1b1: rgya gar skad du/ de rI dz+wa li ma hA mA yA tan tra nA ma/ bad skad du/ lham sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen mo zhes bya bar rgyur//
1b2: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis gsungs pa nyid du gyur pa'i tshe na/ bcom
1b3: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor chen po dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang //
1b4: shin du mos pa chen mo dang / mos pa dang bcas pa srung bar byed pa/ rab tu rnam par srung bar byed pa nye ba mo dang
1b5: bcas pa nye bar zhi ba chen po dang zhi bar mdzad pa chen po mdzes pa dang mdog tu ldan pa/ shes pa dang skyabs su ldan
1b6: pa ni 'di lta ste/ gtso bo rnal 'byor 'khor lo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje nyid tu 'dus pa zhes bya ba dang //
1b7: rnal 'byor chen po btang snyoms zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor chen po dbang du mdzad pa zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor
1b8: s a

2a1: 'dug pa'i cha lugs kyis cod pan lnga dang ldan te/ / ma bsgribs mi sgrib sgribs pa mi 'gog bsgrib tu med pa'i dbyings nas yang dag pa'i gzhal yas chen pon mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rjes skus bkag pas mdzad/
2a2: pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas bzhugs so// de yang 'di ltar so sor gsal bar mnyam pa chen po dang 'khor dang bcas pa mnyam pa chen pos yo byad chen po ni kun gyi gdung 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa ni brten
2a3: pas byin ci ma log pa dang gnyis du ma med pa ni/ gzungs rnal 'byor ma chen mo ste/ byang chub chen mo nam mkha' zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo nam mkha' 'dzin ma zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mos
2a4: srungs ma zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo brlan par byed pa chen mo dang / byang chub chen mo rnam par 'khengs pa spang ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo las grub par mdzad ma zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo rdo rje rab
2a5: tu chags pa chen po 'dzin zhes bya ba dang / rab tu ma chags pa gsod ces bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo rab tu rmongs sel zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo gsung gi 'khor lo ma zhes bya ba ste// de dag kyang 'di lta ste/
2a6: shin tu ud pal lta bu'i mdog dang / sha ga kra dang / bai dUr+ya dang / pad ma rA ga dang / a sa ma gar pa la sogs pa rdzas kyi bsngags pas 'phags par 'tsher ba ma smin pa med par bzhugs pa ni rnal 'byor ma
2a7: kun du bzang po 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ / de yang gus pa chen po gsad pa dang / gus pa chen po sna tshogs pa'i dri dang / gus pa chen po dbang sgyur ba ni gsang ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba dang / gsal ba 'dzin byed ma
2a8: dang / rnam par dri'i gnas su gyur pa dang / rnam par smra byed pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'o// de nyid mthong bar byed pa'i dbang po dang / nyan par byed pa'i dbang po dang / bsung byed chen po'i dbang po dang / btang ba

2b1: chen po'i dbang po dang / shin du gtong bar mdzad pa dang / shin du rtog par mdzad pa dang / shin du 'dzin dbang chen po dang / shin du grub par mdzad pa dang / cha lugs mi gtong ba'i btsun mo dang bcas pa'o//
2b2: yod pa rnam par rtog par mdzad pa dang / med pa sel bar mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'du shes rgyal ba yin par mdzad pa dang / shin du 'gog pa rnam par 'joms pa chen mo dang / mngon spyong kyi las kyis gnyis
2b3: su med par 'khril nas chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa chen po'i gzhal yas na bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma'i gzhal yas su dgyes nas ma skyes pa'i dbyings shes
2b4: rab kyi tshegs chen mo mu khyud kun dang ldan pa/ zla rgyas lta bu'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dbus med par khyab pa/ rin po che kun dang ldan pa/ grwa dang dos dang kha dog dang dbyebs rgya khyod dpag tu mang par gyur
2b5: pa/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i cha lugs kyis rnam par mdzes pa/ yid bzhin chen po'i rgyan gyis rnam par spras pa/ sna tshogs pa'i bye brag gis rgyal ba rnams kyi gdung 'dzin pa/ sgyu 'phrul
2b6: chen po'i sgo bzhi dang ldan pa/ theg pa phyi'i rnal 'byor rnams kyi theg pa chen po 'bab gzhol dge sdig chen po'i mchog shin du gsang ba chen mo dang bcas pa/ pad ma chen po'i dbus na lce kha dog bzhi'i bye
2b7: brag gis mdzes par gyur pa/ phyogs bzhi bre ba rim pa gsum gyi cha lugs kyis gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor sgrib pa mchog tu sel
2b8: ba ste le'u dang po'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po gdung ba mchog tu sel bar mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'dzum pa chen pos rab tu chags pa chen po la

3a1: dbang sgyur bar dgyes te/ gsang ba chen mo'i mkha' la pad ma dbang gi mdog gis rgyas par mdzad de/ oM su rat+na su khe zhes brjod pas rdo rje rigs bsam gyi mi khyab pa btsun mo dang bcas par gyur
3a2: to/ / de nas rab tu 'di brjod par mdzad do// bzhi pa kha dog dkar la 'tsher// btang snyoms kun gyi spro bsdu yis// gsum pa rdzogs par gsal ba dang // phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog de dag las// rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du dgyes//
3a3: phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// bcu gsum pa yi cha lugs kyis// che chung med par gsal bar bsgom// dbul gnyis pa'i yi ger ldan// gsal ba nyid kyi dus dag tu// cod pan lnga yis rin chen las// rgyan gyi
3a4: rigs ni gsal ba yin/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba rgyan dam pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// gsum pa mthing 'bar yi ge che// rigs kyi rin chen spro bsdu las// phyag rgyar gsal bas skur
3a5: gsal ba/ rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du dgyes// sgrib pa kun spangs sdig med sdoms// gnyis pa yi ni yi ge las// cod pan lnga ldan yi ger gsal// thams cad blo sbyangs yid bzhin gter// mnyam pa 'khril ba'i
3a6: tshul 'dzin pa/ rin chen rigs kyi phyag rgyar gsal// las thams cad kyi mchog rgyal mo rnam par rol pa'i phyag rgya'o// pad ma rA ga 'dra ba'i mdog/ chos sku zla tshes rab ldan pa// gsal ba'i kha dog mdzes pa ni// thams
3a7: cad ma lus dbang du mdzad/ / sbyar dang bskyed dang bsdu ba yis// phyag rgyar gsal bas dbang gi sku// btsun modag dang mnyam du dgyes// gnyis su med par 'khril ba yis// dbu ru yi ge gnyis pa ldan// rin chen rigs kyi
3a8: spro bsdu las/ cod pan rigs lnga kha dog ste// ji bizhan pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// phyag rgya bzhugs tshul pad ma'i tshul// mnyam par bsam pas dkyil 'khor yin// mi 'byed pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor

3b1: spyan 'dus mchog/ pad ma rigs kyi phyag rgyar gas la// mun pa sel ba'i mar me bzhin// gsal dag yid gnyis med par bsgom// chu skyes 'dzum pa'i 'od du ldan// steg dang spyod pa'i rol mo yis// dgyes shing mnyam pa/
3b2: mchod par bsham// 'di ltar gsal bas dbang yang rdzogs// thams cad sdud pa zhes su bya// de bzhin dang ste las thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// dus gsum pa yi mdzad pa che// rigs kun 'dus pa bde gshegs las
3b3: mnyam pa ji bzhin ting 'dzin te/ / yi ge 'bru gcig kun gyi mchog/ bshad pas khyab par las kun rdzogs// chu skyes gsal ba'i 'dab ma ste// gnyis su med par gsal ba ni// rnam pa gnyis kyi bye brag gis// 'dus pa
3b4: gsal bas skur gyur pa/ / 'dod cing chags pa ma yin zhing // blo la yid gnyis med pa dang // phyag rgyar gsal bas rgyal ba'i sku// rgyal mo dang ni mnyam du dgyes// dbu gnyis pa yi yi ger ldan// sbyin pa rgya chen khengs pa//
3b5: rang gi 'dod pa'i gnas su bsdu// bong tshong lo grangs khyad par med// gnyis su med par 'khril bar gsal// dus kun du ni mnyam ldan pas// gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu rdzogs// zla rgyas lta bu'i gtso ba bsgom// chags/
3b6: pa med par 'dod sdud pa'i// yum dang lhan cig bsgom pa ni// A li kA li byed pa'i don// phyag rgya las kyi bye brag gis// bde ba chen po'i tshul gnas pa// rgyal ba kun kyang de bzhin 'thun// phyag lag snol mar gnas pa
3b7: yi/ / kun kyang sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro// phyag rgya thal mo rdo rje ni// kun kyang yum gyi rgyab tu stsol// zhal gnyis mdzes par rab rgyas nas// zla gam pa yi ljags gnyis mdzes// drung gi phar bus 'khur chos la// gdabs/
3b8: shing spabs pa'i tshul du bzhugs// bsnyen pa nye bsnyen dbang rdzogs pa// rgyal ba kun gyi sku yis mchog/ bzhad dang 'dzum pa'i gtso gzungs bsgom// rnal 'byor dka' thub chen po'i don// gsang ba sprod la shin du

4a1: dgyes/ gsad pa nyid tu sems can 'dran// thams cad kun gyi rmongs pa sel// yum gyi las kyi khyad par na// sa ya rim pa kun phyung shing // zas la bgal dbang med pa// nyan pas 'gag pa la gas
4a2: pa/ byang chub sems kyi char chen gyis// dam bor bcings pa tshar gcod mdzad// dam tshig chen po sdom pa ste// rgyal ba kun gyi dkyil 'khor yin// phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs mchog ni// dag pa don gyi rigs
4a3: mchog yin/ / myur bar rtag tu ma yengs na// gdon mi zla bar 'grub pa ni// 'dod khams lha yi nyin byed kyis// gsang ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang pa mnyam zhes bya ba'i
4a4: rgya'o/ / kun du bzang po rnal 'byor mchog/ gsang ba nyid kyi mkha' dbyings nas// yi ge a ldan tsheg drag bcas// rnal 'byor bde chen thugs kyi sras// gzugs khams la sogs byin rlabs nas// phyag
4a5: mtshan 'khor lor gsal ba dang / / bde ba rnal 'byor de bzhin gsheg// btsom gser gyi kha dog la// nyi ma zer gyi 'od bzhin du// gsal ba 'tsher ba bcom ldan 'das// dbu ru yi ge gnyis pa las// rin
4a6: chen myu gu khang pa 'bar/ / sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan gyis// legs par brgyan pa mtshan rnams rdzogs// rdzogs pa chen po'i bzhugs tshul dang // ting 'dzin 'thun pas 'gro la dmigs// pad ma ge sar dbus//
4a7: gnas pa'i// thig bzhi gsang ba bzhi dang ldan// mdun du lha mo chags pa mo// lo grangs nyi shu mdzes dang ldan// ma hA bu ka'i gnas la dgyes// mdzes pa'i lag pa gar dang chas// gnyis su med pa'i bzhugs
4a8: tshul ni gtso la brtan pa'i tshul du bzhugs/ / rgyab tu lha mo dgyes chen mo// sangs rgyas brten par mdzad tshul gyis// thal mos 'dzin pa sku brtan pa// sku che bcu drug rtsa dmar sku// sangs rgyas gdung

4b1: 'dzin chags pas skyong/ / 'dod chags can la 'thun par mdzad// g.yas su zhe sdang gdul ba mo// rdo rje pad mor sbyor la dgyes// ma dad pa rnams dbang med par// drag bor sbyor mdzad zhe sdang sel// chags pa
4b2: chen po bcom ldan 'das/ / gnyis su med par sbyor ba yis// gtong ba med par bstan pa'i tshul// sde bsangs mdangs ldan khyad par che// khru tshad bcwa lnga chags pa can// dus mtha' med par sbyor la dgyes/
4b3: steg dang sgeg pa'i cha lugs kyis// sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal 'khru// rab tu skams pa 'gog pa rnams// brlangs nas rgyal ba'i sra su 'gyur// ad tra ma li'i phrin las kyis// thams cad byang
4b4: chub chen por mdzad/ / mig gnyis 'dzums dang sbom po yis// dbang mor ldan par byas pa na// gnyis su med par sbyor 'dod yin// sna yi rtse mor mthe'u chung 'dzin// ma btang bzhugs la brtson byos pa'o//
4b5: so rnams bsdams nas kha bye ba// dus la bab ces bya ba ste// ting 'dzin gsal bar rgyu ba na// dus la bab ces bya ba yin// 'di ltar brda ldan ting 'dzin la// dam can bud med mi 'dud pa// dngos grub mi
4b6: 'gyur dam tshig nyams/ / tshe rabs kun du brlag par 'gyur// 'di ltar brtson par byed pa na// g.yan pa bslang ba rnam bzhi yis// skyes bu na chung tshul bzhin du// rdo rje pad ma'i 'tshams nyid tu/ dbyings
4b7: byug lnga yi sbyor ldan pas/ / dal bus dal bus gzhugs pa dang // dal bus dal bus rab tu bskul// drag po'i yi ge spros pa na// byang chub sems kyi pad ma dgang // sbom po dbang ngam lnga rnams kyis// yum
4b8: gyis blangs te gtso la mchod/ / nye ba'i bsnyen pa la sogs pas// bsnyen pa che chud rdzogs par bsgom// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor las// mchod pa brgyad kyis bstod par mchod// de ltar longs spyod

5a1: rdzogs pa dang / / gnyis su med par lung bzhin du// mnyam par 'khril ba'i tshul du bstan// dus gsum kun du gdung 'dzin pa// g.yon phyogs brten pa'i skal dang ldan// bong chod lo ni bcu dgu pa'i/
5a2: sdong po dul ba dag la dgyes// g.yas par bzur ba'i spyan gyis gzigs// dril bu sgra snyan khrol la brtson// rdo rje rab tu sgrogs byed ma// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can// mngon du sbyor la rab brtson pa// brda dang //
5a3: bcas pa'i gar gyis ni// sangs rgyas kun la slong mdzad ma// byang chub sems kyi sprin chen gyis// mchod pa chen pos rab mchod mnyes// sprul pa bsam yas mtha' klas pa// dus gsum 'khor lo bskor ba
5a4: bskul/ ngo sor chags pa'i mdangs kyis ni// mnyes dang bcas pa'i gar gyis mchod// gru chad bzhi yi rim pa las/ thos byed gsal byed gsung ba che// dri dang ldan pa la sogs pas// btsun mo dag dang
5a5: gcig tu/ / gnyis su med pa'i tshul du bzhugs// bar khyams bzhi la gnas pa ni// thos byed dbang dang nyan byed dbang // dri mchog dbang du lta byed dbang // dus ni bzhi rnams lha mo bzhi// btsun mo'i tshogs dang /
5a6: ldan par gnas// zhe sdang 'joms byed la sogs pas// sgo rnams kun du gnas pa ni// snying rje'i yum dang bcas par gnas// nyi ma zla ba pad ma mchog/ rin chen du nga dang bcas pa ste// tshangs pa brgya byin
5a7: gnyis gnyis kyis/ / bteg pa'i khri la rab tu bzhugs// rdzogs pa chen por kun kyang gnas// sems dpa' chen po'i bzhugs tshul du// kun kyang rab tu gnas par bstan// zhal ni kun du sal leb//
5a8: thugs ni kun du lhan ne ba// sku ni kun la khyab par gsal// e ma mi skye mi 'gag mchog/ e ma mi sel mi len mchog/ e mtshad dam drag shul spyod// e ma gshegs pa'i stabs dang bcas// e ma

5b1: mtshan ma sel bar ston/ / e ma gsung rab rgya mtsho sgrogs// e ma byol song spro ba bskyed// e ma sprul pa bsam yas mchog/ e ma mya ngan 'das par mdzad// e ma gsang ba des don mdzad/
5b2: e ma gzungs dang mnyam par sbyor// e ma ci yang mi mdzad mchog/ ngo mtshar sprin los 'di dag gis// sa yi rim pa 'byongs par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas pa nyid mngon par sangs rgyas pa la gleng
5b3: ste mnyes par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang // gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba rnal 'byor bde ba chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
5b4: de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun du bzang mo rnal 'byor ma la 'jug par dgyes te rab tu 'dris pa chen po dgongs pa dang / kun du bzang mo rnal 'byor mas zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas pa// e ma sem/
5b5: dpa' thig le che// bag chags kun gyi bsnyen por gsungs/ 'di las 'jug pa'i chos 'ga' med zhes brjod do// de nas gsang ba chen mo dang gnyis su med par 'khril bar gyur te/ g.yon pa bskyed pa rnam pa mang
5b6: bos mnyes pa dang pad ma sbas pa la sogs pa 'byung ba spel bar mdzad nas rab tu dgyes te glu 'di blangs so/ / e ma bde ba mchog las skyes pa phyag na rdo rje can// chos kun dngos po med par gsal ba la/ 'byung
5b7: nas chen pos ya mtshan 'byung bar mkhyen pa e mngo mtshar che/ / rgyu nyid stong pas 'bras bu btsal med pa'i// rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid kyang rgyal bas yong mi rnyed// stong pa nyid la dga' ba'i chags pa'i cho 'phrul pa/
5b8: de phyir skye 'gag med ces rgyal ba rnams kyis 'di la brjod// tshes kun dbyer med ma rnyings pa nyid las// kun gyi dga' ba 'byung ba rgyal ba kun pas shin du 'phags shes brjod pas gsang ba'i mkha' la kun du

6a1: bzang po rnal 'byor 'jug par mdzad de shin du rngam pa'i glu 'di blangs so/ / sgyu ma kun las 'phags pas dbyer med rnam par 'phrul byed pa// kun du bzang po rnal 'byor de ni bder gshegs yum
6a2: chen kun gyi gsos/ sdug bsngal kun sbyong ba der gshegs yum la 'jug pa thugs dam yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs// oM hUM mi 'gog ji yang mdzad pa nyid ni mi mdzad mnyam pa yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs// 'di
6a3: ni glu ru blangs pa yis/ / mya ngan 'das kun 'gro ba'i mgon// stong pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor la// dka' thub chen po thob par 'gyur zhes// gnyis su med par glengs so// de nas snying po mchog gi yi ge ni// dang po'i
6a4: gnas su bsgom par bya/ / de snying yi ge bzhi pa ste// rdo rje chen po gsol ba mchog/ yi ge a ldan thig le che// chos kun 'dus par rnam par bsgom// dang por me long lta bu ste// mnyes pa'i kha dog shin du 'bar//
6a5: phyag lag 'khyud pa spyod pa yis// thams cad de dang 'dra bar gsal// oM hU~M su ra ta su ke dz+nyA na da oM A hUM// bder gshegs rgyal mo mkha' dbyings su// gsal dag las rnams 'grub par bsgom// chu skyes pad/
6a6: ma 'dab ma stong // bshad pa'i sgras ni rnam par brgyan// de steng chos kyi sku ru gsal// zla rgyas lta bu'i mkha' dbyings nas// thams cad bsdu ba gsum gyis bsdus// oM su ra tA su khe d+harmad+hA tu swa b+hA bA oM A hUM/
6a7: gnyis su med pa'i yi ge mchog/ mi skye ba ni a dang ldan// byin rlabs rgyal ba kun gyi gnas// mchod pa brgyad dang gsal bar ldan// so sor gsal ba'i mkha' dbyings la// hU~M gzer gyis reg par mdzad//
6a8: oM su ra tA mu kha na pradz+nyA b+hak+Sha na swa b+ha bA oM A hUM/ byang chub sems kyi cher chen ni// yig gnyis pa rtsa dmar su// gnyis su med par ldan pa na// bdud kun rnam par btul ba dang // dbyings kyi bde la gsal ba

6b1: ni/ klong bye ba yi tshul gyis ni pad mang bya ba sna chags b+ha// spro ba dang ni bsdu ba yis// bya ba nan tan ye shes bstad// 'di ltar rgyal bkun mdzad pa// sprul ba bsam gyis mi khyab las// mchod pa mang ba
6b2: mor ldan/ / oM su ra tra su khan duSh+Ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha bA oM A hU~M/ rnal 'byor skal ldan chen po ni// skal ngan kun gyi gsos su gsungs// gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems// mangs bshang gcirnga
6b3: rnams ni/ / dogs pa med pa'i dngos grub ste// rgyal ba nyid la rgyal bas mchod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po las bag chags gtan la 'bebs pa gnyis su med par gleng
6b4: pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i snying po rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang // gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgya'i mchog ni 'di lta ste// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i phyag rgya las// mdzes
6b5: par gsal ba yab yum bcu/ / sor mo phan tshun spel legs pa// rdo rje thal mo byang chub rgya// gsang ba rnal 'byor thugs kyi mchog/ dam tshig sdom pa 'da' bar dka'// rnal 'byor pa la a lI gsal/
6b6: kun du bzang la kar byed// lnga char zur du ldan pa ni// gcig tu gyur pas gar gyi gni// ma d+hi tra AHnA~M/ mA A k+Sha dz+wA rA/ thal mo btang snyoms tshul gyis ni// mdzes pa'i mtha' na kar gyis bya// snying kar bcings pas/
6b7: rnal 'byor don// gar gyi phyag rgya dang nyid pas// gar du byas pas thal mo sngol// mjug tu dbul ba'i tshul gyis bstod// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las// g.yon pa rtse gsum g.yas pas gzung // de nyid gnas
6b8: ru 'bigs par bya/ / rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las// dga' ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa yis// g.yas su bdud pa'i tshul gyis ni// g.yas pa yin thugs kar bsgred // g.yon pa gsung nyan 'khril ba'i tshul/ dong //

7a1: gar gyi phyag rgya las// mdzes pa'i mtha' nas gar byas shing // gzhan nas bsdus nas g.yas g.yon 'jog// rdo rje gang ni de dag las// lag pa g.yas pa 'degs pa dang // dbul ba'i tshul du rnam
7a2: par brtag/ rdo rje gar ni de dag las// spyan dang dbu ni g.yon du 'dud// cang te'u thogs pa'i tshul gyis ni// mchod pa byed par rnam par bsngags// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las// lus ni g.yas g.yon bsdu
7a3: dang / gar las lag pa bral ba skyed pa'o// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las// g.yon pas g.yas pa'i gru mo gzung // g.yas pa nyug pa'i tshul du bya'o// de nyid rdo rje gang dag las// dam tshig phyag rgya 'thor bar
7a4: bstan/ rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las// dam tshig phyag rgya steng du bsgyur// de nyid g.yon pa'i nang dag las// g.yas pa'i dam tshig phyag rgyas gtor// de nyid g.yas pas drangs par ldan// de nyid gnyis pas gzung
7a5: ba yi na/ de nyid gnyis ka thal mo bsdam/ de nyid dril bu 'dzin par bsgom// oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ mu ka ka ra su khe na oM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma rA gas+t+raM su ga na hUM// oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+wa la yA nA na ma ma hA su ken tAM/
7a6: oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma b+ha shra su khe na hA hA hA/ de nyid gtso bo'i phyag rgya ba cas// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba bud d+ha lo tsa na A da ma na~M/ sur tra su kha na maN+Da la pU dza ya pU dza ya oM oM a~M/ oM sarba ta thA kaN+Da
7a7: ma hA d+hu dzA dzA/ oM sur tra su khe na b+han d+ha b+han d+hA/ bA dza ya bA dza ya/ hUM hUM hUM A oM sur tra su khe na/ man sha moH/ bA dza ya pU dza ya/ trirbi traM/ oM sur d+ha su kha~M na sarba ta thA ga ta d+ha rma dan tra/ sA d+ha ka na da tso na/
7a8: sarba ta thA ga ta shri badz+ra lA s+ye/ badz+ra gar+b+he su khe na pU dza ya pU dza ya/ oM hU~M hUM hUM A// sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra gar+b+he su kha na pU dza ya pU dza ya/ tr-i traM lA a/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra gan d+he badz+ra gan+d+he su khe na/ d+he ba d+he ba/

7b1: bAdz+ra ya bA dza ya/ trA~M hU~M hAM a/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra nir te badz+ra gan+d+he ma hA ti la ka su ke na pU dza ya bA dza ya/ a a a/ oM hU~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra du be/ badz+ra gar+b+he su khe na bA dz+ra ya pU dza ya/ oM tad tad tang
7b2: hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra puSh+pe badz+ra gar+b+he su khe na pU dza ya pU dza ya/ hUM hAM tAM aM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra a lo ka dz+nyA na ma Na Ta la ti la ka bud d+ha su khi na pU dza ya bA dza ya/ oM hriM hraM hriM oM A hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta
7b3: shrI badz+ra gan+d+he badz+ra gar+b+he ma hA ma hA maN Da la ti la ka su ke na pU dza ya pU dza ya/ a a a/ oM a hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes pa'i mchog las kar gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
7b4: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen mo dang bcas pa dam tshig bla na med pa'i rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// thams cad sdom pa la gnas par mkhyen no// dam tshig chen
7b5: po 'di dag gsungs/ / so so'i theg pa bsam yas pa// so sor nyes pa med na bde// 'jig rten pa la chad mdo brtsan// 'dul ba 'dzin la bsrungs na bde// gtsang sbrar spyod la gtsang spur spyad// mi dge zlog na dge
7b6: ba bcu/ / spyad pas lhag pa'i 'jig rten 'dzin// rang gi don gyi ting 'dzin gyis// byang chub sa la gnas pa'i rnams// nyams pa med de ma bcol na// nyams pa med de las kyang 'grub// rnal 'byor spyad pa
7b7: spyod pas 'thub/ / tshe gces goms pas theg pa 'joms// gtso mchog pa shes gnyen mi spang zhing // bkur sti ras gro mchog kyang bskyed// ting 'dzin goms par cha lugs bsgom// tshig gi bzlas pa
7b8: bar mi gcad/ / dam tshig mched la gdung ba bskyed// sku yi dam tshig bsam mi khyab// gsung gi dam tshig bsngags pa yin// thugs kyi dam chog lhag par gsungs// rigs lnga bsrungs pa'i dam che gnams/

8a1: nyams na shin du skyongs par dka'// spyad pa'i dam tshig rdzas rnams ni// nyams na nyur bar bkang ba yin// nyams pa ma bskangs le lo yis// sangs rgyas kun dang gtsugs chen te// 'khyam
8a2: rnam pa bcu bor ni/ / myur bar skye bar nges pa ste// de bas rigs kyi bu mchog ni// mchog dang tha ma 'bring gi rnams// rab kyi bar chad med par spyad// 'bring gis lo zla dus drug ste// tha mas lo 'tshams
8a3: mi bzla zhes/ / rgyal ba rnams kyis shin du gsungs// rdo rje dri dang byang chub sems// rag ta dri chen che chen po// dag pa'i snod dang rab ldan pas// byin gyis brlabs te 'thung byed pa// dam tshig sdom la
8a4: gnas pa ste/ / 'das na rlag pa chen por 'gyur// mnyam par bzhag pa'i chos thams cad// mnyam par shes pas spyad pa dang // mnyam pa nyid tu gsal ba na// rnal 'byor sems dpa' yin zhes
8a5: gsungs/ / rnal 'byor skrod du bya ba gang / rdzas kyi bsngags pa yod pa rnams// rab tu bkru zhing byi dor bya// ka la bing ka'i mdog bzhin du// gzhong bu phur bu snod kyi rnams// dri ma bkru zhing mdzes par//
8a6: bya// dus gsum du ni sman sbyar ba// dang por dngul gyi gzhong bar sbyar// de nas dgan gzhod pa ste// zangs kyi gzhong par sbyar ba ni// srang re sbyar ba'i sman rnams las// zangs dang dngul dang ra gan nam// gser
8a7: dang lcags su rab bsres la/ / rnam rtog nad la sman sbyor ba// maun dA ra ba'i mdog bzhin sbyar// man dA ra bar ma gyur tshe// nam yang sbyor bar ma gsungs te// nyi zla dus gcig shar ba na// de nas rdzas kyi
8a8: bsngags pa las/ / sman gyi sbyor ba rab tu brtsam// shin du sman rnams 'byor pa na// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bas ma yas su// ka la bi dka'i mdog tu brtag/ 'di la gang zhig mi brtson pa// dam tshig mi brtsan

8b1: sdom pa med/ rdo rje spun las dben par gdon// lha dang rdo rje slob dpon la// bag med par ni brnyas pa dang // rmongs pas ma mthong g.yel ba dang // dam chos srog la mi lta ba// sangs rgyas rgyal ba bdun la brnyas/ dkyil
8b2: 'khor ba yi las byas pa/ / sems can dmyal ba chen po ste// tshe thung nad kyis btab pa dang 'jig rten 'di ru gnod pa mang// shi nas dmyal ba ngan song ste// de bas sdom pa 'di dag las// 'da' bar mdzad
8b3: pa gang yang med/ / 'di las 'das par mi byed pas// tshe 'di nyid la rgyal ba'i sku// lhun gyis grub pa'i sa la gnas zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid la nyid dam tshig chen po'i sdom pa 'dis
8b4: shin du bsnyengs par mdzad do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bde ba sdom pa thams cad kyi mchog gi le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po
8b5: rnal 'byor ma dang bcas pa dgongs pa gcig tu gnas par mdzad do/ / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po spyad pa mchog dang ldan pa'i spyod pa ma lus pa nyid dang zab mo'i don yin par mkhyen to// mkhyen nas sgyu
8b6: 'phrul chen mo'i thabs 'di gsungs so/ / e mchos dbyings rnam dag spyod yul las// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis ston ya mtshan 'phrul chen yin// de yang ye shes tshogs las sna tshogs snang mod kyi/
8b7: zud ma dkun gyi sgyu ma las ni rab tu sprul te 'char// bde na gnyis sa sor snang ba nyid kyang yum gyi mkha' zhes rgyal bas gsungs// mnor la mchen sgom na kun du bzang mo bsgoms pas lam du zhugs pa yin/
8b8: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa kun shes rab bud med las ni mchod cing bsnyen pas ye shes chen por 'grub bo// dkyil 'khor gdon pa'i las kyi dngos grub mchog gi la rdo rje klu'i don de nyid gnyis su med pa'i dgong/

9a1: pa lagasal bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid// dpa la kun du bzang pos thabs dang shes rab kyi langs spyad 'ad gsungs so// mngan spyad las kyis 'jug pan/ na
9a2: tshun du ni dga' spyod pa/ / rnal 'byor sdom la gnas pa yin// de la mchod pa dam pa ni// sbyor ba rab tu sbyor ba ste// kun du khyab pa kun du sbyor// rjes su chags pa dam tshig mchog/ de phyir kar sham mdog dang ldan//
9a3: bcu drug zong tshong ring ba la// lugs su thugs pa lta bu ste// lus legs mdzes dang ldan pa dang // dpral ba dbyes chags ko pra// nu mchung zhing sor mo ring // yid tsam bzung la mig dkyus ring // dkar zhing rtsa dpa
9a4: mngangs su chags/ / so dkar thags bzangs 'tshams thung zhing // skad sbom gdangs dang ldan pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas mchog ste// 'di la rtse bar byed pa ni// rigs kyi rdo rje gdon miza// cha 'di nyid la 'gru
9a5: par 'gyur/ / gnas rab dben par rab brtag ste// sha dkar mdangs ldan mdog dang ldan// lus 'bring zlum pa cha byad can// so dkar thags dam migs dkyus zlum// skad phra mdog dkar spro ring ba// dpral dpes
9a6: la sogs bzang gnas pa/ / rma dag gnas pa la sogs ni// rtag par chos la 'dud pa yin// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi rigs can te// 'di la brtson byas bsgrub pa yis// de bzhin rigs kyi ting 'dzin la// phan tshun
9a7: du ni dga' spyad na/ / tshangs pa'i snga dro gcig tsam gyis// gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor sbyor ba dga' ba ni// sbyor ba brtson pas 'grub par gsungs// bud med cha lugs legs pa ni// bong tshad mi ring
9a8: lus phra zhing / / rkang lag chung zhing skad gsal ba// mig legs ngo zlum rtsa dmar che// lhun du chags la mi shes med// lus la mtshan gyi rma 'dras brgyan// tshig gsal rmi lam nyung ba dang // so dkar mchu legs dad par

9b1: ldan/ / chos sems ba yi ting 'dzin gyis// gsang ba'i mkha' la nyi zla'i 'od// rdo rje pad mar ldan byas te// phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na// 'dod khams lha yi skad cig gis// 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// lus
9b2: zub brtu dang nga rgyal bcas/ / khong na tshig rnon sems la 'dzin// bya bar dran la mi gtong ldan// bslab pa blo rdul sha rus che// mdangs bkrag brtags na phyi phyir che// sbyin la dga' zhing chos la dang // rin chen
9b3: rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis/ / bag chags yi dges rtsad gcod cing // ti du 'dzin blo la gsal ba na// bsgrub bdu la bab pa ste// de tshe rab tu brtson pa yis// yum gyi pad ma kha bya ste// bde ba thugs kyi 'du 'phro yis/
9b4: phan tshun du ni dga' sprad na// rigs kyi rin chen 'grub pa ni// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// thugs rje mdzad spyod bye brag gis// 'jig rten dag na dman pa'i rigs// rab tu bkug ste dga' spyod na// snying
9b5: rje mchog dang thabs ldan pa/ / rnal 'byor spyod pa chen por gsungs// shan pa rigs ngan rmad 'tshong ba// ngan pa'i rigs dang longs spyod rnams// 'joms pa po yis ting 'dzin gyis// myur du spyad na 'grub par
9b6: gsungs/ / yi dgas gnod sbyin byol song dang // kyi dang du sbal spre'u la sogs// mi dang lha yi gnas mchog kun// so sor 'tsham bor dga' spyad na// dregs pa can la zhi ba che// btsuni la dga' ba btsun pa
9b7: thabs kyi padzang steng blon gyi mchog/ sems can 'di dag don gyi byed// byin ci logatu gang spyod nams// 'dul ba'i mang pa sna tshogs kyis// mi mdzad panam yang med// shin du garnam pa'i cha grags kyis
9b8: po thams cad dbang du mdzad/ / shin du na pa'i cha lugs kyis// chags pa can rnams dbang du mdzad// shin du mdangs ldan cha lugs kyis// chags pa'i yid rnams dbang du mdzad// em shin du mtshar tsha//

10a1: ci yang yin pas cir me dgongs zhes gsungs pas thams cad rab tu brtson pa chen po dang ldan par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nam mkha' dang mnyam ba rdul
10a2: phra mo'i rdul snyed rab tu 'dun pa'i thugs kyis/ mnyam pa brtson par mdzad do// rdo rje chos kyi mchog la sogs pa rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu mnyan pa dang gus pa mchog dang ldan pa sa yongasu gzung
10a3: ba'i le'u mdzad/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen mos rab tu brtson pa mdzad// rab tu brtson pa'i yid kyis spyod pa dang 'khyud pa dang gyad kyi dgyes pa dang / mgub bla na med pas phan tshun du
10a4: dga' ba spyad do/ / de nas de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di gsungs so// oM hUM ye shes rnal 'byor mchog ldan pas// skal bzangs mchog gi dngos grub stsol// rab tu rmongs pa gsas
10a5: phyir 'gog pa kun slong ba/ / rnal 'byor bde mchog gnyis su med pa 'di dag shin du ngo mtshar che// rin chen yid bzhin gzungs ni kun gyi dbang ldan pa// tshangs ma'i mdangs ldan gzungs ma drangs te de brtson
10a6: bas/ grub par 'gyur ba 'di la dga' spyod a la la// shin du sred pa 'di dag bzhin du spyad pas 'grub par gsungs pas sa la gnas pas kun pas 'phags// rgyal ba kun gyi nang na kun du bzang po rgyal ba kun pas/
10a7: 'phags// de yang kun du bzang mo yin zhes sngon gyi rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs// mtshan ma kun bral rab tu dga' sbyor mi gtong bas// sems dpa' rdo rje nyid kyang de yin rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs// tshangs pa ma
10a8: gi zla 'di dag/ brtson par byed cing len pa ni// dka' thub rnal 'byor ting 'dzin te// tshangs pa mchog gi drog cig gis// gdon mi za bar 'grub par gsungs zhes brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu

10b1: brtson pa chen pos gcig gi rang bzhin du gyur par mdzad do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas dus gsum gyi ston pa thams cad bde bar
10b2: gshegs pa'i rang bzhin te rab tu mchod pa chen pos mnyes shing ma rig pa brgyad khri bzhi stong 'dul bar mkhyen to/ / mkhyen nas ma rig pa grol bar mdzad pa dang zhe sdang rnam par grol bar dgyes te/ de dag mnyam pa chen po'i rang
10b3: bzhin gyis 'dul ba'i thabs su sgrol ba dang / dbang gi rigs kyi sbyor bas rab tu bsrungs shing bsrungs pa mdzad do// bdag gi rnal 'byor kun du bzang // mtshan nyid kun brtags gnyis su med// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam//
10b4: sbyor na// mnyam pa'i sa la gnas pa yin// rang sems zla rgyas dbus gnas pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin te// don rtogs gsal bar gyur pa yis// rab tu bsgral ba chen po ste// mchog gis la gnas rgyud yin
10b5: sku yi tshe 'phrul rigs kun rdzogs/ / gsung gi ston pa bla na med// thugs kyi mdzad pa rtags dang ldan// ting 'dzin 'di ltar gsal ba yis// blo rmongs sdug bsngal sbyangs phyir ro// gnyis su med par gsal ba yis// /
10b6: dza hUM baM hos bsdu ba mdzad// mngon spyod las kyi sgrol ba mdzad// gnyis su med par 'grub par 'gyur// rtags dang shes pa phun sum tshogs// byams pa mdzad pa rnal 'byor thugs// gzungs kyi mchod pa mnyam ldan pas//
10b7: rgyal ba mnyes par sbyor shes na// mnyes pa chen po bdag nyid mchod// bden pa'i tshul du dbyer med pa'i// sems nyid rtogs pa rnam sbyang phyir// ting 'dzin shugs kyis kun bsgral te// mngon spyod las kyis sgrol bar mdzad
10b8: gsang ba'i mkha' la kun du sbyor/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzad spyod bsam gyis mi khyab pa las mchod pa de kho na nyid de le'u bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor rab tu skyong ba la dgyes te/

11a1: slob ma mchog dang 'bring dang tha mas yon gyi dbul ba mang po byas te dkyil 'khor du gzung ba mdzad do// bgegs tshar gcad pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis gdong bar bstan rin po ches
11a2: lag sor bkang ste snying po 'di blos su bzhug go/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bu dzI ta d+hi d+ha tiSh+Tha hUM/ oM ma hA maN Da la de ba ka ra pU dza ya pU dza ya hUM a/ zhes brjod de me tog 'thor du gzhug go// gang la bab pa'i bshes
11a3: gnyen bstan/ / sngags dang phyag rgya dam tshig bstan// de nas dam tshig chu blud cing // tshig 'di rab tu go bar bste// sems can gyi ni gzugs chen po// las la sogs te dbang bskur ba// rgyal ba'i sras su
11a4: dbang bskur yin/ / de ring phan chad bu khyod kyi// dam tshig gnyen po 'di dag ni// srog pi phyir yang mi gtang zhing // slob dpon ma btang grogs la mchod// bka' la gus par mnyan par byos// gal te bka'
11a5: las 'das 'gyur na/ / gzhom dang gzhig dang dam rtsal dang // spro dang spar dang dmyal bar skye// sems la chu 'di gnas pa ni// phrin las rnam bzhi 'tsham par bya// zhes brjod nas// rdo rje slob dpon dkyil
11a6: 'khor dang / kun du bzang dang mched la sogs// zhabs la gtugs dang gus par bya// rgyud kyi mnyan pa thams cad bya// bsgrub pa'i gzugs la brten pas bsgrub// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog la// gsang
11a7: ba'i ming gi dbang yang bskur/ / gus par ldan pa'i bu mchog des// rgyal po dbang yod rgyal po srid// rang lus gnas dang 'khor yul dang // bu dang chung ma tsha rgyud dang // rin po che dang shel dang dngul//
11a8: sna bdun rin chen nor gyi dbyig/ rta dang glang po shing rta dang // ma he ne'u le ci yod rnams// gter dang dbyig dang yid 'thad pa// sems la the tsom med pa yis// bkur sti rim gro mchog bskyed la/ phul

11b1: na rgyal ba mnyes par 'gyur/ / de nas dbang mnod theg pa'i tshad// rim pa bzhin du mnod par bya// mnyan pa grub pa la sogs dang // las dang ging dang rgyal 'theb dang // spyan dang rdo rje tshad 'dzin pa// bye brag
11b2: mngag pa la sogs rnams/ / gsang ba'i dbang rnams gang nod pa// nyi shu 'am bcu gnyis lo nang la// gos dang dbu rgyan bza' btung dang // phyag rgya dril bu la sogs pa// dkyil 'khor 'di ltar gsal bsgom
11b3: te/ / rgyal ba kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// mngon du bstan bting dga' spyod cing // steng nas rgyal pos dbang bskur na// gdon mi za bar dngos grub thob// tshig gi legs pa stong ra bya// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog
11b4: des/ / zhabs la gtugs de gtang rag gtang // rdo rje spun dang gzungs ma yis// rgyal ba'i rgyal ba yin zhes brjod/ dus gsum kun gyi sras chen po/ dus gsum kun gyi spyad pa spyod// khams gsum kun gyi sgrol ba de slob ba mcho gi spyad pa skyed/
11b5: shin du rnal 'byor skal ldan pa// dam tshig sdom la gnas pa dang // mtshan ma med pa'i chu 'thung zhing // ji ltar bsgo ba'i las byed pa// kun la byed par rab grags yin// phyi rabs 'dren pa'i gdung 'dzin pa// sgyu 'phrul dra/
11b6: ba'i sa la gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba de kho na nyid las mchod yon dam pa dang snying rje'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i
11b7: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gnas par mdzad do/ / mdzad nas snrel zhi dang bya byed yan man mang po mi 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas yang las la ltos pa rang thad kyi sdug bsngal rnams mi g.yo ba'i ting nge
11b8: 'dzin gyis 'jog par mdzad do/ / de nas yang mu stegs rtag par lta ba ther thug pa la rtag pa ther zug gis cha lugs kyis 'dul bar mdzad do// chad pa phyis mi 'dod ces bya ba la cha lugs des mnyam pa la 'dzud par

12a1: mdzad do/ / mdzad nas rab tu 'gog pa'i dka' thub kyis myur ba bde ba la gnas par mi ster ba rnams la dka' thub 'gyur ba chen po'i tshul gyis 'dul dbang chen po mdzad do// drag shul gyi brtsan thabs la dga'
12a2: bde thagazangs ris kyi cha lugs kyis 'dul bar mdzad do/ / gzhan la snying rjer ma gyur pa'i phyogs gcig pa'i sa rgyal rnams la yid bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dul bar mdzad do// gling bzhi'i dge sdig cha mi shes pa
12a3: la 'khor los sgyur ba chen por mdzad nas 'dul bar mdzad do/ / sbrebs pa chen po dang gtub pa chen po dang / btso ba dang rab tu so tha ma tha ma che chung rnams gnyen po dang zangs kha dang / gshed po chen po'i tshul gyis 'dul
12a4: bar mdzad do/ / de dag kyang chos mnyam pa chen po byang chub kyi tshul rdo rje theg pa kun gyi mchog rang bzhin gyi tshul gyis gnas pa thabs dang shes rab dbyer med de rol pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas par mdzad do/ thabs
12a5: kyi mdzad pa khro bo rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po bdud 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad do// de nas bdud
12a6: zhe sdang chen po zhes bya ba de bskal pa stong gi dus na sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa blangs pas byang chub tu sems ma skyed pa/ / rab tu gdug pa/ spyi bung ba/ bong che zhing tsher sad che ba/ mtshon cha dang khrag gi gdug pas
12a7: sems can la gnod pa/ mtshon gyi mche ba dang bcas pa dpag tshad nas dri tsher te rab tu gsod gcod za 'thung byed cing med pung gi dkyil na gdug pa'i 'da' 'phen cing g.yo ba chen pos bsngo ba drag po dang tsham ngam dug nas
12a8: bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas kun du bzang mo la 'dzum pa mdzad do// yab yum gyi byang chub kyi sems kyi sprin las/ oM d+hu d+hu d+ha d+hur dUr te to/ hUM hUM hU~M/ tri tra~M hri/ hoho zhes brjod pas tshangs pa'i chung

12b1: ma dang / dbang po'i chung ma dang / be sdu'i chung ma dang // tsakra'i chung ma dang / de ba'i chung ma dang / ru tra'i chung ma dang / ka ru na'i chung ma dang / yul 'khor srung gi chung ma dang / rnam thos kyi chung ma dang / 'phags skyes kyi chung ma dang /
12b2: mig mi bzang gi chung ma rnams rab tu chags pa'i 'du shes rang dbang med par skyes te 'du bar mdzad do// de yang byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ mthA badz+ra duka/ ma hA sa ma yas rba sid tri hU~M n+de/ tegs brjod pa
12b3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mang pos mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur te bzhugs pa la tshangs pa'i chung ma la sogs pa 'dus pa thams cad kyis so se re re shin du chags pa chen po'i yid skyes te 'khril bar gyur to/ /
12b4: 'khril nas kyang rol pa'i byang chub kyi sems las chu'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jig rten 'khru zhing 'jig par mdzad do// me'i dkyil 'khor mang pos 'jig rten rab tu bsregs par mdzad do// rlung gi
12b5: dkyil 'khor mang pos 'jig rten sems can gtor bar mdzad do/ / de nas byang chub sems kyi sprin gyis rigs nges par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// de nas gnyis su med pa las bzhengs te// oM oM sarba pi si du sha shA
12b6: dza dza dza/ zhes brjod pas tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug gi chung ma la sogs pa// gzungs las bran mor dam mnos te slar gnas su phyin par gyur to// de nas skra'i cha lugs de las mnyam pa chen po la gnas par mdzad de/
12b7: oM b+ha rA mu tA ma hA tsaN Da tsa dur yo gi ni maN DA la kro d+ha ta la ha la hUM hUM hUM phaT ces brjod pas so so'i chung ma dang bu srid rdo rje bsod byed ma chen mor gyur te/ bdud gdug pa chen po zhe sdang can la sogs pa la jo bo dam mnos
12b8: bzhengs zhes smras te/ bdud gdug pa'i lus la khrag bzhi pas nas gnas so// 'on kyang dam nyan par ma btub ste g.yo bag med par shin du sngo bar gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das sprul pa tham cad gcig tu

13a1: bsdu ba mdzad de dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bro ba dang / rdo rje dang / rde'u chung dang / mda' gzhu dang / zhags pa dang / sdigs pa'i 'dzub mo dang / bar du 'khrug pa'i rol pas/ kun du bzang mo dang 'khril nas
13a2: dbu gsum gsogs te/ sarba b+ha tha sarba b+ha tha hUM hU~M phaT phaT ces brjod pas zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang 'khyen la sogs pa rgyal chen phyogs skyong bsdus te/ khA ti khA hi phaT paT ru lu dra lu ru lurmA
13a3: zhes pas bsgral te ban dar bkang nas gsol te mo gnas par mdzad do/ / yang zhabs g.yas pa'aphen cing 'greng sbyor gyis tshul gyis/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA dz+nyA na gA ra b+ha ho d+h+ya tod+hA tod+ha/ tsan Ta la b+ha la ma hA shrI he ru kan+d+ha nAMrmA/
13a4: trAM trAM trAM/ traM tra~M tra~M/ phaT phaT phaT ces brjod pas so so'i chung ma bu mos rang dbang med par bteg ste phyin to// de nas bdud zhe sdang chen po de yang dregs pa'i chung mas btag ste phyin to// phyin nas bcom ldan 'das dpal
13a5: he ru ka sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan chen pos/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa ma ya shrI he ru ka duSh+TaM d+ha ka ha na/ da ha da ha da ta/ pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa/ hA hA tA hA tA zhes brjod pas rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo rnal 'byor
13a6: ma skul byed ma dang rnal 'byor ma gsod byed ma dang / za byed ma dang / rnal 'byor ma gtum mo dang / las la grub pa chen mo dang / rdo rje sreg byed ma dang / dbang sdud chen po rnams yum gyi gsang ba'i mkha' las byang chub/
13a7: kyi sems kyi sprin las 'thon nas gdug pa'i tshogs bdud mgo nas bzung ste mtshon cha dang bral nas bsgral te lU sug phral nas bsnabs shing bstabs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i dpal rdo rje khrag
13a8: 'thung chen pos 'gro ba gnod sbyin bdud kyi rigs kyi 'khor dang yi dgas kyi lus rta'i lus can gyi srin mo chen mo dang / 'ug pa mo chen mo dang / dur bya chen mo dang / stag dang / seng ge ba glang wa dang / khyi dang / pa wang dang /

13b1: dudud
13b2: sme dang / bya ga dang / bya nod dang / rnga mo dang / bag la sogs pa ma tang ru tra dang chas te gnas pa la mtshan mang mchags pa'i sbyor ba mdzad nas/ hi te ha taH/ rArbAd+hA nA hA/ barba baT baT ces brjod pas byang chub tus
13b3: gyi sprin las seng ge stobs chen po dang / stag gi cha lugs chen mo dang / myos byed rta mgo chen mo dang / 'ug pa'i mgo can dang / bya rog dang / bya rgod dang / mchu rigs la sogs pa srin mo'i cha lugs dang ma bral ba'i mdog
13b4: gis 'thon nas phaT phaT phaT/ tsan Da ma hA maN+Dal hUM phaT zhes brjod pas gdug pa'i tshogs bsgral par mdzad de bya dang / mche ba can dang / sder chags kyi za stangs kyis 'phrog cing gsol ba mdzad do// de bzhin
13b5: gshegs pa dpal sgyu 'phrul chen mos yang phyi sa bstan pa la mi sgrib par bya ba'i ched du las kyi bzlas pa 'di bka' stsal to/ / 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu ru// 'khor yug dur khrod chen po ste// 'bar ba'i dkyil
13b6: 'khor gsal 'gyur nas/ / drag po 'dul ba'i don ched tu// dkyil 'khor 'bar ba de dbus su// khrag 'thung ye shes chen po ste// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // ser nag 'jigs pa chen po'i sku/ sangs
13b7: rgyas khros pa'i rgyal mo dang / / ma hA su kha'i tshul du 'khril// rnam par thar pa'i zhal gsum gyis// khams gsum ma lus rngub cing gsol// thugs dang snying rje chen po yis// sku yi dkyil 'khor chen por bsdus//
13b8: rdo rje ban dang ldan pa yis// khrag chen po dag 'khrug cing gsol// 'jigs pa'i ral pa gyen du 'khyil// bskal pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus// gshog sgra drag pos stong gsum g.yo// rkan sgra drag pos srog chags brgyal//
13b9: spyugs pas bsod nams lus 'jigs shing // yum chen mo dang mnyam par sbyor// sdigs pa rde'u chung tri shra zhing // phyag na bsnams shing ril ming mdzad// stobs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bzhi bcu gsod

14a1: cing tshul bzhin du/ / ha ha ha sa ni dgyes par mdzad// he he hes ni yum dang rol// hU~M hU~M hU~M gis char chen 'bebs// phaT phaT phaT kyis za byed che// zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi sgrol zhing gnon// gzhal yas
14a2: mthing nag chen pos ni/ / 'jig rten khams gsum gyur pa ste// klu chen rgyal po mang po rnams// khyad par chen po'i sku la brgyan// srog chags chen po'i lpags chen yang // tsham dam chen po'i na bzang gsol/ ci
14a3: yang sbyar yang gzugs can te/ / 'jigs byed sku ste cho 'phrul pa// drag shul gsung gi ra ro yis// gsod cing 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po// snying rje mngon sems khrag chen 'thur// gsod cing sbyor ba'i mchod pa la/
14a4: shin du dgyes pa chen por ston// hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha ha ha// khA hi khA hi khA hi/ ha ha ha sa/ ru ru rag ta/ ka ka ka ra ma/ yo gi ni/ ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M// rdo rje rigs chen mi bskyod thugs// rdo rje khrag 'thung chen po ste// dbu gsum
14a5: phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang / / zhing chen gshegs pa'i gdan stengs na// zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi rab tu gnon// smug nag 'jigs pa chen po'i sku// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal mo dang // ma hA su kha'i tshul du 'khril//
14a6: rnam par thar pa'i zhal gsum gyis// khams gsum ma lus rngub cing gsol// thugs dam snying rje chen po yis// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bsdus// snying rje ban dar ldan pa yis// khrag chen po dag
14a7: 'khrug cing gsol/ / 'jig pa'i ral pa gyen du 'khril// bskal pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus// gshog sgra drag pos stong gsum g.yo// rgan sgras rigs kun brgyal zhing dbus// spyugs pas bsod
14a8: nams lus 'jig cing / / yum chen mo dang mnyam par sbyor// sdigs pI ri rab tri shu la zhing // phyag na bsnabs shing khrag 'thung ba// sangs rgyas kun du bzang mo dang // rol ba'i tshul gyis mnyam sbyor zhing / sta ba

14b1: gru phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ / zhing chen gsod cing phung mdzad pa// ha ha ha sa ni dgyes par mdzad// he he hes ni yum dang rol// hUM hUM hUM gis char chen 'bebs// phaT phaT phaT kyis za byed che// gzhal yas smag
14b2: nag chen po ste/ / 'jig rten stong gsum gyur pa ste// klu chen rgyal po mang po rnams// khyad par chen po'i sku la brgyan// srog chags chen po'i lpags chen yang // tsham dam chen po na bzar gsol// cing yang
14b3: sbyar ba'i gzugs chen po/ / cha 'o che 'o dpal chen po// sangs rgyas sku yang che mche ma gsol// srog chags gzhan lta smos ci dgos// 'jigs byed sku ste cho 'phrul pa// drag shul gsung gir ro yis// gsod cing
14b4: 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po/ / snying rje mngon sems khrag chen 'thung // gsod cing sbyor ba'i mchod pa la/ shin du dgyes pa chen por ston// khrag 'thung 'bar ma ma gtogs par// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de//
14b5: de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas nas// gsang ba'i rgyu la shin du dgyes// hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ ha ha ha sa/ ru ru rag ta/ ka ka ka ra ma/ yo gi ni/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM/ rin chen rigs chen yon tan sku/
14b6: rin chen khrag 'thung chen po ste// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// stir che chung gdan la bzhugs// bdud bzhi steng du brkyang bskum pa// nyon mongs lnga dag tshar gcod cing // mthe'u chung srin lag rtse gnyis
14b7: kyis/ a mri ta la sogs pa yi// bdud rtsi zi mdar chen po dag/ dang ba'i sku la rab brgyan cing // sdog nag 'jigs pa chen po'i sku// rin chen khros pa'i rgyal mo dang // ma hA su kha'i tshul du 'khril// rnam par thar pa'i zhal
14b8: gsum gyis/ / khams gsum ma lus rngub cing gsol// thugs dam snying rje chen po yis// yon tan dkyil 'khor chen por bsdus// rdo rje pan dar ldan pa yis// khrag chen po dag 'khrug cing gsol// 'jigs pa'i ral pa

15a1: gyen du 'khyil/ / skal ba'i me dpung chen po'i dbus// gshog sgra drag pos stong gsum g.yo// rkan sgras yon tan rigs kun brlag/ smyugs pas bsod nams lus 'jig cing // yum chen mo dang
15a2: mnyam par sbyor/ / sti ra'i glo snying 'byin cing gsol// dgra sta tri shul rgyu 'dren zhags// phyag na bsnams shing khrag 'thung ba// rin chen kun du bzang ma dang // rol pa'i tshul du mnyam sbyor zhing // stabs glu phyag rgya
15a3: sngags tshig gis/ / thams cad thams cad gcod pa mdzad// rol pa chen po'i tshul bzhin du// khrag chen po yang zhal gyis 'jib// ha ha ha sa ni dgyes par mdzad// he he hes ni yum dang rol// hUM hUM hUM gis char chen
15a4: 'bebs/ phaT phaT phaT kyis za byed che// gzhal yas sngo nag chen por ni// 'jig rten stong gsum gyur pa ste// klu chen rgyal po mang po rnams// khyad par chen po'i sku la brgyan// srog chags chen po'i lpags pa yang / tsham
15a5: ngam chen po'i na bzar gsol/ / ci yang sbyar ba'i gzugs can te// che'o che 'o dpal che po// sangs rgyas sku yang tshe mtsham gsol// gzugs khams lha tshogs mang po yang // mgo yi phreng bas rgyan du byas// 'jigs byed
15a6: sku te cho 'phrul pa/ / drag shul gsung gi nga ro yis// gsod cing 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po// snying rje mngon sems khrag chen 'thung // gsod cing sbyor ba'i mchod pa la// shin du dgyes pa chen por ston// khrag 'thung 'bar ba
15a7: ma gtogs par/ / gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsang ba'i las la shin du dgyes// hUM hUM hU~M/ ha ha ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ ha ha ha sa/ ru ru rag ta/ ka ka kar ma/ yo gi ni/ ru lu ru
15a8: lu ru lu ru lu ru la hUM/ drag po gdul ba'i don ched du// dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i phyogs dag tu// khrag 'thung pad ma chen po ste// mtshungs pa med pa'i khyab par mnga'// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang / dmar

15b1: nag 'jig pa chen po'i sa/ / pad ma khros pa'i rgyal mo dang // ma hA su kha'i tshul du 'khril// rnam par thar pa'i zhal gsum gyis/ khams gsum ma lus rngub cing gsol// thugs dam snying rje chen po yis// gsung
15b2: gi dkyil 'khor chen por bsdus/ / rdo rje ban dar ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang 'khrug cing gsol// 'jigs pa'i ral pa gyen du 'khyil// bskal pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus// gshog sgra drag pos stong gsum
15b3: g.yo/ rkan skra drag pos srog chags brgyal// sngags pas bsod nams lus 'jig cing // yum chen mo dang mnyam par sbyor// tri shul rde'u rdung rgyu 'dren zhags// phyag na bsnams te sha khrag gsol// gzugs
15b4: khams lha tshogs mang po dag/ dgra bcom byang chub sems dpa' yas// mgo yi phreng bas rgyan du byas// dgongs des brtsan thabs chen pos myos// 'dod chags bsnyengs pa'i dgongs pa yis// gzugs can dud
15b5: med lus kun sdud/ / nga rgyal bsnyengs pa'i mthu yis ni// bsod nams can rnams thams cad gnon// phrag dog bsnyengs pa'i dgongs pa yis// gzugs kun kun sdud 'phrog cing sbyor// gti mug bsnyengs pa'i dgo
15b6: pa yis/ / dbye bsal mi mdzad nges pa'i thugs// mchod do mchod do stobs chen po// bdag la bdag mchod mnyes pa che// khro ma pad ma'i dkyil 'khor du// 'jig pa'i stabs dang gar mdzad pas// mi bzad mkha' 'gro
15b7: klong chen 'byung / / stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// zhing bcu gsod cing tshul bzhin du// dngos la longs spyod chen por mdzad// ha ha ha sa ni dgyes par mdzad// he he ha sa ni yum dang rol// hUM hUM hUM gis char chen 'bebra
15b8: phaT phaT phaT kyis za byed tshe/ / zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi sgrol zhing gnon// gzhal yas dmar nag chen por ni// 'jig rten khams gsum gyur pa ste// klu chen rgyal po mang po rnams// khyad par chen po'i sku la brgyan//

16a1: srog chags chen po'i lpags chen yang // tsham ngam chen po'i na bzar gsol// cir yang sbyar ba'i gzugs chen te// 'jigs byed sku ste cho 'phrul ba// drag shul gsung gi nga ro yis// gsod cing
16a2: 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po/ / snying rje mngon sems khrag chen 'thung // gsod cing sbyor ba'i mchod pa la// shin du dgyes pa chen por ston// hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ta ta ta/ khA ti khA ti khA hi/ ha ha ha sa/ ru ru rag ta/ ka ka kar ma/ yo
16a3: gi ni/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu rU b+h+yo hUM// drag po'i dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa// dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i phyogs dag tu// khrag 'thung las kyi sku gsung thugs// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bzang // ljang nag 'jim
16a4: pachen po'i sku/ / las kyi rgyal cing khros ma dang // ma hA su kha'i tshul du 'khril// rnam par thar pa'i zhal gsum gyis// khams gsum ma lus rngub cing gsol// thugs dam snying rje chen po yis// stong khams rnam pa
16a5: mang po rnams/ / sku yi dkyil 'khor chen por bsdus// rdo rje ban dar ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang 'khrug cing gsol// 'jigs pa'i ral pa gyen du 'khyil// bskal pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus// gshog
16a6: sgra drag pos stong gsum g.yo/ / rkan sgra drag pos srog chags brgyal// spyugs pas bsod nams lus 'jig cing // yum chen mo dang mnyam par sbyor// rgya gram dbyug pa rde'u chung dang // tri shul zhing chen rdza
16a7: zhags 'dren/ / tshems rnon stir za byed ce// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// zhing bcu gsod cing tshul bzhin du// phrin las dkyil 'khor nyid la mchod// ha ha ta sa ni dgyes par mdzad// he he te sa ni yum
16a8: dang rol/ / hUM hUM hUM gis char chen 'bebs// phaT phaT phaT kyis za byed che// zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi sgrol zhing gnon// gzhal yas ldang nag chen por ni// 'jig rten khams gsum gyur pa ste// klu chen rgyal po

16b1: mang po rnams/ / khyad par chen po'i sku la brgyan// srog chags chen po'i lpags chen yang // tsham ngam chen po'i na bzar gsol cir yang sbyar ba'i gzugs chen po// che 'o che'o dpal chen po// sangs rgyas sku
16b2: pang chemache ma gsol/ / srog chags gzhan lta spos ci dgos// 'jigs byed sku ste cho 'phrul pa// drag shul gsung gi nga ro yas// gsod cod 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po// snying rje mngon sems khrag chen dang /
16b3: gsod cing sbyor ba'i mchod pa la/ shin du dgyes pa chen por ston// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs par// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsang ba'i las la shin du
16b4: dgyes/ / nA hU~M hUM/ ha ha ha ha ha/ khA ti khA hi khA ti/ ha ha ta sa/ ru ru rag ta/ ka ka kar ma/ yo gi ni/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM// sangs rgyas khros pa'i rgyal mo ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// krod+hi shwa ri
16b5: bzhin rigs/ / dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// khro gnyer spyan gsum mche gtsigs shing // dbu skra mun dzA rgya bcings te// thod rlon mang pos rgyan du byas// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can/ ser/
16b6: nag gyad kyi 'dor tshul du// ban da rag tar ldan pa yis// 'khril pa'i tshul gyis gtso la stobs// dur khrod 'bar ba'i mtshan dbus// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum gnon tshul du// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la
16b7: bzhugs/ / rdo rje gshibs pa'i gshog rkyong zhing // srin lag mthe bong rtse gnyis kyis// a mri ta las sogs pa lnga// blangs te thugs dam skul bar mdzad// dgyes pas rdo rje pad mor 'jog/ ro la phyir ston pa mchog/
16b8: kyang mdzad// ka la gyi la dgyes pas rol// rdod byug tri shul sti ra za// a a hi ti ga da mos 'gengs// thugs dam sku yi dkyil 'khor du// 'jig rten ji srid thams cad sdud// khams gsum kun gyi dbang sgyur

17a1: mdzad/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// lpags chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// dpal chen 'bar ba ma gtogs par// kun kyang thal ba bzhin du rlog/ khros pa'i snying rje g.yos pa na//
17a2: thabs che bo yang chem chem gsol// zhe sdang chen po'i dgyes chen yang // rol pas dbang du bsdus nas ni// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// zas su srog chags kun gsol ba// ma hA mangs sku brgyan
17a3: cing / / zla gam mchod pa chen po yis// khrag 'thung chen po 'dzum par mdzad// yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs ston cing // nyams na rab tu brlag par mdzad/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo ste// dam tshig can la dngos
17a4: grub sbyin/ / khams gsum khrag tu bsgyur na sa ni// hub tu btub kyis zhal du gsol// rdul gyi gong bu mang po rnams// chem chem chem gyis zhal du gsol// sod cig sod cig dpal gyi yum// choms shig tshem
17a5: shig dpal gyi yum/ / gtogs shig gtogs shig dpal gyi yum// sregs shig sregs shig dpal gyi yum// chings shig chings shig dpal gyi yum/ gnod par byed pa'i bdud rnams kun// rab tu
17a6: drongs la tshul bzhin du/ / khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs par// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsang ba'i las la shin du dgyes/
17a7: ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ A ho sarba ta thA ga ta prad dz+nyA pa rA mi tA/ sid da ru pe dza// lo hi ni la sha ta tsa ran a khi ya me hu b+ho ga yo ka sa ma yo b+ha be// ta ru la sarba yo gi ma dA na ra nr-i// rag ta dzA la/ so khyam nu bi la si/ ka
17a8: bas ma le ma ku d+ha/ tri shU la rak+Sha b+ho ba yo ki ni// ma hA sa dU maN+Da la ti la ka/ ban d+ha na/ a la la ho// rdo rje yum chen rgyal gcig ma// kro d+hi shwa ri dpal gyi yum// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can// nyi ma 'bum

17b1: gyis gzi ldan ma/ / keng rus 'bum gyi gdan la bzhugs// smag nag khyad kyi 'dor tshul du// ban da rag ta gtso la stobs// gdug pa'i tshogs chen mang po rnams// mnyes byed phyir na skul 'khril/ dbu
17b2: gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/ / khro gnyer spyan bgrad mcha gtsigs shing // dbu skra mun dzA rgya bcings te// thod rlon mang pos rgyan du byas// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// tsi ta'i glo snying
17b3: mang po rnams/ / zhal du gsol nas 'khril zhing bzhugs// chags pa'i gar thabs chen po yis// gdug pa chen po'i sprin 'phro zhing // las su gsod la shin du dgyes// dur khrod 'bar ba'i me chen
17b4: dbus/ / zhabs ni brgyad bskum chen por bzhugs// rdo rje gshibs pa'i gshog rkyong zhing // srin lag mthe zong rtse gnyis kyis// a mr-i ta las sogs pa lnga// dad pa'i sku la rab brgyan cing // dbyes
17b5: pas rdo rje pad mar 'dzeg/ rol phyir stan mchog kyang mdzad// ka la ki las rol pas dgyes// rdo rje rde'u chung rdung ba dang // tri shul 'phen cing sti ra za// a a hi hi gad mos 'gengs// thugs dam skra
17b6: yi dkyil 'khor du/ / 'jig rten ji srid thams cad sdud// khams gsum kun gyi dbang sgyur mdzad// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// lpags chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// dpal chen 'dra
17b7: ba ma gtogs par/ / kun kyang thal ba bzhin du rlog/ khros pa'i snying rje g.yos pa na// thabs chen po yang chem chem gsol// zhe sdang chen po'i bgegs chen yang // rol bas dbang du bsdus nas
17b8: ni/ / khrag 'thung chen po zhal du stobs// se ral kha'i tshul dag tu// kha T+wAM ga la rgyab brten byas// rol la rngam pa'i cha lugs kyis// bka' las 'das pa 'phrog cing gsol// zas su srog chags kun

18a1: gsol pa/ ma hA mngasas sku brgyan cing // zla gam mchod pa chen pos ni// khrag 'thung ba yi mdog skyed cing // yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs ston cing // nyams na rab tu brlag par mdzad// rnal 'byor
18a2: dbang phyug chen mo ste/ / dam tshig can la dngos grub sbyin// khams gsum khrag tu bsgyur nas ni// hub tub tub kyis zhal du gsol// keng rus rdul gyi gong bu rnams// chemachem gyis ni zhal du gsol//
18a3: sod cig sod cig rdo rje yum// chom shig chom shig rdo rje yum// gtogs shig gtogs shig rdo rje yum// sregs shig sregs shig rdo rje yum// chings shig chings shig rdo rje yum// gnod par byed pI
18a4: bdud rnams kyang / / rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs pa// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na//
18a5: gsang ba'i las la shin du dgyes// oM hUM satwa ka ra rU pa/ rag ta dzA la si pan tsa ta thA ga ta sid d+ha ka ya rU pa/ pan tsa tsid ta ta thA ga ta rU go ta thA ga ta b+ha ga sid d+hi/ yo ga yo gi dzA la d+ha/ ha na ban d+ha na A la la la ho//
18a6: rin chen khros pa'i rgyal gcig ma// tshad med bzhi yi yon tan can// bkres skom phongs la gter sbyin mdzad// rang bzhin rnal 'byor yid bzhin gter// mi zad mdzod du gyur pas na// rnal 'byor ma zhe
18a7: mtshan du gsol/ / ye shes khro mo khro rgyal gtso// dge bas mtshan rdzogs rgyal ba'i yum// 'thing nag gyad kyi 'dor tshul gyis// ban da rag ta gtso la stobs// nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi ldan ma// gdug pa'i tshegs
18a8: chen mang po'i rnams/ / mnyes pa'i phyir ni ska la 'khril// nu 'bur stod smad dbye zhing 'gying // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang// g.yon du 'gying stabs sbyor ba yis// thal sgra drag pos gdug

18b1: ba gsol/ / khro gnyer spyan bgrang mche gtsigs shing // dbu sra mun dzA rgya bcings shing // thod rlon mang pos rgyan du byas// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// yan lag gcad gtubs phral nas kyang // zhal du
18b2: gsol nas chags pas 'khril/ / chags pa'i gar thabs chen pos ni// gdugs pa chen po'i sprin 'phro zhing // las su gsod la shin du dgyes// dur khrod 'bar ba'i mechen dbus// zhabs ni brkyang bskam chen pos
18b3: ni/ zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// rin chen gshibs pa'i gshog skyong zhing // srin lag sngar gyis khrag chen 'thung // dgyes pas rdo rje pad mar 'jog/ rol phyir stan mchog kyang mdzad// ka la ki las dgyes
18b4: par rol/ / dbyug pa rde'u chung kha T+wAM 'dzin// glo snying yan lag kun gsol zhing // a a hi hi bzhad mos 'gengs// rol pa'i rkan sgras thog thog g.yo// rdo rje spyugs pas dgyes mdzad pa'i// thugs dam sku yi dkyil 'khor du/
18b5: gsang ba'i dur khrod kun gsol mdzad// khams gsum kun gyi dbang mdzad ma// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// lpags chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// dpal chen 'bar ba ma gtogs par// kun kyang thal ba
18b6: bzhin du reg/ khros pa'i snying rje g.yos pa na// thabs chen po yang che mche ma gsol// zhe sdang chen po'i bgegs chen yang // rol pas dbang du bsdus nas ni// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// ro la brkam pa'i yum chen
18b7: mo/ / bka' las 'das pa 'phrog cing gsol// zas su srog chags kun gsol ba// ma hA mangs sku brgyan cing // zla ga ma mchod pa chen pos ni// khrag 'thung ba yang 'dzum par mdzad// yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs ston pas// nyams na
18b8: rab tu brlag par mdzad/ / rnal 'byor yum chen chen mo ste// dam tshig can la dngos grub sbyin// khams gsum khrag du bsgyur nas ni// hu ba dub kyis ni zhal du gsol// ster che chung mang po rnams// chem chem kyis ni zhal du

19a1: gsol/ sod cig sod cig rin chen yum// tshems shig choms shig rin chen yum// gtogs shig gtogs shig rin chen yum// sregs shig sregs shig rin chen yum// chings shig chings
19a2: shig rin chen yum/ / gnod par byed pa'i bdud rnams kyang // rab tu rol la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs par// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de/ de bzhin/
19a3: thugs dam nyid bas na// gsang ba'i las la shin du dgyes// oM hUM sangs rgyas kun gyi mi zad rgyan dang ldan pa rang bzhin te ru pa la// dur khrod bdag po za byed yum chen mo// rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan gter ldan/
19a4: ma/ byang chub snying po'i dgongs pa nges ldan bsnams shing gsol// rmongs pa log pa lnga dang ldan rnams drongs la tshul bzhin stobs// kun gyi dbang mo dbang dang ldan pa'i yum chen kun rol cig/ sems dpa'
19a5: khrag 'thung nyid kyang sku la thim par rol/ / khrag chen gsol zhing glo snying za la bskam pas rnal 'byor kun gyi las mdzod cig/ bdag dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad rdzogs pa yin/ a la la
19a6: to/ / sku gsung thugs ldan rnal 'byor ma// pad ma'i gsung gi sangs rgyas yum// chags pa'i pad ma rgya cig ma// yum chen kro d+hi shwo ri ste// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can// dmar nag sku yi cha lugs ma/ dbu
19a7: gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang / / rdo rje ban dang ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang 'khrug cing gsol// chags pa'i thal mo brgyad nas kyang // khrag 'thung pad ma'i sku la 'khril// glog stong 'gyur ba'i 'od
19a8: mnga' bas/ / mun pa nag po thibs po sel// sdang mig mche gtsigs tshems rnon gsod// rde'u chung rdung zhing stir chen za/ sha khrag 'dzag cing rol brkam// bya byed mang po'i nus mthu yis// lha chen po yi mgo

19b1: yang 'gems/ / tshangs pa chen po'i lpags chen yang // yum chen mo yin bzar gsol// mun dzA cod pan ral pa can// gdug pa tshogs chen mang pos bskor// thod rlon rgyan gyi phreng bas brgyan/ brkyang
19b2: bskum sti ra'i gdan stengs na/ / gyad kyi dgyes pa'i 'dor tshul gyis// stan byed cing ro la brkam// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// bgegs chen kun la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du ston/
19b3: bskal pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus// tshogs la rol la tshul bzhin du// dad pa'i sku la rgyan du byas// tsham dam drag shul sder tshogs dang // dur khrod las la shin du dgyes// 'di dag dgongs pa'i dam
19b4: tshig ste/ de bzhin ma byas nyid sgrol zhes// dbang phyug rgyal pos rab tu gsungs so// oM ban tsa rA be b+hi ta rU be b+hi ta rA la pad maman kro d+hi shwa ri sa ma ya sod b+ha bad/ sarba b+hi sha rU be sa ma yo gi ni hU~M/ b+hi yu li ga u0f7f
19b5: pad makro d+hi shwa ri sa ma yo gi ri/ a ha ha ma na sa ma ya yo ki ni/ ban tsa rA be sid hU~M/ ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na khA hi hi/ las kyi rigs kyi yum chen mo// sku mdog ljang nag 'jigs pa'i sku// phyag gnyis gyad kyi 'dor thabs
19b6: kyis/ band rag tas gtso la stobs/ snum chen ldan zhing rol bskam// kro d+hi shwa ri yum chen ma// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrang // khro gnyer sdad mig mche gtsigs shing // nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi ldan
19b7: zhing / gdug pa'i tshogs chen mang po rnams// mnyes byed phyir ni sku la 'khril// nu 'bur stod spad dbye zhing 'gyid// g.yon du 'gying stabs sbyor ba yis// thal sgra drag pos gdug pa gsod// dbu skra mun dzA rgya cings
19b8: shing / thod rlon mang pos rgyan du byas// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// yan lag nang grol drangs nas byang // zhal du gsol nas chags pas 'khril// chags pa'i gar thabs chen po yis/ gdug pa

20a1: chen po'i sprin 'phro zhing / / las su gsod la shin du dgyes// dur khrod 'bar ba'i me chen dbus// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum snol mar yang // keng rus tshogs chen gdan la zhugs// pad ma gshibs/
20a2: pa'i gshog rkyong zhing // snyim pa spar gyis khrag chen 'thung // dgyes pas rdo rje pad mar 'joms// rol phyir ston pa mchog kyang mdzad// ka la ki las dgyes pas rol// ral gri dgra sta rde'u chung zhing 'jigs pas
20a3: gzugs kyis phyag na bsnams/ / sti ra'i zhags pa 'dren cing gsol// a a hi hi bzhad mos dgyes// rol pa'i rkan sgras stong gsum g.yo// rdo rje sngags pas dgyes mdzad pa'i// thugs dam sku yi dkyil
20a4: 'khor du/ / khams gsum ma lus kun 'dus pa// khams gsum kun gyis dbang mdzad ma// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// lpags chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// dpal chen 'bar ba ma gtogs par
20a5: kun kyang thal ba bzhin du rlog khros pa'i snying rje g.yos pan/ / thabs chen po yang chem che ma gsol// zhe sdang chen po'i bgegs chen yang // rol bas dbang du bsdus nas ni// khrag 'thung las kyi zhal du stoT/
20a6: rol brkam pa'i yum chen mo// bka' las 'das pa 'phrog cing gsol// zas su srog chags kun gsol ba// ma hA mang sas sku brgyan cing // zla gam mchod pa chen po stobs// yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs
20a7: ston pas/ / nyams na rab tu brlag par mdzad// rnal 'byor yum cig chen mo dang // dam tshig can la dngos grub sbyin// khams gsum khrag tu bsgyur nas ni// hub tub kyis ni zhal du gsol// stir che chung
20a8: mang po rnams/ / chem chem gyis ni zhal du gsol// sod cig sod cig las kyi yum// tshems shig tshems sha ga las kyi yum// gtogs shig gtogs shig las kyi yum// chings shig sdoms shig/

20b1: las kyi yum// srogs shig bsdoms shig las kyi yum// gnod par byed pa'i bdud rnams kyang // rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gto/
20b2: pa// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsang ba'i las la shin du dgyes// ha ha khA hi khA ti// oM hU~M las su gsod la dga' ba'i rnal 'byor ma// bde gshegs las
20b3: kyi rigs kun sku la rdzogs par rab snang yum chen mo/ / tsham ngam brlang ba'i za stangs gar dang bcas te gtso la stobs// kun gyi dbang dang ldan pa bsod nams lus la dbang sgyur ma// sder chags mang po'i
20b4: tshegs dang bcas te rol cing dgyes par mdzod/ / sha khrag dmar chen mchog la dga' bas dang du kun long la// rnal 'byor dam tshig can la byin gyis rlobs// a la la to// dpal chen 'bar ba'i thugs ka
20b5: nas/ / rnam par sbyar ba'i gzugs byung ba// cir yang 'gyur ba'i sku mnga' ba// rnal 'byor sngo ga nag ke'u rim// khro gnyer spyan bgrang mche gtsigs shing // ral ba 'khyil ba'i mun dz+wa la// thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam
20b6: par brgyan/ / dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // mi lpags rlon pa'i g.yang zhi gsol// stir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// 'jig rten sreg pa'i me dkyil nas// tsham ngam
20b7: gzugs sku chen po yis/ / zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na// bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rdo rje ban dang ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang 'khrug cing gsol// sngar chen glo stong 'dren
20b8: tshul du/ / khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// dbyug pa rde'u chung phyag na bsnams// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// zheng bcu drangs nas

21a1: tshul bzhin du/ / khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// stabs gru phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// log par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun// tsham ngam smras ni tshul
21a2: bzhin du/ / dbang du bsdu ba mdzad nas ni// rol parkam pa'i stangs kyi sa// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// rol cig sprul cig rnal 'byor ma// sod cig longs shig rnal 'byor ma// stor cig sbyongs
21a3: shig rnal 'byor ma/ / choms shig choms shig rnal 'byor ma// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsang ba'i las la shin du dgyes// drongs shig drongs shig dza dza// chings shig chings shig hUM hUM/ sdoms
21a4: shig sdoms shig ha ha/ / rol cig rol cig phaT phaT// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ sku yi dkyil 'khor mdzod stong pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// rnal 'byor ser na gtse'u rim// 'jigs su
21a5: rung ba'i gzugs 'chang ba/ / khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing // ral pa 'khyil ba'i mun dz+wa lA// thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // mi lpags rlon
21a6: pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol/ / sti ra chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyas nas sku yi rgyan du byas// 'jig rten sreg pa'i me dkyil nas// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na/
21a7: bdud bzhi gdon pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rdo rje ban dar ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang 'khrug cing gsol// stir chen glo snying 'dren tshul du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// drag shul mda' 'phen
21a8: 'gengs pa yis/ / dpal chen 'bar ba'i thugs kar gzo// rde'u chung tri shul phyag na bsnams// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// dpal chen 'bar ba'i thugs kar

21b1: gzo/ se gol sgrol mar gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i sku la stobs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// log par lta ba'i//
21b2: bdud rnams kun// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i sku la stobs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gi/
21b3: log par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun// tsham ngam skus ni tshul bzhin du// dbang du bsdu ba mdzad nas ni// rol bskam pa'i za stangs kyis// khrag 'thung 'bar ma'i zhal du stobs// rol cig sprul cig/
21b4: rnal 'byor ma// sod cig long shig rnal 'byor ma// gtogs shig sbyongs shig rnal 'byor ma// tshems shig choms shig rnal 'byor ma// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsang ba'i las
21b5: la shin du dgyes/ / drongs shig drongs shig dza dza// chings shig chings shig hUM hUM// sdoms shig sdoms shig ha ha// sgrol cig sgrol cig phaT phaT// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ khro mo rnal
21b6: 'byor dmar nag su/ / khro ga nyer spyan bgrad mcha gtsigs shing // 'jigs su rung ba'i sdong mig can// ral pa mun dzA rgya bcings shing // thod rlon mang po cod pan can// ste ra'i phreng bas rgyan du byas// kaurlon
21b7: mang po'i na bzar gsol/ / mi lpags g.yang gzhi sham thabs can// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // gsung gi dkyil 'khor mdzod gtong ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// rnal 'byor/
21b8: chen mo pra mo ha// dur khrod mang po'i tshogs dang ni// gsur chen sreg pa'i me chen dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na// bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhug//

22a1: rdo rje ban dar ldan pa yis// khrag chen po dag 'khrug cing gsol// stir chen glo snying 'dren tshul du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// chu srin rgyal mtshan rde'u chung brdung // 'jigs su rung ba'i
22a2: rkan sgra dang / dgyes pa chen po'i skyugs pa yis// se gol sngol mar gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i zhal du stobs// khams gsum za byed zhal du stobs// pad ma gsung
22a3: gi yum chen mo/ / gzhal yas dmar nag chen po nas// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen kun// tsha ma ngam skus ni tshul bzhin du// dbang du bsdu ba mdzad nas ni// gar mkhan chen
22a4: mo'i stobs tshul gyis/ / khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khre mo rnal 'byor khyod kyis rol// khro mo rnal 'byor khyod kyis sod// khro mo rnal 'byor khyod kyis ni// longs shig chings la tshul bzhin du// gtogs shig
22a5: skyongs la bsnams su gsol/ / de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ rnal 'byor khro mo mthing nag sku// stir chen za ba'i be ta li// khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs
22a6: shing / / 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ral pa 'khyil ba'i mun dz+wa la// thod rlon tshegs kyis rnam par brgyan// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrod// mi lpags rlon pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// stir chung ngu
22a7: mang po'i tshegs/ / brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// 'jig rten sreg pa'i me dkyil na// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na// bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rdo rjes
22a8: gdug pa'i glang chen 'gems/ / 'khril bas gyad kyi 'dor tshul du// ban da ra ga tas zhal du stobs// snyir cher za zhing rde'u chung rdung // stir chen glo snying 'dren tshul du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// 'jigs su rung

22b1: pa'i rkan sgra dang / / dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags
22b2: tshig gis/ / log par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun// tsham ngam skus ni tshul bzhin du// dbang du bsdu ba mdzad nas ni// ro la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// rol cig sprul cig rnal 'byor
22b3: ma/ / song cig long shig rnal 'byor ma// gtor cig sbyongs shig rnal 'byor ma// tshems shig tshems shig rnal 'byor ma// de bzhin thugs dam nyid bas na// gsang ba'i las la shin du dgyes// drongs shig drongs
22b4: shig dza dzaH/ chings shig chings shig hUM hUM hUM// sdoms shig sdoms shi ga ha ha ha// sgrol cig sgrol cig phaT phaT phaT// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ rnal 'byor khre mo ljang nag sku// stir chen za ba'i ka sa ma ri//
22b5: khro gnyer spyan baglang mche gtsigs shing // 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ral pa 'khyil ba'i mun dz+wa la// thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// mi lpags rlon
22b6: pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol/ / stir chung ngu mang po'i tshigs/ rgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// dur khrod chen po'i me chen dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na// bdud bzhi gnon
22b7: pa'i tshul du bzhugs/ / rdo rje ban dar ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang bkrug cing gsol// stir chen glo snying 'dren tshul du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// tri shul 'phen tshul rde'u chung zhags// 'jigs
22b8: su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang / / dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa dang // se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// stabs

23a1: glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ / log par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// rol brkam pa'i za stangs kyis// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// rol cig sprul cig rnal 'byor
23a2: ma/ / sod cig long shig rnal 'byor ma// gtogs cig sbyongs shig rnal 'byor ma// choms shig tshoms shig rnal 'byor ma// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes// drongs shig/
23a3: drongs shig dza dzaH/ cings shig tshangs shig hUM hU~M hU~M// sdoms shig sdoms shig ha ha ha// sgrol cig sgrol cig phaT phaT phaT// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ hUM hU~M hU~M hUM hUM/ kha ti khA ti khA ti khA ti khA ti/ rna la
23a4: 'byor khro mo ser nag sku/ / stir chen za ba'i tsaN Da lo// gtum mo chen mo zhe sdang 'joms// khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing // 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ster chen nang grol 'byin cing gsol//
23a5: ral ba 'khyil ba'i mun dz+wa la// thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// zhing lpags sar pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// stir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi
23a6: rgyan du byas/ / dur khrod chen po'i me chen dbus// tsham dam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// rin chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na// bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rdo rje ban dang ldan pa yis// khrag chen
23a7: bo dag 'khrug cing gsol/ / tri shul rnge'u chung phyag na bsnams// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du/
23a8: khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// log par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// ro la brkam pa'i za

23b1: stangs kyis/ / khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// rol cig sprul cig rnal 'byor ma// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsang ba'i las la shin tu dgyes// drongs shig drongs shig dza dzaH/ chings shig/
23b2: chings shig hU hUM hU~M// sdoms shig sdoms shig ha ha ha// sgrol cig sgrol cig phaT phaT phaT// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ rnal 'byor khro ma'i thing nag sku// stir chen za ba'i yum chen mo// chags pa
23b3: chen mo sma shan/ / khro gnyer spyan bgrang mche gtsigs shing // 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// rol pas stir chen 'dren tshul du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// ral ba 'khyil ba'i mun dzA
23b4: la/ / thong rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// zhing lpags sar pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// stir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// dur
23b5: khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus/ / tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen po yis// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na// bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rdo rje ban dar ldan pa yis// khrag chen po
23b6: yang dkrug cing gsol/ / spu gri 'debs shing rnge'u chung rdung // 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snrel mar gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du/
23b7: khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// gzhal yas 'thing nag chen mo nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// log par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun// ro la brkam pa'i za stangs
23b8: gyis/ / khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// rol cig sprul cig rnal 'byor ma// sod cig long shig rnal 'byor ma// gartogs shog sbyongs shig rnal 'byor ma// choms shig choms shig rnal 'byor ma// de bzhin

24a1: la/ / thugs dam nyid pas na// bsad pa'i las la shin du dgyes// drongs shig drongs shig dadzad// chings shig chings shig d+hu d+hun+su// sdoms shig sdoms shig ha ha ha// sgrol cig sgrol cig paT phaT pan/
24a2: bzhin pa byas de nyid brlag/ rnal 'byor khro mo dmar ser sku// gsod byed sting chen zab mo// rol pa'i rnal 'byor buk+ka si// khro gnyer sbyin bkrid mche gtsigs shing // spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can/ 3
24a3: bas sting chen 'dren tshul du/ / khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// ral pa 'khyil ba'i mun dz+wa la// thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// ma hA rag tas sku brgyan cing // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrang/
24a4: ye shes sku yi cha lugs kyis// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// sti ra chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// srin lag mthe 'ong rtse sprad de// a mri ta las sogs pa lnga/ ljags
24a5: lam dbang por sku brgyan cing / / a ho srakas dgyes shing 'khril// dur khrod chen po'i mi dkyi lang bus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen mos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na// bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhug
24a6: bka' las mi mda' thugs dam skong / / 'das na lha yang brlag pa'i phyir// lha chen mang po'i klad 'gems shing // bsod nams sku yang che mchem gsol// rdo rje ban dar ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang dkrug cing
24a7: gsol zangs gri rnon pos yan lag gcod/ / rde'u chung rdung zhing kha T+wAM 'phen// sha khrag za ba'i rnal 'byor ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i skyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs
24a8: nas ni/ / zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// gzhal yas dmar nag chen po nas// sangs rgyas sku yi yum chen mo// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// log par lta ba'i bdud

24b1: rnams kun/ rol brkam pa'i tha stangs kyis// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin stobs// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// rol cig sprul cig rnal 'byor ma// sod cig long shig rnal 'byor ma// gtogs shig spyong/
24b2: shig rnal 'byor ma// choms shig choms shig rnal 'byor ma// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs par// gcig kyang bson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs ngam nyid pas na// gsod pa'i las la shin du
24b3: dgyes/ drongs shig drongs shig dzang dza// chings shig tshangs shig hUM hUM hUM// sdoms shig sdoms shig ha ha u0f7f// sgrol cig sgrol cig phaT phaT phaT/ de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ oM hAM ta thA ga ta su ba u go ga/
24b4: kro d+ha ki li/ sa ma ya yo gi ni/ ma hA maN+Da la/ arge pra tits+tsha/ ka la kr-iSh+Na bi ta lo hi ti dz+wa la su khe na yA mi/ yo ga kA ya mi/ yo ga kA ya/ sarba bud d+ha la/ ma hA he ru ka/ sa ma ya yo ga ru lu yod ta ma dz+wa la ni/ ta na da ha rU
24b5: be pa dza/ sarba sid d+hi ka ru NI ka/ ma kha su khe na/ ba tha ra su khe na sa ma ya yo ga dzA la a su A/ bo g.yo gi srid d+ha a la la ho// mu kha gsod byed seng ge'i mgo/ ser nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs kyis// phyag gi
24b6: thal mo bsnol nas ni/ / khrag 'thung chen mo'i zhal du stobs// khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing // spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// mche tshogs mang po'i 'khor du byas// zhe sdang 'jom
24b7: ma'i za byed ma/ / ma hA rag tas sku brgyan cing // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// mthing nago seng ge'i ral pa phyar// thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// ye shes sku yis cha lugs naM/
