24b8: mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// stir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil nas// tsham dam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i/

25a1: gdan stengs bzhugs// bka' las ma 'da' thugs dam skongs// srog chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing // bsod nams lus kyang che mche ma gsol// ba nad rag tas zhal du stobs// rdo rjes glang 'gems
25a2: rnge'u chung drung / / zheng chen za ba'i muka ste// 'dzeg su rung ba'i rgan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i sngags pa yis// sa gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i gal du s+hosra//
25a3: khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams// rol brkam pa'i tha stangs kyis// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stongs/
25a4: de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu ka gsod byed stag gi mgo/ dmar nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs can// phyag gnyis bdud rtsi thal sbyar zhing // shin du dga' ba'i mdangs kyis 'khril// khro gnyer spyan bgrang mche gtsigs
25a5: shing / / spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// mche tshogs mang po'i 'khor du byas// nga rgyal 'joms pa'i za byed ma// ma hA ra ga tas sku brgyan cing // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang// thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam/
25a6: par brgyan// ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// se ra la kha yi tshul dag tu// thod rlon phreng bas lus brgyan cing // dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos
25a7: ni/ / zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong// srog chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing // bsod nams lus kyang chem chem gsol// ban da rag ta zhal du stobs// dgra stas glang
25a8: 'gems lcags kyu 'dren/ / rde'u chung rdung zhing stir chen za// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung

25b1: chen po'i zhal du stobs/ / khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar du gcod pa'i bgegs chen rnams// ro la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag
25b2: 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/ / de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu ka gsod byed ngur rkun mgo/ sdog nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs kyis// stir chud za zhing gtso la stobs// khro gnyer spyan bgrang mche gtsigs shing //
25b3: spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// mche tshogs mang po 'khor du byas// 'dod chags 'joms ma'i za byed ma// thal chen rag tas sku brgyan cing // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // thod rlon
25b4: tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan/ / ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// se ra la kha yi tshul dag tu// thod rlon mang po'i phreng bas brgyan// dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus// tsham
25b5: ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni/ / zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skor // srog chags chen po'i snying 'dren cing // bsod nams lus kyang chem che ma gsol// spu gris
25b6: mgo gcod rde'u rdung zhing / / kha T+wAM 'phen cing band 'thung // gsod la dga' ba'i muka ste// zhags pas 'ching ba'i mkha' 'gro ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen mo'i spyugs pa yis// saM gol
25b7: snol mar gtogs nas ni/ / stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byang ba'i bgegs chen rnams/ rol brkam pa'i za stangs kyis// rab tu drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stob
25b8: de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu ka gsod byed sho na'i mgo/ mthing nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs can// glo snying 'dren cing gtso la stobs// khro ga nyer spyan bgrang mche gtsigs shing // spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i

26a1: sdang mig can/ / mche tshogs mang po'i 'khor du byas// phrag dog 'joms pa'i za byed ma// thal chen khrag gis mu brgyan can// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par
26a2: brgyan/ / ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// stir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen
26a3: bos ni/ / zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong// srog chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing // bsod nams lus kyang che mche ma gsol// band rag tas zhal du stobs
26a4: kha T+wAM 'phen cing rde'u chung rdang / / zhing chen za ba'i mu ka ste// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag
26a5: 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/ / khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams// rol bskam pa'i za stangs kyis// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du
26a6: khrag thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/ / de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu ka gsod byed bya rgod mgo/ dmar nag gyad kyi 'gyi da stabs can// zhing chen rgyu 'dren zhal du stobs// khro gnyer spyan bgrang zhal gdangs
26a7: shing / / spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sngang mig can// gshog tshogs mang po'i rgyan du byas// gti mug 'joms pa'i za byed ma// thal chen khrag gis sku brgyan cing // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// thod rlon
26a8: tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan/ / ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// stir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus// tsham dam

26b1: brkyang bsum chen pos ni/ / zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong // srog chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing // bsod nams lus kyang che mche ma gsol// band 'thung zhing
26b2: rje'u chung rdud / / zhing chung ril med zangs kris 'debs// zhi chen za ba'i mu ka ste// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang / dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// saM gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul
26b3: bzhin du/ / khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung chen mo mkha' 'gro ma// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// ro la brkam pa'i
26b4: tha stangs kyis/ / khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu ka gsod byed snar mgo ring // ser nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs can// zhing chen lag gis gtsel stobs// khro gnyer spyan
26b5: bgrad zhal gdangs shing / / spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdad mig can// gshog tshogs ma dpos rgyan du byas// bka' las 'das pa za byed ma// ma hA ra ga tas sku brgyan cing // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad//
26b6: thod rnon tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan// ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// ster chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nam sa ya rgyan du byas// dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus / tsham
26b7: ngal brkyang bsum chen pos ni/ / zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong // srog chags mang po'i snying nas 'dren// bsod nams lus kyang che mtsham gsol// ban d+ha rag
26b8: tas zhal du stobs/ / dbyug pas glad 'gems rde'u chung rdung // zhing chen za ba'i mu ka ste// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i spags pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// bgegs

27a1: chen drangs te tshul bzhin du/ / khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams/ rol gas
27a2: ba'i bstangs kyis/ / rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu ka gsod byed bya rog mgo/ mthing nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs can// rdo rje glang
27a3: 'gems su gris gcod/ / ban dar khrag chen gtsal stobs// khro gnyer spyan bgrad zhal gdangs shing // 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// gshog tshogs mang po'i rgyan du byas// zhing bcu
27a4: gsod cing za byed ma/ / ma hA ra ga tas sku brgyan cing // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang
27a5: gzhi gsol/ / stir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus// tsham dam brgyad bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs/ bka'
27a6: las mi 'da' thugs dam skong / / srog chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing // bsod nams sku yang che mchem gsol// kha T+wAM 'phen cing rde'u chung rdung // 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen mo'i skyugs
27a7: pa yis/ se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar
27a8: chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams/ / ro la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu ka gsod byed 'ug pa'i mgo

27b1: ser nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs kyis/ / lag gnyis ban d+ha sa khrag chen stobs// snying chen gro snying 'dren tshul du// khro gnyer spyan bgrang mche gtsigs shing // 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// gshog chog
27b2: mang po'i rgyan du byas/ / sha khrag za ba'i mkha' 'gro ma// ma hA ra ga tas sku brgyan cing // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // thod rlon tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan// ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs
27b3: sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol/ / sti ra chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// dur khrod chen po'i mche dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs/
27b4: bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong // srog chags chen po'i snying 'dren cing // bsod nams lus kyang che mche ma gsol// lcags kyus 'dren cing rnge'u rdung rol// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang // dgyes pa
27b5: chen mo'i spyugs pa yis/ / se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma// stabs glu phyag rgya sngabs tshig
27b6: gis/ bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams// ro la brkam pa'i tha stangs kyis// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ khA hi khA ti// rdo rje bka'i
27b7: pho nya rnams/ / rdo rje bran mo gtum bag can// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mang po ste// sna tshogs las rnams grub par byed// dbang phyugs tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/ dmar
27b8: ser mi srid chags pas 'gying / / dbu gcig pa la phyag drug gzugs// ba na das khrag chen gtso la stobs// g.yag chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// zhing za lcags

28a1: k+Sha sa tri shul 'ben/ spu gris gsod cing rgyu 'dren zhags// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ stabs glu
28a2: phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ / ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmar skya tshangs ma chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug
28a3: 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ / ban das khrag chen gtsel stobs// sbrul gdug mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// rtse lnga rdo rje zhing chen za// kha T+wAM 'ben cing lcags kyu zhags// thod rngon
28a4: g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas/ / brkyang bskum tshul gyis zhing chen gnon/ rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin byed// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par mdzod// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka'
28a5: nyan ma/ 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ser nag khro mo chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dril khrol dbyug to stir chen za// ban d+ha sa khrag chen gtso la stobs// gzigs
28a6: chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / / skra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// lcags kyus 'dren tshul spu gris 'debs// thod dron g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor
28a7: yongs kyi bka' bzhin / / stabs gra phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par mdzod// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dkar dmar khyab 'jug chags pas
28a8: bgyis dbug cig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ / band khrag chen gcol stobs// bya bar mgo yi zhal gdangs nas// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// snyir khrag chen kha T+wA~M rde'u/ thod rlon g.yang gzhi rgyan

28b1: du byas/ brkyang bkram rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs gru phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par mdzod// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i
28b2: sdang mig can/ ser nag gzhon chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing chen rgyu 'dren gcol stobs// ba wa mgo can zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ ban
28b3: dmar kha T+wAM 'khor lo'i'adril/ / thod rlon g.yang gzhi rgyan dbyas// brkyang bskam rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par 'dzod//
28b4: dbang phrag tshigs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su drang ba'i sdang mig can// dmar sar dbang mo chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing chen log 'dren gco la stobs// dred chen mgo yi
28b5: zhal gdangs shing / / sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// ban dmar dbyug chen lcags kyus 'dril// thod rlon g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas// brkyang bskam rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin
28b6: du/ stabs grwa phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmar mo 'phrog chen chags pas 'gyir// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs
28b7: pa'i gzugs/ zhing chan r+g+ha 'dren zhags pa stobs// dom chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byas// dril 'khrol lcags kyu dang dmar dbyug/ thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang
28b8: bskam rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ / rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can//

29a1: sngo nag bdud rtsi chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// ban das khrag chen gtse la stobs// chu srin mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// kha T+wAM mda' 'phen
29a2: rin chen yum/ / thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug
29a3: tshogs kyis bka' nyan ma/ / 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// sngo skya zhi ba chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// glo snying 'dren cing gtso la stobs// sdig chen mgo yi zhal gdangs
29a4: shing / / sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// dril 'khror rtse lnga dung dmar dang // rin chen bum pa khros pas 'dzin// thod rlon g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs
29a5: kyi bka' bzhin du/ / stabs klu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdad mig can// nag mo be con chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig
29a6: phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ / stir chen glo snying 'dren cing stobs// khrag chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// khrag chen dung thung kha T+wAM 'phen// gris 'debs rgyu zhags dbang
29a7: lcug ma/ / thod rlon g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug
29a8: tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ / 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ser nag khro mo chags pas bgyid // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// ban das khrag chen gtso la stobs// wa chen mgo yi zhal gdangs

29b1: shing / sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// zhing chen rgyu 'dren sti ra'i rde'u// rab tu gtum pas kha T+wAM 'phen// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka'
29b2: bzhin du/ stabs kyu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// mthing nag babyed chags pas 'gyid/ dbu gcig phyag drug 'jig
29b3: pa'i gzugs/ / snyir chen snying 'dren gtsel stobs// stag chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // skra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// dung dmar dril khrol kha T+Ta gr-i/ thod rlon g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum
29b4: rkang gis zhing chen gnon/ / rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmar/
29b5: mo khrag 'thung chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// bgegs 'dul lcags kyus zhal du stobs// rgod chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// dung
29b6: dmar zhing dbyug kha T+wAM 'phen/ / thod rlon g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zheng chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par
29b7: byos/ / dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmar mo khrag 'thung chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// ban das khrag chen gtso la stobs// rta chen mgo
29b8: yi zhal gdangs shing / / sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// rtse lnga dril dbyug kha T+wAM 'phen// zhing chen za ba'i dbang phyug ma// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/

30a1: rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ stabs kyu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byo'o// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dkar
30a2: dmar gcig tu chags pas 'gyeng / / dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// ban d+ha sa khrag chen gcol stobs// byi chen mgo yis zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// rdo rje tri shul
30a3: dril dbyug zhing / / thod rlon g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang
30a4: phyag tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ / 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmar nag yid 'phrog chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// stir chung za zhing gtsol stobs// spang chen
30a5: mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / / sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// kha T+wAM dung dmar lcags kyu gri// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs
30a6: kyi bka' bzhin du/ / stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dkar dmar grub pa chags pas 'gying//
30a7: dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// ster chen glo snying gtso la stobs// bu shud mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// pad ma kha T+wAM dung dmar zhags// the rngon
30a8: g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ / brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi

30b1: bka' sdod ma/ 'jigs su rung ba'i snga dmig can// ljang ser klu mo chags pas 'gyid// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// ban das khrag chen gtse la stobs// sha chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /
30b2: sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// rde'u rdung kha T+wAM gri 'debs zhing // thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya
30b3: sngags tshig gis/ / ci 'dod las de grub par byas// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmar nag gsod chen chags pas 'gyid// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i
30b4: gzugs/ steng chen glo snying gtse la stobs// spad ti mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// rdo rje ral gri rde'u chung rdung // thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang
30b5: gis zhing chen gnon/ / rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig
30b6: can/ ljang dmar ma mo tshogs bas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing chen rgyu 'dren zhal du stobs// sprin chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed//
30b7: dung dmar kha T+wAM lcags kyu dril// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnan// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de
30b8: grub par byos/ / dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ljang ser phag mo chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// ban das khrag chen gtso la stobs/ phag

31a1: chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / / sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// rtse lnga zhing za kha T+wAM gri// thod rlon g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor
31a2: yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/ / stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ljang nag sna chad chags pas
31a3: 'gyid/ dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// bdud rtsi rung dmar zhal du stobs// rnga chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// kha T+wAM zangs gri zhags pa 'dzin// thod
31a4: rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ / brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs
31a5: gyi bka' nyan ma/ / 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// sngo skra chu mo chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing chen glo snying 'dren cing stobs// bya rog mgo yi zhal gdangs
31a6: she/ sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// dung 'ar dril khrolo kha D+ga wi// zod rnon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnan// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// u0f7f
31a7: glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ / ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmar skya rgan mo chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag
31a8: drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ / bdud rtsi dung dmar zhal du stobs// sgeg chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin du// dbyug dril kha T+wAM rgyu 'dren cing // thod rmon g.yang

31b1: gzhis rgyan du byas/ brgyad bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byas// dbang phyug chags
31b2: bka' nyan ma/ 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// gnag cing nag mo chags pas 'gying// dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing chung za zhing gtso la stobs// khu byug mgo yi zhal
31b3: gdangs shing / sgra dang bcas pa bka' bzhin byed// lcags kyu dung dmar kha T+Ta gri// zod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du//
31b4: stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// sngon mo rin chen chags pas gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs
31b5: pa'i gzugs/ / zhing chen rgyu zhags 'debs shing stobs// ra chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// dung dmar kha T+wAM dril chen zhags// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du
31b6: byas/ brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su
31b7: rung ba'i sdang mig can/ / dmar mo bum rna chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// ban das khrag chen gtso la stobs// spre'u chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka'
31b8: bzhin byed/ zhing chen kha T+wAM 'phen tshul du// lcags sgrog kun 'dzin zangs gris 'debs// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du//

32a1: stabs gru phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ljang nag gsus 'dzin chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug
32a2: 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ / zhing chen glo snying gco la stobs// spyang chen mgo ya zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// dril chen sgra sgrogs dud dmar 'thung // kha T+wA~M 'phen cing rde'u chung za// thod rlon
32a3: g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/ / brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// pho nya rdo rje dbang phyug ma// cir yang
32a4: 'gyur ba'i gzugs can rnams/ / 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mang po yis// dam bcas bzhin du las kun byos// de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i sprin rnam par spros pa bdud btul ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //
32a5: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje he ru ka khrag 'thung chen po rnams byang chub kyi sems kyi sprin las// oM ma hA tsid tA maN DA la kro d+ha ha ha ha/ he he he/ phaT phaT phaT/ tsa tur yo gi ni tring hring hring // tring tring tring / mrid mrid
32a6: srid krid kri da kri da/ ha ha ha zhes brjod pas rdo rje he ru ka sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa khros pas rngam par gnas so// rang na he ru ka sbyin pa'i khro ba mdzad do// chags pa'i he ru ka dang skra dbang gi tshul gyis shin tu khro ba mdzad
32a7: ro/ / las kyi he ru ka kun du mi mdzad pa med pa'i tshul gyis bdug pa'i khro bo chen po'o// de dag kyang rdo rje 'dzin ma khro mo dang // rin chen dbyug to ma zhes bya ba'i khro ma dang / pad ma band 'dzin ma zhes bya ba'i khro mo dang las
32a8: kyi dbyug to ma zhes bya ba'i khro mo dang bcas pa rnams brkyang bskam gyi stabs kyis dpal he ru ka la 'khril nas gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis mnyam pa chen por gnas so/ / de'i phyir rim na rnal 'byor chen mo dkar

32b1: mo dang / rnal 'byor chen mo skul byed ma dang / gsod byed ma dang / za byed ma dang / rnal 'byor ma dang / gtum mo dang / rnal 'byor ma las grub par byed ma dang / rdo rje rigs byed ma dang / dbang sdud chen mo dang /
32b2: drag po'i cha byad kyis khrag dang keng rus kyi dkyil na zhabs gnyis thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du brkyang bskam gyi tshul du gnas so// de'i phyir rim na rdo rje bra men ma chen mo dang / seng gi mgo chen ma
32b3: stabs dang ldan ma dang / stag mgo chen mo stabs dang ldan ma dang / myos byed rta mgo chen mo dang / 'ug pa'i mgo can dang / bya chog mgo gsod byed stabs chen mo dang / mchu rengs mgo can gcod byed chen
32b4: mo dang / wa'i mgo can skal byed ma'i stabs chen mo dang // rab tu sgra 'byin gyi mgo can dang / rnam par rab tu skyes gsod mdzad pa wang mgo can chen mo dang / mi gtong bar za bar byed ma phag gi mgo can
32b5: zhe sdang chen po rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang / gdug pa'i mtshon dang chas nas gnas par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba las rnam par sbyar ba'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo te le'u bcu pa'o//
32b6: de nas bcom ldan 'das gtum pa chen mo dang / rnam par sgyur ba'i tshogs rmongs pa sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dgyes par mdzad de 'di dag byung bas kun du g.yo ba chen po mdzad do// oM sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/
32b7: mahA shI he ru ka sarba kha tha ma/ d+hU pa tsa ma hA tsa na Da hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM ma hA kA ru Ni ka ya/ ma hA rad na he ru ka sarba kha ta ma d+hu/ pa tsa ma hA tsaNaN tr-i tre tre/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA
32b8: shrI pad ma he ru ka sarba kha ta ma d+hu/ hri tri tri hri tri/ paT pa Ta phaT/ oM sarba ma hA ka ru Ni ka ya/ ma hA shrI karma he ru ka sarba kha ta ma d+hu/ pa tsa ma hA tsaN Da ha ha ha/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ ha la ha la ha la hUM/ oM sarba ma hA

33a1: kA ru Ni ka ya/ bud d+ha lo tsa na DA ki ni/ hA na ha na ha na/ hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba ka ru Ni kA ya/ badz+ra lo tsa na ma hA DA ke ni d+hakar+b+ha/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM sarba ma hA kA ru NI kA ya/ ra da na lo tsan DA ki ni// pa tsa pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/
33a2: so sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA pad ma lo tsa ni DA ki nid+hahad+har+b+ha d+ha ha/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM sarba ma hA ka dre ni kA ya/ karma lo tsi na ma hA DA kini tshon d+ha tshin d+ha/ hUM hUM hUM/ hUM hrIH/ dz+ra gr-i/ ha haH/ phaT phaTe phaT/ o dra lu kro ri/ oM ru lu
33a3: ri/ oM ru lu pra moH/ oM ru lu be ta li/ oM ru lu tsaN Da li/ oM ru lu g+ha sa ma ri// oM ru lu sma thA nI/ bani d+ha bin d+ha/ g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma/ ha na ha na han/ hUM hU~M hUM phaT phaT/ oM tsa ra ka ra sing du he he/ oM go ra kar bya gr-i he he/ oM tsi raka/
33a4: kar srik+ka he he/ oM sho na ka ra kri ta he he/ oM kAng ka ra ka ka phaT phaT/ oM ga ta ka ra ban tsa ma he he/ phaT/ hasta ka ra u lu ka he hohaM/ hri hriM hraM/ phaT phaT/ ma hA tsa tur yo gi ni gahaha/ he he he/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ ts+tsheN+yai b+hU b+h+r-i b+h+yo b+h+yoSh+Tots+tsha
33a5: b+h+yob+h+r-i d+ho b+h+yo/ b+h+yob+h+r-i D+hAb+h+r-i b+h+yo d+ho/ b+h+yoD+hA b+ho b+h+yo b+h+yAM b+h+yAM/ b+h+yoD+b+hi D+ho b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu/ bIny+tsi ti khA ti khA hi khA Ni lA hi/ paT+Ta phaT phaT/ sa ma ya sa ma ya/ yo ga yo gi ni phaT phaT phaT/ hUM d+h+we/
33a6: zhes brjod pas thams cad rab tu brgyal/ rab tu spangs/ rab tu myos/ rab tu bsgral bar gyur to// bsnams shing gsol nas mi gnas par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mnyes pa las sngags kyi
33a7: le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs rngam pa'i stabs kyis dza dza dza hUM hUM ho ho zhes par mdzad do// mngon spyod kyi las kyi sbyor ba sbyor ba chen po mdzad do// gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mdzod
33a8: nas gsang ba'i yum gyi pad ma yong su yangs pa'i nang du sems can gyis tshogs byang chub sems su mdzad nas mkha' pha ba ste sras su bskyed par mdzad de mdzad nas dran pa rnyed do/ / sangs rgyas kyi sku bsam gyis mi

33b1: khyab pa me dpung bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshon cha dang dbu dang zhal mang zhing spyi bung zhes byed pa spangs shing gsod par mthong ste smras pa/ / rab tu 'jigs pa'i khro ba rnams// shin tu bde ba'i gnas shig nas/ bton pa
33b2: skal bar btu chung / / da ni ci mdzad la gor mdzod/ lhan cig rje cig 'on zhes smras pa'i tshig gis sems can gyis mtshan ma 'byongs par gyur bar mkhyen to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos rab tu spros la
33b3: gnod long shig/ rje la gus par dam nos la// 'di la gnas par skal med pas// phyi yi dkyil 'khor sa la 'dug/ ces bka' stsal pas dngangs brtas par gyur te/ rdo rje bran mo'i mna' bor nas smras pa/ skyes
33b4: mchog lha rjes su zhig lags/ / 'bangs dang bka' stsal bdag cag nyan// phyi yi gnas su gnas su bgyi// ma srid bran g.yog 'khor yug rnams// 'jigs pa'i skus ni gzhes su gsol// ci mdzad khyod mkhyen gzhes
33b5: su gsol/ / yun du skal ldan gzhes su gsel// bdag cag 'jig rten skyong ba'i rnams// de ring ngam mnos slan chad du// 'khor rnams skyongs par mi bgyid dam// bka' bzhin las kun mi sgrub bam// theg pa
33b6: 'dzin la mi stong ngam/ / bzhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor me zin na// da lta bzhin du 'jigs pa dang // shi nas dmyal bar shog ces smras te mna' bor ro// de nas khrag 'thung chen pos cang mi gsung bar bzhugs
33b7: pa las rab tu gsod byed ma dang / tshangs pa mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / dbang mo dang / grub mo dang / bskyod chen mo dang / rdo rjer gdong chen mo dang / mi mo rlag par byed pa chen mo dang / phag mo gsod byed ma dang / gtum par
33b8: mdzad ma dang / brlan par mdzad ma dang / 'phags chen mo dang / nag mo ral pa chen mo dang / rdo rje 'dzin ma chen mo dang / rdo rje nag chen mo dang / rdo rje rgan byed chen mo dang / rdo rje yid 'phrog par byed ma dang / rab tu gcig

34a1: tu zab po dang / rdo rje srin mo'i cha byed chen mo dang / sngog nag chen mo dang / ljang nag chen mo dang / be con chen mo dang / zhi ba bum sna chen modad/ las la grub pa mo dang / bka' nyan par byed ma dang / tsham dam/
34a2: kyi gzugs dang / drag shul ma dang / nyul ba mor tshul ston ma de dag la sogs pa/ mdang srid mo bu mo rnams rab tu gus par bka' nyan/ rdo rje bran mor bka' nyan te/ rdo rje bran mor dam blangs nas// ci 'dod las rnam
34a3: bdag cag bgyid ces mna' bor te 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang / mtshan cha dang / gnas pa'i gzhir bcas te phyi'i snam bu la gnas pa'i las byed par gnas so// de dag gi dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa bshad de/
34a4: dkyil 'khor phyi rol gru bzhir bcas/ dbus su zlag ma rag tar bcas// ba su ta yi maN DA la// dri chu rag ta'i tshem bur bri// hrIHlas dbus su bcwa brgyad gzugs// yang na dbu gsum phyag drug pa// thod pa ban/
34a5: dadamar chen bkar// brgyad dam nyi shu dgu ru ldan// yAn lnga dung ldan pa la// lnga pa'i yi ges byin gyis brlab/ zad 'phro phud dang ldan pa la// u tsus sta yi sngags kyis bzlas// thod pa dmar blugs btung bya zhing //
34a6: ming dam b+h+yo 'am ru lu yis// mngon sum phyin par bos nas ni// kha nas rag tas rab gtor te// he ru ka yi las rnams kun// gong nas 'byung ba'i las bzhin bya// sgeg mon chung de dag la// dbang gi chags
34a7: pas 'dod spyad de/ / ta ma la yi zur bus gdab// ci 'dod las rnams grub par sbyin// chags dang gsod dang rgyags pa che// mnyam pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin gyis// tse ra ka ra'i 'khor rnams kyang // bzhi yi las la
34a8: 'jug par ni/ meng tsam 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bskul na rtse gcig las rnams grub// de nas kun du bzang mo chen mos ming tsam nga chos thams cad gnas par mkhyen to// gsang ba sgyu 'phrul chen

34b1: po'i ji bsdu pa chen po mdzad do/ / de nas sems dpa' rnal 'byor mchog/ kun kyang sems dpa' rnal 'byor mchog/ chos kun ming tsam rnal 'byor yin// ming tsam rnal 'byor ma yin par// sems dpa' rnal
34b2: 'byor 'ga' yang med/ / de nyid dus gsum rang bzhin te/ de nyid kun du bzang mo mchog/ sgyu 'phral dra ba'i rgyud dag las// sems ma rdo rje de dag las// gsang ba'i nges don gang yang med// ces chos thams cad
34b3: 'dus pa chen mor mkhyen to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi he ru ka 'dus pa chen mo'i dkyil 'khor te le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// // a ho rgyu nyid stong pas 'bras bu mngon sum pa// byin gyis brlang
34b4: tu med pas byin gyis brlab pas 'grub/ / sangs rgyas mdzad pa nyid kyang sems can yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs// de nyid mi mdzad med par shes pa kun gyi nang na rab tu bsngags// chags pa mi gtong/
34b5: chags pa med pa mngon sum dgongs pa yin pas dkyil 'khor gong ma kun gyi dang // sgrub la dga' bas bsgrub tu med phyir bsgrubs pas 'grub zhes rgyal bas rab tu gsung // pho mo med phyir pho mo
34b6: snang la dga' ba spyod brtson rgyal bas 'grub ces bsgrub pa kun gyis gsungs/ / stong par rtogs la spyod la g.yel ba rnal 'byor min zhes rgyal bas gsung / med la gtod cing dge sdig 'chol ba sdig
34b7: can yin par rab tu gas la/ / dge sdig yod phyir brtson pas 'grub ces theg pa kun las 'byung // bag dang mi ldan rang bzhin med par gnas pa la// gtso mchog mi bkur khungs phyin chos la mi
34b8: brtson sems can yin par mngon sum gsal bar snang / / de bas sgyu 'phrul gsang ba mchog 'di bu rnams gang zhig nyan brtson pas// 'grus par brlabs pa bag dang ldan pa lobs pa dang por ro shes

35a1: bya/ skad cig gzugs la 'phangs pa med par gus ldan gsang ba'i sdud pa yin// rdo rje slob dpon mchog la dad pas sangs rgyas ma lus kun la mchod pa chen po yin// lam la mkhas pas rdo rje gros
35a2: dpon bkur ba'o/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams rab tu 'dun pa chen po skyes te// mchod pa chen po bkur bstis mchod// dkyil 'khor dang po phun sum tshogs// gnyis pa
35a3: gsang ba'i mchod pa la/ / gsum pa rol pa gleng slong ba// khros pa'i sprin las bdud rnams btul// don cig sgyu 'phrul bka' stsal pa// tshogs kyi mchod pa dgyes pa che// dus gsum rtag tu ma byung ba// lam la mkhas
35a4: pa yin par bsngags/ / brtson dang ldan pas rab mnyan dang // gsang ba'i bsgrub pa 'di bsgrub pa// kun kyang kun tu bzang po yin// bcom ldan 'das rmongs pa sel ba zhes bya ba sgyu 'phrul chen po rdzogs s+ho//
35a5: bod skad du// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po ye shes bla ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na// sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po//
35a6: ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bla ma ste// rnal 'byor kun gyi gsang mchog bde// gnas gsang ba na bzhugs nas su// snying po bla ma 'di skad bshad/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
35a7: ldan 'das gsang ba bla ma'i longs spyod chen mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje'i bdag nyid can/ ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa
35a8: thams cad kyang so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/ shin tu gsang ba bla ma chen po'i dbyings 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na/ gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo gsal ba la ye

35b1: shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang nam mkha' dbyangs ltar rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/ yon tan bla ma chen po dpag tu med pas rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur pa/ lhag pa'i ye shes rin po tshe bla ma'i glo 'bur
35b2: bzhis mdzes pa/ rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad so so ma yin tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes bla mas kun du 'khyil ga/ ye shes bla ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
35b3: dbyings dang / kha dog la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pa/ lpags pa tshad dpag tu med pa/ ye shes rin po che bla ma'i phreng ba dang / chun 'phyang dang / shar bu'i rgyan dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri re reg
35b4: bya la sogs pa mi sgrib par gsal bar rang byung la/ / gsal ba'i rgyan khyad par can bla mas klubs pa/ tshad med pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa/ phyi dang nang med pa kun
35b5: du yang bla ma chen po nang du gyur pa/ shin tu gsang ba pas khyab bdal ba'i bla ma chen po'i gzhal yas khang na pha rol du phyin pa lnga'i khri/ mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i khri dang / stobs glang po che'i khri dang / rdzu 'phrul rta'i khri dang /
35b6: dbang rma bya'i khri dang / thogs pa med pa nam mkha' lding gi khri dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang / gos pa med pa pad ma rin po che'i gdan brtsegs pa ni/ ye nas gsang ba bla ma'i phyir/
35b7: yum gyi gzhal yas phyogs bcur 'bar// ye nas pha rol phyin pa'i phyir// thogs pa med pa'i khri rkang brtan// rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal phyir// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan 'bar zhing // gdod nas dri ma med pa'i
35b8: phyir/ / rnam par dag pa pad mo gdan// re ba yid bzhin skong ba'i phyir// yid bzhin rin chen gter gyi gdan// ma bsags lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i phyir// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyan// yon tan chen po'i

36a1: gdan stengs na/ sku mdun dang rgyab med par thams cad tu zhal tha ma tha le bar gsal zhing mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pas thams cad tu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sku gsung thugs yon tan brin las/
36a2: sna tshogs par snang ba/ thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi dkyil mo dkrung du bzhugs pa/ ye shes drug gi phyag rgya ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i phyag rgya can/ sku gsung thugs bsam gyis
36a3: mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po bla ma dang / btsun mo dam pa sra ba'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po tham
36a4: dang / / btsun mo dam pa snang ba'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po bla ma dang / btsun mo dam pa mnyen pa'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po bla ma dang /
36a5: btsun mo dam pa dro ba'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po bla ma dang / btsun mo dam pa bskyod pa'i dbyings kyi bla ma la sogs pa ye shes rgyal po stengs dbyal kun kyang mthing
36a6: ka dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / leb rgan dang / ljang khu'i mdog bla mar 'tsher ba ste/ gnyis su med par 'khril bas chos kyi dbyings kun du mtha' yas par bla ma chen po'i spyod pas khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/
36a7: dper na til gyi gang bu 'am mngar gyi sbram bu bzhin kun du bde ba chen pos khyab par bzhugs so// de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong dbang bla ma dang / btsun mo gzigs par bya ba'i bla ma dang / byang chub chen
36a8: po rdo rje thos dbang bla ma dang / btsun mo gsan par bya ba'i bla ma dang // byang chub chen po rdo rje sdom dbang bla ma dang / btsun mo bsnam par bya ba'i bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje myong dbang bla ma dang / btsun me myong bar

36b1: bya ba'i bram dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje sogs shes bla ma dang / btsun ma sgron ma'i tha ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje gcod shes bla ma dang / btsun ma gdug pa'i bra ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje 'jug shes pa
36b2: ma dang / btsun mo char 'bebs bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje 'dus pa'i bla ma dang / btsun mo rgyas pa'i bla ma dang / 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg g.yas dang / btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa'i bla ma dang
36b3: 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg g.yon bla ma dang / btsun mo chad par ma yin pa'i bla ma dang / 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg gsang bla ma dang / btsun mo bdag tu ma yin pa'i bla ma dang / 'joms pa chen po
36b4: rdo rje reg 'dus bla ma dang / btsun mo mtshan mar ma yin pa'i bla ma dang / de lta bu'i tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyis su med par gsang ba dgyes pa'i dbyings bla ma na bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin
36b5: gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor bla ma de nyid kyi gsang ba bla ma 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo / / e ma'o de bzhin nyid kyi
36b6: dbyings nyid dbang bsgyur dkyil 'khor bla ma'i dang / / ngang nyid rnam dag bde mchog gsang ba'i dbyings// dbyings nyid mnyam sbyor ba de mchog rin chen gter// mi zad gter ldan bdud rtsi gsang ba'i tha// bla
36b7: med byang chub thig le ya mtshan dkyil 'khor snang / / rang snang ba nyid ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan rnam dag snang ba ni// sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las sel med pa'i yid bzhin rin chen mi zad par ldan brgyan
36b8: gyis 'khor lo bla ma rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid do/ / rdo rje gsang ba bla ma'i des don du'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma las dbyings dang ye shes gsang ba'i bde ba'i bla ma nges pa'i gling gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//

37a1: de nas bcom ldan 'das yid byed pa tham rdo rje kun du bzang po thams cad ma lus pa'i tshul rdo rje btsun mo byab mo// kun tu bzang mo'i tha ma la 'jug par gyur to// gsang ba'i bla ma'i tshig 'di ched
37a2: shu brjod do/ / oM chos kyi chos nyid bya ba'i dbyings// kun du bzang mo bde ba'i yum// ma g.yos rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni// bdag yin bdag gi spyod yul bas// phyag rgya sna tshogs so sor gsal// nub byas
37a3: 'og min gnas mchog tu/ / ma chags pad ma'i gdan gting ba// dus gsum rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gnas// rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi la// phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag ldan// dbang med skal ngan bsal ba'i
37a4: phyir/ nang gtan phyi rim lcags dang ldan// rgyal ba yongs kyis gsang ba'i tshes// sum kyang gting dpag dka' ba ste// kun du bzang po nyid kyis gzigs// ho do nas btsun mo bya ba mo kun du bzang mos gsang
37a5: ba bla ma'i tshig 'di ched tu brjod do/ / oM sems kyi sems nyid byed pa'i gtso// kun du bzang po rdo rje yid// ye shes brgyad kyi rang bzhin te// shar phyogs mngon dga' bsam yas nas// ni la lta bu'i gtor 'byin
37a6: gsang 'dus 'phral gyi lnga mig gis/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo phye ste// byang chub mchog gi nang bstan bkrol// ma chags pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs// 'gro don byang chub sems bskyed de// 'gro lnga skye bzhi
37a7: dbang du bsdus/ / sku gsung thugs nas dbang bskur ro zhes gleng ngo // de nas bya ba mo kun du bzang mos gsang ba tha ma'i mchod pa 'di ched du phul lo// oM rin chen pad ma'i dkyil 'jom 'di// 'dzum pa'i mdangs
37a8: kyis 'bul lags kyis/ / bla med 'phrul gyi lde mig ste// dgyes mchog rdo rje gsor nas ni// bdud rtsi char chen dbab du gsol// zhes ched tu gleng ngo // de nas yang yid byed pa po rdo rje kun du bzang pos bdud

37b1: rtsi bla ma'i char bas snod bcud kyi 'dzam bu'i gling tshim par bya ba'i phyir gsang ba bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do/ / oM rdo rje tha ma'i dgyes rab 'di// gsor nas bdud rtsi'i char dbab phyir// 'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i
37b2: gnas su gsor/ / mi dmigs bde dang spro ba 'di// kun du bzang mo dbyings su bskyil/ zhes ched tu gleng ste/ gnyis su med pa las nyid kyi spyod yul thams cad gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bra ma khyad par dus pa
37b3: pabardul phra mo snyed 'thon nas sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par mdzad pa ni/ la la ni gsang ba bla ma'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs te yan lag thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis rlob/ la la ni 'gro ba drug gdus
37b4: ba'i don du thub pa chen po drug hUM bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ lha yi gnas na brgya byin mgon// lha ma yin la thag zangs ris// mi la bdud 'dul shAkya mgon// yi dgas gnas na kha 'bar bde// byol song seng ge nyid du
37b5: smra/ / dmyal ba la ni gshin rje mgon// sku dang cha lugs tshul ston cing // la la ldum zhugs sku la bltam// la la tshul bsrung rab tu byung // la la bsnyen rdzogs dka' thub byed// la la dam nod 'gro ba sgrol/ la la
37b6: bcu drug chos la btsud/ / la la mer 'bar tshur yang 'brug/ la la nam mkha' sgra ru 'bar// la la rdo rje brag tu sra// la la gso gsod 'pham rgyal byed// la la bcing sgrol 'gug sgrol byed// la la bdud 'dul
37b7: ngan song sbyong / / la la dkyil 'khor mchod sprin 'khril// kun kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor/ de ltar rtag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/ theg pa dang po bcu drug mgon// gnyis pa bzhi yi lta spyod bsrung // gsum/
37b8: ba bcu gnyis nges par bstan// bzhi pa gnyis kyi lta spyod sbyongs// bzhi pa'i theg pa mdor bsdus na// bla med theg pa'i dbyings su btsud// theg pa bzhi yi nges 'byung la/ theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas//

38a1: kun 'byung dkyil 'khor sgyu 'phrul che// mang la 'brel bas dra ba'i don// thun mong min pas gsang ba'i don// theg pa'i bcud de snying po'i dbyings// zhes ched tu gleng ste/ snod bcud kyi 'jig rten rgyal ba'i dkyilal lo/
38a2: gsang bar gnas la sbyar ba dang / phyogs bcu dus bzhi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gzegs mos mnyes par gyur to// de nas snod bcud kyi 'jig rten mabacas snyigs
38a3: mamed par gsang ba bla ma'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par sangs rgyas nas ched tu brjod do/ / e ma'o rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// skye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub sems
38a4: dpa'i dkyi'akhor nyid/ / sa chu spyan dang mA ma ki/ me long gos dkar sgrol ma ste// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing // thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las
38a5: gzhan ma yin/ / sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi rnyed do// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs
38a6: thams cad kyis ched tu brjod pa 'di gsungs so/ / e ma'o phyogs bcu'i stong khams ye nas dben// srid pa gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing // stegs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas// phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas// thams
38a7: cad mchog gi snying po bas/ / gzhan du rgyal bas chos mi btsal// nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do// zhes brjod pas chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshes
38a8: pa nyid kyis mkhyen to/ / de nas dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa las ched tu brjod pa 'od brjod do// e ma'o yi nas gsang ba'i chos// sna tshogs snang ba rang bzhin gsang// gzhan du min la shin tu gsang//

38b1: gsang mchog snying po bla na med// thams cad gsang ba'i dbyings su des// bla ma mchog gi snying po las// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med// ces brjod pas thams cad dbyings su nges par mkhyen te// de ltar yin/
38b2: na yang 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pas 'gro ba'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa la thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir rdo rje bla ma'i tshig 'di chad du brjod do// e ma'o bde gshegs
38b3: snying po las/ / rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul// sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang // gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i// bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin// sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de// bcing bar
38b4: bya ba yod ma yin/ / rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis// nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa por// bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i// ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos// bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad// spros kyang 'phel/
38b5: 'grib med pa'i dbyings// de ltar yin na yang de ltar ma rtogs pa rnams la kun rdzob kyi phung po byang chub kyi sems bla ma'i dkyil 'khor du sems kyi ngo bo bskyed pa'i phyir// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di ched tu brjod do// stong
38b6: zhing dben pa'i sems nyid ni/ / rigs dang kha dog dbyibs med do// ci pad med la tsir yang snang // mi bskyod rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung // rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyang // sems kyi sgyu 'phrul chen po yin// gcig
38b7: dang du mar mi dmigs te/ / mngon shes drug gis thams cad byed// bla ma'i ting 'dzin chen po yis// dkyil 'khor chen po byed par bstan// rgyu lnga rkyen bzhis bsdus pa la// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor che phrag ba/
38b8: bzhi yi rim pa tshul bzhin byed// rgyan dang phyag rgya'i tshul rnams kun// til 'bru'i nang du ri rab bskyed// sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor dang // stangs dbyal gnyis kyi phyag rgya yang // ri rab til 'bru'i tshul bzhin

39a1: du dpe byed rgyan gyis brgyan spras pa'o/ / nges pas bzhi bcu rtsa lnga bsgom// dbyings dang ye shes stangs dbul gnyis// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// ho gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad de// yul la kun du bzang mo'o//
39a2: tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan te// yul la khams gsum byams mo'o// ho 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te// yul la na bza' dkar mo'o// to 'du byed don yod grub pa ste// yul la dam tshig sgrol ma'o// to rnam shes rdo rjesam+ba
39a3: dpa' ste/ yul la yangs pa'i spyan can ma/ ho// mig la sa'i snying po ste// yul la dkar mo sgeg chen no// ho sA la nam mkha'i snying po ste// yul la me tog dpal phreng ma'o// ho lce la spyan ras dbang phyug ste// yul la chos kyi dbyangs/
39a4: can no// to rna bar phyag na rdo rje ste// yul la las kyi gar mkhan ma'o// ho kun 'dus sgrib pa rnamasel te// yul la me tog char 'bebs to// kun shes kun du bzang po ste// yul la gsal ba'i sgron ma'o// ho gcod shes byams
39a5: pa'i bdag nyid de/ / yul la bdug pa'i sprin 'pho to// 'jug shes 'jam dpal gzhon nu ste// yul la tsan dan char 'bebs so// g.yas gnyis stobs chen khro bo ste// yul la gdong mo 'jigs tshul to// g.yon gnyis gshin rje
39a6: gshed po ste/ / yul la ster 'phro 'jigs tshul to// gsang ba rta mgrin dpa' bo ste// yul la dur khrod bdag mo to// lte bar bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste// yul la gtum mo 'jigs tshul to// rgyud drug 'khor ba'i gnas drug tu//
39a7: thub drug phyag rgya chen po'o// kun du sku dang kun du gsung // kun du thugs kyi phyag rgya yang // lus ngag yid la de bzhin to// sems nyid sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste// sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul chen po las// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu lnga//
39a8: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nges pa las// snying po'i dkyil 'khor bla ma yin// zhes brjod pas sems can thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang dbyer med par dgyes te mnyam

39b1: ba nyid kyi dbyings na bzhugs so/ / gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma las dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i ngang du sems kyi rang bzhin cir yang 'grub pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas de bzhin
39b2: g shegs pa thams cad rang bzhin gcig dang du mar dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor bla ma 'di dbyung bar bzhed nas ched du brjod pa 'di
39b3: gsungs so/ / oM ye shes bla ma rol pa yis// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar brtags na// dkyil 'khor bas ma yas lhun gyis grub// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod//
39b4: 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhis brgyan rdo rje'i khyams// kun du gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan// rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan// seng ge glang chen rta dang khyud//
39b5: nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la// nyi zla pad ma rin po che// gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul// 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang // g.yas nas mthong thos snom pa dang // myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas// gru chad la ni gcod
39b6: byed dang / / snang byed sogs byed 'dug byed rnams// btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas par gnas// bar khyams la ni thub drug dag/ rlung drug sbyong ba'i phyag rgyar gnas// de bzhin thig le chen po dag/ mdun dang rgyab tu byed
39b7: pa dag/ bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan// sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa dag/ btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad ma'i ral gri nor bu 'bar// ud pal klu shing la sogs mtshan//
39b8: mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin// mthing ka dkar po ser le ba rgan// ljang ku la sogs sna tshogs mdog/ mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// gsal 'cher lhun sdug gzi byin 'bar// 'od zer 'phro

40a1: ba'i tshogs chen po/ / 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa ste// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyi grub// ho zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas
40a2: sra med pa thams cad tu dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po brjod kyis mi lang bzhing gi rdul skyed tu gsal bar 'gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag
40a3: nyid kyi gsang ba tha ma 'di sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las 'di dag phyung ngo / / a ho// bde mchog ngo mtshar byang chub sems chen po// thig le mnyam sbyor sgyur 'phrul bla ma'i dbyings// rnam dag thig le byang
40a4: chub sems kyis rol/ / ngo mtshar rmad byung bla ma chen po'i dbyings/ to// dmigs bya dmigs byed mi dmigs gsang ba'i dbyings// ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor bla ma bsam mi khyab// mnyam dang mi mnyam kun
40a5: khyab gsang ba'i dbyings/ / ye shes kun gsal dkyil 'khor spros med bla ma'i dang // ho// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po des pa'i bla mchen po las dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
40a6: de nas ye shes rgyal po de btsun mo bla ma'i dbyings dang gnyis su med par gyur nas// bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems rim par gsal ba zhes bya ba'i dgongs paster chi ba nas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa phyogs
40a7: dus bzhir dgos par bzhed nas sku gsung thugs bla ma'i dbyings nas 'di dag phyung ngo / / dang po bla ma'i lung bstan pa// mtshon du med pa'i byang chub sems/ ye shes snying po gsal ba dang // bsgom pa rnam gsum
40a8: dus gcig rdzogs/ / byang chub sems kyi thig le la// ma bkag lhun gyis rdzogs pas na// da ni thig le chen po'i don// de ni de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// de ni kun tu snang ba'i dang / de ni rgyu yi rim par ldan to/ gas

40b1: ba bla ma'i tshig tu'o/ / gsang ba bla ma'i nges don las// gsang pa gsung ga dkyil 'khor grags// zla be shra bi shud d+he badz+ra swAtrA/ nAM hUM hUM badz+ra tsita ta oM/ a a a badz+ra ba ta sa ma ya oM/ hUM badz+ra d+de// mr-id+ha tu i shwa ri/ mdza
40b2: dzi ka/ la dwe Sha ra ti/ sra ra tan d+hi ka/ maM mo har ti/ oM A ro li// bA ra gar ti/ ta pra dz+nyA d+h+r-i ka/ taM badz+ra ra ti/ kr-i ti rA dza ya/ hU~Ml se sa sa ya s+thA/ tAM a gar b+hA ya/ tra ma le sa ma yato// d+hi ha to pad sa pan d+ha ma/ tI kir ti
40b3: ga ya ta/ d+h+ri kra rA pA na triH/ a nir ti rA ga ya me/ me d+hA ri ni swA hA/ dza du ba pra be sha/ thi lid ni sru ram pa yA swA hA/ hUM puSh+pa a be shwa/ hUM swa rA dzA ya swA hA// bo d+hA bi su k+Sha ni/ swe shrI ar gA ya swA hA// to gan d+he tsita ta ma
40b4: mu ne krid swA hA/ oM mu ne hU~M druM swA hA/ oM mu ne br-i swA hA/ oM mu ne sra swA hA/ oM mu ne k+ShaM swA hA/ oM mu ne ye swA hA// hUM ya mAn ta kri ta phaT/ oM ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ hU~M pradz+nyA na ta krita phaT/ oM ma hA rad na d+ha
40b5: ram hA kro d+hi shwa re dz+wa la ni hUM phaTe/ drA pad mAn ta kr-id hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA pad ma d+ha ri mi hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa le ne hU~M phaT/ oM bi g+h+nAn ta kr-ita hU~M phaT/ mo ma hA kam d+ha ra ma hA kre d+he shwa ra dz+wa lon tru paT/ oM i h+ye te b+ha ga bAn/ madz+riM
40b6: ka ru ni ka tri sha ho/ / sa sa ya T+Ta/ dza d+hU ba to mo ma tsU sA lA badz+nyA sa ma ya/ badz+ra sa ma ya/ badz+ra sa ma ya/ badz+ra sa ma ya/ badz+ra ma sa ya/ oM ma hU~M swAhA// oM ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las chad po che//
40b7: skyon bral byang chub sems dpa'i chen po de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor bas// phyag rgya bla mar bdag sbyor cig/ oM badz+ra sa sa ya hUM/ oM badz+ra sa su ya s+t+waM/ badz+ra sa ma ya ho// dza hUM ba to zhes gsungs pas gsung gi dkyil
40b8: 'khor bla ma chen pos 'jig rten 'brug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du grags/ / rab tu grags/ kun tu grags so// grags pas snod bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bla sa chen pos skyob pa

41a1: gyur to/ / de nas yang ye shes rgyal po ltangs dbul dag gnyis su med par rol pa mdzad pa bla ma la thim par gyur te/ de nas ye shes rgyal po de nyid dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las
41a2: byung ngo / / oM chos dbyings mnyam pa chen po las// ye shes gsal ba rnam par dag/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// skye med chos la dbang sgyur shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya ma shA n+ya tA d+harma dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba Ad ma konahUM
41a3: dag cing gsal ba'i rang bzhin te/ / skyon med sems nyid rin po che// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// sred pa gsum la dbang sgyur shog/ oM ma hA gu t+yai ma hA A dar sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma kau ta/ swa khams gsum re
41a4: skod rgyal po ste/ / yid bzhin rin chen gter gyi mchog/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis// 'gro ba re skod rgyal por shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya ma hA sa man ta a be sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ oM nyes pa'i skyon bral dri
41a5: ma med/ / skye 'gag med pa'i dngos grub ste// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis// srid gsum nyes dmigs sel bar shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya ma hA pra sta pra be sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA Id ma ko he/ ha dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
41a6: mthar phyin cing / / grub pa las kyi bye brag las// bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis// skye 'gro dbyings su sgrol bar shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya ma hA kri ta a nu Sh+TAn dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ a ni stong dang mi stong gnyis/ dgra
41a7: mal yang mi gnas shing / / stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyis// mi 'gyur dbyings la dbang sgyur shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya ma hA a be sha shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko ta// oM bder gshegs sku yi ngo bo las// me shigs
41a8: rdo rje rgyal ba'i gtso/ / sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis// rdo rje sku yi gtso bor shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko ta i bde gshegs gsung gi ngo bo las// me shigs rdo rje chos kyi

41b1: dbyings/ / sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis// rdo rje gsung gi ngo bor shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ hUM bde gshegs thugs kyi gtso bo las// mi shigs rdo rje rdo rje'i thugs// sngags dang
41b2: phyag rgyar ldan pa yis/ / rdo rje thugs kyis byin rlobs shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta tsita ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad mako ta// swa mi 'gyur ba'i zhing khams nas// ma bskyed pa ni 'bras bu lags// ma bsags pa yi longs
41b3: spyod 'byung / cir yang grub pa'i ye shes kyis// rang dbang thabs kyis sbyar bar sho ga/ swaM ma dA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko ha~M// zhes gsungs pas gsal la 'bar bas thim par gyur to// e ma
41b4: ngo mtshar rab 'byam gyi/ ngo mtshar ya mtshan gsang ba'i chos// sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// sna tshogs sgra rnams dbyings su gsal// gsung gcig yan lag dkyil 'khor ni// bsam gyis mi khyab khyab mchog
41b5: dbyings/ thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya mchog ho// gsang ba'i snying po nges pa'i bra ma chen po las dkyil 'khor bsdu ba dang gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas ye shes rgyal po de nyid de bzhin gshegs
41b6: ba thams cad kyi yan lag thams cad dkyil 'khor bla mar lhun gyis grub pa'i dgongs pa rtser chib nas rdo rje bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du gsungs so/ / sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// thams cad byang chub mchog gi/
41b7: gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi// snying po phyag rgya 'da' dka'o// mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge/ rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/ lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las// sbyar ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu// hUM dang muM gnyis rtse sbyar te/
41b8: 'bru brgyad bsnol nas thugs kar bkan// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya// 'bru bzhi sras nas thugs kar bkan// hUM bsgred rtse mor rdo rje 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil

42a1: cing/ 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas na thugs kar bkan// mu~M bskyed rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lha//
42a2: 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte dbus na// skyon pa rdo rje sems dpa' dag/ yum mchog yangs ma'i spyan dang ni// gnyis med dbyings kyi dang du 'khril// 'bru bzhi sras nas thugs kar bkan// oM bsgreng rje mong
42a3: 'khor lo 'bar/ zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil cing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// laM bskyed rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ btud
42a4: de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta/ / shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs na// bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad dag/ yum mchog kun du bzang mo dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// 'bru bzhi sbas nas
42a5: thugs kar ba kan/ / sra tse 'bar ba rin po che// zla btul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru sras bzhi nas thugs kar bkan// maM bsgreng rtse mong dril gsal 'ab pa nyim
42a6: 'bru lngas las su 'khril/ / btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs nas/ ba der gshegs rin chen 'byung ldan dag/ yum mchog khams gsum byams ma dang / gnyis
42a7: med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/ / 'bru sbas bzhi nas thugs kar bka na// AM bsgreng rtse mor pad ma 'bar// zla ba tul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs
42a8: kar ba kan/ baM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis ltas/ nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stangs na// bde gshegs snang ba mtha' yas dag

42b1: yum mchog na bza' dkar mo dang / / gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// 'bru bzhi smras nas thugs kar bka na// ha bsgreng rtse mor ral gri 'bar// zla btul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul
42b2: gyis chos la brtan/ / 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// trAM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga'i las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs ston
42b3: na/ / bde gshegs don yod grub pa dang // yum mchog dam tshig sgrol ma dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// rin chen myug gu g.yas phyogs na// sgeg cing 'gying ba g.yon phyogs na// sa snying dkar po
42b4: rdo rje'i rigs/ / yum mchog dkar mo sgeg chen dang // dkyil 'khor bar khyams shar phyogs na// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du'i khril// ral gri 'byin pa g.yas phyogs na// phreng ba bgrang ba g.yon phyogs na/
42b5: dkyil 'khor bar khyams lho phyogs na// nam snying ser po rin chen rigs// yum mchog dpal gyi phreng ba dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// pad ma dkar po g.yas phyogs na// bi bang 'gyed pa g.yon phyogs
42b6: na/ dkyil 'khor bar khyams nub phyogs na// spyan ras le brgan pad ma rigs// yum mchog chos kyi dbyangs mkhan dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi dang du 'khril// rdo rje rtse lnga g.yas phyogs na/ gar gyi cod pan/
42b7: g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams byang phyogs na// phyag na mthing ka las kyi rigs// yum mchog gar gyi cod pan dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// mdzes pa'i klu shing g.yas phyogs na//
42b8: bdug spos 'dren pa g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams shar lton// byams pa dkar ser bde gshegs rigs// yum mchog bdug pa'i sprin 'phro dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi dang du 'khril/

43a1: gsar gyi 'khor lo g.yas phyogs na// me tog 'thor ba g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams lho nub na// sgrib sel dmar ser rin chen rigs// yum mchog me tog char 'bebs dang //
43a2: gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// rin chen skyem g.yas phyogs na// sgron ma 'degs pa g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams nub byang na// kun bzang dmar ldang las kyi rigs// yum mchog
43a3: gsal ba'i sgron ma dang / / gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// ud dpal sngon po g.yas phyogs na// tsan dan 'thor ba g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'bor bar khyams byang shar na// 'jam dpal dkar/
43a4: ldang rdo rje'i rigs// yum mchog tsan dan char 'bebs dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// thub drug phyag rgya chen po ni// rgyud drug gnas nas 'dren pa ste// seg par phyag rgya tshul 'dzin pas// sku
43a5: mdog ser pos mi rnams 'dren/ / pi bang phyag rgya tshul 'dzin pas// sku mdog dkar po lha rnams 'dren// go cha mdung thung phyag rgya yis// sku mdog mthing nag lha min 'dren/ rin chen 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis//
43a6: sku mdog sngon po yi dgas 'dren// bo ti brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya yis// sku mdog ser nag byol song 'dren// me 'bar chu 'bebs phyag rgya yis// sku mdog sngon po dmyal ba 'dren// sgo bzhi phyag rgya tshul gnas
43a7: pa/ / rdo rje gnod pa g.yas phyogs na// lcags kyu 'phen pa g.yon phyogs na// stobs chen khro bo chen po yang // yum mchog rdo rje lcags kyu dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// ni mgo gdengs pa
43a8: g.yas phyogs na/ / zhags pa 'phen pa g.yon phyogs na// khro chen gshin rje gshed po yang // yum mchog rdo rje zhags pa dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// sbrul mgo gdengs pa g.yas phyogs na//

43b1: gsazlog sdom pagasan phyogs na// ma chen tamathun dpa' tha yang // ma mchag da lpags s+hog dang / gnyis med kyangs kyi dang du 'brag// rmugs gnon pa gsas phyogs na// ma rbA zlo ba na
43b2: phyogs na/ / khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yang // yum mchog rdo rje dril 'khrol dang // byang gi sgo nas dbyings su 'khril// kun bzang mnyam bzhag ye shes 'gro// yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad mo'i dkyil// gnyis
43b3: med dbyings kyi gsang chen spro/ / bde mchog ngo mtshar thugs kyi dkyil// spro ba spu rdo rje thal mo dag/ bsgyur pas rang sems ye shes gsal// de nyid shes rab thabs su rdzogs// sgyu 'phrul dra ba nges pa'i bla ma chen po
43b4: las phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/ / // de nas ye shes rgyal po de rdo rje bkod pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig rgyan rnam par spros pa'i dgongs pa la gcig char bzhugs te// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di brjod do shin tu
43b5: phra ba'i ting 'dzin mchog/ dpe dang tshad du mi gzung zhing / gzhal yas phyag rgya las sogs te// mtshon du med la snang bar bsgom// shin tu phra bas rnam sbyangs te// rig pas rgya khyon tshad med pa// gzhal yas phyag rgya
43b6: las sogs pa'i/ mtshon du med la snang bar bsgom// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang // tshogs chen gnyis las 'grub pa yi// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan rnams// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam rdzogs te// rags dang
43b7: phra dang 'bring las sogs/ / ji ltar 'dod pa rang gar bya// tsag li dang tshon rtse dag/ bya dang mi bya med pas na// de la dgag par ma gsungs so// 'gro don 'tsham pa de bzhin te// sna tshogs mchod pas rgyas par
43b8: mchod/ / bdag nyid chen pos mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes// srid gsum 'gro ba ma lus kun// dga' ba chen pos tshim pa yin// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dgongs pa yis// rgyal ba'i dkyil

44a1: 'khor ma lus dang / / rigs drug 'gro ba mngon du 'gyur// lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad// gang na'ang yod pa ma yin te// rnam dag ye shes sbyor ba yis// dbyings la dbyings nyid sgom pa yis// kun byas
44a2: dbang phyug rig pas 'jug/ de nas dad ldan gus 'jug pa// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thang dbul// snying yang yon gyi mchog yin te//
44a3: bla ma mnyes phyir gus ldan dbul// dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na// dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes pa yin// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos// skyon rnams ma lus nges par 'byung // dad ldan brtson 'grus
44a4: bskyed byas na/ / phan pa'i dbang nod theg tshad sbyin// des na dbang phyug rgyal po yis// dbang gi rim pa rnams bstan to// 'gro la phan phyir las rnams sbyin// grub pas 'dzin rgyal po sbyin// mi 'gyur rab 'byam bde chen
44a5: no/ / gang 'dod rims kyis sbyin par bya// blo dang ldan pas theg tshad nod// yang na sras kyi dam pa ste// chung ma zos par rdzogs dbang sbyin// sems kyi rnam pa nyid khu byung // sgo 'byed bde bas gyen du bskyil// de nas dbang
44a6: phyug chen po des/ / mi 'gyur sgrol mar sku bskyod cing // sems kyi thig le sgo phye ste// tshangs pa chen po'i dbyang sa bzhed nas/ sgo 'byed rdo rje'i ljags brkyang ste// dad ldan skyes bu dbang bskur ba// rdzogs pa chen po'i bde dbang ni/
44a7: che mchog gong na med pa na// gsang ba'i dbu rgyan gyi dbang dang // thabs mkhas byin rlabs che bas na// las rnams kun gyi dbang dang ni// khams gsum dbang du bsdus pas ni// slob dpon zhal chab kyi dbang ngo // hUM thabs
44a8: mkhas thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis/ / rigs kyi bu mchog dbang bskur phyir// gsang ba'i dbu rgyan 'di bcings pas// rigs kyi bu mchog deng phan chad// 'jig rten che ba kun gyi bla// che ba'i che ba zil gyis gnon// sangs

44b1: rgyas che ba'i mchod gnas ni/ / rnal 'byor chen po khyod nyid yin// oM sarba ta thA ga to gu h+ya badz+ra rad na ma ku Ta trA~M trA~M// badz+ra gu h+ya sid d+hi hU~M// hU~M thabs mkhas byin rlabs chen po ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin te// byin
44b2: rlabs chen po rnam bzhi po/ / dbang bskur gnod phyir gtad pas na// rigs kyi bu mchog dang phan chad// sems can kun la snying brtse bye ra// mu stegs rtag chad yan chad nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzad spyod la// khyod
44b3: kyis mi bya gcig kyang med/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa yis// sems can kun gyi re bskongs// oM sa ma ya gu h+ya e baM ma ya a// slob dpon zhal chab kyi dbang ni khams gsum kun la dbang yid bzhin du sbyar te// hUM ni
44b4: rgyal ba kun gyi bla/ / thig le byang chub sems chen po// nga ni khro rgyal kun gyi rje// ye shes rol pa'i 'byung gnas gter// nga ni spyi dpal bla na med// skyon bral thabs kyi rgyal po yin// sems kyi dkyil nas drangs pa'i
44b5: chu/ / khyod kyi lce la phab pa 'di// snying gi dkyil du gzung bar byos// rigs kyi bu khyod deng phan chad// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs mchog zung // sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo yin// byang chub sems dang mnyam pa'i phyir/ sems
44b6: dpa' kun gyi mchod gnas yin/ / rigs kyi bu thod pan chad// / phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi// bstan pa phyin bab mo kun// sems kyi dkyil du bsdus nas kyang // rdo rje lnga yis sgo bye ste// bdud rtsi sman mchog dam pa 'dis
44b7: dang ldan skyes bu ngoms par byos/ / sems kyi thig le dkyil 'khor du// zhi khro 'byam pa'i gter sgoms la// srid pa gsum la dbang bsgyur cig / dbang can thams cad bkol bar byos// skye 'gro kun la snying brtse'i phyir/
44b8: gdul ba'i phyag rgya 'di yang spyod// dus gsum rtsa ba gcad par byos// phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag/ rnam dag chen po nyid kyi lam// byed spyod thabs tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa// 'gro don byang chub sems kyi dbyings/

45a1: sams kyi chu 'di btung bar byos rnal 'byor chen pos dam du zung // da nas rigs kyi bu mchog das// mnyam pa'i don la gzhol ba'i phyir// ye shes rgyal pos 'di skad gsungs// snying rje kyil dun ma sbyang ga/
45a2: hUM nyid ring pos mtshams sbyar te// thams cad bde ba chen po'i dbyings// dge sdig las kyis mi bcos shing // sgoms dang sgrub pas ma 'byangs pa'i// rnam dag sems nyid rin chen gter// rdo rje snying po ye shes kyis/
45a3: khro rgyal kun gyi gtsor gyur cig/ shrI ma hA su kha badz+ra bo d+hi hU~M ho// oM aM/ mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes gnas// ma btsal phyin pas bde ba'i mchog/ ma bltas gsal bas ye shes spyan// gong na med pas kun gyi rje// ye shes
45a4: rang gnas bdal ba la/ / mi 'gyur g.yung drung sa thob shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya dz+nyA na maN Da la// dz+nyA na gu t+ya sid d+hi swa b+hA ba Ad+ya ma ko ha~M// gzungs dang ting 'dzin stobs dang mi 'jigs pa// 'gyur ba med pa'i sman mchog
45a5: thig le lnga/ / mtshan mchog rdzogs pa chen pos lus brgyan cing // oM sarba ta thA ga to gu h+ya Ad ma a b+hi Shany+tsi ho ha// khyu gi gshog pa g.yas g.yon gdengs pa yis// klu rnams zil gyis gnon par byed pa ltar/
45a6: srid gsum yon tan mchog tu rdzogs pa yi// sangs rgyas kun la mdzes pa'i cod pan mchog/ mchog tu che bas bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon// oM sarba ta thA ga to ma hA gu h+ya badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa ho// hU~M bde ba chen po'i rang
45a7: gnas la/ / ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal du// 'gyur ba med par longs spyod cing // thabs dang shes rab 'phro 'du yis// skye 'gro sras su 'dzin par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga to gu h+ya a nu rA ga ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM//
45a8: dbyings nas nyi shar mkha' la rdzogs sras 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig dang dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po des

45b1: thugs rje chen po gdung ba'i dam tshig lu gu rgyud la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig stan chen po'i phrin lnga mdzad do/ / e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang zhing bcur ldan pa'i
45b2: longs spyod la/ / gsung gi 'phro 'du rnam sbyangs te// lnga yi tshom bu yang dag gsal// sgo lnga byin rlabs 'dren pa'i mchog/ ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i lam// gtsug tu snang mdzad sems dpa' che// skur skyed
45b3: byin rlabs rmad po che/ / pho nya mang po'i 'phro 'du yis// zhing bcu gnas nas blangs nas su// nyi zla ste du de bzhag ste// shes pa gsum po dbyings su bstim// rang rgyud 'khor ba'i sa bon las// ljang ku ni ru 'phang
45b4: bstod de/ ni ljang hU~M ru gnas bsgyur nas// yas 'dus mas 'dus hU~M la 'dus// hUM ni bde gshegs ye shes lnga// dkar la gsal bar skur bskyed de// bde chen 'od zer 'phro bas brjid// rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa//
45b5: yab yum bcu yi byin rlabs nyid// leb rgan hU~M ni dbyings su sbyor// kun du bzang mo bde ba'i mkha'// sangs rgyas sems can gnyi ga'i yum// rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas btso// dras su gyur pas bde
45b6: ba'i mchog/ zhing gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams// gnas ni kun bzang yum gyi mkha'// sa ni rdo rje sems dpa'as// mi ldog nyi zla'i gdan stengs su// mkhas pas sku yi phyag rgyar bskyod// mtshan dang dpe byad
45b7: yang dag ldan/ / rtag tu sku mchog g.yung drung sbyin// ho rdo rje gsang pa'i tshig tu'o// de nas ye shes rgyal po des// gsang mchog bde ba'i mchod sprin gyis// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams rdul snyed na// rgyal ba'i
45b8: dkyil 'khor rdul phran snyed/ / de kun gsang mchog mnyes bya'i phyir// nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo de// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis dbyings su thim// 'khril nas gsang ba'i dgongs pa mdzad// bcwa brgyad phrag

46a1: gnyis hUM spros pas/ / klong du hUM chen gcig tu 'khyil/ kha dog rnam bzhi yang dag ldan// rigs bzhi lha mo rnam spros te// skyong khams bkang nas mchod pa byed// la la gsang mchog dbyings su
46a2: 'khril/ / la la 'dod lnga'i mchod pa byed// rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang // bla re rgyal mtshan 'phan gdugs dang // rin chen do sha la se mo do// dbyibs legs rin chen phung pos mdzes// bsam rdzogs rin
46a3: chen sdong po yis/ / rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod// la la 'gro ba re bskong // la la bdud 'dul ngan song sbyong // kun kyang gsang ba'i mchod 'bul byed// nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang // gnyis su med
46a4: par 'khril nas su/ / 'khril nas 'ga' na'i mchod pa byed// stong khams nyungs 'brur gzhug tshul du// ga na'i mchod pa chen po yis// thams cad gnyis pa chen por gyur to// de nas ye shes rgyal po de
46a5: nyid gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang gnyis su med par 'khril nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / e ma'o bde gshegs sbyong ba'i mchog/ sna tshogs spyod la rang bzhin gsang // ma chags pa yi ngo bo las//
46a6: chags pa chen po'i spyod pa 'byung // spyod pa chen po rnam gnyis la// rtogs nas chags pas su spyod pa// yang dag chags pa chen po ste// 'di ni tshangs mchog rgyal po yin// sems kyi spyod pa rnam pa gnyis
46a7: bzhi bcu mnyes pa'i las bya'o/ / zhes ched du gsungaso// de lta bus phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing khams kyis bsdus pa thams cad mnyes pa chen pos thim par gyur to//
46a8: sgyu 'phrul dra ba tha ma chen po las thugs rje gdung ba'i le'u bdun pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po de mchod pa bla ma'i rgyan bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

46b1: zhugs nas 'di skad gsungaso/ / sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor bla ma dgongs pa'i mchog/ bro gar 'du 'phro'i phyag rgya yis// 'dzum la ma nam mkhar 'gro bar nges// gru tshig sgra
46b2: yi phyag rgya yis/ / chos kyi sems dpa'i dngos grub len// bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis// yid bzhin sems dpa'i dngos grub len// rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis// 'od 'bar tha ma'i dngos
46b3: grub le na/ / A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad grub cing rdo rje nges// rgyu 'bras dbyings su sbyor shes shing // bla ma'i dgongs pa gang sbyor ba// rigs 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du nges// skye ba rnam bzhi rgyud sbyangs
46b4: nas/ mtshan rdzogs la gdon mi za// zhes gsungs pas tshogs chen po rnam pa gnyis rdzogs par gyur to// de nas nyid kyi bla ma'i mdzod spyod la dgyes pa chen pos glu 'di blangs so// oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi
46b5: rdzogs pa yi/ / ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che// bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs// snang stong thig le kun tu rdzogs// ho ma rdo rje bsod nams thig la che// rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje sku
46b6: chen mtha' yas pa/ / rdo rje rgyal po thig le che/ ho/ oM mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings// mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs 'phro// mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim// sna tshogs sku gsung thugs tshon
46b7: go ho/ oM sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che// yon tan phrin las kun tu rdzogs// ye nas lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang // 'dus pa'i rdzogs chen thig le che/ ho// oM phyogs bcu 'jig rten rdul snyed du// rgyal ba'i don rnam
46b8: rdul phran snyed/ / sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyi// skad cig yud la lhun gyis grub// ho oM thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsung thugs kyi kun tu khyab// sku gsung

47a1: a/ thugs kyi theg la ne// ho oM thams cad thig le bla ma don// sgra 'phrul bla ma thig le'i dbyings// dbyings nyid byang chub sems chen po// snying po tha ma nges pa'i don// thig le nyid las g.yos pa med/ snu mA/
47a2: ba tham chen po la rdzogs chen po nas pa gnyis skyes pa'i ma brgyad pag/ denas de bzhin gshegs pa sa shes rgyal ba 'phrul tha chen por 'jigs pa rjen po'i tshul kyis ti nge 'dzin
47a3: bar 'du ma dang de ci'i phyir zhe na/ / bdag tu lta ba dang rmongs pa'i dbang gis gab pa'i gsang ba chen po des togs/ sdus pa'i gsang ba la mngon par zhen pas chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don ni rgyal bar por// bram ze'i den/
47a4: sngags mang po ni blo'i rdzing du blangs nas snying rje chen po'i las dang ni bral/ gnas su med btags nas zhe sdang sgrol ba'i las ni rgyan du byed/ thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med pa'i don ni ma rtogs/ 'dod chags snod
47a5: ba'i las dang skad cig tsam yang ma bral rang rig pa'i ye shes ni blo la nub/ / don dam pa la kun du gti mug pas ni rgyun du khebs/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan ni ma rtogs/ nga rgyal khengs pa'i dregs pa'i las ni/
47a6: rgyun du byed/ tshad med pa bzhi'i las dang ni bral drag dog gi chub mas ni rgyun du khrid de// bdag tu rmongs pa dang rtog pa la zhen te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang bral bas rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs te/ srid pa'i sa bon nub
47a7: mos 'bangs nas mdzums med pa'i sems thun dmyal ba dorjo dmyal ba chen por bags pa chen pa stong thug d+ha brgyar byes pa/ / de las byung nas nyin pa'i sems can dmyal pa chen por bskal pa chen po d+ha skyes so//
47a8: las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo de las thar te sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyang nas yi dgas srin po chen po lus gcig mgo bo brgya pa mgo bo sna tshogs pa/ lus brgya pa mgo bo gcig pa lus dang yan lag mang po 'dug pa

47b1: mtshon cha sna tshogs pa thogs shing gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul mang po ston pas klu'i ris nas 'bras bu che ba man chad dbang du bsdus nas sa bon rtsub mos mang po 'debs so/ / de nas sngon legs par spyad pa'i 'bras bus
47b2: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis sku'i dbyibs legs par brgyan pa ye shes phyin cim log pa'i spyan gyis gzigs te/ las ngan pa'i srin po de nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spyad pa dang / khams gsum gyi sems
47b3: can bdapal gzhag pa'i phyir thugs rje chen po'i ye shes skyes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po dgyes pa chen po ye shes kyi rgyal po de nyid 'jigs byed chen po rgyal ba'i
47b4: dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po sprin rnam par spro ba sgyu 'phrul bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin nyid kyi bla ma chen po'i dbyings nas nyid kyi gsang ba'i bdag mo khro mo'i rgyal mo chen mo mngon du phyung ste/
