47b5: hi ti zhes dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis pad ma rgyas par mdzad de// gnyis su med pa'i dgyes pa chen pos thim nas gsang ba bla ma'i sprin las// hU~M hU~M hU~M badz+ra dzA gi kro d+ha badz+ra dz+wa la man Da la phaT phaT ta la ta la hUM zhes brjod
47b6: bas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad dur khrod bdal ba chen po'i rang bzhin khrag gi rgya mtsho dpa' rlabs 'khrug pa'i dkyil na/ rkeng rus chen po rab kyi steng na rdo rje me dpung du 'khyil ba'i dbus na 'og rdo rje rtsa
47b7: gram mig mangs ris su bris pa/ phyogs bzhi ngos bzhi 'bar bar khyams gsum rdo rje rin po che'i glo 'bur du mdzes pa/ sgo bzhi rta babs mu khyud du bcas pa/ rdo rje rin po che rgya grum mthing ka 'bang ba'i rtseg pa
47b8: dra ba ris su brtsigs pa/ steng yid bzhin gyis rin po che bar ba/ rdo rje rgya gram 'bar ba'i bla re mig mangs su bres pa/ rtse mo dbyibs bla mas 'og min gyi gnas nas srid pa'i rtse mo man chad bum pa'i tshul

48a1: du dbyibs rdo rje rgya gram mig mangs gcig tu 'khyil ba/ / ye shes rdo rje rgya gram gyi cho 'phrul bla ma'i 'od 'bar bas phyogs bzhir 'phros shing 'khrugs pas khams gsum thams cad bdal ba//
48a2: rgyal mtshan tha ma chen po dang / ru mtshon bla ma chen pos phyogs bzhi grwa bzhi nas bsgreng ba/ gsang ba bla ma'i rtsig pas phyi rim bskor ba/ rdo rje rin po che'i phyi rol gyi shing ljon pa tha mas phyogs mtshams gtibs
48a3: pas phyi dang nad med pa kun du yang bla ma chen po'i nang du gyur pa/ khams gsum thams cad rdo rje ra ba'i rtsig pa 'tshor ba med pa'i gzhal yas khang na khro bo dang khro mo'i rol pa'i phyag rgya stong gi 'jig rten rdul
48a4: pra mo snyed 'thon par gyur to/ / de nas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'ur 'ur dang / che mche ma dang / shig shig dang / thor thor dang / gtogs shig dang / chom shig dang / sod cig dang / drol zhig dang /
48a5: sbyongs shig la sogs pas 'jig rten na dbang che zhing dpa' brtul che zhing brtul zhugs can rnams brgyal rab tu brgyal bar gyur to// de nas dgyes pa chen pos ye shes rgyal po de nyid dur khrod bla ma chen por dgyes
48a6: n as khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil keng rus chen po'i ri rab kyi steng na rdo rje me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na rdo rje ye shes kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa la nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang mchod pa bla ma chen po mdzad de gnyis
48a7: su med pa'i dbyings nas 'di phyung ngo / / hUM badz+ra du tri nan sUr+ya tsan dra pad ma maN Da la de ba tiSh+Tha naM zhes brjod pas ye shes rin po che'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa 'od 'bar ba'i steng du dur khrod gdug pa'i tshogs
48a8: seng ge la sogs pa tha ma chen po'i khri btsugs te/ / gdan tha ma nyi zla dang pad ma spel bar gting ba'o// de nas cho 'phrul bla ma chen pos btul ba/ bsam gtan bla ma chen po spags pa tshad med pa// dmigs pa thams

48b1: c ad dang bral ba'i ye shes bla ma chen pos dregs pa thams cad dus gcig tu btul ba'i snam rten bla ma chen po la mtshon pa dang dmigs pa'i yul las 'das pa'i phyag rgya bla ma 'od 'bar ba bzhugs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ye
48b2: shes rgyal po chen po sku mthing nag cir yang 'gyur ba/ / rdo rje ljags kyis gsung 'brug stong gi sgra sgrogs pas stong khams thams cad dus gcig tu 'jig pa/ ye shes me'i thugs kyis snang srid kyi bud shing dus
48b3: gcig tu bsregs pa/ / steng 'og med par kun du skyi bung zhes byed pa/ dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad pe/ zhabs rnam pa brgyad du gtams pa// phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa// dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan
48b4: pa/ / spyan 'bar ba nyi shu rtsa bdun mda' zhing rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje mthing ka khyung gi gshog pas 'jig rten gyi khams yog par bka' ba/ khros pa'i rgyal mo mthing nag 'bar ba dang gnyis su med
48b5: par bzhugs so/ / gnyis su med pa'i dbyings nas shar phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i steng du ma hA de ba dang // 'dod pa'i lha ga na rgyal du brtul ba'i steng du nyid kyi gzugs kyi phung po de
48b6: bcom ldan 'das bud d+ha he ru ka sku mdo ga ser nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyu rab dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ / phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa'o// bde gshegs khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'brel
48b7: ba chen po'i tshul du bzhugs so/ / lho phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i gdan stengs su gshin rje gan rgyal du bsgyel ba gdan la nyid kyi tshor ba'i phung po las bcom ldan 'das ra da na he ru ka sku
48b8: mdog sngonag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ dur khrod kyi rna rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen mo'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// nub phyogs kyi

49a1: 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i steng du/ chu bdag gi rgyal po dang 'khor lo nag po 'bring gi ri tig na rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi 'du shes kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das pad ma
49a2: te ru ka sku mdog dmar nag dbugasum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ dur khrod kyis brgyan pa'o// pad ma khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o// byang phyos
49a3: ' khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i gdan stengs su gnod sbyin stobs bzangs gan rgyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi 'du byed kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das karma he ru ka sku mdog ldang nag dbu
49a4: gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi grang hru sa/ / mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa te/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ las mchog khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis bzhug so// de nas dregs pa chen
49a5: po la sogs pas gdug pa'i sems kyis gtum pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan pas mgrin gcig tu gdug pa'i nga ros gtum pa'i brlang tshig tu smras pa/ / thod thod snying rje'i bdag po ci 'di ltar byed
49a6: dam zhes zer zhing shin du gtum pas rngam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos ye shes rgyal po de nyid sku gzi brjid chen po'i mdangs su gyur te/ thugs rje chen pos 'dul ba'i thabs
49a7: kyis sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i gsang sngags bla ma'i rngam pa'i gdangs skad chen po 'di dag phyung ngo / / hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i gdug pa'i tshogs de
49a8: ngadag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung nas nang rol kun drangs/ yan lag kun bcad gtubs te sha zos// khrag 'thungs rus pa kun 'chos so// de nas 'jigs byed chen po de nyid kyis hUM hUM hUM b+h+yo e ar

49b1: li dzA dzA zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' dang bcas pa yungs 'bru gcig tsam du chung bar bsdus so/ / de nas 'byung po ma rungs pa thams cad kyi rje bo'i ying rje'o// dregs
49b2: pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma 'byung mo thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo/ / srin mo chen mo mi srun mo dang / tshangs ma dang / khro mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / dmar mo dang / bdud rtsi
49b3: mo dang / zhib mo dang / be chen mo dang / srin mo dang / zab mo dang / dga' ba mo dang / ra ro khrag thung mo dang / gcig pu spyod ma dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / rlu mo dang / gsod byed mo dang / me mo dang / phag mo
49b4: dang / rgan byed mo dang / sna chen mo dang / chu lha mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang // bum sna sngo nag chen mo dang / gsus 'dzin sngo nag chen mo la sogs pa dang / yang bran dang / g.yog dang / yang
49b5: g.yog la sogs pa 'khor zhing gi rdul kyang bsdus so/ / de nas yang dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid dgyes pa bla ma'i gsang ba chen po sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mngon par 'du mdzad de sku
49b6: gsung thugs bla ma las 'di dag phyung ngo / / oM A hUM/ badz+ra pad ma pra be sha pad ma hU~M a la la ho zhes brjod pas 'byung po ma rungs pa thams cad shin du chags pa'i yid g.yos nas gsang ba rgyas par byas nas khob
49b7: len gyi rdo la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po'i ska la mi srin mo la sogs pa brgyad 'khril lo/ / bcom ldan 'das ser nag chen po'i sku la tshangs ma la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo// bcom
49b8: ldan 'das sngo nag chen po'i ska la bdud rtsi mo la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo/ / bcom ldan 'das dmar nag chen po'i skal khrag gis myos ma la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das ljang nag chen po'i skul me mo/

50a1: la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo// de nas dgyes pa chen po de dag gis hUM zhes brjod pas pad ma'i tshogs bsdus te shin du btsum par gyur to// de nas dgyes ta ha ha zhes brjod pas nyid kyi shes pa'i tshogs na mdza/
50a2: shes pa brgyad las dkar po la sogs pa brgyang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mchar du chas te 'thon par gyur to// 'thon nas kyang 'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyi rol shar phyogs nas 'khor bar khro bo'i gzugs kyis snying rje 'jigs
50a3: tshul gyis bstan la gnas so/ / de nas dgyes te he zhes brjod pas nyid kyi shes pa'i yul brgyad las seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa brgyad rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas te 'thod nas yang 'khor lo 'bar
50a4: ba'i bar khyams su snying rje 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis stan la shin du rngam pa'i stobs kyis gnas so/ / de nas dgyes te phaT ces phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus par bsgrags pas phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus pa na 'gro ba rnams kyi
50a5: don ma lus par mdzad pa thub pa chen po drug bcom ldan 'das drug 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad cing 'gro ba drug 'dul ba dang / yid chos dbyings nas rol te spong byed nyid zer zhags pa can la sogs pa brgyad du gyur te/ 'bar/
50a6: ba'i bar khyams gsum pa la zhing ska ma ga sher spel pa'i gdan stengs su rang gi lag cha dang shin du rngam pa'i stabs kyis shar phyogs nas 'khor bar gnas so// de nas dgyes te phaT ces brjod pas nyid kyi phyin ci log bzhi/
50a7: las rdo rje srings 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen po'i sgo bzhir snying rje 'jigs tshul gyi stan la shin du rngam pa'i gzugs kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi
50a8: tshul du gnas so/ / de nas dgyes pa chen po'i sprin las bud d+ha rol pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis dus gcig tu phaT ces brjod pas thams cad/ bros nas 'byung mo thams cad kyang rang gi gnas su yud tsam gyis

50b1: byi par bkye'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen pa de nyid thugs rje chen pos bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dgongs pab cig mar zhugs te// skragasung thugs do rda las 'di dag zung ngo // oM badz+ra ma mri ta mid kr-ir+t+ta
50b2: e aM zhes brjod pas dbang thug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen pa'i snam logs nas 'thon to/ / mangs pa thung dngan pa rnyed do// de nas khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun la bcan chen po
50b3: gyur te tshe 'phrul chen po mdzad pa mdzad do/ / de dag gi dus su 'jig rten drug na gnas pa'i dregs pa chen po rnams dus gcig tu brtul bar mthong ste// shin du zhum zhing bred nas mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ 'bangs su mchi
50b4: 'bangs su mchi/ / 'bangs su nan tanam bgyis na// mgo dang lus kyang brgyar 'gas shing // snying yadags shing garlabs myur cig/ rdul rgyags ci gnas chag pa dang // dmyal bar srung bas 'thod par shog/ bas sa
50b5: su mchi ba rangang rang gis sdod btsugs so/ / de nas de dag kun dkyil 'khor gyi gdan du bzhag go// de nas yang de thams cad kyis mgri na gcig tu smras pa// rang rang gi chung ma dang / bu mo dang / ra dang gi ma dang / srid
50b6: mo rnams dkyil 'khor du bral te/ / bdag cag rnams kyi mchis zang dang // ma dang sring ma bu mo rnams/ dkyil 'khor chen po bzhes su gsol// dpa' bo l+la rjes bzhes su gsol// bdag cag 'khor tshogs
50b7: tham ba cad kyis/ / 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di// ming tsam 'dzin par sub kyi dag/ nor bu rin chen 'bar bskur// de yi dgos pa rdzogs par bgyid ces slong gtsug go// de nas de'i sa dang sa yod chung bdas
50b8: bra mo rnams yud tsam gyis byin par 'ongs nas las kyi dngos grub grol ba las/ de nas khrag 'brang ye shes chen pos ming brtags// lag tu rdo rje byin nas rdo rje tha na dang po nya dbang bskur ngo ro// de nas dkyil 'khor

51a1: ' bar ba chen po'i doni phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gsal zhing 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang gnyis su med par gyur nas sku gsung thugs
51a2: rdo rje bla ma las 'di dag byung ngo / / e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos// mkha' dbyings gnyis su med pa las// mkha' la bla ma'i dkyil 'khor shar// khri btsugs nyid dkyil gdan stengs su// de la lha tshogs gdan du
51a3: bting / hUM 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte dbus su// khri bshams nyi dkyil ya bdud gdon// de yi steng du bsam bya ba// byang chub sems las sku bskyed pa// dpal chen bla med he ru ka/ dbu dgu phyag kyad po brgyad de// spyan yang /
51a4: 'bar ba nyi shu bdun// dbu la rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gsol// zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad tu gtams// rdo rje mthing ka khyung gi gshogs// 'jig rten khams kyang yog par dka'// sbrul nag 'jigs su rung ba dang //
51a5: dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// dbu gsum dang la byung ba ni// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// rnam par thar pa'i dbu gsum gyis khams gsum mya ngan zlo ba'i zhal// dbu gsum bar nas rnam pa
51a6: ni/ g.yas sngo g.yon ljang dbus mthing zhal// thabs dang shes rab sems kyi dbu// srid gsum dbyings su rdzogs pa'i zhal// dbu gsum mtha' nas rngam pa ni// g.yas mthing g.yon mthing dbus mthing zhal/
51a7: khams gsum re bskor ba yi// lung dang man ngag sems kyi dbu// 'gyur ba med pa'i mthing nag zhal// skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshems// dbu dgu rol pa'i byin rlabs las// g.yas gsum glog stong lce 'byin
51a8: cing / g.yon gsum 'brug stong sgra sgrogs pa// dbu gsum rdo rje ser chen 'bebs// spyan dgu dang la gzigs pa ni// chos dbyings kun du bzang po dang // kun du bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings la// 'gyur ba med pa'i

51b1: tshul gyis gzigs/ spyan dgu par nas gzigs pa ni// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyis// srid pa'i sems can thams cad la// byams mgon snyoms pa'i spyan gyis gzigs// spyan dgu mtha' nas gzigs pa ni//
51b2: g.yas gsum zhe sdang khros pa'i spyan// gzigs pas bdud dang mu stegs sgrol// g.yon gsum byams mgon snyoms pa'i spyan// gzigs pas mtha' yas bde la 'jog/ dbu gsum ye shes rol pa'i spyan//
51b3: gzigs pas skye 'gro gnas su stob// dbu dgu rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dgu// lnga dgu bzhi bcu rtsa lnga yang // bud d+ha bzhi bcu rtsa lngas brgyan// stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyis// khyab brdal chen po'i rtogs su bsnams/
51b4: bcwa brgyad phyag na rol pa yis// stong pa bcwa brgyad dbyings su sbyor// zhabs brgyad nga rgyal dregs pa 'joms// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// rdo rje mthing ka gshog pa brkyang // bcwa brgyad phyag na bsnams pa yis/
51b5: rdo rje glo snying zhing chung g.yas// band zhing chen stir chan g.yon// nang zhags nyi ma khyud chen g.yas// zhing chen zla ba 'ug pa g.yon// me dang rgya mtsho ga'u g.yas// rlung dang rin chen ri rab g.yon// yon tan
51b6: brgyad dbyings su rdzogs/ / dang po rdo rje dung chen ni// khams gsum dbang du bsdus nas kyang // bdud dang mu stegs kun 'joms pa'o// gnyis pa stir chen glo snying ni// srid pa'i sems can thams cad kun//
51b7: dam tshig stan dbyings su sgrol// gsum pa stir chung ril ming ni// dug gsum rnam par sgrol ba'i rtags// bzhi pa stir chen nad zhags ni// rgyud lnga'i sems can dbyings su 'dren// lnga pa nyi zla zung tu 'dzin//
51b8: byang chub sems las g.yos pa med// drug pa khyud dang 'ug pa ni// mkha' 'gro thams cad 'khol ba'i rtags// bdun pa me dpung rlung gis 'thor// srid pa'i bag chags thal bar glog brgyad pi ra rab rgya mtsho

52a1: rnams/ / thams cad ma lus g.yeng gnas shing // 'byung ba lnga la mnga' brnyes pa'o// dgu pa rin chen ga'u ni// dngos grub sprul pa 'byung ba'i rtags// dgu gnyis zung du ldan pa las// stong pa bcwa brgyad dbyings
52a2: su rdzogs/ / dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni// thod skam 'bar ba phreng ba yis// zhib phyogs gcig mya ngan zlo// mngon par rdzogs pa'i sku brnyes pa'o// thod rnon 'bar ba'i phreng ba ni// khams gsum dbang du bsdus nas
52a3: su/ / sprul pa'i sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o// thod pa phyed tshal phreng bas ni// dug lnga bdud rtsir spyod pa ste// longs spyod sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o// zhing chen rlon pa'i na bza' ni// chos dbyings mnyam pa chen po ste//
52a4: chos kyi sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o// stag lpags g.yang gzhi'i sham thabs ni// phrin las rnam bzhi'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje'i sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o// sbrul nag chun 'phyang mang po ni// ye shes thams cad 'byung ba'i
52a5: rtags/ / rtag chen sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o// zhabs brgyad lha brgyad brdzis pa ni// nga rgyal can rnams tshar gcod pa'o// sangs rgyas khros pa'i rgyal mo ni// kro d+hi shwa ri yum gyi gtso// mthing nag 'bar ba'i ral
52a6: pa can/ / rgyan dang cha lugs gtso dang 'thun// 'khril pa chen po'i tshul gyis su// ban da rak+ta gtso la stob// 'khril pa chen po'i tshul du bsam// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs nas// khri dang
52a7: nyi dkyil nyi zla'i gdan/ / de yi steng du bsam bya ba// gzugs kyi phung po gnas gyur pa// khrag 'thung bud d+ha he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas ljang g.yon sngo dbus ser zhal/
52a8: phyag drug mngon par rol pa las// 'khor lo dgra sta zhags pa g.yas/ band rde'u chung kha T+wAM g.yon// ser nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// bde gshegs khros pa'i rgyal mo dang / 'khril pa chen po'i

52b1: tshul du bas ma/ lce phyogs 'khor la'i rtsibs stengs na// khri dang nyid dkyil gshin rje'i gdan// de yi steng du bsam bya ba// tshor ba'i phung po gnas gyur pa// khrag 'thung dad nate ruka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir
52b2: bgrang / g.yas ser g.yon dmar dbus sngo zhal// phyag drug mngon par rol pa las// rin chen gshol dang gtun shing g.yas// band dgra sta rje'u chung g.yon// sngon ga dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// rin chen khros pa'i
52b3: rgyal mo dang / 'khril pa chen po'i tshul du bsam// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// khri dang nyi dkyil klu yi gdan// de yi steng du bsam bya ba// 'du shes phung po gnas gyur pa// khrag 'thung pad ma he ru ka/ dbu
52b4: gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang / / g.yas sngo g.yon dmar dbus ljang zhal// phyag drug mngon par rol pa las// pad ma rde'u chung spu gri g.yas// ban da kha T+wAM se phreng g.yon// dmar nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan
52b5: pad ma khros pa'i rgyal mo dang / / 'khril pa chen po'i tshul du bsam// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stangs na// khri dang nyi dkyil gnod sbyin gdan// de yi steng du bas me bya ba// 'du byed phung po gnas gyur pa/ khrag 'thung
52b6: kar ma he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dmar g.yon ser dbus ldang zhal// phyag drug mngon par rol pa las// ral gri zhags pa rde'u chung g.yas// band thod dbyug kha T+wAM g.yon/ ljang
52b7: nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan/ / las mchog khros pa'i rgyal mo dang // 'khril pa chen po'i tshul du bzhugs// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyi rim na// me dpung 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na// mkha' dbyings gnyis su med pa
52b8: las/ mkha' las skyes pa'i 'phra men ma// shar phyogs su ni bsam bya ba// sa bdag bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// kun zhi gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor sngo nag ke'u rim// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil/ mtsha

53a1: gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang bzhi gsol/ / dbyugs par glu blangs ha ha sa gzhad// stir dbyug pa g.yas pa na// ban da rag ta g.yon pa na// kyi shi ma la brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho phyogs ngos su bsam
53a2: bya ba/ / gsod sbyin bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// rnam shes gnas gyur phra man ma// rnal 'byor ser na gtse'u rem// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol// dbyugs pa
53a3: glu blangs ha ha sa bzhad/ / thabs kyis mda' drangs g.yas pa na// shes rab bzhu brdungs g.yon pa na// ya ma ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub kyi phyogs su bsam bya ba// nyi ma bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// nyon mongs
53a4: gnas gyur pra men pa/ / rnal 'byor dmar nag pra mo ha// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// dbyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad/ chu srin rgyal mtshan g.yas pa
53a5: na/ ban da ra ga ta g.yon pa na// sUr+ya ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang gi phyogs su bsam bya ba// zla ba ba skyel ba'i gdan stengs su// reg bya gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor mthing nag be ta le//
53a6: ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// mche gtsigs rkan brda bas g.yang gzhi gyon// dbyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad// rdo rje rtse lnga g.yas pa na// stir chung mgo gcod g.yon pa na// tsan tra ye la
53a7: brkyang bskum bzhugs/ / shar lho mtshams su bsam bya ba// me lha bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// lta byed phra men gnas gyur pa// rnal 'byor dmar nag pu ka si// skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing //
53a8: dur khrod g.yang gzhi sgeg pa gyon// dbyugs pa glu blangs ha ha sa bzhad// ster chen po g.yas pa na// tshems par rgyu 'dren g.yon pa na// a ga ne ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho nub mtshams su bsam byas/

53b1: bden bral bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// nyan byed gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor mthing nag sma sha ni// skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing // srog chags chen po g.yang gzhi gyon// dbyugs pas glu
53b2: blangs ha ha sa bzhad/ / stir chung ngu g.yon pa na Ni ta ta phyung ba g.yas pa na// ni ri ti la brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub byang 'tshams su bsam bya ba// rlung lha bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// snom byed gnas gyur phra men
53b3: ma/ rnal 'byor ser nag tsaN Da li// skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing // 'jigs su rung ba'i klog pa gsol// dbyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad// stir chung ngu g.yas pa na// ban da bcad pa g.yon
53b4: pa na/ / ba ya ba la brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang shar 'tshams su bsam bya ba// dbang ldan pa sgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// myong byed gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor ljang nag g+ha sa ma ri// skra 'bar mche gtsigs
53b5: rkan brdabs shing / / sti ra chen po'i shun pa gsol// dbyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad// ban da ra ga ta g.yas pa na// rtse gsum 'khrug pa g.yon pa na// i shwa ra la brkyang bskum bzhugs// dkyil 'khor de
53b6: yi phyi rim du/ / smag nag 'bar ba'i bar khyams na// gsang ba'i mkha' las skur bskyed pa// shar gyi phyogs su bsam bya ba// dri za bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// kun gzhi yul las gnas gyur pa// phra men thogs
53b7: med seng ge'i gdong / / rnal 'byor ser nag seng ge ma// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// phyag gnyis bsnol nas shin du 'gying // stir chen po spug cing gsol// in dra ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs
53b8: lho yi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ / grul bum bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// rnam shes yul la gnas gyur pa// 'phra men dpa' bo stag gi gdong // rnal 'byor dmar nag bya gri ma// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang

54a1: gzhi gyon/ / phyag gnyis kyad kyi 'dor tshul gyis// ster chung bstar nas 'bru tshugs la// ra tre'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub kyi phyogs su bas pa b+hA ba// yi dgas bsgral ba'i gad snang
54a2: su nyon mongs yul la gnas gyur pa/ / 'phra men rtog 'dul wa yi gdong // rnal 'byor dmar nag srika ma// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gni gyen// phyag gnyis stir chen nang grol 'dra// hriM 'di gdan la brkyang
54a3: bskum bzhugs/ / byang gi phyogs su bsam bya ba// gnod sbyin bsgyel ba'i gdan stangs su// reg bya yul la gnas gyur pa// 'phra men btang snyoms spyang mo'i gdong // rnal 'byor mthing nag sho na ma// mchi gtsigs
54a4: rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/ / phyag gnyis rol pa chen po yis// stir phyed mar gtsal nas gsol// yak+Sha'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// shar lho mtshams su bsam bya ba// srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs
54a5: su/ / lta byed yul las gnas gyur pa// 'phra men gzi brjid bya rgod gdong // rnal 'byor dmar nag kri ta ma// mchu bdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// zangs gri rnon po g.yas pan// rgyu zhags drang ba g.yon pa na//
54a6: rA kA sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho nub mtshams su bsam bya ba// srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// nyan byed yul la gnas gyur pa// 'phra man gsal byed dur bya'i gdong // rnal 'byor rnal ma kang ka ma//
54a7: mchu bdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol// stir chung stod smad g.yas g.yon na// rngam pa'i tshul gyis phrag la bkal// rAk+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub byang mtshams su bsam bya ba// srin po bsgyel bI/
54a8: gdan stengs du// snom byed yul la gnas gyur pa// 'phra men sa le bya rog gdong // rnal 'byor dmar nag kha kham// mchu bdang rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// zangs gri dmar po g.yas pa na// ban da rag ta g.yon

54b1: pan rA k+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs/ / byang shar mtshams su bsam bya ba// srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// myong byed yul la gnas gyur pa// 'phra men rdzogs byed 'ug pa'i gdong // rnal 'byor ljang nag hu lu ma/
54b2: mchu gdang rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol// rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas pa na// stir chung spyi 'joms g.yon pa na// rAk+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs// 'bar ba'i bar khyams tha ma la// thod skam 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na//
54b3: zhing chen bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// shar gyi phyogs su bsam bya ba// nyul byed yul las gnas gyur pa// spor byed chen mo mi bzad ma// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog ma// zhing chen rol ba'i skrag pa gsol// ral ba
54b4: kham nag gye na du 'bar/ / dbyugs pas glu blangs srid gsum 'bar// ha ta gad mos ye shes rol// nyi zer zhags pa g.yas pa na// ban da ra ga ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho yi phyogs su bsam
54b5: bya ba/ / mi mgon thub pa gnas gyur pa// sbyor byed chen mo mdung thung 'phen// rnal 'byor ser nag nyul chen ma// ral ba kham nag gyen du 'khyil// mi yi ga yang gzhi gos su gyon// dbyugs pas glu thangs srid gsum sbyangs//
54b6: ha ha gad mos mi rnams spor// rdo rje mdung thung g.yas pa na// ban da rag ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub kyi phyogs su bsam bya ba// chos kyi dbyings las gnas gyur pa// spror byed rdo rje dril
54b7: 'khrol ma/ / rnal 'byor mtshon du med pa'i sku// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// chos nyid dbyings kyi na bza' gsol// dbyugs pas glu blangs stong khams spong // ha ha'i gad mos dbyings su sbyor// gsung bsgrags/
54b8: dril bu g.yas pa na// ban da ra ga ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang gi phyogs su bsam bya ba// lha min thub pa gnas gyur pa// spong byed thod phreng skar mda'i gdong // rnal 'byor sngon ga nyul chen ma/

55a1: srog chags chen po'i g.yang gzhi gyon// ral pa lam nag gyen du 'bar// dbugs pas klu blangs 'ams gsum srung sa// ha ta gdams la min sngar tordo rjes mda' g.yas pa na// band rag ta g.yan pa na/
55a2: rnon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// shar lho mtshams su bsam bya ba// lha 'dul thub pa gnas gyur pa// sgor byed ljang thogs gnod spyan marnal 'byor mthing nag zhal chen ma// 'jigs byed g.yang gzhi gos su rtse/
55a3: ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// dkrugs pas klu blangs stong khams grags// ha ha gdams lnga rnams sngar// rdo rje khyung chen g.yas pan nang rag ta g.yon pa na// ro rnon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho nub mtshas
55a4: su bsam bya ba/ / yi dgas thub pa gnas gyur pa// spor byed ma khyer glog phreng 'dzin// rnal 'byor dmar nag nyul chen ma// yi dgas 'grin rings g.yang bzhi gyen// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// dbugs
55a5: pas glu blangs snang srid sbyangs/ / ha ha'i gad mo yi dgas sbar// rdo rje glog phreng g.yas pa na// ban da rag ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub byang mtshams su bsam bya ba// byol song thub pa gnas gyur pa/
55a6: spo byed 'jigs chen slag sha rdebs// rnal 'byor spug nag nyul chen ma// ral ba kha ma nag gyen du 'bar// slag chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gyon// dbyugs pas glu blangs stong khams grags// ha ha'i gad mos byol song
55a7: spo/ rdo rje skrag sha g.yas pa na// ban da rag ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang shar mtshams su bsam bya ba// dmyal mgon thub pa gnas gyur pa// sngor byed gshin rje ral gri sgra// rnal 'byor sngo
55a8: nag nyul chen ma/ / ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// gshin rje g.yang gzhi gos su gyon// dbyugs pas glu blangs srid gsum sbyangs// ha ta'i gad mo dmyal ba spor// rdo rje ral gri g.yas pa na// ban da rag ta g.yon pa na//

55b1: ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi la// phyin ci log bzhi gnas gyur pa// shar gyi sgor ni bsam bya ba// phag chen po yi gdan stengs su// rta gdong srin mo'i g.yang gzhi gsol// rdo rje lcag
55b2: kyu g.yas pa na/ / ban da rag ta g.yon pa na// phag chen po yi gdan stengs su// stobs chen khro bo chen po dang // 'khril pa chen po'i tshul du bzhugs// rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir bltas pa'o// lho yi sgor ni bsam bya ba// ra gdong chen
55b3: mo'i gdan stengs su/ / phag gdong chen mo'i g.yang gzhi gyon// lcags kyi dril zhags g.yas pa na// ban da rlon pa g.yon pa na// ra gdong chen mo'i gdan stengs su// khro tshon gshin rje gshed po dang // 'khril pa chen po'i tshul gyis
55b4: su/ rngam pa'i tshul gyis bltas pa'o// nub kyi sgor ni bsam bya ba// bum rna chen mo'i gdan stengs su// dred gdong chen mo g.yang gzhi gyon// lcags sgrog me 'bar g.yas pa na// ban da rlon pa g.yon pa na// srin po bum rna'i gdan stengs
55b5: su/ khro tshon rta mgrin chen po dang // 'khril pa chen po'i tshul gyis su// rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir bltas pa'o// byang gi sgor ni bsam bya ba// gsus po che yi gdan stengs su// spyang gdong chen mo g.yang gzhi gyon// dril bu thal byed ga
55b6: ban/ ban da rlon pa g.yon pa na// gsus po che yi gdan stengs su// khre chen bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang // 'khril pa chen po'i tshul gyis su// rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir bltas pa'o// ho badz+ra gu h+ya tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po 'di kho na
55b7: nyid nges pa sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po las bdud btul ba dang / nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi che ba'i yon tan phyogs bcur gsal ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor chen po
55b8: 'di yang dag par grags shing dam tshig rjes su 'dzin pa'i dgongs pa rtser chib nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'di dag byung ngo / / bri bi shwa kro d+ha badz+ra dz+wa la maN DA la tsakra hUM phaT phaT phaT/ ha la ha la du tri tsakra nAn/ sUr+ya tsan dra pad ma

56a1: de ba tiSh+Tha nAn+da/ / hUM hUM ha ha hUM hUM badz+ra ma hA shrI te ru ka ma hA tsaN Da sarba duSh+TAn da ka han da ha btsa d+hu phaT/ hUM badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha shwa ri drA la ni hU~M phaT/ oM sarba ta thA gA ma hA shrI he ru ka ma dA ts+ya Na Da sarba duSh+TAn da ka ta na da
56a2: ta ba tsa tru phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bud d+ha ma hAkra d+haM shwa re dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ oM tra rad ni ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha na daha ba tsa hUM phaT/ twaM sUr+ya rad na ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ oM hrI pa di ma ma hA shwi
56a3: ru ka ma hA tsaN Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ta na da ha pa tsany+tsA phaT/ trI shra pad ma ba mu ka ma hA kro d+hi shwa ra~M dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ ta karma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da Da sarba duSh+TA na da ka ha na ba tsa hUM phaT/ karma ma hA kr-i d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ badz+ra
56a4: ke 'u ri ha/ badz+ra tse'u ri ta/ badz+ra pra mo hA ta/ badz+ra be ta li ha/ badz+ra pu ka si ta/ badz+ra ka sa ma ra hi/ badz+ra sma sha ni ta/ badz+ra tsaN Da li ha/ badz+ra sid ha mu ka he/ badz+ra bya gr-i mu ka he/ badz+ra sri la mu ka taM/ badz+ra shro na mu ka he/ badz+ra kri ta mu ka te/ badz+ra
56a5: kar ka mu ka he/ badz+ra kha kha mu kha te/ badz+ra hu lu ka mu ka he/ badz+ra A r+ya te tsa te da tsa/ badz+ra a mo g+ha hU~M/ badz+ra a lo ka baM/ badz+ra ba smi bA la ya ba to ho// e h+ye hi pri ta Ar+ya ni tsa tu ra ba ya phaT/ badz+ra be yo gi pra ti Ar+ya ni tsa trar tha ya hUM phaT/
56a6: badz+ra mu a ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni ba shi ka ra phaT/ badz+ra mu ni a pra ti Ar+ya ba ni shi ka ra phaT/ badz+ra mu ni a sum ba a ni ba shi ka ra phaT/ badz+ra mu ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni traM su pa shi ka ra phaT/ badz+ra mu tri ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni ba shi ka ra phaT/
56a7: badz+ra mu ni a du bri ti a ni ba shi ka ra phaT/ e h+ye ti a na ya ho/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hU~M/ dza hUM baM ho/ badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya hUM phaT/ ces gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyis stong gsum gyi dkyil 'khor khyab par dus gcig khyab par grags
56a8: pa dang / dam nod pa bka' nyan gyi tshogs mi'i srin mo la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang so so'i srog gi snying po phul lo// badz+ra ma nu rAk+Sha si/ badz+ra pra ma ni badz+ra r-I tri/ badz+ra be sna be/ badz+ra bing ga lam/ badz+ra ke ma ri/ badz+ra in dran/ badz+ra su

56b1: ra ya tra/ badz+ra so du mya/ badz+ra a mri ta/ badz+ra dan ta/ badz+ra rak+Sha si/ badz+ra bak+Sha si/ badz+ra ra ti haM/ badz+ra ru ti haM/ badz+ra e ka tsa raM/ badz+ra ma no ha raM Sha dz+ra san ti ti/ badz+ra ba ya bya/ badz+ra ma hA ma ra ma na/ badz+ra ag ne ye/ badz+ra tsa mun tri/ badz+ra pu tra na/ badz+ra pa ru
56b2: Ni/ badz+ra ma hA ka la/ badz+ra tik+Sh+Na baM// badz+ra lam po d+ha ra/ ye shes rgyal po dgongs su gsol// kho la khros pas zhi mdzad pa// thugs rje khro dpal rngam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin rlabs rmad po che// de nyid du ni bdag la stsol// oM badz+ra
56b3: sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya to/ badz+ra sa ma ya phaT/ a li u li ta li ta ba li da sta ma kho na ro tri kha raM yo ga ni kha ra hUM ha he phaT ces brjod pas// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu kun// tshig cing 'bar bas thams cad khyab// gsung
56b4: gi khre tshogs chen po yis/ kun du khyab cing gang gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi de dag gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir nges par brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs
56b5: bzhi pa/ gru tshad zhis brgyan par khyams dang // gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gsum gyis mdzes// thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid// 'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po 'khrug/ khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag
56b6: gtum pa dom gyi spar bas ni/ dbang phyug lha chen la sogs pa// dregs pa chen po gtum tshogs mnan// gdan du byas te sku bzhugs pa// smug nag sngo nag ser nag dang // dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ dbu dgu
56b7: phyag ni bcwa brgyad dang / dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir dgrad// rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs// stag lug sprul dang nyi mar chas// stir che chung nang zhags dang // khyud dang yid bzhin nor bu dang // stong gis 'jig rten/
56b8: khor yug bcas// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang // ral gri dgra sta bshol las sogs// rang gi lag cha sna tshogs dang // btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang bcas// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang // spor byed chen mo brgyad

57a1: bab/ / rnams dang / dbyug pa mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin// sgo bzhi'i phyag rgyar mdzes pa dang // lcags kyu la sogs thod pas mdzes// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes// ra
57a2: gi stan dang lag char chas/ / ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas// zhes gsungs pa dang / 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du/ sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis gang zhing khyab par gyur
57a3: to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po de nyid don yod pa'i 'bras bu chen po dam tshig chen pos gzung ba'i phyir 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig rdo rje 'di gsungs so// bla med mi spang bla med bkur// sngags dang phyag rgya
57a4: rgyun mig cad/ / yang dag lam du zhugs la byams// gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya// rtsa ba'i dam tshig chen po ni// rdeng chen bcu yi don rtogs kyang // rtsa ba gsum po mi 'da'o// yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis ni/ gti
57a5: phug 'dod chags zhe sdang dang / / nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo // dkar rtsi dmar tsi dri sha chu// dag pa'i snod bcud mi dor ro// spyi dpal bcu yi mnga' brnyes kyang / yan lag bcu po sa dor ro// gzhan yang yan lag dam
57a6: tshig rnams/ / 'da' bar mi mdzad rdo rje dam// sa ma ya ni rdo rje che// mi 'dara' rgyal ba nyid kyi ma// pas ma rdzogs lhun grub tshe mthar phyin// srid gsum dag pa dbang chen smrar// mi 'jigs kun tu bzang por spyod// theg pa
57a7: mtha' yas 'dul ba'i thabs/ / ji snyed sdom pa mtha' las pa// ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis rdzogs// nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang // tshe thung bsam pa log pa dang // mya ngan sdug bsngal chen po dang // dmyal ba nyid
57a8: ni rdo rje byed/ / dgu rdzogs bcur ldan gsum gyis sbyangs// skad pa las sogs mtha' yas mchog ces gsungs pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis 'dul bar 'gyur to// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma

57b1: chen po las 'jigs byed chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig rdo rje'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid chos thams cad man ngag bla ma chen po'i snying
57b2: po byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i dang du snyigs ma med par byungs btab pa'i phyir sku gsung thugs bla ma chen po'i thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas man ngag bla mtshan po'i snying po 'di byung ngo / / byang chub sems
57b3: kyi bde chen la/ / rgyu rkyen rten dang len bcas pa'i// skyon med thig le chen po las// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang // rang bzhin gas
57b4: ba'i don rnams ni/ / yi ge tshig la rab brten te// khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil
57b5: 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ / thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i thig le dbyings// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// byed pa rigs kyi gtso bo ste// byang chub sems kyi rdo rje'i tshogs/
57b6: dbang po yul dus rig pa'i rnams// bdag nyid chen po lhag par rdzogs// thugs kyi ye shes lngas blta zhing // snying po thig le mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba'i ye shes chen por rol// ye shes dgyes pa mchog tu
57b7: 'dul/ / zad med zag pa med pa yi// bsod nams ye shes sgyu mar rol// rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa'i dbyings// sku gsung
57b8: yon tan bring las thugs/ / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// ma lus bdag gis dbang bsgyur ro// dbang sgyur ye shes rol pa yis// dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor rdzogs// rdzogs the

58a1: dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub/ / rdzogs chen rtogs pa chen po yis// rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus 'byung //
58a2: phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon// snga ma'i dkyil 'khor ma lus sgrol// bya ba med pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bas ma bsgom pa'i mnyam sbyor bas/ rang
58a3: 'byung kun nas lhun gyis grub/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// rgyu rkyeni rten dang ldan pa yi// thams cad byang chub sems kyi dbyings// byang chub sems kyi bde chen rmi
58a4: dkyil 'khor thams cad dbyings su thim/ / thig le chen po bla ma las// sgyu ma byang chub lam du bstan// skyon dang yon tan thams cad kyang // byang chub thig la nyid kyi dang // spyod pa rnam pa gnyis kyi yang // thig
58a5: le chen po'i lam du nges/ / sgyu ma rol pa'i dkyil 'khor yang // thig le chen po'i dbyings su sbyor// sdom pa rnam pa bcu gsum dang // spyi yi dam tshig mtha' yas pa// thig le chen po'i ngang du gsal// snod bcud
58a6: 'jig rten ma lus pa/ / thig le nyid kyi rol pa'i dbyings// tshogs chen rnam pa gnyis po yang // byang chub sems kyi dbyings su des// gzhal yas khang dang rgyan rnams dang // tshe 'phrul byang chub sems su tham
58a7: khro tshogs bdud 'dul rol pa yang / / byang chub sems su nges pa yin// 'gro drug sems can gsum po yang // ye shes drug dang sku gsum du// nges pa'i thig le chen po yin// lnga yi rten dang rkyen bzhi yang / dbying/
58a8: kyi ma dang dus kyi srid// thig le chen po'i deng du 'dus// snga phyi gsum dang yod med khams// sku gsung thugs su des bstan pa'i// thig le byang chub sems su des// phung po khams dang skye mched kyang // phyag rgya

58b1: bzhi du gnyis po yang / thig pa nyid las gzhazhanan med/ ban lalas dang gcag pa yang // thig les mas kyang nga drugs la// 'gru ba 'don du 'byung ba la// dgu dang stong phrag brgya bcub te/ byang chubs pas las gzhan
58b2: med/ khang skyed sdug bsngal mang po yang // rtogs pa bde chen dbyings kyi na// ye shes ye shes rol pa yang // rdo rje snying po'i dbyings sungs// kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' dang // dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams ny+tsag
58b3: gcig yab tu nges par rdzogs/ / thar pa'i lam mchog dbyings kyi yum// kun du bzang mo las sogs kyang // thig le ma yid dadugs la// gzhal yas khang dang dkyil 'khor dang // bzhugs gnas khyad par mang po ya/
58b4: ye shes chen po'i gnas su bsdu// mchod pa'i rgyan dang longs spyod kun// rigs pa'i byang chub sems chen po// cho 'phrul chen po'i dang du 'dus// rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi ngo bo dang // chos so cog gi rang bzhin rnams// byang chub sem/
58b5: su nges pas na// dkar nag las kyis ma gsungs so// byang chub sems kyi bde chen ni// ci yang med las cir yang snang// cis kyang ma bcos g.yung drung sku// cir mi mdzad la thams cad sgrol// dmigs pa med par kun la
58b6: khyag pa bskos rgyal po yang dag pa/ / ma sbyangs ye shes snying po che// ma bsgoms gcig car don nyid rdzogs// ma bskabs rgyal ba kun gyi gtso// ma sbyangs skyon dang yon tan med// tshig dang yi ges mi mtshon te// sangs rgyas
58b7: nyid kyis rnyed par dka'/ / kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' yis// rnyed nas rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod// spyod pas 'gro bsgrol ba ste// de la nyes pa'i skyon mi mnga'// zhes gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs
58b8: pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas stug pos brgyan pa'i rgyan nyid tu bzhugs so/ / sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las man ngag snying po byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang ye shes

59a1: r gyal bar nyid de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dgongs pa yang dag pa'i phrin las chen po 'dam byon pa'ang bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ched du sgra gsung thugs yon tan zin las rdo rje las byung ma
59a2: yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la// khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig/ bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya//
59a3: bkug nas rdo rje'i phur pas gdab// rdul du byas nas tshogs la 'bul// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// bcings gyur pa skyod nas phyogs bcur g.yos// myos 'gyur gas
59a4: techog par 'gyur/ / ba gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba'i gzi brjid lhun chen la// chags pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// rdo rje gsum yang dbang du 'gyur// dud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// mtshan mchid/
59a5: dubacas par bya// rdo rje chags pa'i phur bas gang ba// chags pa'i tshogs la thim par dbul// baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du spel bsdams nas// ci 'dod de bzhin byed par 'gyur// ma yi tshogs
59a6: kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba'i 'du 'gro'i gzi chen la// dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtag/ nga rgyal
59a7: dga' 'phro'i phreng bas gang ba/ / rdo rje gzi brjid 'phel bar brtag/ ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen spro// yid bzhin nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/
59a8: ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la// dang pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// gtum chen rngam po'ang lhananar 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// gtum chen 'jug pa'i dbor brtag

59b1: lhan ner gsal ba'i phur pas gdab/ / 'bar ba lha ne'i tshogs la dbul// ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud tu sbrel bsdams nas// 'barab lha ne'i byin gyis khyab// thams cad g.yo ba med par 'gyur/ a
59b2: thams cad rdzogs pa chen po ste/ / las su ma gyur gcig kyang med// las kyi khyad par rdzogs pa yi// srid pa gsum du bsdus pa rnams// byin gyis ma brlabs gcig kyang med// rdzogs pa chen po'i phrin las kyis// sbyangs pas
59b3: bsam rdzogs lhun gyis grub/ / ho slas dang bye mo bran mo'i tshogs// lhag ma kha chu 'dod pa sbyin// rang gi dam tshig rab bsgrubs te// gang 'dod las de byed par bsgo// khrag 'thung chen po las sogs te// bro gar glu tshig chen
59b4: mos ni/ ji ltar 'dod pa thams cad kun// thams cad ma lus byed pa yin// mdzod ldan chen mo las sogs te// bro gar glu chog chen mos ni// 'du bar 'dod na 'dra bar byed// 'phel bar 'dod na 'phel bar byed// spos mo chen
59b5: mo la sogs te/ / bro gar gru tshig chen mos ni// rmongs par 'dod na mongs par byed// myos par 'dod na myos par byed// sod gdong chen mo las sogs te// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la za bar byed// rdul
59b6: tsam yang med par byed/ / gzhang gdong chen mo las sogs te// thogar gru cheg chen mos ni// thams cad kun la 'byin par byed// kun la rab tu nyams par byed// mi spyod byed chen mo las sogs te// nyul byed chen mo brgyad
59b7: rnams la/ tho gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la nyul bar byed// ma lus gnas nas spong bar byed// spus dang byi mo bran ma'i tshigs// thogar gu tshig chen mos ni// srang cing gtang bar bya ba ste// thams cad ma lus
59b8: byed pa yin/ ljon shing dang ni lcug phran tshal// sdong gcig dang ni me reg tu// dang ba dga' ba chags pa dang // khros pas ka li rab tu bya// zhes gsungs pas zin las rnam pa bzhi sti ra'i rnga dang bcas par phyogs bcu dzi

60a1: rten gyi khams 'dul bar gyur te/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po 'jigs byed chen po nyid dam tshig sti ra'i rnga blam rdung zhing ster rngam pa'i mdangs 'di byung ngo // e yi tshogs chen 'byam pa ru// s+t+waM
60a2: ri'i rje chen sgra bsgrags pas/ / hUM ha he phaT s+tha 'byin cingag/ mig 'bru brgyad kyi byin rlabs kyis// ru lu hUM b+h+yo'i gsung sgrogs pa// khro bo rngam pa'i sgra skad kyis// srid pa gsum char bshig nas kyang // stong gsum bsgral ba'i sgra 'byin
60a3: 'o/ / ra rje chen 'di brdungs pas// gnod sbyin srin po kun bskal te// mu stegs kun gyi snying yang 'byin// s+thi ri'ing chen 'di bsgrags pas// stong gsum khro ba'i tshogs kyis bkang // kun kyang rnga badz+rad dor re dzas
60a4: chen pos stong gsum bshig/ rnga sgra chen pos bdud dpung bsgral// rnga sgra chen pos srid gsum sbyangs// rnga sgra chen pos dgra bgegs 'dul// rnga sgra chen pos ngan song sbyangs// rnga sgra 'brug gi sgra bsgrags pas/ na rag
60a5: dmyal khams stongs par byed/ / rnga sgra stag cem ri rab rnyil// stir rnga chen sgra phyung bas// phyin ci log rnams snying yang 'byin// rnga chen 'brug gi sgra sgrogs shing // rnga thabs glog stong 'grub bzhin// de bzhin gshegs/
60a6: ba'i thugs dam bskar// ma mo mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig bskangs// rnal 'byor rnam lnga'i dam tshig bskul// stir rnga chen 'di bdungs pas// nyan thos mdo sde gnas nas spar// rang rgyal lta ba dbyings su sgrol// s+thi ra'i rnga chen
60a7: 'di bsgrags pas/ / lha dang mi yi theg pa yang // bla med theg pa'i dbyings su btsud// stir rnga sgra 'di bsgrags pas// stong khams sti ra'i rnga sgras bkang // kun kyang rnga brdung di ri ri// rnga thabs glog stong lce 'byin cing // rnga
60a8: skad 'brug stong sgra sgrogs pas/ / byin rlabs lcags kyi ser chen 'bebs// stong gsum 'khrug cing srid gsum 'thor// rnga thabs g.yab mor bor ba dang // kha dang ka yi ru mtshon gyis// thams cad gnam lcags chen

60b1: pos bstag/ / ka la chen po las sogs te// rdo rje chags 'og ldegs pa'i rnams// dus gcig tu ni tsi tata 'byin// stir chen po'i rnga sgra yis// srid pa khrag gi rgya mtshor bskyil// dus gcig tu ni dbang chen rdzogs// rnga sgra rin
60b2: chen khang pa brtsegs/ / bsam rdzogs che la dbang thang thob// rnga spras g.yo ba med par byed// chos la 'dzud pa'i sgra yang 'byin// rnga sgras ci 'dod dgongs pa rdzogs// byang chub sems ltar de ma thag/ ces gsungs pa de
60b3: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sbyor bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po man ngag gi snying po dang bcas pa de
60b4: la shin du rngam pa'i mdangs kyis dgyes pa chen po'i glu 'di blangs so/ / hUM gtum chen dus mthing me ltar 'bar// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// khro gnyer glog stod 'gyur ba bzhin// mche bzang yag za byed che/ ho/ hUM
60b5: rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir/ / tug che ma ri rab 'bum rnyil skad// a la la yi gad rgyangs che// dbyugs pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che/ ho hUM khro bo'i shes rab 'od po che// ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal// 'bar
60b6: ba'i ye shes kun du 'joms/ / sna tshogs ye shes thig le che/ to/ hUM khro bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po// khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'bebs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung bas gter// sna tshogs khros pa'i
60b7: thig le chen/ / to hUM bdud rnams kun gyi bdud chen po// bdud kyi bdud ste bdud rnams 'joms// 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa// 'jigs byed chen po gdal ba che// hUM rdo rje brag chen srab po// rdo
60b8: rje chu bo sdud chen po/ / rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che// rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che// to hUM stong gsum khro bo'i dkyil 'khor tshogs// 'jigs byed mtshon du med pa'i sku// sna tshogs gsung dang sna tshogs thugs// 'jigs

61a1: byed rngam pa'i ye shes gter/ / ho zhes blangs pas stong gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jigs byed chen po rnams dbyer med pas mnyes par gyur to// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las lhun gyis grub pal
61a2: phrin las dang yongs su mnyes pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / // rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'i don// gsang ba kun gyi bla ma ste// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po yin// des don chos kyi snying po las// 'dul ba mdo sde ches
61a3: mngon dang / / dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'phros te// sde snod kun dang rgyud kun yang // 'byung nas gtan la nges par 'bebs// 'gro drug sems can gsum po yang /
61a4: stan chen po'i dbyings su bstan// ling ga pad mar bcas pa yang // 'ga' na chen po'i dbyings su sbyor snang srid kha dog mang po yang // 'ga' na chen po'i lam du bstan// rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di// rtogs nas smra
61a5: bar gang byed pa/ / de nyid nga yen dbang yang rdzogs// rtag tu byang chub sems la gnas// tshe 'di nyid kyis mngon sangs rgyas// nor bu rin chen 'bar ba ltar// bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin 'grub/ ces
61a6: gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes te/ mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings na lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i
61a7: sgra 'phrul bla ma chen po las rjed chen po'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o/ / // rtogs pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i le'u stong phrag brgya pa las lung gi spyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i
61a8: tha ma chen po'i le'u las thams cad ma lus par 'phros pa de dag gi 'bras bu'i mchog/ rdzogs s+ho// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI karma nAd ta ri tsakra gu h+ya tan tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam

61b1: dpal las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud/ / // 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen por gyur te/ yum
61b2: chen mo dang gnyis su med pa'i mkha' la bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ / 'khor khro bo dang / khro mo dang / ma mo dang / mngag gzhug dang / 'bangs la sogs pa rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa chen po la 'dud pa'i tshul du bzhug
61b3: so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das btsun mo dang gnyis su med par gyur/ skye 'gag dang bral ba'i don 'di ston to// ye nas ma skyes gshin rje chen po'i tshogs// rnam dag dbyings kyi rang nyid rnam par dag pa la/ gnyis med 'dus
61b4: pa'i sras mchog gshin rje gshed/ / thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag pa yi// kun gyi ye shes thams cad 'dus pa ste// thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// sems can ma lus mya ngan 'das pa'i lam/ ye shes
61b5: thams cad de yi ngang la rdzogs/ / 'khor ba'i nyes skyon thams cad tshar gcad phyir// 'dod chags 'dus pa'i dpal ldan gar gyi bdag/ bye ba phrag brgya dpag tu med par yang // 'dul ba'i dbang gis de lta bu yi gzugs su
61b6: bstan/ / zhes gsungs pas 'khor gyi khro bo dang khre mo la sogs pa thams cad mgu bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed chen po la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// sems can 'khor
61b7: bas gdungs pa la/ / mya ngan 'das pa'i lam mchog bstan// bstan pa dam pa 'di gsungs pas// thams cad sgrol ba ngo mtshar re// zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yum dang gcig tu 'dus te/
61b8: 'di skad ces gsungs so// sprul pa'i sku dag tshad med dpag tu med// thun mong ma yin 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las rmad du byung // me dge bcu dang mtshams med tshar gcad pa// zug rngu ma

62a1: mnga' chos nyid mad poche/ chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// sprul pa'i sku dang gsung ni don dam kun du sbyor// phyogs bcu bde bar gshegs pa thugs kyi dpal// yang dag ye shes dpal yin 'jam dpal yin/
62a2: zhes bstod de gnyis su med par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa de la 'khor gyis de bzhin du gsol pa la dgyes te// 'di skad ces gsungs so// zhi ba gnyis med chos kyi ngang nyid las// snying po gnyis med byang
62a3: chub sems dpa'i don/ / thams cad 'dus pa'i bla med dam pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di bshad do// oM sarba ta thA ga ta e h+ye ti thA ga ta ba bti/ bo d+hi satwa d+harma d+ha du// e h+ye hi dza hrI hi hi h+ye hi hrI hUM hUM/ zhes brjod nas/ brdas
62a4: mtshon par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das steng gi phyogs su sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugaso// snyoms par zhugs pas phyogs la phyogs su bltas ste/ rang bzhin gyis sgrol ba'i
62a5: nus pa can du gyur te/ thams cad kyang sgrol bar gyur to// de nas yum gyi tshogs thams cad kyis dgyes pa chen po'i brda' 'dis bcom ldan 'das las skul lo// e ma'o phyogs bcu dus gsum rdzogs pa yi// ye shes 'dus
62a6: pa'i phrin las mchog/ bla med theg pa nges pa la// sbyor ba mchog gis bshar du gsol/ zhes bskul bas// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par gyur to// de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa
62a7: rnams dbang phyug gi 'khor mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad dang bcas nas sku'i rgyan gyis brgyan te/ / so so'i btsun mo'i dgyes pas sku'i nyams su btang bar gyur to// da ltar gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
62a8: bskyalangs ste/ / 'di skad ces ched du brjod do// sku gsung thugs rnams 'gro ba so sor 'dul// rang gis zhi ba'i dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro ba so sor 'dul// de phyir mchog gi rgyal po 'di bshad do//

62b1: zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor rnams rab tu dga' mgu rangs par gyur te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// sku gsung thugs kyis 'gro ba rang rang 'dul// dbyings las 'dren pa rdo rje gsor byas te// 'di ltar 'dul bar mdzad pa
62b2: ngo mtshar che/ zhes brjod do// sku la zhugs nas mi snang bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad khro bos 'dul bar mkhyen nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// khra dang spyang ki srin mo mu stegs rnams// bdud dang log 'dren
62b3: thams cad tshar gcad phyir/ / chos nyid sgyu ma lta bu sprul nas phrin las mdzad ces gsungs pas/ 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di skad du/ e ma'o che ba'i yon tan kun la khyab pa la// ngang gis khro bor bstan pa
62b4: 'di lta bu/ ngo mtshar rmad byung sprul pa 'di lta bu/ rab tu mi srun 'dul ba ngo mtshar che/ zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bskul bar 'di skad ces gsungs so// khyad par rim par bstan pa'i khro gnyer ni//
62b5: ye shes dbyings kyis kun la khyab par ston// khro bo bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu la sogs// ston pa mchod phyir khro bo mang po bstan// dang khro kun khyab shugs khro rang rang 'dul ba yi// bye brag so sor rab tu shes bya la// mtshan
62b6: ma drag po zhi ba dbang dang rgyas/ / go rims bzlog ste rab tu bshad pa bya// lte bar bcas pa'i rtsibs can la// 'khor ba gcod byed rtse mo can// gru gsum e'i pho brang la// zla gam rnam gsum dbang gi tshul// mu khyud
62b7: rang can rgyas pa phyi/ / rnam bzhir ldan pa'i 'khor lo la// rab tu mdzes pa'i thig gdab bo// dbus sum he'i zhing gdan la// rtse dbus zhing brkyang re re'i// rus pa tshogs kyi rba rlabs brag tu spungs// rag ta khrag gi rba glong
62b8: mtshe lta bu/ gnam lcags ngur mo rab tu ta la la// dur khrod rab tu brgyan pa de bshas mo// dbus su khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// skran nag po dug 'dra la// dbu gsum dkar dmar mthong ba ste// ral pa kham nag srid

63a1: 'bar/ rtsal me 'bar rkang nas zhag kyang 'dzag/ rtsa ba chu ste sdang mig rab tu bskrad// phyag drug phyag mtshan bsdams pa'i thor tshugs ni// bsgribs 'jug rgyu zhabs lugs kyu g.yas// dung tshan mdung thung gsal
63a2: shing g.yod/ / zhabs bzhi thur du bstan pa ni// brkyang bskum tshul gyis 'gro ba dbang du sdad// sku stod glang chen ko ba zhing phrag la/ sku rmad stag ste sham thabs tsham ngam can// se yi pho brang dbus su'o// yum yang yab dang sku
63a3: 'thun te/ pho brang dbus su g.yon du'o// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mche ba can// khram bam ban d+ha bsnams pa'o// rtse la khro bo yab yum bcu// rab tu khros pa'i sdang mig can// go rims bzhin du dgod par bya// zla gam
63a4: dar long ma mo ste/ / sbrul de bzhin bsrung ba'o// de la rim pas mgu bar bya// zhes brjod de// 'di sku gsung thugs las byung ngo // maM a kro many+dzu shI mr-i// hUM badz+ra kro d+hi d+hi nan hU~M/ ma~M badz+ra ba ta li rag sha man/ hU~M u0f7f
63a5: hUM hU~M hU~M/ hu~M hU~M hu~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hu~M hU~M/ oM ru ru dun/ oM dzA dza ya/ oM ya shug b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo// dzaHhUM baM ho/ zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu thams cad 'khrugs ste/ g.yos so// 'gul to/ ldeg go// chem mo/ 'ur te/ g.yo 'gul du
63a6: grwar te/ 'khrugasas gyur to/ de nas yum gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs par gsol ba gad ba ste/ gsol bar zhus pa/ e ma'o rab tu blo ldan khyod// 'jig rten 'khrugs par mdzad pa'o// dbang med las kyis mnar ba
63a7: bder gshegs gsung du gsungs pa ste/ rab tu bde bar mdzad du gsol/ zhes glengs pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rgyal po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs ste/ 'di gsungs so// aH
63a8: na la ka la hU~M badz+ra ga ta pra be sha ho/ / zhes gsungs pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag rab tu 'jam par gyur to// gyur pas sems can thams cad slar sngon kho na bzhin du gyur te// bcom ldan 'das gshin rje

63b1: gshed chen po la skyabs su dong ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi phyag rgyas mnyes par bya ba 'di gsungs so// rtse gcig mnyam par gzhag bya ste// sgeg mo g.yon du gnas par bya// bskul/
63b2: ba'i ting 'dzin brlan pa la// bskyod pa byang chub lam du drangs// gnas nyid bder gshegs skyed pa'i rkyen// rtse mo oM la phaT du bstan zhes gsungs pas// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rol mos
63b3: panyes par gyur to/ / 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las// gleng bzhi rtsa ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las zhi bar bya ba 'di ched du brjod do// rab tu dkar ba'i
63b4: yul dag la mgu ba'i sems dang ldan byas ste/ / dang bas mgu ba'i las byas zhes// bla med rgyal bas rab tu bshad// sa gzhi dkar ba rab mnyam la// gru bzhir ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor la// lte bar bcas shing rtsib
63b5: brgyad pa/ / mkhas pas bsgrims te bri bar bya// dkar dang ldan pa'i zla ba la// gcig nas gsum nas mgo btsugs la// khams gsum rab tu mgu bya'i phyir// nyams su lon par byas la bsgrub// dbus su ye shes
63b6: bdag po la/ / shar du nag 'joms chen po ste// lho ru ya ba ti zhes bya/ nub du khro bo dmigs pa la// byang du bdud 'joms dgod par bya// shar lho lho nub nub byang dang // byang shar 'tshams su dgod pa ni// glang mgo wa
63b7: che gcod skyong rje/ / las grub brgyad de go rim bzhin stang 'ag dmar po zag dgon bsgoms te dgod// zla ga ma lam mo gsum rnams// sgo skor sgo srungs ma rnams bri// de yi yum dang bcas pa rnams// khro bo nyid dang
63b8: sku 'thun pa'o/ / sems dpa'i 'dug stangs gnas byas la// sgeg mo g.yon du bsten byas la// sngags g.yog mdzes par tshogs byas la// mgu ba'i phrin las brtsam par bya// ske tse thal ba rus pa la// dzam pa la

64a1: yi gzugs lta bur/ / byas la snying khar bri ba ni// a myA ba la si ti 'am// gang 'dod pa yi yi ge de/ phaTad swA hA sa dam ltar bya// ming byang gong ltar bri byas la// gang ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du gzhag/ de la/
64a2: 'di yang rab tu brjod// oM a kro badz+ra shan ting nag badz+ra swA hA// oM a kr-i te ka shan ting ba la buM// zhes brjod la snying khar brgyu ba na// thams cad mgunas dang pa'i sems kyis zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas zhi ba'i sra
64a3: byas zin nas phyogs bcu'i gdug pa zhi bar bya ste/ bdag la mi dga' ba med na las 'grub pa yin no// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ thams cad zhi ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
64a4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad rgyas par bya ba 'di ched du brjod do// gser las grub pa'i yul dag la'ang // dpal rgyas sems dang ldan byas te// rgyas par bya ba'i sems kyis su// dkyil
64a5: 'khor dam pa bshad par bya/ / dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas la// ba yi chag chag btab byas ste// rnal 'byor dam pa blo ldan pas// thig ni gdab pa rab tu brtsam// gser las grub pa'i thig skud la// dpal ldan//
64a6: 'phel ba'i sems dang bcas// slob ma dam pa las grub par// bsams la thig ni gdab par bya// pho brang gser la rtse mo g.yu// rdo rje rtsig pa gser las grub// gru chad sgo rnams lcags las grub// rnal 'byor
64a7: sngags pa blo ldan pas/ / thig bzhi re'u cha brgyad du 'gyur// mtha' nas thig gdab man ngag can/ de las sogs b+ha bsam par bya// rin chenA dkyil dkrung 'dug byas la// dbus su gsang sngags bdag pos ste/ phyog
64a8: phyogs sgo ba dam pa rnams/ / snga ma bzhin du bsgoms nas kyang // rang sngags skyes bu da bskyed do// o a kre to puSh+Ti ba la na hUM// oM a kro puSh+Ti ti ba ta na s+ho// zhes brjod pas bdag po yab yum la// 'khor rnams 'bru

64b1: re ba las sam/ rang rang bskyed pa dam pa ste// sngags dang ldan par ting 'dzin gsal// bzhugs dang brtan dang mchod pa dang // phyag byed pa la sogs pa yi// las kyi bya ba ma lum par// thams cad ma lus chad par bya// skyed dang
64b2: grub pa'i 'bras bu ni/ / rgyal ba bsnyen te thag mi ring // rang grub 'bras bu de la sogs// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi// dngos grub dam par bster zhes// 'dren pa dpa' bos yang dag bshad// de nas gzhan yang
64b3: ba bshad pa/ / dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas nas// sa zhag gser las grub pa la// gzugs ni dam pa rab tu bya// phyig na gan rgyal mnan byas la// nad hUM puSh+paM a pra tse swA hA// snying khar bris nas brjod bya ba// snying po sngags
64b4: kyi dam pa ste/ / bla med dam pas rab tu bshad// oM badz+ra puSh+TiM a yu ba shad shrI puSh+paM swA hA/ zhes brjod na thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ro// / 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ thams cad rgyas par
64b5: bya ba'i le'u ste/ gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bdag nyid dbang gis 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// zangs las 'brel ba'i yul dag la// rang
64b6: dbang med de dbang bsdus nas/ / 'du ba'i sems dang ldan byas ste// dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya// zangs sam dmar po'i sa dag la// dkyil 'khor snga ma dag dang 'dra// legs par khong snyom zin pa dang // thig ni rab
64b7: tug dab par bya/ / lce ba can la rtsi bas brgyad pa// kun du zlum pas rgyas pa mtha'// steng pus gzhu rdungs bris byas la// de steng bdag po dam pa gzhag/ thams cad ma lus mchog tu 'gugs/ sa pa la yang thogs pa za/
64b8: zhes ni yang dag pa med des// bshad par bya steg tu brten/ gzhan yang ra chub shad byag// sems kyi dkyil 'bor dam pa te// tha med yang dag nges pa'i lam// sangs rgyas byang chub la sogs rnams/ gzhung la

65a1: pa'i tshig don rnams/ / ma nor gsungs pa'i bka' bzhin du/ bsgrub na grub par bshad pa'o// de dag 'gugs par gyur pa na// phal pa gzhan lta smos ci dgos// bsdu dang 'dren pa byang chub lam// 'di dag go 'phang thob
65a2: bya'i phyir/ yungs dkar rkang rjes sa'am gzhan// khrag gsum thal chen sras byas la// ga'u'i nang du thugs byas la// gzhu gnyis ni kha sbyar te// spyad pa dmar po zangs la sogs// bcings pa bsnams te dkris byas la/ dkyis
65a3: 'khor gyis ni thog tu gzhag/ yungs dkar zangs gnyis bsreg byas te// du dbas ga'u de la 'dug/ de la bdugs par gyur pa dang // bzlas pa'i snying po brjod bya zhing // lan grangs khri tshad du ma ru// brjod na sangs rgyas la sos
65a4: rnams/ / dgugs par gyur na phal pa gzhan// smos ci dgos te nges par 'gugs// oM badz+ra a kro many+dzu shrI ba shang ma hA sarba ti la bruM// lan grangs mang du brjod byas na// ci ltar bsams pa thams cad dgugs// rgya shug
65a5: bkrus pa'i khu ba dang / / ma yi lag pa'i khu ba gnyis// snga ma bzhin du bkugs byas na// 'gugs par 'gyur zhes dpa' bos bshad// yang na rang gi lag pa rung // zhes gsung pas// thams cad ma lus par 'dus te// dper
65a6: na phyogs thams cad nas mtshol sbrang ma 'du ba bzhin du 'dus te/ / bdag gi dbang du bya ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rjes gsungs so// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gas ba'i
65a7: rgyud las/ / dbang gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po gshin rje'i tshogs 'du mdzad do// rang bzhin gyi mthucan 'di gsungs so// 'byung byed ye shes dkyil 'khor ni/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin
65a8: byas la/ / bdag nyid khro bo chen po ste// yum yang de bzhin de yi'o// yab yum gnyis med byin brlabs las// thabs dang shes rab 'phro 'du las// thig skud rgyus pa ljags las byas// de ni las kyi thig ces bya// theg bzhi

65b1: btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi rgya khyud bcas// kun tu gru bzhi sgo ljad can// gru cha ldan te dur khrod rgyan// mdzes par bris te gzhanan min// nyen pa'i lha ste sngam bzhin// bskyed pa'i sngags 'di
65b2: brjod byas pas/ / bdag dang 'dra bar bskyed par bya// oM a kro te ka s+t+wa~M a/ hU~M badz+ra be ta li rag sha man/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ gr-i Tu hU~M hUM hUM hUM hu hu~M hu hUM/ dza hUM baM ton/ b+hu b+h+re b+h+rU~M b+h+yo/ zhes brjod pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams
65b3: cad g.yos so/ / rab tu g.yos so// kun du rab tu g.yos so// 'gul 'gul// rab tu 'gul// kun du rab tu 'gul lo// ldeg ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun du rab tu ldeg go// che mchem/ rab tu che ma/ kun tu rab tu che mchem
65b4: mo/ / 'ur 'ur rab tu'u ra'ur/ kun du rab tu'ur 'ur ro// dbus mthon mtha' dma'/ mtha' mthon dbus dma' ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag rab tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i bdag
65b5: nyid des 'di skad ce gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu gsung gi gsang sngags gsungs pa bdag cag spro lags so// 'jig rten du 'di lta bur mthu can la bdag zhu lags so// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis
65b6: khro bar mdzad pa de la bdag mngon du sems can thams cad rab tu yang zhu bar 'tshal lag so/ / bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen por 'dra mdzad pa des 'di skad ces gsungs so// oM shrI ba ra yag sha/ gu ya sarba ta
65b7: kri badz+rag la rub mar na paT ces gsungs pas/ 'jig rten na dbang che ba dang / mthuche ba la sogs pa thams cad btul nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nes kyang // gsung du med par
65b8: chos nyid la/ / rang sems 'phro 'dur gyur pa las// phyogs bcur gsungs pa de dag yin// de bas nan tan bskyed byas ste// drag po'i cha mdam bshad par bya// 'jig rten 'dud kyi gdug bkun// mtsham ngam klog

66a1: ltar 'gyur ba las/ / ngo mtshar ya mtshan bsgrag par bya// e ma 'o yab yum gnyis memad rol pa'i mkha' dkyil nas// phyogs bcur 'phro ba byang chub sems// rigs kyi yab dang de bzhin btsun mon// rtag par
66a2: bsgoms ted de bzhin gshegs par bya/ / rdzas dang phyag rgya sngags dang bcas rnams ni// gzugs dang 'dod pa'i 'bras bu gang 'did grub par ro// mi dge bcu dang ldan pa'i rnam par 'dren pa dar byas ste// sngags dang phyag rgya rdzas
66a3: rnams dang / ga 'u pad ma dam pa dang // kham pa rda yi 'dzi ba yi// khrag sna gsum dang 'gi wang ngo // de dag phrin las mchog yin te// grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// bla med dpa' bos yang dag gsungs// phyogs bcu'i
66a4: kadug pa ma lus kun/ / 'dul bar 'gyur te the tshom med// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las drag po'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed/ ye shes
66a5: lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang la longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / rang bzhin 'phags pa kun du shes rab ste/ de bzhin rnam par mi rtog yin pas na// 'di gnyis chos kyi sku zhes rab tu bshad/ chos
66a6: kye longs spyod 'dul ba'i don la rgyas/ / 'gro ba'i don rdzogs ma lus skur 'byung dang // bdud dang mu stegs srin po gdul ba'i phyir// mtshan dang dpe byad gzugs su sprul nas ni// ma lus tshar gcod don du 'di gsungaso//
66a7: 'khor lo rtsabs brgyad mu khyud zlum por bcas// sbrul gyi rgya gram dag gi mtha' bskor la// lte bar rdo rje rgya gram bri bar bya// de yi steng du ka pA la gnyis la// gcig la gshin rje dbu drug pa yi gzugs// gcig la yum
66a8: chen khro gnyer gzugs bris la/ / nang du dgra bo rkang rdzas sa dang ni// dri dang de bzhin khrag sna gsum// thal chen rgya shug bkrus pa'i khu ba dang // brdzis la dgra bo'i gzugs byas la/ bcug la skud pa dkar pos bcing /

66b1: dkyil 'khor thog tu gzhag par bya// oM ya man ta ka hI Sh+Ti da badz+ra kro ta ya man ta ka badz+ra kro ta phaT phaT a// zhes brjod pa tsam gyis ni// ya ba yum sku mdog mthi nag la// dbu skra kham nag ral pa gyen du brdzes//
66b2: dbu la thod pa rlon pas brgyan// skal sbal nag chun po dang // zhabs bzhi brgyad bskam tshul du bzhugs// phyag drug phyag mtshan bsnams pa ni// g.yas kyi dang po bsdigs 'dzub la// rgyu zhags lcags kyu bar tha ma/
66b3: dung chen tre shul gsal shing g.yon// de ltar cha lugs gsal ba dang // dbyangs 'di blang ba ra nan tan bya// hUM rngam pa'i rgyal po khrag 'thung gshin rje gshad// khams gsum dbang sdud rtags su zhal gsum pa'o//
66b4: dbyings nas sprul pa'i yab yum lhun gyis grub// las ngan 'khrul pa'i sems can gdul dka' ba// gdug pa de dga' dul phyir gshegs su gsol// dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas la/ dza hUM baM ho/ sa ma ya ste// zhes
66b5: pa lan grangs mang du brjod/ / des ni brtan par bzhugs par 'gyur// khrag chen rgod khrag sha dang tshal// chen po la sogs gtor ma sha ma// de ni dkyil 'khor thog dag tu// bdag nyid ting 'dzin gsal ba las/ sngag
66b6: 'di ba bum phrag gcig tu bzlas/ / oM badz+ra hasta ba ba ha ha dA na hrI Sh+Ti che ge mo ma ra le hu~M hu~M phaT phaT// che ge mo ha sta ba bri ti nir te sa hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ nyin zhag gcig la lan 'bum bzlas// nyin zhag gsum gyi bar du
66b7: bzlas/ de dag bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang / gtor ma'i las dag brtsams bya ste// bskyed dang bskul dang rdzogs pa dang // phyogs bcu'i khro bo spyan drangs ste// bzhugs dang brtan dang mi g.yo sogs// ma lus rdzogs pa'i
66b8: phrin las bya/ de ltar phrin las rdzogs pa dang // yang nas yang du bstab pa bya// de kar bstab pa byas pa ma/ dgra bgags dbang 'gyur smos ci dgos// de nas yang 'di ched du brjod de gsung so// oM ni phyogs bcu dus

67a1: gsum gyi/ / bder gshegs thugs kyi sras yin par// bdud dang srin po log 'dren rnams// ma lus tshar gcod byin brlabs ste// mgon po gshin rje nyid kyi sras// don rnams thams cad ma lus
67a2: de nyid du ni bsgrub par bya/ / dgra rnams thams cad gdul ba'i phyir// phrin las rdo rje can gyi mdzod// zhes brjod cing sngags kyis brdeg pa ni// phrin las mchog gi rgyal po zhes gsungs so// dus dang dus dang
67a3: zhag grangs ni/ / nyi ma gcig la stong rtsa gcig/ nam gyi gung la brgya rtsa gcig/ tho rangs thun gcig brgya rtsa gcig/ srod kyi gu la brgya rtsa gcig/ de ltar nyin zhag gsum par du// bzlas pa zhag grangs tshang bya zhing /
67a4: phyag rgya bca' zhing gzugs la brdeg/ nyal byas na gdon mi za// oM ma ra na kha da sarba sISh+TiSh+NI ya man/ hu~M hU~M tre kha da ba ra na ba la hu~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA// rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya bcas la dgra bo'i gzugs la/
67a5: brdeg go// oM badz+ra hu~M kham spang na phaT/ hu~M a be she a/ hu~M hU~M phaT phaT a/ yang phyag rgya gong ma bcas la/ oM badz+ra kro ta ni la ta na tra hu~M hu~M hrISh+Ti kri ta nan/ hu~M tISh+Ti bi kri ta na na nan zhes brjod la/ bdag gi lag pas dbang
67a6: bskur ro/ / yang phyag rgya bcas la/ sngags 'di la yang lan grangs mang du bya'o// oM badz+ra tsaN tra hISh+Ta~M badz+ra sti ra ba~M/ kha hi hu~M hU~M che ge mo dbang du sbas shig/ hri la tri la/ zhes lan grangs mang du brjod do// rdo rje rgya
67a7: gram gyi phyag rgyas brdeg go/ yang phyag rgya bcas la// sngags 'dis brdeg go// oM badz+ra kang ka ma ke la ya na hUM phaT phaT a/ zhes 'bum bzlas la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgyas brdeg go// yang phyag rgya bcas la
67a8: sngags 'dis brdeg go/ / oM badz+ra ma gu sha tre tha sti ra ba hu~M hU~M phaT phaT che ge mo ma ra ya dza hu~M zhes dbang du bsdus shing / hU~M hU~M phaT phaT zhes lan grangs mang du brjod do// rdo rje gdengs pa'i phyag rgya bcas la dbang du

67b1: bsdu'o/ / yang phyag rgya bcas la sngags 'dis brdeg go// oM hu~M hU~M phaT phaT 'dus 'dus rang rang yaM yaM raM raM tring hri du ba b+h+yo hU~M phaT che ge mo dun b+h+yo zhes bzlas la// kha T+wAM gi phyag rgyas brdeg go// de ltar las de dag yongs su rdzogs
67b2: pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par byas la/ bzlas pa byas na las ci byas pa thams cad dbang du 'du bar des zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ ngan sngags dbang
67b3: sdud kyi le'u ste drug pa'o/ / // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed/ bcom ldan 'das kun la khyab pa'i phrin las bsgrub pa 'di/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // lnga phung yan lag gzhom
67b4: pa dang / / dug gsum rtsad nas gcad pa dang // 'bras bu rgyal bar bsgrub bya'i phyir// nan tur phrin las bshad par bya// dang po'i las ni rgyas dang gsang // dgug dang gtang dang bcing dang dgrol// sbyor ba'i gdug pa ma lus
67b5: kun/ / phrin las 'di yis byed par 'gyur// dang por btsal ba'i btsal thabs ni// rnam pa drug dang ldan pas btsal// stag mo gang la mchod stabs dang // sang ge gangs la 'gying tshul dang // khwa spyang gzan la rgyug tshul dang /
67b6: bya rgod gzan la 'babs tshul dang // dom chen rmi lam rmi tshul dang // khwa sgeg thang shing snyag tshul gyis// ro yi phung po btsal bar bya// ri la 'dug na 'gying bas btsal// sribs la 'dug na mchod pas btsal// gdags la
67b7: 'dug na 'dug pas btsa la/ / 'or na 'dug na 'babs pas btsal// brag la 'dug na rmibs btsal// nags la 'dug na snyeg pas btsa la// rgyal rigs yin na seng ge gtang // bram ze yin na stag mo gtang // rje'u rigs
67b8: yinan bya nor gtang / / rmang rigs yin na dom gyis bya// ma ning yin na sprer gyis bya// dog la yin na wa sbyang gang// de ltar ro la tshol stangs ni// rnam pa drug dang ldan pas btsal// brtags nas 'ongs 'gyur ba dang /

68a1: gshin rje rgyal po'i tshim dam bya// khro bo bcu yi stangs stobs kyis// ro la kun du bskor byas la// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su gzhag/ de ltar gzhag pa'i las byas nas// mgo ni lho nub 'tshams su
68a2: bstan/ / rkang pa byang shar 'tshams su bstan// lag pa g.yas pa lho yi phyogs// lag pa g.yon pa nub kyi phyogs// rkang pa g.yas pa shar gyi phyogs// rkang pa g.yon pa byang gi phyogs// de ltar gan rgyal bzhag bya la//
68a3: da ni phur ba dgod bya ste// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// lag gnyis rkang gnyis pho mtshan dang // lkog ma de bzhin snying kha dang // lte ba pus mo dpung ba gnyis// gru mo de bzhin long bu gnyis// mtshogs ma de bzhin spyi bo dang //
68a4: sku dang de bzhin mtshan khung gnyis// dpral ba rnams su gdab byas la// phur ba de dag lha yi skur// rab tu brtags ste goms pa dang // rang bzhin gnas nas gshegs pa dang // ting nge 'dzin du bsgoms pa dang / gzugs
68a5: brnyan nang du bkod pa gsum/ / tshad pas gdungs pa'i bye ma la// mar zhu de bzhin thim pa bzhin// gnyis su med par shes bya la// gong du bstan pa'i lha rnams ni// rnam shes bzhi dang dbang po bzhi// de las gyur pa'i
68a6: yul rnams ni/ / brgyad po'i ngang du shes par bya// sgom lus la grags pa'o// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i phyir// steng 'og khro bo de las gyur// de dag kun gyi sku gsung thugs// ma mo gsum gyi rang nyid de// yab
68a7: nikun la khyab pa la/ / yum ni kun la sdud pa ste// bya ba byed pa bdag nyid do// phung po kun la khyab pa la// mnyes pas phul phyin lha yi tshogs// 'gro drug kun lam lus snang // de ltar las rnams zin pa dang // zhag grangs du
68a8: bya dam yang bca'/ / dngos grub thob par 'dod pa yi// rnal 'byor chen po'i ting 'dzin gsal// de ltar byas na mi las sogs// thams cad dbang du 'du bar gsungs// dgra bgegs la lta smos ci dgos// drag po'i

68b1: phrin las grub 'dod pas/ / dgra bo'i ming byang bris byas la// baM g+he kha ya nang du gzhug/ rdo rje rgya gram rgya yis gtab// he ru ka yi phyag rgyas gnon// yungs dkar rgyal pos drag tu brdeg/ rgya shug bkrus pas drag tu glug/
68b2: nyi ma bzhi la drag tu brdeg/ sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad// dam rdzas mchod pa shin du bgram// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin drag tu bya// yengs na par chad 'byung bar 'gyur// g.yeng bar mi mdzad kho bos gsungs//
68b3: des ni las kyi 'bras bu yang // shin du zad pa med pa ste// mkha' la 'phur dang sa la 'dzul// tshul 'bying med mngon shes ldan zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las ro langs/
68b4: kyi bsgrub pa la ngan sngags kyi phur bus gdab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje nyid rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa 'di ched du brjod do// ye shes 'byil ba'i dkyil 'kho
68b5: bskyed steng na/ / ye shes nyi ma gsal ba'i thig phran gdab// mu khyud zlum po sbal gyi zhags pa bri// stegs bu phyogs 'tshams phur bus bskor bar bya// de ltar bris pa'i dkyil du dgod pa ni/ oM ni dbus kyi lte ba la/ shar
68b6: durbi la lho ru s+tha/ / nub phyogs hU~M la byang du ha// byang shar 'tshams su dzaM zhes pa// shar lho trai la lho nub ma// nub byang a la rab tu rten// rten pa'i yi ge de bkod nas// dbus su brtan par bsgom pa ni// gshin rje ste
68b7: ska dmar nag la/ / dbu gsum po la phyag kyang drug/ dbul thod pa tshal gyis brgyan// zhal g.yas skrag nag g.yon ldang ba// dbus ni sku dang rab 'thun pa// sku la thod pa rgyan gyis tshal// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum
68b8: du bzhugs pa/ / yab kyi skul rab 'jug pa// g.yon phyogs gnas bgong ma bzhin// oM a mri ta ta ka sarba a mri ta kro Ta hU~M phaT/ oM a mri ta kro Te hU~M phaT/ de ltar yob yum gsal bar skyed// pad ma'i gdan la rab

69a1: bzhugs pa'o/ / 'bar la sogs pa'i rim pa ni// bskyed pa gang ma'i rim pa'o// rtag tu bzlas pa bsnyen pa'i sngags// mi drag mi bral mi zhan par// ting 'dzin gsal bar bsgoms byas te// zhil 'tsheng/
69a2: ba'i ting 'dzin la// ri rab dbus kyi lte dbus la// rab brten 'og gi go ga nas// rdo rje tshe yi dbang stsol te// phyogs bcu gdug pa'i tshe 'dren te// gdug pa ma lus 'gugs par 'gyur// tshe'i snying po 'di rtag tu
69a3: bzlas/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI mu tra a yu ba la si ti ni bru~M a// des ni tshe yi dbang thob nas sangs rgyas sku dang mnyam pa dang // bskal pa ma zhig bar du ni// lo lnga lon pa bzhin du gnas// de nas bskul ba'i gnas
69a4: 'di gsungs/ e ma'o phyogs bcu kun nas 'dus pa yi// ye shes rgyal po'i thig le 'di// gsang chen rmad du byung ba ste/ rgyu drug 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i bcud// thams cad ma
69a5: lus chos so chog/ chos kyi sku 'am chos kyi dbyings// don dam tshig dang mngon sum pa// dngos po mtshan ma thams cad las// khyab pa'i mya ngan thug rje che// phra mo sems kyi rang bzhin ste// gti mug mun pa sel ba ste/
69a6: nyon mongs dri ma kun dang bral// shin tu sad pa mya ngan 'das// thugs rje'i rang bzhin gshin rje ste// rdo rje tshe'i rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba'o// zhes gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams
69a7: cad rngam pa'i zhal nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / e ma'o phyogs bcu 'jig rten ye nas dben// bder gshegs thams cad ya nas lhun gyis grub// mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i ye shes ldan rdzogs pa'i//
69a8: phyogs bcu'i stong khams 'jig rten rgyan du bcas// thabs dang shes rab kyis ni dbang bskur na// bdud dang srin po log 'dren tshe bsdus te// dbang bskur gnang ba des kyang byin bskyed de// shar phyogs dri za'i gnas

69b1: nas tshe drongs shing / / oM badz+ra ku la e sra sha ra na ha ha he ho hu~M hu~M/ zhes ni dbyangs dang bcas pa yis// rdo rje rigs la grub pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis// mgon po gshin rje tshe dbang bskur// de nas
69b2: rin po che'i tshe'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir 'di gsungs so/ / e ma'o rin chen 'chang ba kun gyi bdag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug dbang byed pa// gtso mchog khyab par byin brlabs te// mi 'gyur rigs kyi tshe thob nas// lce phyogs
69b3: gshin rje'i gnas nas tshe drongs shig/ oM rad na ku la a yu he he he ho ha~M// rin chen dgyes pa'i dbang bskur bas// khyab par byin brlabs thob gyur cig/ de nas pa dam rigs kyi tshe'i dbang 'di yang gsungs so// e
69b4: ma'o khro gtum rngam pa'i tshogs/ / pad ma rigs kyi dbang phyug ste// snang ba med las lhun gyis grub// rdo rje 'chang gis dbang bskur bas// klu 'dul tshe yi dbang thob shog/ pad ma ku la a yu he he he ho haM// lhun gyis grub/
69b5: pa che yi dbang / thogs med dam pa thob par shog/ de nas las kyi rigs kyi tshe'i dbang bskur ba 'di brjod do// e ma'o rang bzhin mtshan ma med pa yi// ye shes lnga ldan phrin las gtso// gnyis su med pa las kyi rig
69b6: las rnams thams cad dbang bsgyur bas/ / gnod sbyin gdon la tshe drongs ste// gnod sbyin bgegs 'dul dbang thob shog/ oM kar ma ku la a yu he he ho ho haM// zhes brjod pas thams cad tshe'i dbang nyid du gyur te/
69b7: ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// tshad med bzhi yi thugs rjes kyang // nyon mongs dgra rnams ni gyur cig/ ces phyogs bcu rus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis tshe'i dbang bskur ro// 'phags pa
69b8: las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyad las 'jam dpal tshe sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i bdag nyid des// mtha' byed 'byung ba de nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs

70a1: las byung ngo / / gshin rje las kyi phrin las 'di// myos dang mgo 'khor byed pa dang // yid 'khrug khrag tu skyug par byed// log 'dren rnam pa drug tu bsten// log 'dren mtha' byed dkyil 'khor na btsu
70a2: gnyis 'khor lo rtsibs can de/ / yi dgas kyi ni gos la bri// sram rtsig ldan pa'i mu ra na la// dbyangs kyi yi ges kun du bskor// tsiSh+Ti'i sngags kyis gnan byas la// thal thod pa gtang bar bya// de nas sngags
