70a3: kyis dgang bar bya/ / ya ma na ste ra tsa'i tshogs// sa sta 'byung byed to yi rten// me ste thams cad sreg pa'o// bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed skur bskyed la// yum yang de ru bsgom byas la// phyogs bcu gadrug
70a4: pa thams cad kun/ / ma lus tsham dam drag par bya// bzlas pa'i snying po ma nor bar// sgra dang 'du byed rab spangs te// bde zhing yid 'ong gnas de las// rab tu sdang mig sdang sems bcas// sgra dang bcas pa'i sems
70a5: spangs ste/ / nyi ma shar nas nub kyi bar// rgyun dang dus su bstan pa'o// par par bskul ba'i las bya zhing // bcol ba'i las dag rab tu brjod// de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bog shin rje'i tshogs thams cad yum
70a6: btsun mo dang gnyis su med par byas te/ / bzlas pa'i sngags 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs las phyung ngo // oM hriSh+Ti bi kri tA nan hu~M hu pa na a nud b+ha ba/ sarba d+harma tsa tsAr+ya a ti ba ha// oM la ya a/ badz+ra bo d+hi ta thA ga
70a7: kro ti shwa ri a byi ta badz+ra kro te shwa ri/ / he he ha ha// sngags 'di rab tu brjod byas pas// kha dog che zhing lus bong che ba dang // rgyad ga yongs su ma chad thams cad nam mkha' ste// gsal ba'i shes rab thams cad
70a8: nam mkha' 'dra/ mthar phyid sngags kyi lung la mkhas par bya// de yi sbyor ba thams cad dgyes skongs shig/ dbang sdung sngags ste drag po'i las dang sbyar// mi dmigs gtso bo'i sngags dang phyag rgya gnas//

70b1: sgrol dang mthar byin phrin las gnas su bstan// ting 'dzin rim pa 'di dag ldan par bya// khro bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang // sgyu ma la dbang sgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // go 'apang chen po la
70b2: sbyar ba'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang // thugs rjes zhe sdang sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // shes rab kyis 'dod chags sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
70b3: ye shes kyis gti mug sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // yon tan gyis nga rgyal 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang // 'bad pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis phrag dog 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de dag 'joms pa'i
70b4: sngags ni 'di dag go/ pra dz+nyA ku la dz+nyA na ku la/ d+ha ka ku la/ gun ku la/ bir+ya ku la/ b+hu ta ku la/ badz+ra ku la/ pad ma ku la/ kar ma ku la/ rad na ku la/ sarba ta thA ga ta ho// zhes brjod nas 'di skad ces gsungs so//
70b5: dper na me dang 'od bzhin du// 'od la sbrang ma 'dun yang // me lce'i dong ni 'od la yod// 'od kyis sbrang 'tshig ci bzhin du// skyon gyis dri ma thams cad dang // bdud dang mu stegs log 'dren dang // mi mthun pa yi
70b6: dgra dang bgegs/ / shes rab thabs kyis gzir gnon pa'i// me lce dang ni sbrang ma 'dra'o// tha dad pa yi mi mthun pa'ang // 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje nyid// 'khrigs pa med cing sbrel bar byed//
70b7: mi skye ye shes ral gri yin// nyon mongs sdug bsngal dral byas nas// gnas dang gnas ma yin pa yi// rgyu dang rgyu ma yin pa yi// nyon mongs sems can mtho ris gnas// bsgral ba'i zhing du spros pa de
70b8: de la de bzhin drag tu bya/ / rigs dang lo grangs 'thun pa la// de bzhin byas na skyon pa ste// de dag yongs su shes par bya// las dang bya ba rtsol ba rnams// nyams kyi phyag rgyas dang don sad/ de rtags

71a1: 6/ dka' ba mi 'gyur te// mi la ya yi 'og gos la// 'gi wang dag gis bris byas ste// 'og nas 'byung ba'i gsang sngags dang // gang bya spel la bri byas la// rag ta dag gi kha chus bran// thub pa drug gi/
71a2: snying po bri// gsang ba'i sngags 'di drag tu brjod// oM triSh+Ti kro ta bi kri ta/ hriSh+Ti kro ta mir ta/ pra sad he te ba mu ka/ he hangad he hang / ka la ru ba hu~M hu~M phaT phaT a// de skad gsung gi sgra bsgrags pas// dgra dang bgegs dang mu
71a3: stegs dang / / bdud dang srin mo ma lus rnams// gzir cing gnan pa drag tu bya// mi mthun phyogs kyi 'byung po de// gdul bar bya ba'i don ched du// khro ba'i sku ru bsgom byas te// thams cad bsgral bar bya ba yi// rang bzhin/
71a4: grub pa 'di gsungs so// oM pra ma rta na/ na mo badz+ra badz+ra ki mo na ta// a hang pra khu ma khu ma mo mu sti sU hA// de skad ces ni gsungs pa yis// rang bzhin gyis ni dbang du 'gyur// bdud rnams dag ni khro zhing gtum// srin po
71a5: dag ni 'jigs shing ngam/ / mu stegs log 'dren rgol bar byed// de dag gdul bar bya ba'i phyir// phrin las dam pa 'di brtsams so// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la// dbus kyi pho brang lte ba la// bdud rnams
71a6: 'dul ba'i snying po bri/ shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// dri za dbang bsdud snying po bri// lho yi phyogs kyi 'khor lo la// mu stegs sgrol ba'i snying po bri// nub kyi phyogs kyi 'khor lo lo// klu rnams tshar gcod snying po/
71a7: bri/ byang gi phyogs kyi 'khor lo la// gnod sbyin tshogs rnams dbang sdud bri// huM bi g+ha nan/ hu~M rag sha nan/ oM tir ti ka nan/ oM ma ra na nan/ 'tshams kyi dkyil 'khor lte dbus su//
71a8: 'tshams kyi bgegs gnon snying po bri// huM d+ha huM bA/ hUM lA/ huM swA/ gru tshad rnam pa bzhi po la// thod pa rlon pa bri bar bya// mu khyud thod pa'i phreng ba gtad// phyi rol sbrul gyis yongs su dgang // de ltar dkyil

71b1: 'khor zin pa dang / / rnam par 'tshe ba'i gzugs rnams kun// kham pa rdza yig bul// gzugs su yongs su bri byas ste// dbus su yongs su gzhag par bya// kha dog dmar pos bcings nas ni// rtse gcig phyag rgya bcas
71b2: byas la/ / gsang sngags 'di yang 'bum khri brjod// oM pra ma rtan mo ha sa badz+ra dza ki mo ha d+ha a tang pra khu ma mo tha tha swA hA/ na mo do gi kha d+ha mu prab tha byi tha u ste ni nan sarba ta ta na phaT/ phyag rgya de dang bcas pas brdeg/ zhag
71b3: gsum bzlas pa byas na ni/ / bgegs dang log 'dren dbang du 'dus// gzhan yang de bzhin bzhugs pa'i khro// dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang // smug nag ldang nag kham pa dang // so so'i cha lags rngam pa'i gzugs// mgon/
71b4: bo gshin rje nag po yis// bgegs dang log 'dren gzir cing gnon// rngam pa'i zhal du 'di bstabs so// oM che ge mo kha ra ma kha ti// oM triSh+Te che ge mo kha ra mkha'i// oM ka la rub che ge mo kha ra mkha'i// hu~M hU~M phaT phaT a/
71b5: nyin zhag gsum gyi bar du bzlas// de nas phyag rgya gsum bcas ste// yang nas yang du gzir cing gnan// phyag rgya de dang gsang sngags 'dis// lan grangs stong rtsa gcig tu brdeg/ oM triSh+Ti badz+ra ya yan pa rna su bud
71b6: d+ha hu~M huM phaT phaT a/ / las dang rdzas dang sngags dang ni// phyag rgya brtson 'grus ma yengs par// 'bum mam grangs ni ci mang du// yang nas yang du nan tan bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal
71b7: pos rab tu gsung so/ / 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las log 'dren mthar byed kyis gnan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i bdag nyid des mthar byed 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang
71b8: gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung ngo / / gnod sbyin mthar byed phrin las 'di// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la// bzlas pa'i snying po bri bar bya// ya ste skyed pa me ste sreg/ tos la snying rje ru la chags// nA ni 'byung //

72a1: gas pa nA la / nal ma shA ste// rab tham gtas pa sa pal// byang chubasams kyi // ngam dang cam pas su 9/ d+hU chub can/
72a2: sangs rgyas la// mchod cing ci ltar mdzad pa ltar// bdag kyang rab tu bsngal slad du// ting 'dzin 'dra ba nam mkha' 'dra/ zhes gsungs pas phyogs bcu'i gdug pa can thams cad su gong ste bred nas myos par gyur te/
72a3: dper na mang ra ba bzhin na// de nas nan tan gyi zin las 'di nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs yan tan zini las las byung ngo // gdug pa ma lus 'dul mdzad pa// zla ba can ba d+hA s+tha can// las rnams thar byed bran las /
72a4: gnod sbyin sdang sems ldan pa kun// bar chad bya bar sems pa ste// de dag zil gyis gnan pa'i phyir// sku mdog nag po chen po ste// dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyil// thod pa tshar gsum dbu rgyan can// phyag g.yas zhing
72a5: chen g.yon ban d+ha/ / spyan gsum mche gtsigs zhabs kyang brkyang bskum ste// mi mthun bgegs dang sdang ba'i dgra// ma lus dbang sdud phrin las mchog gi sku// mi sdug tshul 'chang dregs pa'i khyo shug ldan// zhing chen
72a6: g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas/ / zhe sdang dbang sdud stag gi sham thabs can// nyon mongs dbang sdud glang chen ko rlon can// 'dren pa'i khro rgyal gdug 'dul dam pa 'di// dus ngan tha ma'i sems can 'dul dka' ba// nyon
72a7: mongs dbang sdud dpal gyi zhal du stobs/ / 'gro ba ma lus thugs rjes dbyings la dgod// zhe sdang shugs 'chang khro bo'i gtso// gdug par gyur pa'i dgra bgegs 'dul mdzad pa// nga rgyal la sogs rtag tu dug
72a8: gsum sku/ / ye shes dang las thams cad rdzogs par mdzod// oM badz+ra hriSh+Ti bi kri tA nan/ ta thA ga ta ya ma ra tsa huM phaT a/ zhes pa'i sngags dang bcas la bdag nyid las thar byed kyi skur bsgoms la phrin las bcol zhing/

72b1: gdan ba drag tu bzlas pa'i snying po bzlas so// de'i dus su sbyin sreg byed na phrin las brtsam par bya ste// me thab e yaM dbyibs 'dral// bang rim sum brtsegs kha khyer can// ngos la me yi phreng ba gtang // gyur /
72b2: rje ra ba la// mu ran thod pa'i phreng ba ste// me ste bsreg bya 'chang zhes pa// kha dog nag po shin tu ring // phyag na zhugs gling bgrang phreng dang // be con ril ba thogs pa ste// tshul bzhin spyan drangs gan bzhugs bstod// dbang dang
72b3: phyag tshar gshegs pa rnams/ / gang ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bya// gnyis 'og rang bzhin ya ma'i sku// gnyis med spyan drangs bzhugs la bcol// sbyin sreg phrin las zin pa dang / bcol bskul dag kyang rab
72b4: tu bya/ rdzas ni dug dang lan tshwa dang // ske tshe sbrang rtsi yungs nag dang // gu gul nag po la sogs pa'i// lcags 'dra'i rdzas la rab tu bsngags// bdag nyid lha yi skur bsgoms la// dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa yi// sngags
72b5: 'di rab tu rtse gcig bzlas/ / oM hUM ya kha me tra ta mu kha tri Sh+Ti ya ma ra tsa phaT hUM// phyag rgya zil gnon phyag rgya bca'// dkyil 'khor bskor zhing gsang sngags bzlas// bdag nyid nub kyi phyogs 'dug ste// las kyi thar
72b6: byed skur bsgoms la/ / gsang sngags mi bul mi drag par// bzlas na myur du 'grub pa ni// yid 'khrugs myos nas dbang med 'gyel ba dang // rab tu brgyal nas thal bar 'jig pa dag/ de rnams mi 'grub pa ru
72b7: das ma bshad/ ces bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i khro bos gsungs so// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las gnod sbyin mthar byed kyis gnan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas yang 'jam
72b8: dpal gshin rje gshed chen pos mthar byed 'byung ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs las phyung ngo de/ / srin po mthar byed phrin las 'di// dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa bya bar bstan// ya ste rgyu la ste ste rkyen// yo ni kun tu bskul

73a1: bal/ ni ni sdud pa'i don yin te// ri zhes bya ba lhun sdug pa// ya la 'dus te k+She la thim// bdag nyid chings zhes bya ba'i sku// dbu gsum po la phyag drug ste// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ser
73a2: nag/ phyag drug phyag mtshan bsnams pa ni// g.yas pa ba su ta yi zhabs// g.yas par gsal shing tha ma lpags kyu'o// g.yon gyi dang po chu srin par ma ka ta re// tha ma rdo rje rgya gram bsdams pa'o// sku stong glang
73a3: chen ko rlon la/ / sku smad stag gi sha ma thabs ste// zhing chen g.yang gzhis sku la brgyan// gzhan yang dur khrod rgyan mchog rnams// ma lus sku la rdzogs pa la// bskul ba'i dbyangs 'di blang bar bya/ bi shigs
73a4: rdo rje gar gyi bdag/ rdo rje gsang ba'i gshin rje ste// phrin las rgyal po grub pa'i las// oM dang oM dang hU~M zhes pa// oM ni dpral ba'i steng du dmigs// oM ni l+le yi steng du la// hU~M ni thugs kha nyid du'o// de las
73a5: 'od zer rab spros te/ / bdag lus nam mkha' lta bur gyur// phaT ces bya bar pa brjod pas// 'jig rten khams rnams 'od kyis khebs// de nyid sreg pa ma yin te// yid kyi ye shes ma 'bar ba// gcig gi
73a6: stong nyid gang yin pa/ / kun gyi stong pa de yin no// ji ltar mkha' la chen snang ba// nam mkha' nyid las byung ba ltar// sngags kyi 'gro 'du btang ba yang // sems las byung ba rnam mkha' la// rnam shes stong
73a7: pa'i ngang la 'du/ bdag nyid chos kyi skur bsgoms la// zhe sdang 'phro 'du mang byas la// bskyed pa'i sngags 'di drag tu bzlas// oM ma hA dang stod ka be ra a ra ne tsa na ka ta khe che ge mo la dus zhes pa dang / sngags gong
73a8: nas 'byung ba dang spel te las byas nag don mi za ba'o zhes gshin rje khro bo'i rgyal po so gsungs so/ / 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las klu mthar byed kyis gnan pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste/

73b1: bcug cig pa'o// // de nas yang khro bo chen po gshin rjeg shed kyis// thar byed 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las las byung ngo // ya ma mthar byed phrin las ni// dkyil la
73b2: snga ma 'dra bar dmigs/ / bzlas pa'i snying po 'di yang br-i/ ya ste 'byung byed k+She yis sreg/ ya ni yang dag tsa ni skems// ni zhes pa ni khug shig pa'o// ra zhes bya ba bskal ba la// ma las sbyad byed slar
73b3: sdud pa'o/ / bdag nyid ya ma mthar byed skra// sku mdog ldang nagazhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// skul thod pa phyed tshal brgyan// dbu yi skra ni kham nag la// ral pa gyen du 'khyil pa ste// phyag g.yas chu sran
73b4: dbyug tho 'phyar/ / g.yon pa phyag na zhing tshon za ba'o// sku stod glang chen ko rlon la// sku smad stag gi sham thabs can// dur khrod me dbus bzhugs pa la// yum yang de dang 'dra bar bsgom// bzlas pa'i ting 'dzin
73b5: me 'dra la/ bzlas brjod rlung 'dra g.yo zhing bskyod// lce la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// steng du bzlas pa'i snying po dgod// tha ma dbyangs dang bcas pa la// triSh+Ti sngags kyi phreng ba gdags// phar 'phros rnam shes 'gug
73b6: par bsam/ / tshur bsdus gshin rje nyid la thim// 'phro 'du bzlas pa de dag kun// gong du bshad pa dag la yang // de dag rab tu sbyar zhes bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i khro bos bskul ba 'di
73b7: gsungs so/ / oM ya ma las kun 'jigs par byed pa ni// thams cad dbang sdud ya mthar byed sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ldang // zhabs gnyis dor thabs klu rgyal gnon// sku la sbrul nag
73b8: stong gis brgyan pa ni/ / bgegs rnams 'dul zhing rtag tu 'chi bar mdzad// sku la thod pa'i phye tshal brgyan pa ni// 'gro ba thugs rje phyogs gcig dgongs pa'i rtags// dab sla ral pa gyen du 'khyil ba ni//

74a1: srid gsum ma lus dbang du sdud pa'i rtags// phyag g.yas chu srin dbyug to bsnams pa ni// dgra bgegs 'jigs pa che las sgrol ba'i rtags// g.yon pa zhing dbyug phyag na bsdams pa ni//
74a2: thugs rjes sems can mya ngan lam la 'jog/ ko rlon g.yang gzhis sku la brgyan pa ni// dug lnga ma spangs gnas su dag pa'i rtags// stag gi g.yang gzhis sku la brgyan pa ni// dug gsum gnas
74a3: bsgral nas chos kyi sku/ / skye med dang la g.yo bskyod mi mnga' yang // zhe sdang phrin las bya ba'i dus la bab// oM hriSh+Ti ya ma ra tsa sarba ma ra ya nan dza sa ma ya// zhes brjod cing zhe sdang dang ldan par ting nge
74a4: 'dzin gyis bzlas pa dang sbyar te las byas na gdon mi za'o/ / de dag ni 'di 'os pa tsam gyis ma yin te// yang da de yang du dris par byas la nan tan gyi ma byas na 'phral du phra mo tsam gyis 'grub pa ma
74a5: yin no/ / // 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las ya ma mthar byed kyis gnan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang las phran tshegs bsgrub pa 'di nyid sku dang
74a6: gsung thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung ngo / / zla ba 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la// pad ma 'am 'khor lo gang yang rung // yang na rin chen dra ba la// dra mig rnams ni 'dug par gnas// rin chen
74a7: phur bu nang du bltas/ / de ru bri 'am gzugs par bya// tha ma sbrul gyi zhags pas bskor// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// khru gang thur du bskos byas la// ga 'u kha sbyar nang du ni// yungs
74a8: dkar blugs la bzlas pa bya/ / rtags la ma yengs 'phro 'du yis// rgyun mi 'chad par bsgrub par bya// oM badz+ra ka la da du kha la/ bra ma rtan hUM phaT/ sle kha sle kha phaT phaT ces bzlas la// bdag

74b1: nyid ya man ta kar bsgoms la/ / sngags 'di nus tshad du bzlas na 'grub des so// yungs dkar rgyal po bsgrub pa'o// de nas 'khor khro bo la sogs pas/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la 'di
74b2: skad ces gsol to/ / e ma'o dbyings las byung ba dang / mkha' la rgyu dngas la dbang ba gsum gyis bskul ba'i dbyangs 'di bdag cag len lags so// ye shes mkha' ldan ma mo'i depal/ gzi
74b3: brjid 'bar ba'i phrin las can/ / dpal gyi phyag brnyan rag ta'i dri snom ma// ma mo khyod ni kun gyi gtsom dpag tshad brgyad khrir rgyug/ bud med lus la 'jigs byed tshul 'chang ba// kha nas me
74b4: 'bar rgya mtsho'i ting nas skems/ / mig nas zhog 'dzag ri rab thal bar brlog/ skad cig tsam la steng khams dbang du sdud// 'jig rten lha chen brgyad kyang 'dar yang yod// che ge mo zhig dbang du sdud
74b5: par byed/ / bud med gzugs can dus la bab// che ge mo oM tra ga rag sha triSh+NI ya ma ma ma na na/ zhes bskul ba ni dbyings kyi ma mo'o nam mkha'i gting dpag yangs la gnas bcas shing // bar snang khams la
74b6: rgyu ba'i tshogs/ / khams gsum thams cad dbang du sdud// lcags kyi bya khra lta bu ni// ma mo rnams kyi mchog kyang yin// kha 'bar stong gi gtso mo ste// 'jigs med rnams kyi dbang byed ma// srid gsum dbang
74b7: du sdud pa mo/ / gzigs pa'i go 'phang nam mkha' 'dra// gshegs shing bzhugs pa klog pas mgyogs// g.yas kyi gshog pa brdabs pa yis// bdud dang srin po rdul du klog/ g.yon gyi gshog pa
74b8: brdabs pa yis/ / dgra bgegs 'byung po dbang du sdud// dam tshig can gyi dus la bab// oM mar trag rag sha tri yo ya ma ra tsa ka ka ru pa triSh+Ti dza/ zhes bskul ba ni/ mkha' lding gi tshogs so// ya man ste grub pa

75a1: la la lag na rgyu zhags 'chang / / la la lag na thod phreng 'dzin// la la zhing chud ba su 'dren// la la me khyer rgya mtsho skams// la la 'gugs byad nyams pa 'dzin// la la sbrul nag zhags pa 'dzin// la la pho
75a2: nya'agugs shing 'dren/ / sngags pas bos shing gdungs pa'i tshe// dam tshig dus la bab po sa ma ya// sdang bar sems pa'i snying nas drongs// brtse ba'i tshogs kyis dus la bab// oM ka ta traka rag sha rad na ka la
75a3: triSh+Ti swA hA/ / zhes spyan dang zhing bskul ba ni// gter bdag gi tshogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po las bzhi 'khor lo 'di/ dus phyi ma la rnal
75a4: 'byor pa gang zhig bsgrub pa'i las byed na/ da yang thugs dam las mi g.yel la/ 'khor khro bo dang / khro mo la sogs pas kyang / nga'i thugs dam rjes su bsgrub par mdzad pas/ dus tha mal dam pa'i chos
75a5: 'di rnal 'byor pa'i sku la bsngo ba la sogs pa la dam tshig 'byung bar zhal gyis bzhes so/ / de nas 'khor rnams bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rjes/ dus tha ma la 'byung bar zhal gyis bzhes pa
75a6: la dga' nas yid ra ngos te/ mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las mjug bskul ba dang gnad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor
75a7: logs rab chen po rtsa ba'i rgyud/ / rdzogs s+ho// // de nas 'khor khro bo dang khro mo la sogs pa rnams kyis// ngag 'thun pas bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o bcom
75a8: ldan khro rgyal gtso/ / las bzhi 'khor lo'i rgyud 'di la// ngo mtshar rmad byung bstan pa la// bdag cag the tshom 'tshal ba rnams// bder gshegs gsung gi ngo bo yis// zhu ba'i dmigs rnams bshad du

75b1: gsol/ / 'phags pa zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// las bzhi zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// 'khor lo zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// gsang ba zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// rgyud ces bgyi ba ji ltar lags// rnam dag
75b2: dbyings las bzhengs nas ni/ / zhu ba'i dmigs rnams bshad par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo gzhan la gdug par mdzad pa yis// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis gsum phyung ste// 'di skad 'khor la
75b3: bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi 'khor rnams zhu ba yi// dmigs rnams zhu ba rab tu legs// 'phags pa zhes su bstan pa ni// gdug pa ma lus kun las 'phags// ye shes sems dpa' 'byung ba'i gzhi/ dpe
75b4: yis de la bskrun du med/ / las bzhi zhes su grags pa yang // de la las ni rnam pa gnyis// thabs dang shes rab 'dul dbang dang // sku gsum phrin las 'dul ba ste// thabs dang thabs su 'brel ba la// shes
75b5: rab 'brel bas yum zhes bya/ / chos dang longs spyod pa yi sku// 'dul dbang las zhes bya bar grags// de la bzhi zhes bya ba yang // zhi ba rgyas pa dbang mngon no// zhi ba bya ba'i des tshig kyang // ting 'dzin rim pa
75b6: byams pa la/ / 'phre 'du dkar la mtsher ba ste// thams cad mgu bar byed pa dang // mi mthun pa rnams zhi bya'i phyir// de phyir zhi ba zhes bya'o// rgyas pa gser ltar ser ba la// ting 'dzin sprul pa mang por khyab//
75b7: phyogs bcur 'gro ba'i don byas te// bskul ba'i sa la gzhes pa yi// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs te// bdag gi ba spu'i bu ga nas// kun tu zhugs te rgyas pa la// tshe dang dbang thang dpal la sogs// thams cad rgyas pas
75b8: rgyas zhes bya/ / de la dbang gi nges tshig kyang // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad nas// bdag gi yid la bsams pa kun// yab yum sprul pa'i khyad par las// ci 'dod thams cad dbang du sdud// las dang bya

76a1: pa ma lus dang / bdag nyid lha yi skar bsgoms pas// 'du bar 'gyur ba gdon miza// de la drag po'i phrin las kyang // gshin rjegashed dang gshed bdag mo// yab yum khyad par smin lta bu// nam mkha'/
76a2: khebs pa byed pa lta// gnyis med byang chub khyad par las// 'phro 'du 'od zer sprin lta bu// nam mkha' gang bar khyab pa la// khro bo'i sprul pas khebs gyur te// 'jig rten rdul du bshig nas ni// gdug pa
76a3: ma lus kun btul te/ / slar bsdus yab yum sku la sdu// de ltar nas dang yungs 'bru tsam// ma lus kun du 'gengs byed cing // dmigs pa gang na gnas pa dag/ btsal te slar yang 'gugs la sogs//
76a4: 'di dang 'di zhes bya med par// 'khor ba tshang nas sprugs bsams te// drag po'i phrin las grub par bsam// // 'khor lo zhes su bstan pa yang // mi 'khor 'khor phyir rtse mo 'phro// lte ba 'khor
76a5: la rtse mos gcod/ / de phyir 'khor lo zhes su grags// gsang ba zhes su grags pa yang // kun la mi bstan rtsa ba ste// thun mong kun gyi ma yin pas// de phyir gsang ba zhes bya'o// de la rgyud ces bya ba yang // /
76a6: tshad zhing 'brel bas btags pa dang // bred chags dgos pa sgrub pa yi// de phyir rgyud ces bya bar bshad// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// nyi ma bzhi la las bzhi zhig/
76a7: gsungs shing nges par bston pa ste// dngos po ci la bsgom par bgyi// zhi ba la ni ji ltar bgyi// sngags rnams ji ltar bzlas par bgyi// phrin las nges par bstan pa ste// rgyas pa dag la ji ltar bstan//
76a8: sngags rnams brjod pa ji lta bu// dbang la ji ltar bsgom par bgyi// sngags rnams brjod pa ji lta bu// drag po'i las su bstan pa la// lha ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi// bzlas pa'i sngags rnams ji ltar lag/

76b1: phrin las rnam bzhir bstan pa des// las ni ji lta bu zhig 'grub// gzhi 'am gnas ni ji lta bu// de dag ji lta bu yis bri// nges par bstan pa'i man ngag la// bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol// den mo ldan bro 'as
76b2: des/ gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// gang bsgom lha rnams sku mdog dkar// yum yang de dang 'dra ba la// phyogs bcu'i 'khor rnams rigs dang sbyar// bdag nyid ya man ta ka ru// sku mdog gsal bar
76b3: bsgoms nas ni/ / bzlas pa'i sngags 'di mgu bas bzlas// / ya ma ra tsa sa to me ya/ che ge mo ba lu ka shan tid ku ru swA hA// ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ che ge mo k+Sha ra tsa shan ting ku ru swA hA// ya ta yo nir
76b4: ya k+She ya/ che ge mo ba la mu sti shan ting ku ru swA hA// ya k+Sha ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ che ge mo ma ra ya shan ting ku ru swA hA// mi drag mi bul mi zhan par// ting 'dzin sbyor ba ldan byas ste// nyi ma re le rim bzhin sbyar/
76b5: grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za'o// phrin las nges par grub pa ste// bsgom par bya ba sku mdog ser// yum yang de dang 'dra ba la// phyi ma'i rims bzhin sbyar bar bya// gser lta bu yi ting 'dzin la// 'phro 'du//
76b6: byang chub sems lta bu// phyogs bcu ma lus don byas te// bdag gi phung po ma lus dang // tshe dang longs spyod 'phel bar bsam// de tshe sngags 'di bzlas par bya// ya ma ra tsa sa to ma ya// che ge mo bram
76b7: ya/ / bus ting ku ru srA hA// ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ che ge mo ka k+Sha bus ting ku ru srA hA// ya ta yo na re yak+She ya/ che ge mo zhigs sti bus ting ku ru swA hA// yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya// che ge me zhig ma ra ya bus
76b8: ting ku ru sra hA/ / de tshe rang rig ting 'dzin gyis// mthu dang ldan par byas te ni// sngags de bzlas pa byas na ni// 'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med// thams cad dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// lha yang sku mdog

77a1: zangs lta bu/ yum yang de dang 'dra bar bsgom// lha rnams gzhung bzhin skyed pa ni// mthar byed 'byung ba'i bzlas pa'o// ya mar cas tom la// che ga ma hA hUM ba shang ku ru swA hA// ya ma tonan ma
77a2: taya/ che ge mo hu~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA// ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya// che ge mo hu~Mt+ta phaT phaT/ ka la ru byA swA hA/ yak+She ya tsa nI ra ma ya che ge mo hu~M hU~M phaT phaT/ ka la ru ba huM hUM phaT phaT// / sngags kyi bzlas pa byas
77a3: nami/ bla med sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // 'du zhes gsungs te gdon mi za'o// lha ni sgra mdog lcags lta bu// mthing ka rab tu khros pa la// gcer bu ral pa gcig ste 'jigs// ma drangs 'dul ba bsgom
77a4: nas ni/ bzlas pa 'di ni drag tu bzlas// ya ma ra tsa sa to me ya che ge mo a mu kham pra ma ya ni hu~M phaT/ ya ma to run yo ta ya/ che ge mo a mu kha~M mur tsa ya hUM phaT/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya che ga a mu khaM rag ta
77a5: tsar hu~M phaT/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya che ge mo a mu khaM ma ra ya hUM phaT// bdag nyid 'jigs byed skur bsgoms la// sngags kyi phreng bas phog 'gyur na// mngon shes ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / 'chi bar 'gyur bar
77a6: gdon mi za/ / zhi ba'i dus su bzlas pa yis// dang pos sems ni g.yos par 'gyur// gnyis pas yid la 'byung bar 'gyur// gsum pas dkar po'i ngo bo dang // bzhi pas thams cad zhi bar 'gyur//
77a7: rgyas pa'i dus su bzlas pa yin// dang pos dpal yang 'phel bar byed// gnyis pas dbang thang skyed par byed// gsum pas gzi byin rnyed 'gyur te// bzhi pas tshe ring ma lus rgyas par 'gyur// dbang gi dus su
77a8: bzlas pa yis/ / dang pos sems kyang g.yos par byed// gnyis pas 'jug par nus pa ste// gsum pas dmigs pa dbang du 'dra// bzhi pas thams cad dbang du 'du'o// drag po'i bzlas pa byas pa yis//

77b1: dang pos mgo ni 'khor bar byed// gnyis pas yid 'khrugs gsum pas khrag tu skyug/ bzhi pas gdon mi za ba'o// bzhi'am gnas su bstan pa ni// bcu gnyis 'khor lo rtsibs can de// yi dgas kyi ni gos labri//
77b2: zhi ba pad ma zla ba la/ rgyas pa glang po'i rgyab tu bya// dbang ni bud med snying khar te// dgug pa seng ge dre'u dang gnyis// dbye brta dang ma he gnyis// smyo 'phog sha ba'i rgyab tu bya// lkug pa lug gi khong du gzhug/ bskrad pa
77b3: rnga mo'i rgyab tu bya/ / gsang ba skyes pa'i snying kha ste// gnan pa ri rab 'og tu bya// snag tsha'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yang // khrag sna gsum dang byi la'i gcin// pho rog dag gi sgro rtsa la// shrI ba'i sgral bir byas
77b4: la/ gang brtsams grub par nges par bshad// // de nas bcom ldan 'das brtsam pa'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin mchog de la 'di skad ces gsol to// nges par bstan pa'i rgyud 'di la// khro bo'i zlas
77b5: pa ji ltar lags/ / yum gyi bzlas pa ji ltar lags// ma mo'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags// khro bo'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags// // zhe sdang 'joms mdzad khro bo des// gsung ni 'di skad bka'
77b6: stsal to/ / bro bo yab yum lce la gzhag/ ma mo sngags kyi mthu byin che// khro bo mang po 'od 'phro ba'o// de yi bzlas pa 'di dag go// oM a kro ti ka ya man ta ka ka la ru pa pa tsa te ni hU~M phaT/ oM a~M hUM pe ta li/
77b7: rag sha man// oM rog mdun b+h+yo// tsa mun ta kyi kyi ma b+h+yo// nam grum pa ya ti b+h+yo// oM o oM/ kro ta badz+ra pa sI/ badz+ra kro ta ma la/ badz+ra kro ta tiswa/ badz+ra kro ta kang ka badz+ra kro ta tigags co ga pa co ni
77b8: badz+ra kroHkun d+ha la~M/ badz+ra krota krita/ badz+ra lo ka / badz+ra ba swi/ badz+ra shul/ badz+ra ku lan/ badz+ra kang ka/ badz+ra mu la/ badz+ra sri ta/ badz+ra ba mu/ badz+ra shul/ badz+ra swar/ kr-i c-i nr-i kr-i hrauMtsa~M/

78a1: u0f7fd+ha ba ho b+h+yad+ha// da nas yang bcom ldan 'dus 'dam dpal la shes sems dbul laba'i rgyal bdal 'din mas gas pa // des par bstan pa'i rgyu ga
78a2: zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags/ / yungs dkar bsgrub pa ji ltar lags// de yis las ni ci zhig 'grub// phur bu zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// dang po dam bca' ji ltar lags// bcom ldan khro bo'i rgyal po la/ de/
78a3: skad ces ni zhus pa dang // gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// tshe zhes bya ba'i don 'di yang // chos nyid spros pa med pa la// kun du mi 'gyur nam mkha' 'dra// bskyod med du kyi gshig tu med// 'gro ba 'khrul
78a4: pa'i ngo gang la/ / bag chags ngan pas bslus pa yis// tshel bar chod 'ong bar gsungs// de phyir tshe yi bsgrub pa gsungs// // yungs dkar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang // bag chags 'khrul pas gnod 'gyur
78a5: gami mthun pa dang gnyen po ste/ / de dag 'dul ba'i don du bstan// de ni las kyi 'bras bu yang // sngon nas las ngan mthu rtags te// mi mthun pa de 'gugs par byed// de nas yungs dkar rgyal pos bya'o// phur
78a6: bu zhes su bstan pa yang / / bdag nyid khro bo chen po ste// gnyis med mkha' la gnas bsams te// phur bu zhes ni de la bya'o// phyogs bcu'i thugs las skyes pa ste/ de phyir phur bu zhes su bstan// dang por dam bcas 'di
78a7: ltar ro/ / lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// mtshams med lnga ni kun spyod cing // gos ngan re ba gon pa dang // zas ngan gcibaza pa'i tshe// da tshe de yi bskrun pa 'byung // dus ngan tha ma byung ba'i tshe// lha mo'i nang na 'od zer can/ 'pham
78a8: pa'i nang na 'jam dpal gnyis/ / 'di gnyis ma gtogs dngos grub gzhan// rigs 'dzin kun la ma yin no// khro bo'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// nges par dbang du ma gyur pa'i// dang po 'das dang da ltar gyi/ phyis

78b1: 'byung ba ni gang yang med/ / dgrapa gegs 'brum mam stong yang rung // de ma thag tu brlag par byed// khrag gi char yang 'phebs par byed/ ces gsungs pas 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams da ma da de/ ga po'i phrin la
78b2: grub par gyur to/ / de nas 'khor rnams kyis// 'jam dpal khro bo gshin rjegashed po la 'di skad ces bstod do// 'phags pa khro bo 'jam dpal gshin rjeg shed// chos sku byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las// tshad
78b3: med bzhi yi rang nyid rnam dag pas/ / bdag nyid khro bo 'bar ba'i sku ston cing // tshangs pa brgya byin lha chen drag po rnams// gnyis med byang chub sems kyis sgrol bar mdzad// ma he'i steng na zhabs ni brkyang bskum gnas
78b4: las kyi dbyug pa dag gis rdul du glog/ klu yi rgyal pos sku la brgyan pa ni// snyan cha mgur dang dbu dang phyag zhabs rnams// yan lag lnga la nges par dkris te gnas// dbus skra kham nag ral pa gyen du 'bar//
78b5: spyan gsum gnyis med rnam thar don la gzigs// mgo bcad phreng bas dbu yi rgyan du byas// ljags dang mche ba glog ltar 'dril zhing 'bar// 'jigs byed drag po'i zhal spyan rab tu bskrad// mi lpags rlon pa
78b6: dag gis stod g.yogs shing / / stag lpags rlon pas sku yi rgyan du byas// de 'dra'i sku mdog 'bar ba'i cha lugs 'chang // ngo mtshar rmad byung che la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes stong nas gnyis su med par gyur to//
78b7: 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las// le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// // 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsad pa'i rgyud las// rgyud phyi ma rim par bkod pa rdzogs s+ho// /
78b8: 6/ rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta bud tri bran gu rgyab no shi a shad da ma bi na sa ma ta tan tra nA ma// bod skad du// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa gsang pa rta mchog rol pa'i

79a1: rgyud chen po zhes byab dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde bachen po phyogs bcu dang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ma lus dI
79a2: 'byung gnas/ sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje gsang pa gzhan las khyad par 'gyur ba mtshan dang da byang dran su ma tshogs pas rnas / bkod pargyan gyid dkyil 'khor ldan po rtags shing yon tan ri
79a3: po che'i 'byung gnas snga tshogs rnam par snang ba'i ra bo/ zab pa dang rgya che ba'i ldan gsas gsal bur byed nga sa shes kyi tshogs kyis chos ma lus pa mthar phyin pa/ kun du zin las rtsa cher 'phrul
79a4: 'i bdag nyid/ / dpal bde byed pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug chags pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin brnyes pa med pa'i chos nyid kyis thams cad la dbang bskur ba de nyid/ lha thams cad 'du ba'i gnas gzhal yas khang
79a5: bar du gyur pa/ 'og min rdo rje lhun po'i gnas ye shes kyi snang ba rin po che sna tshogs ni 'od 'bar ba'i khang bzangs/ 'dod pa'i yon tan gzugs sdug pa sna tshogs dang dri zhim pa sna tshogs dang ro bro ba sna tshogs
79a6: dang rig bya 'jam pa sna tshogs dang chos kyi bde ba bskyed pa sna tshogs phyogs bcur 'gro zhing 'phrig pa rtse mo mtho zhing khyams kyi rnam par phye bar sgo bzhi ni khang dang bcas par bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe bde bar gshes
79a7: pa'i rol pa chen po kun tu snang ba dang / 'od kyi dpal dang / dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang // cho 'phrul bkod pa dang / rnam par gzigs dang / mi bskyod rdo rje dang / mngon par snang ba dang / brtan pa'i dbang phyug dang / 'brug
79a8: sgra dang / dri ma med pa dang / rin chen phung po dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / rin chen dra ba dang dkon mchog mtshan dang / rin chen rtog dang / 'od zer snang ba dang / tshe mtha' yas dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / chags

79b1: pa med pa'i 'od dang / dga' ba'i spyan dang / don thams cad yod pa dang / brtson 'grus shugs can dang / las chen 'phrul las dang / gnod sbyin 'dul ba dang / sna tshogs dbang phyug go// gzhan yang byang chub
79b2: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba'i blo gros dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs dang / gzi brjid bkod pa dang / 'khor lo rnon po dang / shes snang ba dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / 'od zer 'phro ba dang / drag shul can
79b3: dang / dri ma sems dpa' dang / sgyu ma'i sprul pa dang / rin chen rgyal ba dang / dra ba can dang / lag bzangs dang / gser 'od 'phro ba dang / rin chen snyem dang / chos kyi mthong ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / mun pa sel ba
79b4: dang / dga' ba'i dbyangs dang / gzhon nu rin chen dang / rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang / gar mkhan dang / bro'i rgya mtsho dang / thogs med bkod pa dang / pad ma dga' ba dang / sa li dbang phyug dang / rin chen spang
79b5: ba dang / sprin gyi phreng ba dang / yid 'ong me tog dang / ye shes sgron ma dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / kha lo sgyur ba dang / dran pa'i dbang phyug dang / pad ma'i blo gros dang / las byed pa'i stobs dang / snying po blo gros
79b6: rnams so/ / de dag kun kyang rang rang gi btsun mo'i tshogs dang 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// gzhan yang pad ma 'phro ba dang / pad ma 'dzin pa dang / pad ma sgrogs pa dang / pad ma
79b7: bskyod pa dang / pad mchi ma byed dang / pad ma 'thor ba dang / pad ma snang ba dang / pad ma dbang byed rnams kyang rang rang gi phrin las kyis bkod do// gzhan yang 'jigs byed chen po byams pa'i dbang phyug/
79b8: brtse ba'i bang drug dang / bdagrol dbang phyug dang / grol ba'i dbang phyug dang / sbyin pa'i dbang phyug dang / spyod pa'i dbang phyug dang / smra ba'i dbang phyug dang / 'thun pa'i dbang phyug kyang rang rang gi rig pa bcas pas

80a1: 'khod do/ de dag la sogs pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnam par 'byed pa dang / 'byed pa med par snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang thabs gcig tu thug go/ nas
80a2: bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po pad ma chags pa'i spyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/ thugs kha'i dpal be'u la sogs pa'i gnas rnams nas// 'od zer gyis dkyil 'khor gsal bar
80a3: byed pa bkye bas/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gsal bar byas pa dang / ya mtshan gyi ltas chen po bcwa brgyad 'byung bar gyur to// de nas snod dang bcud du bcas pa'i gsal zhing 'bar bar gyur nas//
80a4: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs dam bskul te// de dag gis kyang cho 'phrul rnam par 'khod pa zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen pos rang gis 'khor lo'i khyams dag tu spro bar byed mdzad do//
80a5: des yang zhing khams rnam par sbyong zhing slar 'bor gyi podang bcas pa 'od zer 'phro ba'i gnas su 'dus so// de ltar 'chad pa'i rgya chen po'i rnam par rol 'phrul pas rol zhing zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas par gyur nas
80a6: bzhugs pa las 'khor thams cad kyis the tshom skyes par gyur to/ / de'i dus na 'thun par gleng pa ni// kye ma ho ya mtshan sna tshogs chos// rgyal ba'i mdzad pa ya mtshan che// tshe 'brul dpag med gyur pa yi//
80a7: dgongs pa'i don nyid ji lta bu// rgyu rkyen med par sangs rgyas ni// gsang gsum dam tshig sgro mi mdzad// de yi mtshan nyid yang snang ba// gsang ba'i dbang po bskur bar mdzod// khyed ni rgyal ba kun gyi sras// dgod
80a8: don rgya mtsho don mda' ba/ / bka' yi bdag po dgongs mdzod dag/ legs par zhu zhing gsol gdab mdzod// de nas gsang pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes lnga brgya dang bcas pas gzhan dag gi the tshom rnam par//

80b1: gcod pa dang rang nyid kyi sgo gsal bar bya ba'i phyir mdun rol nas langs te/ phyogs bcu nas 'khod nas mchod pa'i tshogs rgya chen po bkod cing rgyal ba kun la mchod de/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bskor ba byas shing //
80b2: rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag 'tshal nas/ dga' ba'i bzhin gyis gsol ba btab pa// e ma rgyal ba nyid kyi sku// rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor dag/ ting 'dzin ye shes gnas las byung // dga' mdzad
80b3: dkyil 'khor 'dus pa dang / / byang chub sems sprin char chen gyis// nyon mongs la sogs skyong mdzad cing // thugs rje chen po ye shes kyis// tshogs pa'i 'bras bu legs smin mdzad// sku mdangs dga' ba'i
80b4: bzhin bcas pas/ / gsal ba'i theg pa bstan du gsol// khyod kyi dgongs don gtid dpag dka'// zab cing phral rgya che bas// 'khor rnams the tshom ri bos non// thugs rje che mnga' gsal bar mdzod// 'di dag
80b5: thams cad bstan pa'i snod/ / mgon po btang snyoms lhun mnga' mdzad// dus 'dir rtsom padon che ste// smon lam 'bras bu mthar phyin mdzod// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa
80b6: de nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i brtan g.yo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad thugs mnyam pa nyid rtse gcig gi sgo nas gzigs so/ / rnam par gzigs kun tu gzigs/ de ltar dgongs nas dkyil 'khor
80b7: 'di dag thams cad smra bas pa las 'das par sna tshogs rnam par smros shig/ de nyid dngos po dang bar gzigs nas// gzigs pa'i mtha' dang / dgongs pa'i mtha' dang / mdzad pa'i mtha' kun la snyoms
80b8: pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bkod pa dang / rnam par bkod pa dang / rnam par bshad pa dang / dgongs pa dang / rnam par dgongs pa dang / rol pa dang / rol pa chen po dang / mdzad pa dang / sna tshogs

81a1: mdzad pas kun du spros par mi byed de/ / 'jig rten drug gi rnam par bsdus pa'i stong gsum gyi dngos po 'di dag/ sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'di las gzhan du snang bar mi dgongs so// de'i
81a2: dus dang sa dang sa'i khyad par dang / dkyil 'khor bkod pa dag kyang rnam par mi gzigs// kun tu mi gzigs shing dgongs pa yang mi 'gog go// de dag ni mthar yang mi gnas shing nam mkha' lta bur
81a3: bzhugs so/ / de nas ting nge 'dzin de la bzhugs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bur rtogs par 'gyur ro// de nas yang
81a4: gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi sgo nas bskal zhing gzhan dag gi don thugs g.yo bar mdzad pa'i glus g.yo slong bar mdzad de/ tshul ban don gyi rgyal po che// 'dren pa kun gyi rgyud nyid phra/
81a5: nam mkha' lta bu'i rgyud nyid pas// nam mkha' lta bu'i dkyil 'khor nas// thugs rje chen po'i ya mtshan ston// kye ma'o mgon po don kun gnas/ zhi ba'i las dam 'jug byed pa// byang sems thugs rje'i
81a6: rlan bral lam/ / rdos can chos dang 'grang 'gyur cing / zhes gsol ba btab ba l+la kyang ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas yang yum gzi ldan pad mo zhes bya bas rnam par mi rtogs pa'i
81a7: ting nge 'dzin las slong ba'i glus skul bar mdzad de/ / mi dmigs ting 'dzin bsam 'das brjod dang bral// bde ba chen po ye shes byang chub sems/ mi dmigs thugs rje mi 'da' dam tshig gis// rol pa'i
81a8: chotshe 'phrul rgya chen bstan du gsol/ / de skad ces yang bskul ba'i rjes// mgon po'i gnas rnams la dgongs nas// 'od zer rnams bkod 'dzum mdzad de// 'khor ba legs sbyin skabs dbye mdzad/ legs

81b1: legs so rdo rje can/ / pad mo 'dzin pa'i grogs bcas pas// yang yang bskul bar mdzad pas na// gtang zhing bstan par mdzad pa la// dga' ba'i spyan rjes dang par gyis// gang 'dod rtogs bzhi par mdzod// ma 'ongs rtog
81b2: pa mtha' dag rnams/ / thugs rje shugs kyis bzung mdzad de// don kun khyab pa'i snang ba yis// gzung bar bya ba'i skabs dbye mdzad zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i
81b3: gsang ba'i rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las rnam par sprul pa'i le'u ste dang po'o/ / // de nas dga' zhing 'khor 'dus pas// dga' ba'i bzhin bzangs rgyas mdzad de// gtso bos ci ltar bka' stsal bzhin//
81b4: thugs rjes 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gzungs// de nas gzi ldan pad mo can// 'dzum mdangs rgyas pas bskul mdzad de// 'o byed 'khyud pa la sogs pa// dga' bzhin chags par rnam par 'gyur// e ma rig pa'i
81b5: rgyal po khyed/ / thugs rje chen po nyi 'od bzhin// thugs rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gzungs// phyogs ris med pas go 'byed pas// yul du gyur pa kun rgyud dgongs// mi dmigs tshe 'phrul nam mkha' las// bkod pa
81b6: rgya mtsho sprin phung bzhin/ / thugs rje sprul pa'i char chen pos// sna tshogs las brgyad dag par mdzod// de nas gtso bo rdo rje 'chang // ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs mdzad de// rang gis mtshan mes rab mdzes pas// rgyal po zil
81b7: gnon gzi brjid can/ / phyag gi 'khor lo rab bskor cing // phyogs rnams kun du gzigs mdzad de// mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings dag na// rdo rje sbrul sku mngon phyung nas// gzi ldan pad mo chen mo dang // rol gyi
81b8: tshul du bzhugs mdzad de/ / 'dzum mig chags pa'i bzhin dag gis// 'khor rnams slong ba'i sngags brjod do// oM A hUM ma hA b+ham+bi sha ku ru bi ni hr-i da ya oM b+ha ba ti oM la la ti/ gnyis su med pa'i byang sems kyis/ dkyil

82a1: 'khor sbyor zhing bsdu bar mdzod/ / bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs sku// rdo rje gar gyis rol mdzad cing // dga' mchog rdo rje byang chub sems// 'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i pad mo'i gnas// dkar mcher
82a2: dag pa'i rang bzhin te/ / dmar po dbang dang gnyis med par// gsal khyab kun du spros pa las// dkyil 'khor sprul pa mtha' yas 'thon// zhi 'gog mya ngan 'das pa dang // byang chub mgon gnas lam zhes dag/
82a3: gnyis med gnyis su sbyor mdzad cing // rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bkod// ngo mtshar sprul pa rnam par rol// brjid dang bcas pas gar mdzad cing // 'dzum par mdzad dang rol pa dang // kun du 'gying dang spyan
82a4: mdzes bltam/ smin ring bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang // rdo rje phur pas g.ya' bas slong // 'dor zhing sku ma dang 'jog ldeg dang / rnam par rol pa'i gar gyis kyang / rigs kyi phrin las sna tshogs sprul// nam mkha' kun tu
82a5: khyab par mdzad/ / rnam par rol pa'i pade 'byung bar// byang chub sems sogs zhi zhing gsal// rol pa'i char nyid mngon bab pas// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// brtan dang g.yo ba ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas zhing
82a6: khams dag byas nas/ / byang chub sems tshegs rol pa las// brdeg dang 'khyud dang sdom pa las// sbyor dang bstim dang mnyes pa dang // kun du rab dgyes ye shes thig/ sna tshogs snang ba nyi ma'i 'od// yang dag bde la
82a7: rab ga nus mdzod/ / de 'dus pa'i tshe tshogs pa'o// phyogs bcu kun nas bzhengs mdzad de// thabs dang shes rab byin brlabs pa'i// byang sems rnam dag rgyun gyis mchod// rnga dang sil snyan sgra sgrogs shing // dbang po chem
82a8: pa'i ro rtsed dang / / gar dbyangs glu drug sna tshogs kun// stong gsum gang bar srung byas te// bcom ldan pad mo bde 'ang bde// gzi ldan yum dang bcas par mchod// e ma 'dus pa'i tshegs dbus na// thugs rje che

82b1: mnga' nyi dkyil bzhin/ / 'khor lo kun sbyar sgrol mdzad pas// rang gi dkyil 'khor rgyas par mdzad// rdo rje 'chang ba'i gsol 'debs kyis// dkyil 'khor dag la lhun grub rdzogs// pad ma'i dpal ldan sems pa che/
82b2: phrin las ye shes gnas kun skyong // khyod zhabs bskyed pa thugs rje'i stobs// khams gsum ma lus dag pa yi// de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mchog/ mgon po bka' drin mdzad pas legs// de skad gsol btab
82b3: dgyes par 'gyur/ / phyag rgya chen po'i gnas la bzhugs// de nas dga' ba'i byang chub sems// sngon gyi rgyud dang lam bzhi las// sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang // sngon gyi rgyud dang lam grogs rnams// dgongs
82b4: shing thugs rje'i ye shes thugs/ / rang bzhin gnas nas kun dgongs te// phyogs bzhi nas ni bskul bar mdzad// kye kye mchog gsum bde ba'i sku// byams pa'i thugs mnga' sku gsal mdzad// rdo rje rgyal po
82b5: byang chub sems/ / bdag dgongs 'gro ba'i don chen mdzad// kye kye yon tan rin chen tshogs// thugs rje mnyam nyid ye shes che// rgyal po 'khor lo byang chub nyid// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs sprul pa'i mdzod/ kye kye
82b6: rnam par dag pa'i sku/ / dga' ba rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i gnas// so so'i ye shes sna tshogs 'byed// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// kye kye 'gro ba'i don chen bdag/ btang snyoms mi 'dor sna tshogs dor// bya ba grub pa'i
82b7: ting 'dzin mchog/ phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag ston// rang dga'i skum pas g.yo mdzad de// phyogs bzhi byang chub dga' gnas 'jug/ kye ma'i 'gro rnams de bzhin nyid// byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul
82b8: las/ nyon mongs gzung 'dzin sgrib pa yis// rang gi mtha' lam 'gegs par byed// 'di dag thugs rje'i gnas su rung // ye shes gsal ba'i thabs mang pos// thams cad dus gcig bsgral byas nas/ rang

83a1: gi bde chen don ston mchog/ zhes gsungs pad ma'i rig pa 'dzin// sangs rgyas sras bcas dga' bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa gsang ba dpal
83a2: mchog rol pa'i rgyud las thugs rje sprul pa'i rol ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// rdo rje 'chang bstan las langs// bde gshegs bsngags pa brjod byed cing /
83a3: bskum pas dbyangs kyi gsol ba btab// kye ma ho mchog gsum dam tshig sku// ye shes bla na med pa'i bdag/ byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// rnam 'phrul thugs rje'i dus nyid pas// rigs kyi
83a4: 'khor lo dpag med sku/ / de ring bkra shis phun sum tshogs// thugs rje chen po yal 'dor na// ci phyir theg chen mchog tu sngags// yang dag zhus pa'i tshig gsan nas// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor gzigs
83a5: bar mdzad/ / mgon po'i pad ma'i sku de nyid// gzi ldan yum dang rol mdzad cing // dri med ye shes phyogs gzigs shing // gnyis med byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal// theg pa gsang chen cher
83a6: 'byung ba'i/ / lam 'di dpal ldan rol mo'i mchog/ sangs rgyas sras bcas bsdud mdzad de// gzhan 'phrul gnas tshogs g.yo mdzad cing // stong gsum 'di dag spyod mdzad cing // ting nge 'dzin la snyem
83a7: 'jug ste/ / sku las 'od zer spro bar mdzad// des khyab rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal// ye shes 'od mdangs sems dpa'i sku// gnas lngar gsang ba'i sngags kyis gzhug/ phyag rgya chen po yongs rdzogs su//
83a8: zhal gsum phyag drug dga' ba'i mdangs// dmar gsal pad ma ra ga'i mdangs// g.yas g.yon zhal gnyis sngo dang ser// rigs rgyan mtshan ma kun gyis mdzes// phyag na pad sdong bum pa dang // rdo rje rtse lnga

83b1: dpal be'u dang / / mtha' mas mda' gsor gzhu 'dzin pa'o// rin chen sna tshogs na bza' dang // phyag rgya'i yul bcas rol ba mdzad// gzhal yas khang pa sgo bzhi dang // rin chen sna tshogs rta bzas bcas//
83b2: dra badra byed mu tig phreng // ban da dril bu sogs kyis spras/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor cher 'phags pa'i// pho brang ka ba gdung rnams la// pad mo rdo rje sogs pas spras// 'dod pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs/ gnas
83b3: rnams kun du rin chen khri/ / pad ma 'khor lo nyi zlas mtshan// phyi rol par khyams 'khor ba dang // snod rnams kun du pad ma la// thabs dang shes rab bye brag gis// nyi ma zla brkyang ba'o// de nas pad mo rnam dag kun/
83b4: dbus kyi gdan la bzhugs mdzad de// dgyes pa'i gar dbyangs bskyod pa'i mthus// thabs dang shes rab rdzogs par mdzad// de tshe thugs mchog byang chub sems// mkha' klong rnam par dag pas na// rig
83b5: pa bde ba chen po'i sku/ / sna tshogs sna tshogs shar ba de// gsung nyid yi ge 'khor lo'i tshogs// 'bar ba 'od zer rtse lnga pa// cho ga'i yan lag rim bzhin du// thugs kyi mtshan ma dam tshig bya// sngags bcas
83b6: 'phro zhing 'du ba'i tshul/ / rgyal po bder gshegs yab yum dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems ma dang // las mdzad khro bo yab yum dang // phyag rgya chen po'i skur gyur nas// rigs kyi rgyal phreng mtshan mas
83b7: mdzes/ / rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs shing // rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod// de tshe mgon po bde chen po// rigs kun bdag 'gyur zhes bya bas// pad mo rnam par 'phrul pa yi// dkyil 'khor chen
83b8: po'i 'byin par mdzad/ / byang sems kaM las rnam 'phrul ba'i// bde shes 'od zer snang ba'i sku// zhal dang phyag la sogs pa'i brgyan// gtso bo'i cha lugs ci lta bar// rang 'od yum dang 'khril bar mdzod/ bkra

84a1: shis mtshan ldan bde ba la/ / rlag pard mo hUM zhes pas// sngags mchog yi ge 'bru brgyad de// las kun grub par mdzad pa yin// gang gi pad ma sha ri dang // b+hu d+ha hU~M gis bsnan byas na// zhi rgyas dbang drag
84a2: las kun dang / / grub chen brgyad kyi tshogs sog rnams// sbyor ba tsam gyis grub 'gyur zhi// yun rings gnas pa gnas pa yin// 'byin pa'i dus su gsang sngags la// yi ga dza yis gdags byas nas//
84a3: rnam 'phro rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor// rigs bdag sku gnas dgyes par bzhugs// thugs rje skul ba'i glu dang sngags// 'od zer tshogs kyis skul ba mdzod// dam tshig gsum ston sngags kyi mthus//
84a4: dgyes chags brtan pas gzi dang ldan// oM rnam dag pad mo bde ba'i dbyings// ye shes byin las gsal ba'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor gsang gsum dam tshig che// mnyam nyid rigs bdag thub pa che//
84a5: byin brlabs 'dor bar mi mdzad pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// gsal mdzad gnyis su med pa'i sku// rang gi ngo bos gnas pa yin// gtso bo sngags kyis bskul byas te// 'od zer rgyan
84a6: bcas thugs kar bsdus/ / yi ge a nas aH'i bar// bcu drug 'od zer 'phro byas pas// 'gro kun sangs rgyas skur bskod cing // rigs 'thun dkyil 'khor kun gsal 'gyur// sngags kyi sa 'od
84a7: zer skar bcas pas/ / chos rnams bcu drug dag pa'i dbyings// rang gi gnas su bkod byas pas// mtshan mchog sum bcu rtsa gnyis rdzogs// de bzhin ka nas k+Sha yi bar// sum bcu rtsa bzhi'i rim
84a8: bzhin gsal/ / brnyan pa'i yi ge drug dang bcas// 'od 'phros thams cad sangs rgyas sku// ye shes dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas// sngags kyi 'od zer sgrar bcas nas// chos mang ye shes zag pa

84b1: med/ slar nyid sku yi gnas bzhugs pas// dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu rdzogs// gzhan yang rin che sna bdun dang / bkra shis brgyad sogs kun gyis spras// kham las rnam 'phrul tshe mtha' yas// zhal
84b2: gcig phyag bzhi dkar dmar mdangs/ / pad ma segs dang ral gri 'dzin// chos kyi snang ba'i rgyan gyis bsgrubs// pad ma rgyan 'bring rang bzhin mchog/ shar gyis dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/
84b3: gaM las sprul pa'i chos dbang phyug/ dmar ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// pad ma'i phreng ba bum pa 'dzin// dkyil 'khor gnas su bzhugs pa'o// g+haM las sprul pa'i chags med 'os// zhal
84b4: gcig phyag gnyis byu ru'i 'od / / pad gnas glegs bam me long 'dzin// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o// da~M las sprul pa'i spyan dag ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rtsod kyi mdog/
84b5: rin chen phreng bas bsil yab 'dzin// byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o// tsaM las sprul pa'i mi bskyod pa// zhal gcig phyag bzhi chu shel mdog/ rdo rje dril 'dzin 'khril ba'i tshul// dpal
84b6: be'u bum sogs 'od phreng rgyan/ / tshe las sprul pa'i rta dbang phyug/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi bai dUr+ya// rin chen snye ma dung por 'dzin// lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// dza las sprul pa'i 'brug
84b7: sgra ni/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis gur gum mdog/ rin chen chags shing 'gu rje 'dzin// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// nya las sprul pa'i dri med dpal// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mar gang
84b8: mdog/ rin chen pa srungs za ma tog/ byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// ti las sprul pa'i rin chen dbyangs// zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog/ rin chen dril bu yum dang 'khril//

85a1: rin chen mdzod spungs 'khor lo sogs// tha las sprul ba'i nam mkha'i mdog/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi sngo skya'i mdangs// rin chen gling bu bang po 'dzin// shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs//
85a2: de las sprul pa'i dra ba car// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mthang ka' mdog/ rin chen phreng dang pad mo 'dzir// lho la dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// d+ha las sprul pa'i dkon mchog rgyur// zhal gcig phyag can
85a3: dpar skya'o mdangs/ / chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyud mangs 'dzin// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// naM las sprul pa'i rin chen tog/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi mar ta// dgos 'dod bum pa dpag bsam shing //
85a4: byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// Ti las sprul pa kun du snang // zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog/ 'khor lo dril 'dzin yum dang bum pa 'dzin// gtsug tor dri med rdo rje 'dzin// thaM las sprul pa'i
85a5: 'od kyi dpal/ / zhal gcig phyag bzhi shel gyi mdog/ 'khor lo dra ba ral gri 'dzin// shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// de las sprul pa'i dga' dbang phyug/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi nyi ma'i mdang gal po
85a6: lo rgyal mtshan dga' ba'i mdzod/ / lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// taM las sprul pa'i cho 'phrul bgod// zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs// nyi ma'i 'od phreng rdo rjes spras// nub kyi dkyil 'khor
85a7: gnas la bzhugs/ / naM las sprul pa'i rnam par gzigs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis ldang smai'i mdangs// ku sha'i chun po'i a mr-i mdangs// byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// ba las sprul pa'i don yod pa/
85a8: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang sngo'i mdog/ rgya gram dril bcas yum dang 'khril// rdo rje gdengs pos ral gri 'dzin// paM las sprul pa'i brtson 'grus 'khrugs// zhal gcig phyag bzhi kar ti ka/ rgya gram phreng ba rtsa gsu/

85b1: 'dzin/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// baM las sprul pa'i las chen po// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser skya'i mdog/ pad ma'i phreng ba nor bu 'dzin// lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// b+haM las
85b2: sprul pa'i gnod sbyin 'dul/ / zhal gcig phyag bzhi pad ma'i mdangs// phyagar rdo rje mche ba 'dzin// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// ma las sprul pa'i sna tshogs dam// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ldang sa
85b3: mdangs/ / zla ba rin chen dbyug pa 'dzin// byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// bder gshegs rgyal ba de dag kyang // rtsa kra bsgyur rgyal ma lus dang // mtshan dang dpe byad sna tshogs rgyan// rigs btsun
85b4: btsun mo mdzes par bya/ / yang sprul byams pa'i dbang phyug ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi gangs ri mdog/ rdo rje gdengs dbyug ral gri dang // dri shul thod bcas pad ma'i lcug/ rngam brjod 'khor bcas yum dang
85b5: 'khril/ drag po'i rgyan ra shar gyi sgo// khwa las sprul pa rtse ba'i dbang // zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog/ rin ren dbyug pa pad mo dang // thod rnga rdo rje myu gu'o// raM las sprul pa'i rnam grol dpa'// zhal
85b6: gcig phyag bzhi dmar mdangs gsal/ / pad ma dang ni dril bu dang // thod sbrul ras sngon pa dan 'dzin// laM las sprul pa'i 'gro dbang phyug/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi ldeng khu'i mdog/ rdo rje rgya gram pad mo dang / gri gug
85b7: gtur shing phreng ba can/ / rin ren phreng bas mdzes byas nas// 'khor bcas rngam pa'i mdangs bcas pas// lho la sogs pa'i sgo ban du// gzhan 'jig drag po'i las kyis 'khod// shi las sprul pa'i byin dbang phyug/ zhal
85b8: gcig phyag bzhi dkar dmar 'ong / / rtse gsum ban d+ha ran chen 'khril// me yi thod pa ri mos mtshan// ShaM las smra ba'i dbang phyug ste// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser skya'i mdangs// rin chen rtse dgu bgrang phreng dang / pad ma

86a1: lcug ma sdigs 'dzub mdzad/ / sa las sprul pa'i spyod dbang phyug/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs// dbyug pa rtse gcig pad ma dang // dgra sta zhags pa phyag na 'dzin// haM las sprul pa'i dbang phyug ste/
86a2: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang khu'i sku// ral gri lcags kyu dgra s+t+wa dang // me yi phreng ba 'khor lo 'dzin// gzhan 'joms 'jig pa'i khro bo'i mchog/ rang 'od rigs 'thun yum dang rol// drag po'i rgyan tshogs ma lus/
86a3: 'gengs/ pad ma'i 'dab ma bzhin du 'khor/ ka las bde ba'i blo gros dang // zhal gcig phyag bzhi nam mkha'i mdangs// yum bcas rdo rje dril bu dang // nam mkha'i mdzod kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang // kha las khang pa rgya
86a4: mtsho'i sgra dbyangs can/ / zhal gcig phyag bzhi bu shar// rin chen bi bang phreng ba dang // rnga yab rdo rje cod pan thogs// ga las gzi brjid bkod pa ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi rgya skegs mdog/ pad ma'i lkug ma zla ba dang //
86a5: 'khor lo yid bzhin bum pa dang // b+ha las sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnon pa ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma ra dang // 'khor lo dbyug pa ma mo shing // rgya gram rin chen lcug ma 'dzin// tsa las shes rab snang ba ni// zhal gcig
86a6: phyag bzhi ldang skya'i mdangs/ / rin chen phung po pad ma dang / rtse gsum dril thabs 'od dkyil 'khor tsha las rdo rje rgyal mtshan te// zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog/ rin chen gdugs mdzes nyi ma dang // dpa' bo
86a7: longs spyod pad ma'i spyan/ / dza las 'od zer 'bro ba can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mdangs dmar gsal// pad ma 'khor lo mchod sdong bu// mu tig chun po za ma tog/ dzA las sprul pa'i drag shul can// zhal gcig phyag
86a8: bzhi ldang ser mdog/ 'od kyi me phung me 'od dang // ral gri 'bar ba g.yas dang g.yon// ta las sprul pa'i dri ma ser// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dmar skya'i mdangs// nyi ma'i phreng ba ga Na DI rteg/ chos kyi tsakra rdzogs byed pa'o//

86b1: tha las sgyu ma'i 'phrul ba ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa la sha/ seng ge rgya mtsho rin chen phreng // rin chen bum pa de bcud bcas/ las kyi rin chen rgyal po ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi rA ga'i mdangs// ri bo pad ma chu dri dang / gser
86b2: nya 'phye bo'i rdzing bu yin/ / d+ha las 'phros pa'i dra ba can// zhal cig phyag bzhi ljang khu'i mdog/ rgya gram dril bu 'phro ba dang // ban d+ha smad yab 'jig pa'i rgyun// ta las sprul pa'i lag bzangs ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi
86b3: ka ra ta'i 'od/ pad ma'i rgyal mtshan dkar dmar mdangs// dri yi zhong pa ku sha'i tshul// tha las gser 'od 'phro ba 'dzin// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mthing ka'i mdog/ glegs bam mdzes pa'i sku gzugs dang / rin chen
86b4: mdzod dang zla ba'i 'od/ Da las rin chen snye ma ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi pad rA ga/ pad ma'i sdong bu dpag bsam shing // ban d+ha rtse gsum zla tshes gzugs// d+ha las chos kyi mthong ba ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi sna tshogs
86b5: sku/ go cha ye shes sgron ma dang // dpal be'u zur brgyad nor bu tog/ sna tshogs sprin phung sir gra bcas// mche ba dril bu ngang pa 'dzin// b+ha las gzhon nu rin chen ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdog/ rgya
86b6: gram 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / / 'od zer rtse gsum sngags pa'i bum// sems dpa'i chen po de dag rnams// rgyan phreng cha lugs 'od zer dang // yum gnas 'khril zhing rang gnas kyi// gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul
86b7: du bzhugs/ nyi man las 'phrul pa yi// rdo rje rnam par gnon la sogs// rigs kyi mtshan ma ci bzhin du// pad ma rA ga rag ta mdangs// be'u gser mdog in tra bzhin// pad ma rdo rje rims sogs mtshan// zhal
86b8: gcig phyag bzhi yum dang 'khril/ / 'og ma'i phyag mtshan 'thun pa yi// rang rtags mtshan ma sna tshogs dang / pad ma'i lcug mas mtshan byas pa'i// me tog 'bras bu rnams kyis mdzes// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs

87a1: bzhin/ / byang chub sems dpa'i cha lugs kyis// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas su 'khod// sarba ra las sprul pa'i// pad ma 'phro ba la sogs bzhi// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar dang ser// dmar ldang
87a2: pad mo me long dang / / rin chen phreng ba bi bang gar// mchod pa las mdzad nang gi 'tshams// Sha sha sa ha las 'phrul pa'i pad mo tshim byed la sogs bzhi// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rigra gnyis gzugs/ bdug spos ma
87a3: tog drung dang dri/ / 'gi tshul tri shul las kyi tshul// mchod pas phyi yi mtshams na gnas// de dag gi gsang sngags ni/ oM d+he hi rA ga pad ma shi ri bu ta hU~M hU~M swA hA// oM pad ma ma hA d+ha ba ra pun si ta ma hA d+ha maH
87a4: da yA hUM hUM/ prad tad ya dza swA hA// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi'o// oM tsakra a lo ka na ma rak+Sha saM b+ha ra da na hri ti ba ya pa ti dza swA hA// nub phyogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// oM badz+ra dar ba kri ta ya ni shaM ra ti ba shaM ni dza swA hA/
87a5: shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la'o// oM rad na ku ti du man ta pan d+ha ban d+ha du na bi dza swA hA// lho phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor ba'o// oM bi sha tsin d+ha ma ma du ru ha ha ha ha sarba gurba ni hUM phaT swA hA// byang gi dkyil 'khor ba'o//
87a6: oM ma ma a ba lo ka na/ ru ru yu ru si da b+h+yo de sa ta ma ma hUM dza swA hA// rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o// oM bi lo ka na ma si ta na ma ku ru ku ru bo d+hi satwa b+ha ra bun dza hU~M dza swA hA// rigs las sprul ba'i
87a7: byang chub sems kyi'o/ / oM bini d+ha ben d+ha sarba karma si de de bi ku ru pra ta sa~M bo ha hU~M oM a~M dza swA hA// lha mo rnams kyi'o// oM a bas+pha ra kro d+ha s+t+ri yag sha hUM hUM hUM bi ta ba ka phaT swA hA/ khro bo rnaMswa kyi'o// gsang sngags rgyal
87a8: po mi bzad pas/ rnam par sprul pa sku yis ni// stong gsum gnas nas g.yo mdzad de// rang gi lha la gsal bar mdzod// de nas mgon po rdo rje 'dzin// bde chen gar gyi dbang phyug gis// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum

87b1: gsal byed pa'i/ / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// dkyil 'khor byin brlabs dbang bskur zhing // rigs kyi bdag pos gsal bar mdzod// gnas kun mtshan ma yongs dag nas// rnam gsum snang ba gnyis med
87b2: 'gyur/ / oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ga tsit+ta ma hA bo d+hi t+ya su tr-i tri sha shu d+he son khyA bru~M tsu hUM// oM rin chen dbu rgyan gyi sngags// sar+b+ba bu ta ku ru ra da na ma ma ku tA/ a a bir+ya sad ma ma ku a b+hi Shi tsa oM AHhUM
87b3: swA hA/ oM pad ma a mo ka sa ma ya shrI ha ha ta tshin d+ha ma ni asmi sha bi ma ma ya hU~M hU~M// sngags gsum gyis gsal bar byed pa'o// oM bi sha tsin d+ha ma ni a ba saM bo d+ha ma ma ku ru si la la ta sin bi bud bab ma da hU~M
87b4: hUM hUM/ / rnam par spro ba'i sngag so// oM ma tA la ni bi sha tsakra ku ma ta bu ta na ma si la du tri si hUM phaT swA hA// dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i sngags s+ho// oM aM a a min du she ma la shan dun d+he ta thA ga ta b+h+yod ti pad ma ku
87b5: ru AHhUM swA hA/ / rbad pa'i sngags so// oM pad ma mu khaM pad ma babs bo ta di ri ya ma gu ru hU~M hUM hU~M haM ha~M dA ra sha swA hA// snying po'i sngags so// oM na ma su traM b+ho ga ga na gu ma le saM sar hUM phaT swA hA// rig pa mchog gi sngarma
87b6: so/ / oM pa gag pa saM po pad ma d+ha e h+ye d+hi ma hA ka ru mad o ma d+hun dza dza// spyan drang pa'i sngags sa so// oM pad mo saM ga ga su ra ta rag sa ye s+ho// gdan gyi sngags so// oM a mu ka si na ma sarba b+h+yo ga ga ta bu tsa med na da hU~M
87b7: triswA hA/ / mchod pa'i sngags so// a pad ma bi lo ku ma la sun tu tra~M swA hA ba saM ti ti// dgyes par bya bI sngags so// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po mchog/ rdo rje gsang ba rmad 'byung ba'i// sku dang gsung thugs gas
87b8: sngags che/ / byin gyis brlabs pa don bshad mdzad// bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes mchog/ de dag dkyil 'khor rnam 'phrul mchog/ dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems// de ni dkyil 'khor snying po

88a1: mchog/ rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas chen po// thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i tshul// rang bzhin byang chub semra nyid las// rang bzhin lhun grub rdzogs chen po// 'gro ba'i sdang ba dam pa'i mchog/
88a2: bzhin dag pa dri med chos// dkyil 'khor gnas mchog gnyis med pa'o// phung po mkhas sogs rnam dag sku// e ma ha chos su mya ngan 'das// e ma'o chos rnams ye shes sku// e ma'o chos kun
88a3: rnam par 'phrul/ rgya cha sngags kyi tshul ldan pa'i// dkyil 'khor gas gsum du mtshar che// thabs lnga mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis// snron dang dalta 'phrul dadu 'byung // babs pa las pa ma byin pa rdzogs/
88a4: bsod nams ye shes dag pa'i shugs// sa dngas 'das don chen po// ta thA ga ta'i byin brlabs dbyings// la la sku dang gsung dang thugs// zab pa de nyid rang gi mthus// gsang gsum gnas la phyag
88a5: 'tshal lo/ / ya mtshan chos la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam 'phrul su la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa
88a6: gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o/ / // de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// dga' ba chen po ngo mtshar gyis// rgyud gsum
88a7: rnam dag tshim gyur nas/ / dgyes pa'i dbyangs kyis gsol ba btab// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan che// gnyis med rol pa ya mtshan che// dri med dag pa ya mtshan che/ 'od 'phro 'dra ba ya mtshan che/ byang
88a8: chub sprin phud ya mtshan che/ / sangs rgyas 'byung ba ya mtshan che// 'phrul pa 'byung ba ya mtshan che// khro bo 'byung ba ya mtshan che// byin brlabs cho 'phrul ya mtshan che// tha ba rlan mdzad ya mtshan

88b1: che/ / 'gog pa rlung mdzad ya mtshan che// bdag cag 'khor tshogs 'dus pa rnams// dam tshig can du byin brlabs mdzad// za 'og rim pa ci bzhin du// rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'god// de nas ba
88b2: ldan 'di chen pos/ / chags pa chen po rdo rje'i sku// sku dang gsung thugs gnyis med pa'i// 'khor rnams rab tu sbyang ba'i phyir// rdo rje rgyan gyi ting 'dzin gyis// rang gi dkyil 'khor gsal bar
88b3: mdzod/ / de tshe byang chub sems chen po// 'od zer kun du khyab pa des// dga' ba chen po'i mchod pa yis// gnas kyi mtshan ma gsal bar mdzod// 'dra shes med dang 'gog gnas sogs// rang gi rtog pa'i
88b4: mtha' zhes rnams/ / dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems// rin chen chu des dbang bskur nas// rang gi ye shes dbang thob ste// 'gro ba'i don byed nus dang ldan// las la spyod pa'i gnas rnams dang // rang skyob pa yi sem
88b5: dag gis/ / thugs rje chen po'i byang chub sems// sangs rgyas brtan pa 'di gnyer ro// byang chub sems kyi mtshan ma yis// 'dus pa'i gnas lnga rig par bya// oM gu h+ya badz+ra sa ma ste// a la la to// rdo rje ro langs
88b6: bsdus pa yis/ gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po rnams// rigs kyi dgongs pa ci lta bar// rdo rje gsang ba'i las la gnas// skal bzangs dam tshig chen po ste// de las 'das na rlag par 'gyur// bka' yi bsgo ba'i don
88b7: chen pos/ / 'das pa'i 'khor tshogs bsam yas pas// dam tshig thob pas gral 'khod do// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po nyid// dbang thob las mdzad chen po des// bcom ldan 'das la gtsug gi byag/ rnal 'byor
88b8: lugs su byas nas ni/ / phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod// mnyam 'gyur gsol ba rab tu gdab// 'di ltar ma byung ngo mtshar khyod// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang phyug che// mngon spyod ya mtshan ston par spyod// bka'

89a1: yi 'khor lo dam pa nyid/ / smra bas ma yul las rab 'das kyang // dpes mtshon snang ba la bsten nas// yi ge ming tshogs la sogs kyis// gsal bar mtshon te go bar mdzod// ston pa dbang phyug dam
89a2: pa des/ / gsol ba btab pa'i don dgongs nas// brjod bsam 'das pa'i ting 'dzin las// mnyam par gzhugs nas mi gsung bzhugs// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis// stobs mchog seng ge chen po la//
89a3: logs su btud de phyag 'tshal nas// rmad 'byung mchod pa sna tshogs byas// gsol btab blo mchog seng ge khyod// bdag cag zhu ba'i gnas skabs phye// stobs mchog seng ge gsang bdag gis// gsol ba/
89a4: btab pa'i don dgongs nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs khyod nyon cig/ bdag la zhus cig spobs par byos// slar gnyid gsol ba btab pa'i don// kun gyis 'thun pa'i tshig smras pa// mgon po rgyal ba kun
89a5: gyis mdzod/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras kyi mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' rje btsan la/ chos rnams ston pa'i gnas la gsan// bcom ldan gsang mchog dam pa des// gsang sngags lam rnams mi
89a6: ston cing / / dgongs mdzad 'brel bas mi mdzad pa// rgyu dang rkyen gyis gang lags pa// 'khor ni tshogs la bstan du gsol// gsal zhing dbye bar mdzad par rigs// zhus pa'i don nyid slar gsungs pa// rgyal ba kun
89a7: gyis gsang ba'i mdzod/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dngas// sna tshogs snang zhing gsal bar mdzod// de nyid rdzogs pa'i gsang sngags can// bshad las 'das pa'i don de ni// dgongs don rgyal bas gsung mi mdzad//
89a8: de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog gis// rnam par brjod pa mi mdzad pas// yang dag don gyi snying po nyid// rgya cher bka' ni gsal ba yin// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams nyon cig/ byang chub dam pa'i snying po ni// smra bsam lnga

89b1: 'das brjod med pas/ / tshig tu brjod pa legs ma yin// gnyis mtha'i rtog pa las gzhan dag/ tshig gi snang bas the tshom skyed// grel pa nyid kyis 'ching 'gyur zhes// 'das dang ma byon thams cad dang // da ltar
89b2: byung ba'i dgongs pa'i don/ / ma gsung mi gsung gsung du med// de nas sems dpa'i snying po ni// spros dang bral ba'i byang chub sems// kun rdzob bden pa'i tshig dbang du// mtshan ma'i tshig gis rnal 'byor rnams// don
89b3: dam rtogs dga' 'gro ba'i phyir/ / rgyal bas tshig skor bstan pa yis// 'dus tshogs 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// stobs mchog seng ge de ltar na// bdag sogs ma 'ongs rnal 'byor pas// tshig gi rjes 'brangs don dag tu//
89b4: gsang ba'i las brjod gsal byed pa// ji lta bu yis mtshon par 'gyur// dpa' bo khyod ni rgyal ba'i sras// dbang bskur thob par zhu ba spobs// bcom ldan dbang mchog dam pa la// zhus shing stobs mchog seng ge khyod//
89b5: nges kyang 'khor gyis zhus pa bzhin// rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin pa la// phyag 'tshal rmad 'byung mchod rdzas nas// rdo rje tshig tu 'di skad gsol// kye ma ston pa thugs chen po// phyog bcu rgyal ba kun 'dus pa// byang chub sems
89b6: kyi mtshan nyid de/ / tshig tu brjod pa ma mdzad na// ma 'ongs dgra la rten pa dag/ don la rig par mi 'gyur phyir// mtshon bya mtshon par byas nas ni// snying po byang chub don 'di la// dpes mtshon 'thad par grub byed pa// gsang ba de
89b7: nyid bstan du gsol/ / de nas mgon po rdo rje 'dzin// ye shes lnga dang rtags ldan pa'i// phyag gi mtshan ma gsor mdzad cing // rmad 'byung ya mtshan ston par mdzad// thams cad pad mor 'gyur ba yi// rmad 'byung chos
89b8: kyi sgra yang grogs/ / oM AHhUM swA hA/ bo d+he tsit+ta gu h+ya/ sa ma ya a sa/ a nu b+ho d+hi tsit+ta a nan// ta gar ba/ ma hA satwa pra ta a hUM/ 'di ni gsung ma thag tu yang // sangs rgyas grangs chen thams cad dag/ rab tu drag cing

90a1: brgyal 'gyur nas/ / gzhan lta ma lus smos ci dgos// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag dka'// bshad kyis rigs kyi bu rnams nyon// don dam kun rdzob gnyis med par// yang dag bden pa'i don
90a2: bstan pa/ de ni dngos po mtshan nyid de// mkha' ldan chen po rnams kyi gder// ji srid blo yi chos dag tu// gnyis su snang ba'i mtshan ma la// bsam brjod kun rdzob zhes bya ste// de las 'das pa don dam yin// sku gsum
90a3: gnyis su med pa yi/ / snang ba'i dngos po ma 'gags pa// dus gsum bstan pa chen por gnas// yid bzhin pa yi don nyid do// thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i chus// thams cad rang bzhin stong pa nyid// zung du 'jug
90a4: pa'i ye shes ni/ / de nyid bla med mchog dam pa// de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas// a la la yi sgra brjod do// stobs mchog seng ge dri ba dris// de ltar lags so bcom ldan 'das// sngags kyi lha la blo gnas gang //
90a5: spyod la gnas pa gang dag gis// phan tshun 'brel 'gyur ci lta bur// blo yi rim pa 'jug bya 'am// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan
90a6: pa'i don/ / mtshan nyid rnam dag du legs pa// bgrang dang bgrang ba las 'das pa'i// dngos po mtshan nyid de bzhin no// legs spyod bden pa'i lam 'jug cing // rnam gsum sngags kyi don spyad na/ 'brel
90a7: bshugs kyis sgrub byed na/ / lta spyod gnyis ldan bden pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byor sa la legs gnas shing // bden gnyis 'brel pa'i don bsgrubs nas// yang dag rtag pI dron gsal 'gyur// rnal 'byor sa
90a8: spyod sa thog shog/ ma skyes thabs kyi ye shes ldan// thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings// bden gnyis dbye ba med pa yis// yang dag don mchog sgyu ma'i sku// kun rdzob sgyu ma thabs kyi gsung // phyag rgya sku

90b1: ma'i tshul nyid de/ / med pa ma yin mtshan med de// rnal 'byor gnyis dang ldan phyir ro// slob pa'i rnal 'byor gnyis bsten nas// lhun gyis grub pa'i sa goms nas// bden 'gyur bden pa gnyis la gnas// che
90b2: chung mthu yis grub pa yin/ / sgra yi rjes 'brangs rnal 'byor pas// don med spyod la gnas par 'gyur// yabang ga kun rdzob bden gsal bas// gnyis med don dam bden par gnas// sna tshogs chos kyi g.yul
90b3: do bzlog/ rig pa'i skyes bu rnam par grangs// zhes pas dgyes par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las de kho na nyid snyan pa'i
90b4: le'u ste bzhi pa'o/ / // de nas rig pa'i skyes bu mchog/ gsang ba'i bdag pos yang zhus pa// bcom ldan snying po byang chub sems// dgongs pa'i don ni ci lta bu// las dang nyon mongs dag byed pa'i//
90b5: shes sgron ma ci ltar lags// rgyal bas dgongs pa'i byang chub sems/ rdo rje lta bur mnyam gzhag nas/ me tog ye shes gsal mdzad de// sna tshogs rnams kyang byang chub sems// bde ba che las gzhan
90b6: med do/ / lus ngag yid gsum rnam pa'i tshogs// chos rnams kun gyi rgyu yin te// rnam gsum rdo rje lta bu nyid// sku gsum gsal ba rnam par snang // dngos po gsal ba'i chos med de// gcig las rnam
90b7: 'phrul sna tshogs nyid/ / phyag rgya gar thabs dbang bsgyur bas// 'chi ba'i tshogs las rnam par grol// dngos po thams cad bral ba yi// phung khams skye mched rnam par dben// gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i
90b8: yul bral bas/ / dpag med pa yi ngo bo nyid// rnam gsum mchog gi don las byung // 'od gsal chen po'i rang bzhin no// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i don// rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// skye dang skye

91a1: med sna tshogs dngos/ / phyogs 'dzin mtha' yis bcing bar byed// de dag chos las rnam grol ba'o// bden pa chen po'i ting 'dzin rgya// ngo mtshar ya mtshan rmad kyi chos// me long gsal ba'i rang
91a2: bzhin can/ / rgyal ba rnams kyi gsang ba'i mdzod// 'gag pa med pa'i chos rnams la// byang chub sems nyid skye bar 'gyur// mnyam nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// ya mtshan rmad du 'byung ba'i chos// sna tshogs
91a3: snang byed gnas grol ba/ / rang bzhin zhi ba'i byang chub sems// gnyis kyi mtha' las grol ba'o// gnas dang gnas med byang chub sems// ya mtshan rmad kyi don byung ba'o// rgya cher so sor gsal ba'i ngang // kun rtogs
91a4: byang chub sems chen po/ / dmigs med gsang ba las byung ba'i// dmigs dang mi dmigs sna tshogs ni// bde ba'i ye shes gsal ba'o// ma 'gags pa yi chos nyid do// bya ba grub pa'i tshul can du// spros med
91a5: spros pa sna tshogs snang / / spro bsdu 'dun dang spros bral ba'i// mdzad pa'i byang sems brtan pa las/ ngo mtshar cho 'phrul bla na med// ye shes rgya mtsho rmad du byung // rang gi de nyid gsal bar 'gyur// rgyal bas
91a6: bshad pa'i dgongs don la/ / 'khor rnams ya mtshan ngoms par 'gyur// mchod dang zhal dag sgra 'byin cing // rang gi de nyid gsal 'gyur nas// byang sems de nyid bstod par bya/ e ma'o stong nyid
91a7: byang chub sems/ / e ma'o dag pa dri ma med/ e ma'o mi sgrib gsal ba che// e ma'o mnyam nyid dbyer med chos// e ma'o so so rang rig sems// e ma'o bya byed lhun gyis grub// de bzhin nyid la phyag 'tshal
91a8: stod/ / bcom ldan 'das nyid byang chub sems// byang chub sems nyid thugs kyi mchog/ bdag cag rig 'dzin tshogs pa rnams// byang chub sems nyid smon pa dang // 'jug dang ldang dang gnyis med ste// rang gi

91b1: byang sems g.yo bar gyis/ / reg par bgyi zhing nye bar bgyi// nyams su myong bar 'tshal lags na// thugs rje che dgongs byin gyis rlobs// bde bar gshegs pas byin gyis rlobs// de skad tshig tu gsol
91b2: btab pas/ / bcom ldan snying po 'di sang gsung // dardzogs rnam dag bo nyid// chos rnams 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams kun// rang bzhin brjod bral rtog pa med// rang gsang rtogs pa'i dka' ba'i don// srid
91b3: gsum ye nas rnam dag chos/ / bdag tog 'khrul ba'i nyes dmigs kyis// dus ring 'khyams 'gyur 'gro ba rnams// rang rtog dngos po'i las la stod// log pa'i sems kyis kun btags kyang / 8
91b4: bzhin nyid la 'gyur ba med/ / ye nas don gyis sangs rgyas la// 'khrul pa'i bde sdug 'khor lo sa 'khyams// log rtog dngos med byang chub sems// 'khrul rtog mi gnas rgyan gyi mchog/ tha ba'i
91b5: gnas nyid byang chub zhing / / srid dngos sangs rgyas mngon rdzogs sku// 'dzin rtog byang chub snying por gsal// brtan g.yo dngos po thams cad dang // bde chen sku las gzhan med do// de bzhin gshegs
91b6: pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las de bzhin nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o/ / // bcom ldan rgyal ba thams cad kyi// dkyil 'khor snying po bsdus pa'i don/
91b7: de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis// dkyil la bor rnam par 'phro ba'i don// mtshan nyid 'phro zhing rtogs pa dag/ rgyal bas bshad phyir bskul 'debs mdzad// bcom ldan rgyal ba thams cad kyi// dkyil
91b8: 'khor snying po bsdus pa'i don/ / rgya che mdzad pa'i mthu ldan pa// rdo rje gsang ba gsum gyi gnas// rab rgyas mtshan bzhin cho ga'o// yan lag bdag la bstan du gsol// de nas mgon po gsang ba'i bdag/

92a1: gnyis med ye shes la 'gro ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs gnas// rgya cher sprul pa'i don bstan mdzad// stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i// ri bo rgyud 'dzin rigs mtshan can// dbyangs kyi yi ge'i
92a2: tshul 'jug pa'i/ / rta bdun 'od sogs gsal byed ldan// skar ma'i tshogs dang 'dra ba las// mnya ma nyid 'od kyi gong bu'i gzugs// snang ba'i 'od zer lnga yi tshul// phyag rgya mtshan ma sngags dang bcas// rnam 'phros
92a3: rang rig zhing khams spyod/ / de dag gong bu'i gzugs mtshungs par// gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku// stong nyid snying rje chen po yis// ma lus rgyud rnams gsal mdzad nas// nam mkha' dad pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin//
92a4: thugs rje chen po sbyin skyong mdzad// sa bon gsang ba'i las byung ba'i// mkha' snang gsal ba kun khyab las// sna tshogs kun nas so so nyid// 'byung bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin dkod// kun 'phrul
92a5: sa bon las bskyed pa'i/ / ye shes rin chen sna tshogs gzugs// shar du do shal phreng ba dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rnga yab sogs// me long rol mo'i tshogs bsam yas// 'khor lo rin chen rdo rje
92a6: pad/ d+ha ra na bzhi rgyan mdzes pa// sgra dbyangs sna tshogs nyi zla'i tshogs// tsakra bar khyams phreng ba dang // dam pa'i 'dod yon lha mo 'khrigs// rin chen 'bar ba'i khri brtsegs gnas// nyi zla pad ma'i rin chen
92a7: rgya na/ / gnas rnams khyab par ci bzhin pa ra// dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub pa'o// a A i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ aM aH/ ri rI/ li lI// ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+nyanya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ Tha ta na/ yaHb+ha ma/ ya ra la
92a8: wa/ sha Sha sa hak+Sha// de bzhin nyid dbyings rmad 'byung ba'i// bde gshegs kun gyi thugs gsal ba// byin brlabs ya mtshan sprul pa'i sku// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kun gyi gnas// sems can

92b1: kun gyi sems chen po/ / rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med// phung po chos rnams sangs rgyas ste// 'byung lnga dbyings phyug yum gyi mkha'// khams dang skye mched sems dpa' dang // sems ma'i tshogs dang khro bo'i
92b2: sku/ phyi nang srid gsum dngos snang ba'i// dkyil 'khor rigs kyi bdag nyid che// gzugs phud rnam par snang mdzad che// tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan sku// 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas sku// 'du byed don yod
92b3: grub pa yin/ rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste// thams cad bder gshegs lnga yi sku// sa khams sangs rgyas spyan yin te// chu khams lha mo mA ma kI// me khams na bza' dkar mo ste// rlung khams dam
92b4: tshig sgrol ma'o/ / nam mkha' kun du bzang mo'i sku// 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa'o// dbang po'i spyod yul ma lus kun// thams cad bder gshegs rigs kyi sku// mig la rnam par snang mdzad de//
92b5: rna ba rin chen 'byung ldan che// snal snang ba mtha' yas nyid// lce la don yod grub pa'i sku// lus nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin// de ltar snang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// ye nas lhun grub gnas pas na/ rnal 'byor
92b6: gsad pa don shes bya/ / phyi rol don shes yul drug 'di// yum chen lnga yi phyag rgya'i dbyibs// gzugs khams sangs rgyas spyan ma ste// sgra tshogs lha mo mA ma kI// dri tshogs na bza' dkar mo'i dbyings/ ro drug
92b7: lha mo sgrol ma yin/ / reg tshogs lha mo kun du bzang mo'i sku// dus gsum mnyam sbyor 'du 'bral med// rdo rje pad mo mnyam sbyar bas// rang rig dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzod// thams cad ma lus sku gsung
92b8: thugs/ yon tan phrin las rol pa'i rgyan// nga nyid 'du 'bral med pa'i dbyings// thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i mchog/ sa yi khyad par ma lus pa'ang // rdo rje chos kyis sbyor mdzad dang // yon tan phrin las ma

93a1: byin pas/ che 'di nyid kyi go 'bang mchog/ rdo rje gsang gsum dam tshig che// rang gi mthu yi sbyor byed pa// rtag tu mnyam bzhag sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas bzhugs ste// dri med byang
93a2: chub sems kyi tshul/ / 'gro rnams tshogs bcas dag par byas// rtag tu gsang sngags brjod byas shing // rdo rje mgon po'i sgogs la brtan// rtag tu gtor sbyin gtang byas ste// khams kyi 'dzin pa med par grol/
93a3: rtag tu lha la mchod byas te/ rang gi bdud rtsis mchod cing rol// rtag tu mi gnyis bstod bya ba// rnam grol tham ca brag cha'i sgra/ pha rol phyin bcu dus cig du// pad mchog rtogs
93a4: par 'gyur/ / zag pa zad pas sku lnga dang // pad ma'i rigs kun mnyam par sbyor// pad ma'i dam tshig la gnas pa// gnas kun dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur// pad ma rang gi gnas su bsgom// 'dod chags chos
93a5: kun spyod pa yin/ / mgon po rang rang gnas na gsal// dri med dag pa'i thig le las// 'od zer lnga yi snang ba bcas/ rang gi gnas nas 'phro mdzad cing // de nyid mgon po'i sku 'dod gzugs// kun du pad ma chags med
93a6: bas/ / gnas kun dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur// thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams dang // dpe byad rdzogs par gyur nas ni// yon tan ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas// kun du dregs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog/ rdo rje'i dam
93a7: tshig la gnas pas/ / rdo rje rang gi gnas su bsgom// 'od 'phros 'dus pang gnas phyag rgyas// / ye shes mnyam nyid kun don mdzad// thugs rjes rnam mar yul bral zhing // 'joms par mdzad pa'i khro bo'i sku/ rang gi
93a8: dkyil 'khor dri bral ba/ / mngon sam gsang ba'i ye shes sku// 'khor lo dam tshig la gnas pas// 'khor lo rang gi gnas su bsgom// rgyal ba kun gyi rin po che// 'phro 'dra nyi shu rtsa lnga'i tshogs// phung tshegs kham

93b1: rnams rnam dag cing / / phrin las ye shes bla na med// byang chub dag pa'i cha lugs gnas// dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i byin rlabs sku// dga' ba'i thabs dang shes rab sbyor// phyag rgya chen po'i rigs 'dzin nas// rnal/
