93b2: 'byor dang brtson ting 'dzin ldan// 'grub 'gyur ring por thogs med spyod// zhes gsungs pas 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams mnyes par gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs
93b3: pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste drug pa'o/ / // de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje stan las phangs te// dga' ba'i mchod pa dang gar thabs kyis dkyil
93b4: 'khor thams cad mnyes par byas nas/ / bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te gsol ba btab bo// kye ma rgyal ba kun gyi gtso// sangs rgyas tshogs rnams bskyed pa'i yab// khyed kyis dkyil 'khor sprul mdzad
93b5: nas/ / gdul bya'i lam 'di grol byas na// phyi yi 'gro ba ci ltar gzung // gang dag dbang po ma smin pa'i// dkar po chos rnams mthong mi 'gyur// de dag thugs rje chen po yis// gzung zhing las la bzhugs par snang //
93b6: ma 'ongs 'gro ba la la dag/ 'di ltar dkyil 'khor mthong ba rnams// ji ltar dkyil 'khor brtan par 'dul// zhes gsol ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba theg pa
93b7: gsang sngags kyi lam du 'jug par 'dod pa dag gis ni/ / rdo rje slob dpon la brten te gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o// slob dpon blo gros mchog/ dad brtson shes rab stobs dang ldan// bdag chos ma
93b8: lus shes 'gyur nas/ / skyob pa byang sems sdom pa blangs// byang sems snying rje chen po dang // dga' ba btang snyoms bzhir bzhag nas// sems can thams cad 'gron du gnyer// slar nyid byang chub lam la dgod// pha rol

94a1: phyin pa drug rnams dang / / bsdu ba bzhi la legs gnas pas// theg pa chen po'i lam gnyer zhing // nyan thos la sogs zlos pa med pa'i blos// gsang ba'i theg pa don nyer zhing // dkyil 'khor dbang thob dam
94a2: tshig ldan/ / gsang ba'i rgyud rnams don shos shing // de nyid bcu las goms gyur pas// rang gi ye shes rnam grol zhing // dngos po de nyid bstan par gnas// mu stegs la sogs mi bskyod cing // theg dman la sogs
94a3: 'gyur ba med/ / rtag tu 'gro ba bzung ba'i thos// dkyil 'khor la sogs las li brtson// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa yaM// grang khyer chen por 'gro byed dpon// 'jig rten drags brtson chos brgyad dag/ btang stongs
94a4: spong len med pa nyid/ / dmus long tshogs kyi mig brabs// bla ma'i gtso bar gzung bar bya// 'jug pa'i gang zag phun sum tshogs// zhi des gsong por smra ba dang // 'jam zhing 'gro ba'i yid 'ong ba// ce cig dad pa
94a5: brtson 'gyur byed/ / blo gros yon tan kun la 'jug/ lha dang bla ma la sogs gus/ theg pa chen po'i lam dag pas// ngan pa'i tsho gas spangs gzhan du gnas// de ni blo gros bzang po yon tan ldan// theg chen gsang
94a6: 'dzin pa'i snod/ / sa mchog shin du dben pa'i gnas// ri bo nags tshal 'bras bu dang // me tog chu rgyun phun sum tshogs// gnod byed skye bo tshe gas bral ba// rnal 'byor grogs bcas dga' 'gyur ba'i// bdag dbang
94a7: bar chad med pa'i mchog/ bsnyen pa ci bzhin rdzogs pa yis// dkyil 'khor bri sogs las rnams bya/ phun sum tshogs pa bdun ldan pas// bdag gnas sa gzhi'i grogs bcas dang // mchod rdzas yo byad ma
94a8: lus pa/ / bsrung zhing byin gyis brlab par bya// rdo rje sa gzhi ra ba dang // gur dang bla re bcas pa yis// khro bo me 'od mtshon cha'i tsho gas// bsrung zhing 'khor lo rim bzhin bsgom// sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i/

94b1: zlos/ bsod nams tshogs kyis dag par bya// phyag 'tshal mchod pa dbul ba dang // sdig bshags bsod nams rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas mya ngan mi 'da' zhing // chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang // lus dbul byang
94b2: sems bskyed pa dang / / lam gnas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo// rgya cher yongs su bsngo byas shing // sems can don du smon lam gdab// dmigs med pa yi rang bzhin gyis// de dag brtson bral nam mkha' bzhin// rnam
94b3: thar gsum las 'das pa yi/ / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes che// thams cad nam mkha' mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// nam mkha' dra ba rnal 'byor pas// don kun mnyam pa nyid la gsal//
94b4: de la rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor chen po sprul byas pas// rigs kyi zhing khams sbyong byed cing // rnal 'byor chen po las kun 'grub// sa phyogs dri med yid 'ong ba'i// grong ngam grong khyer dgon
94b5: pa 'am/ / ri phugs nags tshal gang rung bar// nyams dga' yan lag rtag par bya// gang du bzang ni 'bras bu bcas// ne'u sing chu 'gram me tog bcas// dpal rdzogs yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas// de ni rab
94b6: gus brtag par byas/ / nam mkha' 'khor lo dra ba dang // sa gzhi pad ma dra ba dang // bkra shis phun sum sna tshogs gzhi// bar chad med pa'i mtshan nyid yin// sa gzhi zhom rdib med pa yi// dbus su mtho brgyag
94b7: rgya che/ / shar dang byang du gzhol ba ni// phrin las rnams bzhi'i dngos grub 'gyur// lho dang nub tu gzhol bas ni// 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub 'gyur// nub dang byang du gzhol ba ni// ting 'dzin phra mo'i las
94b8: gzhan 'gyur/ / gang zhig shar phyogs mthong ba dang // dbus su dma' ba spang bar bya// sa de bus mo nub tsam du brkos te slar yang dag par bya// ma 'phel gyur na dngos grub mchog/ gang bar gyur pa shes pa yin

95a1: dma' zhing ma legs gyur pa yin/ / sol du ma rus sogs byung na yang // yang na chu yis dag byas te// slob dpon rdo rje dril 'dzin pas// mnyam bzhag lha yi sngags brjod cing // shar du mi drag
95a2: gom pa brgyad/ / song ste slar ldog blta bar bya// 'grib pa med na dngos grub 'gyur// snang dang mi snangs yi bdag/ mgu byas rin gyis nyo ba dang // blangs te bar chad med pa'i phyir// bgegs gzhan phra mo
95a3: bskrad par bya/ / bar chad med pa'i sa dbus su// rigs kyi bdag po 'byor ldan pas// chos gos la sogs rgyan thogs shing // pad ma'i dkyil 'khor legs bzhugs te// 'khor lo sgyur rgyal cha lugs kyis//
95a4: mchod sogs sbyang zhing byin brlabs te// rdo rje bsrung ba'i phyag rgya yis// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rig par bcas// sa yi lha mo srungs ma rnams// spyan drangs mchod pa mnyes par bya// khyad par sa yi
95a5: bdag po dang / / 'gro drug bgegs rnams ma lus kun// dgug cing bu lon mchod sbyin gtang // dri zhim chu yis kun gtor zhing // sngags dang phyag rgya sdud par bya// gang zhig dngos grub la sogs 'dod// rab
95a6: 'bring tha ma grub don du/ / lto 'phye ba rtag pa'i tshi ga bzhin// yan lag kun dbang rgya yang bya// de nas dkyil 'khor rgyar mnyam pa'i// sa gzhi khru la sogs tshad du// brkos te sa yi skyon gsal zhing // sa zhig
95a7: mdog bzangs 'jam phyin pas/ / gang zhig dri zhim chur bcas pa'i// sngags btab gang zhig 'thas par bcas// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor khru dor stong // rgyar ni khru drug pa yi tshad// tshogs bsags
95a8: gang 'phang du bstod/ / mtha' skor khru gang pa yi tshad// dbang bskur sor bzhi'i tshad bstod de// ji ltar gru bzhi rgyar bskyed cing // dbyibs legs me long bzhin du gnas// tshad mnyam grog sbur la sogs

95b1: pa/ / rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // snying po lnga dang 'bru lnga dag/ dri chu sngags kyis btab byas nas// dkyil 'khor snying por gzhag par bya// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs te// stong pa nyid kyi sngags kyis sbyad/
95b2: dri zhim sngags kyis byin brlabs pa'i// chu rgyun phyogs bcur gtor byas shing // sna tshogs gtor mas mnyes byas te// lha tshogs 'gron rnams tshim par bya// slob dpon rigs kyi gtsor gnas pa'i// rgyan dang
95b3: cha lugs rdzogs byas nas/ / sgrub pa'i grogs mchog blo gros ldan// tshul bzhin du ni gsol ba btab// dbus kyi sa yi char gnas pa// kun 'byung nam mkha' dag pa'i sngags// brjod cing 'byung ba'i sa bon
95b4: las/ / dkyil 'khor ri rtsegs bsgom par bya// rdo rje bsdams pa sar bzhag cing // byams pa'i rdo rje rngam dag cing // rdo rje dkyil 'khor thugs dang bcas// phyag mtshan dran pa thog mthar rgyan// rdo rje sa
95b5: gzhi rab dang / / gur sogs khro bo me 'od bcas/ gtso bo gar gyis dbang phyug skus// pad bcas thal mo lan gsum brdab// 'od 'phro gnas kun g.yos pa la// lha mo gser mdog rgyan gyis mdzes// me tog phreng
95b6: ba bum thogs pa'i/ / lus phyed sa la 'thon byas te// 'thun na bka' nyan tshul du gnas// mchod bstod zhal bsil sogs 'bul zhing // dri zhim las rnams ma rdzogs par// de srid mi 'gyur brtan bzhugs
95b7: nas/ / bdud sogs bsgo ba'i dag bcas mdzad// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis// sa dang pha rol phyin pa las// lha mo khyod ni dbang du shog/ ji ltar rgyal ba thams cad
95b8: kyi/ / bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms mdzad pa// de bzhin bdag gis bdud las kyang // rgyal bar byas pa'i dkyil 'khor brtsam// de nas slob dpon rgyan rdzogs pa'i// rdo rje dril 'gyid bcas pa la// dam

96a1: tshig nye bar bskul ba yi/ glu dag phyogs bzhi'i gnas nas gdon// rgyal bas 'gro ba'i mgon gyur pa'i// chos kyi me long gsal ba ston// bder gshegs rnams kyi gsang ba pa//
96a2: rdo rje gsang gsum dam tshig mchog/ ye shes dri ma med pa'i tshul// sgrib sogs ma lus thal byed pa'i// rdo rje pad mo mnyam pa'i dbyings// dkyil 'khor chen po drug bcu'i bdag/ theg chen
96a3: chos kyi 'khor lo'i mdzod/ / gsang gsum pad mo dag pa'i dbyings// so sor gsal ba'i don bstan pa// rdo rje lta bus gnas kun sbyor// zab cing rgya chen sgra sna tshogs// chos kyi 'khor lo bshad
96a4: pa'i dus/ rgyal po yon tan dpe dang bral// rin chen lhun po'i mdzod mnga' ba// nyams dga' thugs rje'i zhing rnams dgongs// bdag med mnyam pa'i ye shes can// phrin las dag pas zad par
96a5: mdzod/ / gsang gsum sna tshogs rdo rje'i bdag/ rigs mtshogs shes rab brtson byed cing // spyan bzang dag pas 'gro la gzigs// slar nyid khro bo chen po'i sku// zhal lnga phyag cha sna tshogs
96a6: 'dzin/ / 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i skur gnas te// mgur nas hU~M bsgoms sgra sgrogs shing // rdo rje pad ma lta ba yis// lha rnams bdag la bsdu byed cing // ma dang ta las byung ba yi// mig gnyis nyi zla'i
96a7: dkyil 'khor brjid/ / 'bar zhing thams cad dag byas nas// slar nyid rang gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// shangs kyi rlung sgom 'bar ba nas// 'jig rten thams cad 'bar byed pa// rdo rje'i 'gros las 'byung ba yi/ sna tshog
96a8: sa gzhir brtan par byas/ / oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M// grih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ grih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M hU~M/ a na ya ho b+ha ga bAn bi d+hA rA dza ya hUM hU~M phaT/ phyag gi mtshan ma kun 'khrol zhing // khro bo'i dkyil 'khor spros par

96b1: byed/ hUM hU~M lha dbang rlung lha'i tshogs// gnod sbyin dri za srin po dang // sha zag shin rje ma me'i tshogs// mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin ma lus rnams// gang dag sa gzhi 'dir gnas pa// srung byed sa yi bdag bor
96b2: bas/ thos btsas gyis sbyar bar dengs// da'i bka' las 'da' ma byed// gang zhing gnas pa'i mthub cha// pad ma rdo rje khaT+wAMg/ thal ba'i tshogs bzhin rlag par byed// rab 'bar khro ba'i gnas 'joms
96b3: pa'o/ / pad ma'i 'bar ba'i gzugs 'di yi// gal te gang gi dam tshig bcag/ 'dod gsum skye gnas gsal byas te// 'jigs par 'gyur zhing gzhan 'das med// sa las yongs su bskor byas te/
96b4: bgegs byed bya phyir bur bur gdab/ oM g+ha ta ya g+ha ta ya sarba duSh+TA na phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra kI la ya/ badz+ra d+ha rod adz+nyA ba ya ti kA ya bAg tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ lag pa bskyod cing rkang pa bskyod// ngo mtshar
96b5: khro bo'i zur mig bzhin/ / smin ma khro gnyer g.yon mdzad cing // kha yi bed ma 'dzum bcas pas// so so'i phyag rgya gnas su sbyar// 'gying bag bcas pas gzhal la bstod// rta mchod khro bo'i gar thabs
96b6: kyis/ zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po'i tshul/ ba yi rnam lnga dri sres chus// dkyil 'khor sa gzhi nyer byugs nas// lha rnams gnas su dri yi chus// thig le gru bzhir zlum por bya// rang gi sngags dang me tog rnams/ so
96b7: sa'i gnas su dgram par bya/ dbu rgyan rol ma mchod pa'i tsho gas// lha mgon gnas kyi nye 'khor mdzes// dkyil 'khor lha rnams nye ba'i sa// mchod cing bstod pas mnyes par bya// cho ga'i yan lag rdzogs
96b8: pa dang / bzod gsol bskang ba'i don ched du// rdo rje dril 'dzin dpa' bo yis// phyogs rnams kun tu bskor ba bya// oM badz+ra satwA sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra satwa tra no pa tiSh+Tha Di D+ho mo b+ha ba// su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rag to

97a1: me b+ha ba/ su toSh+To me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi me pra ya ts+tsha// sarba karma su tsa me tsit+ta shrI yang ku ru hAM/ ha ha nA ha to/ b+ha ga bA na/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ badra thA swe TuT+Ta/ dz+ri d+ha shArnam pa satwA AH/ gsang sngags rgyal po bla med pa'i/
97a2: lan gcig brjod pa btsam gyis kyang // sdig pa ma lus zad byed cing // las rnams thams cad 'grib par byed// pus mo sa la btsugs byas te// lag pa g.yas pa spos 'dzin cing // g.yon pas dril bu
97a3: dkrol byas te/ tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya// oM bder gshegs stobs bcu brtson ldan 'gro ba'i mgon mi 'jigs la sogs yon tan rtsal med ldan// rigs gnyis thabs kyis brgyud
97a4: pa'i dkyil 'khor che/ / bsnyings pa mi mda' thugs rje shugs chen po// dga' mdzad dbang gi dkyil 'khor tshogs tshan la// tshul khrims la sogs phung po mnyes gyur cig/ pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug gcor
97a5: byas pa'i/ dri bral thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid ni// nyes pa'i tshogs rnams kun las rnam grol zhing // bde legs yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// 'dod yon 'bras bu phun sum tshogs bsgrub
97a6: dang / 'gro rnams ma lus thugs rjes bzung byed cing // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor rnam dag rgya chen rtson lags na// mgon po'i bka' drin rjes su brtse dgongs te/ khyed kyis
97a7: rab tu gnas par mdzad 'os lags/ / me tog dri bzang phreng sogs 'di bzhes la// ji srid 'gro ba'i don rnams ma grub par// de srid thugs rjes bzung zhing bzhugs nas ni// bdag gi gnas sogs 'di dag byin gyis
97a8: rlobs/ de nas slob ma la bos te// kye rigs kyi bu khyod theg pa'i snod// rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung 'di nyon// dad gus dga' ba'i shugs phyung shog/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis// cho ga bzang po 'di bstan

97b1: bya/ / mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas nam ngam byon de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs// de bzhin da lta'i sems can rnams/ 'gro la phan phyir gnas bzhugs te// gsang ba zab mo bla na med// cho ga bzang po 'di spyod pas// skyes mchog
97b2: rang gi gnas nyid du/ / kun mkhyen ye shes bde chen brnyes// gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med par// pad ma gar dbang dkyil 'khor gyi// bdud tshogs shin tu mi bzang ba'i// dpung rnams ma lus 'joms par mdzad/
97b3: de phyir kun mkhyen ye shes kyi// blo gros mchog 'di khyod kyis kyang // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// kun du skyabs su 'gro bar gyis// rnal 'byor mkha' 'grogs sngags can// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor so so la/
97b4: 'khor lo bzhugs pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun nas skyabs su 'gro bar gyis// dpa' bo dpa' mo 'khor dang bcas// byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid che// khyad par du yang slob dpon la// khyod kyis skyabs su 'gro
97b5: bar gyis/ de nas legs spyod slob ma yis// skyabs 'gro byang sems sdom pa gzung // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum po gzung bar bya// bdag gis sdig pa byas pa dang // bgyid pa rjes
97b6: su yi rang ba/ / mgon po'i spyan sngar mchis nas su// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// rgyal ba sras bcas 'khor rnams dang // rang rgyal dgra bcom 'gro rnams kyis// bsgom bzlas la sogs bsod nams la/
97b7: dad pas rjes su yid rang ngo // sems nyid mngon par sangs rgyas dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byed pa'i// tshogs spyod byang chub sems dpa' la// bdag ni rab tu skyabs su mchi// sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ci lta bar/ skal
97b8: ldan byang chub sems dpa' yis/ / byang chub sems mchog dri med pas// 'gro ba rgya che tshogs la dmigs// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i 'gro rnams kyis// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal mdzad pa/ de bzhin nyid dbyings

98a1: 6/ / byang chub sems// dus gsum dag tu gtad mi bya// rdo rje slob dpon la gus shing // dus kun du ni yod tan bzung // rnal 'byor gsang ba smad mi bya// rdo rje spun la mig bzhin pa lta// gsang myags phyug rgyur ba
98a2: rnam bdag/ brtson pas dus gsum dran par bya// de nas shes par bya ba'i phyir rang dang mtshan ma'i yi dge sngags// byin brlabs ye shes bskyed par bya// slar yang bdug pa me tog dang // mar me dri che ba la sogs
98a3: pa'i/ / rang gi gnas su 'dug cig dbul// bkra shis shing mchog 'o ma can// lo ma me tog 'bras bur bcas// rngon pa rang zhing 'bru rjes med// chagags med pa'i tshems shing ni// sor ni bcu gnyis dri bzangs byug/
98a4: certse mo me tog phreng btags pa// sngags zlos dri chus bsang par bya// rigs kyi mtshon char byin brlab pas// oM sarba pA pad ha na badz+ra shi ta ni swA hA// yi ge sum bcas sngags brjod cing // shar du kha bltas slob ma la// bden
98a5: pabadar zhing sprin bya zhing / / des kyang mi smra blang bar bya// gri rtse lta bus lce bzhar zhing // phra mo'i phyogs kyi so brud ste// sa gzhi dri yis byugs pa ru// phan tshun mi lta dor bar bya// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kun gyis//
98a6: zhi sogs dngos grub mtshan ma brtag/ gyen thur rub dang 'bring gis lta// 'tshams kyis 'jig rten las rnams 'grub// las dag pa yi sngags bzlas nas// sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs byas pa'i// chu gtsang dris sbyang
98a7: byor pa gsum/ / nye reg 'thor ba'i tshul du sbyin// oM tri byi shud d+ha sarba d+harma pA ba ni tsa sha bi sho d+ha ma sa rba gis par a ba na ya hUM// gtsang ma'i res la legs bkal ba'i// srung skud mdung pa gsum ldan pa'i// yi ge gsum
98a8: gyis sngags bzlas nas/ / de yi dpung pa g.yon par bcing // ku sha rtse mo ma 'khrugs pa'i// bam po gnyis su sbams pa yis// yab yum gnyis su byin brlabs pa'i// sngas dang stan du sbyin par bya// oM sarba dus+thi Tu

98b1: ru swA hA/ dag ba'i gtam gyis gzeng bstod cing // mchod pa gtor ma'i tshogs bcas pas// lha tshogs rnams la bsngo byas nas// bden pa brjod cing ci bder nyal// mi smra dge ba'i sems bcas pas// rmi lam mtshan ma/
98b2: brtag par bya// slar nyid slob dpon nang seM na dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// lha rnams mchod cing bstod bya ste// dge ba'i sems kyis nyal bar bya// de nas skya rangs shar dus su// slob dpon slob ma sngas 'ongs
98b3: ste/ kye kye bzhin bzangs rnams longs cig/ rmi lam mtshan ma ci mthong ba// bden pa brjod pa'i dus yin no// des kyang ci bzhin smra bar bya// rab 'bring mtshan ma'i ltas bstan cing // ngan pa'i ltas rnams bzlog pa
98b4: bya/ sbyin sreg gtor ma la sogs dang // ba yi rnam lngas byug par bya// dngos rnams mtshan ma las grol ba'i// stong pa chen po ye shes bsgom// rin chen rgyu las byung ba yi// bum pa mgul
98b5: ring lto ba zlum/ / kha khyer zhabs bteg phel ka che// dri zhim mtshon dkar legs byugs te// pad ma'i dkyil 'khor legs gnas te// so so'i mtshan ma'i yi ge rgyan// rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs rnams// mchod nas
98b6: bstan la bkram par bya/ / rin chen sna lnga 'bru lnga dang // snying po lnga dang sman lnga dang // bkra shis rdzas lnga bzhugs par bya// mgul chings gzungs thag kha rgyan sogs// dam tshig lha rnams gsal byas nas// ye shes sku dang
98b7: gnyis med par/ / mchod bstod sngags kyi bzlas pa bya// sngags bcas chu dang gnyis med gnas// dkyil 'khor grub pa'i dus dag tu// rang rang gnas kyi phyogs su dgram// dam tshig dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas/ ye shes
98b8: lha dang gnyis med pa'i/ / thabs dang shes rab 'brel byas pas// dkyil 'khor sa la thig gdab bya// shes rab spyan mdzes bcu drug lon pa'am// ji bzhin byin gyi brlabs nas kyang // dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa gnas bya'o//

99a1: gtsang ma'i rgyu las byung ba'i ras// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am// lnga las byung ba'i skud pa dag/ byin gyis brlab bcing bsgril bar bya// stong pa nyid kyis sbyang byas nas// rigs kyi lha ru gnas pa dag/ mchod bstod
99a2: sngags bcas bsgril bar bya/ / oM badz+ra sa ma ya mu tra ma ti kra ma nAM// oM A t+ma/ dza gdags pa'i sngags brjod cing // rdo rje slob dpon thugs kha nas// slob mas smin mtshams drang por then// de la gnas kyi nub dang shar/ 'od
99a3: 'phros byang sems thugs rje che/ / nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor mngon par lha// rdo rje lte bas phyogs dang mtshams// dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs par bstan// stobs mchog dpa' bo dgongs su gsol// rdo rje thig skud sbyar
99a4: ldan pas/ nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor legs grub cing // 'gro ba'i don la bskul bar mdzad// oM a nu na a nu ga to sarba d+harma ba ra ba ra a nu ga ta sarba a nan ta/ a ba ta ra sarba d+harma hUM// lha rnams mdun du bzhugs 'gyur
99a5: nas/ mchod bstod dbang po'i tshul du dgongs// rdo rje khu tshur sar bzhag cing // shar nas nub du brkyang ba yi// tshangs thig dang po gdab byas nas// de bzhin sgo nas tshad kyis ni// zur bzhi shin tu legs par gzhal/ rdo rje lho
99a6: byang gnyis pa dang / / 'tshams kyi thig rnams gdab par bya// legs thig gru bzhi mnyam 'gyur nas// brgyad dang bcu drug dag tu bgo// bar khyams phyi khyams ma gtogs pa'i// gzhan dag cha bran bzhi bzhir bgo//
99a7: thig gi cho ga rdzogs pa dang // ye shes skud pas mchod bstod cing // rdo rje khu tshur sngags bcas kyis// rang gi gnas su gshegs gsol bya// oM badz+ra ga dza// dkyil 'khor bdag po'i nga rgyal gyis// mig gnyis mdang ta
99a8: las byung bar bsam/ / dkyil 'khor gnas rnams kun bltas te// sngags dang phyag rgya bcas pa yis// sgo dag bzhi po dbye byas nas// cha bran dag kyang blo yis brtag/ rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya yis// ri mo'i mkhar ni bte/

99b1: byas ste// 'byung 'jug gsang ba'i cho ga dag/ rnal 'byor brtan pa yid kyis bya// oM be ga kra ma hUM// pad ma rang bzhin rnam dag pas// dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i gnas chen po// thugs rje ye shes rnam 'phrul tshegs// khyab
99b2: mdzad byin rlabs ston pa'i gtso/ / rgyal ba rnams kyi sku gsung thugs/ yon tan phrin las rmad du 'byung // ma lus sems can don gyi phyir// pho brang dag par byin gyis rlobs// phyogs mtshams ma lus rnam dag pas/ byang
99b3: chub ye shes gnas gsal 'gyur/ / nyon mongs nyes tshogs kun bcom pa'i// thugs rje chen po dri med shugs// ye shes byin brlabs las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub par mdzod// rin chen rnams
99b4: lnga'i phyi ma dang / / sa tshen la sogs gang 'byor pa// rin po che yi snod thugs te// dkyil 'khor gnas kyi phyogs lngar gzhag/ sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs byas na// rigs lnga'i skud tshegs yum bcas la// rigs kyi
99b5: dkyil 'khor dbus sogs dang / / mchod bstod sngags kyis mnyes par bya// oM badz+ra tsi ta ma ti sa ma ya hUM/ dkar mthing ser po ljang khu dang // dmar po'i tshen rnams rim bzhin du// dbang ldan 'tshams nas brtsam/
99b6: byas te// ban tsa rA ga drang bar bya// g.yas pas pad ma rdo rje bzung // g.yon pas 'dren pa'i las bya'o// de la mchod 'bul sngags brjod cing // bden pa bdar te dgab par bya// 'di ni tshes dbyings rnam par dag/
99b7: sems can khams ni rab sgrol byed// dpal ldan pad mgar dbang ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// yang dag bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ dkyil 'khor las rnams shis par mdzad// dbus kyi lte ba
99b8: nas brtsams te/ / dang po slob dpon gyis bri zhing // phyis ni ci dgar shes par bri// mtho dman med snyoms drang por bya// de nas mtshan ma rtags bstan te// chad cing skabs mi 'grub ste// yon pos gdung ba'i las

100a1: rnams skya/ chad pas slob dpon slob ma dag/ shi tha ma ngan par 'gyur ba yin// lhag dang bcas pas g.yul 'khrugs shing // phyogs 'khrul pa yis smyo bar 'gyur// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gnas dag tu/ ra
100a2: mig nyi shurtsa lnga las/ / bde gshegs gtso bo'i rigs su bcas// phyag rgya'i yi ge mtshan ma bri// phyi rol pad ma'i 'dab gnas la// nyi shu rtsa bzhi tshigs rnams la// byang sems khro bo bcas padag/ shar nas rim bzhin
100a3: bri bar bya/ phyi dang nang gi 'tshams rnams su// mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad rnams gzhag/ bar 'khyams bskal bzangs sems dpa' rnams// sgo bzhir khro ba'i tshigs gzhag go// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus song ste//
100a4: bde gshegs 'od zer snang ba yi// pad mo rdo rje dril bcas pas// rang gi kha dog mtshon bcas bzhag/ de yi shar phyogs re'u mig la// tshe mtha' yas dang chos dbang phyug/ chags med 'od dang spyan dga' ba'i// bde rtsegs
100a5: pad ma'i phreng ba dang / / pad gnas rin chen glegs bam rin chen phreng // rang mdog sngags kyis brgyan pa gzhag/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bde bar gshegs pa mi bskyod pa// rdo rje dril bu'i sngags
100a6: bcas pas/ / rang gi 'od bcas gdan la gzhag/ de yi shar phyogs re'u mig la// 'brug sgra dri ma med pa'i rigs// mngon par snang mdzad bstan dbang phyug/ chags shing rin chen pad spungs pa// rin po che yi dra ba ste/
100a7: rim bzhin rang mdog sngags kyis brgyan// lho yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// bde gshegs rin po che spangs kyis// rin chen brtsegs dang dril bu la// rang mdog sngags kyis mtshan byas pa'o// de yi shar phyogs
100a8: mig la/ nam mkha'i mdzod dang dra ba can// dkon mchog rgyal mtshan rin chen togra// rin chen gling bu rin chen phreng // rin chen rgyal mtshan rin chen bum// rang gi 'od bcas sngags kyis brgyan// nub kyi dkyil 'khor dbus

100b1: gnas pa/ bde gshegs kun du snang ba'i 'od// 'khor lo dril bu mtshan ma la// rang 'od sngags kyis mtshan pa bri// pad mo rigs kyi 'khor lo'i tshad// byang gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// bde gshegs don yod grub
100b2: pa yi/ rdo rje sna tshogs dril bu bsnams// rang gi sngags dang kha dog gsal// de yi shar phyogs re'u mig la// brtson 'grus dang ni shugs chen po// gnod sbyin 'dul ba sna tshogs dbang // rgya gram phreng dang pad ma phreng // rdo rje
100b3: gdengs po zla kham can/ / 'od 'phros sngags kyis mtshan byas pa'i// 'tshams kyis re'u mig bzhi rnams la// 'od phros pad ma 'dzin pa dang // pad ma gnon dang pad skyong dang // me long rin chen phreng ba dang // pi bang gar gyi phyag/
100b4: rgyal/ rang 'od sngags kyis mdzes par bya// phyi rol pad ma'i shar brtsams ste// rigs kyi byang sems bzhi bzhir gnas// bde ba'i blo gros rgya mtsho'i sgra// gzi mdangs dang ni 'khor lo yi// nam mkha'i mdzod kyi 'khor
100b5: lo rin po che/ / pad lcug 'khor lo dbyug pa rnams// rang 'od sngags kyi mtshan mar gnas// shes rab snang ba rdo rje rgyal// 'od zer 'phro ba drag shul gyi// rin chen phung po rin chen gdugs// pad ma'i sdong po 'od phung bri/ dri ma'i/
100b6: tshogs dang sgyu ma 'phrul// rin chen rgyal po dra ba can// rin chen ri bo rgya gram bri// lag bzang gser 'od 'phro ba dang // rin chen skem chos mthong dang // pad ma'i rgya gram glegs bam dang // pad ma'i sdong po'i go cha bri// dri med dmun pa sel
100b7: ba dang / dga' ba dbyangs dang gzhon nu yi// chu shel nor bu'i phreng ba dang // sprin phung rdo rje rgya gram bri// de ni rigs lnga'i sems dpa' ste// rang 'od sngags kyis mtshan byas pa'i// de mthar khro bo bzhi rnams kyis// phyag rgya'i
100b8: mtshan ma bri byas te/ / sbyin bdag smra ba'i dbang phyug dang // rtse gsum rin chen rtse dgu dang // dbyig pa rtse gcig ral gri'o// gru 'chad mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi// bdug spos me tog mA me dri// phyi rol bar khyams gnas dag la/

101a1: phyogs re sems dpa' bzhi bzhi ste// rdo rje rnam snang gar mkhan dang // blo yi rgya mtsho thogs med bkod// rdo rje mtshan ma gsang sngags bcas// rang 'od gnas gdan dag la bri// pad mo dga' ba'i sal
101a2: dbang / rin chen spungs pa sprin gyi phreng // rin chen mtshan ma sngags dang bcas// rang 'od gdan la gnas pa bri// yi 'od me tog sgron ma dang // spos brtsegs kha lo bsgyur ba dang // pad ma'i mtshan ma sngags dang bcas/
101a3: rang 'od gdan la gnas par bri// dran dbang pad ma'i blo gros dang // las byed snying po'i blo gros dang // rgya gram mtshan ma sngags dang bcas// rang 'od gdan la gnas par bri// shar sogs pa yi sgo rnams su// khro ba
101a4: 'jigs pa'i rgyal po yis/ / rdo rje rgya gram rdo rje gdangs// rin chen dbyug pa pad ma phred// rang gi yi ge gdan gnas pa'i// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma bri bar bya// phyogs bzhi rgyan dang phreng ba dang // 'dod yon lha mo laso//
101a5: pa'i// rgyan rnams pad ma rdo rje dang / rin chen 'khor lo rgya gram bri// 'phreng bas mtshan ma kha dog lnga// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'od bcas pa'o// phyi rol rta babs dra ba sogs// ban d+ha dril bu nyi shu bzhi// gdugs dang bum pa
101a6: bya yi phreng / dpag bsam rdzing bu dang ba dang // nyi zla me long rgyal mtshan lnga// chos kyi 'khor lo ri dgas rnams// mdzes byas phyi mtha' pad ma dang // rdo rje me 'od mtshon gyis bskor// dbus mig kha dog nyi shu lnga/ pad
101a7: phrad dmar po bar khyams dkar/ / sgo bzhi'i rin chen sna bzhi yi// gru chad gser gyi kha dog can// mchod pa lnga dang bum dgram zher// bla rgyan na bza' phyogs rgyan bre// me tog tsho ma bu sngags bcas pa// so so'i gnas
101a8: su dgram par bya/ / gtor ma'i tshogs mang sbyar byas nas// phyi rol phyogs dad 'tshams su dgod// lha yi ting 'dzin gsal byas pas// dkyil 'khor shis pa'i las 'grub 'gyur// de nas lha rnams bstod byas/

101b1: te/ rdo rje pad mo dam tshig gzhugs/ thugs kha'i sngags kyis dgug byas pa'i// mgron rnams tshim par 'gyur ba dang // dam tshig sngags kyis bskul byas shing // rang gi phrin las bcol bar bya// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin
101b2: gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las gzugs brnyan rtsam pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o/ / // de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// rdo rje 'chang
101b3: sogs mgu 'gyur nas/ / rgyal ba slar yang bskul ba mdzad// kun don thugs rje chen po'i shugs// ma 'ongs gsang sngags spyod rnams kyis// dkyil 'khor chen por gang 'jug pa// dbang bskur tshul bzhin ji
101b4: lta bur/ de bzhin rab tu gnas pa gang // bdag gzhan don gyi yan lag bsrung // sbyin sreg rim pa ji ltar lags/ gtso bo thugs rje cher ldan pas// ma lus gdul bya kun gyi phyir// dus 'di snang bar mdzad nas kyang / cho ga'i
101b5: yan lag rgyas pa gsungs/ / de nas byang chub sems tshogs kyis// gus par gzung ste spyad par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang // phyag rgya shes rab rab bskyod cing // rab tu dga' ba'i bzhin rgyas pa// rigs rnam
101b6: kun la gzigs mdzad de/ / mchog gsum sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i// don 'di rab tu gnas par mdzad// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pa'i// ma 'ongs gdul bya gang dag gis// gnyis med gsang ba'i theg pa 'dir// smin par
101b7: lam la 'jug 'dod pas/ / gang gis nyes pa'i las rnams kyis// rdo rje slob don mgu byas nas// yang dang yang du gsol btab ste// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i don du gnyer// ma lus sdug bsngal las bsgral phyir/
101b8: byang chub sems mchog rgya chen blos// phyi nang 'byor pa'i yo byad dag/ thams cad byang chub don du bsngos// 'dod chagra rnaM dag pad mo'i dbyings// chos kun gyi ni de bzhin nyid// ye shes sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ de nga

102a1: yid 'ong don chen gnyer/ / oM u ta ga ta sa ma ya sto// pad ma dga' ba'i sku mchog mnyes// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i gnas// mtshan dpe phun sum tshogs pa yi// bder gshegs sku la phyag 'tsha'o// rdo rje
102a2: chen pos gzhan rnams 'joms/ / mi shes dri ma kun sel ba'i// thugs mchog gsang ba'i chos mthar phyin// rdo rje thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang sngags snying po gsang ba'i chos/ rab snang pad ma'i dbyings nas 'phrul/
102a3: byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan rin chen char 'bebs shing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal 'gyur ba// dpal mchog bkra shis phun sum tshogs// theg pa che la phyag
102a4: 'tshalo/ / kun tu gnas 'gyur khyab pa po// las mdzad rdo rje dam tshig mchog/ mi mthun gnas rnams rab 'joms mdzad// rdo rje 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug rgya la// dkyil 'khor chen po'i
102a5: gnas nyid du/ / dbang bskur gsang ba las byung ba// dam tshig ye shes rab grub mdzod// shes rab chos nyid las 'phrul ba'i// rjes su 'jug pas snying rje'i tshogs// yang dag bden pa las byung ba'i// byin rlabs 'dod pa tha
102a6: cad rdzogs/ / bde gshegs sprul pa'i tshig tshogs ni// dbang bskur rdzogs mdzad pa yi rigs// me tog phreng ba la sogs pas// slob ma rgyan par byas nas ni// phyir phyogs stegs bu la bzhag ste// gtor ma phyogs kun las
102a7: byin nas/ / kun la gsol 'debs bsgo bya zhing // slob ma gzhug pa nyid du bya// ras gtsang dmar po'i rgyu las 'byung // gnas gzhan ma spyad ma nyams par// rang gi sngags kyi byin brlabs nas// legs par gdong na g.yog
102a8: par bya/ / pad ma'i thal sbyar rin chen phreng // sngags brjod gzungs 'dzin rtse gcig tu// brtan por byang chub den gnyer bas// dkyil 'khor gnas su mos pa bskyed// de nas slob dpon blo ldan pas// theg chen lam la zhugs pa'i

102b1: phyir/ / slob ma dag la slar smras pa// gsang sngags lam mchog zab pa 'di// shin tu bzung ba dka' ba yin// khyod kyis bzung bar 'dod pa rnams// mi snyems pa yi blo bskyed nas// lta spyod mchog la gnas dgong so// kye ma
102b2: rdo rje gsang ba'i don/ / theg chen snying po bla na med// tshe 'dis byang chub 'grub byed kyang // rmongs rnams the tshom skye bar 'gyur// ngang tshul bzang po 'di rtogs pas// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// byin brlabs
102b3: ngo mtshar mchog brnyes ste/ / sems can don phyir tshul dang ldan// khyod kyis sgro skur dang bral zhing // dang brtson the tshom med par zud// de nas slob mas slar gsol ba// yang dag thugs rje cher mnga' ba'i// mgon mchog rnams
102b4: kyis bdag la gnod/ / 'di dag bdag la rtol med pas// khyod kyis gsungs bzhin gsol bar 'tshal// slar yang rab gus dang ba'i yid// tshul chen mi nyan dam tshig mchog/ slob dpon tshe la skyabs su mchi// sangs rgyas
102b5: dkyil 'khor sras bcas tshogs/ / thugs mchog dri med bdag la dgongs// bdag gis byang chub don gnyer bas// dkyil 'khor gnas su mos pa bskyed// gar gyi dbang phyug bde chen mchog/ mgon 'gyur rnams la skyabs
102b6: mchi/ / mya ngan las 'das pho brang 'dir// bdag nyid zhugs par mdzad pa legs// de nas las kyi rdo rje yis// gsang ba'i mthe bo nas gzung ste// yol po'i nang du bzhugs par bya// oM pad mo sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya yo ga tsi taM u
102b7: pa ta ya ma~M hUM swA hA/ / de nas gsadra ba'i gnas bzhugs pas// mchod brnyes rgyun gshegs la sogs kyis// snod du rung bar gyur pa dang // dam tshig gsum sgrogs chu blud cing // rdo rje gsang ba'i dam sgrogs shing // phyag rgyas
102b8: sngags kyi gnas gsum sbyang / / oM rgyal ba kun gyi khyod nyid ni// byin gyis brlab cing brtan mdzad pas// pad ma gar dbang dkyil 'khor 'dir// bdag med dam tshig spangs pa dang // dad med brtson 'grus nyams pa dang // blo dpan

103a1: shes rab chung ba dang / / blod san rtog 'dzin la gnas la// srog gi phyir yang brjod mi bya// bde chen mgon po pad 'chang sku// khyod kyi snying la zhugs pa na// gsang ba'i ye shes gzhan brjod dus// snying khrag 'thung
103a2: zhing gzhan du shes/ / bdag ni gar gyi dbang phyug sku// khyod la thugs rjes bzung byed pas// nga yis bsgo ba'i tshig 'di dag/ 'da' bar rung ba ma yin no// bdag la brnyas shing 'khru byed na// rab gtum khro bo chen po'i sku// grang ba
103a3: tshal ba brgyar 'gas shing / / lus sems ngal sogs rdul du byed// gnas gzhi 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la// rang sngags sa bon 'od zer bcas// dbab pa'i gsang sngags lan stong du// dri zhim bdug spos dril dkrol zhing //
103a4: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug par bya// des ni mtshan ma'i rtags mthong 'gyur// sku yi ye shes phyogs bcur g.yos// gsung gi ye shes gsang ba brjod// thugs kyi ye shes mngon shes gsal// sngags gsum phyag
103a5: rgyas brtan par gnas/ / bden pa'i ye shes byin brlabs kyis// dkyil 'khor rigs kyi lha gang yin// bdag gis bskal pa ci lta bar// dus 'dir dbab par mdzad par rigs// nor bu phreng ba gar bab pa// rigs de rang gi
103a6: dam tshig nyid/ / sngags dang phreng ba ma lus pa// slar nyid de la sbyin par bya// gser gyi thur ma byin brlabs pas// ma rig ldongs pa'i ling tog bsal// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// khyod kyi mig 'byed brtson
103a7: par mdzang / / ma rig bsgribs g.yogs gsal mdzad nas// pad mo spyan bzangs dri ma med// oM pad ma tsak+Shu dz+nyA na pra be sha phaT/ rdo rjes gdong g.yogs bsal byas nas// dkyil 'khor gsal ba bstan par bya// legs par ltos
103a8: cig blo gros che/ / sngon gyi rgyal ba la sogs rnams// gsang sngags snying po dkyil 'khor 'dir// legs par zhugs te grub pa bzhin// me tog gang la bab pa yi// lha de rigs kyi dam tshig yin// shar gyi sgo srungs nas

103b1: brtsams te/ / gtso bo'i bar du dkyil 'khor bstan// zhal zas na bza' la sogs pas// bla ma blo ldan mnyes par bya// yid dam lha sku phyag rgya sogs// gsang ba'i ming dang bcas par bstan// de ring dus nas bzung byas
103b2: te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas thob par// rab rib tha ma'i blo ldan pas// dus kun du ni bzung bar bya// kye ma ho blo gros rgya mtsho'i gnas// 'gro la bskyabs pa'i don brtson la// khyod zhabs pad ma la btud de// pho brang grong
103b3: mchog nyams dga' 'dir/ / dbang bskur ba yi rin chen mdzod// snang mdzad lus la bab pa lags// rigs bzhin thugs rje rtse dgongs pas// dri ma'i skyon sol byin brlabs mdzod// gnang bar mdzod pa'i dus lags
103b4: bas/ / skyob pa'i sku mchog thob par mdzod// shar gyi sgo phyogs khru do'i rgyab// dbang bstan dkyil 'khor dbus kyi tshad// pad ma 'dab brgyad sgo dang bcaso// dmar po'i 'tshon gyis legs byugs te// seng ge'i khri ba shas
103b5: pad mor bcas/ / 'khor lo sgyur rgyal tshul gyis gzhag/ spyi bor gdugs mdzes rgyal mtshan g.yas// dung dang zang dung sil snyan rnams// rol cha mchod cha phyogs 'tshams dgod// rgyan phreng gos kyis legs klubs
103b6: ba/ / dri chu sngags bcas yungs dkar dang // ku sha'i chu yis dag par bya// oM ma hA bin ta ha na na hUM phaT/ de nas rigs kyi lhar bskyed de// bkra shis bdag pa'i glu blangs shing // rol mo rgyan phreng bkod byas te// bum pa'i chu
103b7: yis dbang bskur bya/ / de'i phyir na sgrib tshogs dang // bag chags nyon mongs gnas dag nas// lha yi chu rgyu na dag pa'i mthus// yo shes phung po dbang phyug mchog/ oM lha yi chu ri dag pa'i chu// rdo rje gsang gsum gnas lnga
103b8: byung / / byang sems chu yis tshogs rnams ngag/ dbang bskur ba yi don thob mdzod// yon tan rin chen rnam dag mchog/ rigs lnga'i sku rgyan byas pa yi// dbu rgyan bzang po'i cod pan bcas// kun 'byung rin chen phung

104a1: po mcho/ / traM yon tanam bcas sa rgyan// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed// khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po zhe mtshan dang dpa byad kun rdzob kun// ye nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa// 'od phreng sngags kyis
104a2: brgyan byas pa'i/ / rtogs bcas tshogs rnams kun las rgyal// bde gshegs thugs rje rtse gcig pas// khams gsum gnas rnams dor mi mdzad// byang sems rdo rje rtse lnga pa// rang rig ye shes gnas gsal
104a3: byed/ / chos rnams skye ba med pa'i don// sgra brjod dngos po brag cha bzhin// stong pa'i dril bu gsung rang bzhin// de las sna tshogs rgya chen tshegs// hoM chos kun rgyu las rnam grol zhing // de bzhin rkyen med 'bras bu'i
104a4: tshegs/ / rang bzhin pad ma dag pa'i dbyings// nges pa'i theg pa ston byed gsung // kye ho rdo rje che ge mo// rigs kyi mtshan gyis dbang bskur ste// chos sku 'od gsal bde ba che/ pad ma'i sgra dbyangs ming dang bcas// oM phyag
104a5: rgya chen po gsang ba'i gnas/ / rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// mi mthun la sogs bcom byas te// rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs// oM badz+ra pad mo a bi/ ny+tsa mi// oM rad na mu ku ta a biShiny+tsa hUM/ oM a
104a6: tib ti traM a bi/ Shiny+tsahaM/ oMn mche ge mo a bi Niny+tsa mi// slob dpon lta la rab gus pas// tshegs bcas yon tan gzung byed cing // rdo rje dam tshig pa yi spun// mig gi 'bras bu bzhin du bskyud // 'di dag la gus snod/
104a7: byed pa// che srog rdo rje gtum pos 'phrog/ sngags rnams dus su brjod bya zhing // phyag rgya rgyun du bcing bar bya// gsang ba'i tshig dang mtshan ma'i tshegs// dus kun dag tu snga byas te// bdud rtsi lnga po sha sogs rnams//
104a8: mnyam par shes pas rgyun tu spyad// bro drug glu drug stabs pa yi// brtul shugs gnas skabs dag tu bya// nyon mongs tshes lnga 'dod yon lnga// dam tshig nyams pas shes par spyad// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya che// nas

104b1: gsum brtul zhugs la gnas shing / / lung bstan rjes gnang dbugs 'don pa'i// cho ga bzang po sprad par bya// de ni rdo rje slob dpon mchog/ yon tan bza' ba'i gnas theb 'gyur// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya sku// yang
104b2: dag sngags kyis byin brlabs te/ / ma 'ongs gzung ba'i blo gnas pas// gsang ba'i dam tshig rjes su zung // oM sarba ta thA ga ta swa ra pa da ma sa ma ya s+t+wa~M// oMd du shrI pad mo g+han d+ha a/ oM ma hA pad mo swA hA sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya tra/
104b3: tsi ta hUM phaT/ mchod pa bkra shis bzang la klags// brtul shugs mchog tu gyur pa yin// bdag dang gzhan gyi don spyod pa'i// dngos grub thun mong cho ga'i las// zhi rgyas dbang dang dgug pa dang // dbye rmongs bskrad
104b4: ba'i cho ga dang / / gsang pa la sogs las rnams kun// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di yi tshul// khyod kyis gang 'dod grub par gyis// de nas rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i// pad ma'i dkyil 'khor rab sbyor bas// 'khor
104b5: ba'i chos rnams zil gnon cing / / phyogs bcur dam chos gsung sgrogs shing // pha rol phyin drug gnas 'phags te// sgro 'dogs the tsom gcod par byed// lung bstan bde gshegs sras bcas kyis// rigs
104b6: mchog mdzad pa bla na med/ / rgyal ba kun gyis lung bstan mdzad// khams gsum 'dzin bcas kun las grol// 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig/ khams gsum kun na gzhan med de// des na 'dod chags thal
104b7: bar/ khyod kyis nam yang ma byed cig/ oM ma hA sa ma ya hU~M phaT// gsang sngags rgyun rnams 'dzin bya dang // lha dang slob dpon gsung bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// gsung gcig sgo nas gsungs
104b8: pa yin/ / 'gro rnams kun la phan pa'i blos// dkyil 'khor la sogs brtson par gyis// dad brtson shes rab blo ldan pas// gang 'dod 'bras bu'i tshul la sbyor// mchog tu gsang ba'i grong khyer 'dir/

105a1: gang gis 'dod don gang gnyer ba// des ni sgrib sogs kun spangs shing // mchog gnas ye shes gsal bar sbyor// bde chen gsang ba'i theg pa che// tshe 'di byang chub 'grub par byed/ nyon mong/
105a2: dgra sogs las grol ba'i// bde ba chen po'i gnas thob pa'o// de nas lha dang bzhugs gnas pa'i// rnam dag de nyid bstan bya ste// mchod sbyin gtor tshegs mgron gnyer cing // bkra shis 'gro ba'i
105a3: tshegs bsags bya/ / slar yang slob ma blo ldan pas// yon mchog bla ma la phul te// maN+Dal mchod pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// mnyes byas gsel ba gdab par bya// shes rab yan lag phun sum tshogs/
105a4: bcu drug yang na nyi shu bzhi// rdo rje bla ma la phul ste// byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga bya// khrus byas dri zhim rgyan gyis grubs// sna tshogs sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyar// rigs kyi lha dang ldan byas pas// dam tshig bskul
105a5: bar brdas mtshan ste/ / gnyis med ye shes snyoms 'jug bya// byang chu sems kyis rgyun gyis// rang gi dkyil 'khor mchod byas pas// slob dpon tshogs la dbang yang bskur// ji ltar rgyal ba sras mchog gis//
105a6: 'jug pa po rnams tshim mdzad pa'i// gnyis med ye shes gsang ba'i don// dbab pa'i phyag rgya pa sa byung ba'i// a la la ho/ oM A hU~M/ a ho su ka rang gi gnas// a he ra ti tshim par mdzad// dkyil 'khor kun la
105a7: rang bzhin gnas/ / shes rab mchog ldan byin brlabs pa// slob ma'i lag tu gtang bar bya// rang bzhin bde ba'i ye shes nyid// zag pa med pa'i don gsal 'gyur// rnam rtog med pa'i sems kyis ni/ rang gi
105a8: dngos nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ / e ma ho 'gro ba'i gnas 'di dag/ de bzhin nyid las gzhan du 'khrul// de dag bde chen ye shes pas// gzhan du 'gyur ba ci yang med// ye shes 'di ni shin du phra// rdo rje snying po

105b1: mkha' 'dra zhing / rdul bral thar pa zhi pa'i chos// rang gi rang bzhin de nyid do// de ni sbyin sreg gsang ba'i don// khyed rnams kun la phyir bshad de// dkyil 'khor chen po phyogs bzhi 'am// gzhan yang gnas gzhan
105b2: gang 'thad par/ kau rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang // las kun pa yi thab khang brtsa ma// zlum po khru gang zla lam dang // grugasam sna tshogs dbyibs can no// de dag dkar ser dmar dang nag/ sna bzhi kun gyis mtshon pa'o//
105b3: rdo rje 'khor lo pad ma'i rgyan// sna tshogs rdo rje mtshan cha can// khru gang bzhi dang gnyis med dang // khru gsum de yi zhabs su byed// bud shing yam shing so sa ya// mtshan nyid lo 'bras kha dog ro// rtse mo cha las sor 'i
105b4: dang / sor brgyad bcu drug nyi shu'i tshad// sbams pa'i so so'i mar gyis thug/ rim bzhin rtsa ba bud khang ni// zlum dang gru bzhi zla ga ma dang // gru gsum tshul du rtsig par bya// lha rnams kun gyi khang pa nyid// me yi gnas
105b5: su gzhag byas te/ / so sor las dang 'thun pa ste// a ga ne ra tsa bod par bya// g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgyas g.yab// g.yon pa bgrang 'phreng bzung bar bya// oM e h+ye hi ag ne ye ma hA ba ba hi swA hA// khro bo'i rgyal
105b6: gsung bya ste/ / me lha'i gdan mchod pad ma dbul// de rjes mchod pa rnam lnga dang / sreg rdzas ma lus dbul byas nas// lha rnams mchod pa'i phyag brtsad du// bstod cing gsol ba gdab par bya// g.yas g.yon dgang
105b7: gzar blugs gzar gyis/ / khu bcud 'dzag pa'i rnam grangs dbul// oM ma hA a na la ma hA b+hU tA badz+ra la basmi ku ru hUM sar+b+ba duSh+TA Na hUM phaT// me lha mchod pa'o// oM ma hA ku ru bany+tsa hU~M// dgang lugs dbul ba'i sngagaso/ oM saH
105b8: pa d+ha ta na badz+ra swA hA/ / til gyi'o// oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM// me tog gi'o// oM sarba a k+She ye hU~M swA hA// ya ma shing do// e badz+ra pu tsa me g+ha ga lo ki shwa ra hUM// 'jig rten dbang phyug bya ba'i mchod pa'o// oM d+hU ba rtib bu sha g+han d+he sbyar ba'i mtsho

106a1: pa rnams so/ / oM a pra ti badz+ra ya swA hA/ ku sha'i 'o// oM badz+ra a yu she swA hA// dur ba'i'o// gzhan yang rdzas rnams gang tshogs pa// rang mi de yi ge gsum sngags dbul// de nas dkyil 'khor kun mchod cing /
106a2: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btab// sdig bshags bag chags kun byas pas// lha yi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// tha ma me lha mchod byas nas// phrin las so so'i sngags brjod cing // oM badz+ra na ma sarba ta thA ga ta dri da yam/
106a3: ku rA hUM/ lharna mas gshegs su gsol zhing // dam tshig lha la bsdu bar bya// de nas rab gnas bzang po ni// 'gro la phan phyir bshad par bya// sa phyogs nyams dga' mdzes parla// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor legs
106a4: byas te/ / mchod rdzas rdzas kyis mnyes byas nas// slob dpon chos su gzhug par bya// dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgrubs byas nas// rten tshogs sbyang ba'i cho ga bya// ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// dga' ldan
106a5: gnas nas gshegs mdzad de/ / lha mo sgyu ma'i lhums zhugs nas// de bzhin 'dir yang bzhugs su gsol// dkon mchog gnas 'dir gzhugs nas kyang // me tog la sogs mchod bzhes la// 'di don bzung bar
106a6: bya ba dang / / byang chub sems mchog spel bar mdzod// na par rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal// slob ma rnams la btse ba dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// bcom ldan bdag ni grub pa la// bka' drin cho ga
106a7: mdzad par 'os/ / de nas gnas rnams kun sbyangs nas// 'gro drug gnas kun sgrol byed pa// thams cad dus 'dir dgongs su gsol// byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang // gsang ba'i sngags ldan lha rnams
106a8: kun/ / 'jig rten mchod pa'i don phyir ro// rab gnas bzang por 'os pa lags// de nas gnas rnams kun sbyangs nas// byin gyis brlabs pa rdzogs byas te// rang gi dkyil 'khor ji lta bar// dbang bskur cho ga rdzogs

106b1: byas nas/ / sbyin sreg gtor ma la sogs gtang // zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ lam khyad par du 'phags pa'i
106b2: le'u sa brgyad pa'o/ / / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa de'i tshe// bdud kyi rgyal po shin tu mya ngan skyes te/ kye ma'o ho sangs rgyas 'dir ni bdag gi gnas la sogs pa bcom
106b3: zhing brlag par byed na thabs ji lta bur gdul bar bya/ / 'on kyang 'di nyid la ni bdag ci yang bya ba'i gnas med// shin tu dman par gyur pa dag dang mtshungs par 'gran nam// de bzhin du 'jig rten gsum pa 'di dag ni//
106b4: srid pa mi bsreg brlag par bya ba'i phrin las yin pas// thams cad la bka' bsgo zhing // las ngan pa 'di dag la bzlog par bya'o zhes bsam mo// de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi gnas na mthu che ba dang // dbang dang gzi
106b5: brjid thams cad 'dus nas/ / kye khyed rnams// bdag la nyon cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag ni// rgyal po gcig gi dbang du ma gnas na// thams cad srid pa 'jig par 'gyur ro// des na phyogs thams cad
106b6: 'khor dang bcas pa 'dus la/ / bdag gi bka' nyan par mdzod cig ces bsgrags so// de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi drag byed chen po'i tshogs kyis rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul bstan cing smras pa// khyed ji lta bu'i nga rgyal can cig
106b7: yin/ / nged rnams re res kyang 'khor dpag tu med pa skyor ba'i rgyal po chen po yin pas yul 'khor grangs med pa la dbang byed cing / gzhan gyi reg nas dam par gyur pa lags pas khyod rang zhi ba la gnas na legs so//
106b8: zhes 'thun par brjod par bas bdud kyi rgyal po yang shin tu nyon mongs pas rgyas te gzhan dag la smras pa/ lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di dag kun// da yi bka' las gnas pa yin// skye 'gro ma lus gang dag can/

107a1: rgyal ba bgal gas nyan par byas// khams gsum bdag pa lta u0f7f// sa rnams dran gyis snad ga/ dag nam thA dang rdzu phrus chad// kun rdzas dran par nus ma yin// nga yi bka' las 'ad byed na// kro
107a2: med parlag cing gnas kyang 'thor/ / zhes brjod do// de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal pos/ rang gi 'khor dpag tu med pa bsdus te// de dag go dbus nas srin po chen po'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i khro bar gnas nas// rang
107a3: mthulas sprul ba'i khro bo dang / / mtshan cha'i tshigs spro bar mdzad do// de bzhin du khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshigs kyi bdag po dang / 'bring gar te dang / gnon nu gdong drag pa rnams
107a4: kyis kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang dpag tu med pa bsdus te/ / de dag gi dbus na 'gying zhing sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab par spros te/ dbang dang rdzu 'phrul ston to// ra rab kyi kha khyer la gnas pa'i rgyal po chen po bzhis
107a5: kyang rang gi 'khor gyis dbus na 'gying zhing mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ston par mdzad do/ / gser gyi ri la gnas pa'i phyogs skyong brgya byin dang / dbang ldan dang / gshin rje dang / bden bral dang / chu lha dang / gnod sbyin dang /
107a6: nyi ma dang // ma'i lha rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi gnas dang bcas par 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha dang bcas par 'khod do// nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / mig dmar dang / phur bu dang / pa ba sangs dang / sman pa dang / gza' chen po rnam
107a7: kyis kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas pas 'jigs pa'i khro bo'i tshogs dang / mtshon char bcas pas 'khod do// mtha' yas dang / 'jog po dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang // rigs ldan dang / nor rgyas dang / dung skyong dang / 8
107a8: ma dang / / chu lha rnams kyis rang rang gi g.yog 'khor rnam dang // 'jigs pa'i sprul pas 'khod do// de bzhin du khams gsum gyi drags byed kyi tshogs gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / grul bum dang / 'gro ba drugag cu

107b1: bo dbang che zhing mthu yod pa rnams dang / / ma mo rnams dang / gshin rje dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / 'dab bzangs dang / srin po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / rgyu skar gyi tshogasu bcas pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi 'khor gyis
107b2: dbus na 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyi mtshon cha dang nga ro dang bcas pas rnam par 'phrul zhing 'khod do/ / de nas bdud kyi rgyal po yang nyon mongs pa skyes te// rang gi 'khor rnams 'du bar mdzad cing rdzu 'phrul gyi nus pa
107b3: ci yod pa dus 'di dag gcig tu ston nas/ / mtshon cha sna tshogs 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang nas drag po 'bar bar 'jigs pa'i skur ston to// khro mo'i tshogs dang rol ba mdzad pa lags// 'khor ba'i tshogs
107b4: mtshon cha me 'od bcas pa phyogs bcur spros te nam mkha' thams cad gang bar byas nas thog ser nad dang tshub ma thams cad skyes so/ / des 'jig rten gyi lha kun myos shing rmongs par gyur pa dang / 'jigs pa'i
107b5: tshogs kyis phyogs thams cad nas/ / 'khor ba'i ma 'od 'bar ba'i mtshon chas bsad cing gtubs pa las// so so'i tshogs bred par gyur te// rang gi snying po phul zhing skyabs su gsol lo// de nas lha thams cad
107b6: 'du bar byed pa'i bdud kyi sde de dag la gnas dor zhing dam tshig byin te/ so so'i snying po blangs te/ 'khor tshogs thams cad rje dpon dang bral te// lha chen po brgyad ni rang gi rtsol 'khod do// rgyal po chen ba bzhin sha
107b7: gling la 'khod do/ / gnod sbyin dang phyogs skyong dag ni shar gyi gling 'phran gnyis su 'khod do// 'gro ba rib drug gi sems can rnams ni lhor bstod do// dri za dang ma mo rnams ni lho'i gling bran la dgod do// lha ma yin rnams
107b8: ni nub tu dgod do/ / gshin rje dang 'dab bzangs dang srin po rnams ni nub kyi gling gi gling phran gnyis la dgod do// gza' dang rgyu skar rnams ni byang du dgod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa gas ba bla na med pa

108a1: las bdud kyi sprul pa bstan pa'o/ / // de nas bdud kyi rgyal po de nyid shin tu dga' ning 'khor thams cad la bka' bas+ho// rgyal po gcig gi 'khor du gnas pas ni// yid dang 'thun par spyod pas gnas pa yin pas/ khyed
108a2: rnams kyis kyang ngas kyi ltar bsgo ba'i dka' bzhin nyon la/ / thar pa'i lam 'di chod la/ ston pa gzhan la gus par ma byed cig/ khro bo'i 'jig rten stongs par 'ong ngo // bsam pa rgya chen po'i med pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag ni/
108a3: mug can gyi rang bzhin ste/ byol sor lta bu yin pas/ khade legs kyi gnas thob pa'i don med pa yin no// yang tshig su bcad de smras pa// kye 'du shes med pa'i 'gro ba dag/ rang gi bde ba spong byed ci// thar pa'i lam gzhan/
108a4: sgrub byeng pa// de dag 'khrul pas rang rgyud brlag/ nyes 'dod bde legs spong byed pa// rmongs pas 'gro rnams snying re rje// re shig thugs rje skal ldan pas// bdag gi 'khor du 'dus pa yin// gnas gzhan gong mtho ba
108a5: 'dod pas/ / dge la dad sems gus par gyis shig ces bsgo'o// de dag gis kyang de ltar nyan ste// rang rang gi gnas shor zhing mya ngan gyi sems skyes kyang ci ltar bya ba'i thabs med de/ de ltar 'khod cing gnas
108a6: so/ / de nas bdud kyi rgyal po rang gi gnas su song ste/ 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dga' ba'i longs spyod 'dod pa'i yon tan la spyad cing // dgyes pa'i glu gar dang rol mo la spyod do// ji ltar khams gsum
108a7: kun gyi bdag po ni bdag yin pas/ / 'di las lhag pa'i bsgrub bya ni gzhan dag yod par bdag gis ma mthong ngo // nga sangs rgyas kyi tshogs dang byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang bdag gi dbang du bstan
108a8: thabs ci ltar brtsam zhing / rang gi 'khor dag la yang 'dri bar byed do// de nas bdud kyis grong khyer kun la bsgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor rnams lam dge ba'i bltas dang mtshan ma ngan pa'i cho 'phrul

108b1: sna tshogs kyi bsgrub pa thams cad du rab tu 'chad cing / ci 'dod pa rnams la grub par bya na bdag cag la mos pa byed do// de'i rjes la de dag ge gtso bo rnams bdag gi 'khor du 'dus pa'i tshe thabs sna chog
108b2: kyi sgronas gdul bar bya'o/ / gal te 'ongs par ma nus bdag ni kho rang gi gnas de nyid dang bcas pa gzhom par bya'o zhes brjod do// de'i stong gsum g.yo bar byed pa'i tshogs kyi khro bo'i mtshan
108b3: cha'i tshogs dang bcas pa sprul nas/ / dkar po'i ros la dga' ba'i 'gro ba rnams ma lus bcom zhing // sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang brlag par bshams pa las/ bden par
108b4: mthu gang la gnod par ma gyur to/ / de nas rab tu khros te/ bdag gi khams gsum 'di dus gcig tu gdul bar bya spyod pa la// ngan pa'i tshul can g.yo sgyu dang bcas pa 'di dag mi 'dul lam/ de rang gi snga
108b5: tshan 'og ma la gnas pa kun bskal te/ thar pa'i lam la gnas pa 'di dag rigs kyis gdul bar bya'o// zhes brjod do// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa bsgo bar mdzad pa dang / de dag gis kyang rang rang gi sprul pa
108b6: dang / mtshon cha rnam phyogs kun tu spro zhing // rang gi gsang sngags drag po'i tshogs dag kyang brjod par byed do// des 'jig rten 'khrugs shing g.yos nas thams cad bred par gyur to// bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud
108b7: las/ bdud kyi sde dang bcas pa shugs 'byung ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan pade chen mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyis// stong gsum so sor 'dul mdzad phyir// rnam 'phrul ting 'dzin gnas la
108b8: bzhugs/ / de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos kyang // thugs rje che dang smon lam mthus// so so'i las rtog 'thun bzhin du// sna tshogs rtog pa'i tshul ma ston// 'dod chags la zhen smon pa dag/ chags pa chen pos 'dul bar
108b9: mdzad/ / de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog 'dral don du// 'thun byas snang ba sna tshogs dang // mi mthun sgo nas 'dul bar mdzad// pad mo bde gshegs rdo rje don// rin chen rin chen las

109a1: sna tshogs/ / phyag rgya che sogs 'khor lo sgyur// ji lta ba bzhin dag par mdzod// thabs chen rnam dag pad mo'i dod// shes rab sprul ba'i mchog 'gyur bas// gar gyi dbang phyug bde ba che// rdo rje lha nyid
109a2: sprul par mdzad/ / gzhan yang mdzad pa rgya chen po// sde tshogs mthu yis 'dul mdzad de// dag pa'i 'gro ba 'thun byas sku// gser 'od mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// go byed theg pa bla na med// zab mo gsang sngags ji bzhin par//
109a3: rgyabs de gshegs phyag rgya'i mu// rab srul dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i// la las byang sems rgya chen mchog/ la laralam lnga dag par spyod// la lar pha rol byin bcu rdzogs// la lar 'bras bu'i don la sbyor// la lar dga'/
109a4: ldan lha yul 'phags// lhums su zhugs pa'i bltam pa dang // 'jig rten spyod 'thun rol rtsed sogs// gzhan gyi skur spangs bya ba bsnams// bcas ka'i can gyi bsam 'phrul ba// 'thun 'jug thabs kyi bya ba mchog/ dka' thub mdzad//
109a5: dang bka' ba spyod// rdo rje ga dan la yang sangs rgyas// bdud 'dul mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas shing // rtse gcig ting 'dzin bskul nas bzhugs// cho 'phrul mdzad pa kun 'dul zhing // chos kyi 'khor lo rims bzhin bskor// mya ngan
109a6: 'da' tshul ring srel ston zhi tshogs khro bor 'khyil ba dang / / rang byung dud 'gro'i gzugs sna tshogs// snod kyi 'jig rten kun mthu sku// tshangs pa khyab 'jug 'jig rten skyong // bdud dang srin po gzugs sogs kyis// 'gro
109a7: ba'i las rtog dag mdzad cing / / rang gi ye shes don bkod bya// de tshe 'gro ba'i gnas mtshon tshogs// las kyi stobs tshogs mthus brdabs rnams// de bzhin nyid mthus tshogs chen pos// yang dag lam la sa rab grol zhing //
109a8: nga rgyal chen po'i dregs tshogs skyes// rang gi mthu dad rdzu 'phrul ston// nyon mongs las kyi lam la zhen// rang gi rigs tshogs bsdu bar byed// 'jig rten gsum 'jig a la la// khams gsum gtso bo'i bdag cag nama?/

109b1: bu'is sprus pa al la// 'jigs par mdzad pa'i 'os ma lags// rang gi bka'athub pa dganas pas// myangan 'das pa'i lam mchog ste// gzhan gyi bstan pa ci zhig bya// bde tshogs 'jigs pa'i yan lag go// bu shig
109b2: rang gi bar spong zhing / / gzhan nas sdug bsngal don gnyer ba// gzugs mang sprul pa bsam yas kyang // rang gi sku mdzes bsgyur ba dka'// sgra mang sprul pa bsam yas pas// rang gi gsung nyan 'phro byed dam// sems
109b3: rtog bya ba'i 'od bcas kyis/ / ting 'dzin rtse gcig 'gyur ba med// drag po'i stobs mchog gzi ldan rnams// rang gis rang spyod bde bar sdod// de nas bdud dpung dang po dang // dbang phyug tshangs pa khyab 'jug che// rmya byed dgu dang
109b4: dregs byed rnams/ / rab tu khros te rang gi mthus// ston zhing drag po'i gsang sngags dang // gtum tshig dang 'bod sgrogs pa byed// de tshe rgyal po'i byin brlabs mthus// mthun 'dug thabs kyis 'dul mdzad de// theg pa gsar
109b5: ba tha med mchog/ khyad par sgo gsum gsang byed cing // yang dag don la bde bkod phyir// thugs rje chen pos 'thun mdzad de// 'jug pa'i lam ring bde bstan zhing // dga' ba'i sgo nas bde mdzad kyang // rang gi nyen mongs dregs/
109b6: pa'i mthus// don 'jug 'thun pa'i snod sgo 'jig/ gti mug chen po mun btibs nas// nga rgyal ri bo kun tu bkod// zhe sdang me lce 'bar sreg shing // phrag dog rlung gis bskyod byas nas// 'dod chags chu bos 'byin
109b7: par 'gyur/ / dregs pa'i mthu yis rab 'khros te// tshogs rnams gcig la gcig bsgo zhing / gsang sngags rdzu 'phrul stobs phyung nas// rab tu bsgrags pa'i mthu yis ni// 'jig rten gsum dag 'khrug par byed// mi
109b8: nad mu ge 'khrug pa dang / / mtshon cha le tog 'bras bu 'phrog/ 'byung po'i 'jigs gzugs nyes tshogs rnams// rgyun mi 'chad du 'khor bar 'byung // sa gzhi me 'bar chu bdag byed// dug dang dbyig dug rlung bzhin/

110a1: g.yas// bdal ma ma thongs thar la ma gcod // mdag sa mas kyis nan 'gyur zhing // 'gro rnams sdug bsngal bskyed pas pas sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs bral bskyed // de nas byang chub sems bcas pa'i//
110a2: 'khor rnams dus gcig bstan par bzhengs// gtso ba'i phyogs su 'dud byed cing // lan grangs bskor zhing phyag kyang 'tshal// mgon po bde ba mnyes byed cing // mched nas gsol ba gdab par bya// thugs rje mnga' lta yi
110a3: lha/ / bya mas sogs dga' ba'i bdud rtsi chus// gdes bcas thal bar brlag mdzad pas// thim 'gyur rdo rje ye shes tshogs// cho 'phrul dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol// mdzad pa'i byin brlabs bstan du gsol// de dag
110a4: nyor mongs rlabs 'khrugs pas/ / rang gzhan thar lam bde bar 'joms// byang chub sems nyid rlan bral lam// srid gsum yal bar dor byed na// thugs rje chen po gang gang gis// e ma ho 'bras bu mya ngan 'das/
110a5: e ma ho byang sems pad pa'i brdzings// a ma ho brjod bral ku mu ta// e ma ho me tog 'bras bcas shing // 'di dag dkyil 'khor rnam dag pas// rigs mchog mtshan nyid yon tan gnas// dus 'dir dag par ga la
110a6: mdzad/ thugs rje chen po gal gangags// 'di dag skal ldan gsung ba'i snod// rdo rje theg pa'i bstan pa 'dzin// da ltar rnam rtog ri bos non// thabs kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur bas// shugs kyis bskal bar bya ba'i phyir/
110a7: dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bstan du gsol// zhes gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpa la ta mchog rol pa'i rgud chen po la sa mdzad pa chen po le'u ste bcu pa'o//
110a8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po rnams 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ste/ rdo rje bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid sku gsung thu gas kyi dbyings nas phyung ste sprul pa mdzad do// gru bzhi pa la
110a9: sgo bzhi pa'i rtabapas rgyan tshogs kun gyis spras/ rin chen nor bu'i phreng sogs dang // ban d+ha dril bu 'dod lnga'i tshogs// mchod pa bla rgyal mtshan gdugs// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lngas spras// 'khor lo ro'u mig dgu pa las// seng ge la sogs gdan khri

110b1: sa/ / lag kyang / / N+Da/ ta thad d+han/ pab banyam/ yang la zhwa/ kAs tak+Sha/ ye shes ma 'dres pade chen gas pa// rnam 'phrul rigs mchog gzungs kyi dmacig dang // thog 'dren par
110b2: mdangs kyis gnas/ / rigs gnyis lung gis rgud pa'i sku// dmar na gzhal gsum phyag drug pa// ser dkar dmar ba'i zhal gnyis dag/ bzhin mdangs tshangs pa'i tshul gyi gnas// dbus pa khro 'dzum brjid pag dang /
110b3: bad ma rdo rje 'khor lo dang // dril bu rin chen rtsa gsum 'dzid// rin chen phreng ba'i chun 'phyangs dang // bu tig do shal dpung rgyar smras// stod g.yogs srad dkris na bza' klubs// dbu rgya ra stan ma sor rngub tshogs// mtshan pa ra
110b4: dpe bad mdzes par brgyar/ / rigs kyi mchod pas dbu pra sil// rang 'od btsun mo'i sku bcas pa// phyung nas phyogs bcu'i sngags kyis spros// hUM phaT pad mo 'grig dza swA hA// oM du d+ya b+hin d+ha dza pra mo haM/ mdzad pa'i phrin las rdzogs
110b5: byas nas/ / srar 'dus bdag po'i phul thim// shar du rnapa sdang phyag rgya re// gser mad gzhal gsum phyag drug pa// rtse gsum btson pad mo ral gri ban d+he 'dzin// lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan nyid// mthing gzhal gsum phyag drug pa
110b6: rin chen padam gri gug dang / / shul bum pa rje gsum 'dzin// nub tu snang ba mtha' yas sku// dmar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa// thod dbyug rtse gsum pad po dang // dgra 'khor lo ral gri 'dzin// byang du don yod grub pa nyid//
110b7: ljang bag la gsum byug drug pa// ras gri rje dbyug pa ma nga // pad ma rtse gsum gshin rje'i dang // ku gyi g.yas da/ g.yon pa ni// dpang gang sa dadang 'thun na me ga/ rang gi btsun mo'i 'phrul nas 'khrung // zhal
110b8: phyag gnyis bdag po ldang / / sku mdogogs pa'i bang sa dang ldan// phyag dang lugs kun kyis brjod// mdzan rdzogs sa// 8/ sr-i d+h+r-i ka/ ral ha u0f7f// a me lag/ bya ga / ha rbad+ha d+hika/

111a1: tA badz+ra ra ti/ hUM phaT swA hA/ 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs bcas pas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzad// 'khor lo sgyur rgyal cha lugs dang // dgyes pa'i dkyil dkrung tshul gyis bzhugs// khyams kyi phyogs dang
111a2: mtshams rnams su/ / sems dpa' brgyad dang sems ma brgyad// thugs kyi ye shes yi ge las// rang gi gsang sngags dag gis gdon// ma snying dkar ser rin chen 'dzin// dam snying mthing ka ral gri 'dzin// spyan ma dmar skya pad+ma 'dzin/
111a3: gsang mdog ljang kyu rdo rje 'dzin// g.yon pa pad mo yu ba can// bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis phyogs su 'dud// sgeg mo phreng ba dbyangs dang gar// dkar ser dmar ldang 'od 'phro mdog/ me long rin chen phreng ba dang // dbyangs snyan ga
111a4: thabs mdzes pa'i tshul/ / oM k+ki ra dza ya/ hUM lA swe sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ tra~M mA le sa ma ya ho// hri pad ma ban d+ha hri/ git+taM ra ho haM/ a nir ti ga la mi hUM phaT/ byams pa dkar se re klu shing 'dzin// sgrib sel 'khor lo mthi ka ste// 'jas
111a5: dpal dmar du/ ud pa la// kun bzang ldang ser rin chen ste// g.yon pa pad mo lcag ma 'dzin// sems dpa 'arlabs kyis gzhal bzhugs// bdug spos me tog 'thor ba dang // mar me dri chab lha mo rnams// ser dkar dmar ldang
111a6: go rim bzhin/ / mtshan dang 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis mdzes// oM mar ni/ dza du ba pra bi sha/ thi leng sra ram pa ya/ hUM bus be a be sha hU~M swa ra tsa ya/ bde ba bu gi ni/ mu shing tsi ya/ ho gan d+hi/ ya hU~M phaT// shar sgor gshin rje
111a7: ga/ ya dag sa da gsum zang // skye zhir stopos can med bya'i bdang // de rdegags pa'i chen cing // nab sto nyis chog 'jigs byed rgyal// da b+ha bu lug drung// khyeng rna kyis /
111a8: yang ya da// 'das sa/ gas pa pazhis nas// sa da

111b1: sa kyil ba rgyad bgrus sa/ / du ma dul gsung dan nga// las kyi bang la gan phrul// na chu bdun cad dru / dzab ga nyig byu / pa// d+hA na ta thAg byu tu 'ad/
111b2: mgro ti sha ri hUM big nan ta kring // haM skar ma kro ti shwa hUM phaT swAhA// phyi nang med par dkyil 'khor chen po ste// thugs rje ye shes che las sprul// phyag rgya ba ni yi rgyas btab cing/ dbul rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan// 'od dbung
111b3: sprul pa'i lha 'khor gyis/ / 'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing // tshangs pa la sogs lha chen brgyad rnams 'gugs// rdo rje brjid gnon sngags kyi mthus// de dag dran pa med par 'gyur// mtshon cha'i tshogs kyis sgrol byas
111b4: te/ / dug gsum phung po gsol bar mdzad// phrin las khro bo brjid glu yis// lha chen 'khor rnams dbang du bsdud// dkyil 'khor chen por gzhag byas nas// snga ma'i sha rus gnan nas ston// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting 'dzin
111b5: gyis/ / lha chen rnams kyis slar lus gsol// 'khor bcas pa yi dbang bskur zhing // rdo rje 'chang gi gral la dgod// dam tshig gsang pa'i brdas bsgos shing // phrin las bka' nyan gnyer gtad de// gzhal
111b6: yas khang gi rgyan du gzhag/ kun kyang tshig dbyangs 'thun pa'i sgros// dam tshig mna' srog thal myong 'gyur// zhes brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal ta mchog/
111b7: rol pa'i rgyud chen po las rdo rje bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas pad mo chags pa'i sras// gsung gi gzi mdangs rgyas mdzad do// phyag rgya rdzu 'phrul gnas sbyor bas//
111b8: gser mig 'dab bzangs grong khyer dang // lang ka'i gnas tshigs srin po'i sde// klu rgyal dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// rdzu 'phrul kun stobs 'khor lo yis// lha chen la sogs gdul bar dgongs// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

112a1: zhugs te/ / pad ma rta mchog sprul pa mdzad// de bzhin nyid dbyings snyoms 'jug las// sems dpa' rgyal ba kun gyi yab// rnga rje 'dzin thub dbang cid dang // reg nyid sprul ba'i lung las grub// su mdo ga dmar por/
112a2: ga'i mdog/ zhal gsum rta mgo ljang khru can// phyag na gri gug khwa N+DaM la// thod pa khrag me dpung sprul lnga// gnas brgyad klu bdag thod phreng dang // glang chen stag gi lpags pa gyon// skra skad drag po phyogs bcur sgrog/ bgegs
112a3: la sogs pa'i cha lugs can/ / drang srong khros pa'i cha lugs kyis// klu yi 'gro ba mongs mdzad pa// pad ma'i gdan la brkyang bsum gyis// yum chen dpal ldan ma dang sbyor// oM pad mo gu ru he he ru lu hUM phaT// 'khor lo 'bar ba
112a4: phyogs mtshams su/ / ye shes khro bo chen po brgyad// hri las grub pa'i 'jigs gzugs can// ta mgo ljang khu brjid pa yi// shar du pad ma'i dbang phyug ni// dkar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'o// rdo rje pad ma kla zhags dang /
112a5: rin chen dbyug pa ral gri mdung // seng ge'i rgyal mo srudang 'khril// sna tshogs mi mthun zhabs kyis gnos/ nyi ma rma ba'i stan chas brgyan// sbrul gyi phreng bas gnas kun brgyan// lho ru gzi chen drag pos ni// mdog nag ral
112a6: gri rtse gsum lnga/ / rdo rje rtse gsum mda' dgazhu// drag po gnas kyi su dang 'khril// me ri 'bar bas kun du khyab// stug mo bcings pas gzhan gnas 'jig/ sprul pa'i pho nya ma 'brug gi/ khro bo yin ni dkyil 'ardze/
112a7: tshogs// nub tu rdo rje drab mchog/ dmar ser rdo rje dbyug pa zi// 'khor lo sbrul zhugs me long chu// lha mo 'jigs chen zhabs kyis gnon// 'od 'bar klog gi phreng ba can// sprul pa'i pho nya lce sbyang gdong // 'bum tha
112a8: dri da phreng khrag 'dzin/ / byang du'od byed 'jigs chen sra// ljang khu rtse gsum mnga' bo che// nor bu rung khrag lug ma dung khrag 'chang // ra ro mig dmar zil gyis nan// rgyal bdag the bo'i sra dang 'khril// cod pan bla

112b1: mtho ga ngasaka brgyan/ / dus mtshungs phud kyi sna chan grags// kun kyang zad brang ga yang gzhi dang // drang zed gnas 'byung bdam byed// 'tshams kyi khrab chen pa ba na// rigs kyi du gzugs thag las mtshan// zhal gsum bya// /
112b2: drug 'od mdangs can// rdo rje thod dbyug gru yi sgra// lce srung bu khrung gnam lcags spen// zod phreng thig le dbyu ga'i chan// ma 'phrul gru thabs tsal u ta ra// 'dod yon lha mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// kun tu spyan dmar rdo rje
112b3: mtshan/ / gnas su 'jigs pa'i d+hU skr-i sgrogs// klu li rgyal po'i gnas na bzhugs// gzhan gyi rdzu 'phrul 'doms par byed// oM ma hA tra la grib pad ma d+ha dra ni bi d+ha da~Mr hUM phaT/ rtsa ba'i sngags so// yon mo ang ti he rul
112b4: ru kaM ba mu kha/ a ka ra Sha ya rak+Sha na gaM gu ru hUM phaT/ snying po'i sngags so// oM pad ma ra ga ma ku r+ya ra kaM ru lu ru lu hUM phaT// nye ba'i snying po'o// dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyogs bzhi ru// lcags kyu lcags sgrog zhags pa dril bu snams/
112b5: dkar dmar ser ldang 'od mdangs 'bar// seng ge lce spyang stag 'brug dang // mgo brtsegs sprul pa'i 'khor dang bcas// rang gi las kyis 'khod pa dang / 'jigs pa'i cha lugs rngam gzugs gnas// las mdzad klu yi dkyil
112b6: 'khor 'dul/ / klu chen brgyad sogs bsdus byas na// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par bya/ rang gi dam tshig dran pa'i shugs// spyan nams spyan sngar 'dod par byed/ oM nag drings meg na na ga ra tsa ya sa ma ya trAM// dkyil 'khor gas
112b7: bar dbang bskur nas/ / 'od bzangs gzi mdangs me dpung 'bar// rigs kyi dbu rgya na gsal byed phye// ye shes 'od tshogs gnas bcas te/ dkyil 'khor gsang bar goms zhugs kyis// tshul 'dzin dkon bachog mngon du
112b8: dbye/ / tshegs rnams ma lus mgrin gcig tu// gar dbang srul skyabs gsol zhing // da yon gsol 'debs dam bcas pa/ bsod nams phung po'i gter la spyod// kye ma dkyil 'khor la mtshan che// bdag cag 'khor rnams rab sgo

113a1: mdzad/ / rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor dpe bral bas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du gnas// bde chen lam 'di sngon ma togs// da ltar thugs rje drin gyis rnyed// rnal 'byor gsang bar 'dzin byed kyis// ji ltar bsgom
113a2: pa'i bka' bzhin bgyid/ / rdo rje gsang ba'i dam 'di las// gal te nyams na 'das par shog/ ces dam bcas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las
113a3: rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i gus// yum la chags tshul 'dzum mdangs kyis// bka' yi bsgo bas dgyes mdzad de// mi shigs ting 'dzin la garma
113a4: mdzad/ / phyogs skyod dri za rgyal chen po// rang gi chung ma tshogs bcas pas// gnas gzhan 'jig par mdzad pa dang // rang gi mthus bcus 'dul bar mdzad// sku ni bai dUr 'tsher ba'i mdangs// zhal gsum phyag rgya drug gis//
113a5: rol// rin chen mdzod bum sngags chen lkug/ 'khor lo phreng ba ma ga te// rgyan dang cha lugs rin chen tshogs// dbyings kyi dbang phyug yum chen mo// dmar skya zab mo'i tshul du sbyor// 'od 'phro sems dpa'i gdug pa'i 'phro//
113a6: rigs lnga'i da brgyan rin Te// phyag brgya bzhi yis brjid pa'i lha// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs brgyan// bar 'khyams 'khor gyi dbus nas 'gying // pad ma'i lte bar skyim da krung bzhugs//
113a7: shar du 'joms byed rdo rje'i sku// dkar gsal rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// lho ru rin chen blo gros sku// dpal be'u gdugs mdzes 'od mang ser// nub kyi phyogs kyi rgyal po rtog/ dkar dmar pad ma glegs pa ma 'dzin// byang du
113a8: 'jig rten thun grol ba/ / ljang ste rdo rje rgya gram ze// shar lho dra ba'i dbang phyug ni// ser skya rin chen 'bring kar// lho nub chos kyi lhun po mchog/ rtse gsum pad ma'i lcug ma 'dzid// nub byang rgyal ba'i ye shes rtog/

113b1: rdzo bya seng ge'i bum pa 'dzin// b+hang shar rdzu 'phrul dra ba brtsegs// ljang ser g.yung drung rdo rje mtshan// 'di dag 'khor lo bsgyur rgyal byin// mtshan dang dpe byad 'od mdangs rgyan// skyes bu chen po'i long spyod 'phel// ra 'thun yum
113b2: dang 'khril par bzhugs/ / oM ba ta dz+nyAn tanas bog ta tA phaT/ oM d+harma mun nas na sa hU~M phaT/ oM ba hi ra pra ma tha na hU~M phaT/ oM dz+wa lo dra saM bo ga ya hUM phaT/ maM rad na ma rud tes grum hA phaT/ oM mahA shug ta mu sa mo ha hUM phaT oM
113b3: bud d+ha bud d+ha sa r+ya na ku pa ra hUM phaT/ oM ni ma ga gan si ta yo ga hUM phaT/ oM ni sa ha he he hu mu ga ra ba ri hU~M phaT/ 'khor lo'i gas bsdigs rab brjod pas// lha rnams phyi yi gnas su spro// drag po'i rgyu 'bras sbyong byas te/
113b4: gnas kun dag pa'i ye shes che// rigs mchog ye shes 'di gsal bas// shar gyi dbang po dri za sogs// gnas mgon skyabs dang dbang du mdzad// nyon mongs las kyis dregs pa'i tshogs// rang rgyud zhi nas byang
113b5: sems bcas/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod// snying po mdongs sol phul bar 'gyur// oM trag sha ka sarba ra ma ma sa hUM hUM swA hA// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig pa 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol// bstan
113b6: pa myur du spel gyur cig/ rgya chad pa'i sngags kyis thams cad bsrung bar gyur pa bde legs su bya ba'i gnas pa bdag cag dus thams cad dkyil 'khor 'dir gnas shing de 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag bsrung bar bya ba dang /
113b7: bran bzhin du gnas par bgyi'o// slar yang bdag cag rnams mgon pos gzhengs la byin gyis brlabs ste dbang bskur ba dang grol bar mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis rig pa'i snying
113b8: 'di byin gyis brlabs so/ / oM u e mri ta bi ga na shu ta hUM phaT swA hA// zhes gsungs pa dang / de dag dang po'i sangs rgyas bzhin du 'od zer dang bcas par gyur nas gzhal yas khang gi rgyan du 'khod do// de bzhin gshegs pa

114a1: thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las thugs ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor 'phrul pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bde byed gar dbang phyug
114a2: pad ma 'tshegs pa'i sku chen pos/ / yon tan rin chen sgyu ma'i chos// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// mkha' 'gro tshogs bcas gshin rje rnams// rgyal po rgyal chen rgyal mor gnas// 'khor bcas 'dul bar bya ba'i
114a3: phyir/ / mkha' 'gro chen mo'i tshogs 'phrul mdzad / thabs dang shes rab gnyis med las// gzi ldan gar gyi dbang phyug ma// pad mar gnam mkha'i mdog/ zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi ste// pad ma'i sdong po bdud rtsi'i snod/
114a4: rdo rje kha TAng zhags thogs// rin chen phreng ba'i rgyan gyis grubs// khyod bzhad 'jigs mdangs tshul 'dzin cing // brkyang bskum zhing mchog nyi ma'i dkyil// g.yang gzhi nyi ma'i phreng bas brgyan// oM pad ma ma hA kro ti shwa ri hUM phaT/
114a5: dpal gyi lha mo mchog nyid dang // oM dang sprul te phyogs dang 'tshams// pad ma'i gdan la zhing gis mtshan// brkyang bskum sku mdog sngon mo'i tshogs// phyag na gri gug thod pa khrag/ 'bar ba'i cha lugs bsgra 'bar ma// phyi rol
114a6: sprul pa'i tshogs bcas pas/ / dur khrod chen po'i gnas su rol// rdo rje rin chen pad mo dang // las dang sgyu 'phrul mkha' la bshad// sna tshogs sgyu ma bzhin rgyas spyan// kha dog phyogs mtshams ji lta bu// gsal zhing mun pa'i
114a7: rdul gyis gos/ / zhing gi dbyug pa rtse gsum dang // gser gyi mda' dang rdo rje dang // chu srin rgyal mtshan zhags pa dang // zhing chen rdo rje rtse dgu gdengs// gri gug rgyu ma'i zhags pa sdom// rdo rje gdengs pa rtse gsum khrag/ zhing chen
114a8: kho ga byes snying 'dren cing / / de bzhin rlung yab thod pa 'chang // oM badz+ra ta krid ma hA la ti ti hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ta tri me dar hUM phaT// oM DA ki ma dkum pa ya hU~M phaT/ oM DA ki ni ti pre sha hUM phaT// oM badz+ra DA ki bi las hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki

114b1: bri ku ta ma le hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra nA gi dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT// phyi rol pad ma'i 'dab ma las// seng ge rta dang lce stad wa// bya rgod kang ka bya rog 'ug/ mgo brnyan mche gshog chen mo brgyad// hUM las sprul te mdog dmar po// phyag na gri gug thod pa
114b2: khrag/ rdo rje ral gri rtse gsum mdung // 'khor lo dgra sta be con mda'// gtun shing shing khog g.yang gzhi sprul// ne'u le gzhong pa rin chen khyud// zhal gdangs so so'i phyogs mdangs bzhin// kun kyang khro bcas khyams par
114b3: gnas/ zhid lpags g.yang gzhi thod phreng sprul// khrag zhag thal ba'i tshem bus brgyan// mkha' 'gro rigs bdun ma srid sprul pa'i tshogs// mche gshog 'bar ba phyogs bcur 'khrugs/ oM ser ba ra na hUM phaT// oM nai raM
114b4: te sha ba mu kha hUM phaT/ oM kaM na ma du na hUM phaT/ oM mu ka ra na no hUM phaT/ oM su r+ya sa mo ka hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sdig sha bruM hUM phaT/ oM ni sha ku ru ra na hUM phaT/ oM re lam su bag sha hUM phaT// mkha' 'gro bcu drug 'di dag kyang // 'od 'bar
114b5: glog gi phreng ba can/ / 'od kyis ru lu'i sgra 'byin cing // spyan mur khro gnyer mche ba can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi rol pa'i stabs// dbyings dang shes rab rab rtogs la// so so'i phrin las mdzad pa'i phyag/ zhal dang sku ni so so'i
114b6: mdog/ oM ru khu sa~M ta gu na De ta sa mo ra ga hUM phaT// snying po'i sngags so// oM badz+ra DA ki dza la sha~M ba ra ku ma ra hUM phaT/ nye ba'o// oM DA ki hU~M sam pa ra dza li mu kha ma me hU~M phaT// rtsa ba'i sngags so// mkha' 'gro ma yi dkyil 'khor
114b7: spro ba'i mthus/ / de dag drag pa med par brgyal// slar nyid rang gi 'khor du bsdus// dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen por bkod// de nas mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bcas// gdul bya rnams kyi gnas dor nas// rgyal ba'i
114b8: bstan pa gzung byed cing / / rdo rje theg pa sbyor bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las mkha' 'gro ma sprul pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// /

115a1: de nas bcom ldan dgyes pa'i gtso// gar gyi dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs// gzi ldan yum dang zhal sbyor zhing // phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'o// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// phyogs kyi bgegs
115a2: 'dul byed pa'o/ / khams gsum gnon pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin gnas// rin chen 'bar ba'i khar bzangs na// rin chen pad ma seng ge'i gdan// dri med nyi zla smras pa la// dbus kyi lha mchog chen
115a3: bo ni/ / zhabs brgyad phyag ni bcu drug dang // dmar ser nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// bgegs la sogs pa'i tshul dang ldan// pad ma rdo rje 'khor lo dri// thod pa rin chen dgra sta ras// yum chen dbang phyug sgeg mo dang // rgyan tshogs/
115a4: rin chen phreng ba can// dri mad pad mas klubs pa'o// oM ba ga ba te ru kaM saM bo ga ta ya hUM phaT// mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' ni// dkar ser rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// g.yas su rin chen sems dpa' ste// ser po rin chen 'khor lo thogs/
115a5: rgyab du pad mo'i sems dpa' nyid// dmar ser rtse gsum thum pa thogs// g.yon du las kyi sems dpa' ste// ljang ser dril bu tri shul// oM badz+ra swa ta hUM phaT/ oM radra srat+ta hUM phaT/ oM pad ma swat+ta hUM phaT/ oM kaR+Sha swat+na hUM phaT/
115a6: 'khor lo pad ma'i rtse mo la// yum dang 'khril pa'i tshul gyis 'khod// phyi rol pad ma'i rigs bdun la// bde gshegs yab yum nyid stong tshogs// bde gshegs rdo rje rin chen dang // pad ma rgya gram sna tshogs mkha'/
115a7: gu mdog pad ma rag dang // in+d+ra la sogs rim bdun la// rol pa rtse mdzod bum pa la// lcug ma dril bu grags bam dang // chos kyi rgyal mtshan phreng ba 'dzin// kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa// rin chen rgyan phreng 'od ma dang
115a8: can/ / phyag mtshan gri gug thod pa dang // pad ma'i phreng ba rtse gsum bsdams// lhag pa'i phyag bzhi 'dzin par mdzad// dang po rang rtags phyag rgya bsnams// oM badz+ra du ka pi she ka du kud ki me hri sa ga ta spr-i sra mo ta phaT swA hA// de

115b1: bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'o/ / oM badz+ras mo yo ga ha sa ra la su hUM phaT/ rin po che rnams kyi'o// oM pad ma buM saM haM ha he he maM baM hUM phaT/ pad ma'i rigs rnams kyi'o// oM kar+b+ba D+h+we truM hUM rak+Sha mar+ya sa hUM phaT/ las kyi rigs kyi'o//
115b2: oM badz+ra tsakra bruM si ti yo gi shwa ri hUM phaT// 'khor lo'i rigs kyi'o// de nas dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i tshogs// phyogs rnams kun tu spro byas pas/ rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya yin// phyogs kyi rgyal po'i gdon rnams 'gugs// bsgrag shing byed
115b3: nas dgra 'gugs shing / / so so'i rigs dbyer 'khrug pa dag/ rdo rje gsang ba'i sngags kyis gzer// rang gi dam tshig rjes su dran// srog gi snying po dbul bar bya/ rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gis// dbang bskur byin brlabs rdzogs byas
115b4: nas/ / dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i gnas su 'khod// gsang ba 'dzin pa'i gnas 'dor nas// rang gi lus su gnas byas te/ gzhal yas khang gi brgyan du gzhag/ de dag gi snying po ni/ oM sa mu dar dzi na nag su tra b+ha ba si tri sI sha
115b5: hUM bruM phaT zhes pa'o/ / slar gso ba'i sngags ni/ oM su mu ge DaM saM myag he he ru tu ba la si taM dza hUM phaT/ lha rnams kyi snying po bsdus pa ni/ oM sarba sa ka ra bruM bag sha si me br-i mu rak+Sha hUM zhes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa
115b6: bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ / khams gsum gnon pa'i le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan gar dbang sku/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus mdzad nas// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sprul byas te/ gnod
115b7: sbyin grul bum 'dul bar mdzad/ / gzhal yas gru gsum mthing nag la// dbus su 'khor lo nyi ma'i gdan// dpal chen pad ma he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i rgyan gyis brjid// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug ste// sku mdog pad ma rags
