115b8: mdangs/ / rtse gsum gtun shing ral gri dang // pad ma zhags pa thod pa 'dzin// glang chen zho ba thod rlon sbrul// yum dang zhal sbyor 'khril ba'i tshul// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las// yi ge las sbrul khro bo'i rgyan// shar du rnam rgyal

116a1: mdog dkar sngo/ / zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje rung // 'khor lo rin chen pad ma dang // ral gri me 'od kyi mtshan pa// lho rug shin rje gshed po ni// sngon gzhal gsum phyag drug pa// thod dbyug rin chen ne'u le dang /
116a2: rtsegs pa med pa zong rnga 'dzin// nub tu rta mchog khro ba'i dra// zhal gsum phyag drug dmar sna'i mdog/ 'khor lo bsdigs 'dzub rtse gsum dang // ral gri thod pa TA ma ru// byang nga ba dad ci 'khyil bste// ljang sngon zhalags ma phyag/
116a3: drug pa// rgya gram gri gug pad ma dang // be con rtse gsums ge 'dzin// shar lhor dbyug pa sngon po ni// sngo skya zhal gsum phyag drug pa// dbyug pa tsakra pad ma dang // rnga yab ban d+ha dril bu 'dzin// lha nub mi g.yo mgon po ni//
116a4: la gsum ser skya phyag drug pa// rin chen ral gri gtun shing 'dzi// pad mthod khrag mdung rtse gsum// nub byang 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni// dmar skya zhal gsum phyag drug pa// rdo rje dbyug pa'i rin chen bu ma// thod pa bdud
116a5: ci snying 'dzin pa'o/ / byang shar stobs chen du dka'i mdog/ zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa'i mdangs// rdo rje rtse gsum ba mchen khog/ sna tshogs rdo rje bam chen khrag/ 'jigs pa'i cha lugs khro grong dang // gyad kyi dor thabs
116a6: rol ba'i stabs/ / oM badz+ra kro ta bi dza ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ta ya man ta ka hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ta ha ya gri ba hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ta a mri ta kun DA li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kr-i ta ni la tan tra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ta ar+ya a tsa la hUM phaT/
116a7: oM badz+ra kro ta ta ki ra tsa hU~M phaT// oM badz+ra kri ta ma hA ba la hUM phaT/ phyogs skyong gi rgyal po gnod sbyin dang / grul bu mtshogs rnams dbang bsdus te/ gsang sngags drag pos bsgral byas na// slar gsol ye shes lhums su gyur// dkyil
116a8: 'khor gsang ba'i dbang bskur zhing / / dam tshig la gzhan dkyil 'khor tshul// kun gyi srog snying phul ba ni// dam tshig chen pos byin brlabs mdzad// slar yang dam tshig 'dzin pa'i sngags// 'khor rnams kun la sbyin par mdzad/

116b1: so badz+ra krakar marngas na pa muka hU~M phaT/ oM At+ma/ badz+ra su ka ta b+ha me traM al la hUM phaT// lha rnams kun gyis dam tshig ni// rdo rje gsang ba gsum las byung // rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po'i klu// khams gsum ngas kyis dbang bskur
116b2: nas/ / 'khor ba'i chos las rgyal byed cing // byang chub sems kyis de nyid gsal// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las khro bo phrin las rol ba'i
116b3: le'u ste bcu drug pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan gar dbang skus// gzi brjid dgod pa'i rgyan bkod cing // lha min grong khyer 'dul ba'i phyir// yum gyi dkyil 'khor 'phrul bar mdzad// chos dbyings sprul pa'i gnas
116b4: bzang mchog/ rgyal ba'i rang bzhin rin chen spros// gru bzhi khang pa sgo dang bcas// rta babs ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes// dbus kyi pad ma'i gdan bzhugs pa// gnyis med rol pa'i yum gyi sku// mdog dmar rgyan du zangs
116b5: chen gzugs/ / zhal gcig phyag bzhi mdzes pa'i mdangs// 'khor lo rung khrag pad mo dang // rin chen 'bar ba che dgu 'dzin// rin chen pad ma'i phreng ba can// stong bzangs na bza' dkyil bzangs bzhugs// oM pad ma
116b6: mu sha ra sa ma ka ta hUM phaT/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su// pad ma dbyings phyug gsal ba mo// rin chen phreng ba glum che// dkar dmar ser dang ljang khwa'i mdog/ rdo rje gsum pa pad mo dra ba dang // na ra si la'i snod
116b7: ni tshogs/ / rang gi dkyil 'khor ma spros shing // sna tshogs pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs// oM tsun d+de shwa ri hUM phaT// oM k+Shi sha badz+ra saM bruM ga hU~M phaT/ oM byi tsu sra te hUM phaT// mtshams kyi pad ma'i 'dab ma la// de bzhin bde
116b8: babaskyed byed yum chen bzhi/ / drab mo dang glog 'gyur rgyan// gshog pa can dang 'dod pa'o// dkar ser dmar spyi sngo bsangs dang // ljang khu mdog legs la bzhugs nas// rdo rje rin chen pad mo dang // uta pal ljang khwa

117a1: legs mdzad pa'o/ / a nri to so no tsakra hU~M phaT/ oM saM bo ga ta su he bya hUM phaT// oM ma ma kri br-i he he hU~M phaT/ oM ta re ga ga na a ma la hUM phaT// phyogs rnams kun du mkha' khyab pa// til gang bzhin du gnas gyur pa/
117a2: pa mo gshin rje'i tshogs rnams kun// 'khrug rngam rod ro por gyur nas// thugs rje can la skyabs su mchi// srog gi snying po dbul bar byed// de nas dkyil 'khor bsdus byas te// rang gi gnas su dbang bskur zhing// dam
117a3: rig dga' ba'i sdom pa snyed/ / bde gshegs ye shes gsal bar 'gyur// kun gyis 'thun par khas blangs te// dam tshig bsrung zhing rnal 'byer spyod// oM ma ma rag ta ma pra ta a da sa pra ta phaT/ oM trag shar ba se bad Ta
117a4: phaT/ / ma mo dang 'byung po rnams kyi snying ba'o// oM yu me si d+ha ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi'o// oM AHhUM yog br-i gu me/ ha sa ha sa/ ru lu ru lu hUM phaT// slar gso zhing byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// de bzhin
117a5: gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ / rin chen dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'phrul ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas gar gyi dbang phyug nyid// dus gsum sangs
117a6: rgyas thams cad kyi/ / sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yis// sa 'ogs bla sa stengs rnams// 'joms byed gza' dang rgyu skar dang // bdud dang de yi rigs 'khor kun// 'du bar bya ba'i ting 'dzin la// snyoms zhugs 'khor lo spru
117a7: pa mdzad/ / thabs dang shes rab bsgrub byas pa'i// 'od zer gsal bas stong gsum gang // rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // sgo bzhi rta babs phreng bas brgyan// 'khor lo rim gsum gdan dang bcas// rdo rje padi
117a8: ma rin chen gyis/ 'khor yug seng ge glang chen mchog/ nyi mas mdzes pa'i pad mo yi// dbus kyi dpa' bo yum dang bcas// zhal gcig phyag bzhi rdo rje rin// pad ma ral gri 'dzin par mdzad// dmar ser kun tu rgyu

117b1: bani/ / ljang ser pad ma dril bus 'khyud// mtshan dang dpe byad rgyan phreng klubs// sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya bzhi yis mdzes byas pa'o// rdo rje 'khor lo rtsibs rnams la// rigs kyi sems dpa'
117b2: nyi shu ba ni/ / dkar dang dmar dang ser ba'i mdangs// rdo rje dril bu pad ma bsgom// 'khor lo rin chen ste ma ba rnams// dang po'i phyag gnyis mtshan byas shing // lhag ma zi grag thod pa thogs// khro zhing sems dpa'i cha lug
117b3: kyis/ / rgyan phreng rigs kyi dbang po gsum// rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis klubs// mo badz+ras/ krota he he ru lu hUM phaT// rdo rje rigs rnams kyi'o// pad ma te shwa sA da na maku ru ku ru hU~M phaT/ pad ma rigs kyi sems dpa' rnams kyi'o//
117b4: oM oM ku ri tsag ban d+ha si d+hi phaT phaT/ kro ti sha ri hUM phaT/ de bzhin gshegs pa rigs kyi'o// sgo bzhi mdzes gzugs khro mo ni// mi mthun blo gros dpa' chen mo// ye shes mkha' dbyings bzhi rnams te// dkar ser dmar dang /
117b5: rim pa bzhin// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog dril bu mtshan ma'i phyag/ oM badz+ra a~M gu ga dza/ khA sha hU~M/ s+phoT baM/ g+han Ta'o// phaT/ dgug gzugs bcing ba'i las dag dang // dbab pa'i tshi ga mnyes par
117b6: byed/ / dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kun// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dus// rigs gsum sems dpa' khro bor bstan// 'jigs byed cha lugs rngam pa'i stabs// rdo rje gcod byed 'jigs pa che// rdo rje
117b7: 'joms pa'i yid 'phrog byed/ / rdo rje rab bzang blo gros mchog/ rdo rje'i bstan pa g.yul las rgyal// pad ma'i sprin chen 'brug sgra'i dbyangs// pad ma'i tho gsal mya ngan 'joms// pad ma'i sdong par ra byos// pad
117b8: 'od zer bdud rtsi'i 'od/ / 'khor ba brtsegs pa myur du bzlog// 'khor po dga' basbrang rtsi'i mchod// 'khor lo grol dang rtse gsum 'ching// khor lo rol pa dga' byed stobs/ 'di dag sprul pa 'khor tshogs skus// gnas gsum po dag 'dul bar

118a1: mdzad/ / de nas gza' dang rgyu skar rnabs// gdug pa'i ngaro num shums// sgra chen sgrogs shing sprul nas kyang // mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po skyabs gsol zhing //
118a2: bstar pa bzung bar dam bcas so// de dag sa so'i srog snying dag/ lus sems dad pas phul byas pas// dkyil 'khor chen po dbang bskur zhing // rab gnas gdan la gzhag par bya// de bzhin gshegs
118a3: pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ / rang sangs rgyas thams cad khro bor byung ba'i le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan dbang gi lha// bAng
118a4: pa bde chen yub bcas la/ / 'gro drug rgya 'bras bya ba'i phyir// bde chen byang sems dkyil 'khor sprul// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas 'bar ba// rin chen phreng sogs 'jigs byed brgyad// dur khrod chen po'i
118a5: gnas bzhin brgyan/ / dbus kyi 'khor lo gdan bcas la// rigs lnga'i he ru ka bzhugs mdzad// yum chen lnga dang 'khril bar sbyor// kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa// dmar nag dkar ser ljang khu'i mdang
118a6: rdo rje 'dz+wa ral gri dang / / tri shul zhing dbyug tho ba bsdams// g.yas par drang zong g.yon thod khrag/ bar mgre gug pad ma ste// tha ma yum dang 'khril ba'i tshul// spyan dgu sdang mig dmar po bzlog/ khro
118a7: gnyer ral pa gyen du mdzes/ / thod sbrul khrag dang thal bas brgyan// g.yang bzhi ri sha'i rgyan gyis mdzes// oM badz+ra shri he ru ka badz+ra kro ti shwa ri hUM phaT// oM b+hu ta shri hi ru ka b+hu ta kro ti shwa ri hUM phaT// oM rad na shri he ru
118a8: kahUM phaT/ / rang na kro ta shwa ri hU~M phaT/ pad ma shri he ru ka hUM phaT// oM pad ma kro ti shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM kaR+Ya shri heH/ hUM phaT/ kaR+Sha kro ti shwa ri hU~M phaT/ bide chen byang chub sems kyi rgyan// rol pa kun du khyab mdzad de// khams

118b1: gsum ma 'dres rnam par dbyings/ / bde ba chen po gnyis med 'gyur// dbang bskur byin brlabs rigs kyis bskur// bskyed de dbu la rang gi bdag pos brgyan// smon 'jug g.yo lnga'i bskyod pa yi// lha mo bzhi dang mnyam
118b2: par sbyor/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol ba'i rgyud las/ bde ba chen po'i le'u ste/ bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa nyid la bzhag
118b3: sde bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe de'i dus na bdud kyi rgyal po ma tra ra tra sa// rang gi rdzu 'phrul chen po stan zhing // 'khor dang bcas pas phyogs bcur rgyug cing rig pa 'dzin pa dang // rnal 'byor mtha' dag gi bar gcod byed cing bde
118b4: 'gro'i bde ba thams cad rgyun gcod pa dang / rang nyid kyi nyon mongs pa bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rigs kyi 'od zer mtha' yas pa zhes bya/
118b5: bas stong gsum gyi 'jig rten thams cad skad cig gsal bar mdzad do// rgyal ba'i dbang po stong gsum 'dir// khang bzangs mdzes par byin brlabs te// rin chen ka ba gdan phreng dang // gzugs mdzes la sogs kun
118b6: gyis sbas/ / nyi ma zla ba rin chen khri// pad ma seng ge la sogs gnas// sgo bzangs khyams su bcas pa yi// rnam dag gzhal yas khang bzangs sprul// de nas bcom ldan bde chen pos// dpal ldan gar gyis dbang
118b7: phyug skus/ / sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rigs tshogs rnams// dga' ba'i sprin gyis bskul bar mdzad// bde ba chen po gnyis med mthus// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor cig tu gyur// yongs rdzogs gsal ba rgya chen pos//
118b8: dkyil 'khor rgya chen sprul par mdzad// dbus su pad ma'i rigs rgyal po// gtso bo pad ma rdo rje'i mdangs// zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs byed sku// rdo rje dga' ba'i spyan 'dril zhing // shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kun

119a1: du/ / bde gshegs rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/ rnam sdang rin chen don grub rnams// rin chen phyogs kyi mtshon mdangs gsal// rdo rje 'khrolo rin chen dang // ral gri pad ma sna tshogs dang // gtso bo pad ma'i drug mtshan
119a2: can/ / stong pa'i sgra snyan dril bu g.yon// sangs rgyas spyan mdzes mA ma kI/ dkar mo dam tshig sgrol ma dag/ mdog bzangs phyag mtshan gtso bo bozhi// sangs rgyas ting 'dzin rdzu 'phrul stobs// thabs dang shes rab nyis stong tshogs//
119a3: 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo la// rang gi mtshan ma so so'i tshul/ dmar mdangs dkar dang gser gyi mdog/ ni ra ka ta'i mdog mtsher zhing // pad ma rdo rje 'khor lo rin// pad ma tri shul bcas pa 'dzin// g.yas na 'khor lo go rims bzhin
119a4: rdo rje dkyil dkrung legs brgyan brjid/ / gzhan yang khro bo'i tshigs 'bar ba// phyi rol 'khor lo'i bar khyam dang // sgo la sogs pa'i 'jigs gzugs kyis// rnam pa'i mdangs bcas 'khor pa ni// khri tshogs yang sprul
119a5: mtshon cha dang / / rigs kyi sprul pa'i don byed pa'i// khams gsum 'jigs byed khro bo dang // mkha' 'gro'i dag pa'i tshogs bcas rnams// dur khrod rgyan gyis rab mdzes shing // rigs kyi kha dog mtshon cha dang / 'od zer
119a6: 'phro ba 'khrigs pa'i tshul/ / gsang sngags drag po brjod mdzad pa'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor khro zhing tshogs// skad gcig gsal bar rdzogs byas nas// byi yi gnas su spos zhing bya// gsang sngags rgyun gyi skal
119a7: par byed/ / hUM a la la ha// ma hA pad mchid ya/ a A oM A hUM/ ma hA pad ma ku ru/ ha la ha la b+hi shan hUM hUM phaT// stod khams sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i gnas// rab 'khrug bred brgyas rmongs pa dag/ 'bar ba'i
119a8: dkyil 'khor 'od kyis bder byas shing / / rang gi sangs rgyas zhing la bkod// dkyil 'khor gnas su bsdus byas nas// rang gi 'khor lo mdzes byas te// dbang bskur byin brlabs rdzogs 'gyur nas// dbul

119b1: rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan/ / oM pad ma kun d+hA li hrid ya na bi mu ku ru ha na d+hA ha hUM phaT// gsang sngags kun gyis brjod byas na/ 'jig rten gsum po bsdud pa yi// pho nya rdo rje ki la yang // drags byed gtso bo dag rengs
119b2: bya/ / de nas bcom ldan pa de chen mus// sangs rgyas thams cad bskul ba'i phyir// rdo rjes gol lan gsum bdag/ dam tshig chen po'i sngags chen brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs tshogs rnams// ting yin
119b3: bsdu ba'i rdo rje las/ / gcig tu gnas nas 'gro ba gzigs// drags byed gtso bo ma rungs rnams// sgyu dang 'bras bu log 'khrul zhing // sangs rgyas bstan pa log mi 'gyur// log pa'i lam la mngon zhen cing //
119b4: mngon pa'i nga rgyal mthus bsnyems nas// 'jig rten gsum dag pung byed na// zha bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur na// tho bo'i rol ba mdzad mod kyi// 'dul bar gzigs nas bka' dros mdzad/ kye ma 'dul ba'i tshogs chen
119b5: dag/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon 'byung ltar// da lta'i dus 'dir byung ba ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las// log pa'i lam du 'khrul pa ste// khro bo'i tshul du byung gyur pa// de tshe sems can thams cad kun//
119b6: shin du khro zhing gtum par 'gyur// de ltar gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyis// mnar med la sogs gnas ngan len// mi bzang sdug bsngal mtha' la brten// jig bu yi thabs kyis 'dul// shin du gti mug mdongs pa'i
119b7: tshogs/ / de bzhin bag chags ngan pa yis// gang de bdun chud gcod byed cing // bstan pa'i gsung rab 'jig par 'gyur// las kyi mun pa 'gro ba 'khyams// dus ngan rigs ngan 'phra men ma// gnod byed gdon dang /
119b8: log 'dren dang // srid gsum 'jig cing dam tshig 'dral// 'di lta bu yi thabs kyis ni// sangs rgyas thugs rje rnams 'phrul bstan// nga rgyal chen po mdongs pa yi// lta ba ri bo mthu snyes tshogs// de lta'i tshe ni 'di

120a1: byung 'gyur/ / rgyal ba 'das dus sbyor byed cing // ji bzhin las la 'khrul bar byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mdzod// mngon spyod rol ba'i thabs chen gyis// 'di dag bstan pa'i dus la bab// srid gsum
120a2: gadrag cing gtum pa la/ zhibs phan par mi 'gyur ste// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las// khro bo de bzhin gshegs phan mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pa yin// 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na// sangs rgyas thugs
120a3: rjekhros pa yis/ / khams gsums lus smos ci dgos// rang bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo las// phrag dog 'khrul pa'i rlung dag gis// 'jig rten phyin ci log tu 'khyams// ji bzhin gnas pa la ma bral bas// khams
120a4: gsum brlags pa'i lam la zhugs/ / 'jig rten 'di dag snying rje zhing // mngon shes gdul dka'i rmongs tshogs rnams// khro bo'i tshogs kyis sbyor bar mdzad// zhes bsgrags so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/
120a5: dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal ta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las// rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrol bya'i le'u ste// nyi shu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen pos// padam gar gyi dbang phyug skus/
120a6: matang ru tra la sogs pas// bdud kyi tshogs bcas 'dul ba'i phyir// yum chen sku cig rol mdzad de// byang chub sems sprin phyogs bcur spro// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dkyil 'khor gsal// dkyil 'khor 'dus
120a7: tshogs dkyil 'khor che/ / dkyil 'khor chen po'i bdag nyid che// dgyes bcas gar bcas gdan la bzhugs// zhal gsum gas ri mdangs ldan pa// pad ma gtun shing rtse gsum thogs// rin chen rgyan sogs dbu
120a8: rgyan bcas/ / dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// snod gcig dus gcig sprul pa mdzad// mtha' dang dbus med 'jig rten gnas rnams kun// drag po 'thing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // 'khor lo

120b1: rtsibs drug par khyams te rims ldan/ / kun du zla kham sgo khyad gru bzhir bcas// rin chen 'bang ba'i thod dbyug rgyan dang bcas// tshad med ye shes 'khor lo la bsten cing // 'jigs byed khro bo'i rgyan tshogs mang po grubs/
120b2: nam mkha'i mtha' snyan lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas// smon lam dbang dang thugs rje'i byin brlabs kyis// 'jig rten drug dang dus bzhi phyogs bcun// gzugs khams ma lus dbang du bsdu ba na// drag po lha brgya dang
120b3: rgyal gzhom pa'i phyir/ / lha chen phyogs skyong tshogs kyis rtsig pa byas// sku bzhi dpal brgyad tshang bar bya ba'i phyir// rgyal chen rigs bzhi bzung nas ka ba byas// theg pa gzhan las 'phags pa'i don// glang ches
120b4: ka la ling gis ka rten byas/ / gling bzhi'i mo rnams dgos 'dod bskong ba'i phyir// gza' skar mig tshags byas pas 'gyur ldog med// 'jig rten zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir// seng ge ka la sha yis ka zhu byas
120b5: 'khor ba'i gcod rnying gtan nas sbyang ba'i phyir/ / seng ge'i kha nas bdud rtsi 'o ma 'dzag/ thod rus bar khyams rdo rje'i gzer gyis rgyan// zhing chen rnga yab bA re phan gdugs dang // thugs rje blang sems kun tu khyab
120b6: pa'i phyir/ / nyi zla 'bar ba'i rgyan chas gsal bar ldan// sprul pa'i me rlung 'brug gis dus bzhir phye/ khro bo'i 'byung gnas thugs rje'i sgra dang bcas// rin chen khri dang pad ma nyi zla gdan// gser gyi seng ge spyan
120b7: gsum pa/ / drug bzhi rtsal 'phags nyi shu brgyad// khri rkang brgyad kyis bar 'khyams dag la gnas// thugs rje che bas nyi ma nyi shu brgyad // 'jigs pa spangs pa'i seng ge nyi shu brgyad/ sbrul su thob pa sad rang /
120b8: monyi shu ba rgyang // kun tu 'od kyis la rab gnas pa// rin chen khri rkang 'degs pa'i stobs dang ldan// mgon gnas dben par gzhan dag gis// mthong rkang sbas pa'i chos nyid lung // phrin las rnam par

121a1: rdzogs pa'i gnas/ / rigs bzhi khrag 'thung he ru ka/ bzhugs gnas mi 'gyur chos kyi sku// de nyid kun tu 'od kyi lung // pad ma leb rgan phyogs bcu'i 'od// sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i tshul//
121a2: chags par gyur pa bad ma ste// che ba 'am yon tan lung du ston// mkha' dbyings rnam dag dri med pas// ma chags pad ma can gyi lung // stong zhing gsal bas gzhan gang 'phags// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gtsigs pa
121a3: yin/ / seng ge 'khor lo tshogs chen pos// thabs dang shes rab ye bral bas// spros med rang gis bzlums pa ni// ma skyes pa yi chos nyid lung // 'od zer gsal bas 'tsher bas na// yang dag sbas pa ye shes
121a4: lung / / 'bro 'du khyab par gyur pa'i tshigs// shes rab rigs kyi gsang ba'i yum// thabs dang shes rab dgyes pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// tshogs chen yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor chen po ni// bdag po khro ba
121a5: chen po'i sku nyid du/ / gsang sngags 'di yis yongs rdzogs bya// oM pad ma shri he ru ka ba ra ma kro ti shwa ri hUM/ ma hA tsan d+hA sar+b+ba du stan phaT// dkyil 'khor bdag po rngom brjid cha lugs dang // 'bar ba'i me
121a6: 'od dmar gsal 'phro ba'i mdangs/ / dbu lnga phyogs bzhir las bzhi'i tshul du bzhugs// dbu ma mnyam nyid bde ba dbyings su gzigs// ral pa'i srid rtse me 'od bzhin du 'bar// smin pa khro gnyer spar sogs
121a7: myur ba/ / lus thung sku rgyan gyad kyi cha byad la// bcwa lnga'i spyan gyis rang gi yul rnams gzigs// rdo rje rin chen khyung gi gshogs pas gtabs// bcu drug rol pa'i spyan dang phyag mtshan dang // sgeg po'i
121a8: zhabs brgyad chas dang 'chas par gnas/ / 'jig rten gsum po zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir// khro bo'i tshigs bcas 'gying bag yum bcas gnon// 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba'i rtse mo la// bde gshegs

121b1: rigs lnga'i snang ba sna tshogs ston/ / rang gi zhing skyong drag po'i gnas 'dul zhing // thams cad rigs kyi dkyil 'bong che la dgod// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus gyis// yab yum gnyis kyi dga' ba bskyod par mdzad
121b2: gnas su'i zla ba dadakyil zlab la/ / sku gsung thugs kyis sa bon yongs rdzogs gsal// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ba ko ha~M/ oM sar+b+bA ta thA ga ta thA ga badz+ra swa b+ha ba ad mako hi/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga cin badz+raH
121b3: ba.ad mako ho/ / 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo drug rnams la// mkha' 'gro'i rgyal mo kham rgya chen mo drug/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can// rigs drug mtshan ma cha lugs ci lta bu// bAr+N+Na
121b4: badz+ra oM/ swata badz+ra hUM// rat+na badz+ra traM// pad+ma badz+ra hri/ kaR+Sha badz+ra ha/ g+hu na badz+ra phaT// phyi rol dkyil 'khor khyab par spro byas te// 'gro rnams dud sogs khams rnams dag byas nas// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen pad mo dang //
121b5: ral gri bcwa rtse gsum dril bu bcas// g.yon pa bdud rtsi thod pa gang ba thogs// mkha' 'gro rab gtum rigs kyi dbu rgyan can// rang gi phreng ba dur khrod rgyan gyis klubs// las kyi kham rgya sna tshogs gzugs kyis
121b6: bzhugs/ / dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// long ba rgyab 'brel rgyan rnams rdzogs// sku mdog mdog mtshan ma tshogs la// phyag sbrel zangs kyi thed pa thogs// oM shri kha'i oM shwa ri kha'i/ hraM/ shri kha'i a/
121b7: dmus long 'khor ba bcu drug dag byung ste// thod rus par 'khyams gnas su bkod par bya// oM shrI kha'i hUM/ shri kha'i hUM/ lcags kyi spyad mo brgyad rnams yang sprul bcas// ye shes sprul pa'i khyi bcu rngam par 'khob
121b8: me ri sprin ltar bstibs pa ril zhing 'khrugs/ / par 'khyams phyi ma'i gnas la kun du 'khod// oM ti ba ta tsakra sho na mu mor khaM hUM phaT// ku kur yag sha hUM phaT// dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// dza hUM ba he

122a1: phyag rgya las/ / mgo dgu brtsegs pa'i rkang gcig po// mgo brgyad lag brgyad rol pa dang // mgo drug lag drug rkang drug dang // mgo gsum rkang gsum lag gsum po// dkyil 'khor chen po sgo bani ru dzad
122a2: med sprul pa'i phyag rgyas rol/ / de dag rol pa'i byin brlabs las// steng 'og phyogs mtshams ma ju gi thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems// me 'brug rlung 'brug phyag rgyas gsal// rab tu rdzogs pa'i tshul du byung // oM dzin
122a3: la toH raM yag gaku ru ban ts+tsha hU~M phaT/ gzhan yang sprul ba'i dkyil 'khor tshogs / e yi byin lag dmar po dang // dung bya khrung khrung la sogs rnams// 'jig rten tsam pa'i tshogs kyis bskor// oM haha ru dra ma hA shan ya hU~M hU~M phaT/
122a4: kun gyi rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM pad ma bi ti si to he he rtsa kra b+h+yo phaT/ snying po'i sngags so// oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ e a ma ra li hUM dza// nye ba'i snying po'o// oM b+h+yo e a ra li dza zhes brjod pa khro bo 'khor lo ma lus par byon zhing/
122a5: rang gi dkyil 'khor gnyis su med par gyur nas// he ru ka chen po nyid kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyu'i dkyil 'khor du gnas shing // rang gi dkyil 'khor rnams dam tshig bkod par mdzad do// de nas sprul pa'i 'khor lo chog
122a6: ma lus rol bar byin brlabs shing / / bdud dang grags byed rmongs byed cing // rang gi gnas su 'du bar mdzad// oM hu lu hu lu raM dza la e a ra le dza hUM baM ho// a la la ho// oM ma tra oM ma tra ru tra ha la ha la hU~M phaT/ dug gsum dngos/
122a7: po sbyad pa'i phyir// rngam pa'i khro tshogs phyogs bcur spro// khro 'dzum phyag rgya bstan mdzad cing // he he ru ru'i gsang sngags brjod// ha la rdo rje'i gad rgyangs kyis// bdud dang srin po la sogs rgyal bar mdzod// oM sarba pa ba
122a8: gang te ta ba byi sha ma ta ru u0f7fhUM phaT/ / oM sarba ba pa he ta pa byi sha kha tang ru Na hUM phaT/ oM sarba ba pa ka ra he ta pa byi sha kha tad ru u0f7f hU~M phaT// dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor po nya'i tshogs// dpal chen rdo rje thog thog ser chen

122b1: 'babs/ / hUM dang paT kyis srid gsum 'khor ba 'jig/ hU~M dang paT kyi byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// rdo rje khrag 'thung khrag gi rgya mtsho skems// rdo rje mtshon chaganam lcags thu lum 'dril// gsang sngags log par/
122b2: lta ba'i bdud rnams 'joms// rdo rje ser chen thog bcas 'bar zhing 'khrugs// nyams pa'i snying dang dbang po thal bar lhogs// ye shes thugs rje a la la// oM ma hA shrI he ru ka D+han+ta b+han+d+ha/ gardzag rdza/ ha la ha la
122b3: hUM phaT/ de nas bdud dang ru tra bcas// rdo rje mtshon chas bskal bskal nas// 'khor gyi longs spyod rol mdzad cing // sha khrag nang grol bdud rtsi dang // rus rkang dbang por bcas pa la// tshogs kyi longs spyod ston mor mdzad// kun gyi
122b4: dgyes pa rdo rje'i glus/ / 'thun par spa dbyangs gcig gis bstod// thugs rje rnam dag pad ma'i rang bzhin las// thugs khar lam las sprul pa'i byang chub sems// phyogs bzhi dbus lngar brjid pa'i sku mchog ni// grub pa'i
122b5: sangs rgyas mkhyen pa'i ye shes lnga/ / dpal lus khyad par 'phags pa zhal gyi dbyings// dbang mchog lhun gyis grub pa'i rta skad can// thar lam thugs rje thabs mkhas sprul pa yi// ye shes byin brlabs khro rgyal 'bum
122b6: du sprul/ / sprin mdzad smon lam yun rings grub pa yi// dmigs pa'i mtha' bral pad ma yum gyi tshul// chos rnams ma lus gsal bar gzigs pa'o// chags med thugs rje pad ma'i tshul// sba mang thams cad mtha'
122b7: las grol/ / zab dang rgyang ring chos kyi don rnams mtshan nyid las// shangs kyi rlung sbom dug gsum gcad nas chod// zhal gyi ho la 'brel bas rgyud lnga gcod// rno dbang mche ba skye shi rtsang nas gcod // leb rgan ljags
122b8: kyi gsung sgra rgya mtshor 'chad/ / ral ba'i phyag gis 'gro ba 'dul la mkhas// gshog bzhi bskyed pas phrin las rnam bzhi mdzad// zhabs rol bas ni zil gnon mdzad pa'i sku// sku cha yan lag rags pa ri bo bzhin

123a1: thugs mchog ye shes stong nyid nyi ma brdal/ ye shes lha mchog byin brlabs 'byung ba'i gnas// ngo mtshar rol pas khro bo kun gyi rje// dpa' bo sku mchog mang la phyag 'tshal stod// de nas bde chen dbang gi
123a2: sus/ / 'khor lo dam tshig sgrogs mdzad cing // rdo rje gsang ba'i sku gsung thugs// gsal bar byin brlabs bskyed par mdzod// oM A hUM sarba paSh+Ta a pri ta sa ma yo gi si ti hUM/ ba ho ka ka ma la su ta sa hUM// oM badz+ra sa ma
123a3: ya kro ta sa ma ya oM A hUM/ mahA yo gi tsi ta raM pa ra ga ta me la kha'i khe'i hUM/ oM kha kha la la ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ oM d+ha na sa ma ya a la la ho// zhes rdo rje 'gru blangs so// pad mo gar mdzad do// bde ba chen pos mchod pas tshim
123a4: par 'gyur ro/ / de'i dus na bdud la sogs pa rnams bsgral ba'i tshogs rnams byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i ye shes kyis brgyan te// dbang bskur ba'i thugs kyis// bdag po rigs 'dzin thams cad kyis bdag
123a5: bopo zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ / dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol tu 'khod cing gsang ba dkyil lokhor 'dzin par gyur to// de'i 'khor rnams kyang dam tshig gi snying po blangs na bran du mdzad par khas blangs to// snying po brjod
123a6: pa ni/ / ma ma trag sha ru tra ma ma b+h+yo// slar bsgo ba'i sngags ni// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo pad+ma hri d+hA ru ru hUM b+h+yo hU~M// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las
123a7: gsang chen 'dus pa'i le'u te/ nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan gar dbang gi so// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bsdu mdzad nas/ bdag dang gnyis med rol pa'i mthus// khro ba'i rgyal po san
123a8: dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// gsang gsum dam tshig phyag rgya che// dkyil 'khor rgyu yi dam tshig sku// bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'o// chos dbyings yon tan 'byung gnas gzhal yas khang //

123b1: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rigs kyi cod pan can// rigs kyi dbang phyug skye 'gro ma lus sgrol// rdo rje bkod pa rgyan gyis dkyil 'khor che// dbang po yul tshogs rigs kyi sku lngar ldan// shes rab thabs dang me gnyis 'du
123b2: 'bral med/ / dus gsum gcig char sgrol bas char gsum rgyan// khams gsum yongs sgrol mdzad kyi rgyan du che// mi gnas mya ngan gsung rab rgya mtsho bsgrogs// ma bsgribs ma bsal go 'phang mdzes par mtho//
123b3: mi ldog yul sgrol stabs drug mdzes par mgyogs// gar yang thogs med byin brlabs shugs dang ldan// mtsher skad gdangs snyan ma srid spro ba 'gyed// khaM dmar ral pa'i dbus nas dbugs 'byung ba// dpral ba zhur po brjid
123b4: pa'i khyad par dang / / rta mgrin 'od 'bar gsal ba'i khyad par ni// don mchog khyad par yon tan rmad du 'byur// ljang khu me 'bar rta mgo'i rang bzhin ni// 'gyur med ye shes ji bzhin gsal// byams pa'i mdangs
123b5: kyis khams gsum khyad par gzigs/ / rdog ma le'u rgan 'bar ba'i khyad par mchog/ stug po bkod sogs zhing khams dpangar byam na// rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed khro bo kun// zhing khams gsum dag ma lus dbang du
123b6: bsrung / / shes rab thabs su 'brel ba'i ta skad ni// grub pa'i dpal tshogs tshangs pa'i rka dbyangs yin// dang po'i mdangs kyis rgyal ba'i zhing khams sgrogs// gdangs skad gnyis pa ri rabartsel 'tsher// gsung snyan
123b7: gang sa gsum snyan pa'i khyad par ni/ / bcu drug spang ma'i ngan tog thar lam ston// spyan mig glog ltar 'gru ba cher 'phags zhing / sha khrag rnon paza ba'i srin po 'joms// mtsher can yid la gdung ba'i taskad ni//
123b8: mun mthu'i 'gro ba ma lus gsal bar mdzad// rgyu dbyings grangs dang gzigs thabs rtogs pa'i don// hUM las dpal chen khro ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// gnas ni snga'i dbugs rings dro ba lags// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor

124a1: rnam par 'phrul pa 'byung / / shangs kyi rlung skom yangs pas ye shes srog/ gsang ba'i tshub mas sdug bsngal snyid nas 'byin// rgya chen sprul pas bag chags tshar gcod de// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho lugs las
124a2: bzlog pa yi/ / rigs kyi rlung gis dug lnga dbyings su sgrol// zlum dkar bzang rims rno dpal tshems// zhal du bdar ba'i byang chub sems// ma skyes chos nyid kun la rol// zhi rgyas dbang bdud drag po yi// cir yang
124a3: 'gyur ba'i ho mkhung ste/ / las lnga 'grel pa'i zhal zhes bya// 'khor ba yongs su smin pa dang // las mangs nyon mongs dbang btsan dang // skye ba mi skye lung ma bstan// de sa smin mdzad pa chen po yi// 'jug ldog cir yang
124a4: gyur pa dang / brjod byed gnyis ka'i bstan gyur nas// 'byar zhing bskyod pas ljags nyid do// yig 'bru'i rgyu nyid bde gshegs thugs// rdo rje myu gu ting 'dzin thugs// 'od nyid nyon mongs rnam dag 'joms// rig byed ye shes
124a5: phyag rgya dang / / yig 'brus bon phyag rgya dang // yon tan rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya'o// srid pa gsum ste lta ba dang // rgud dang las kyi rim pa'o// dpyir ye shes rol pa'i dbyings// snying po phyag mtshan phye mo dag/ bstan
124a6: par gyur nas mkha' yi dbyings/ chos sku chu yi zla ba bzhin// sna tshogs snad la rang bzhin med// dur khrod chen po'i gnas kun du// gar gyi dbang phyug rnam par rol// shar du rol pa'i phyag bzhi mtshan ma ni// khro chen snyed
124a7: 'byin kha To 'bar ba dang / / rdo rje lcags kyu srul gyi zhags pas rol// de bzhin lho la sogs pa'i phyag kyang bzhi// zod pa khrag bkar rdo rje lu gu chud// rdo rje be con thod rlon 'dzin par rol// me yi zhags pa dang ni byung gi wa//
124a8: bsdigs 'dzub rtse la ye shes 'bar// rdo rje khan+da kha ni rab tu 'gro// rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga gdengs pa dang // rtse gsum rtse gcig 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg/ ye nas ma skyes dang pa'i cho 'phrul ston// ye shes lnga yi

124b1: yon tan khyad par ni/ / rin chen drab sangs rgyas stong gis brgyan// klu rgyal nag po 'dra ba'i thabs shes kyis// rtse ba rnam thar sgo gsum sku gsung thugs// sprul pa'i don mdzad dkyil 'khor sna tshogs ston// gsang ba'i
124b2: yum bzhis su la 'khril byed cig/ byang chub sems bzhi de nyid ston par byed// rdo rje dra bas rin chen glog 'gru ba// khyung gshog a mo thig gshog sder mo can// sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis kyi thugs rje shar//
124b3: thabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pas g.yas nas brkyang // srid gsum ma rig mun pa sel byed pa'i// shes rab zla stong rtsa gnyis yon nas khyab// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i byin brlabs che// sprul pa 'phros pas
124b4: drag gsum rgyan mi 'chang / / sna tshogs rol pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa yi// phrin las brgyad kyis bdag nyid sku che ba'i// dpa' bo stag gis steng phyogs 'dul zhabs brgyad/ rgya bye'u lcags kyis shar lho'i zhabs brgyad de// rdo rje 'chang
124b5: zas lho ye phyogs na brjid/ / ba se khrab spug pos lho nub rkang pa brkyang // sna tshogs brjid pas byang shar 'tshams su gyon// shu ke na dar gyis byang shar zhabs mdzes shing // mche ba dmar pos nub byang brkyangs pa'i gdan//
124b6: sprul nag 'khril ba'i zhabs kyi sa 'og phyogs 'dul bar mdzad// khro brkyang gnan cing gzir bas zhabs brdegs shing // dug chen bcom zhing sgral rtsibs gnan// brang gnon ldan pa 'joms zheng 'jigs mdzad dang //
124b7: 'khor gyi skul sbas pas ye shes gsal// sku nyid 'khor la sbas pas dbyings kyi brgyan// thugs rje'i rol pa gzhal yas khang du bstan// phrin las rol pas hUM mdzad hU~M gis brgyan// sa bcu zil gnon stobs bcu'i
124b8: dbang dang ldan/ / de nas gar gyi dbang phyug che// dam tshig gar gyi byin brlabs kyis// rgun gyi ting 'dzin la gnas nas// yum chen gzi ldan dgyes par mdzad// dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya ni// mnyes mdzad gzi ldan

125a1: ga/ dang phrugs// byed pad med pa tshogs dang // gsung gi rdorje mi phrad do// gtso bo rabatu gdungs pa la// rab tu smra ba gang byed pa// bsreg pa'i tshig gis brgyan nas su// sri'u'i sems kyis gdungs pa la// ye shes tshogs kyis rab
125a2: bskor ba'o/ / lha mo'i tshogs rnams bskor byas te/ rang ga phyag rgya dkyil 'khor du// gnyis med mnyam pa'i rgyag zhi gdab// byang chub sams tshogs gsal ba'i blan// thim pa'i dkyil 'khor don chen gsal// dbyings byug k+Sha
125a3: tshogs bsam yas dag/ nges pa'i ye shes rol pa'i sku// stong gsum dbang por gdon mi za// 'jig rten gsum gyi 'byung gnas mchog/ dus gsum kun gyi gnas dang rten// phyogs bcu dkyil 'khor thams cad na// dmachen
125a4: chen po de nyid mangs/ / phyi nang gsang ba'i mthar phyin pa// thams cad pad mo rnam dag pas// cho 'phrul rnam kun de bzhin nyid// thugs rje chags pa'i phrin las kyis// dbang drag phran las gnod sbyin gnas// gnyis med 'bar bas
125a5: thams cad sreg/ las dang bag chags sgrib sogs kun// gnas nas gshegs mdzad ye shes tshogs// lhun gyis dad pas kun tu 'joms// snying ma lnga brgya dus kyi mtha'// srid gsum sems can gdul dka' ba//
125a6: 'phro 'du 'khyil ba'i 'od mdangs mdzad// 'jig rten mkhyen dang mya ngan 'das// gnyis med thugs kyis sa le mkhyen// de ltar dgongs pa'i khyad par de// 'gro ba mtha' dag 'dul don du// rnam par thar pad bu gsum bstan//
125a7: g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing ka/ ye shes drug gi phyag mtshan ni// g.yas pa'i rdo rje rde'u chung dang // mdud rtse gsum pas 'dzin pas rol// zil bu rgyu zhags thod rngon g.yon// bskal ba'i me ri sbrul zhags dang //
125a8: thod rnon phreng ba brgyan du byas// sgeg pa dpa' bo 'jigs su rung // dgod dang gshi dang 'jigs par byed// snying rje dam dang zhi ba'i sku// sku gsung thugs kyi gar thabs can// 'jigs byed khro bo rnam par rgyal// skyeb

125b1: med pa'i chos dbyings su/ / mtshan ma med pa'i chos bshad pas// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rgyal// longs sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis// mi 'jigs stobs mchog gad na ste ras/ sangs rgyas zhing khams thams cad du// zab mo rgya
125b2: chen chos ma bstan/ / dngos dang dang sa med gsal byed pas// me long lta bu'i ye shes dang // sprul pa 'gro mang don gyis phyir// phal mad bkod pa'i sa rnams su// dngos po mtshan ma rnam 'phrul gyis// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes tshogs
125b3: thams cad mtshan mnam mkha'i dngos/ / de nyid sgro btags chos dang bral// kun ldan byams sems de kho na// rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med// he ru ka yi bde chen dbyings// chos rnams kun gyi rgyu yin te// 'od gsal ba
125b4: yi gnas 'jug pas/ / rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor rgyu'i don phyung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//
125b5: de nas bcom ldan dpal gyi skus// gar gyi dbang phyug lhun grub mchog/ thugs rje brjid pa'i stobs ldan pas// yon tan khyad par bstan pa'i phyir// nam mkha'i ri mo phyag rgya'i rngom// cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs pa'i rngom//
125b6: zil gyis gnon pa'i gnas mchog rngom// 'tsham jam chen po'i stangs stabs rngom// sku mdog brgyad kyis brjid pa'i mchog/ phyag rgya'i don dang ldan pa'i sku// haM lnga 'brel bar gyur pa'i zhal// zla kham cir yang 'gyur
125b7: ba ljags/ / kye shi ba tsang nas bcod pa'i tshems// rnam pa'i 'brug ltar sgrol ba'i dbyangs// ting 'dzin nam mkha'i skar tshogs bzhin// bran las rgya mtsho rarlabs tshogs ltar// byin brlabs tshe yul sprin
125b8: phung tshogs/ / mdzad pa'i rol mo gar thabs rngam// bdud dang srin mo 'joms byed rnams// khams gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i gad na// stong gsum dus gcig bsgral ba'i zhing // rtog pa 'joms pa'i brdul zhum

126a1: mchog/ sagasung dgas marag yon tanan// rngam brjid sum bdu rtsa drug ma dang// rgya chan yan lag rags pas brjed/ grangs sarkye dang mamam pas brjod// bkur gshes gca ba mthong bas brjed/
126a2: byang zhugs bla ma yin pas brjid// gdong chen stong gsum gang bas brjid// don la nyi tsher ston pas brjid// gsal bas mtha' gnyis yangs pas brjid// thugs rje bugs dam mthar phyin brjid// ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dul
126a3: ba brjid ma 'gags sa le mkhyen pas brjid/ / med la zad mi shes pas brjid// gcig la 'dod dgur sgyur bas brjid// gnod sbyin pa par mdzad pa brjid// babs mkhas skyon gyis ma gos brjid// rems bral nyam thag
126a4: rol pas brjid/ / 'khor ba yun rings mgon mdzad brjid/ cig char zil gyis gnon pas brjid// bya ba'i ye shes rdzogs pas brjid// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// zil gnan nga rgyal bcag par bya// des su ro yi nang /
126a5: nas ni// glog 'gyur lce ni lan gsum 'byung // so 'am sen mo gcad par bya// de nyid ral gri bzang por 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa yi grangs bzhin 'byung // de thogs nam mkha'i la song nas// rigs pa 'dzin pa'i sngags brjod
126a6: bya/ / yo thu ru na ra sa ma ta ya hUM phaT// gar gyi dbang phyug nga rgyal gyis// gang 'dod gan su 'gro bya zhing // dregs byed tshogs rnams zil gnan te// brtul zhugs spyod pas klu zang zhing // btul zhugs spyod pa sna tshogs pas//
126a7: yud tsam gcig la gnas su dag par byed// bcom ldan pad ma he ru ka'i// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// ji lta sprul zhing cir yang snang // mtshan nyid cig tu ma des pas// sku gsung thugs sprul bas ma yas che/
126a8: bzhin las dang yon tan gyi// byin brlabs ya mtshan sgrib med gsal// khams gsum kun las rtsal 'phags shing // rang gi dkyil 'khor rnam gsal las// byin brlabs 'gro la rgya cher ston// chos dang longs spyod

126b1: rdzogs pa dang / / sbrul sku sna tshogs 'dul ba'o// tshig gi gsung rabs rig pa'i gsung dang // bzhi la gsum bcu drug gis brjid// dug gsum sku gsung thugs kyis sbyangs// dug lnga bde ba chen pos sbyar// dbyings las ye shes
126b2: rol pa'i mthus/ / skye 'gro ma lus rgyas btab nas// rang bzhin dag pa'i dbyings su spyod// rgyal ba gang gzugs rjes kyang // 'di la skyabs su yod ma yin// sred pa gsum du dag byas nas// srid pa'i phyag rgya
126b3: gsang bas 'debs/ / thig le chos sku rig pa'i mchog/ gar gyi dbang phyug zhes su bsngags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las// khro bo rngom brjid
126b4: ston pa'i le'u ste/ nyer gsum pa'o// // de nas 'khor gyi gtso bo mchog/ gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pas// yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal lo// mchod pa rgya chen phul byas ste// 'gro brtse ba'i sems can las//
126b5: bsgrubs pa'i rim pa zhu bar mdzad// bcom ldan dngos grub kun gyi bdag/ gdul bya kun gyi don gyi phyir// thun mong dngos grub ji lta bur// de bzhin mchog gi dngos grub dag/ sgrub par bya ba'i thabs ni gang // las kyi cho ga ci lta bur/
126b6: yan lag tshogs pa'i ldan byas nas// tshe 'di mchog tu gyur ram ci// thabs mang cho ga bshad par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang // rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs te// ma 'ongs 'gro la phan pa'i phyir// sku
126b7: gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba las/ / ngo mtshar 'phrul pa 'di gsungs so// rgyal ba kun gyi dam tshig che// rnam gsum phyag rgya la gnas nas// las kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa ni// gnas bzangs dag tu brtsam par bya'o// phyag rgya'i grogs
126b8: la bsten pa na/ / bzlas brjod yan lag ma nyams par// gsang sngags yi ge bcu bzhi pa// sum 'bum dag tu brjod byas nas// rol pa mtshan ma bsgrub pa'i phyir// mchog chen mtshan ma ma nyams pa// rab rtags dur

127a1: khrod gnas nas blangs/ / khro bo chen po'i tsham rngam gyis// yungs dkar thal ba la sogs pas// sum pa ni'i sngags brjod cing // yi dgas gshin rje bskrad par bya// de nas dri zhim sbyar ba yis// dag byed//
127a2: chu yis legs bkrus te// me tog phreng sogs rgyan gyis rgyan// gsung gi phyag rgya byin brlabs cing // dpa' bos rang gi khyim du blang // klu drug bcas drug bcas pa yis// khro rgyal rol pa'i bro yis sbyangs// bsgrub
127a3: pa'i dkyil 'khor nyams dga'i mchog/ rgya khyon 'dom gang khru yis bstod// ci bzhin la sogs cho ga bzhin// rdzas dang sa gzhi dag bya zhing // sa bon gnas pa'i las rdzogs nas// bsrung zhing dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//
127a4: yab yum bsgrub pa'i grogs bcas rnams// dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir gnas bzung ste// mchog chen dkyil 'khor kha ru bzhag/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo legs ldan pas// stong nyid ting 'dzin nas brtsams te//
127a5: dkyil 'khor mnyes pa sogs rdzogs byas nas// ro langs dgug cing gzhug bya ste// bar chad med par bzlas brjod bya// oM be ra na trag sha ta ha la ta'i lo ma ta ya man ta tsan tra hUM phaT// ting 'dzin 'od zer gsal
127a6: ba'i rgyun/ zur ma chag par brjod byas te// 'bu mtsho gcig gis g.yo 'gyur zhing // gnyis kyis 'od dang bcas par snang // 'bum phrag gsum gyis sgra bstan zhing // langs te kun tu blta bar byed// de tshe rnal 'byor
127a7: dbang po yis/ / sgra nas bzung nas bsgyel byas la// rta mchog sngags kyi dbang du bya// rdo rje khyud gshog phyag rgya yi// don gyi gsung gis go bar spyod pas bro yang brdung // ting 'dzin sngags dang yan lag rnams/
127a8: ma bral rang gi gnas 'ongs te// dkyil 'khor mtha' mas bskor byas nas// mchod pa bro glu dang bcas pas// lha rnams mnyes pa'i cho ga bya// de nas rtul zhugs chen po yis// go la lang g+ha gnon pa yi//

127b1: blol sogs pa rdzogs byas nas// ro da gsar du gyur pa yin// den mchod dang sbyin pa dang // rang la dgas par yo byad bya// de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi dgangs pa zan mad pa'i gsang pa dpa la tam chag
127b2: ril pa'i drud la / ro langs bskus san te// nyi shu bzhi pa'o// / de nas gar gyi dbang phyug gis// gzi ldan sum dang la ma da cing// 'khod kyis zhus pa'i tshig gas nam/ thun mo dngos grub babang po nyid/
127b3: ma 'ongs 'grol pa nA gdags b+hair// rim pa bzhin du pan gdags mngang // dbang thob dam tshig la gnas pas// yid 'thun gnas mchog bzang po rtsa// mig sman sbyor ba bsgrub byas ste// byin rlabs ldan pas 'gro don/
127b4: byas// rang ga ting 'dzin gnas pas/ rang gi gsang sngags 'bum rdzogs nas// mtshan ma phra mo mthong ba dang // bsgrub pa'i dkyil la bar brtsam par bya// dkyil 'khong gang yang rung ba yi// phyag rgyags sngags nyid 'dzin/
127b5: ldan// na chen sngags kyi mas 'arjod ni// 'bram thag gsum du gasrung bar bya// oM padams cag stsas pam ma b+hi ti yan d+ha baT/ dkyil la ba gnas kyi rtags pa son// da sa pa'i gnas su 'gro byas te/ sa/
127b6: ma mthang mchen mo nga/ l+h+wang dreg tum tha thong dubasdud// nga gi 'a khar gyi tshogs rnams kyis// mind pacan 'thang baspang bar bya// de ni ban d+hamatshan ldanas// gzi can ma ni bltas nas sa// matsan
127b7: ga k+ku 'dzin ma nyams skye / / smra da sa/ / pa ma thugs // kharnams can gyis gas kyis/
127b8: bdag pa dang du bzud// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags ldan pas// sra nyid dmig sman gas cig drug/ de nas 'bar gyi tshogs na zhing// skye gro ldan la gsang par bya// bdas bsgrub pa'i snang las// 'dod

128a1: grub mthong bar 'gyur/ / gzhan yang ri lu'i bsgrub thabs ni// bdud rtsi lnga las 'byung ba yi// rdzas dag sha lnga dang bsres te// thod pa mtshan ldan nang bzhag nas// dkyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan gnas su// thabs dang shes rab ldan
128a2: nas su/ / gar gyi dbang phyug sku bsgoms zhing // yi ge bcu bzhi gsang sngags kyis// 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas byas te// mtshan ma phra mo mthong ba dang // bdud rtsi gong bu bsgril byas te// rgya shug 'bras bu'i tshad tsam /
128a3: rin chen za ma tog tu gtugs// dkyil 'khor pa'i dbus gzhag pas// bsrung ba'i tsakras bsrung bya zhing // rig pa 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags ni// 'bum phrag lnga ru brjod par bya// 'od zer lcags kyu 'byung bar 'gyur/
128a4: oM ma hA pad ma saM po ta hu lu hu lu hu hUM phaT swA hA// de nas ri lu de blangs te// kha 'am lag rtsa gzung byas nas// gang 'dod gnas su 'gro byed cing // ci 'dod pa dag grub par byed// lha'i gnas mchog nyams dga' ba// snga do gcig gis
128a5: 'khor bar nus/ / gzhan yang bcud len bzang po nyid// skyes bu gang gis bsdub 'dod pas// bdud rtsi rgyal ba a ru ra// gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pas mchog/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bor swa// sul rangs rgyas par gyur
128a6: pa dang / / pa gcig pur mo thal ba dang // sIr skya'i pa mar gtse bar bya// de nyid sbrang rtsi dang sbyar bas// nyi shu rtsa gcig zhag gi bar// zhe re'i tshad du bskyed cing bza'// dkyil 'khor gsang ba la bsten nas/ gar gyi dbang phyug
128a7: skur bsgom zhing / / rig 'dzin pa yi sngags brjod cing // mtshan rtags gsal bar ma mo thong bar// yan lag ma nyams brtson 'grus bskyed// oM pad mo bi ha ra ha ra ta si ni hUM phaT swA hA// gsang sngags sum 'bum ma
128a8: rdzogs par/ / a ru ra'i 'bras bzangs stong gi tshad// legs par sbyar te stong gi tshad// legs par sbyar te zos pa'i mthus// nad dang zug rngu'i tshogs 'joms shing // tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs/ rgas la sogs pa'i

128b1: skyon sel cing / / rigs 'dzin gnas su 'gro bar byed// de bzhin dbang po'i lag pa dang // kha ra bu ram nye shing dang // zur rdul mu zi la sogs pas// rang gi cho ga shes pa yis// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags kyis 'grub// gar
128b2: dbang dkyil 'khor la ni rten byas te/ / so sor mnyams sbyangs pa'i sa// ba yi'o mdang sbyar zhing // pa yi mar gyis gzungs btab nas// mtshan ma ma gyur bar du gzhag/ de ni rige 'dzin dngos grub thob// oM pad
128b3: mo e dra dra a he de ba na hUM phaT/ oM pad mo ra rgya a ga ra ta dor sha hUM phaT/ oM pad mo ma mo na pi sha la hUM phaT/ oM glu li sa po ta ma go ra na hUM phaT/ oM pad mo me sha a nan da ta ya ka ra hUM phaT// de dag las rnams 'grub
128b4: pa dang / / rtag tu rang gis 'char byas shing // gsang ba'i sngags lam la brten nas// tshe 'di grub par gyur pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud
128b5: las/ thun mong gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i le'u ste/ nyer lnga pa'o// // de nas gar gyi dbang phyug nyid// phyag rgya rol pa'i skur bcas kyis// snod ldan byang chub sems dpa' dag/ mchog gi dngos grub bskyed byed pa'i//
128b6: rig 'dzin gnas kyi mtshan nyid bshad// dmar po dbang gi dkyil 'khor du// ban d+ha mtshan dang ldan pa brgyad// pad ma'i 'dab ma la bkram nas// tshe 'das sngags kyis brgyan par bya// de ni bza' ba tu longs spyod
128b7: tshogs/ / ma nyams phun sum tshogs par spyad// gar dbang lha la mos pa yis// gsang sngags rgyal po brjod byed cing // sum 'bum bzlas pa'i grangs chad nas// mtha' sngags gzhan gyis brgyan byas te// rtags
128b8: mthong bar du bzlas brjod brtsams/ / oM a su sha oM a yu sha so ta bruM// 'od zer du blta bu dang // phyag rgya'i dbyings dang 'byung ba'i dus// bro drug glu dang gar bcas pas// brtul zhugs chen po bdud rtsi spyad//

129a1: sugasung thugs mchog phyag rgya che// gsang ba'i yum bskyed snying po mchog/ oM e ka te bi ga te ma tang ka te swA hA// mnyams nyams pa'i phyag rgyar gsal// gnyis su med par sbyor ba yis// rdo rje pad mor ldan
129a2: byas pas/ / thabs kyi phyag rgya'i tshe 'phrul la// gzi ldan gsang ba oM gru gsum// nyi me pad ma shes rab ldan// so so gsal ba'i brdas mtshon ste// oM bruM pad ma a yu shes/ sprin brlab rnams par 'gro ba yi// phyogs
129a3: bcu'i sangs rgyas thugs skul zhing / / byang chub sems mchog cha yi rgyun// bsgrub pa po la gsal bar mdzad// bda'adab brgyad pa nyi mar bcas// dbus su gsang ba'i rdo rje tshe// hUMgs gsor zhing a yis bstod// yangs
129a4: yang du bskul ba ni/ / sku gsung dbyings su gyur pa'o// de la byang chub sems mchog rgyun// ban d+ha mtshan ldan nang du bcug/ rnal 'byor gar dang legs bcas pas// bkra shis tshigs bshad glu blang zhing // bkra shis gar dang
129a5: dbyangs su bcas/ / longs spyod ston mo kun gsol zhing // dngos grub don phyir gsol ba gdab// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba// dpal ta mchog rol pa'i chud chen po las tshe bsku
129a6: pa'i skye drug pa/ / de na sa gang kyig mchog gos// thams bad n+ti b+hin pa bas nas// phyin snod bzud ma lus kun// rigs pa'i sna bsgrub pa'i phyir// nga las byung ba nga bzhin dang /
129a7: grub snying po kun bsdus bshad// chos dmas ma lub rnams btogs nas// rigs lnga'i dkyis mabor rdum drug nas// desas 'byung ba'i dngas rnams kyis// de bung stong ba rgya// dang por bsod nams tshogs sa
129a8: rdo rje thas pa nyes byas pas/ / bran su ma tshogs pa'i gnas dag rtsa// sanyid nye zer bsgoms byas pas// dkyil 'khor chen po brtsam par bya// rigs kyi kyi dkyil 'khor gyis// rigs kyi phyag rgya ba sgrub pa

129b1: bya/ / dri dbyibs kha dog rol la sogs// shwa lnga bdud rtsir bcas pa dag/ ban d+ha mtshan ldan lnga ru ni// dkyil 'khor 'khor dang phyogs bzhir dgram// rdo rje dkod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// so sor spang ba sbyar byas te// phyag
129b2: rgya sngags dang ting 'dzin mthus/ / rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub// mchod cing mnyis la byas nas ni las kun pa'i gsang sngags brjod// oM pa mo brda shri g+hun si d+hi sar+b+ba ban d+hA a mri ta/ AM AMHhUM snunA// de las
129b3: 'od dang du ba dang / dri dang lha mo rtags dag ni// bzlas brjod dran mong khyad par dag/ 'bumatsho gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur// de nas grub pa'i rtags mthong nas// de dag btag tsam sbyang bya zhing // mkha' 'gro ril ba'i rdul
129b4: shugs kyis/ / bsod nams sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs// dkyil 'khor bgod pa rgyan dang bcas// khro bo 'bar bar zhal sbyar zhing // yab yum gdung ba'i glu dbyangs dang // byang chub sems dpa' 'phro 'dra yis// dkyil 'khor
129b5: dbus kyi gnas bzhugs par/ / bdud kyi gar gyi dbang phyug bskyed// slar nyid khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyis// gzugs 'dul gtso bo'i thugs khar zhugs// ye shes dkyil 'khor kun bkug nas// dam tshig bdud rtsi
129b6: gnyis med 'gyur/ / slar 'byung bad ma'i rgyal po'i mu// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gdan la bzhugs// mchod pastod dga' bas mnyes byas nas// tho gar gru yis thugs dam bskang // khyad par gsang sngags rgyal/ ba
129b7: bo'i mthus/ / ye shes lngar ldan 'od zer can// oM ma hA sarba ta thA gta ban tsa a mri ta ru lu dra lu hUM phaT swA hA// ji srid mtshan ma mthung bar// sngags kyi rgyal po brjod par bya// de nas rta mgrin phyag rgya
129b8: yis/ / bsgrub pa chen po gsang ba'i don// rdo rje rta mchog phyag rgya che// bdud rtsi rdzas kyi dbang bsku zhing // rnal 'byor thogs bcas tshim par bya// phyogs rnams kun nas gdungs pa'i glus// dkyis/

130a1: 'khor lha dang bla ma mchod// dngos grub gsol ba'i tshig brjod cing // dga' ba'i longs spyod rgya cher bya// lha rnams kun la dgyes 'dul zhing // dam med dbang po sngags kyis bskrad// bdud rtsi gtor bas
130a2: lus chag 'gyur/ / rang gi ye shes las las skyes// de nas las mdzad srungs ma dang // 'gron tshogs gtor mas mnyes byas te/ bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen po// rab tshogs 'gro ba'i don phyir bsngo// de bzhin
130a3: gagegra ba thas cad kyi dgo pa blan med sdig/ dpal te mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu bdun pa'o// // de nas rta mchog rol pa'i sku dbus su// dkyil 'khor dbus su dgyes tshul gyis/
130a4: 'gro mas kun la bskal mdzad cing // phrin las gsang ba'i don bshad mdzad// bsam gtan las kyis 'byung ba yi// zhi rgyas dbang drag mngon spyod dang / gnan bzlog rengs dang gsod las sogs// ting 'dzin gsal
130a5: nam goms pa'i mthus/ / bdag dang gzhan don las la sbyar// zha bzhi pa'i yig ste// bsgrub bya zla dkyil la bzha gnas// rnam par snang mdzad 'od sngags kyis// dus gsum lha dang mngon sbyar zhing // byang chub sebs
130a6: kyi bde bskyed de/ / zug rngu rtog pa rnam par sel// yun rangs goms par bsten pa'i mthus// me 'bar gnas kyang zhi bar nus// rgyal rgyas pa'i gzugs bgyis te// rin chen 'byung ldan la 'byung ba'i// 'khor
130a7: lo bsgyur rgyal cha lugs kyis/ / ser po 'od dpung 'bar ba brjid// rang gi btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas// bde gshegs byin pa rlabs kun bsdus shing // sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dang // phrin las sgonas
130a8: brtsam par mdzad/ / sngags dang 'od zer gsang ba yis// rin chen sna bdun gser la sogs// mkha' mdzod char sprin bzhin du 'bebs// tshogs rnams rang gis longs spyod cing // 'gro rna mas gzhan la byin

130b1: par byed/ / thabs dang dbang du bsdu phyir ro// 'od dpung dmar po mtha' yas swa// pad ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs shing // chags pa chen pos 'gro 'dul ba// rigs kyi ting 'dzin sngags kyi mthus// lha tshogs 'gro rnams dbang //
130b2: sdud cing // 'khor bcas dang bar gyur pa yin// gang zhig sdang ba'i sems yod pa/ 'phrad pa bzhin rgyas chags par 'gyur// gang zhig gsad pa'i las grub mdzod// de ni mthing nag las kyi khro bo'i ting 'dzin las// khro bo
130b3: sprul pa'i 'phro 'dra yis/ / bsgrub bya dang phra zhing dgug pa// me yi dkyil 'khor lagazhag ste// shin tu ma rungs mtshon char ldan// dkon mchog gsum la sngo byed cing // skye ba yongs la 'tshe ba dang // slob dpon ku la bsngo ba dang /
130b4: sangs rgyas thugs rjes bzod mi mdzad// las kyi khro bo sna tshogs kyis// mtshon cha me 'od 'bar 'phros nas// sdig pa can de bsgral mdzad cing // bya khyi lce spyang sha za dang // khrag 'thung mang po 'dras pa yis// bstod pa'i tshul du rol
130b5: zhing dgyes/ / til tsam med par zos pa dang // sems nyid bde ba chen po'i gnas// de dag ting 'dzin gsang sngags dang // dkyil 'khor so so'i rnam pa bsgrub// oM b+huta tsakra sam pa ti lo tsa na che ge mo shan ting ku ru swA hA// oM rad
130b6: na saM b+ha gu ru ma ma ki che ge mo busti ku ru swA hA/ / oM ya mi te sa ra ba ra ho/ che ge mo ba sha~M ku ru swA hA// oM kar+m+ma sa na ti ba krota ni che ge mo hA yA swA hA// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzang po// rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas te// sngags/
130b7: 'dzin thor ba'i mthus// cho ga mngon du 'grub par byed// gzhan yang rmongs dang rangs pa dang // dbye zhing dgug dang bskrad pa dang // gnan la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang // rang gi lta ba'i sbyor ba yis// bsam gtanas
130b8: kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba// dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las// bsam gtan gyi sbyor ba'i rim pa la'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o// // de nas

131a1: sbyor ba'i rgyal po dang / phrin las kun gyi mchog gyur pa'o// rdzas rnams rten pa'i mtshan ma nyid// 'dod 'dod 'bras bu sgrub byed pa'o// gar gyi dbang phyug phyag rgya'i sku// rnam spro lha yi dkyil 'khor gyis// sa
131a2: so'i 'dod don bsgrub par byed/ / rdo rje tsakra rin chen dang // pad ma rgya gram la sogs te// las kun lha yid rgyal gyis// mtshan rtags mabyung bar du sgrub// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bzhir gzhag nas// lha'i
131a3: dkyil 'khor bsgrub byed cing / / mtshan ma'i rdzas la rten byas te// brten par mchod cing mnyes pa dang // las kun pa yi gsang sngags brjod// oM ma ma sarba byi ta ha ra ku ru swA hA// sarba sa mo kra ni// lam pa shan
131a4: ti ku rud ni hUM/ buM sting rat+na ma ku ru swA hA/ ba sha ma ku ru pad mo hri da ya aM/ staM pa na mo sha a kaR+Ya pa ni hUM phaT/ cung zhig gzugs ni 'dra ba'am// 'od 'phros bskyod par gyur pa dang // nga rgyal ldan pas lag thogs te/
131a5: gsang sngags drag tu brjod par bya// gang zhig zhi dang rgyas pa dang // dbang la sogs ni bsgrubs 'dod pas// de dag de dang 'thun pa dang // las kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas bsam// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma bskul byas te/
131a6: rang gi las la rnam par gnas// dgug la sogs pa'i las dag dang // lugs kyu la sogs las kyis bsgrub// rten gyi mtshan ma dang bral bar// ci 'dod bya ba mthar phyin ba sgrub// thabs dang bsgrub byed gsang
131a7: sngags la/ / se so'i las kyi mtha' brgyan te// yi ge bcu bzhi'i rjes thogs su// sum 'bum grangs kyis bsgrub par bya// oM bi lo gi ma ma du shA na ga ga na ru lu ru lu hUM phaT// dang po rtsa ba'i sdigs ni// sum
131a8: 'bum dag tu zlas byas nas/ / slar yang de yid grangs mthun pa// gang 'dod las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyur

131b1: chen po las rten gyi sgo nas spyod pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// // 'gro ga nas thams cad bsrang byed cing // phan gdags cho ga bzang po nyid// rgyal ba'i byin brlabs gnas pa'i thabs// rnam pa yis ni
131b2: brtsam byas te/ / grong khyer la sogs bsrung 'dod pas// chu dang bye ma la sogs la// gsang sngags rgyal po brjod par bya// oM na mo ku ru sarba byi dar ni mo sa de nir sha ni ra sha kra ra kra ta hUM phaT// rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas/
131b3: stong du brjod cing phyogs bcur gtor// gang srung ba dag shis 'gyur cing // 'byung po'i tshigs kyis mi tshugs 'gyur// gzhan yang ri'u cha dgu pa'i// 'khor lo shing shun tshegs la bri// mu khyud dag gis mtha' bskor nas
131b4: gsang sngags rgyal po dgod par bya/ / dbus su dgod pa'i gsang sngags ni// yi ge bcu bzhi gsang sngags bsam// de yi mtha' mar oM mthar he he dang // hu ru kaM pa bag sha ha ha ma mra bri hUM phaT swA hA// de mthar dbyangs dang
131b5: gsal byed gang / / bsrung ba'i sngags dang bcas pa ni// gur gum bzang pos byugs byas te// rdo rje rgya gram dbus su gzhug/ gang gi ming bcas 'bum zlas shing // btags pa'i srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// gzhan
131b6: yang bum pa bzang po ru/ / bdud rtsi 'o ma sbyar ba dag/ rang gi gsang sngags yungs dkar bcas// gar dbang chags pa'i skur bsgoms shing // sngags thong bsrung bar 'gyur bar byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
131b7: kyi/ / gsang ba 'di nyid bshad pa las/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems bcas pas// de la thams cad dga' mdzad cing // lha rnams kun la slar bsgo/ mdzad// de dag dad pa'i shugs kyis ni// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di bzung
131b8: zhing / / de 'dzin gzhan la bdabyams par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba las/ bsrung ba'i le'u ste sum bcu pa'o// // de bzhin gshegs pa

132a1: thams cad kyi dgongs pa/ blan med pa'i gsang pa dpal ta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po'i rtse ba/ rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ti ru kakA ru Ni kIHta tan ta gu h+ya ke b+hI ra ud ta ma nA ma/ bod skad du
132a2: dpal te drag rnying rje rol pa'i rgyud bsang bzab ma'i mchog ces bya ba/ / dpal rdo rjesems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang /
132a3: rin po che dang / pad ma dang / las kyi rigs thams cad kyi mchog tugs ba chen po dam tshig gi sdom pa gnyis su me da pa'i bde ba chen po dbang brnyes pa/ thabs dang shes rab kyi rna la 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po/
132a4: khams gsum thams cad kyi bdag po chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i skabs dang ldan pa// che mchog
132a5: he ru ka'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rin po che gsang ba rdo rje mchog tu gsang ba'i bcom ldan 'das bud med kyi dkyil na gsung brjod pa med
132a6: par bzhugs so/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa// rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo dang / la pa dang /
132a7: ldan pa dang / 'jib par byed pa'i gsang ba chen mo'i g.yog dang / 'byung ba chen po lnga dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa'i lha'i tshogs 'bum phrag brgya stong gis khyab pa 'di lta ste/ snying po ye shes rdo rje dang /
132a8: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rdo rje dang / me long ye shes rdo rje dang / so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / mnyam pa nyid ye shes rdo rje dang / bya ba nan tan ye shes rdo rje dang / nam mkha' ye shes rdo rje dang / rlung ye shes

132b1: rdordo dang / me ye shes rdo rje dang / chu ye shes rdo rje dang / sa ye shes rdo rje dang / thabs dang shes rab ye shes rdo rje dang / gzugs pa shes rdo rje dang / mA ye shes rdo rje dang / dri ye shes rdo rje dang / ro ye shes rdo rje dang / reg ye shes rdo rje dang /
132b2: sku ye shes rdo rje dang / gsung ye shes rdo rje dang / thugs ye shes rdo rje dang / bde ba chen po ye shes rdo rje dang // kun du bzang po ye shes rdo rje dang / gsung gi dbang po ye shes rdo rje dang / gnyi su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / zhi ba'i ye
132b3: shes rdo rje dang / gdul dka' 'dul ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyal ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / me tog gri ye shes rdo rje dang / rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / dbang gi ye shes rdo rje dang / nyi ma'i khro bo ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyal mtshan
132b4: ye shes rdo rje dang / rdo rje sgra ye shes rdo rje dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba ye shes rdo rje dang / gzhon nu ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyu ye shes rdo rje dang / gsung med pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / sna tshogs kyi ye shes rdo rje dang / go cha ye shes rdo rje dang /
132b5: yang dag par zab par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / 'dus pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / bde ba chen po'i ye shes rdo rje dang / byang chub sems kyi ye shes rdo rje dang / rin chen dbang bskur ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / pad mo dmar po ye shes rdo rje
132b6: dang / dam tshig ye shes rdo rje dang / mchod pa'i ye shes rdo rjed/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo g.yog dang bcas pa rnams la 'di lta ste/ shin tu dga' ba'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / rmongs par byed pa'i dbang ma ye shes rdo rje dang /
132b7: gsod ces bya ba'i dbang po ye shes rdo rje dang / rdo rje dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang / ye shes dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang rin chen dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang / pad ma'i dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang / las
132b8: kyi dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang / gnon par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / 'dzums par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / rmongs par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyas 'debs par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / 'dren par byed ma ye shes

133a1: rjo pasod par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang/ 'bigs par byed pa ye shes rdo rje dang // gcod par byed ma la shes rdo rje dang // sdigs byed ces byabs shes rdo rje dang / tshig byed ces b+ha ba ye shes rdo rje dang / yan lag thams cad 'dro bye
133a2: ye shes rdo rje dang / 'jib byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / khrag la dga' ma ye shes rdo rje dang / gcod byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / phan byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / nam mkha'al 'gro ma ye shes rdo rje dang / ngag 'phrog ma ye shes rdo rje dang / zas sha rlon
133a3: za ba ye shes rdo rje dang / srin mo ye shes rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin ma ye shes rdo rje dang / gnod byed ces bya ba ye shes rdo rje dang / sbrul ye shes rdo rje dang / seng ge ye shes rdo rje dang / stag ye shes rdo rje dang / ri dgas ye shes rdo rje dang / phag
133a4: shes rdo rje dang / spre'u ye shes rdo rje dang / khyi ye shes rdo rje dang / byi la ye shes rdo rje dang / ra ye shes rdo rje dang / bya rog ye shes rdo rje dang / wa ye shes rdo rje dang // bya rgod ye shes rdo rje dang// sre mo ye shes rdo rje da// mi'i keng dus dang / 'bu chen po'i ro dang // yi
133a5: dgas dang / sha za dang / gzig dang / bong bu dang / rta dang / ma he dang / ba lang dang / 'ug pa dang / rdo rje 'phrog par byed ma chen mo dang / rdo rje zas 'dren ma chen mo dang / de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam
133a6: pa dang bcas pa/ chos kyi dbyings rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs g.yog dang bcas pa/ rdo rje'i rigs ye shes rdo rje dang / ye shes kyi thobo me shes rdo rje dang / ye shes kyi khro mo yi shes rdo rje dang / sprul pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / skum pa'i 'phra mamen/
133a7: ma shes rdo rje dang yang sbrul ma chen mo ye shes rdo rje dang / bdud rtsi lha mo ye shes rdo rje dang / de dag la sogs te bye ba phrag brgya stong po rnams skra ca co 'byin cing nam mkha' dbyings rab 'bya ma chen po'i tshogs rnams kyis ma/
133a8: par byed cing // bud med kyi dkyil na gsung brjod pa med par bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog he ruka kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa gdon mi za ba'i tshogs rdo rje gtor

133b1: bdabang mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rol pa can pos rnam par ros pa// sbrul pa can po gang dang / khwadang / sil b+han dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / drid/ rod/ reg pa'i bad ba chen po dang
133b2: 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / rol pa la sogs pa'i reg pa pabadeng la spyod pa'i gang nye bar ston cing / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshogs kyi tshul chen po 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnon pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
133b3: spyod pa dang / gar byed pa dang / za bar byed pa dang / 'jib par byed pa dang / spras par byed pa dang / klog par byed pa dang / myang bar byed pa dang / 'gyur bar byed pa dang / 'phrog par byed pa dang / rtsom par byed pa dang / kun du 'dabs par
133b4: byed pa dang / bde ba nye bar stobs shing reg pa/ ro'i bye brag mang po bye ba phrag brgya stong tshad med par nam mkha'i dbyings rdul phran las 'das par mnyam par 'jog pas nye bar gnas shing 'tsho skyo ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
133b5: pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mi gzigs/ dgongs pa nye bar mi 'jog/ thabs dang shes rab ston par mi mdzad// shin tu 'gal ba phyin ci log pa la 'jog par mi mdzad/ nye bar 'jog par
133b6: mi mdzad/ ma dad pa rnams dad par yang mi mdzad/ mdul ba rnams dul bar yang mi mdzad// nye bar bcos pa rnams 'tshe bzhi par yang mi mdzad// ma 'gags pa rnams 'gog par yang mi mdzad// ma bskul ba rnams
133b7: bskal par yang mi mdzad/ margyas pa rnams rgyas par yang mi mdzad/ rnam par mongs pa rnams sel bar yang mi mdzad/ byur nams mi da yang yang ri me // ga nga mgyur rnam da' ba sa mim / thos pa rnams thos pa
133b8: yang mdzad mi gdu pa rnams gdug papa mi mdzad/ 'jigs byed chen po dang / drag po ma rungs pa chen po dang / gtum po chen po dang / lha dang lha ma yin dang / log 'dren dang / gdug pa chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang /

134a1: srin mo dang / shin du gdug pa'i gdug pa chen po dang / tsha ba'i don dang / nad dang / sbrul dang / sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar byed pa rnams nye bar zhi bar yang mi mdzad/ rnam par dul bar yang mi mdzad/ de nas de bzhin
134a2: gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas dgongs pa nye bar bzhag ste/ spyan gnyis mi 'dzums par gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pa la bskor zhing sku gsung thugs kyi
134a3: rdo rje'i phyag gis phyag byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dbyangs kyis bskul zhing gsol ba btab bo// rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun// rnam dag sras bcas byang chub rnams// yun rings
134a4: bsgoms nas shin du gdungs/ / dga' ba'i yid kyis dgyes par mdzod// kye 'dod chags dri med kun du bzang po'i spyod pa ste// 'dod chags dam tshig la ni phye mdzad nas// dka' ba drug spyad shin du gsungs pa yis// 'dod
134a5: pa bde ba nyid kyis 'jigs par mdzod/ / rnam dag rdo rje las byung ye shes chu// rin chen 'bar ba'i byang chub sems ni rab phyung nas// rgyal ba thams cad rnams kyi dbu ni skams pa la// dri med rin chen char gyis spyi bor
134a6: dbang bskur mdzod/ / mnyam dang mi mnyam 'dod chags cul ga pa// pad ma'i gnas su rdo rje mdzod gtod pas// sna tshogs sems dpa' sems brlan parlag gyur pas// sbyor ba gzhan min ma rtogs bshad du gsol//
134a7: rdo rje sems khyod dbang mchog bde ba byed pa'i mchog/ rdo rje pad mo dbye ba'i tshul gyis sbyor mdzod de// rgyal ba kun gyi gzugs kyi sku ni rab gtud pas// thams cad bde ba'i sgrub pa nyid kyis mnyes par mdzod// de nas
134a8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi nges par bskul bzugs su chud nas bzhengs te/ brjid pa dang bcas pas gar mdzad

134b1: ci/ / zhal 'dzum pa dang / 'dor ba dang / bskum pa dang / 'gying pa dang spyan mdzes pas smin rings bskyod cing bskur ba dang / pad mo phyag gis g.yas g.yon gar gyi phreng ba'i tshul gyis sa'i ngos la zhabs 'ben cing bsgyur ba dang /
134b2: 'dor zhing bskum pa dang / 'jog cing 'dogs pa'i rnam par gnan pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab par mdzad de/ rlung gi khams dang / me'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / sa'i khams kun khyab par mdzad de/
134b3: bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems la kun du khyab par mdzad de// sna tshogs dang / pra ba dang / sdom pa dang / bud med dang / gzhan nu dang / rgan pa dang / skyes pa dang / skyes pa ma yin pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / skar
134b4: ma dang / gshin rje dang / chu bdag dang / brgya byin dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa thams cad la bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos rgyas par byas te yang dag par gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
134b5: pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ / yang 'dus nas phyag gar dang bcas nas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po la spyi bos btud nas gsol ba btab bo// bcom ldan 'das kun gyi gsang ba'i he ru
134b6: chen po rol pa'i thig le 'di/ / gnyis med ye shes yang dag 'byung // bcom ldan khyod kyis bshad du gsol// sems can kun gyi ma skyes pa// skyes dang ma skyes nam spangs pa'i// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rab sbyor ba'i//
134b7: mchog tu rtag pa'i sbyor ba'o// thams cad rin chen 'byung gnas dag/ nam mkha'i dri med 'dra ba yis// rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng bya ste// rdo rje chen pos dbang bskur ba'o// longs spyod chos ni yang dag 'byung // pad mA~M
134b8: mchog ni dmar po mdog/ 'dod chags de nyid gsang ba che// bde byed thams cad bdud rtsi'i mchog/ la la ar ni don dang ldan// yang dag mdzes pa 'gyid pa'i 'gros// sa tshogs ye shes bde ba che// byang chub

135a1: sems thags chag cad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun du bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang pa'i bdag pos gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas 'gog pa can thas na
135a2: rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi gsang bar zhugs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te// yang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po kun tu babang po chen po la de la/
135a3: na nyid kyi dbyangs kyis bskul te bzhengs par mdzad do// oM A r+g+haM/ mi skye ye shes pa de mchog rol mnams// sems dpa' mchog nyid 'gog pa rnams las bskrad// chags med kun du mya ngan 'das mdzad pazhengs
135a4: shing mnams/ / mchog tu gsang ba'i dam bcas 'jig rten sgrol// byang chub skye gnas dbyings las kar mdzod cig/ sngon gyi nyon mongs rdo skams gzir ba yi// bde mchog rgyan dang ldan pa'i thabs kyis bskul te/
135a5: go bar mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po chen po ha ru ka rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rang gis gsang ba'i thig le shin tu
135a6: dgyes pa chen po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs phyung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gas pa'i snying po'i thig le'i dbus su rgyas par byas te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du snang bar byas te/ steng dang 'og tu yang bkum
135a7: te/ ma lus lus pa med pa'i ril dang / sems can thams cad la bsal bar byas nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro bde ma mnyes par byas nas slar de nyid du slar log nas/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa
135a8: chen po'i snying po gsang ba mchog ni big le'i dbus na bzhugs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi 'phreng ba mchog tu bde bar gyur ba snying po des bskul ba ni gar mdzad cing rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin du

135b1: dmigs nas/ / bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po'i thugs kyi dbus su mchog tu gsang ba shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde bar bsgrubs te/ sku rang gi bud med kyi tshul du bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas mngon par 'gyur/
135b2: bar gyur to// de la la la ni spyan pad ma lta bur bsgyur cing smin grus rings// sangs rgyas tshul gyis gar mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor du/ rab dgyes rdo rje gdon mi za// rdo rje sems la dgyes mdzad cing // bde ba'i
135b3: sangs rgyas bde ba yis/ / bcom ldan sangs rgyas bzhugs par 'gyur// zhal bsgyur smin ma 'gyur ba yis// spyan yang bskur zhing shin du gnon// sor mo rnams kyang rab bsgyur dang // rdo rje tshul gyis gar mdzad cing // sems
135b4: dpa' che la mnyes par mdzad/ / rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dkyil du/ swA ni skad cig bskul ba yi// bcom ldan rdo rje gnas par 'gyur// zhal ni brjid cing rin chen dbu// dri med spyi bor gang mdzad cing // dkyil 'khor zhal gyis nas
135b5: bskur ba/ / byang chub sems ni med par mdzad// dur khrod yon tan tshogs dag gis// pad ma'i spyan gyis gzigs mdzad cing // bde ba'i bdag po chen po la// rin chen tshul gyis mnyes par mdzad// rab tu dgyes gsal
135b6: bde ba yi/ / pad ma dmar la che mdzad de// bdod chags bral zhi rab tu bsgyur// pad ma'i dra bas 'brel ba yis// pad ma'i rnal 'byor ma dkyil du// brjid pa'i spyan gyis kun gzigs pa'i// bde ba chel mnyes par mdzad/
135b7: bcom ldan pa mo gnas par gyur// phyag gi sor man mo mtha' rnam par bsgyur ba dgar mdzad cing // phyag/ sbyar khong steng pad ma yis// srog bzhin dpral nas spyi gtsug tu// mchod pa'i sprin gyis longs spyod pas/
135b8: sna tshogs pade byed gco nyid la// las tshul gyis mnyes mdzad cing // bcom ldan sna tshogs gnas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen de shin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gas ba byang chub

136a1: sems kyi ting nge 'dzir la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu bsang pa thig la byang chub kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsu dang blags
136a2: rdo rje las byung ngo / / dkyil 'khor nyid kyi tshul gyis su// cho ga sbyor bas spros byas te// de dang 'thun pa'i dkyil 'khor gnon/ sbyor ba'i gar gyis gar byas shing // ci ltar yang dag brtag par bya// ci ltar dkyil 'khor de kho na// he ruka
136a3: dngal dkyil 'khor ni/ / rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bos kyang // rtag par nus pa ma yin no// dkyil 'khor ye shes kyis brtags pas// snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs kyis// lha yi sbyor ba rgyas btab pas// cho ga shes pas bri
136a4: bar bya/ / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// ta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan// thig gis yongs su 'khor bas btab// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhir ldan// kun tu yongs su mu khyud bcas// phyi rol rdo rje rabs bskor// de'i dbus
136a5: sra bcom ldan 'das che mchog he ru ka rigs bzhi he ru kas ni skor/ / gla bzhi shwa ri yum dang bcas de'i phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu drug la ye shes khro mo bcu drug/ de'i phyi rim pa da ma bcu drug la sprul pa'i khro bo pa bcu drug/
136a6: de'i phyi rim pa ma bcu drug la sprul pa'i pra men ma bcu drug/ de'i phyir ma snam bu gcig la yang sbrul bcu drug/ de'i phyir mi snam bu cig la she sbrul bcu drug/ de'i phyi rol snam bu cig la sman gyi lha mo sum bcu rtsa gnyis// de'i phyi rim snam
136a7: la bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid kyi srubasi la dpag/ bsam gyi shing bzhin/ de'i rtsi ban sman bdud rtsi lhag ma rerare// gser gyi me tog gzhon nu re re/ bcom ldan 'das la mtshad cing bdud rtsi bum pa thogs nas sku khrus mdzad
136a8: pa re re/ / de'i phyi rim snam bu la dbang phyug ma las las grub pa/ mgo brnyan ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad dgod// yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dgod pa'i don bzung zhing bka' stsal ba/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du/ bcom

136b1: ldan 'das chemachog te drag/ dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig la// phyag ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so// zhabs brgyad ka chen po so mnan// glang chen ko rnon gos su gyon// zhing chen g.yang bzhi yab bskor// sbrul na gachun pos dbul brgyan//
136b2: thod pa rlon pas se ral la// stag lpags mgo chen sham thabs can// khrag dang zhag gis tshem bur bcas// bde gshegs rigs pa'i te rug/ khrukhyung mchog ma he gzig dang skrag/ mi 'jigs sems can gzhi yi khri/
136b3: smug nag sngon ga ser nag dang // dmar nag ldang nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ dbug sum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// cha lugs mgo bo yab dang 'thun// dbus kyi dbu gyen du lta ba'i zhal gyis nang du rdo rje bcug
136b4: nas gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba tshul bzhin du mdzad cing bzhugs so/ / rigs kyi yum kun gtso bo yab dang 'thun/ ye shes las grub pa'i khro bo rdo rje thogs med dang / khro bo rdo rje mdung dang / khro bo rdo rje ma dpal dang / khre bo dza
136b5: rje mda' bsnyags dang / khro bo rdo rje phur bu dang / khro bo rdo rje tho ba dang // khro bi de dzaM bya gri dang / khro bo de rje rnon po dang // khro bo rdo rje ral gri dang / khro bo rdo rje zhags pa dang / khro bo rdo rje gtun lung 'dzin dang / khro bo rdo rje gzhu 'dzin dang / khro bo rdo rje ral
136b6: pa gcig pa dang / khro ba rdo rje ye shes dang / khro bo rdo rje lcags sgrog dang // khro bo rdo rje rgya gras 'dzin dang // zo sa de pad sa 'bris ta dang / khro so rdo rje gcig ma dang / khro mo rdo rje rtse mo dang / khro mo 'jigs su rung ma dang / khro mo mi thub rje
136b7: rjes 'dul ba dang / khro mo bkra shis ma dang / the bo dpal ldan ma dang / khro mo pad ma'i 'phreng thogs ma dang / khri mo nor bdag ma dang / khre mo grags ma dang / khro mo grags chen mo dang / khro mar ni 'od ldan pa dang / khro mo pad ma'i
136b8: spyan mda' ma dang / khro mo zas sbyin dang // khro mo bdud rtsi 'byil ma dang / khro me rdo rje dur khrod ma dang / sku mdog gcig tu ma des te/ sna tshogs cir yang 'gyur ba'o// sprul pa'i khro bo 'di dag kyang su mdog sna tshogs su 'gyur

137a1: ba'o/ / khra bo tsU ka ra dang / khro bo rnam par rgyal ba dang / khro bo n+ti la tan tra dang / khA ba ya man taka dang / khra ba mig yo mgan pa dang / tha ba ta ya gr-i ba dang / khra ba ta ke rA dza dang / khra ba bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang / khra bo khams
137a2: gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang / khro bo ma hA ba la dang / kho bo bskud kyi rgyal po dang / khro ba zla ba'i gtso bo dang / khro bo rdo rje khu tshur dang / khro bo gom pa 'dor ba dang / khro bo gnod sbyin rdo rje dang / khro bo las thams cad pa dang / khro mo sprul
137a3: ba'i 'phra men ma dang / rdo rje ke'u ri dang rdorje 'u di rdo mu lo tog/ rdo rje be ta li dang / rdo rje bug si dang / rdo rje gasma ri dang / rdo rje sma sha ni dang // rdo rje tsan d+ha li dang / rdo rje si ha mu ka dang / rdo rje bya kri mu ka dang / rdo rje srin mu ka dang / rdo rje bran mug
137a4: dang / rdo rje kri ta mu ka dang / rdo rje kaM ka mu ka dang / rdo rje khwa ka mu ka dang / rdo rje u lu ka mu ka dang 'di rnams sku mdog gcig tu ma nges so// 'di kun zhing snol ma'i khri la bzhugs so// bdud rtsi lha mo de rnams kyang / phyag mtshan rdo rje
137a5: bum pa 'dzin sku mdog dmar po pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das sang ge'i khri nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan la sku lus glang po che'i cha byad du sprul nas mdzad/ yang sbrul chen mo seng ge lum dral dang / stag lum
137a6: dral dang / ma lham dral d+ha/ sbyang mo lcam dral dang / bya rgod lcam dral dang / kang ka wu madral dang / bya rog lha ma dral dang / 'ug pa ldum dral dang / 'di dag kun gyi ye shes sprul ba'o// pha bang lha ma dral dang / zer mo lca ma dral dang / pho rog lha ma dral dang /
137a7: snga ka sum dral dang / kha tra lcam dral dang / byi la lcam dral dang / spre'u lcam dral dang / khyi lcam dral dang / sprul pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// las grub pa dbang phyug ma/ byo me'i srin mo dmar ser shing chen tri shu g.yag
137a8: mgo ma/ / tshangs pa'i dmar skye ba na dmar rtse lnga sbrul mgo ma// khro bo khyab 'jug 'byung sdigs snying 'dren gzig gi mgo/ khyab 'jug dkar dmar nga dmar byi zhags sre mo mgo/ gzhon nu ser mo rdo rje pha bang mgo/ dab

137b1: sa mags / / gan
137b2: yi mgo/ srin mo nang mo bam chen rgu zhags wa yi mgo/ za byed nag mo bam chen snying 'byin stag gi mgo/ dga' byed nag mo khong chen bgegs rgyal bya rgod mgo/ khrag 'thung dmar mo rdo rje dbyug dung dmar rta'i mgo/
137b3: gcig pu dkar dmar nam mkha' lding gi mgo/ yid 'phrog dmar sar bzhis bsdus byi za khyi'i mgo/ grub ma dkar dmar sad ma byi za bug shud mgo/ chung mo dmar ser ro za rdo rje sha ba'i mgo/ bsod byed rgyal lda dab ma
137b4: chen rde'u chung ste/ ka'i mgo/ me mo dmar ser mo srag rngu 'dren sbyin gyi mgo/ phag mo ldang nag tsa byin rlon dmar phag gi mgo/ dmar mo ldar sngon bdud rtsi khrag 'thung khra yi mgo/ sna chen ldang nag bam chen langs spyod pa
137b5: lang mgo/ grub mo ldang ser bdud rtsi ban dmar sbrul gyi mgo/ phag mo lcags kyu pu tra rdo rje khu b+hag mgo/ ra ni ser mo rgyu zhag sar yi mgo/ bram sna dmar mo lcags sgrog kun 'joms seng ge'i mgo/ gsus 'dzin ser mo
137b6: bdud rtsi dril chen gzig gi mgo/ sems can thams cad mchog dag dang // dgyes pa thams cad rab sgrub phyir// nga yi de nyid gsung gis ni// dkyil 'khor de nyid bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// gang gis chung
137b7: bas rdzogs sangs rgyas/ / sems can mchog gi ston byed na// de nyid sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub// de nas bcom ldan ga gi dus nas// rab tu spro ba'i spyan gdangs nas/ zhabs dang zhabs kyis gnon pa yis// skud cing 'dod
137b8: pa 'jug par mdzad/ / g.yas dang g.yon gyis phyag gnyis kyi// brjid pa'i rtse mo mtha' nas dkrol// cung zad zur gyis gnon pa yis// mdzes pa'i smyigatsun rnams sbyar ba'i// spyan gyi phyag rgyas phyag mdzad pa'i/
