138a1: 'gro la phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur// dpa' bo rdo rje sems dpa' la// bskul ba'i dbyangs kyis rab tu bskul// gsang ba dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor du// shin tu dgyes tshe rdo rje dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi
138a2: bde chen po/ / mchog tu dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// rnam par kun du skye med rol cing chud mdzad pa// bdag cag gzugs dang bcas te rnam spyod 'gyur med pa'i
138a3: bde mchog byang chub sems dpa' ni/ / rnam pa kun tu sdug bsngal yongs bral te// che ba'i ye shes lhun grub mchog dang ldan// bde spyod de la rol pas tshul bzhin mdzad// rdo rje bla ni blangs pa yis// shin tu srid
138a4: ba'i mya ngan 'das/ / dge chen de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis brlabs// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa dang / bcas pas spyan ud pa la kha bye ba bzhin/ smin ma dang sku rnam
138a5: bar bskur ba/ glog dang chu rlabs su gyur pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las de kho na nyid 'di gsungs so zhes// dkyil 'khor zhes ni rab tu bya// ye shes rdo rje thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor
138a6: rdo rje mchog nyid do/ / nyid kyi sbyor ba btags pa yin// rdo rje dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor du// 'od zer dkar po 'phreng bas mdzes// byang chub sems dpa' 'dra ba'o// rdo rje dpa' bo dkyil 'khor du// zla ba gam
138a7: pa mdzes pa yi/ / mthi dka' bar ba kun rgyas pa// me la rlung gis bus pa bzhin// dgyes pa'i mchog ni rab bsgrubs pa'i// rin chen rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni//
138a8: dga' bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// rab tu gsal ba nyi ma bzhin// dkyil 'khor dgyes mchog 'byung byed pa// dam pa'i dbang po pad ma 'dra// 'dab ma brgyad po dgyes pa yi// ge sar ze

138b1: pas mdzes byas pa'o/ / las ni thams cad 'grub byed pa'o// rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dga' byed dkyil 'khor gru gsum ste// 'bar ba chen po me dang 'dra// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i// dkyil 'khor rnams ni brtag bya ste//
138b2: rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yis// ci ltar de nyid sprul pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas rdo rje brjid pa'i gar mdzad cing glu dang // sil snyan dang / gling bu dang / bi wang dang / rdza rnga dang / dun wa dang / pan
138b3: wa dang / bal ki dang / zhi ba'i thal mos sogs pa kun du gdungs pa dang / sil snyan la sogs pha rol pas lha'i ro dang / ro'i zas dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba dang / theg pa dang / stan pa dang / gos dang / bldag pa dang /
138b4: 'jib pa dang / 'jam pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos bstangs nas gus pa dang bcas pa nas 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan gdangs te/ dbyangs 'dis bstod pa mdzad do// byams pas kun nas gzigs pas
138b5: thugs rje'i spyan/ / grol bar 'thun pa'i lam ston dug lngas 'brel// gzungs kyi rang bzhin bde gshegs kun la stobs// bde chen kun du rgyas pas che ba'i ye shes 'dren// sku nyid stong pas tshogs pa'i rgyal po bzhin//
138b6: chos nyid bde ba reg pas sku nyid ston// byang chub bgrod phyir chos kyi sgo mo bstan// bzungs bstan rigs lnga'i gtso bo rnams mdzad do// dgyes pa drongs la mnabs shing rol mo mdzad// bde ba mnabs shing dbyings nas bslang
138b7: pa'agyur/ / skye 'gag med pa'i tshul durnam par za// ti rjer ldan pacas pad ba chen pa gyun// chos nyid de bachen po rnam ma pa'i ba'in// bde ba mchog gis dang las sprur pa'i lhas // ngom pas 'dus pa'i tshag
138b8: la stsal bar mdzod/ bdel brnams shing bde la mnos padz+ra// bde mchog char pa rab tu dbab par ga sol// dbyings las bder gshegs slob ma ga zung du gsol// ci ltar bzhugs pa'i gnas

139a1: su bzhugs su gsol/ / ngo mtshar byang chub tshe 'di bde ba thob// pha rol phyin drug gang la mi rten par// mi skye mya ngan 'das pa'i gzugs dang rnam par ldag/ bde ba chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa yi// rmongs pa'i bde
139a2: bas 'gro la snying rje'i rtsa/ / byang chub sems kyi dgyes mchog mi chags pa'i// klu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// yid dang 'thad pa'i bde chen po// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po/
139a3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa// pad ma dang 'dra ba'i spyan gnyis kyis kun du gzigs shing / 'dzum pa dang bcas pas zhal rgyas par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phran gyis
139a4: tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams mang po bskal bar rgyas pa'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho chen po snyed ma lus lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che dang / pad mo dang / las kyi rigs las byung ba'i de
139a5: bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / rin chen 'dzin pa dang / chos 'dzin dang / sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang / rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs dang / thugs las byung ba dang / mtshon pa dang / dga' ba dang / sgeg mo
139a6: la sogs pa rnal 'byor g.yog gi tshogs tshad med par byed par 'dren pa dang / 'gug par byed pa dang / 'jib par byed pa la sogs pa'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang / grags pa med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'phrog par byed
139a7: pa'i tshogs dang / gzhan yang phyi rol gyi rdo rje dang / rin chen dang pad ma dang / las kyi rigs las byung ba'i rnal 'byor pa dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams la rnam par gyur pa dang bcas
139a8: pa kun du gzigs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad ma dang / kun tu gnon pa dang / tshegs kyis 'debs pa dang / phyag na gar mdzad ma dang / 'gying ba dang / kun tu rnam par 'dor ba'i gnon pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la byin gyis

139b1: brlabs nas dgyes pa'i gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gsungs pa/ de nyid bdag ni mnyam bzhag dang // de bzhin lha'i de bzhin nyid dang // sngags dang phya/
139b2: bya de bzhin nyid/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog tu 'gyur// yan lag thams cad bsam las 'das// yod med gnyis las mi gnas pa// 'dren dang tshigs las yang dga' das// 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog ces bya'o//
139b3: chos min chos ni nam pyod pas// chos rnams thams cad brtag par bya// rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba yi// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bstan pa yin// 'dod chags mi chags 'dod chags mnyam// chu yi pad mo dmar po 'dra
139b4: rang sems 'dod chags shin du chags/ / 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no// gzugs med gzugs ni dri med pa'i// khams gsum las ni 'jug byed pa'i// sems ni chu nyid dang ba bzhin/ dkyil 'khor chen po
139b5: zhes bya'o/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad g.yog dang bcas// pho nya dang / pho nya mo dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang / yang bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po bzhengs nas 'di skad ces gsol
139b6: to/ / kye ma rab dgyes dpa' bo mchog/ kye ma rab bgegs phyogs bsgyur ba// rnal 'byor chen po tshogs mchog ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs// sangs rgyas sbyor ba rab tu zab// rdo rje spyod pa
139b7: zan med/ 'jig rten gsum po bde thob pa'i// dkyil 'khor gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs// pad mo rin chen sna tshogs che// thabs kyis sbyor ba gar mdzad pa// nam grangs sems kyi 'jig rten du/
139b8: bde chen dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// thams cad gar dang bcas pa'i phyag/ sor mo 'dab ma kun du 'brel// rdo rje thal mo gar rnams bsgyur// brjid pag dag du rab tu/

140a1: bcas// grol zhing ma mchu tshams kyis mnan// chu skyes 'dab ma bzhin du gzigs pas bshad// dbyangs len pa dang gcig la gcig bskul dang // sdang zhing kun du ma chags par// chags med bde ba mchog
140a2: gis ni/ / bde ba'i rnal 'byor gzungs kyis rnams// stobs shing bde ba sbyin mdzad pa// nam mkha'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ stobs shing bzhengs te grub par mdzod// chags pas rab tu mi gos pa'i/
140a3: bde ba reg cing dgongs su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po cheno dgyes pa chen pos bskul bas thugs sad par gyur te/ shin tu dgyes nas rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par zhugs
140a4: nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du shin tu dgyes pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyis mgur len cing / rdo rje rnam par rol pa yis bcom ldan 'das dgyes bzhad pas bzhad cing // nyid kyi sku dang
140a5: gsung dang thugs rdo rje gsang ba'i thugs ka nas ma hA pu kats+tsha zhes brjod/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag mo ye shes kyi dbyings dbang phyug ma 'di phyung ngo // zla ga ma steng du ldan pa yi// ye shes gnyis po ma ltas bu/
140a6: thig le mtshan du ldan byas nas/ gsal ba ye shes rnal 'byor ma// A li ka li 'dren byas ma// ri mo dbus su brtag byas te// de yi mgo dang mjug nyid du// khro bo gnyis po mchog pos bya// 'di ni btsun mo rab gsang
140a7: ba'i/ / rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor ma'i// dran pa tsam gyis 'di dag kyang // bsod nams kun gyis byin brlabs 'gyur// A li gnyis dbus ri mo bri// 'dren pa yang dag ldan pa ste// steng du zla gam thig ler dga'/
140a8: mgo mjug tu yang gzhan yang bri// 'di ni gsal ba'i don dam ste// rnal 'byor rin chen dbang bskur sbyin// bstan pa bsod nams thob 'gyur te// sdig pa rnams kyang 'jig par byed// a li gnyis dang ldan

140b1: bya ste/ / cheg drug yi ge gnyis bshad// 'di ni rab 'gal kun tu chags// chu srin ma zhes bstan pa yin// dang po bskal pa chen po yi// chog drag po dang bcas par bzhag/ sangs rgyas byang chubar basbyid byed/
140b2: bdag nyid la ma bzhag yang rung // phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// bsgrub bya dkyil 'khor sgrub byed na// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor dam pa rnams kyi mchog/ ye shes phyag rgya mngon gnas
140b3: 'dzin pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba'i/ / bris pa yis kyang khyad par 'gyur// e ma'o bde ba ye shes che// 'di ni ye shes sku 'di la// gnod byed pa ni bsten byed cing // 'di yi tshul gyis thob par 'gyur// khams
140b4: gsum mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ / 'di las rgya chen gzhan med do// bsgrub pa po dang sems can kun// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub// tshe mchog he ru ka gsang ba 'di bcom ldan 'das dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor
140b5: rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyi gsang ba chen po rnal 'byor ma dbang phyug chen mo rnams kyis mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste dang po'o/ /
140b6: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dgyes pa'i yid ches pa dang / mgu ba dang / yid dga' ba skyes nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gzhad pas mdzad cing // yang he ru ka'i sku mdog
140b7: nisna tshogs pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das che mchog he ru// zhabs brgyad phyag mtshan sna tshogs pa'o// de las spyos nas phyag stong spyan stod gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis
140b8: mi khyab pa na/ shin du mi srun pas gdug pa nga rgyal che zhing dregs pa can thams cad la badz+ra dza li'i sgra sna tshogs 'od zer du gyur te/ de las spros pas rigs bzhi he ruka/ dregs pa can thams cad tshar gcod

141a1: pa'i phyir raka te ru ka nyon mongs pa'i dug gsum dbang du sdud cing 'joms pa'i phyir ran he ru ka/ ye shes kyi dan dang ldan pa'i phyir byi sha he ru ka/ dam chog las mi 'da' ba'i phyir sa ma ya he ru ka/ de las 'phros/
141a2: bas te rug stong rtsa brgyad// sku mdag dang phyag mtshan cir yang stsal nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// oM d+hi shwa ri sgra ma dog snga chags pa'o// dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad/ dbas pa'i phyagag na chogs pa'o// zhabs brgyad rdo rje
141a3: 'bar ba me dpung gnang na/ he ruka bzhi zhabs bzhes mnan pa/ aH he rba ka/ pad ma'i sbubs su dpral ba'i spyan byed tsam nub par bzhugs pa// shin tu rngam pa'i khro me dbu'i steng na he druka zhabs brgyad kyis khram
141a4: dbu brgyad mnan pa yang dbus kyi gyen du bltas pa'i zhal ni nang du rdo rje bcug nas gnyis su med par sbyor zhing byang chub kyi sems yum gyi sku la bstims/ byang chub kyi sems kyi rigs kyi he ru ka zhabs 'og tu mnan
141a5: pa yang gnyis su med par sbyar shing byang chub kyi sems 'bebs/ / badz+ra dza la'i sgra sna tshogs pas rab tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi lha chen po rnam par rab tu skrag nas skyabs su gsol lo// mgrin gcig
141a6: tu 'di skad ces gsol te/ rdo rje 'bar ba mi dpung gis/ bskal pa pas kyang bsreg mdzad cing // 'jigs chen rngam pa'i khyad par can// dbu mangs bsgrub pa'i tshig sgrogs shing // phyag mangs 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha
141a7: bsnams/ / zhi ba'i phyag stong spyan stong yang // 'jig rten rab tu dpa' kong na/ khro gnyer phyag stong spyan stong yang // rgod dang gshe zhing za byed pa// 'bar ba'i mtshon cha sna tshogs can// 'jig rten thal bar rlog mdzad
141a8: pa/ khro chen khyod la skyabs su mchi// ma dang srid mo bu mo dang // chung ma sras 'di rnams phul nas skyabs su gsol lo// chags pa med pa'i dbang gis thabs kyi sbyor bas dbang bsdus te/ dam tshig dang ming

141b1: btags lag tu rdo rje byin nas rdo rje 'chang gi gral du dgod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka rol pa chen po'i don gyi gsang ba rab rtogs pa'i ye shes rgyal po sku dang gsung da thugs kyi rol pa
141b2: 'di phung ngo / / dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad ni// gru bzhi sgo bzhi mu khyud bcas// thig gis yongs su 'khor bas btag dbus su pad ma 'dab brgyad bris// dbus kyi pad pa'i snying po la// bcom ldan che mchog
141b3: he ru ka/ shar du badz+ra he ru ka/ s+pho ru ra dan he ru ka/ nu bdubad ma he ru ka/ byung du kar ma he ru ka/ shar lhor rAk+Sha te ruka/ lho rub ya te draka/ rub byang byi sha he ru ka/ byang shar sa ma ya he ru ka/ bde gshegs
141b4: yum dang bcas pa dgod/ / de'i phyi rim snam bu la ye shes las grub pa'i 'phra men ma bcu drug dgod/ de yi phyi rim sgo bzhi thod pas bskor// gshin rje 'joms dang stabs pa che// rta ma gri dadang ni bdud brtser 'khyil/
141b5: sgo bzhi dag tu rim bzhin no// sku dang phyag mtshan cir yang 'gyur te gcig tu ma nges pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po de kho na nyid sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das dpal
141b6: pad ma he ru ka dbu lnga phyag bcu drug pa/ bshog pa rdo rjes bstams pa// zhabs brgyad chas dang brgyan cing // 'phra mer ma bcu drug gi 'khor dang / dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bskor nas bzhugs te sprul pa
141b7: las bcom ldan 'das rta mchog chags pa chen po rag ta dang / rus gong gsang snying gi nang na thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du zhing bsnol ma'i gdan khre la bzhugs so// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs pa zhes
141b8: klu chen po rnams brdzes pa/ rdo rje brag res bltams pa/ rdo rje ma pung 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs pa/ dbu gtsug nas rta mgo ljang khu lnga byung ba// sbrul nag gi chun po stag lpags kyi sham thabs bgos pa/ thod pa'i

142a1: phreng bas brgyan pa/ / zhing brnol ma'i khrel bzhugs pa// bcom ldan 'das rta mchog chags pa chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de nub phyogs sangs rgyas zhing khams nas// de nyid rang sdang mnyam nyid dkyil
142a2: 'khor na/ / bde ba chen po dpal 'bar mchog gi lha// 'du 'bral med pa thugs rje dbang gi lha// dbang mchog ngo mtshar rngom brjid dbang gi lho// dpal chen pang mi jugs ni rin po che// khro bar stan kyang zhi ba'i cha lug
142a3: can/ / snying rje yum gyi mkha' la sprul pa sna tshogs car yang 'gyung // 'gro ba'i don du dpal chen bzhengs su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rta mgrin de nyid/ yul lam chags brag phrag dgon pa// zas lam chags rna
142a4: rtsab/ / gos lam chags shing gi shun pa/ skom pa lam chags brag gi thigs pa brag ri mi rten ging rteg zhing 'i te chu brte// chu'i snying po 'tshar ba gcig tu sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// ha ya grib rta mchog dpal// sku
142a5: mdog dmar po stag gi sham thabs can/ / sbrul nag stong gis brgyan pas brjid chags pas/ dbu sra kham na ga ral pa mun tsa cod pan can// dbu'i gtsug nas bdud rtsi rnam sprul pa// sprin 'tshams snga brag kun nas
142a6: glogrog stong 'phro/ / dbu'i gtsug nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bskyed nas ni// snyan nas sgra byung 'brug skad ldir// spyan nas me byung khams gsum sreg/ shangs nas rlung 'byung 'jig rten 'thor// zhal nas khrag 'dzag
142a7: rtsa mtshor 'khyil/ / ma mo dam can rnams kyang dam la 'dra/ rta skad theng gsum tshe rabs sred pa dbang du sdud// rta bro theng gsum brdungs pas dud bzhi zil gyis mnan// pad ma rgyal po rta mchog dpal// dkar po'i
142a8: mdog la dmar po'i zhal/ / sku mdog mthing ka'i khro gnyer can/ snyan ni dung gi khong seng can// mu med khams ni ci mchis ga/ san// spyan gnyis nyi zla'i phrugs su bcas// khams gsum dag ni ci mchis gzigs/

142b1: rdog pa mtshon gyi lcang lo can// rnga ma lcags kyi g.yab mo 'debs/ shangs nas me phung 'bar ba'i tshub ma mthor // zhal nas mi zad lcags kyi ser chen 'bebs// g.yas pa gsum po ba dan 'phyar// g.yon pa sdigs pa'i
142b2: 'dzum mo bsgreng / / ke'u re gshog pa gsang ba'i phyag rgya yis// na ba rnams ni sos par byed// rta skang bzhad la rta bo brdungs// rta skad chen po thang gcig gis// klu rgyal ris drug dbang du sdud// rta gad chen po thang gcig gis//
142b3: mtshogs dbang phyug dbang du sdud // rta skad chen po thang cig gis// bgegs kyi tshogs rnams dbang du srung // rta grol na gsum brdungs pa yis// bdud bzhi kun kyang zil gyis gno// dpag chad 'og na bdud nas pa/ klad du rgyab
142b4: la thal bar lhogs/ / yab cig re byams rta mchog dbang // ta kun tshul du gar byed kyis// gar bye brda lad mur skyon// ta kun tshul du dbugs 'dor gyis// dbugs pa'i rta la da chur kun// rta kun tshul du g.yab 'ang bye/
142b5: g.yab mo brda lang tshur spyon// hUM gis rlu drug rtsanas gcod// phrin las zhi bar mdzod cig ta mchog dbang // srid gsum 'gran zla med pa rgyal ba'i mthu// che chan kun las 'phags pas pad mgar gyis dbang phyug che//
142b6: gar mkhan sgra 'phrul kun las thabs kyi rgyal por grags/ byams ldan gar gyi dbang gis phrin las mdzod// rtag tu thub mchog re zhing 'bod 'grogs na// byams ldan mgon po bdag la ci phyir thugs mi brtse// sna mchog
142b7: bdag gas 'bed kyang 'bras bram mchis na/ / ye shes lamachog byed kyis thugs rjer drang lags sam// dngos grub stsol bar mi dmigs kyang // sngon gyi thugs dam dbang gi dngos grub rtsol// yum chen me ga tsatam/
142b8: ral bcig mas de skad bskul lo// yang yab kyis bskul ba 'khyud par bstan pa'i rnal 'byor ma// bdud kyi yum la gshin rje sum// 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma// dpal ldan chen mo re ma ti// mtshan

143a1: a ka tsa ti ma/ / gu cagasang chen ral gcig ma// re te chen mo tsa mun ta// srin mo dkar mo chen mo'i tshogs// dpal ldan rdo rjod ma shin ti// nam mkha'i khams kyi rnam rgyal dpal// yid pa rgyal mo g.yu 'phrom/
143a2: las la 'khril cing chos la bstan// dbu rnams 'byin cing 'dud pa'i tshul// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// de nas snying po dran tsam gyis// pad ma ta krid ha ya gri ba// hu lu hu lu/ e a ra li hri hring cing / e ka rtsa tis
143a3: ma ya hUM/ ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yony+dza/ sngags kyi phyag rgya sbyor ba yis// dbyings gsum rnam par dag pas bsgrubs// de nas skyon nas bsdu ba ni// hU~M hU~M zhes ni rab brjod de// phyag rgya chen po sku gnyis ni// sar ha ra na hUM zhes rab tu
143a4: brjod/ / yab kyi yum la bsdu// yum yang chos kyi dbyings su bsdu// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po dang / kho na nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thug rdo rje las byung ngo // rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni// nibacu gnyis tshad du bya/
143a5: dkyil 'khor dbang gi rang bzhin dmar po ni// dbus su pad ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya// pad mo'i snying po la bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mgrin dbu gsum phyag drug la shar gyi pad ma la badz+ra he ru ka/ lhor rad na he ru ka/ nub tu
143a6: pad ma he ru ka/ byang du kar ma he ru ka/ mtshams bzhir yum bzhi// de'i phyi rim du ke'u rim brgyad dang / sing ha ma brgyad dang bcu drug/ sgo bzhi sgo khyud dang bcas pa'o// sgo bzhi rims bzhin dang 'thun/ de nas bcom ldan
143a7: 'das kun du bzang po de kho na nyid rab gsang ba'i thugs ka nas phyung ngo ro/ / sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud/ za byed chen mo tshogs kyi bdag/ yon tan phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa// rdo rje shugs can dang // rdo rje 'jigs
143a8: su rung ba dang / / rdo rje grags pa dang / rdo rje snying po dang / rdo rjesgyu 'phrul dang / rdo rje gsus po che dang / rdo rje gad mo dang / rdo rje ga rgyangs can dang / rdo rje grags can dang / rdo rje ha ha gad mo can dang / rdo rje he he grags chen dang / rden

143b1: bgegs gdon pa'i rgyal po dang / rdo rje gshin rje bshed pa can dang / rdo rje las kyi bdag po dang / rdo rje mi g.yo mgon po dang / rdo rje bsgyings pa dang / rdo rje glang po che dang / rdo rje ko brtson pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' chen po dang /
143b2: rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje mig mi bzang dang / rdo rje bde ba dang / rdo rje so'i 'phreng ba can dang / rdo rje dang chen dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje g.yab mo dang / rdo rje dga' ba dang / rdo rje 'degs pa dang / rdo rje hU~M chen
143b3: dang / rdo rje mda' dang / rdo rje gzhug drung dang / rdo rje ral gri dang / rdo rje rdo rje dang / rdo rje gsul thog dang / rdo rje 'bar ba dang / rdo rjes dang / derde chu dang / rdo rje ma dang / rdo rje rlung dang / rdo rje nam mkha' dang / rdo rje yang dag dang / rdo rje rje
143b4: 'bar dang / rdo rje 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje mig brgya ma dang / rdo rje ba spu ma dang / rdo rje sen mo skyes pa dang / rdo rje zangs kyi lpags pa can dang / rdo rje lcags kyi mche ba can dang / rdo rje spu gr-i so can dang / rdo rje lpags pa mkhregs pa dang
143b5: rdo rje 'phreng ba thogs pa dang / rdo rje rgyan pa dang / rdo rje rnon po dang / rdo rje ka la ya dang / rdo rje dpal ldan pa dang / rdo rje rnam par dag pa'i snying po dang / rdo rje za byed dang / rdo rje 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang / rdo rje chen po dang / rdo rje 'jig rten
143b6: dbang phyug dang / rdo rje smra ba dang / rdo rje skyes mchog dang / rdo rje seng ge dang / rdo rje kun tu lta ba dang / rdo rje mchog tu dga' ba dang / rdo rje gzi brjid dang / rdo rje 'od bzangs dang / rdo rje grags pa dang / rdo rje snang ba po dang / rdo rje su
143b7: dang / rdo rje gsung dang / rdo rde thugs dang / rdo rje 'od gsal ba dang / rdo rje sprin rnam par 'bor ba dang / rdo rje charab stan dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor chen po dang / rdo rje rin chen kun bdag dang / rdo rje 'chang ba po dang / rdo rje nyi ma dang /
143b8: rdo rje snang ba dang / rdo rje zla ba dang / de rje dri ma med pa dang / rdo rje chags pa bral ba dang / rdo rje skyi dkrung dang / rdo rje 'od po che dang / rdo rje pad ma skyes pa dang / rdo rje thams cad kun mkhyen dang / rdo rje mdzod 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje

144a1: pha rol phyin pa dang / rdo rje rab tu ldan pa dang / rdo rje rnam par dag pa dang / rdo rje 'khor lo dang / rdo rje gshog pa can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje nu ma can gyi tshe gra dang / rdo rje sder mo can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje mche ba can gyi tshogs
144a2: dang / rdo rje ba 'ad ba dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzir dang / rdo rje longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / rdo rje sprul pa'i sku dang / rdo rje rgyud 'chang ba po dang / rdo rje phyogs bcur sprul pa 'gyed pa po dang / rdo rje don byed pa po dang / rdo rje lha'i dbang po dang / rdo rje
144a3: lha min bdag po dang / rdo rje 'chi med lha'i dbang po dang / rdo rje 'joms par byed pa dang / rdo rje chos kyi sbyin bdag dang / rdo rje byams pa dang / rdo rje shes rab rnon po dang / rdo rje thog thog lcags kyi gser chen 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje rten/
144a4: stag stong gsum 'gyed pa dang / rdo rje thib thib mos par byed pa dang / rdo rje'ur 'ur 'brug sgra sgrogs pa dang / rdo rje chem che ma gnam lcags 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje yud tsam glog 'byin pa dang / rdo rje shig shig khams gsum
144a5: bskul ba dang / rdo rje ye shes 'bog byed dang / rdo rje mi srung spyod par byed pa dang / rdo rje kha T+wAM rgyal bar byed pa dang / rdo rje dbang phyug sdigs shing sdang bar byed pa dang / rdo rje sbrul gyi zhags pa dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin srog gcod pa
144a6: dang / rdo rje khrag 'thung snying khrag 'thung ba dang / rdo rje dpal snying sreg pa dang / rdo rje mdung thung 'bugs par byed pa dang / rdo rje khrag za bar byed pa dang / rdo rje tshil za bar byed pa dang / rdo rje rkang za bar byed pa dang / rdo rje sha za bar
144a7: byed pa dang / ye shes las sprul pa'i khro bo 'di rnams kyang 'thung bar byed/ zhal du 'dren par byed// mkha' la rlom par byed/ zhal du rngub cing / za bar byed/ dbang du sdus cing tshar gcod par byed/ tho bas rgyag
144a8: par byed/ phur bus 'debs par byed/ ral gris gcod par byed/ be con gyis rdung bar byed/ 'khor los lus gtub par byed/ dgra stas gsheg par byed// rdo rjes mgo mjug med par rdeg par byed/ rdo rje rgya gram gyis

144b1: byed tshal du byed/ rdo rje mad sa gting 'bugs par byed// mtshon spu gri ma la sa gsheg cing dral bar byed cing lcags kyus 'gug par byed/ zhags pas 'ching bar byed// lcags sgrogs gis sdom par byed// rdo rje d+ha
144b2: zab byed kyis dbang du bsdus nas las thams cad grub par byed do/ / rdo rje mtshon cha'i sngags so// oM bi shrI badz+ra bo d+ha dra la maN Da la phaT phaT/ ha la ha la granga? da man tra mu D+ha re/ oM nu n+da r+tha d+ha n+dad+de Tud+ha r+tha/
144b3: phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ grangs nges par 'dir bstan to// lan zangs nyi shu rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ de skad ces rdo rje mtshon cha'i char 'bebs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po klu dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
144b4: las re bsgrub pa 'di byung ngo / / dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad ni/ cha ni dgu yi tshad du bya// thig gis yongs su 'khor bar gdab/ dbus su 'khor lo brtsibs bzhi bri// 'khor lo dag gi lte ba la// bcom ldan 'das
144b5: kun du bzang po bri/ / shar du rdo rje sems dpa' bri// lhor rin chen 'byung ldan bri// nub tu snang ba mtha' yas bri// byang du dor yod grub pa bri// phyi rim rdo rje rabs bskor// grwa bzhir dgod par bya ba ni// shar du rdo rje
144b6: dbyings phyug bri/ / lhor rin chen dbyings b+hag bri// nub tu pad ma dbyings phyug bri// byang du las kyi dbyings phyug bri// de yi phyi rim snam bu la// sgo bzhi sgo khyud bcas par dgod/ sgo bzhi ni dkyil 'khor gzhan
144b7: dang 'thun/ de rnams kyang phyag mtshan tsha'i bram pa re re 'dzin cing bsnams pa// gdan pad ma la bzhugs pa sha stag go// de nas tshe dbub par bya ba dang / cho ga shin rje nag po'i laganas dbrog pa dang chegang g.yab pa
144b8: dang / che bcing zhing bsdam pa dang / tshe dbang du bsdu ba dang tshe yongs su spel ba dang / tshe rgyas par bya ba dang / tshe ring zhing bdud kyis par mi chod par bya ba dang / tshe sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par bya ba dang / cho bye shi

145a1: med pa'i 'bras bu chosku ldan gyis grub pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos lha mo lcags kyu thogs pa grangs med pa smos nas// oM bruM badz+ra a yu she hUM zhes bka' stsal pa dang / bdud gshin rjenas
145a2: po'i snying bral te/ / shog gog skya bo rlung gis btab pa bzhin/ dun dun khyer khyer 'ong ba de la gshin rje'i tse ta nas bzung nas 'drud kyis bsgyel te/ rdo rje snying kar bzhag nas lag pa nas thur gyis phrogs nas// tshe
145a3: g.yab dar dang / phyag rgyas g.yabs pa dang / ri rab rtse la sbas pa/ rgya mtsho'i gting du sbas pa/ bar snang gi khams la sbas pa/ phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad steng 'og bcu nas bkug cing tshe blangs te/ zhags pa'i tshig
145a4: kyis bcings/ lcags sgrog gi tshogs kyis bsdams nas dbang du bsdus te rgya chen cher yongs su sel bar bya'o// oM bruM badz+ra a yu she bradz+ra hU~M a zhes brjod pas/ bde bar gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgyas brtan nas rgyas
145a5: par bya'o/ / oM badz+ra d+ha ra/ rad na d+ha ra/ pad ma d+ha ra/ karma d+ha ra/ ta thA ga tA/ sa ma ya ti/ ya ma ya ti kra sa ma ya ya d+ha ra ko ta ma zhes brjod pas bdud gshin rje nag po'i lag nas tshe phrogs te/ gshin rje yang brgyal zhing sngangs
145a6: nas bskal zhing rdo rje khrag 'thung chen pos snying khrag 'thungs te/ tshe'i bar chod byas te/ oM pra Ni bu Ni/ ma hA pu Ni/ a ba ra mi ta a yu pu Ni/ dz+nyA na sam pa ro// ba tsi ti swA hA// zhes bzlas pas sku rdo rje dang / gsung rdo rje
145a7: dang / thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub thob pa dang / tshe srog gi snying po// oM br-i badz+ra a yu she badz+ra trA~M a zhes bzlas pas/ tshe skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung gi sku tshe thob bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas che'i las
145a8: 'di gsungs so/ / dbang phyug btso dang rigs kyi yum/ yang dag gsar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ bde ba chen pos yongs brgyan te/ dkyil 'khor rdzogs par phun sum ldan// rdo rje sems gtso mnyes mdzad pa/

145b1: gnas 'dir brtse phyir gshegs su gsol// oM e hUM te ma tA kA ru NI kA tri sha ho// sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ dzaHtrAM baM toH brtan par bzhugs pa/ ye shes rgyal po sru gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las mang po che// de nyid du ni
145b2: mnyam sbyor ba'i/ / phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya oM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya a/ hU~M badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ swa badz+ra sa ya swa/ haM badz+ra sa ma ya taM/ las la bzhugs pa/ oM shar gyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ rdorje
145b3: lha mo dkar mo lcags kya dza/ / tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ dkar mo zhi byed mgyogs ma 'od 'gro can// tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bskal nas// tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud//
145b4: badz+ra a yu badz+ra a g+hu sha dzadzadza/ lho phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ ser mo yid bzhin thog phrer 'dzin// phyag na rin chen sbrul gyi zhags pa bsdams// tshel gnod cing 'gal byed kun bskal nas// tsho dang ye shre
145b5: ma lus dbang du sdud/ nub kyi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma/ dmar mo bkra gsal dbang sdud ma// phyag na chu srin rgyal mtshan bsdams// tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas// tshe dang ye shes ma lus
145b6: dbang du bsdud/ / byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// nag mo mig gcig ral ba can// dung gi tshems la lcags kyi spu// phyag na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams// tshel gnod cing 'gal byed kun bskal nas//
145b7: dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyings phyug ma rnams bskul ba// dbyings phyug mkha' ldan pad ma'i dbyings// phyag rgya bde mchog dbyings kyi yum// ye shes sprul pa'i
145b8: phyag rgya ma/ / dbyings su mkha' la tshe dang gzi brjid drongs// badz+ra ag+hu sha hU~M dza// stong gsum dbyings la tshe yi mnga' brnyes pa// khams gsum ma lus dbang sdud ma// zhing la rngam zhing brkam stobs can//

146a1: stong gsum dbyings nas tshe dang gzi brjid grol/ dbyings ma dkar dang rkun mo gnyis med tshogs// bde chen rmongs byed thal byed ma// gtum mo dbyings su sgrol mdzad snying 'byin ma// dpal chen rgyal ba
146a2: dgyes pa'i 'khor/ / dung phreng chen mo 'khor dang bcas// tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas// dbyings su mkha' la tshe dang gzi brjid drongs// log pa lta byed bdud dpung 'dul mdzad ma// 'dod khams
146a3: mdang gnyis med rol pa'i sras dbang phyug phra men 'bar ba'i tshogs/ / tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas// gshin rje la gnas tshe dang gzi brjid drongs// shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// tshe yi
146a4: lha mo lcags kyu ma/ / phyag na shel gyi bum pa bsnams// tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed bsgrol bar byed// lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// tshe yi lha mo zhags pa ma// phyag na mthing shing bum pa bsnams/
146a5: tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed 'ching bar byed// nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// tshe yi lha mo lcags sgrog ma// phyag na zangs kyi bum pa bsnams// tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed sdom par byed// byang gi phyogs
146a6: nas 'gugs pa ni/ / tshe yi lha mo dril bum// phyag na g.yu yi bum pa bsnams// tshel gnod cing 'gal byed dbang du sdud// steng gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// tshe yi lha mo dbyings byug ma// phyag na dngul gyi bum
146a7: nga bsnams/ / tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed dbang du sdud// 'og gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// tshe yi lha mo brtan ldan ma// phyag na gser gyi bum pa bsnams// tshe la gnod byed ma lus dbang du sdud//
146a8: oM bruM badz+ra a yu yud te rad na yu ti// d+harma yu ti/ kar ma mu ti// bruM badz+ra a yu she hUM a/ de nas dngos grub blang ba ni// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan// ding

146b1: bdag sangs rgyas su 'dzin pa'i/ / byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas mdzod cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ dpal ldan rdo rje gsung 'chang ba/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan// ding bdag sangs
146b2: rgyas kun 'chang ba/ / byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga tA bag badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko hi/ dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan/ ding bdag sangs rgyas thugs 'dzin
146b3: pa'i/ / byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga tA tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko he/ dam tshig nyams pa thams cad skongs par gyur cig/ lta ba yon po thams cad spongs par gyur cig/ cho ga nyams
146b4: pa thams cad rdzogs par gyur cig/ tshe sku gsung thugs kyi skye shi med pa'i dngos grub thob par gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sku gsung thugs sprul pa'i
146b5: cho 'phrul gyis ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs so/ / dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// mahA rag ta'i mgo la yon gyis zugs la/ dbus su badz+ra he ru ka/ yum ka ti shwa ri/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// shar du badz+ra
146b6: he ru ka/ lhor rad na he ru ka/ nub tu pad ma he ru ka/ byang du kar ma he ru ka/ sku mdog phyag mtshan rgyud gzhan dang 'thun/ de yi phyi rim snam bu cig la phra men ma bcu drug/ de'i phyi rim sgo bzhi la dkyil 'khor
146b7: 'dom gang grub bzhi la/ dri chen gyis maN la thugs la dbus su yak+Sha he ru ka/ dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad/ zhabs brgyad gshog pa rdo rjes bsnams pa// de'i phyi rim pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la// sharaH/
146b8: badz+ra he ru ka/ lhor yag k+Sha he ru ka/ nub tu byi sha he ru ka/ byang du sa ma ya he ru ka/ mtshams bzhir khro mo dbang phyug ma yum bzhi bzhugs// gdan zhing bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs so// de'i phyi rim snum

147a1: bral phra men dang khro bo pa bcu ma bcu dgod cing bzhugs so/ / sgo bzhir lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhi dgod do// khro bo chen po ni la tan tra dbus su bri// de'i phyi rim pad ma 'dab ma brgyad la sku
147a2: pa'i khro ba shugs can dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / rdo rje grags pa dang // rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dang / rdo rje gsus po che dang / rdo rje gad mo dang / gad rgyangs can dang / 'di rnams go rims bzhin gyi// sgo bzhi gzhan da
147a3: 'thun/ dkyil 'khor 'dom ga gru bzhi la rnam par rgyal ba dbus su bri// pad me 'dab ma bzhi la// shar du rdo rje grags chen/ lhor khro bo gad mo can/ nub tu khro bo he he/ grags chen dang / byang du rdo rje bgegs
147a4: gnon pa'i rgyal po bri/ / de'i phyi rim sgo rnams bri// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su gshin rje gshed po bri// phyi rim pad ma 'dab brgyad la 'phra men ma sing ha la sogs pa brgyad bri//
147a5: sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang grub bzhi la khro bo mi g.yo mgon po dbus su bri// de'i phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la khro bo 'gyings pa dang / khro bo glang po che dang / khro ba ko brlon pa can dang / khro bo mig mi bzang pa
147a6: bzhi rim pa bzhin du bri'o/ / phyi'i sgo snams dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su ha ya 'grib bri/ pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la ke'u rim brgyad bri// phyi rim sgo snam dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru
147a7: bzhi la ta ki ra dza dbus su dgod/ / phyi rim man Da la brgyad pa la khro ba bde ba dang / so'i phreng ba dang / dung chen dang / khu tshur dang / g.yab mo dang / dga' ba dang / 'degs pa dang / hUM chen dang ni 'di rnams bri// sgro snam dgod/
147a8: dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/ shar du rdo rje spu can dang / zangs kyi gshog pa can dang / lcags kyi mche ba can dang / spu gri so can dgod// dkyil 'khor

147b1: 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ / khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dbus su dgod// de'i phyi rim pad ma 'dab ma bzhi la phyag gi mgo can dang / g.yag gi mgo can dang / sha ba'i mgo can dang / byi la'i mgo can rnams so//
147b2: bzhi rims bzhin dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la khro bo hU~M kar dbus su dgod do// 'khor lo brtsibs bzhi la spyang khu'i mgo can dang / wa'i mgo can dang / dom gyi mgo can dang / dred mgo can rnams/
147b3: dgod do// sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la stobs po che dbus su dgod/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// shar du rdo rje gdengs mo// lhor ni rdo rje sder mo// nub tu dur khrod bdag mo// byang du rdo rje gtun khud
147b4: rnams rims bzhin du dgod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' khro ba de rnams kyi las kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// dbus kyi khrag 'thung chen po ni// dbu dgu phyag ni bcwa brgyad ste/
147b5: gshog pa rdo rje gtams pa gdengs zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du brtan// de yi 'khor gyi khro mo ni// phyag kyang srin po ltar mthun te// zhabs kyang de dang 'dra bar bstan// shar gyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni// khro ba rnam
147b6: par rgyal ba ste/ / sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ dri za bsnol ba'i khril bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo// shar lho mtshams na
147b7: bzhugs pa ni/ / khro bo dbyug bsngon po can// sku mdog sngol 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na// me lha bsnol ba'i khril bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong la 'dul tshul
147b8: lo/ / lho yi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni// ya man ta ka gshin rje gshed// sku mdog sngol 'od zer 'phro// dbugasum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ ma he bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs

148a1: sha/ / 'jig rten skyong ba 'dra tshul lo// lho nub mtshams na bzhugs pa ni/ khro bo mi g.yo mgon po ni/ sku mdog sngol 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ bden/
148a2: thal bsnol ma'i khril bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ma 'dul tshulalo// nub kyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ ta ya grib ta mchog dbang / sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'gro// dbug sum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs
148a3: drurgya rdo rje zag stengs na/ klu bdag bsnol ba'i khril bzhugs// 'jig rten myong ba 'dul tshul lo// nub byang mtshams na bzhugs pa ni// khro bo Ta ki ra dza ste/ sgra mdog dud ka 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog
148a4: bcan/ / zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na// chud lha bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs/ 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo// byang gi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni// khro ba bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste// sku mdog ljang khu 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum
148a5: phyag drug gshog pa can/ / zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na// gnod sbyin bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo// byang shar mtshams na bzhugs pa ni// khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal
148a6: su mdog ldang ste 'od zer 'phro/ / dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag stangs na/ bi na yaka 'a khril bzhugs// 'jig rten myong ba 'dul tshul lo// steng gi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni// khro hU~M/
148a7: mdzad hUM ka ra// sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na// nyi zla gza' skar khril bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo// 'og gi
148a8: phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ ma hA ba la stobs po che// sku mdog gnag la 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na// sa bdag bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs/

148b1: 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo ya man ta ka'i ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs nas 'di skad ces bskul lo// bdud ru tra nag po 'dul bar mdzad do// hUM gtum chen rab 'byam 'jig rten 'jom/
148b2: mdzad la// nyi ma 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od ldan khyod// phyag cha mang po bskal pa'i me bzhin 'bar// rab 'bar gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje sku la klu dbang rab brgyan cing // gcan zan gdug pa'i lpags
148b3: rnon skul brgyan/ / brkyang bskum tshul gyis rab 'jigs gshin rje gnon// zhing chen khrag 'dzag zod tshon sul brgyan// mi bad rgyal po gdong drug hU~M b+ha can/ phaT kyis khams gsum sngags mdzad zhabs drug po// sha
148b4: za'i mgo bcad dbu yi rgyan du thogs/ / spyan bzlog tsam gyis thog 'bebs me ljang 'phro// ljags 'dril choms kyi gseb nas thog 'bebs shing // ma mo rnams kyang sgren mor 'dar zhing 'bros// stong gsum med par
148b5: mdzad pa'i zhal gdas la/ drangs pa'i 'khor bcas khrag gi phyogs 'dag // nad ga nga srin ma tshogs rnams padang zhing 'bros// kun sa gtogs pa sgra chen ltab 'jug kyang // 'brabs 'brel bcas par u0f7f
148b6: grug nyid pa du/ / phyag bang rnonapa pa skams pa ni// dngos grub / gis ya zag sa rlog// ma ma pa'i mgu' cad bram na byas// zhi chen mgonas chem chem za par byed// rdzu brang tha/
148b7: da bas par thogs napa na// da mthang ces kyis rapa 'jigs nyid la'as// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis degad ces pa/ 'phrul pa dang / myur ba'i tha ba sa pag sum thag dru pa bad+d+hAn pa
148b8: nas bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa'i mdangs kyis ma rtag gtor bka' nod pa'i tshul du gang de bzhugs pa da la/ / bcom ldan 'das rnga rdzasems dpas 'di gad ces paka'astsal to// dgung la theg thog sa pa kyi

149a1: khye'u chung sngon mo mkha' la lding / / ya man ta ka khro bo ste// sku yang che la bam ldir bzang // sku mdog stangs zil bcag pa 'dra// phyag gnyis dang po kha T+wAM ga/ bar na rdo rje dril bu rnams// tha ma mda' dang gzhu
149a2: bsdams te/ 'khor ni phra men brgyad kyis bskor// de nyid yin te skal ba bzang // skal bzangs nga yi dam tshig gis// dogal chem chem mi bzang ba// bsgrags pa ral pa cig ma yin// dam tshig dus las ma 'da' nan
149a3: ces sgo'o/ / ci bka' stsal pa bzhin du// las thams cad kyang grub par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos ma dang phra men ma'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// las bcol
149a4: bar mdzad do/ / kro d+hi shwa ri dpal 'bar ma// khams gsum srid la mnga' mdzad ma// las su gsod la dga' ba mo// shan pa spu gri rnon po so// rol rngam pa'i kha T+wAM ga/ 'byung po'i tsi ta mchog la rol/ mthing ka mtsho
149a5: ston dpal gyi yum/ / rdo rje thugs kyi dbang phyug ma// ke'u ri ma yi mchod pas rol// gser gyi 'od 'phro mda' gzhu 'ge ngas/ rin chen sku yi dbang phyug ma// tsi'u ri ma yi mchod pas rol// phra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan
149a6: 'dzin/ / pad ma'i gsung gi dbang phyug ma// pra mo ha yi mchod pas rol// nag mo ral pa thod pas 'gengs// kar ma las kyi dbang phyug ma// be ta li yi mchod pas rol// gtum mo zhe sdang pU gri so// zhe sdang 'jom
149a7: pa'i dbang phyug ma/ / gasma ri yi mchod pas rol// pad ma 'joms pa'i char chen 'bebs// 'dod chags 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma// puk+ka si ya mchod pas rol// rin chen me lce glog phreng 'dzin// gti mug 'joms
149a8: pa'i dbang phyug ma/ / sma sha na yi mchod pas rol// las su dgra sta 'bar ba 'dzin// nga rgyal 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma// tsan d+ha li yi mchod pas rol// sid ha gsod byed seng ge mgo// ro mchog za ba'i 'phra

149b1: men ma/ / bya gri mgo gcod stag gi mgo// thod rnon za ba'i 'gra men ma/ sri ka dur kun wa yi mgo// dur sri ma yi 'phra man ma// shon sha 'drad sbyangs mo mgo// sha chen za ba'i 'phra man ma// thi ta khrag 'thung bya
149b2: rgod mgo/ / khrag tshil za ba'i 'phra men ma// kang ka ma ka dur bya'i mgo/ dug gsum 'joms pa'i phra men ma// khra la rgyu 'dren po rog mgo// dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i 'phra men ma// hu lu tsha 'phrog 'ug pa'i mgo/
149b3: glo snying za ba'i 'phra men ma// stag g.yag sha ba seng ge'i mgo// byi la spyang khu wa/ yi mgo// dom dred pag gi mgo can rnams// thugs dam bzhin du las byos shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / chags pa med
149b4: pa'i sbyor bas sku las 'khril cing las mthar phyin par mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sko ba rnams la bka' stsal pa// dza dza lcags kyu glo snying 'dren// a mo sngon po thod sbrul zhags// a'i dmar po lcags
149b5: sgrog sdom/ / pas ni ljang ku dril 'khrol dgyes// bka' stsal pa bzhin du nyan par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las ye shes kyi khro bo dkyil 'khor gyi le'u
149b6: ste gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal lha mo sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sku dang gsung dang thug rdo rje las byung ngo // rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor 'di byung ngo // gru bzhi pa la sgo/
149b7: bzhi pa/ rta babs rnam pa bzhis ni brgyan// der dang dril bu chun po dang // nyi ma zla bas rnam par brgyan// rin chen mu shig 'dros bus spos// do shal rkang gdub rnams kyis brgyan// sna tshogs gzugs ni rnam
149b8: bres pa/ / sna tshogs phreng ba gos kyis brgyan// srid bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste// ka ba mchog brgyad yang dag ldan// dbus su dga' byed stan la ni/ dngul la sogs pas rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs pad

150a1: ma'i dar gyis g.yogs/ / thams cad snyan la de dag ces// dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ stan de la ni bzhag par bya// tshad med pad mo dmar 'dra ba// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par grubs// yid bzhin nor
150a2: bu dbu rgyan ldan/ / rin chen gtsug ni rnam par mdzes// tshad med dang ni sbyang ba yi// dbul chun pos mdzes par byas// sna tshogs ye shes rab tu gnas// chu skyes spyan ni rab tu rgyas// dga' byed yid tsam g.yon du
150a3: 'dud/ / g.yas kyi phyag gis rdo rje che// snying kar gsor la rab tu brtson// de bas sogs pa yon tan ldan// thog ma nyid du rnam par bzhag/ slob ma'am yang na gzhan yang rung // mtshan kun gyis ni rnam brgyan
150a4: la/ / tshul bzhin byin gyis brlabs bya ste// dbus kyi dkyil du gzhag par bya// bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam bzhag ste/ de la sogs pa yon tan gtso// dbus kyi stan la 'dug pa ni// bdag ni rab dgyes rje su sba// der ni
150a5: slob ma byin brlabs te/ / thams cad las byed phran sum tshogs// rdo rje pad ma las byung gyi// gsang ba yis kyang dbang bskur ro// rab dgyes la sogs yon tan ldan// yid 'ong bu mo btsal bya ste// snying ka ma tshogs ma
150a6: mgrin gyi bor/ / ha rnams las sogs 'brub sgoms te/ mtshan ma phyag rdzar pa 'bar ba'i// rdo rje pad ma mnyam skyor ba'i// rang la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// tshul bzhin thams cad gzhag par bya// mdun du lamo
150a7: myos byed ma/ / ma mchu 'dzin pa'i rol dgyes// dkar dmar kha dog 'dres pa yi// thams cad brgyan dang yang dag ldan// lo ni bcu drug lon pa mchog/ shes rab can gyis mdun du bzhag/ g.yas su
150a8: lha mo gsod byed ma/ / mtshon cha'i mda' ni 'dren par brtson// do shal rkang gdub bdag gis brgyan// lo grangs nyi shu lon pa ste/ gser gyi ri bo zhu ba 'dra// chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam sngo// samra

150b1: dpa' tshal ma nyes mdzad cing / / da ma tshul bzhin gzhag par bya// rngub tu margyangs byang sa// pad mdamar ba ma dgag 'ang// chu srin rgya la mtshan mdzes pa'o// sa la mdan gra gcag/
150b2: dga' byed 'dod pa'i ro la dgyes// sna tshogs na bza' yang dag gsol// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par grubs// sna tshogs pad mo sbyor las sogs// gar gyi bya ba rab rlag bzhag/ g.yon du sna tshog
150b3: chen mo ste/ / sna tshogs dgos brjes brlabs pa// sku yi tshad ni bcu gnyis ldan// rnal 'byor la ni shin du brtson// lha dang lha min mi yi rnams// 'gro ba thams cad mos mdzad ma/ sna tshogs brgyan gyis rnam
150b4: par grubs/ / sna tshogs dar ni na bza' gsol// grwa rnam dag ni thams cad du// gzugs sgra dri re reg rnams dang / bdug pa me tog gsung ldang ba// gzi brjid chen po'i 'od dang ldan// ci rigs par ni
150b5: bzhag par bya/ / sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rang gi las kyi phyag rgyar ldan// bskal ldan 'ga' la rnam mos pa// sgo srungs bzhi ni bzhag par bya// gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/
150b6: pi wang gling bu brdab pa dang / rdza rnga rnga chen ku mu ta// mu ra tsa dang da ra da dang / gar dang dbyangs dang gzhad pa che// rol mo yo byad sna tshogs rnams// dga' byed dkyil 'khor bzhag par bya// phyi yi dkyil 'kho
150b7: thams cad do/ / dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi rol du// rdo rje nam malnga 'gro ma bzhag/ yi dgas phyag rgya yang dag zhon// dpa' bo 'jigs byed gzugs 'dzin te// skal ldan rang gi lag char ldan/ gdug
150b8: pa'i sems kyis bsdigs byed cing / / sha khrag dang ni rgyu ma dang // rkang dang tshil bu za spyod pa// dkyil 'khor byas te bdug pa ni// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bzhag par bya// dga' bar byed dang 'dran

151a1: par byed/ / bsod par byed dang 'phrog par byed// rdo rje mkha' 'gro tshegs kyi rnams// shar gyi phyogs su bzhag par bya// gzi brjid che dang 'bar byed ma// 'joms byed bong bu lho ru ste/
151a2: gtsug lag mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni// mkhas pas tshul bzhin gzhag par bya// chags chen po dang chags bral dang // 'khor lo ma dang rgyas 'debasam// rab tu 'byor pas 'byor byas te// ci rigs nub
151a3: bzhag par bya/ / sna tshogs lus dang srung ba dang // gnod sbyin mo dang yang dag 'phrog/ sngags dang phyag rgya byin brlabs nas// sngags mkhan ci rigs byang du bzhag/ shar gyi gra ru bzhag pa ni// bya rog
151a4: gdod ni mi 'bru ste/ / 'jigs pa'i mig dang 'jigs pa'i gdo ci ltar rjes su 'thun byas te// yi dgas stan la yang dag 'dug/ sna tshogs mchog gi gdong 'dzin te// lag par gri dang khar gzhod thogs
151a5: mchog tu sha dang khrag za ba'o/ / nub dang lho yi mtshams bzhag pa// bzhad dang bu ga pa'i gdong ring ma// khros pa'i khri dang phag gi gdong // gsus po che la lto 'phyang rnams// ru ba dang byang gi mtshams dag tu//
151a6: rnga bo bong bu gdong 'dzin ma// khros par dang khyi yi gdong // rgyu ma'i mgo nas sha bar byed// shar dang byang gi mtshams dag tu// keng rus dkar po 'dzin pa ste/ khros pa rus pa'i phreng bas klubs/
151a7: lto phyangs po la bum pa 'dzin// phan tshun 'thab par brtson pa yi// lce spyang gi ni 'khor gyis rnams// 'jigs byed gdong ni mche ba 'dzin// rnam par bsgyur ba'i gzugs 'dzin ma// sgo rnams kyi ni
151a8: phyogs rnams kun/ / sgo bzhi rnams ni bzhag par bya// byang gi phyogs su 'bod 'grogs te/ bum pa rnams ni shar nyid du// nub tu rnam par 'jig pa'o// lho ru gshin rje rgyal po bzhag/ de dang gzhan

151b1: yang rgyal po mchog/ nam mkha 'gro bas kun du bskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po rdo rje sa pas dpa' yum gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// dgyes shing spyan ni rgyas pa yis//
151b2: gzhengs nas dgyes pa chen po yi// brjid pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing // thal mo sbyang nas gtsug nyid du// bzhag pa yis ni 'dud par byed// skul ba yis ni dbyangs 'di yis// de dag gtso la mnyes par byed/ kye mtshos ni ngo mtshar che/
151b3: kye ma sbas pa ngo mtshar che// kye ma bde byed yang dag 'byung // kye ma kun tu bzang po don// kye ma rab dgyes yang dag 'grogs// kye ma bde ba dga' ba te// kye ma bde ba bde mchog ste// kye ma sngags kyi yang dag/
151b4: spor// kye ma snying po yang dag sbyor// kye ma phyag rgya yang dag bzhugs// kye ma bsgrub pa rmad 'byung ba'o// kye ma pha rol phyin pa yis// kye ma ci ltar mthur rigs pa// kye ma dgos pa sna tshogs che// kye ma dag pa gsum
151b5: thor pa/ / kye ma rdo rje mnyam spor pa'i// kye ma pad ma rnam phye ba// kye ma dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'i// kye ma mchog dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// kye ma gar ni dga' ba che// kye ma glu rab dri ma med// kye ma sil snyan rnam pa
151b6: 'khrol/ / kye ma gda' dang mun sel ba// kye ma dga' byed me tog phreng // kye ma mar mo mun pa sel// kye ma dri ni shin du bsil// kye ma rnal 'byor mnyam sbyor ba'i// kye ma sgyu mnam mkha' 'dra// kye ma sangs rgyas
151b7: nam mkha' dra/ / kye ma rin chen bde mchog skyed// kye ma sna tshogs sku ma mdzad// kye ma ngo mtshar sangs rgyas dang / kye ma ngo mtshar dbang po rnams// kye ma ngo mtshar sems dpa' che// kye ma ngo mtshar lha yi rnams/
151b8: shin du dgyes che rdo rje la// rgyal ba kun gyis bstod byas te/ rdo rje sems pa 'gyings pa yis// dga' dang bde byed skyes par 'gyur// chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum bcas pa// yangs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad de//

152a1: spyan dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis// rab tu dgyes ldan smin ma bsgyur// yangs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad de// spyan dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis// yid tsam mdzes pa'i spyan zur gzig/
152a2: rgyas brla ni nu mar 'dud// rked pa'i dbyes ni rnam par yangs/ rnams kyi gos kyang che la mdzes// chags pa cung zad tshems kyi gnon// tshoms kyi phreng ba kun da zla// mi drag zlos pa'i dbugs
152a3: 'byin cing / / rab tu dga' chen dgyes pas stong // bud med gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba// lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas gsum gyis// dben par mchod pa rab
152a4: tu brtsam/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo mchog/ spyan las sogs pa bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'od zer sna lngas
152a5: khyab pa yis/ / pad ma rdo rje bsgom par bya'o// 'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin du skor// yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bya// bzhin bzangs phan par 'dod pa yis// bud med rnyed na cho ga bzhin// bde
152a6: bar mchod par brtsam par bya/ / ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya// sngags shes pas ni gnas bzhin du bud med rtag tu bzhag par bya// rgyan rnams
152a7: thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ / bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// dben pa'i gnas su khyad par du// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub// mtshan nyid dag ni yongs su dag/ rab tu bzang la bzhin yang
152a8: mdzes/ / rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// bang bar bzhag nas rnam par bsgom// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// bu mo ud pa la mthing ga'i mdog/ 'dra ba dag ni rtag tu bsgrub//

152b1: sbyor ba'i cho ga de nyid ni// byas na las rnams brtsam par bya// bud med sems ni rab brtan pa// lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa la// rigs kyi sbyor ba rab bsgoms te// bdag gi khu bas mchod par bya// 'dis
152b2: ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ / na chung gzhon nu mig bzangs btsal// gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa yi// lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon pa'i// gzung nas byol song skye gnas brtag/ bzhin bzangs shin
152b3: du mdzes pa yi/ / na chung mtshan ldan skal pa mchog/ mig bzangs brtan pa'i blo ldan pas// khu ba blangs nas bza' bar bya// dben zhing rab tu nyams dga' bar// sbyor ba mchod pa kun brtsams na// rdo rje sku
152b4: dang gsung dang thugs/ / zla ba phyed kyis nges par grub// smin dkyus ring zhing sra lo 'jam// lus lde ma dbyibs sku blong dag cing / bstan pa chags shing bcos su btub// lus nyan ci la thogs pa med// rked pa phra
152b5: la ro spad zlum/ / stod ni drang la shin tu rgyas// tshems dkar mgul rings phyag sor ring // dkar la dmar chags nor bu'i mdog/ gzung sam mtshan ldan spyad par bya// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem rab tu mdzes//
152b6: yid 'ong 'dzum phran spyan zur gzigs// khur chos dkar pos gdab par bya// dkar 'dzin phyir ni mnya bya ste// pad ma'i thebs chen pos gdab// pad ma lan gsum mnyes bya ste// mtshan lung mngon suman pa gaN+DI
152b7: zangs kyi mdog gis gzung bar bya/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi btsun mo dang bcas par gyur to// de nas 'di brjod par mdzad do// zhi ba kha dog dkar la 'tsher// btang snyoms kun gyi spro bsdu yis// gsu
152b8: pa rdzogs par ldan pa dang / / phyag rgya tshogs mchog de dag la// rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du skyes// phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// bcu gsum pa yin lus 'dzin// che chung med par gsal bar bsgom// dbul

153a1: gnyis pa'i yi ger ldan/ / gsal ba nyid kyis dus dag tu// cod pan lnga yi rin chen las// rgyan gyi rigs ni gsal ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya'o// mthing /
153a2: kha 'bar ba'i yi ge che// rigs kyi rin chen spro bsdu las// phyag rgya gsal ba'i skur gsal ba'i// rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du skyes// sgrib pa kun spang sdig byed stobs// gnyis pa yi ni yi ge las// thams cad
153a3: blo dbyangs yi ge gter/ / mnyam par 'khril ba'i tshul 'dzin pa// rin chen rigs kyi phyag rgyar gsal// las 'di thams cad kun gyi mchog/ rgyal po rnam par rol pa'o// pad ma rA ga 'dra ba'i mdog/ chos sku
153a4: zla tshes rab ldan pa/ / gsal ba'i kha dog mdzes pa na// thams cad ma lus dbang du mdzad// sbyor dang skye dang bsdu ba yis// phyag rgya gsal bar dbang gis bskur// btsun mo dag dang mnyam du skyes// gnyis su
153a5: med pa 'brel ba yis/ / dbu ru yi ge gnyis par ldan// rin chen rigs kyi spro bsku las// cod pan rigs lnga'i kha dog ste// ci bzhin pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// phyag rgya bzhugs tshul pad mo'i tshul// mnyam par
153a6: gsal bas dkyil 'khor yin/ / mi phyed pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor kun 'dus mchog/ pad ma rigs kyi phyag rgyar gsal// rigs kun gyi ni phyag rgyar gsal// mun pa sel ba'i mar//
153a7: me bzhin// gsal dag yid gnyis med par bsgom// chu skyes 'jam pa 'og tu ldan// steng dang spyod pa'i rol mo yis// dgyes shing mnyam pa'i mchod pa bsham// 'di ltar gsal ba dbang yang rdzogs//
153a8: thams cad bsdu ba zhes bya ba// de bzhin dbang ste las thams cad// dus gsum pa yi mdzad pa che// rigs kun 'dus par bde bar gshegs// mnyam pa ci bzhin teng 'dzin te// yi ge 'bru gcig kun

153b1: gyi mchog/ bshad par khyad par las kun rdzogs// chu skyes gsal bar 'dab ma'i steng // gnyis su med par gsal ba san+da// rnam pa gnyis kyi bye brag gis// 'dus par gsal bar skur gyur pa// 'dod cing chags/
153b2: pa ma yin zhing // blo la yid gnyis med pas na// phyag rgya gsal bar rgyal ba'i sku// rgyal mo dang ni mnyam du skyes// dbul gnyis pa'i yi ger ldan// sbyin pa rgya chen khebs pas na// rang gi 'dod pa'i gnas su bsdu//
153b3: bod tshed lo grangs khyad par med// gnyis su med par 'khril par gsal// dus kud du ni mnyam ldan pa// bsang ba mchod pa rab tu rdzogs// zla rgyas lta bu gtso bo sgom// chags pa med par 'dod bsdu yi// yum dang /
153b4: lhan cig bsgom pa ni// A li kA lir byed pa'i don// phyag rgya las kyi bye brag gis// bde ba chen po tshul gnas pa// rgyal ba kun kyang de dang 'thun// phyag rgya bsnol bar gnas pa yi// kun kyang sems dpa'i
153b5: dkyil 'khor ro/ / phyag rgya rdo rje thal mo ni// kun kyang yum gyi rgyab tu bsnol// zhal gnyis mdzes par rab sbyar ba// zla gam pa yi ljags gnyis mdzes// dung gi phur bus mkhur bcos la// 'debs
153b6: shing rdeg pa'i tshul du bzhugs/ / bsnyen pa nye bsnyen dbang rdzogs pa// rgyal ba kun gyi sku yi mchog/ gzhan dang 'dzum pa'i gtso gzugs bsgom// rnal 'byor dka' thub chen po'i don// gsang
153b7: ba spyod pa shin tu dgyes/ / gsang ba nyid du sems can 'dren// thams cad kun gyis rmongs pa sal// yum gyi las kyis khyad par ni// sa yi rim pa kun sbyor zhing // zas dang mgo dbang med pa yi// nyan thos 'gog pa
153b8: la sogs pa/ / byang chub sems kyi char chen gyis// pad mor bcings pa tshar gnod mdzad// dam tshig chen po sdom pa ste// rgyal ba kun gyi dkyil 'khor yin// phyag rgya chen po tshogs mchog ste// dga' ba

154a1: don dudrags mchog yin/ / myur bar rtag tu ma medangs na// gdon mi za bar thub pa ni// 'dod khams ltar nyin byed kyis// gsang bkun dang mnyam par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i don dang
154a2: mnyam pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / kun tu bzang mo rnal 'byor mchog/ gsang ba nyid kyis mkha' dbyings so// yi ge oM ldan tsheg drag bcas// rnal 'byor bde chen nyid kyis sras// gzugs khams lnga tshogs byin brlabs te/
154a3: phyag mtshan 'khor lo gsal ba dang // bde ba rnal 'byor de bzhin gshegs// gtso bo gser gyi kha dog gsal// nyi ma gser gyi 'od bzhin du/ gsal ba 'tshor ba bcom ldan 'das// dbu ru yi ge gnyis pa la//
154a4: don chen myu gu khang ba 'bar// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan gyis// legs par brgyan pa mtshan rnams rdzogs// rdzogs pa chen po bzhugs tshul dang // ting 'dzin 'thun par 'gro la gzigs// pad ma ge sar dbus
154a5: gnas pa'i/ / thig leng gsang ba bzhin dang ldan// mdun du lha mo chags pa mo// lo grangs nyi shu mdzes dang ldan// ma hA su khe gnas la dgyes// mdzes pa'i lag pa gar dang bcas// gnyis su med pa'i bzhugs
154a6: tshul ni/ / gcol rten pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rgyan tu lha mo dgyes chen mo// sangs rgyas bsnyen par mdzes tshul gyis thal sbyar 'dzin pa sru brten pa// sku tshe bcu drug brtsan dmar sku// sangs rgyas gdung 'dzin
154a7: tshangs par sbyor/ / 'dod chags can la mthun par mdzad// g.yas su zhe sdang 'dul ba mo// rdo rje pad mo sbyor la dgyes// ma dad pa rnams dbang med par// drag po sbyor mdzad zhe sdang sel// chags pa chen po bcom ldan/
154a8: 'das// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba yis// gtong ba med par bstan pa'i tshul// sngo bsangs mdog ldan khyad par che// sku tshad bcwa lnga chags pa can// dus mtha' med par sbyor la dgyes// steng dang sgeg pa'i

154b1: cha lugs kyis/ / sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal 'khrug/ ra tu smras pa'i 'gog pa rnams// bsrungs nas rgyal ba'i sras su mdzad// a ta ma li phrin las kyis// thams cad byang chub chen po mdzad// mig gnyis 'gyu/
154b2: dang sbom po yis// dbang mor ldan par byas pa na// gnyis su med par sbyor 'dod yin// snga yaM rtse mor mthe'u chung 'dzin// maN+Da bzhugs par brtson byas pa'o// so so rnams bsdams kha bye ba// dus la bab ces bya ba ste/
154b3: ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa na// dus la bab ces bya ba yin// 'di ltar brdal ldan ting 'dzin la// dam can bud med rnam mi 'dud// dngos grub mi thob dam tshig nyams// tshe rabs kun du brlag par 'gyur// 'di ltar
154b4: brtson par byed pa na/ / g.yon pa bskyed pa rnam bzhi yis// skyes pa na chung tshul bzhin du// rdo rje pad ma'i mtshams nyid du// dbyings phyung lnga yi sbyor ba yis// dal bus dal bus gzhugs pa dang / dal bus dal bus
154b5: rab bskul te/ / drag po tshig gis spro ba dang // byang chub sems kyis bde ba dgang // sbom po dbang dam lnga rnams kyis// yum gyis blangs la gtso la mchod// nye ba'i bsnyen pa la sogs te// bsnyen pa che chung rdzogs/
154b6: par bsgom// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor las// mchod pa brgyad kyis mchod par ston// de ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang // gnyis su med par lugs bzhin du// mnyam par 'khril ba'i tshul du bstan//
154b7: dus gsum kun gyi gdung 'dzin la// g.yon phyogs sten pa'i skal dang ldan// na tshod lon bcu drug pa// sdong po rul pa dag la dgyes// g.yas pa zur gyi spyan gyis gzigs// dril bu sgra snyan 'khrol la brtson
154b8: rdo rje rab tu sgrogs byed ma/ / sangs rgyas lnga yid bu rgyan can// mngon du sbyor la rab brtson pa// brda dang bcas pa gar gyis ni// sangs rgyas kun la slong mdzad ma// byang chub sems kyi sprin chen gyis//

155a1: mchod pa chen po rab mchod mnyes// sprul pa bsam yas mtha' klas pa// dus gsum 'khor lo bskor bar bskul// so sor chags pa'i mdangs kyis ni// mnyen dang bcas pa'i gar gyis mchod// de nas
155a2: gsang ba chen mo dang gnyis su med par 'khril pa chen por gyur te/ / g.yon bskyed pa mang pos mnyes pa dang // pad ma spang ba la sogs pa 'byung ba mnyes par mdzad nas rab tu dgyes te klu 'di blangs so// chos can
155a3: dngos po med par rab gsal ba/ / 'byung gnas chen po ya mtshan 'byung bar mkhyen// e ma'o ngo mtshar che'o zhes blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa// mdangs bzang mig gi dkyus
155a4: kyang ring / / sku ni ldem la tsan dan dri// yan lag lcug ma bzhin du mnyen// tshems dkar sum bcu rnga rje med// mgul ba zlum rings rab tu legs// gser la g.yu sbas g.yas su 'khyil// gzungs ma 'di dag
155a5: bsten par bya/ / skad gdangs mi snyan rar po// yang na rmongs pa gsub sub po// sbrang bus gtses pa'i sna sgra bzhin// sems can dag la khro zhing 'tshog/ dam can dag la g.yel bar mdzod// phyi nang sra zhing 'bras
155a6: ba can/ / de bsnyen na ni dngos grub nyams// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma la// rab tu 'phrul te 'char ba yin// bden gnyis so sor snang ba yis// yum gyi mkha' zhes rgyal bas
155a7: gsungs/ / ma nor la mchen kun bsgoms nas// kun du bzang mo bsgoms pas grub// bud med la ni mchod bsten na// ye shes chen po grub par gsungs// dpal kun du bzang po thams cad shes rab kyi longadra/
155a8: spyod 'di gsungs so// mngon spyod las kyi 'jug pa 'di// phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na// rnal 'byor sdom pa gnas pa yin// de la mchod pa dam pa ni// sbyor ba rab tu sbyor ba ste// kun du khyab pa kun du sbyor// rjes

155b1: su chags padam tshig mchog/ de byid kar sham mdog dang ldan bcu drug bong tshad ring ba dang // lugs su brubs pa lta bu ste// lus legs mdzes dang ldan pa dang // dpral ba dbyes che kos blo bra// nu ma chung zhing sor mo
155b2: ring / / yid tsam mig kyus ring ba dang // so dkar thags bzang mtshams thung zhing // skad bzang mdangs dang ldan pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas mchog ste// 'di la brtson par byed pa ni// rigs kyi rdo rje
155b3: gdon mi za/ / tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// gnas rab bden par rab brtags te// sha dkar mdangs bzang mdog dang ldan// lus 'bring thub pa cha byad can// so dkar thags bzang mig dkyus ring //
155b4: skad pra mdog dgod sbyor de ba// dpral dbyes las sogs bzang gnas pa// rme nag la sogs gnas pa ni// rtag tu chos la 'dud pa yi mtshangs pa dbyangs kyi rin chen las// 'di las brtson byas bsgrubs
155b5: pa yi/ / de bzhin rigs kyi ting 'dzin las// phan tshun du ni dga' spyod na// tshangs pa'i snga dro gcig tsam gyis// gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor spyod pa dga' ba ni/ sbyor ba brtson pas
155b6: 'grub par gsungs/ / bud med cha lugs legs pa ni// bod chod mir de lus phra zhing // rkang lag chung zhing skad gsal ba// mig legs ngo zlum rtsan dmar che// blun du chags pa mi shes med// lus
155b7: la mtshan gyi rmad 'dras brgyan/ / tshig gsal rmi lam nyung ba dang / so dkar mchu legs dad par ldan// cho ga shes pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// gsang ba'i mkha' la nyi zla'i 'od// rdo rje pad mor ldan byas te/
155b8: phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na// 'dod pa'i khams lha'i skad cig gis// 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// lus zlum gtum pa nga rgyal can// khong na sems rtog sems la 'dzin bya ba 'dral mi gtong

156a1: ldan/ / bslab pa'i blo rtul sha rus cha// mdangs bkrag brtags na phyi phyir gsal// sbyin la dga' zhing chos la dad // rin chen rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis// bag chags yi ge tshar gcod cing //
156a2: ting 'dzin blol gsal ba na// bsgrubs pa'i dus la bab pa ste// de tshe rab tu brtson pa yis// yum gyi pad ma kha phye zhing // bde ba thugs kyi 'phro 'dra yis// phan tshun du ni dga' spyad ni// rigs kyi rin chen grub
156a3: pa ni/ / tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// thugs rje mdzad spyod bye brag gis/ 'jig rten dag na dman pa'i rigs// rab tu bkug ste dga' spyad na// snying rje mchog dang thabs ldan pa'i// rnal 'byor spyod pa chen po
156a4: gsungs/ / shan pa'i rigs ngan smad 'tshong ma'i// na ba'i rigs dang 'dod spyod rnams// 'joms pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis/ myur du spyad na 'grub par gsungs// yi dgra gnod sbyin byol song dang /
156a5: khyi dang ru sbal spre'u lnga sogs// mi dang lha yi gnas mchog kun// so so mtsham pa dga' spyad na// las mchog dam pa 'grub pa gsungs// rab tu chags la chags pa'i mchog/ rab tu rmugs pa rmugs
156a6: pa sel/ / zhe sdang can la 'tsham par ston// grags pa can la zhi ba che// brtson pa dag la brtson pa mdza/ thabs kyis mdzad pa kun gyi mchog/ sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// phyin ci log tu gang spyod rnams// gdul ba
156a7: mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis/ / mi ma dzad pa ni ci yang med// shin du gtum pa'i cha lugs kyis// gtum po thams cad dbang du mdzad// shin du zhi ba'i cha lugs kyis// grags pa can rnams dbang du mdzad/
156a8: shin tu mdangs ldan cha lugs kyis// chags pa'i yid rnams dbang du mdzad// e ma'o shin tu ngo mtshar che// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen pos rab tu brtson par mdzad pa// yid kyis

156b1: 'phro ba dang / / zla gam med pa dang // gyad 'gyed pa dang // 'khur ba bla na med pas phan tshun du dga' ba spyod do// sha mdog dkar la nu ma 'bur// stod spad phyed la smin kyus ring // pad ma'i dri yang dud ltar 'phro// pad
156b2: ma legs pa gro bos 'dra/ / zlu ma la che chung snyoms pa'o// sha mdog dkar la sde pa can// stod spad phyed la sor mo ring // nu ma chung zhing mthang ba ste// dri yang pad ma'i dri bu bro// mgul ba legs la rig zung rin//
156b3: pad ma dmar la mkhur chos legs// spyan yang zlu ma la 'og nas lta// sha mdog ser la nu ma zlum// rked pa pra la ro smad zlum// rkang pa'i sor mo nang du sbyor// lus kyang legs la che chung snyoms// tsams kyang
156b4: dmar la thags kyang dam/ / sor mo rnams kyang phral ring // dri yang tsan dan dri ru bro// yan lag lcug ma bzhin du mnyen// pad ma ser la phra la ring // spyan yang pral zur du gzigs// sha mdog gnag la sde ba
156b5: gnag/ sha yang gnag la rtsub pa ste// skad gdangs mi snyan gnyid ra ro// rmongs la mi shes sub sub mo// nu rdog che la nu bshal ring // rkang pa sbom la sor mo thung // gdong yang leb la sme ba 'jug/ smin/
156b6: mthung la mig mi sdug/ lus po sbom thung 'jing pa thung // pad ma gnag la yangs pa ste// ba lang can gyi rigs ces bya'o// gzugs ma mtshan dang ldan pa btsal ba'i don ni// rang dbang thob po da lo yang //
156b7: bcos su btub la lung nyan pa// skad gsal lta bas thag chod pa// spyod pa la dor rtog pa choms// yid gzhungs blo rno dbang po gsal// sems dag gzhung bzang zhal ngo rtag/ dam tshig phog las mi
156b8: 'da' ba/ / tshig la brdzun gyi gron the ba med// dad pa skyo dang dub pa med// spyod pa blang zhing dor ba med// brtson 'grus thang dang lhod pa med// ngo tsha shes dang khrel yod pa// gom pa dal la spyod pa gzob//

157a1: 6// mig 'bra chags su mi lta zhing // 'og dang zur gyis rtogs par// / dpal 'jam la lcang lor 'khyil// spyan bkra pral klas ring ba// sA gzur zor la rgyud mchad// ya mo nyig dang chad pa med// sod/
157a2: sum bcu thags bzang la// kos ske/ sogs bu yul zungs 'dra// mdog sdug dkar dmar mdangs byed pa// rked phan chag gam zlum pa dang // mgul ba zlum la phral ring // dang mo bya yi tshul dang 'dra// sna zlum blta
157a3: mdzes chung ba dang / / phyag gi sor mo bral ring // na bgro ba bcas pa 'dra// lce ni dang bltab khrag pa bzhin// dbugs chu phyi nang mo dpa' dra// gnyid chung sha yang sdud pa med// kha snams med la dri zhim pa// sna tshos
157a4: spos dri lus la bro/ / skyod par mkhas shing las la dpal// sbyor drod rig dang ting 'dzin rig/ pa dam dam pa spyad na dog/ nu ma dag na chung la sra// kha mchu srab la bzang ba'o// lha'i sbyor ba tseg bu// mi'i gan rkyal//
157a5: yi dgas zur gyis sbyor// byol song kha sbub tu sbyor ro// gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa rnams la zhag zla'i tshad bzung ste// dam du bcas nas mchod dus mi chag par phyi nang mi bsre// dam bcas pa la ma
157a6: gtogs par gzhan dang sbyar bar mi bya'o/ / gzhan du sbyor ba byas na dam las 'das te// mngal gyi srin bu kha dmar du skye'o// dam las ma 'das bka' bzhin du bsrungs na// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
157a7: dpa'i sras su skye'o/ / gzungs ma 'di dag ldaka' 'thun par bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med do// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// he ru ka rol pa las gsang ba'i
157a8: pa'i lha mo mchod pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas ru lu'i bsnyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang

157b1: thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / / ru la chos nyid du shes pa ni oM la dpal chen po yab lnga la yum khrag 'thung rgyal mo lnga yang sku la rdzogs so// de nyid lta bas srin por song gis dogs nas ye shes lngar bstan to// a
157b2: ltar snang ba chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes/ / zla tshes me long lta bu'i ye shes// rna ru so sor rtog pa'i ye shes// ma mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes// a las btags par bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes// yab yum rnams kyang /
157b3: de bzhin du sbyar// chos thams cad mthur ma skyes pa'i rang la skye ba'i cho 'phrul bstan to// ru lu dkyil 'khor du shes pa ni phung po lnga rigs lnga 'byung ba lnga yum lnga khams dang skye mched byang chub sems dpa' dang /
157b4: sems ma dang sprul pa lum dral// phung po lnga he ru ka lnga// 'byung ba lnga khrag 'thung rgyal mo lnga// khams dang skye mched 'phra men ma bcu drug/ skal tshigs dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ ba spu nyag ma re re sprul ba'i
157b5: phra men ma dang pho nya/ yan lag sgo ba bzhi// sprul pa thugs kyi rgyan te/ sngags ma hA yo ga'o// dkyil 'khor la yang phyogs dang gral ma nor bar dgod do// sgo skyod yan chad rims bzhin du dgod// ru lu ltar
157b6: shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po byang chub sems kyi don rtogs na sangs rgyas yin par shes par bya'o/ / ru lu mchod par shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems kyi don rtogs pa// dag
157b7: byang chub kyi sems mchod pas 'phags pa'i tshogs mnyes pa ste/ / 'drangs shing tshim par 'gyur ro// tshim pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// ru lu bsnyen par shes pa ni bsnyen pa ni dpal chen po'i sku'o//
157b8: nye ba'i bsnyen pa ni yum kro d+hi shwa ri'o// bsrubs pa ni phra men ma bcu drug/ bsgrubs pa chen po ni 'di ltar bsgrubs pas 'bras bu drod rnam pa gsum dang sbyar ro// 'od kyi drod ni bdag bsgrub pa byed pa'i dus

158a1: su bdag gi lus la 'od byung ba ni drong dang po dang sbyar ro/ / 'don pa'i drong ni bdag bsgrub pa byed pa'i dus su bdag gi lus bal 'dab g.yengs bltar byed na drod 'bring po dang sbyar ro// drod kyi drod ni bdag gi sem
158a2: tag tag rang rang nam mkha' 'phur snyam byed na tha ma dag sbyar ro/ / bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// don dam par bsnyen pa ni byang chub kyi sems kun tu bzang po'i nye ba'i bsnyen pa ni byang
158a3: chub kyi sems kun tu bzang mo'o/ / de la gnyis su med pa ni bsgrub pa// rgyu byang chub kyi sems skye ba med pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos la 'bras bu kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems phyag rgya sna tshogs cir snang yang
158a4: sgyu ma ye shes kyi phyag rgya tsam du snang / / snang tsam nyid na rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ka ste// rgyu 'bras ro gcig pa'i byang chub kyi sems shes par bya ste// thig le chen po'i ngang tu yenas ma bcos par lhun gyis grub
158a5: gnas pa ni lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ste/ bsgrub pa chen po'o// ru lu sgra shes pa ni byi bung na bung ba chen po'i skad tsam rang gi rna bas thos pa las ma gtogs pa gzhan gyis tshor bar mi bya'o// ru lu dbyangs su shes
158a6: bani/ / tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dren bsnyungs kyis// rgyal ba rgya mtsho thugs dam bskul// rdo rje srin po dung s+tha yis// khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdung // 'khun cing gdung ba'i sgra dbyangs kyis//
158a7: mdang mkha' 'gro thugs dam bskul// khong kun 'dren pa'i gdung dbyangs kyis// ke'u brgyad kyi thugs dam bskul// mkhur ba dazugs kyi rlung 'byin gyis// seng ga deng las sogs thugs dam bsgra/
158a8: sngags kyi yig 'bru bzlas pa yis// rdo rje tshig la skad gdangs med// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi bzlas pa 'di gsungs so// dam tshig ye shes dpal 'a bar ma// oM na sku gsung thugs kyis

158b1: dun gze brjid 'phrul ba u0f7f/ / sun yum chen dpal 'ab ma// sbyin ma sring rgya ma N+Da tshugs// du lugs phrang rgya mtshoste// bar smras pas ni skul bas// snang bsdus pas ni thugs la tham// mo du ma du
158b2: dz+halas rdo rjeHpa/ / ba las pad+ma mar gyur pa'i dbus// ma las dkyil 'bang bsas// shA dpalas sogs pa la brnal ba na tshul bzhi dang // bsnyen pa dang bsnyen pag/
158b3: nagrub chen po// sum ni pad ma'i dkyil 'khor // de bzugs kyi dkyil 'khor ste// sangs rgyas smin tshogs ma lus pa// ces mnyam mchog go spyan pas bskus// stong gsum stong gi 'ji ga nan/
158b4: sku yi sprul pa bsam mi khyab// de yang dpal chen nyid kyi sku// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// gsung gi sprul pa bsam mi khyab// de yang dpal chen nyid kyi gsung // stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/
158b5: thugs kyis sprul pa bsam mi khyab// de yang dpal chen nyid kyi thugs// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten no// shar phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// kun kyang badz+ra he ru kar byin brlabs nas// badz+ra he ru ka'i
158b6: dngos grub dus 'dir stsol/ / stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// lho phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// kun kyang rad na he rur byin brlabs nas// ra da na he ru ka yi dngos grub dus 'dir stsol// stong gsum stong
158b7: gi 'jig rten na/ / nub phyogs steng gi 'jig rten na/ kun kyang pad ma he rung byin brlabs nas// pad ma he ru ka yi dngos grub dus 'dir stsol// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// byang phyogs stong gi
158b8: 'jig rten na/ / kun kyang kar ma he rung byin brlabs nas// kar ma he ru ka yi dngos grub dus 'dir stsol// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// gnas rab gnas ni bsam mi khyab// dur khrod chen po

159a1: gnas kyi mchog/ bde ba chen po gnas kyi mchog/ phram gyi mkha' dbyings gnas kyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi gnas// stong gsumathong gi 'jig rten na// zas bzas ni bas ma
159a2: rdo rje rje chen zas kyi mchog/ rdo rje ga pur zas kyi mchog/ bdud rtsi rnam ldazas kyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi zas// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// skom rabaskom ni bsam mi khyab// rag ta tri r+tha
159a3: skom gyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi sgom// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// sgyogs rab phyogs ni bsam mi khyab// ban d+hagasar rnying sgrogs kyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi sgyogs// stong gsum
159a4: stong gi 'jig rten na/ / yab rab yab ni bsam mi khyab// kun du bzang po yab kyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi yab// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// yum rab yum ni bsam mi khyab// kun du
159a5: bzang mo yum gyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi yum// oM ru lu 'di ni sku yi sku// ru lu 'di ni sku yi gsung / ru lu 'di ni sku yis thugs// ru lu 'di ni gsung gi sku// ru lu 'di ni gsung gi gsung // ru lu 'di
159a6: ni gsung gi thugs/ / ru lu 'di ni thugs kyi sku// ru lu 'di ni thugs kyi gsung // ru lu 'di ni thugs kyi thugs// skur gsal gsung gsal thugs kyang gsal// sku don gsung don thugs kyi don// ru lur ma gyur
159a7: gang yang med/ / stong khams thams cad ru lus bkang // ru lu dngos grub dus 'dir gsol// ru lu dngos su snang ba'i sku// de nyid ma skyes pa ni gsung // snang ba dang ma byung ba gnyis su med pa ni thugs so// ru luswA
159a8: gsum gsung gsum/ / thugs gsum dgu phrugs kyi don to// oM ru lu ru lu d+hu b+h+yo trA~M/ oM na dpal chen he ru ka yab yum mo// ru lu gong ma brgyad ni ke'u rim brgyad/ ru lu 'og ma brgyad ni sid ha ma brgyad

159b1: hUM ni slo ba yab yum brgyad/ / b+ho ni dbang phyug mnyi shu rtsa brgyad// hUM ni bsdud pa byang chub sems// lha re re la snying po grangs brgya rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad dbul lo// khro bo rnams ni kro d+ha ni du lu ru lu hUM b+h+yohrI/ den bcom ldan
159b2: 'das he rug rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro ga nyer snying po chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM badz+ra bi s+yA te ma hA gro dra ma// tan tan kri gr-id+ha/
159b3: mar ma ra/ ban dza ban dza/ da ha da ta/ ba tsa ba tsa/ hU~M dr-i/ bri bri/ pra ma ya pra ma ya/ bi dran sarba ba ran sarba duSh+TAMSh+TaM// ma ta ma ta/ mo ta mo ta/ hU~M br-i tra~M traM bri hU~M tra~M traM// de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po pad ma 'byung gnas
159b4: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bsnyoms par zhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje thugs ka nas phud do// pad mdza la ma hA kro d+ha pad ma pa mu ka kha kha// sarba duSh+TAM/ kha ti kha ti/ sarba dusta ba/ ru stan
159b5: ya/ dam da ma/ badz+ra sho da ka/ ta ma tha ma tha// kro d+ha kro d+ha/ badz+ra kha ra tsa/ ba la du ru/ ga be ga tra sa ya tra sa ya ma hA badz+ra ba da ba mu ka/ bra ma pra ma hUM phaT/ ti ha ha ti ha ti/ tsa tur muka/ bi pra na sha na hUM hri// hUM hUM hUM hri// rdo rje
159b6: chen po 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i khro bo chen po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs ye shes kyi snying ka nas byung ngo / / oM badz+ra be ga ma hA kro d+ha sarba duSh+TAM// sa ma ya bak+Sha ya/ hU~M hUM hU~M/ phaT baT phaT/ badz+ras/
159b7: na ha na hUM phaT// khro bo chen po thams cad phyag rgya chen po mngon par sprul nas mche ba chen po 'khyil cing zhal mi sdug pa// spyan stong pa/ nyi ma chen po stong gi gzi brjid can rab tu za bar byed pa'i mdog sngon
159b8: po'i sku/ dur khrod chen po'i dpal chen gyi phyag cha mi'i keng rus khrag dang sha dang lud pa dang rkang dang tshil rnams zas su gsol// mi'i lpags pa rnams g.yogs te bsdams pa// mi mgo'i phreng ba dbul 'dzin

160a1: pa/ seng ge dang / glang po dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ma he dang / phag dang / lce spyang dang / ra dang / khyi dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rog dang / gzhad dang / byil dang / gzig dang / stag la sogs pa khro bo'i byol song gi gad/
160a2: la sogs pa brgya stong mang po rang gi ba spu'i bu gnas byung ste// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis shar phyogs 'jigs byed 'dul ba// zhal rnam par bsnyen pa// 'jigs pa lta bu'i spyan dang // zhal rdo rje mche ba cher
160a3: gtsigs pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i khro bo chen po brgyad stong gi g.yog dang // shar phyogs dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so// lha phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du khro gnyer can mang po brgya stong g.yog dang bcas
160a4: par gnas so/ / nub phyogs su yang rta gdong khro bo brgya stong mang po g.yog dang bcas te gnas so// byang du yang ru 'ur chen po khro bo brgya stong mang po g.yog dang bcas te gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shin du khro
160a5: be chen po'i tshigs brgya stong mang pos bskor nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs te/ he ru ka'i khro bo'i tshogs chen po de dag dang // khro bo chen po brgya stong mang po'i ri rab kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa bskyed
160a6: bung nas nam mkha'i dbyings rab 'byam thams cad snang bar byas te/ / stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams
160a7: cad gang bar byas so/ / shin tu dgyes pa'i khro bo chen pos khre bo'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa// na mo ra da na tra pA ya// na ma thun Da badz+ra pA Na ye// ma hA yak+Sha sa nA bA ta ye// ta da ya thA// oM b+he b+ho/
160a8: ma hA ba re ba da ra ba/ ma hA d+hi/ ha ra ha ra/ grih+Na grihA/ ma ra ma ra/ ban dza ban dza/ k+Shi kra na ma hA badz+ra tsaN Da d+ha// sarba duSh+TA~M ru ku/ ha na ta na/ da ta da ha/ ba tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha hU~M phaT/ 'di gsung ma thag tu// 'jig

160b1: byed chen po dbul bar byed pa/ / rang gi sku nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshul du byed do// khro bo brgya stong po zhal rnam pa rab skyer ba// mche ba gtsigs pa// 'khyil cing bskur ba phyag brgya stong mang po la mtshon cha
160b2: sna tshogs bsnams pa/ / zhal brgya stong mang po me lce bzhin du 'bar ba'i sku// oM ma hA badz+ra ad/ ta sa ta sa/ ha ha ha hU~M ta/ oM taM/ oM ma hA/ be ra ba be/ shing shing / tra tr-i tr-i tra~M/ ha ha i ti/ de nas 'jigs byed
160b3: chen po 'dul bar byed pa'i khro bo des he ru ka'i nga ro 'byin cing mgo bo nas mnan to/ / rdo rje he ru ka'i rol pa'i bdag nyid kyi mthu chen pos 'jigs byed chen po'i de ro 'byin cing sgyu ma'i sbu gu drangs nas khrag dang
160b4: rus pa dang rkang pa rnams za zhing chem che ma mdzad pas/ / de'i 'khor la rab tu ston par mdzad/ ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgren mor byas te sma pham nas he ru ka'i tshogs chen po'i mthu dang gzi byin bskyed
160b5: nas/ / 'khor thams cad thul skyabs 'og tu yang btsun nas dam tshig la gnas te yang dag par bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo drug po'i bzhad pas// bzhad cing / oM badz+ra pri ku ti ta na ta/
