160b6: gr-ih+Na gr-i d+ha/ ma tam ta// krin tsu ri ya/ si su ra ma hA sa/ sra ti re ke ba sur dza la na lar tshi pra ti dza la ta// ma sur ti/ a kad Ta a kad Ta/ a bya la/ a byA wa/ kri sA tsakra be ra ba tid yAn trA~M br-i/
160b7: de nas khrag 'thung gi sngags// oM badz+ra sur+ya bri ku ti// khro da ma hA gri te// da ra ba da ra pa/ su ra ru ra ti/ oM sa me dang ma ni tsan/ oM pra bra bi br-i ba/ de nas rtag dong gi khro bo chen po'i sngags// ba tri/ oM ma hA badz+ra
160b8: ba da/ ba mu ka/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ tsa ru ri mu kang / ba ba bi ba/ a ru ti ram/ ma kA r+ya hri da yan/ dra na/ dam de'u/ badz+ra ba daM ba mu ga/ hi hi/ sha hi sha ma hA sha sha hi hi/ de nas rdo rje chen po'i rnga gad chen/

161a1: 'om da cing bzugs so// tsun ldan 'das zlab rten pos thos pa dang bcas pa'i smra bas gtsigs// oMgs rnas ban mAb+hA ba d+hA sak+Sha p+'u / k+Sha m+b+ha sa// badzi d+ha yan u0f7f/
161a2: badz+ra dang s+thA ma// hUM ba ma thaMng // de nas bcom ldan 'das khro ba chen po rnal 'byor pa rnams dang ros cing / rang gi shin tu dgyes pa'i kun du longs spyod pa'i khro'i chen po'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugs so//
161a3: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'du ba mdzad nas// bcom ldan 'das la bskul ba mdzad do// oM ma hA su ra ta/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha bas tA ra ba sa ha ra// sarba kro d+ha ma sham sha
161a4: za shas pra sha ma/ sarba kro d+ha mAr+thaH// bo d+hab pas ma ya/ ma dA ma dral snyam pa// sarba dustA pra drA sta pra dus+ya// kro d+ham pa ba ye/ dza la ya sha rba ba dam// bi sha ra ma ye/ sha ra ma d+hA/ b+hag pan/ ra
161a5: ti/ sarba ta thA ga tA sA dA na/ sa ma ya na tsa ho// su ra ta// sa ma i ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM dza hUM baM ha~M// tAkatrUM ta ki hUM ki b+h+rUM m-i gtan
161a6: d+hU/ ak+sha na gas/ ba / shai s+'uR+Ya/ s+yAH kA d+ha snum pa/ r+dz+dza a / ta/ d+hA d+d+ha/ hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi khra ba chen po 'di byung // oM sa ma d+hani sram ta
161a7: kr-i d+hi shwa re hU~M phaT/ bdud rtsi'i khro bo'i dbang mo 'di byung ngo // oM badz+ra a mri ta ma hA kro d+hi shwa re/ ud tsa bedz+ra a mri tad+d+hi a// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma bdud rtsi chen mo 'di kun du khros te// ru lu rum+bi
161a8: zhes bya ba 'byin cing rang gi pad mo la bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje btsug nas bdud rtsi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i rigs po phyung ngo / / oM a mri ta sa man ci ba ni a mri ta su mu te/ pra be sha ya sarba na badz+ra/

161b1: pad ma ma sa// yo gi ni ra// ma hA bo d+hi tsi// bi tA bi ti mur ti ya/ rdo rje khro bo'i dbang mo zhes bya ba nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA shwa ri sarba duSh+TA/ su ta ni mahA pra la yan/
161b2: sma sha na bi sha tse// ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha dudaSh+Ta ka ra le bi ki ta/ ba de na/ sarba sha du pra ma ni/ hUM hUM ma hA kro d+ha shwa ra hUM phaT/ khro bo 'di rnams phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa// zhal gsung pa/ mdog in
161b3: tra ni la'i 'od 'dra ba/ rdo rje dang / thod pa gcig khang pa dang / thod pa dang / mdung dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / rtse gsum dang / be con dang / mu su dang / 'khor lo dang // ka na ya dang / tom dang / mda' dang /
161b4: gzhu dang / sha ga ti dang // gri rnams phyag na 'dzin pa// thod pa'i phreng ba mgul rgyan du byas nas nyi ma brgya'i me'i bod 'dra ba'o// de'i dbus mdun du rdo rje khrag 'thung ma chen mo de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs
161b5: dang cha lugs 'dzin pa rig pa 'dis bzhag par bya'o/ / oM badz+ra ma hA d+ha ra// ma hA kro d+ha ri/ ma hA sA sha ni// bi sha ni la dza la ya/ ma hA sa pra pra dza la te/ mu ti da ra/ ka ba la ma la// bu shid/ ma ku te/
161b6: mar ru ti/ radrang ba// ci bur te/ ka ba la has te/ kwa dang la ba // tri shul gan d+ha/ ma hAkr-i d+he/ hU~M d+hu ng+ku d+ha/ he he ruta mu ta pra la hUM phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po gzi brjid mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya'i
161b7: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so/ / rdo rje nyi ma nyid kyi khro bo nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM hUM traM a/ su r+ya badz+ra kro dra shwa ri// dam da ma/ gra sa gra sa/ a sta ma hUM phaT/ oM hUM dr-i dra dra dra/
161b8: khro mo chen mo 'di lho phyogs su bzhag par bya ste// gzi brjid chen mo rab gtor zhing / shin tu 'jigs pa che bzhin 'bar// dpung pa bcu drug rno ba che/ dpung rgyan thod pa brtsigs pa byas// spyan ni rab dmar

162a1: stobasangs mdog/ mtshon chen tshogs bsnams par brtson// bdug pa thams cad na byed cing / ye dgas chen po stag sa zhon/ rang ga g.yog gis mdun paskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad mar
162a2: 'od 'phro ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad mo'i khro mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM thi badz+ra pad ma ba mu ke/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/
162a3: ma hA ma ho da ri/ bi go be hUM/ he hUM hUM hUM hUM/ hUM hriM ha/ sha ti sham tha ba/ badz+ra ba dab na la maho// te to hUM hUM hi hi hUM/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du// 'di ni rgyab tu bzhag par bya// rno ba chen po zhal gsum pa// rta gdong gyen
162a4: ston pa ste/ / khro bo chen po dpung bcu drug/ rnam par bsgyur ba'i mi sdug gdong // mi lto stan la yang dag zhon/ khrag mang po la 'thung byed pa// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste// khros pa'i dbu rgyan thod pa brtsams
162a5: 'od zer rnon po gtong byed cing / g.yog bcas dkyil 'khor rgyan du bzhugs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje khro bo gnyis su med pa'i 'dul ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
162a6: snyoms par zhugs te/ khros pa'i dbang mo chen mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sarba a mo ka ma hA bye shi shwa ri/ hUM hUM haM haM haM ma gro ti gra ma khe// ma hA byi sha ru ba da ri ni/ sarba dusta pra sha ma ni/
162a7: hUMhUM hUM phaT/ 'di nyid kyis ni ci rigs par/ rdo rje gdon mi za dkyil du/ g.yog dang bcas pa rnam pa bzhi// sna tshogs dam tshig bzhag bya ste// sna tshogs pa dang khyad par ldan// kun du yongs su bskor nas gnas//
162a8: bkyed pa dang ni btsum pa'i gdod// rab tu drag pa'i ro byang zhing // gdod gnyer thod pas rtse mo byas// dpung pa bcu drug gis brgyan pa'i// khro mo chen mo gdong gsum la// za byed me bzhan lta ba yi// de yi ri bo

162b1: thams cad kyi/ / g.yog ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyang // rang gi phyag dang mtshan mar ldan// dpung pa brgyad dang ldan pa yi// de ni cho ga ci bzhin du// 'byung mo phyag rgya yang dag zhon// dur khrod bzhin du 'jigs byed pa//
162b2: phyi yi rnal 'byor mtshogs rnams// de dag kun du yongs su bskor// bzhag gam bri bar bya yang rung / de ni de yi stan la gnas// bzhin ni sdug la dpung bzhi mo// gdug pa'i khro mo rnams bsgyur bcas// de las
162b3: sogs pa rim par ldan/ mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i sngags rnams nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sarba badz+ra dar a nIr gi nam hA ti ga
162b4: phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra a kar sha ni/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri hU~M dza dza dza hU hU~M hU~M/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra ku la ma nur gi ni ma hA badz+rA kro d+hi shwa ri hU~M ha he phaT ho// oM sarba badz+ra dar kra ma hA kro d+hA hU~M sa sa hU~M phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hi ha tsa a be shaH/ hU~M hU~M
162b5: hUM/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA su ta pri ti ka ro ka dra tha ta tha// oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra he ru ka ma hA kro d+hi sho ri// ma hA pa tsa yo tsa ba ra ye// hUM hU~M hU~M druM druM dr-i dr-i tha/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha a ta ha si ni/ hUM hUM dring dring trotal
162b6: hUM phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra dA ra ma d+ha badz+ra kro d+ha bak+Sha ni hU~M hU~M hU~M/ bak+ka ya bak+Sha ya hU~M hrI/ oM sarba badz+ra mahA badz+ra d+ha ra barba tik+Sh+Na kro d+hi shwa tshon d+ha tshon d+ha hU~M badz+ra tiSh+Thaha ste// tshod ya cho da ya/ hUM hUM ma tha ma tha// oM sarba badz+ra d+har/
162b7: hrI tsa rtari na// ma ga d+ha dzI ni/ trA~M trA~M ba ta ya ba ta ya// ma hA badz+rA tsi grin tsa kren tsun hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM sarba badz+rang+garam hA ke ra ba tsa ni// hU~M nAM dz+dza/ matam ta/ oM sarba badz+ra ma hA d+ha ra~M ma~M ta bi sha ma kha ng+ku hU~M baT phaT/
162b8: oM sarba badz+ra ma hA d+ha ra ma ya ba de/ hu du tang tang hang / phaT phaT phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra yak+Sha ni hUM hUM/ kha kha// bA hi ShA hi// a bi ba bI'i hU~M phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha na ma hA badz+ra ba nid ni ma hA kro d+ha bin d+ha ya ban d+ha ya/

163a1: bi d+ha ya hU~M phaT// oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra tad ni// ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra kro d+hi ma la ni// hUM hUM/ gr-i gr-i g+h+raM/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha gan dgas ni// hUM hUM gr-i gr-I/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ri pa hA/ krod+ha
163a2: shwa ri ma hA sa ho/ / ka la da rin ti ba y-i// hod tod/ oM barba badz+ra d+har ma hrI b+hi d+hi shwa ri ma hA la si hU~M/ oM sarba badz+ra d+har ma hI k+Sha d+ha shwa ri ma le r+d+ha na hU~M/ oM sarba bad+ha d+ha ra d+ha ra ma hA kr-i dz+nyA ga ton d+hu hi haM/ oMs rba badz+rA d+har men+d+haHr+b+hi
163a3: shwa ri ni ri ti ke hUM/ / oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha ma hA kar shi na/ dza dza hUM hUM dza/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra ba sha hUM hUM hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha/ ban d+he ban d+he/ ban d+ha ya ban d+ha ya/ hUM baM// oM sarba
163a4: tathA ga tA badz+rAd+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha ba she/ / hUM hUM hUM/ u0f85u0f85ho// oM hUM tra~M hri ta/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' la 'gro ba thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA b
163a5: adz+ra d+ha ra/ / oM badz+ra kro d+ha g+h+ri ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha Ta ki ni// ma hA he ma ba ti ba hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ku ma ri ri ye hUM phaT// oM badz+ra Ta ki ni d+hi sha mA ra ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni/ ma hA badz+ra musti ni/ bid+ya bi d+ya/ sum b+ha ni sum b+ha na
163a6: hUM phaT/ oM sarba Ta ki ni ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha ra li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha tsakra ni/ tshon d+ha tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni/ ma hA mi thod pa ti kaM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni sa mya kro d+ha shA ri hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma
163a7: hA badz+ra d+ha na te hUM phaT/ / oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA ma ri ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA a mri ta ka ba li ha ste hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni/ ma hA saM mya kro d+hi shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni mri du dan da ri hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni badz+ra
163a8: bri ge li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni bi ba bi ba ru ti ra ma ma hA badz+ra ba li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA badz+ra pa sha ba ba sha k+Sha hUM phaT// oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA badz+ra sha ni bi pe hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki na~M/ ma hA badz+ra bi she hUM phaT/

163b1: oM badz+ra Ta ki ni/ a na ya a na ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni/ ma hA badz+ra be ka ni gu gu ma ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni badz+ra dza la ya/ basmi ku ru hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA badz+ra mi ka to hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA badz+ra taste hUM
163b2: phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA badz+ra ka li pra be sha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA su maM sa sha ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA ka ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA ka ra sha ni mi ta ka la mu ki hUM dza dza hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ya bi sha ni hUM phaT
163b3: khro bo spyi'i bsten pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ / oM ba hUM bi bi ta ro// dra sa na ti ta/ yi ni shaM she/ sarba bi dan ya/ sarba ta thA ga tA dza le dza le/ pra dza le pra dza le/ gur bi gur bi// k+Sha ma sa rba ma pa pra ni/ b+h+yo hU~M nAM/ oM ru lu ru lu d+hAr+dz+dza
163b4: bsnyen pa'i grangs brgya dang stong dang 'bum mo/ / bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las gsang ba'i khro bo'i bsnyen pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka rol pa rdo rje khro bo'i
163b5: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // khro bo rdo rje mgyogs pa'i dbu lnga bcu rtsa gcig/ phyag brgya rtsa gnyis pa phyung ste// oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA ban te/ baM paM phaT/
163b6: oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA do sha na sa ye hUM phaT/ a a/ oM badz+ra ma hA rak+Sha sa ma sa ru te/ ra ma ti/ da pri ya/ ma hA kum pa ka ru na// hUM hUM hUM hUM/ kA oM badz+ra ma hA rak+Sha/ a ga da ta ya thab ga ya pra be sha ya/ sarba badz+rag la/ bshin
163b7: band/ hUM hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+rad// ben d+ha ya banA d+hA ya/ sha ya/ bi ga ya/ be baM sha na sarba nA/ hUM hUM phaT/ e badz+ra ma hA ra shas/ bi na da ya/ band ya/ sarba madz+nyA pa~M wi tAnan/ d+ha sha gri ba hU~M phaT/ de nas bcom
163b8: rdza das kun tu bzang po nyi ca ka'i sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku deng gsung da dathugs rdo rna las byung ngo // sdug nag sngon ga/ hUM trArmA nA nA nI hUM hrIr+m+ma d+hU hUMn+dan+dan+da n+dan+da trA rmA/

164a1: na san// sa nanas / ma sa sa su su yu sa sa la sa yu yu
164a2: phaT/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ zhal re re nas hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra mang po phyung bas/ khro bo 'bum du gcig tu pU da ste/ hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra mang po 'byin cing /
164a3: 'jig rten gyi khams rus gcig tu gad bar gyur te/ dregs pa thams cad brgyal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa dang // mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ ma dang mkha' 'gro
164a4: ma 'bum chos kyi dbyings nas bzhengs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // ma mo 'bum gyi rgyal mo dbyings nas bzhengs// khyod ni ye shes lha mo 'bum gyi gtso// zhing lpags rlon pas
164a5: sa gzhi 'gengs mdzad ma/ zhing chen rlon pa gzhi ral pa can gzig lpags rlon pa stong gi sku smad klubs// sbrul nag 'bum gyis yan lag rgyan du sgril// thod rnon thod skam thod tshal mgur chu dpung rgyan sa
164a6: ral kha/ khyed kyi rdo rje the'u gsheg g.yas pa las/ ye shes lha mo tshigs na brgya yang 'tsher/ khyod kyi rdo rje the'u gsheg g.yon pa la/ las byed lha mo brgyad bcu gnas// nyid zhing rgya mtsho gting nas bzhugs pa'i tshe/
164a7: bu rgyal 'bras gyis bkris shing mchod pa 'bul// mtshan zhing ri rab rtse la bzhugs pa'i tshe// gnod sbyin bu mo khyed kyi pho nyar gtong / bdud kyi bu mo khol zhing nga rgyal drag tu gnon// gshed ma don du gnyer zhing dgra sti
164a8: tshal bar 'gams/ gsur chen dud pas 'jig rten ma lus 'gengs/ sha chen rol rngam zhing dpal chen zhal du stob/ rang yang za zhing grogs la bdar bar byed// ma dang mkha' 'gro dbyings nas bskul bskyod la/

164b1: las la 'khril zhing chos kyi dbyings su brtan/ mkha' 'gro za byed mgyogs ma gshog pa can// mkha' 'gro 'jug byed yid 'phrog num can/ mkha' 'gro rngam pa'i zhal gdangs mche ba can// mkha' 'gro 'byung //
164b2: ba'i don pa'i sder mo can/ mkha' 'gro khams gas mdzum pa'i mchu rings ma/ mkha' 'gro drag gsum za byed 'bar ba'i sgra// las kyi mkha' la 'gro ba'i shugs can ma// don gyis mkha' la 'gro ba'i ye shes yum/
164b3: de nas mkha' 'gro ma brgyad dpal chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis las byed par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan dpal he ru ka'i rol pa ma dang mkha' 'gro ma de rnams dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor brtse gcig ma'i ting nge 'dzin
164b4: du mdzad do/ / 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum la skyes pa'i bdud bag chags kyis mtshams sbyar te// bdud ra tra nag po sems can dang rnal 'byor pa la 'tshe zhing gnod par byed pa za bar byed pa de la bcom ldan
164b5: 'das he ru ka'i rol pas pho nya'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // til mar sna tshogs kyis lus bslus pa'i rdo rje mche ba can dang / nag mo mi thod thogs pa'i rdo rje phreng ba
164b6: can dang / rnal 'byor ye shes rdo rje dam tshig ma dang / mgo bi cod pan legs spras rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang / lag na mtshon thogs pa'i rdo rje phreng ma dang / dgra bgegs dbang du sdud pa'i rdo rje g.yul zlog ma dang / sprul
164b7: gyi ske rags 'ching zhing lag na mdurang zung ral gri thogs ma dang / zhing lpags rked pas dkris shing khrag gis myos ma dang / mig rtsa dmar por gyur pa'i rdo rje 'khrug ma dang / mtshan mo dur khrod du rgyu ba'i 'byungs
164b8: sgrol ba dang / ke rlon smad dkris thod pa se ral khar thogs ma dang // mi ro rgyu mtshems kyis 'dren pa'i rdo rje zab mo dang / khrag gi thig les brgyan pa'i rdo rje dri tshor ma dang / zhing chud 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'khrug ma dang /

165a1: rdo rje zhag gi tshom bu can chen mo dang / rdo rje mi ro shal che mche ma za ba'i rdo rje mche ba 'dzin ma dang / drag po 'dral ba'i rdo rje drag mo chen mo dang / ma mo klag par byed pa'i khams gsum dbang du sdud ma/
165a2: dang / zhing la skam par byed pa'i rdo rje kha T+wAM ga dang / nag mo lus mdog gnag pa'i rdo rje me stag 'phro ba mo dang / zas su khrag tshil za ba'i rdo rje srin mo dang / kun la dbang mdzad rdo rje pad ma 'dzin pa dang / zas su sha rlon
165a3: za ba'i rdo rje rnga mo dang / e ma mchogs rdo rje za byed ma dang // dpal ldan chen po rdo rje ljang lo can ma dang / kha nas rdo rje me 'bar rgya mtsho skams ma dang // lag na bdud rtsi rdo rje 'dzin ma dang / nag mo mig gcig rdo rje lcags/
165a4: klu 'dzin ma dang / sbal gyi zhags pa thogs pa'i rdo rje gshog pa can dang / lcags kyi bya khra khyung gi g.yu mig can dang / thal ba'i mtshan mas rdo rje 'byung ma dang / rdo rje ral gcig chen mo bya byed ma dang / rdo rje tri shUl
165a5: thogs pa'i zhag gi tshem du can dang / 'tsham dam drag shul spyod pa'i rdo rje sgrol ma dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rdo rje bdud 'dul mo dang / rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje gzugs can ma dang / cir yang 'gyur/
165a6: ba'i rdo rje rdzu 'phrul can dang / khro gnyer spyan bgrang rnal 'byor sngo nag chen mo dang / mche ba gtsigs pa'i ral pa 'khyil ma dang / thod pa rlon pa'i rdo rje mun tsa la dag dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje mi lpags g.yang
165a7: gzhi gsol pa dang / stir chung ngu mang po brgyus nas brgyan te rdo rje brjid ma dang / 'tsham dam brkyang bskum rdo rje 'jig rten skrag ma dang / bdud bzhi gnon pa'i rdo rje ban dar ldan pa dang / stir chen tho snying 'dren pa'i
165a8: rdorje khrag 'thung ma dang 'jigs su rung ba'i rngubs pa'i rde'u chung thogs pa'i rdo rje rkan sgra can dang / log par lta ba'i rdo rje bdun rnams 'dul ba dang / rol rnam pa'i rdo rje zab mo dang / gsod cing skyong ba'i rnal 'byor/

165b1: sngo nag ma dang / khro gnyer spyan bgrang rdo rje mche gtsigs ma dang / 'tsham dam chen mo mdzad pa'i tri shUl mda' 'phen rdo rje 'gengs ma dang / dgyes par byed pa'i rdo rje se gol rdebs ma dang / 'gugs par byed bI
165b2: rdo rje rnal 'byor dmar nag 'jigs pa'i sku dang / sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yum chen mo dang / rnal 'byor chen mo dur khrod bdag mo dang / 'tsham dam gar mkhan chen mo rdo rje stabs tshul can dang / rnal 'byor
165b3: 'thing nag rdo rje stir chen zab mo dang / bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i rdo rje gdug pa glad 'gems ma dang // gsod pa'i las la dgyes pa'i khro mo rdo rje sdang ma dang / khro gnyer 'jigs pa'i dbu gcig phyag drug ma dang // rdo
165b4: tri shU la rde'u 'dzin pa'i rdo rje rkan sgra rdebs ma dang / 'ching zhing snyom pa'i rnal 'byor ser nag dang / gtum mo zhe sdang stir chen zab mo dang / zhing chen nang grol 'byin cing rdo rje 'cham dam can dang / sgrol bar byed pa'i/
165b5: rdo rje 'thing nag dang / spyan bgrang mche gtsigs rdo rje chen mo dang / sgyid 'dren pa'i rdo rje khrag 'thung zhal du stobs ma dang / spu gris 'debs pa'i rdo rje ban dang ldan ma dang / zangs gris 'debs shang kha T+wAM 'ben pa'i
165b6: rdo rje sha za mo dang / ro la skam pa'i rdo rje za stangs chen mo dang / rdo rje ser nag seng ge mgo can dang / mche gtsigs spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i rdo rje sdang mig can dang / mtsha tshogs mang pos bskor ba'i rdo rje zhe
165b7: sdang 'joms ma dang / 'thing nag rdo rjes dge ral pa can dang / rdo rje ye shes sku'i cha lugs 'chad mdang / mi 'jigs ste ra'i g.yang bzhi gsol ma dang // srog chags mang po'i snying 'byin rdo rje klar 'gems ma dang /
165b8: dmar mo chen mo ster mgo can dang / ye shes lnga'i rdo rje cha lugs 'chang ma dang / mi 'jigs bzhi'i g.yang gzhi se ral khar thogs ma dang / bka' ba las mi 'da' thugs dam skor zhing las mdza ma/

166a1: dang / ba nad rag ta sa bkang nas gtso la stobs shing dgra sdang klad 'gems ma dang / gsod byed sngo nag dur bya'i mgo can dang / mche tshogs 'khor du bskor zhing 'dod chags 'joms pa'i rdo rje zab
166a2: mo dang / thal chen rag tas rdo rje sku la brgyan ma dang / spu gri mgo gcod pand 'thung zhing gsod la dga' ba mo dang / rdo rje zhags pa 'ching zhir khrag mthung zhal du stob pa dang // 'thing nag 'gying stabs rdo rje
166a3: shwa na khyi mgo can dang / glo snying 'dren pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin ma dang // phrag dog 'joms par byed pa'i rdo rje za ba dang / dmar nag 'gying pa'i bya rgod mgo can dang / zhing chen rgyu 'dren gti mug 'joms
166a4: par byed ma dang / gshog tshogs mang pos bskor ba'i thod rlon 'dzin ma dang / ser nag 'gying pa'i pho rog mgo can dang / klu rnams 'dum par byed pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'chang mdang / mthing nag
166a5: 'gyid pa bya rog mgo can dang / ser nag gsod par byed pa'i mgo can dang / sha khrag za ba'i mkha' 'gro dbu gsum ma dang // lcags kyus 'dren pa mi 'jigs sbyor ba dang // rdo rje bka'i
166a6: pho nya spyan gsum mche ba can dang / rdo rje phran mo gtum bag can dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang / snying rje phag gi mgo can dang / rdo rje sbrul gyi mgo can dang // rdo rje gzig gi
166a7: mgo can dang / rdo rje byi ba'i mgo can dang / rdo rje pha bang mgo can dang / rdo rje dred kyi mgo can dang / rdo rje dom gyi mgo can dang / rdo rje sdig pa'i mgo can dang / rdo rje wa'i mgo can dang / rdo rje stag
166a8: gi mgo can dang / rdo rje rta'i mgo can dang / rdo rje spyang ku'i mgo can dang / rdo rje bu ba shud kyi mgo can dang / rdo rje sha ba'i mgo can dang / rdo rje sbyin gyi mgo can dang / rdo rje phag gi mgo can dang / rdo rje

166b1: rnga mo'i mgo can dang / rdo rje bya rog mgo can dang / rdo rje spang ti'i mgo can dang / rdo rje ske ka'i mgo can dang / rdo rje khra'i mgo can dang / rdo rje spre'u mgo can dang / rdo rje khu byug mgo can dang / rdo rje seng ge'i mgo
166b2: can dang / rdo rje pha bang gi mgo can dang / rdo rje sha ba'i mgo can dang / rdo rje srin bya'i mgo can dang / rdo rje sre mo mgo can dang / rdo rje zer mo mgo can dang / rdo rje dmag pa thang gog gi mgo can dang / rdo rje nyi ma'i
166b3: zhags pa can dang / rdo rje me lce glog phreng 'dzin dang / rdo rje srin mo mdud thung 'phen pa dang / rdo rje ral gri sgra 'byin ma dang / rdo rje klu mo thogs 'bebs mo dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed pa lang gi snga dang / rdo rje
166b4: gnod sbyin khyur gdong ma dang / rdo rje lag na khrag thogs ma dang / rdo rje zla ba skar mda' ltar gtong ba dang // rdo rje dam tshig bsrung ma dpal phreng ma dang / rdo rje lag na phur bu 'dril ma dang / rdo rje ri rab
166b5: bsnyil ba'i rngam stangs can dang / rdo rje dmar mo spyan gsum shin du mi srun ma dang / rdo rje cing yang 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul can che mo dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i 'gyogs ma dang / rdo rje sdug nag gtibs
166b6: pa'i me dpal can dang / rdo rje keng rus 'cha' ba'i tshems rnon ma dang / rdo rje bzhad ma'i shin du gad rgyangs chen po dang // rdo rje nang grol 'dren ma kad ka'i mgo can dang / rdo rje sgra 'byin 'brug sgrogs ma dang /
166b7: rdo rje bdud rtsi rin chen cha 'bebs ma dang / rdo rje shugs 'chang rdo rje sgrol ma dang / rdo rje dbang mo rdo rje sder mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sham pa spu gri'i rnon po'i so can dang / rdo rje go cha sra bar byed pa dang / rdo rje
166b8: sprin tshogs mang po bsdud par byed pa dang / rdo rje 'ur 'ur shig shig g.yo bar byed pa dang / rdo rje rkan sgra rdebs pa'i drag shul can chen mo dang / rdo rje za bar byed pa'i phaT phaT/ sgrogs ma dang / rdo rje

167a1: brkyang bkrum gshin rje gnon ma dang / rdo rje zhing chen khrag 'dzag thod rlon sku la brgyan pa dang / rdo rje drag po'i nga ro 'byin pa'i gdong gsum ma dang // rdo rje yud tsam 'dul phyogs bcur 'phro ma dang / rdo rjes
167a2: ge'i skabs su mchod pa'i nga rgyal can dang / rdo rje sprul pa mang po 'gyed pa'i bya khwa khyi skyigs can dang / rdo rje stir gnas nyul bya wa khyi skyigs can dang / rdo rje dam tshig gi tshogs nyal ma bya khra khyi snyigs can dang / rdo rje/
167a3: phyi nang 'tshams nyul ma bya khwa khyi skyigs can dang / rdo rje dam tshig gi rjes gcod ma bya khra khyi skyigs can dang / rdo rje dbya'i sbyor nyulam bya khra khyi skyigs can dang / rdo rje 'dod chags ma bya khra khyi skyigs can dang /
167a4: rdo rje dur khrod ro za 'dul ba'i bya khra khyi skyigs can dang / rdo rje dmar mo bkrags la dbang sdud ma dang / rdo rje ser mo sbrul gyi ske rags can dang / rdo rje gnam lcags 'ur mo thog 'bebs ma dang / rdo rje brgyal
167a5: byed sngangs par byed ma dang / rdo rje bsdams pas srin mo brgyal bar byed ma dang // rdo rje kha nas mi khrag rta khrag 'dzag ma dang / rdo rje dbu stong phyag stong bdud kyi dpung rnams 'dul bar byed ma dang /
167a6: rdo rje 'bum phrag yangs pa'i mkha' 'gro chen mo dang / rdo rje ral pa spyi gtsug 'khyil ma dang / rdo rje ral pa sku yis rol pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bar ma dang / rdo rje gsung gi sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed ma dang / rdo rje thugs kyi sgyu
167a7: 'phrul mda' ma chen mo dang / / rdo rje thugs kyi sku 'phrul dbang phyug ma dang / de rje gi chen pa'i bang phyug ma dang / de je bde mo dbang phyug ma dang / rdo rje dbyings la sbyor zhing stan byed ma dang / rdo rje mgyogs ma dbu dgu ma dang / rdo rje sgra 'byin ma dang / rdo rje che
167a8: ma dang / / rdo rje myong ma dang / rdo rje reg byed kun la 'khyams dang / rdo rje dmar nag dbu gsum ma dang / rdo rje sngon ga ral ba can chen mo dang / rdo rje ljang nag dbu brgya ma dang / rdo rje ljang sngo dbu drug ma dang / rdo rje ba lang gi

167b1: mgo can ma dang / rdo rje seng nag dbu bcwa lnga ma dang / rdo rje smag nag dbu brgya ma dang / rdo rje ljang ser khro gtu ba dbu dgu ma dang / rdo rje ser mo dbu gcig ma dang / rdo rje dkar mo dbu lda ma dang / rdo rje nag mo dbu gsum ma dang / rdo rje
167b2: bsgoms ma bya khra khyi skyigs can dang / rdo rje ser mo bya khri khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje dungar khrod kyi bdag mo bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje gtun khung ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje mda' bsnyag ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang /
167b3: ngo rje sul byed ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje rlung 'byin ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje brjod byed ma bya khwa skyug can dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed ma bya khri khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje bdud rtsi sbyor ma bya wa khyi skyeg
167b4: can dang / rdo rje 'phrog ma brlag byed ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje rmongs byed ma bya khra khyi skyig can dang / rdo rje yid 'phrog ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje khrag 'jom sa ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje tshe 'jom
167b5: ma bya khra khri smyig can dang / rdo rje thugs byed pa bya khro khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje srin mo snyid zan ma byo khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje sbrul ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje 'bebs ma bya wa khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje dpal bdag mo
167b6: byakhra khyi smyig can da/ rdo rje rkan 'jib ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje gnas ma mgyogs byed ma bya khri khyi skyig can dang / rdo rje sgrub pa che 'dzin ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje thod rlon dang sbrul nag 'khyil ba can
167b7: dang / rdo rje zhing chen stod g.yogs chu srin smad g.yogs can dang / rdo rje za byed kha 'bar ma dang / rdo rje nam mkha' lding dang / rdo rje khri dang 'ug pa dang / rdo rje bya rgod chen mo dang / rdo rje yan lag dang / rdo rje gang ga'i lus
167b8: la chu srin gyi mgo can dang / rdo rje gshog pa gtams pa dang / rdo rje sder mo lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje mchu rtse gcig ma'i gdong can ma dang / rdo rje so gri can dang / rdo rje kha gdangs ma dang / rdo rje kar ma mu dkar

168a1: dang / rdo rje 'jigs par byed pa'i gzugs can dang // rdo rje sdigs bu'i mgo can dang // rdo rje za'i mgo can dang / rdo rje yid las byung ba'i mdun pa mo dang / rdo rje myos pa mo dang / rdo rje drab mo dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang /
168a2: rdo rje byed pa dang / rdo rje dad pa mo dang / rdo rje kha spu can dang / rdo rje ral gyi spu can dang / rdo rje lcags kyi lpags pa can dang / rdo rje zangs kyi kha spu can dang / rdo rje ka li bi ka'i dbyangs can dang / rdo rje dbang sbyin ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje
168a3: dgyes pa chen po'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sgyu 'phrul gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje chen du 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshogs dang /
168a4: rdo rje rab tu gtog pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gsang ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gzugs kyi tshogs dang / rdo rje sgra'i tshogs dang / rdo rje dri'i tshigs dang / rdo rje ro'i tshags dang / rdo rje reg gi tshogs dang / rdo rje khro mo'i tshigs dang / rdo rje
168a5: gos gyon pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bza' gtung gi tshogs dang / rdo rje bro gar gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje lha mo'i tshigs dang / rdo rje klu mo'i tshigs dang / rdo rje dbye bar byed ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje pad mo
168a6: phreng ba ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bdeb mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sprin bsdung ma'i tshegs// rdo rje dgyes pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje mnyam pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje nye zla'i 'od kyi tshogs dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i tshegs dang /
168a7: rdorje yid bzhin gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje mchog phran 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje zhing 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rjed rgyal can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje thim par byed pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ngo mtshar chen po'i tshogs dang /
168a8: rdo rje 'khor lo ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje pad mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje mnyam par rdzogs pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bka' nyan sprul pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje dngos grub las kyi tshogs dang / rdo

168b1: spyod pas ci la'ang thogs pa med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rigs su thabs mkhas pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'od 'phro bar 'i tshogs dang / rdo rje chags pa med pa'i tshul du gnas pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa'i/
168b2: chags dang / rdo rje rigs su skyes pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ma stag phra mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sems ma ye shes su snang ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje snyoms las med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje spyir lug
168b3: med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rje tshom med par bsgrubs pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gsang ba mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rnam par spros pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rgyan po/
168b4: pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bstan pa mo'i tshigs dang / rdo rje nam mkha' la rgyab mo'i tshigs dang / snying rje skyon dag pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje phyogs 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gdul ba mo'i dgongs pa'i tshogs dang /
168b5: rdorje rten pa mo'i tshogs dang // rdo rje tshigs mtshon pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gab pa mo'i tshigs dang / rdo rje sbas pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje thugs 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'byung ba mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje shes ra
168b6: 'dzin pa mo'i tshigs dang / rdo rje bde ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje thugs kyi ye shes 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje drang snang mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rang 'byung mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje kun du mang ba'i
168b7: tshogs dang / rdo rje shes rab kyi mig dang ldan pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje kun bzang longs spyod gnas pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje mongs par byed pa mo'i tshigs dang / rdo rje srog za bar byed pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje za mo'i
168b8: tshigs dang / rdo rje khrag za ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje tshil za ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rkang za ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bsod nams gter 'chang ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i tshogs dang // rdo rje

169a1: sgra mtha' yas pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje yon tan phrin las kyis tshogs dang / rdo rje lhun gyis grub pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sprul pa 'byung ba mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rgyu las 'byung ba mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gtum bag/
169a2: can dang // rdo rje gdug pa gtong de bsgral gyi chun pa can dang / rdo rje 'jigs pa'i mgo brgyad pa dang / rdo rje mgo sna tshogs par sprul pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje lus stong la mgo bcu pa dang / rdo rje lus brgya la mgo gcig pa'i chos
169a3: dang / rdo rje lu sa sna tshogs dang / rdo rje yan lag 'bum yod pa dang / rdo rje gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs thogs la dang / rdo rje lung sa rgyal mgo stong yod pa dang / rdo rje lus brgyal mgo brgya pa dang // rdo rje lus bcu la mgo gcig
169a4: pa dang / ma go ba rgya pa la rkang pa brgyad pa dang / mgo dgu pa la rkang pa gcig pa dang / de'i 'khor gyi yang sbal gyi pho ta ni lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum po dang / long brgya baspel ba dang / nag po mgo dgu ba'o// shar gyi dkar mo spyad dung gi
169a5: khyi mo chen mo dang / lho'i sbrul gyi zhags pa can dang / nub kyi dmar mo zangs kyi mche ba can dang / byang gi rnar mo dril bu can dang / 'di rnams kyi pho nya mo ni shar gyi rdo rje sder mo dang / lho'i nag mo dung gdub ma dang / nub kyi dmar mo
169a6: seng ge'i mgo can dang / byang gi ser mo las kyi bdag mo dang / rdo rje rus chen phres can dang / rdo rje zangs kyi phreng ba can dang / rdo rje lcags kyi phreng ba can dang / rdo rje ral gri so can dang / rdo rje na mkha'i dgu bcod ma dang / rdo rje/
169a7: nyi ma'i zer zhon ma dang / rdo rje chu bo'i gzhung 'dal ma dang / rdo rje rgya mtsho'i gting dkrug ma dang / 'di rnams kyi sku mdog ni sna tshogs pa'o// phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs pa'o// drag byed bdag pos sgrol bar byed pa'o/
169a8: de na sa ba com ldan 'das dpal he ru kas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las pho nya'i las 'di gsungs so// oM hUM pho nya sum brgya drug bcu rnams/ yud tsam gyis ni kun 'dul zhing / yud tsam gyis ni phyogs bcur 'phro

169b1: hUM dang pan gyi sna sgrogs shing / bskal pa'i thubs chen po lngar/ mgo gsum po la lcags sder can/ me sha za zhing bdud dpung 'joms// bltas pas bdud rnams chag byed cing / klu ye khyim rnams rab tu
169b2: 'joms/ / rab tu mi srin 'di dag ni// 'ad yang dpal gyi po nya ste/ las rnams thams cad grub par gyis/ mtshan dang dpe byad gnyis las 'phros// mgyogs pa mgyogs ma'i pheM nya ra ldan gro ga 'grum
169b3: dang 'dra bar grags/ chos nyid khyab pas mtshan ma dbyings su sdung // ye shes thugs rjes 'brel bas kun la khyab// phrin las rlabs 'gro ba chags kyis grol/ de phyir lha mo rin chen dra ba ma// oM dz+wa la badz+ra
169b4: hUM/ ye shes glog 'grus mtshan ma dbyings su gcod// skad cig thugs rjes 'khor ba dbye bsal byed/ phrin las glog 'grus 'gro ba yud kyis sgrol// drabs sdud la glog 'gyu ma yi sa la dren/ badz+ra a
169b5: ma ka hUM/ 'od zer dung ka 'phro ba ni/ hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing / bskal pa'i 'brug sgra chen po bzhin// kun kyang mgyogs ma rlung dang mtshungs// mig gsum yol lcags sder can/ mgo gsum po la
169b6: rkang gsum pa/ mang du za zhing bdud khyim 'joms// bltas pa sa bdud rnams tshig byed cing // klu yi gnas kyang nges par 'joms// 'di rnams khro bo'i pho nya ste/ ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing // gang gis
169b7: rlung phyogs song ba yi/ khro bo thams cad nges par 'jig/ na mo byi tsir b+h+yo/ ha ha ra lu ru lu b+h+yo mgo brgyad po la rkang brgyad po// lag pa brgyad la mig kyang brgyad// lag pa brgya da ni rdo rje 'dzin/ rta
169b8: mgrin gnas kyang nges par 'joms/ / mgo drug po la rkang du ga po// lag pa drug ni chu drug gcod// rkang pa gsum ni phur bu 'dril// g.yon pa gsum ni gtor ma sbyin/ gang na sa ga dra 'gro ba'i

170a1: che/ / rkang pa lcags phur rab tu drag/ 'od zer rung kas reg pa ni// tshangs pa'i gnas kyang rab tu 'jig/ lag pa g.yon pas bskyod pa ni// 'phra men 'khor bcas ral bar 'bar// lcags kyus dgra sta rab
170a2: thogs shing / / zhing chen yan lag 'dzin pa 'phro// byang gi phyogs nas 'byung ba ni// lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum po// lcags kyi lus la nyi ma'i mig/ spu ni lcags kyu bsregs pa 'dra// bad ni klog pas des pra
170a3: mgyogs/ / skad ni 'brug pas shin tu che// rab tu mi srun 'di dag ni// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang 'phrog/ mgo dgu po la rkang gcig po// lus kyang gnag la 'od phung gnag/ yan lag gnag la sbrul gyis brgyan
170a4: ral pa gnag cing mche ba gnag/ mig kyang gnag la lag nag po// mgyogs kyang rlung gis bskyod du med// 'di dag po nya'i mchog yin pas// las rnams thams cad grub par gyis// long ba brgya
170a5: sbrel phyi ma nang / / mang so za zhing ri lu sgrol// mig kyang med la cang mi smra// yangan lag pa sbrel te 'gro// 'di yang khro bo'i pho nya ste// las rnams thams cad grub par byed// shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa
170a6: ni/ dung gi khyi mo chen mo la// dung gi ba lang sna khrid can// dung gi mi mo chen mo zhon// lag na lcags kyu 'bar ba thogs// lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// lcags kyi khri stang rkang gsum pa// lcags kyi
170a7: spyang mo mgo dgul/ / lcags kyi mi mo chen mo zhon// lag na zhags pa sgril ma thogs// nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// zangs kyi khyim mo chen mo la// zangs kyi mi mo chen mo zhon// lag na lcags sgrogs
170a8: sgrol ma thogs/ / byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// gser gyi khyi mo chen mo la// gser gyi mi mo chen mo zhon// lag na rdo rje phur bu 'dri// 'di yang dpal gyi pho nya ste// las rnams thams cad grub par gyis// de nas

170b1: bcom ldan 'das dpal he rugaka po nya bsrubs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ / dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dbus su 'khor lo brtsibs bzhi la// dbus su bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i rol pa// sla bdon
170b2: 'bring nag dbu sum brgya phyag drug brgya pa zhig dgod/ shar du rdo rje til mar dgod// lhor stag gi mgo can dgod// nub tu g.yag gi mgo can dgod// byang du sbrul gyi mgo can dgod// de'i phyi rim pad ma la brgya rtsa brgyad
170b3: rim pa gsum la po nya sum brgya bcu dgod do/ / de'i phyi rim snam bul po nya lnga bcu rtsa brgyad dgod do// de'i phyi rim snam bu la yang sbrul gyi pho nya dgod do// de'i phyi rim sgo ba bzhi/ bo nya las byed bzhi dgod do// ci bgyi dang
170b4: bka' tan dang / bka'i bo nya dang / sprul pa dang / yang sprul pa dang / 'di rnams yang dag pa'i bden du nges par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gsang ba he ru ka'i rol pa las rdo rje pho nya'i le'u
170b5: ste lnga pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las he ru ka'i las kyi bzlas pa 'di gsungs shing phyung ngo // bdag med gnyis pa rtogs sgrib pa gnyis spangs pa/ thugs je
170b6: sprul pas 'gro ba ma las sgrol/ / yul med ma skyes byams pa'i chos dbyings las// 'dzin pa mi rtog snying rje zhen chags khro// gnyis med dag las phrin las snying rje snyoms// dpal chen khrag 'thur khyod la byas
170b7: 'tshal lo/ / rtog 'joms spyod pa 'thun pas 'gro 'dul zhing // brda can yan lag len pa'i don go la// lha rgyud brjod pas dngos grub kun dang 'brel// bka' don gtan tshigs rigs pas brjod par 'os// zhes
170b8: bya ba'i don to/ / lung gsum man ngag gsum dang spyi don gsum/ lung gi spyi gcod man ngag gdeng du bya// spyi khog bcu bzhis don gyi khog phu ba la// bzhi bcom drug ldan rtsis mgos sa bcad de// khro bo rtog/

171a1: bamatshan ma'i mnyer kyis bshad// 'dini khrag 'thung rngom brjid rgyal po'i lung // zhes tshig kyang zhing mdor 'dus la don mang por 'byung bas mda' sde zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das dpa' rdo rje sems dpang /
171a2: bka' stsal ba/ lung gsum gyis sna grangs te rde'u bya'o// man ngag gsum gyis 'jug pa sdus te blo la bzhag pa'i don to// spyi don gsum gyis lung thams cad kyi spyi gcad do// spyi khog bcu bzhi don gyi khog dbub
171a3: po/ / bdud bzhi bcom pas yon tan kun la snang ba'i che ba bcom mo// rtsis mgo drug gisas bcad do// bre bo rtog pa mtshan ma'i gnyer gyis bshad pas ni gol sa dang ni sgrib pa spang ngo // yon tan kun nom pas brjid
171a4: gzhan la snang phyir rngom brjid chen po sum bcu rtsa drug bstan to/ / rgyal po yin pa'i rtags ni rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal por gsol lo// lus kyis spyi dril de bshad do// de ltar rnam pa bcur des nas/ de ni phye byad ngo/
171a5: bstan te gses nas bshad pa// de la lung gsum ni zhi gnas mi rtog dngos po mkha' khyab 'dra// lhag mthong ma rmongs gza' skar mkha' la bkram// gdod bcas don dang bstun te 'tsham par bshad// ting nge 'dzin shre
171a6: rab bka' lung gsum du des/ / de la man ngag gsum ni bdag tu mi rtog sprul pa mdzod nas thong // yul du ma grub gzhan med mdzad du gshegs// yul sems gnyis med ma skyes dbyings sa gcig/ nyan thos rang
171a7: rgyal sems com spyod man dag/ de la spyi dron gsum ni/ med rgyu btag chags sgrub 'grub bltas par snad// spyod mthun khro drag gdug pa'i dpal sos 'dul// tog 'joms sman rdzas dngos len dngos grub rgyu/
171a8: 'di ni khro bo spyi yi don du bshad// de la spyi khog bcu bzhi ni/ gang khro gang la ci phyir gang gis khri// gang khro rnam pa bzhir ni shes bya ste// dang khro shugs khro bar bcas dang bcos/ rtogs pa thugs rje rang bzhin

171b1: 'dul ba'i dbang / gdal snying rjes khros te yul dang gnas las dang 'bras bu sems can sgrub pa'o// las bzhi sgrol mdzad 'bras bu sku gsung thugs// ci phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis la ni// dus gsum mi yod sha rus//
171b2: khrag la rol// gang gi ri ni hUM dang ha he phaT// gnas ni lhag 'og mkha' stong ye shes phugs// bskyed thabs cho 'phrul gsum po khro ba'i sku// 'bras bu dpal chen 'bra men tshegs kyis bskor// 'apra man las drag 'gro ba/
171b3: bcis 'dul mdzad// de la bdud bzhin gzhom pa ni// tshad dam drag pos lha chen 'dar 'gyel brdzis// brtul zhugs rol pas gdos bcas phung po bshig/ dus gsum brlag phyir sha rus khrag la za rnam shes
171b4: 'chi med rgyal ba'i gnas su stobs/ / rtsis mgo drug ni dbang dang rab tu ldan pa dang // dpal dang gzugs dang grags pa dang // ye shes dang ni nan tan dang // drug dang yang dag ldan phyir ro// de la dbang ni chags
171b5: sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog ni/ / mnyes stobs yum dang 'jigs tshul sku yi sprul// dran med thod pa kham por g.yang gzhi ni// kha dang rgyal mtshan che dang lha chen gnon// de la dpal drug ni/ byams las bya/
171b6: pa thugs dam dmigs kyis bsgral// thugs rjes 'gro thams cad bu ltar dgongs// smon lam dbang gis 'khor bar ji srid bzhugs// gzhan don mdzad pas bdag don lhun gyis grub// yongs su rdzogs pa
171b7: bde ba chen po'i dpal/ / khro rgyal khrag 'thung dpal te rnam drug yin// de la dpal yongs su rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i dpal ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa bzhi ste/ de yang gang zhe na/ sku gsum sa gsum sems dpa'
171b8: rtogs dka' ba/ bka' khya ba sprin bdal char 'bab chu bo'i rgun// ting 'dzin pas ma yas bo d+his thogs pa de// bas ma yas bsam khyab mkha' la gza' skar gsal// klu mthu gdul phyir klu lngas sku brgyan pa//

172a1: mang chen gsung sgra dbyangs dang pho nya'i dbang / dub lngas gdos bcas 'du byed rgyan byas pa/ khrag sbrul g.yang gzhi khA ta dregs pa 'joms// de la gzugs rnams pa gnyis ni// mi thung bus pa'i
172a2: gzugs 'dral/ a gon la ni rkang lag gtams/ drang srong khros pa'i cha byad la/ shin du mkhrar zhing skems pags bri/ gnod sbyin snying pags mi mthun gzugs dang ni/ 'dul dbang yid dgas srin po drang srong 'dra//
172a3: de la grags pa ni bud d+ha bo d+his bstod dam sras spun dgongs/ gti mug gzengs bstod nga rgyal gnon par grags/ de la ye shes ni/ rnam dag dbyings mkhyen 'khor ba'i skyon dang bral/ 'gro ba'i rgyud mkhyen 'asngo
172a4: ba'i mtha' las 'das/ gnyis su med par mkhyen pas dbu ma'i dang / mdor na thams cad pa yi ye shes yin/ de la nan tan ni/ nan tan snying po zag med zag bcas 'du/ nan tan phrin las 'gro ba gnas nas
172a5: 'don/ bsam yas nan tan 'gro ba chung mi gson/ nan tan mchog gi mchog tu shes par bya/ da ni lung rnam pa gsum spyir dril te bshad do// de yang mi 'da' brgyan gyi lung dang / che mchog yon tan
172a6: gyi lung dang / yan lag rtags kyi lung gis bshad do// de la mi 'da' ba rgyan gyis lung ni/ grang chen 'dul stobs theg pa'i rgyan zhes pa/ bdud 'joms smad rdzas grub dang lta ba'i gzhung / stag ni dpa' rkun pa byed
172a7: byin zhes pa/ ye ge bzugs rje'i phrin las dang du bstan/ sbrul ni gtan+da lcag phrin las rgyan zhes pa// 'jigs tshul drug gnon 'khril ba yum gyi rgyan/ thod phreng dbang sgrol 'chang ba'i rgyan zhes pa/
172a8: sku gsum theg gsum dus gsum dbang chad sgrol/ g.yang gzhi tshul khrims gos kyi rgyan zhes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims gos shes bya/ rag tu thugs rje chags pa'i rgyan zhes pa/

172b1: mi rtogs dbyings nas thugs rje spyan/ gzi chen don dam bcud kyi rgyan zhes pa// bcud kyi thig le don dam kun tu 'ong / thal ba 'dul byed phrin las rgyan zhes pa/ yi ge 'khor los mtshan mtha' bar rlog/ me ni
172b2: 'bar 'phro 'dra sreg glong dkyil zhes/ ye shes thugs rje dbyings 'dul zin las te/ zad par byed pa'i mtha' 'das dkyil zhes bya/ me sgra sgra chen tha dad sgra zhes pa/ chos sku khyab dang ting 'dzin sna tshogs pa/
172b3: ral pa kha ma nag sbrel zhing phye ma mi// de nas tshe nyid dbang drag sprul pa 'phro/ sku mdog 'thing nag nam mkha'i rgyan zhes bya/ 'dul dbang mtha' med yon tan dgongs pa gting mi dpogs shes bya'o// de la khrag 'thung
172b4: zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gong du bshad par zad go/ / de la dpal he ri'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan cir yang ma nges par 'byung ste gang ltar bsgyur yang 'grub po zhes bshad do// de yang mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang / de la
172b5: dngos byung phyag rgya rnams/ ngas pa med par dpal pos bshad/ mkhas pas bsgoms la ci dgar 'grub ces 'byung ngo // 'on yang 'di'i gnas skabs su/ he ru ka dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir dgrang
172b6: de/ de yang yan lag rtags kyi lung gi sa bshad na/ grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang / mdzad pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang gnyis so// de la grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya ni/ dbu gsum dug gsum sku gsung thugs ldan
172b7: grab/ lta spyod rnam gsum grub pa'i rtags/ spyan dgus gsum sku gsum ye shes gsum ste dgu/ bgrod med thob med dmigs pa las 'das pa/ rtag chad spyan gnyis mtha' yangs dbu ma'i stan/ shas
172b8: gsum sreg la mnga' mdzad ting 'dzin gsum/ de bzhin nyid du kun du snang zhes bya/ sgra chen tha dad sgra chen chos sku ting 'dzin snyan// zhal gsum rnam thar sgo gsum lhun gyis grub// sngags gsum theg gsum

173a1: mthar phyin shes bya'i rtags/ / mche bzhi brin las mthar phyin zhi ba'i tshul/ ye shes drug ni mthar phyin phyag drug ste/ pha rol phyin drug mthar phyin phyag mtshan drug/ zhabs bzhi lam bzhir brgad
173a2: pa med pa thob/ de la mdzad pa rtags shes bya ba ni/ spyan dgus dgu 'dul ba'i bye brag gzigs// spyan gsum mid/ sum ma rtsod so sor mkhyen// gdas gsum nas byud sprul pas stong gsum 'gengs// snyan drug
173a3: 'gro drug gnas nas ci gsol gas na/ / dbu gsum srid gsum mgon mdzad sku gsung thugs/ zhal gsum dbyings su dug gsum zad par rngub/ ljags gsum theg gsum bstan pa'i gdangs dang
173a4: sgrogs/ khams gsum nyug byed rdo rje srin mo lce// mche ba zhin+de shi rtsa nas gcod par mdzad/ phyag drug rgyud drug 'khor ba gting nas 'don// phyag mtshan pha rol phyin drug 'gro don mdzad// zhabs bzhir phrin la
173a5: rnam bzhi bgrod med sgrol/ / yan lag rtags kyi lung gis 'di ltar yang dag brgyan/ rdo rje ye shes pha rol phyin pa ni// rang bzhin mi 'gyur las ni 'bigs shing 'joms// chos su rdo rje rtog dang bag chags
173a6: bsreg/ ye shes yin phyir de la de skad bya// band bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa ni/ chos dbyings spros med ye shes bzhi dang ldan// ye shes dbyings rtogs zhen khrag thugs rje skye/ mtha' gnyis skyon la mi
173a7: bsngags bzod pa'i mchog/ kha T+wAM stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa ni// dug gsum dga' byed dregs pa'i lha bdud 'joms// stang gsum srid pa yo 'dul rgyal po'i rtags/ kun la mnga' mdzad 'khor rnams
173a8: dbang du bsdud/ / zhing chen smon lam pha rol phyin pa ni// 'bod pa'i g.yab mos 'khor rnams dbang du bsdud/ sbyin pa'i thabs mkha' 'gro tshim par byed// rdeg pa'i dbyig pas gdon bcas phung po

173b1: bshig/ rtag bachos nyid dran med shes lnga bzung // ci ltar smon cing grub pas de skad bya// thod gshol thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa ni// nyon mongs tha ba thugs rjes zlog mdzad cing / ye shes chos dbyings mahA
173b2: dang bral ba'i brtags/ / thabs kyis sku gsum lhun gyis sprul pa 'phro// badz+ra ni shes rab pha rol phyin bstan pa// yul med ma skyes chos skra rnga sgol/ 'dzin pa bdag med rig pa'i dbyu gus brdungs//
173b3: gsung rab rnga sgras 'gro ba shes rab skyed// 'khor lo bsam gtan lhag pI gsum gyi mtshan// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rapo gsum dang ldan/ pad ma 'dam skyes ma chags thugs rjes spyod// tshul khrim
173b4: pha rol phyin pa'i dang du bstan/ mi zad par ldan sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// ral gri ye shes thugs rje mtha' gnyis gcod/ rtse gcig ting 'dzin gnyis las brtson 'grus mdzad/ dgra sta zhags pa las la sogs phyag
173b5: mtshan rnams/ rang gnyer las kyi brda' gtsam chos su rtogs par bstan de la 'di man chad che mchog yon tan gyi lung gis spyir dril de bshad pa ni/ yon tan gyi brjid la phyin las kyi rngom sum bcu rtsa drug brtan
173b6: ba ni de la sku'i rngom pa bzhi la nam mkha'i ri mo phyag rgyar rngom/ cir yang 'gyur bzhi bzhugs tshul rngom/ zil gyis gnon pa'i gang na rngom/ tsham ngam chen po'i stobs rngam pa dang bzhi'o// de yang kun rdzob dang
173b7: bzhin me pal nam mkha' la sprin dang ba'i tshul dang / lha dang 'phags pa tshangs pa dang / smon lam cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs thabs kyi tshul dang / srid pa'i 'khor lo zil gyis gnon pa dri med pad ma nyid zla
173b8: 'od yon tan rtags de gdan khri'i tshul dang / stobs chen bcu'i tshul dang / rnam pa ni 'og nas chad do// gsung gi rngom bzhi la hom na lnga 'brel bar 'byung ba'i zhal rngom/ zla gam cir yang 'gyur ba'i ljags

174a1: bab/ / jom/ skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i choms rngom/ gsung sbra 'brug star rdzogs pa'i dbyang sa rngom pa'o// de yang zhal ye shes kyi phyag sa nam pa lnga'i bsreg khang du ronam palngas tshol zhing mchod pa 'brel ba rnam lang
174a2: tshul dang / gsung dbyangs tshul 'dus byas dang / rang bzhin zung ma 'dres par ston pa'i tshul dang / mche ba bzhi ye shes bzhi'i 'phro 'dus drug bzhi ye shes bzhis gcod pa'i tshul dang / 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i yan
174a3: lag drug bcu'i dbyangs kyis snyan pa'i mdo sdes go bar sgrogs shing zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang rnam par bshad do/ / thugs kyi rngom pa bzhi la ting nge 'dzin phyag rgya'i rgyan gyi skar tshogs ltar rngom/ phyin las
174a4: rgya mtsho rgyan gyi dba' rlabs ltar rngom/ yon tan sa bzhi rgyan gyi rtsi shing ltar rngom/ mdzad pa rol mo rgyan gyi gar thabs ltar rngom pa'o// de yang rgya chen po bzhi ni rang bzhin dang rgyan du dbye'o// lhag mthong gi rang
174a5: bzhin las lhag mthong gi rgyan ma g.yos por snang ba'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin la zhiganas kyi rgyan khyad par du 'byung ba'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin la zhi gnas kyi rgyan khyad par du 'byung bal
174a6: tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin bzod pa las lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis phan 'dogs pa'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin mi zad ma gol ba las lhag mthong gi rgyun gyis cir yang 'gyur ba'i dga' ba skyed
174a7: pa'i tshul lo/ / mthu'i rngom pa bzhi la ru dra bcos pa'i gnas jom// lha chen gnon pa'i gdan jom/ khams gsum sgrol ba'i zhing rngom/ rtogs 'joms spyod pa'i brtul zhugs rngom/ de yang gnas khyad par
174a8: can bkra shis shing cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i tshul dang / gnas khyad par can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang / zhing khyad par can khams gsum yo sgrol ba'i tshul dang / spyod pa khyad par can srid pa'i rtog/

174b1: pa drus gcig du bcom pa'i tshul lo// rngo ma tshul sum bcu rtsa gnyis bshad do// de la brjid chen po la/ sku che yan lag rags pas brjid che/ grangs mang rkyen dang 'tsham pas brjid che/ bkur pos gtso bor mthong bas
174b2: brjid che/ khyad zhugs yid dang 'thong bas brjid che ba ste bzhi'o// de yang chos su dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sku che/ thugs rje dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sprul rags/ sems 'du byed dang mnyam par
174b3: 'byung ba'i sgo nas sprul ba grangs mang / smon lam gyi sgo nas rigs dang 'thun pa'i rkyen du 'tsham/ spyod lam gyi sgo nas bkur bar 'os/ rigs btsun pa'i sgo nas gtso bor mthong / rang bzhin grub pa'i sgo nas
174b4: khyar zhugs/ phrin las kyi sgo nas yid dang mthong / gsung gi brjid bzhi la gdangs che stong gsum gong bas brjid che/ tshig myur the tshom gcod pas brjid che/ bdag la cher ston snyam pas brjid che/ khyad zhugs
174b5: yon tan mthong bas brjid che de yang chos skus khyab pa'i sgo nas sgra che/ sgra tha dad pa'i sgo nas stong gsum gang / sgra dbyangs sgo nas kun gyis go bas mya ra/ nye bar bsgyur ba'i sgo nas the tshom gcod/ byams
174b6: pa'i sgo nas bdag la gzigs/ thugs rje'i sgo nas nyi cher ston/ shes pa'i bye brag gi sgo nas khyad zhugs/ tshig gi yon tan gyi sgo nas 'dul/ thugs kyi brjid bzhi la/ yangs pa re dogs med par brjid
174b7: gsal ba mtha' gnyis spangs pas brjid che/ thugs rje thugs dam mthar 'byin pas brjid che/ marmongs thabs kyis 'dul bas brjid che'o// de yang gnyis med pa'i sgo nas yangs/ spang blang med pa'i
174b8: sgo nas re dogs med/ lhag mthong gi sgo nas dbu mar gsal/ zhi gnas kyi sgo nas mi 'gyur bas gnyis mtha' spangs/ mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sgo nas thugs rje che/ 'khor ba ci srid bzhugs pa'i sgo nas

175a1: zugs dam mthar 'byin/ shes rab kyi sgo nas rmongs pa sel/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams thabs kyis 'dul/ yon tan gyi brjed bzhi la/ med pa zad mi shes pas brjid che/ gcig la 'dod dgur ston pas brjid
175a2: che/ gnod sbyor phan par 'dod pas brjid che/ thabs mkhas skyon gyis mi gos brjid che'o// de yang bdag tu mi mdzin pa'i sgo nas med/ med pa'i sgo nas zad mi shes/ ye shes kyi sgo nas gcig/ sems kyi
175a3: sgo nas 'dod dgur ston/ / sems kyi sgo nas gnod par sbyor// grub pa rgyu'i sgo nas phan par mdzad/ shes bya'i sgo nas thabs mkhas/ spyod pa'i sgo nas skyon gyis mgos/ phrin las kyi brjid bzhi la/ mi mnyal
175a4: nyam phag rol pas brjid che/ 'khor ba yin rings mi mnyel bar brjid che/ mgon skyabs rgyun du mdzad pas brjid che/ dgongs pa'i don rnams mdzad pas brjid che'o// de yang sgyu mar gyur pa'i sgo nas mi mnyel
175a5: rang bzhin gcig pa'i sgo nas phag tu rol/ spyod pa'i sgo nas 'khor bar yun ring por bzhugs/ bya ba ched pa'i sgo nas mi bsnyel/ mthu yi sgo nas mgon skyabs che/ dam bcas pa'i sgo nas 'gro don rkun
175a6: du mdzad/ rtse cig gi sgo nas mtha' gnyis kyi skyon dgongs// nan tan gyi sgo nas bya ba grub/ brjid nyi shu dang sgo bzhi bcu ste spyir drug bcu'o// // de la rin po che sna bdun ni 'khor lo rin po che'i dbang
175a7: bcus skye ba bzhi la dbang bskur ro/ / btsun mo rin po ches ni yul gyi rgyal po la mnyes par dbul lo// dmag mi rin po che'i tshul dgus pha rol gyi dpung 'joms so// khyim bdag rin po che'i tshad med pa bzhi
175a8: rgyal po'i chab srid 'dzin to/ / glang po rin po che'i stobs bcus pha rol bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed do// rta rin po che myur mgyogs rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis bgrod pa'i gnas sleb par byed do// yid

175b1: bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni rnam bzhi'i sgo nas sems can gyi re 'dod skong ngo / / lung ba rnam pa gsum ni mi 'da' ba rgyan gyi lung la sogs pa gong du rtsis mgo spyir sbyar bar zad/ de nas 'khor lo rin po che'i dbang bcu
175b2: ni/ skye bzhi slar ston sde ba'i blol mdzad pa// lha mi sdig thul mche ba bzhin ston/ yo byad bring pa'i 'dod yon lnga dang ni/ rtog pa gzhon phyir sman lnga dang len ro'o// ci ltar mos bzhin 'dod dgu gzugs ston pa// ga
175b3: dbang 'thad dga'i tshul du rol pa mdzad/ rdzu 'phrul ba spu'i dbyings nas 'phra men 'gro// lus ni tsi rdza sems ni tshe 'phrul ston// gad rgyangs gdangs dar sgrogs pa ma tshogs kyis// mche bzing gnon pa dang chos rnams
175b4: ston/ / shes rab thabs ldan spyan gnyis dbu ma'i dang // dbyings las ma g.yos cir yang sa la mkhyen// sems kyi bye brag ting 'dzin tha dad 'phro// bsam gyis mi khyab bzhi la rol pa mdzad// rdo rje sder yo lpags
175b5: pa spu phred brgyan/ / 'khor ba ci srod bzhugs pa'i tshen la dab lta ba rnam bzhi spyan zur gyis bskul bas// 'phra men bzhi 'phro phyogs bzhir las bzhi mdzad// smon lam dbang gis drag po skur ston pa// dus mni
175b6: bskal pa bzhin du bshol du med/ / de la btsun mo rin po che'i dbang ni// ma chags rdo rje gzugs kyi yum gyis khyud// zhi ga nas ting nge 'dzin mi g.yo yum gyis sbyor// thogs med shugs 'chang don grub
175b7: yum gyis bskyod/ / lhag mthong ye shes yum gyis mnyes byed 'bebs// 'byung ba bzhi po rdo rje lha mo ste// bde ba chen po skul mnyes par dbul// dmag mi rin po che'i tshul dgu ni// bsgrogs pas 'gro
175b8: bshes rab bskyed pa'i tshul/ / nyam nga med pa'i mdzad spyod dpa' bo'i tshul// gdug rtsub gdos bcad brgyan pas 'jigs pa'i tshul// log par lta ba zhe gcod gshe ba'i tshul// rmad du byung ba'i chos sgrogs

176a1: u0f7f/ / bzhad pa'i tshul// shin du gdul bka' la khro stong rje'i tshul// smon lam dbang gis mi shom ngam pa'i tshul// nyon mongs grub pa'i bur mdzad do mtshar tshul// khro drag dbyings nas megaya zha ba'i tshul// de la
176a2: khyim bdag rin po che'i tshad med bzhi ni/ / tho ga tu mchad med byams par snang // bsod chen snying rje bdag nyid che// bskal zhing bstabs pa dga' ba'i mchog/ yal bar mi 'dor btang snyoms so// de la glang po na
176a3: po che'i stobs bcu ni/ / thugs rje chen po'i stobs ni dregs chen bsnyengs phyir gnon// chas nyid stobs ni mi dmigs nam mkha'i mdog/ mi 'byed stobs ni dngos grub bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ ma spangs stobs ni gad
176a4: bcas skul brgyan/ / ma g.yos stobs ni don mthun grol ba'i brgyan/ smon lam stobs ni bskal par yongs grol mdzad// sprul pa'i stobs ni mgo bstan 'gra men 'phro/ phrag dog log lta 'khor bar
176a5: gcig mi gtong / / 'dod chags yud tsam 'phral 'dod spyad bzlog dmar/ de la rta rin po che'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni chos dbyings med bzhin cing snang ba// mkha' la 'ja' tshon bzhin du rnam par
176a6: bkram/ / ye shes rdzu 'phrul chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa/ mkha' la nyi shar bzhin du gsal la stong/ tsho gas gnyis rdzogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bye brag ni// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sprin bung bzhin du bdal//
176a7: sprul pa'i bye brag 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phrul ni// rol gcig char 'babs snod bye brag phye// de la nor bu rin po che'i rang bzhin ni// 'gro rnams ci ltar 'dod pa'i re 'dod skong / mi zad bdag nyid gter chen nam
176a8: mkha'i mdog/ srid gsum mun nagasel ba'i ye shes sgron// dus gsum rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rin chen phreng / lung gsum ni brtsis mgo spyir sbyar ba yin no// da ni lha rgyun gyi rtog pa so sor bshad pa bya

176b1: 'gro rna mas ci ltar 'dul zhing gshegs mdzad pa/ shes rab nam mkha'i bskal pa dga' rgyud ston/ gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms mdzad pa/ gti mug rdo rje bud d+ha d+he ru ka/ ye shes rdo rjes nyon
176b2: mongs rdo rje 'joms/ thabs 'dzin mchod pa'i dngos po pashig/ zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad pa/ zhe sdang rdo rje badz+ra he ru ka/ rin chen dbyig ltar kun skong zhing / bdag med zhig nas chu yi bska
176b3: bas 'khra/ / nga rgyal tshul gyis dargyal 'joms mdzad pa/ ngargyal rdo rje rad na he ru ka/ 'khor ba'i 'dam du pad ltar su 'khrungs shing / lhag mthong me chen 'bang bas thams cad sreg/ 'dod chags tshul gyis ran//
176b4: chags 'joms mdzad pa/ 'dod chags rdo rje pad ma he ru ka/ phrin las rgya mtshos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i// shes bya thogs med bskal pa'i rlung gis spyod/ phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms mdzad pa/ phrag da
176b5: rdo rje karma he ru ka/ sku yi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing / shes rab mthar phyin gti mug rnam par dag/ phyag rgya gzugs kyi mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing / chos dbyings na mkha' dbang bskur khro mo rgyal//
176b6: thugs kyi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing / brtson 'grus mthar byin zhe sdang rnam par dag/ rtogs pa dag bya'i mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing // sra brtan rdo rje dbang bskur khro mo rgyal// gsung gi longs
176b7: spyod sna tshogs ma dmags shing / tshul khrims mthang byin 'dod chags rnam par dag/ gsung bsgral mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing / lcag mthong ye shes dbang bskur khra ma rgal// yon tan langs spyongs
176b8: tshogs mi dmigs shing / sbyin pas mthar phyen da rgyal rnam par dag/ ngang 'dzin bre mchog mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing / bdag med ni gnas dbang bskur khro ma rgyal/ phrin las longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs

177a1: shing bzod pas mtha' phyin phrag dog rnam par dag/ tshul khrims dri med mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing / thogs med las la dbang bskur khro bo rgyal// thugs mchog rnam dag ye shes dkar mo'i tshigs/
177a2: 'gugs mdzad ye shes lnga yi dbyug tocan/ dran pas rgyud lnga sgrol mdzad zhi bar gzigs/ srid gsum 'joms byed dbyug thogs go rim/ sku yi yon tan tshogs spyad rkun mo'i tshogs// mthu 'a brog
177a3: zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel/ bden gnyis lta bas khro tshul 'gro la gzigs/ dam tshig dbyings mchog skul byed tse'u rim/ gsung gis thams cad zil gnon rmongs pa'i tshogs// dbang mdzad mtha' gnyis mi yod
177a4: chu srin ni/ / mi gnas rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing mos par lta/ stong gsum dbang mdzad rgyal byed bra mo ha/ thal ba byed pas thal byed ma yi tshegs kun gyi dngos grub rdo rje rgya dgu 'dzin/ sa dgu rtog 'joms shi ba slong bar gzigs
177a5: 'jig rten thal byed rde'u thogs pa ta li/ 'byed med shes rab mi rtog spos mo'i tshogs// 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin 'ching zhing dbang 'dren las/ khro gar gzigs tshul rgyun gyi thugs rjes sgrol// bde mchog dbyings su
177a6: 'dren mdzad buka si/ zhe sdang tshul gyis don mdzad gtam ma'i tshogs/ mos mdzad dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pa'i/ thugs rjes dgrag cing ro ba'i tshul du gzigs/ sdod bcu da nga krugs nas skongs mdzad g+harma/
177a7: ri/ chags pa'i tshul gyis don mdzad sme sha can/ ma ni rgyud 'phel gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rtags/ mtha' gnyis spangs pas rnam par g.yengs tshul bzhugs/ 'bar bstod gsum stobs byed tsaN Da li/ thams cad
177a8: 'byung ba'i lhun 'gyur ma tshogs ma/ kun gyi las mdzad chos kun snying po 'dzin/ kun la rol pas gzigs tshul kun dang ldan/ thugs rje 'jig rten sgrol mdzad sme sha ni/ 'joms byed rtsal mchog rdo rje thugs kyi

177b1: yum/ mnyen po stobs kyis thams cad dazil gyis gnon// shes rab thabs ldan su gsum bdag bzhin don// thug bsngal ni sdang gsod byed sid rgyam/ dpa' bdun babyed ye shes thugs de'i las/ brtson 'ju
177b2: myur ba'i shugs 'chang 'gre don du/ thugs rje ye shes rtse gcig so sor gzigs/ nga rgyal 'chi bdag 'joms mdzad bya khram/ mdzes byed dam tshig na ma dag gsung gi yum/ thabs mkhas spyod pas bdag dang
177b3: gzhan don mdzad/ don gyi chos sku ting 'dzin ljags la gtang / 'dod chags dur khrod 'joms mdzad sri ka ma// mi ma byed spyod pas mchog rigs kyi yum/ g.yer ba'i phrin las 'gro la thugs rjes srung // chos
177b4: nyid sku la ye shes spyan gyis gzigs/ / phrag dog las grub za byed shA na ma/ yid kyi ye shes so so kun la rtog/ rnam shes kyis bsad gong 'brang tshul khrims srung / 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod rgyud 'dzin rgyu gri 'dzin
177b5: mgyogasams snyags byed khrag 'thud kyi gya ma/ rnam shes mnyam nyid yid 'gyogs mtshan ma 'joms// gsod pa'i god nams sbyin pas pha rol phyin/ mtha' 'das chos sku gzugs 'dzin spangs tshul
177b6: bzung / 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal che 'phog ka ka ma/ bslang bas mi 'gyur bkrus pas mi 'dog cing / mi mthun gnyen pos mi shigs bzod pa'i mchog/ chos sku brags su chud phyir zhal na thogs/ yon tan yid
177b7: bzhin bdag nyid kad ka ma/ dbyings la mi rtog 'gro la thugs rjes gzigs/ gnyis la mi gnas shes rab pha rol phyin/ dbyings kyi thugs rjes phrin las 'dus ma byas// mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i rngam
177b8: tshul ka/ bcu drug zhag gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ dpal chen bcu drugs la lhun gyis grub// bsod nams ye shes tsho gas gnyis rdzogs pa'i sku/ thog ma med cing yon tan zla ba med/ sbyin pas/

178a1: rigs pa'i klung du mtsho drang ltar/ 'khor bas 'jigs nas thugs rjes lcags kyus 'dren/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin don mdzad pa/ shugs rje shar mdzad rta gdong ljags kyu ma// don dang 'thun pas
178a2: kun kyang dga' bar mdzad/ byams pa'i zhags pa 'khor ba'i rgun 'dzin cing / rin chen phyag rgyas sems can re 'dod skong / yon tan tshogs rdzogs pag gdong zhags pam/ gzhan gyi don du spyad pas bdag gi don//
178a3: shes rab sgron mas mun pa'i sdug bsngal sel// don nyid mi 'da' dga' ba'i mchog/ kun gnyen ma rig mun mdzad nyi zla'i spyan/ gan par smra ba kun kyang dka' bani kyas tang snyoms thabs mkhas thugs rjes 'gro don
178a4: du/ / phab nas rnam shes thal ba'i gzugs kyang 'tsho/ chos ston bag chags byed mdzad dril 'khrol ma// de ni srin po'i lha rgyud bshad de// bcwa brgyad spyan gyis bcwa brgyad khams la gzigs/ bcwa brgyad shangs nas/
178a5: bcwa brgyad sbal pa 'byung / bcwa brgyad khams la bcwa brgyad skur ston cing / bcwa brgyad thugs kyis bcwa brgyad 'dul thabs mnga'/ bcwa brgyad snyan gyis bcwa brgyad khams gsan cing / bcwa brgyad ljags kyis
178a6: gsung rabs bcwa brgyad 'chang / brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dgongs pa bsam mi khyab/ sa dgur thugs rjes don mdzad dbu dgur ldan/ brjod gnon zhabs brgyad phyogs brgyad lha brgyad gnon// ci ltar rol yang spyan
178a7: dgur dbyings mi g.yo/ 'dul ba'i dbang du bskal pa'i tshul ston cing / rdo rje srin pos ci 'dul yid bzhin rdzogs/ rnam thar gsum las sku gsum phrin las 'byung / spyod pa rnam dag smon lam stobs kyis gshes/
178a8: rol pa sigs sprul pas 'gro don rtse gcig rol/ bcwa brgyad stong pas mnyes mdzad rtsa ting ma/ brjid pa'i stobs kyis klu rnams zil gnon cing / phra ma'i skyon spangs dag gi dbang phyug che/ babad po med pa'i brtson 'grus

178b1: shugs dang ldan/ / chos la dbang mdzad ha yA 'gri ba dpal/ 'dzin tshul stobs kyis drang srong tshar gnod cing / log lha'i nyes spangs yang dag lta dang ldan/ tshul khrims mthar phyin drang srong spyod pas che/ skyel dbang mdzad bran tshul
178b2: mi g.yo mgon/ shugs 'chang stobs kyis rlung lha tshar gcod cing // 'khyil ba'i spyod spangs dag gi dbang phyug che/ 'dod pi kun la sbyin mdzad rgyal po'i tshul/ sems la dbang mdzad 'dod pa'i khro bo rgyal/ 'ching ba'i stobs
178b3: kyis gnod sbyin zhabs kyis mnan/ ngag rtsub skyon spangs dag gi dbang phyug che/ smon lam mthar phyin bdud 'dul thugs rje'i rtse/ las la dbang mdzad bdud rtsi ku Na Da li// gnon pa'i stobs kyis 'byung po tshar
178b4: cod cing / gnod sems nyes spangs thugs kyi dbang phyug che/ gnyen po'i stobs kyis mi mthun gnon mdzad cing / rdzu 'phrul dbang mdzad 'jigs byed stobs po che/ rdeg pa'i stobs kyis srin po tshar gcod cing / bden
178b5: rang bral ba'i brdzun spangs smon sel ba/ mtshan ma'i thabs kyis mtshan ma 'dral mdzad pa/ ye shes dbang mdzad dbyug pa sngon po can / 'debs pa'i stobs kyis sa bdag tshar gcod cing / khan pa sems skyon spangs sras
178b6: kyi dbang phyug che/ / bzod pas gzhi lta bu gzhir 'gyur ba/ smon lam dbang mdzad 'dam skyes ku Na/ li/ zlog pa'i stobs kyis bdud rnams tshar gcod cing // 'dod chags skyon spangs su yi dbang phrag che/
178b7: ye shes mthar byin nyi zla'i 'od bzhin gsal/ skye bzhi mos pas dbang mdzad hUM ka ra/ rol pa'i stobs kyis lha rnams tshar gcod cing / ma byin len pa'i skyon spangs bdag nyid che// rab tu shes pa'i shes rab
178b8: mthar 'byin pa/ yo byad dbang mdzad gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal/ 'jigs byed stobs kyi 'chi bdag zil gdon cing / srog gcod nyes spangs sku yi dbang phyug che/ gzung 'dzin skyon spangs pasam gtan dpal

179a1: gnas/ chos dbang mdzad 'jigs byed gshin rjeg shed// ye shes thugs rjes zin pas mthar mi 'ching / thugs rjes zin bI srid las grol// gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar bsnyoms// 'dod pa'i rgyal
179a2: po mnyes mdzad pas te/ rigs pa'i sder chen chos kyi dbyings nyid 'dzin/ thugs rje lcags kyus 'khor ba mi gtong zhing / shes rab thabs kyis lcags kyus mtha' gnyis 'dzin/ gtso bo dbyug sngon mnyes mdzad dra ta ru/
179a3: ye shes mtshan sdud dathugs rje khrod 'byung zhing / sprul pas 'gro bsngal sa dang ye shes 'phro/ shes snying ma skyes dbu ma'i rig pa phye/ stan bstis khro rgyal gshin rje mnyes// dbyings su mtshan ma shes rab tho bas brgyan/
179a4: thugs rjes sems can phrin las mtshan ma 'joms/ dbu mar ye shes snying rje mi rtogs dang / mi g.yo mgon po mnyes mdzad mu ha la/ rdo rje gtum mo mtshan ma'i dngos po bcom/ thugs rje rngam tshul srid pa
179a5: thal bar brlag/ gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar bsdigs/ ha ya 'gri ba mnyes mdzad tsaN+Da Da li// phra mor 'bigs pa'i ye shes dbyings su 'phen/ 'bigs pa'i ye shes gnang du thugs rjes rdeg/
179a6: mkhyogs dbu ma chen po'i don ston pa// gzhan gyis mi thub mnyes byed sha ya ti/ mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings thos rig pa'i sgra/ dbyings nyid rig shes dbyings la nyan pa'i sgra/ de la bstan pa gsung gi sgra 'byin
179a7: ba/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ba sha sa ya tis mnyes/ bdag tog log lha'i mtshan ma kun bcom zhing / za byed mche bas skye bzhi rtsang bcad de/ klu dang ye shes ma skyes mi dmigs pa/ pad mo 'khyil ba mnyas
179a8: byed mar na/ thugs dam dbang gis rnam dag dbyings nas bskul/ thugs rjes shugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas 'dren/ gnyis med chos bsku' dbu ma'i dgyes pa stob/ ma ha ha la mnyes mdzad tsun dam/

179b1: bskyod pa'i ye shes sa rnams dus gcig gcod// thugs rje shugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas bsgral/ thabs dang shes rab bskyod pas mtha' gnyis spor/ ba ya ba tes khams gsum hU~M mdzad gnyis/ sdug
179b2: bsngal thugs rjes mi bzod phrin las dpa'/ yal bar mi 'dor brtson 'grus shugs kyis bstan/ gdod nas don mdzad 'khor ba mthar thug sgrol// de phyir dpa' brtul za byed bya khrim/ sdang mig mi
179b3: 'gyur thugs rjes de la gnon/ / mthu rtsal rngom brjid 'gyur med bdud dpung bzlog/ tsham dmar la bsigs gdangs dar 'jig rten 'gengs/ de phyir 'gyur med 'phra men tsa sa ra// rtog pa'i dgra spangs
179b4: drag pa'i dgon par gnas/ 'khrul skyon dri med shes bzhin rdzi mtshor spong / 'gro don dus la bab na thugs rjes 'jug/ de phyir 'jug par byed pa'i ha ri na/ tshes dbyings gnas mal rtog pa'i skyon sel zhi/
179b5: thugs rje spu ris sprul pa bas mi khyab/ dug gsum 'joms mdzad sha rus khrag la rol// sel byed sprul pas don mdzad d+ha ma/ yang dag zon chags 'gro don thabs mkhas ldan/ mi 'dul zir thub btang snyoms
179b6: chen por bzhugs dus la bab nas brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan/ de'i phyir mkhas brtson mdzad pa'i rtsal ma/ ye shes dbyings la 'jug pa shes bya za/ dbyings nyid shes la 'jug pa nyon mongs za/ gnyis
179b7: med ye shes 'byin las 'khor bza/ dpyir ze byed buka muka ba// rigs btsun gnyen por gyur pas thams cad 'dral// phrin las rtsal gyis bdud dpung thams cad 'joms// snong nyid ska bskas
179b8: mu stegs wa tshogs 'jig/ de phyir 'joms byed rtsa mchog sing ta ma/ dbying sa la ye shes nyal zhing thugs rje mi/ lcing nag nag po drag po su ston gzugs mchog na ma dag chos nyid dbyings su

180a1: mkhyen/ / de phyir rmi byed 'phra men rak+Sha ma/ ye shes thugs rje stobs kyis mtha' gnyis gnon/ tsham dam ral bsigs skul bas bdud dpung 'joms// las su ci mdzad brtson 'grus stobs kyis rol
180a2: dedabyir stobs ldan 'phra man ta kA ma/ lhag mthong chos dbyings zhig nas rlan gyis brgyal/ thugs rje 'khor bar smon lam stobs kyis mos// rtogs 'joms rdzas la gtsang sbra med par rol// de byar 'dra
180a3: men mos byed u ka ra/ yid g.yo las can sems par gyur pa ni/ ye shes dbang gis thugs rjes 'gro la g.yo// don mdzad god 'brang ye shes dbyings su mkhyen/ de phyir tshul khrims chen po kyi kye
180a4: ma/ / bsam pa'i dngos po 'dod la 'dun pa ni/ dbyings nyid mnyam nyid ye shes mkhyen pas za/ thugs rje 'dun pas 'khor ba bag chags sbyong / de phyir 'phra men za byed don ka ma/ dbyings la sems
180a5: 'dzin yid la byed par 'gyur/ ye shes dbyings rtogs drangs pa nyin mo ba nyal/ 'gro mdo sa rmongs la thugs rjes mtshan mo ldan/ ye shes thugs rjes drangs pa'i u lu ka/ brtags pa'i dngos
180a6: la rtse gcig ting 'dzin 'gyur/ mnyam nyid mtha' bral dbyings las mi g.yo ba/ rtog gi spyod yul byis pas mi mthong ba/ de phyir sleb byed 'phra men pa ya ta/ las 'bras bden la yid ches dang gyur
180a7: te/ mnyam nyid dbyings su ye shes thugs kyis mgyogs// zhi gnas spyan rdzi lhag mthong bgrod tshags chung / de phyir 'phra min mgyogs byed b+ha ga shi ti/ nges pa'i dngos la 'dzin pa'i mos pa grur
180a8: lhag mthong ye shes dbyings nyid mnyam 'gyur 'dzin/ zhi gnas gtses par 'dzin pa mi 'phrogs pa// de phyir 'phra men 'dzin ma tsa ta ma/ 'dris pa'i dngos po ma brjed dran par gyur

180b1: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med ma brjed dran/ ting 'dzin 'bum phrag lhag mthong so sor gsal/ gnyis la ma rmongs zim ma ti ti la/ chos rnams 'byed pa'i byed par gyur pa ni/ mnyam nyid dang du log
180b2: lha sel byed cing / rig pa bskyed pas som nyi the tshom gcod// de phyir 'phra men gsod byed na ku la/ 'jug pa rang dbang med pa'i gnyid gyur pa/ bstan pa'i chos spogs log lha mos byed cing / mnyam
180b3: dang mi mthun log lha mos byed phyir/ thams cad mo byed pra mna'u shi ka/ gsum 'dus gcod pa'i reg pa gyur pa ni/ phrin las bye brag mang po ci mdzad cing / phyag rgya bzhi po ma skyes dbyings su
180b4: bros/ de phyir 'phra men 'bros byed ka si ka/ 'khor ba'i rdo rje brjod pas mya ngan 'das// chos sku rdo rje brjod pas mtha' gnyis spangs/ rjod byed brjod bral don gyi tshig dang bral/ de phyir rjod byed badz+ra ba
180b5: sha ma/ chos nyid rdo rje mtshan ma'i dngos po bshig/ ye shes rdo rjes gzung 'dzin rtogs pa bsregs/ phyag mtshan rdo rjes dregs pa'i lha bdud bcom// de phyir 'joms byed badz+ra be ra be// 'chi med bdud rtsi yul sems skye
180b6: 'gag med/ grub pa'i bdud rtsi bsam pa'i 'bras bu thob/ thugs rjes 'gro bdud rtsi gtong bla med bsgrub/ rtsi mchog ye shes badz+ra a mri ta/ ye shes 'phrog byed yon tan rgya mtsho bsgrub/ thugs rjes 'phrog byed
180b7: 'jig rten dbang du bsdud/ ye shes thugs rjes gnyis med dbang du 'ug de phyir brlag byed badz+ra ma ran// da ni pad ma dbang chen dang / dbang phyug ma lha rgyud brjod par bya'o// bco lnga sbyin gyis rgyud lnga'i mi dge
180b8: bcu/ ye shes lnga dang so so cis 'dul mkhyen// snyan bcus mi dge bcu yi sdug bsngal gsan/ shangs lnga nas byung rigs lnga'i sprul 'phros pas// rgyud lnga'i mgon mdzad brtson ldan rta dbus dug lnga zhal du shA

181a1: chu ba mdzad cing / ljags lnga the tshom gcod phyir theg lnga 'chang/ skye ba zhe las bzhis sgrol mdzad shog bzhis bsgrub/ bcu drug dmyal khams bcu drug phyag gi 'dren phyogs brgyad 'dral phyir zhabs
181a2: brgyad khro brgyad bcom/ / rigs bzhi snod bcud nyi zla 'od dang brdzis// phyogs bzhi rtsal drug dbang phyug yang ches mnan// che ba che ba yang che bla na med/ bcu drug zhag gis zla dkyil rdzogs pa lte/ tshogs gnyis
181a3: rdzogs pas bcu drug bzhugs/ / phyogs bzhi dbu lngar 'bar ltar rigs lnga'i dbu/ mkhyen pa'i ye shes thugs rjes gzigs// tshogs chen yongasu rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / dbang chen yongs su 'dus pa'i
181a4: dkyil 'khor dang / tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs ye shes lhun grub pa/ dkyil 'khor gsum gyis brjid pa'i khro bo rgyal/ thugs rje 'dam skyes spyod pa skyon mi gos/ mtha' gnyis dbang mdzad pad ma he ru ka/ rngam
181a5: pa'i tshul gyis srin mo gzugs 'dzin cing / thod rus gdug pa 'bum mar zas su za/ srid pa'i sems can chags pa'i snying khrag gsol// dbang drag las mdzad ma bu ra kA si/ sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das
181a6: rtogs tshangs pa'i gzugs/ / tshad med bzhi rdzogs rtogs kyi dbu bzhir ldan/ zhabs bzhir smra 'don gling bzhi bkra shis brjod/ gti mug yid bzhin ni chen pra ma ti/ thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs rig
181a7: mchog ma/ ma rig dug gsum 'joms mdzad dpal che bsnams/ bud med chags tshul dbang mdzad bka' zlog ma/ chags pa'i skyon bral ta chen re'u tri ma/ thams cad sgyu ma bzhin du rtogs mkhyen ma//
181a8: 'brel ba'i thugs rjes sems can kun la gtogs/ phran las rgya mtsho sgrol ba'i bzhed chen can/ 'khor ba'i rgyud gcod drag mo bo sdug/ 'ang byed mi rtag dril bu'i sku ltar mkhyen/ rtag par gzhon tshul 'khor brda

181b1: srid bzhugs/ nyon mongs thab 'bebs pa'i mdung thung 'phel// gzhon tshul chags pas dbang mdzad go 'u ri// rdo rje las mdzad kun gyi bla na med// lha yi rgyal srid chos la dbang bsgyur zhing // mtshon sbyin brgya mdzad mi
181b2: dmigs su dkar mdog/ bsod byed rdo rje 'bibs byed in tra ma// byams dang thugs rjes dbang mdzad sra mdog dmar// ba nad snod yangs bcud kyi zag mtshol// dam pa'i zhal du drug gsum za byad ma// sdug bsngal
181b3: dbyings su spyongs mdzad bi ka lam/ / sems can gdul thabs khra bo mchog tu mkhyen// mun sel sngon 'bar bdud kyi nad gsos mdzad// 'dam skyes pad ltar 'khor bar spu 'khrungs kyang / chags pa'i skyon bral
181b4: dbang mdzad a mri ta/ / zhi ba'i las na bsod pa'i mchog tu mkhyen// zla ltar yon tan cha shes mthar phyin sku// gdung ba'i nad sel 'jig rten sgrol mdzad cing // gtan mchog thams cad stobs byed se'u mya la/
181b5: dbyug pa 'tshogs pa 'dra ba gzhan med mkhyen// thabs kyis ma rmongs phrin las ljang ku'i mdog/ nan dbang drag shul 'tshogs pa'i dbyug to bsnams// dregs byed sbyinas 'joms mdzad de na ha ma// log par
181b6: b+ha ba 'jigs byed spyan gyi mchog/ skye ba 'phrog med ste rgyun khrag mtsho gsol// las mdzad chags pa gser gyi rkang tshangs can// drag mo rngam tshul glog 'gyu rak+Sha sau// phreng ba rgan gyi nang na mchog tu mdzes//
181b7: snying rje rgyun skad pasu zhags pa yis// chags mad zhing du khams gsum kun 'dren ma// rgyun gyis thugs rjes sgrol mdzad pag k+Sha si// 'tshog par byug pas 'chang ba'i mchog tu mkhyen// gtun bus gdug
181b8: ba ma lus 'joms mdzad ma/ / yon tan mi zad nor gyi gter mdzin ma// stong gsum nor gyis rgyas mdzad ral gri ma// ra ro 'dra bar dpa' bo gzhan med mkhyen// chos rnams gnyis med don rtags rtag tu myos/

182a1: nyon mongs tha ba bzlog pa'i gshol bsnams shing // dge ba'i lo tog skyed mdzad ru ti ram// brten pa tsam gyis gzhan pham dpa' bo mchog/ ma lus gsod byed las la 'jug mdzad cing /
182a2: bsnyengs pa mi mnga' 'gro don gcig pu spyod// gsor byed 'dra mdzad e kar tsa ma// bud med chags pas 'gro ba dbang du byed// thams cad ma lus mgu byed dge ba'i las// 'dod lha'i mda' 'phen srid gsum
182a3: yid 'phrog ma/ / thugs rjes zhen pa'i mno ha ra ma// khrag las zas gzhan med par rtogs mkhyen cing // gdon rnams bsgyur ba'i las mdzad sgo gtong can/ mi zad nor gyis gter ldan bum pa 'dzin// sdug bsngal re
182a4: skod thag thug si ti ka/ reg bya'i sems ni rlung gi khams te mchog/ srid gsum dbugs kyi srog sbyin cho 'phel ma/ bder gshegs ras rgyus sems can sgrol mdzad cing // khams gsum gnas nas skyon mdzad
182a5: pa ya be/ / snyigs ma lnga ldan lnga brgya'i tha ma la// sred gsum 'khor ba'i sems can gdul dka' ba/ gsang ba nyid la las kyis 'dul bar mdzad// sdug bsngal dbyings su gsol mdzad ma ra na/ gzi brjid
182a6: can de me yi khams te mchog/ 'bar ba mchog gis gdug pa ma lus bsregs// za byed bskal pa dus mtha'i tshul ston pa// lhag mthong ye shes 'bar 'phro a ga ne ye/ mche ba dag pas skye bzhi rtsad
182a7: gcod bzhugs/ / nyan thos tha ba zlog mdzad phag gi dbu/ 'og gi phyogs nas srid gsum stobs kyis spor/ skye bzhi rtsad gcod za byed pa ra ti/ 'chi bdag thams cad gnas nas ma 'phos mkhyen// thams
182a8: cad gsod byed dam nyams 'chi bdag mdzad/ / dam tshig bsrung ba'i 'chi bdag zlog mdzad cing // lung gi dur khrod dbang mdzad dza mun ti// 'jigs las lhags pa'i grags na gzhan med mkhyen// stong phrag

182b1: brgyad bcu grangs la mnga' mdzad cing / / sna chen glang sna bdud rtsi 'ge'u wang mthong // sdug bsngal nad ga sos mdzad pa'i pu ta ma// chu las lhag pa'i nor ni gzhan med mkhyen/ nor gyi tshogs rnams ma lus 'brog mdzad
182b2: cing / gdug pa 'dul phyir dug gtor sbrul zhags bsnams// zhi gnas ting 'dzin dbang sdud ba run// 'gro ba'i don mdzad mi 'gyur sku mdog gnag/ sred gsum 'joms mdzad tri shul gdengs po bsdams// thugs
182b3: rje shugs kyis 'dren mdzad lcags kyu bsnams/ / 'khor bar thugs rjes shar ba'i ka ma la/ chags pa'i thugs rjes don mdzad ram go can/ byams pa'i zhags pa 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin cing / gang la cis 'dul
182b4: de la des ston pa/ / yon tan tshogs rdzogs re skong tsa ka la ma// ston pa'i bka' dang rang gi dam btsas gnyis// ma 'da' ma grub rab tu brtan par bzhugs// dam tshig sgrog gis sems can 'dul mdzad cing // ma
182b5: rig nub mdzad ku ma ba ka rnam/ / sku gsum yon tan phrin las mtha' klas pa// stong pa'i sgras bskul 'gro ba'i rgyud la 'bebs// so so'i skad du chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa/ ma chags byed mdzad las bo d+ha ram//
182b6: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rel pa las bzlas pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las thabs dang shes rab kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi
182b7: dbang 'di bka' stsal to/ / dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su pad ma 'dab ma brgyad/ pad ma'i lte ba la rag ta'i maN+DaDa la byas te/ dbus su badz+ra he ru ka/ shar du bud d+ha he ru ka/ lhor rad na he ruka/
182b8: nub tu pad ma he ru ka khyA du drug tshangs pa ni khro mo dbang phyug ma bzhi// de'i phyi rim snam bu la go'u rim brgyad// de'i phyi rim pa sid ha ma brgyad/ sgo bzhi dang sgo khyud dang bcas pa/ zhing gi rgyal mtshan/ ras

183a1: chen gyi 'phan gdugs/ tsi ta'i thog med sa'i bra re/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems yum gyi sku lag snyems te/ yum kun du bzang mos rang gi
183a2: mtha' la byang chub kyi sems blangs te/ nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor rnams dbang bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // byang chub sems nyid sgom pa'i dbang //
183a3: dbyings dang dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ sems nyid rtogs pa'i thig btab ste/ de ru slob ma bsur bar bya/ chos rnams thams cad brtag par dka'// brjod pa'i tha snyad kun las 'das/ da ltar sa
