183a4: gsum gnon pa ni/ sems can nang na ma yin te/ sangs rgyas mis ni bgrub thag nye/ byang chub sems de'i don rtogs nas/ 'bras bu yang dag mngon du 'tshar// de las kyang ni ma gtogs pa/ de las
183a5: sangs rgyas gzhan na med/ sems nyid dngos po de las med/ bstan cing yang ni rtogs par dka'/ bsgom pa'i dngos gzhi'ang de las med/ sems kyis brtag par dka' na yang / tshig gis 'di yin
183a6: bstan dka' zhes/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid 'di/ de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ bo d+hi tsi ti hUM/ phyi yi tshul du rtogs 'gyur na/ sems la srid pa thams cad chub par 'gyur/ nang gi tshul du rtogs
183a7: 'gyur na/ sems la sku gsung thugs kyang 'khrugs par gnas// gsang ba'i tshul du snang ba thams cad ni/ yum chen kun du bzang mo zhes kyang ba/ sems ni snang ba shar ba'i ye shes yin// gnyis su med
183a8: bar rtogs na chos kyi su/ / byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bsrung ngo ro// badz+ral tsi ta hUM/ mngon pa'i sangs rgyas che ba yum tshan kun tug da ga som sa/ sa sa / ga zus pas/ byang chub

183b1: sems nyid bde ba chen po yin/ chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas bde ba chen po ni// yum dang sems nyid gnyis su med pa yin/ rdo rje sems ni ye nas mi 'gyur te/ skye 'gag med pa'i sems nyid don yin te/ sems
183b2: dpa' yin bdud bzhi med pa'i don/ kun du khyab cing bdal ba dpag tu med/ thams cad man dag la ni thams cad na 'ad/ chen rgya'i yar gsungs/ byin snod kyi 'jig rten togs 'gyur na/ 'byung ba lnga
183b3: las sangs rgyas gzhan na med/ nang ni bcud kyi 'jig rten rtogs 'gyur na/ sems las ma rtogs sangs rgyas gzhan na med/ byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// bsdu ba'i gnas su nges pa med
183b4: ces bya/ rang 'byung ye shes nyid kyang tshig gi mtha' las 'das// sems la dngos po med cing gzung du med/ gnas ni yum gyi b+ha ga ya ti ste/ rnam par mi tog chos nyid stong par gsal// byang chub sem
183b5: kyis ding 'dir dbang bskur ro/ / rig pa rnyed pa dag la shin du gsal/ byang chub sems kyi dngos gzhi ma gtogs pa/ sangs rgyas gzhan na med ces 'byung ba yang / mi rtog pa'i lta ba mi bslad pa'i
183b6: ye shes te/ mi gtong ba'i spyod pa ni 'gyur ba'i sems nyid yin/ mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig mi 'bral ba'i gzungs/ me g.yo ba'i chos nyid dbyings dag pas/ byang chub sems kyis ding 'dir dbang bskur
183b7: ro/ / mnyam par shes pa sangs rgyas kun gyi rje/ mtho ris srin mo na rag dmyal ba kun/ mnyam pa'i don dang rig pa gnyis med pas/ 'di dang phyi ma'i don du bsgom par bya/ byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir
183b8: dbang bskur ro/ / mdzod gsum ston pa sangs rgyas kun gyi rje/ phyi ma'i don du srid pa'i gnas 'gro bas/ nang gi tshul du gnas ni rtogs 'gyur na/ sku gsum lus ngag yid gsum gnas gyur na/ de

184a1: yang gsang ba'i gnas su rtogs par bya/ kun gzhi yid dang rnam shes yid dang gsum/ gsung ba'i mdzod gsum yin pas bskur bar bya/ de la sems kyi gzugs ni ci 'dra ga tsi ta'i dbyings nas dza/
184a2: ni mtshon gang 'phro// dkar ser snum la 'dril ba gcig tu gnas/ las 'phro len las gzhan ni len pa'i tshe/ sems ni rta dgugs nyid rgyu ba yi 'dus// mi chags mi 'khor ba yi don de ni/ 'od dang bcas pa
184a3: tshon gang gsal bar bsgom/ byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// rtag pa chen po rnam snang mdzad mi skrod pa ni sems kyi mchog/ bdag gi lus ni rtag pa ste/ bdag gi gsung ni 'gyur ba yin/
184a4: bdag ni sems ni mi bskyod pa/ sems nyid dus gsum 'gyur ba med par gsungs/ byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// thig le chen po dgu yi lung bstan pa/ man ngag gnyer chen rnam che/
184a5: tshogs dgu ste/ yid kyi rnam shes las 'phro len pa'i don/ rnam par shes pa'i byang chub sems nyid 'di/ byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// med pa'i phyal ba dang ni gcig pu lhun gyis
184a6: rdzogs/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rje btsan bskal par mi nyams rdul tsam med/ rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rang dbang las/ gzhan nas sangs rgyas brtsal gyur kyang // btsal kyang rgyal ba mi rnyed do// bams
184a7: cad 'gyur med byang chub sems dpa' las/ ma gtogs gzhan na med ces bya bar gsungs// byang chub sems nyid mnyam par khyab 'dal te/ bdag dang gzhan du med par rtogs pa la/
184a8: de ltar sus rtogs skyes bu gcig pu yin/ lhun gyis rdzogs pa zhes kyang de la bya/ byang chub sems kyi sa dang 'dir dbang bskur ro// dran pa'i sems can sems kyi rang bzhin ni/ dkar 'tsher

184b1: snu ma la 'dril bar byang chub sems/ / 'dzangs pa zin po sems shes de la bya/ blun po byol song sems ni na bun dud pas 'dres/ sems gnas phung po tsi ta'i dbyings kyil na/ 'od kyi thig le dkar 'tsher gnas
184b2: pa ni/ de dang bdag tu 'dzin pa'i sems de ni/ te dang ra dang nas btags zhabs 'khyud rnams/ gu gu zla tshes dag tu gnas gyur te/ mi las sangs rgyas dag tu gnas bsgyur nas// dus gsum sangs rgyas
184b3: kun gyi thugs kyi sa bon 'di/ bdag gi ma yengs brjed bral med par 'di bsgoms na/ sangs rgyas 'bras bu yang dag byang chub sems// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// /
184b4: nyam pa'i chad pa byung ba la/ mgon tshun de las gzhan med do// rnal 'byor dam nyams gzhan gyis mi skongs kyis/ bdag gi sems nyid kun du bzang po'i ngang gyur na/ bya rtsa dang ni bral zhing 'das pa yin//
184b5: 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das pa yang / nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dbyer med mnyam pa chen po dang / de la sangs rgyas gang nas btsal kyang rgyal bas mnyes par ma gsungs so// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro//
184b6: glang po dpal gyi thugs kha nas/ lcags kyi zer chen bzhi 'phros te/ glang po dpal chen he ru ka'i/ lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// 'od zer dgu 'phros gdug pa ma lus bcom/ 'gro ba
184b7: mtha' dag rnams kyi don byas te/ bdag gi rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyang / kun gzhi snying la 'dus pa'i he ru ka/ de ltar lags pas rtogs na byang chub sems/ gang nas btsal kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur te/
184b8: byang chub sems kyis der 'dir dbang bskur ro// bdag med khams kyi snod gang du/ rgya che gsal ba'i khams bkang ste/ re dogs med par phud 'gro yang / nyam nga med par lam gyi mchog/ gza' gtad med pas

185a1: don du bde/ de bas rang sems bzod pa'i sa/ byang chub sems ni yangs zhing rgya che ste/ de bas bdag gis lus rtogs na/ sdong bcud la sogs rtogs pa'i skyes mchog nams/ shes gsal tho ldan
185a2: rnams la ye nas rnyed pa gsal/ bla ma'i rgyud mchog de la yod ces gsungs te rdzogs/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ro// bsgoms pas rnyed par mi 'gyur ma bsgoms stong bral med/ thugs/
185a3: nas zhal du byung ba 'gro ba'i don du gsungs/ rna rgyud ston pas thugs lnga brtol te/ lus dang sems las ma gtogs bsgom du med/ bsgoms nas sems nyid gzhan nas btsal yang rnyed par ma gsungs
185a4: so/ / dus gsum rgyal bas ye nas ma bcos te/ rang sems gdod nas ma skyes chos kyi sku/ chos nyid bsgom par bya ba gang yang med/ man ngag shes rab sbyin chen nges gsungs pas/ lus dang sems
185a5: las ma gtogs na/ bdag gi sku gsung thugs la chang bar gnas// gal te brjod pa'i mtha' bzhi yod na ni/ don rdzogs sgom pa po yang yod par gyur// lus sems skye ba med bden pas/ bsgom du med
185a6: par 'jog pa gang / don kun rdzogs shing chub par der gnas so// byang chub sems kyis ding 'dir dbang bskur ro// zla gsang dkar dmar rlung ka lci/ zla ba shes rab gsal ba thabs chen te/ thig le byang
185a7: chub sems nyid dkar la 'tsher ba yi/ dmar ba yug gi rag ta byang chub sems/ rlung la shor du mi rtsal khri/ la sgrom du swa/ de las ma gtogs sangs rgyas gzhan na med/ man ngag tshul du zla ba'i gzugs
185a8: yin te/ gsang ba'i tshul du yid kyi rnam shes nyid kyang zla ba yin/ thig le sems kyi rang bzhin snum la 'dri la// man ngag len par byed pas sems kyi thig le yin/ sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas

185b1: gzhan na med/ byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// rang 'byung che ba'i ye shes mi 'gyur la// chos nyid rang gis gnas pa'i rang bzhin la/ dmigs bral ting 'dzin rgya mtshor rab sprul te/ yid ni 'phags
185b2: pa'i lam ni gnas pa ni/ phra zhing zab pa bstan dka' rgyal ba'i sku/ dran pa byed pa'i rtsol dang srog chags gsum/ kun gzhi pad ma'i yig 'bru gsal bar byed/ byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro//
185b3: rgyu ni skye ba med pas rnam par dag/ 'bras bu 'gags pa med pas byang chub sems/ byang chub sems de skye med ye shes dbyings// skye med mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje'i don/ sems la rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu
185b4: bsgom/ byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang skur ro// 'byung ba chen po bcom ldan 'das// nam mkha' rdo rje snang ba ston pa'i sangs rgyas so// sa rdo rje chos nyid ye nas gnas pa'i sangs rgyas so// me rdo rje chos nyid
185b5: rin po che'i sangs rgyas so/ / chu rdo rje snying rje chen pos brlan pa'i sangs rgyas so// rlung rdo rje 'dod pa sgrol ba'i sangs rgyas so// 'byung ba bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskur ro// dngos grub stsol ba rnam gnyis te/
185b6: nges pa'i lung dang rang bzhin no// chos kyi dbyings las mnga' bsnyes nas/ gang ltar bsgrubs kyang dbyings kyi don/ chos kyi dbyings la 'char ba dang dbang sgyur 'chi ba med/ sprul pa kun du
185b7: bzang po nyid/ sgrib dang 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ro// lhun gyis grub pa'i dbang chen ni/ de yangs gser zla ba me/ gser dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems/ byang chub sems ni sa zhes
185b8: zlab me dang 'dra ba yi/ byang chub sems nyid kun tu bzang / gsal zhing drol nyon mongs sreg/ byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ro// don ni dbyings dang ye shes yin/ yab yum gnyis med rol pa

186a1: ye/ rag ta byang chub sems dkyil na/ ma skyes rdzogs pa'i he ru ka/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud/ yon tan phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa/ gsang ba'i don gyis dbang bskur ro// gsang ba yum chen kun tu
186a2: bzang / rag ta byang chub sems dkyil na/ ma hA su kha'i dkyil 'khor dbyings/ sems kyi thig les thig btab ste/ dkyil 'khor zlum po 'khyil ba la// chos kyi dbyings las spros pa'i sku/ don gyi dbying sa
186a3: nas lha dang lha mo dgod/ nges pa'i don gyis dbang bskur to// da dang rang bzhin bdag nyid chen po ste// lhun gyis rdzogs dang spros pa med pa yi// thugs kyi dkyil nas 'byung ba rigs kyi sras/ kun du bzang po yum dang don gyi
186a4: thabs chen las/ man ngag dang bcas pa yi ye shes snying po'i don bcom ldan gsang ba'i mchog gi dkyil 'khor na/ dpal chen kun du bzang po ye shes te/ gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// dkyil
186a5: 'khor ma hA su kha'i gnas/ ma hA su kha'i dbyings nyid na/ byang chub sems nyid de kho na/ ye shes chen po lhun gyis rdzogs nas gnas/ ma hA su ka gsang ba chen po 'di/ don dang ldan te kun du bzang po yin/ ngang las
186a6: ma g.yos kun du bzang po ni/ gnyis su med par rnam par dag pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// yum gyi nags tshal chen po 'dul med du/ rtag tu mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang du bzhugs//
186a7: dang ni dus gsum bzhugs shing rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa yin/ bdag nyid 'dus ma byas pas skye ba med par lhun gyis grub// gsang ba'i byang chub byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// srid pa byang chub
186a8: sems su ma bcos thig ler zlum/ sngar 'das dang ldan bzhugs dang phyis 'byung ba'i/ sems nyid rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ nyon mongs dri ma ya nas med pa'o// ya nas sangs rgyas ma skyes

186b1: ldan gyis grub/ byang chub sems nyid gsang ba'i dbang bskur ro// dpal chen kun du bzang po dbye ba med pa'i don/ sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las sprul pa mang po 'phro/ lhag pa'i ye shes bye brag gcig 'dra'o//
186b2: bya 'gyur ba mang ba kun te phyag rgya'o// suni thams cad chos kyi su ru 'dus/ la ma ni thams cad rol bas chub pa'o// yum gyis dbying sa chen rang bzhin rnam par dag/ zas ni thams cad bdud rtsi lnga yi don/
186b3: pa bya ba med pa chen po'o// thugs ni rtog pa mi mnga' sale po// ldem dgongs don dam byang chub sems kyi don// byang chub sems kyis dang 'dir dbang bskur ro// rna rabachud ston pas thugs brtol te/ das
186b4: ba'i lung dang don yang sangs rgyas yin/ / sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyings su 'gro ba zhes/ byang chub sems ni kun du rtag pa'i don/ rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde ba chen po nyid/ dbang mchog 'dis
186b5: ni dbang bskur ro/ / sku rgyan 'khor lo lung chen zab mo nang nas gsal/ lnga bzhi nang du 'khor ba yang / ye shes sangs rgyas de las med/ lta ba 'di la gnas shing rnal 'byor skal ba bzang / bder gshes kun gyi
186b6: thugs dam byang chub sems kyi don/ don dam dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro// dbyings nas gsal shar bdal ba la/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'bya ma ra yas/ rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yid la thim/
186b7: 'greng ldog spyi'i tshugs gar 'gyur yang / gang ltar byas pa byang chub sems kyi don/ thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor du/ mun nag langs kyang khams gsum gsal/ ye shes khrus kyi rdzing bu ra/ dril
186b8: dag pas rdul mi 'gro/ dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro// de nas macom ldan 'das nyid las gzhan pa'i 'khor rigs bzhis 'khor ba'i 'phra men ma dang / khro bo rdo rje bka'i pho nya rnams la bka'

187a1: stsal to/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje dbang / de ring khyod la bskur bar bya// sangs rgyas rnams su grub bya'i phyir// rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long // shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya 'dzin// rnam grol dag pas gsung skad sgrogs
187a2: dril bu 'di ni sgra snyan gyis/ / phyogs bcu kun tu sgrogs par byed// bang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro// de nas dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad du bya/ rag ta'i mgo ma yin gyis byugs pa la// de ru dpal chen dgod par bya// 'apra
187a3: men 'khor dang po nyas bskor/ / de rwa slob ma gzhug par bya// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thang dbul/ dbang phyug longs
187a4: spyod lngas mchod na/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phye dang nang dang gsang ba gsum gyis bka' stsal to// phyi yi dbang rin po che sna bdun la sogs te/ dbang rjes lnga bcu
187a5: rtsa lngas dbang bskur ro/ / nang dbang dpal chen po yab yum dang / khro bo dang pra men rnams kyis phyag mtshan gyis dbang bskur ro// gsang dbang thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// bcom
187a6: ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa gsang ba zab mo las dbang gi le'u ste bdun pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // chos thams cad
187a7: ye nas sangs rgyas kyis kyang mkhyen pa'i ye shes la sku gsung thugs mnga' ba'i rtags su dang po phyag rgya chen po drug dang ldan par bsgom mo/ / de nas kun mkhyen ye shes kyis thabs mkhas pa'i thugs
187a8: rjes go shag gis phye la kun tu snang gi ting nge 'dzin du bsgom mo/ / de nas rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin du yi ge hUM mthing nag las sku smug nag 'jigs pa'i sku/ gsung gi drag shul spyod pa'i sngags/ thugs ting de

187b1: 'dzin hUM bzing nag las 'phags pa'i skur bsgom mo/ / de nas he ru ka rol pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
187b2: dang / 'khyil ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyes pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / grub pa rdzas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje bza' ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud rtsi btung ba'i ting nge 'dzin
187b3: dang / lha'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdzogs pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bla na med pa
187b4: ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje gsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dgyes pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu 'dus pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog
187b5: pa'ajoms pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshul khrims chen po'i ting 'dzin dang / bum chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bden pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra sgrogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dam tshig gi ting nge 'dzin
187b6: dang / lhun gyis grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'bar ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gtum po rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi
187b7: ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje 'gugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje las kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / khrag 'thung chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje ltos pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ser gdong chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
187b8: gzhad gdong chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje mtshon cha'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje dur khrod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dregs pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / bsnyen pa'i

188a1: ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mthor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rngam par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glo snying nad grol 'dren cing za
188a2: ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / byin gyi rlabs kyis ting nge 'dzin dang / mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa'i rgyud
188a3: gsad pa zab mo las ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa'i mnyes pa chen po'i mchod pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // de la mchod pa dam pa ni/ thogs
188a4: mar rtog bsgoms bdag nyid bsgral/ de nas gnyis med blo yis ni/ blo dan 'jig rten snyed re rje/ gnyis su med par bsgral ba bya/ 'thil ba'i 'jig rten mnyas sbyor bas/ bdag nyid ma nyes pas mchon pa byas 'i chu rjeb chen po / ga dang /
188a5: mnyam pa'i tshigs la 'bul/ bza' dang btu dang bca' dang bgo/ longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni/ dkyil 'khor la ni dbul bar bya/ mnyes pa'i mchod pa chen pos rab tu mchod/ sha chen dang ni dri chen dang / ga bur rag ta dri
188a6: chu dang / ma he rta dang khyi sha dang / na ge ge rgya gshog pa can/ 'di dag 'phags pa'i tshogs la dbul/ pad ma can dang dung can dang / ba lang can dang ri mo can/ 'di dag mnyes pa'i mchod par dbul/ zhing gi rgyal mtshan
188a7: shachen rtog/ ras chen dag gi bla re dang / zhing gi dbyug pa tsi ta rtog/ til mar dag tu bcas pa rnams/ 'di dag mchod par dbul bar bya/ mnyes pa'i mchod pas rab mchod na/ thams cad ma lus mngon sangs
188a8: rgyagaphyi 'i mchod pa nang gi mchod pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las mchod pa bsang ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // bla med mi

188b1: spang ba dang / bla ma bskur ba dang / sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam la zhugs pa dang / gsang ba'i don du mi smra ba dang / rtsa ba lnga dang sgrub pa dang / bsrung ba dang / gti mug dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang
188b2: dang / nga rgyal dang / phrag dog dag mi spang ngo // dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri chen sha/ dag pa'i snod bcud mi 'dor ro// yan lag bcu yi dam tshig ste/ ye shes mnyams rtogs pas snang / bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig ni/ rtsa ba yin
188b3: te rigs med 'gyur/ mi spong mi 'dor gnyis po ni/ yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka' ba'o// mnyam la mnyam pa sbyor ba ni/ mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas ni/ mnyam rdzogs chen po thob gyur nas/ 'das na sangs rgyas ma
188b4: yin no/ / rtsanyams pa yi phyal bdag/ gsol nye bar mi brtson dang / skad cig yud tsam smra mi byed/ nyams 'byung nyes pa brjod mi lang / rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams 'gyur na/ bsgrub pa thams cad nyams pa
188b5: 'gyur/ yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i// 'azas bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'dra/ yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na/ 'bras bu med cing ngan 'gror srung / dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje ste/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag
188b6: nyidi yin/ rgya ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni/ gcig la gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum/ yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la/ gcig la bcu phrag gnyis su med// bsrung bar bya ba dang mi spang ba brgya nyi shu/ dang du blang ba brgya nyi shu/
188b7: spyad ba byab rgya'i bu khyi sum drug bcwo dam tshig 'di rnams ma nyams na 'tshang rgya'o// / nyams na dmyal ba yin par shes par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu pa'o//
188b8: dode nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // blang bar bya ba'i snod ni gang / spang bar bya ba ci lta bu/ mtshan nyid rnam pa du zhig mchis/

189a1: spyad par bya ba du zhig mchis// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis he ru ka rol pa'i don bka' stsal pa/ dus bu gcig dang dum bu gnyis// gsum dang bzhi dang lnga pa dang / drug pa dang ni bdun pa dang / dum bu brgya pa
189a2: rab tu grags/ bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs bud med rigs ma des/ dkar dang dmar dang dkar sngo dang / sngo dang de bzhin ser skya ste/ thal ba'i mdog dang mdog mi sdug/ kha dog bdun du rab tu
189a3: grags/ nye rim dang ni glang po'i rgya ba/ 'khor ba de bzhin bya rog rjes/ dung sngogacig dud gnyis dang / chag pa dang ni mtshams kyis pa/ 'di dag thams cad rab brtags te/ rab tu brtags te spyad par bya// shin tu
189a4: mnyam pa'i sa phyogs sam/ snyi ba 'am yang na dul ba'i sa ra/ sngags kyis btab ste gnam du bsgyur/ ltung ba'i mtshan nyid 'di rig bya/ lho phyogs kha bltas bram ze med/ srin po'i phyogs bltas glang po snyol/
189a5: nub kyi phyogs bltas rigs ngan te/ rlung gi phyogs bltas gsang mi thub/ byang gi phyogs bltas phyug por 'gyur/ dbang ldan phyogs bltas sngags grub ster/ shar du bltas na bdag nyid gsod/ me yi phyogs
189a6: bltas she'u shing med/ 'og tu bltas na rkun por spyod/ steng du bltas na pu/ med bsod/ glor bltas de ni rigs ngan te/ snod kyi mtshan nyid 'di rnams so// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ dge ba sprul pa'i
189a7: snod dag ni/ dum bu gcig pas la dbang / gnyis pa de ni rgyal phran 'gyur/ gsum pa de yang nor la dbang / bzhi pa de yang sngags sgrub 'gyur// lnga pa de yang chos kyang sgrub/ drug pa de ni slong ba yin/ bdun pa de ni/
189a8: brtul shugs so// brgyad pa yongs su spang ba bya/ dum bu gcig pa bram ze'i rigs/ gnyis pa de ni rgyal po'i rigs/ gsum brje'u rigs yin pa ste/ bzhi pa de ni dmangs rigs so// bu gu med dang mang ba ni/

189b1: mkhas pas shin tu spang bar bya/ bod chung ba dang bsrab pa dang / gang dag ser por 'gyur ba ni/ bud med yin par shes par bya/ bud mad rab tu smad pas ni/ de dag rab tu spang bar bya// ser skya dang ni dkar ba dang / kha
189b2: dog sna tshogs spang bar bya/ dung med pa dang dung gnyis dag/ lha mo sprul pas mi blang ngo // dud sngo bdag sdug bsngal te/ bya rog rjes ni 'thab rtsod 'gyur/ nyi rim gyis ni gsod par 'gyur// glang po rgyab ni nang du 'gyur/
189b3: 'di las gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ gsang ba sgrub thod mtshan nyid ni/ yang lag tshe pha mang ba'i bdag/ dpag bsas shing ni yod gyur na/ 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob 'gyur te/ sngags pa de la the tshom med/ dbus su
189b4: gshod bu bzhi yod na/ 'di ni 'dod 'jo ba zhes bya// mdun na gshod bu gnyis yod na/ yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya'o// de yi mtshan nyid ldan pa'i snod/ su dag rtag tu 'chang ba ni/ longs spyod thar pa thob 'gyur
189b5: te/ de la lha mo the tshom med/ de nas rigs ni rnam bshad do// snod rnams kyi ni bye brag dang / dung dang kun zla 'dra ba'i mdog/ snu ma la mnyam du sdug pa ni/ sngags rnams thams cad 'grub ster yin/ dbang phyug
189b6: chen por shes par bya/ thal ba'i mdo ga la bod yang che/ pad ma'i dbyings su 'dab mar brgyan/ tshangs pa'i skud pa gsang ba yod/ 'di dang tshangs par rig par bya/ sbrang rtse ser skya'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ zhi ba'i
189b7: thig las rnam par brgyan/ / khyab 'jug pa yi snod yin te/ zug rngu dgra rnams 'joms par byed/ kha dog dmar zhing lnga pa la// pad songs ra ba rabargyan pa dang / zlum pa shin du rnam pa ste/ snod 'di gzhon
189b8: ma zhes bya/ cung zad sar zhing zlum la zab/ gang dag rdo rje mtshan yod pa/ de yi mtshan ldan gang yin pa/ dbang phyug chen mo rigs chen yin/ phag mo'i gdong dbyibs 'dra ba la/ rab tu mkhregs shing su

190a1: tig 'phro/ sha yi dri dag mnam pa yi/ snod ni phag gdong ma zhes bya/ thal ba'i mdog la bod yang che/ thig le chen pos nas par brgyan/ khrag 'dzag pa yi dri mnam pa/ 'jigs byed ma yi snod ces bya/ snod
190a2: kyi khyad par shes byas nas/ sngags pas 'di dag rtag 'chang na/ bdag bka' byed na bzhin bzangs ma/ de la bgags kyis tshugs mi 'gyur/ de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ snod kyi dngos po khyad pa ni/ tshangs
190a3: pa bram ze bcad par bya/ rtag tu dngos grub sbyin par byed// sgrub pa chen po'i dus dag tu/ khyab 'jug dang ni 'byor kun la// rtag tu las rnams 'grub par byed/ rgyal rigs kyis ni gzhon nu ma/ pha rol
190a4: yul ni rnam par 'joms/ rje'u rigs kyi ni dam chen mo/ blo dang ldan pas bzlog phyir bshad/ kha sad dang bskal dang bstabs pa'i phyir/ dmangs rigs kyis ni phag gdong bcad / las dang rigs rnams thams
190a5: cad dang / 'jigs byed mas ni dngos grub ste/ re ba med pas bdag nyid mas/ grub pa'i khyad par 'di shes pas/ 'dra ba med pas bdag bsams te/ rtag tu 'di bdag spyad cing bcad/ bdag gi dngos grub
190a6: skye ba yi/ sngags pas de nas bshad par bya/ oM na bab to/ bdu ba ya sma sha na/ ba si ni i tad ka ba la/ a be sha ya/ a be sha ya/ hUM phaT swA hA/ thal ba dang me tog dang / chu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad snod la
190a7: btab ste blang bar bya/ ri mo rdo rje 'khor lo dang / mchod rte dang ni rin pog/ pad ya dang ni sngon shing dang dbus nA bug gnyis yod pa/ mdun na gshong bu gsum dang gnyis/ gang dag rdo rje mtshan yod pa/ dpal dang ldan pa'i snod
190a8: gnas so/ / srubs gcig pa dang srubs gnyis dang / srubs gsum pa dang srubs bzhi pa/ lnga dang drug dang bdun dang brgyad/ dgu dang bcu dang bcu gnyis dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to//

190b1: bcu drug pa dang nyi shu drug/ 'di dag rab tu spang bar bya// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las kun tu bzang po he ru ka rol pa snod brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// de nas dbang phyug chen po bsgral ba'i thabs 'di bcom ldan
190b2: 'das dpal kun tu bzang po'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / / ma hA ru dra'i rgyud dur khrod ma hA ru dra brgyud pa'i dbang du bsdu ba'i mchog phyi rol phyogs gar bde ba'i sar zhing chen stan gar 'os pa gcig tu
190b3: ma Na Dal byugs te/ gnas chen po dur khrod kyi bdag po chen po'i cha lugs ci ltar nyal tshigs bcad las byung ba bzhin tshon gyis bris/ yang na thal ris dang / yid kyis bkod kyang rung / stana'i dkyil 'khor bsham/
190b4: de'i dbus su hom khung gru gsum pa zhig bkod/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bca' ste/ mnyam pa nyid du bsgom pa'i sngags la/ a sa ma hA tsa ya d+harma d+har+tha pra b+hA ba Ad ma ko hUM/ zhes cung zad bsgoms
190b5: ba'i rjes la/ mi g.yo phyag rgya chen po dang / chos kyi sku las bzhengs pa yi/ gnyis med phyag rgya rol pa yis/ dus la bab po sa ma ya zhes brjod nas// rnal 'byor gzhan gyis 'di ltar byin gyis brlabs nas mkhas
190b6: pa gcig gi sa las 'di bgyi/ dbang gi gtam rgyud bshad/ rgyud kyi gtsug lag chen po dang bden pa'i tshig gis bsgrags nas/ 'phags pa thams cad bdag la gson/ 'byung po mang po kun nyon cig/ thugs rje che
190b7: dang shes rab dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i byin brlabs kyis// 'gro ba thams cad spyod par mdzad/ 'gro ba'i bdag po che dang srog/ gson po bde ba'i bar gcod pa/ bdud dang gshin rje 'khor bcas kun/
190b8: zhing gsod pa'i gnyen po ni/ 'jam dpal 'phrul gyi khro bo des/ srid gsum thar byed rngam pa dang / thod dbyug drag po mi mdzad pas/ gshin rje bcom ste bsad nas kyang / ro yang lho yi 'dzam gling du/ ber nas

191a1: 'khor bsams lagar bris pa'i sar bltas te/ de'i bdag po la sdigs pa'i phyir/ ldan pa g.yas byo zhing sdang mig drag tu bgrad/ mig gi 'bras bu dril la// sarba ba bkar he ru ka/ byista na ma haM ka ru dra hU~M phaT/ rigs
191a2: lnga'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang khro bo'i dang du gyur te/ bdag dang 'dra bar bsams la/ de nas 'gying rngam pa wa ral pa bsigs la/ lag pa g.yas pa sgreng / sor mo gyen du bgrad ba ya ke tsi ta dza la hUM phaT/ ces brjod
191a3: nas lag pa sta zur du bzhag cing lag pa g.yon pa rngam pa bzhin du skra gyen du bteg la/ pradz+nyA ke shi tsit+ta dz+wa la hUM phaT/ ces brjod la rngom pa'i ro bgyi/ mche ba 'dar rkan sgra drag tu gtogs la rngom brjid chen po'i tshul dang
191a4: ldan par bsam/ oM pradz+nyA su pa ya na hUM phaT/ rkang pa g.yas pa bskum/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha e sha ya hU~M/ de nas slar go cha'i phyag rgya snying kar gcings la btang ste/ oM badz+ra ka be tsa zhes brjod nas go bgo bar bsams te/
191a5: gnas lngar bsrung zhing / i na ma dru ba bi/ spyi bor thal mo sbyar te/ sarba bu d+ha mu tra sa~M ha ran/ a bi shiny+tsa hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas sku cir yang 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya bcas te/ rkang lag bzhi'i tshogs bskum mgo mgrin
191a6: 'khril cing bsgril la hUM zhes tshig 'bru drag pos g.yas g.yon du lta ba'i tshul drag po re re bgyi/ sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM/ zhes drag tu brjod do// rdo rje dril bu gsil te/ brkyang bskums bsgreng la 'gying zhing dkyil 'khor
191a7: phyogs su mchodas la/ khams gsus nas 'byung sems can rnams/ rdo rje mu yi khyad par gyis/ 'od zer tshul du bsdus nas kyang / de dag bdag gi lus la gzung / sngo brdo rje thams cad kyi/ sku dang yab shes
191a8: mchog gis bya/ thar pa'i bla med dkyil 'khor 'dir/ brod pa can rnams dang ba ltar/ skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi bu/ bde bar 'ongs pa legs pa 'ongs rtse rgyal bstan pa'i gnas chen 'dir/ b+ho d+hi tsi ta'i

191b1: ni drang khrod kyi/ bdag po gdol badrag po yis/ ro yi nyal thabs gan rgyal te/ mgo na lho nub mtshams su bstan/ rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan// de yang cung zad bsnol ba'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon khrig
191b2: mal/ phyi gnyis dang ni brgod do// thal ba'i mdog la su sgreng ba/ de yi lus snying yan lag ni/ ma mo chen po rnams kyis gnas dur khrod chen po 'di dag go// de yi sgying ne ma hA'i lho// drar khrod chen po bsil tshal na/
191b3: mamo chen mo ge'u rim/ mkhas pa snying bstobs che ba'i gnas/ de yi mgon lho phyogs kyi/ seng ga la yi gling bran na/ ma mo chen mo tse'u rim/ mthong thos rngam pa'i rdzu 'phrul mnga'/ lag pa g.yas
191b4: ni shar lho mtshams/ bal yul na ni pu ka si/ 'khor dang longs spyod sna tshogs ldan/ lhag par zas kyi 'byor pa che/ lag pa g.yon ni lho nub mtshams/ sa yi tshal na be ta li/ phyag na rdo rje dbang gi gnas// de nas mthu dang
191b5: dbang yang che/ rkang pa g.yas pa byang shar mtshams/ li yul na ni tsan Da la/ shing ka na zhes grags pa de/ de yang 'khor dang longs spyod ldan/ rkang pa g.yon pa nub byang mtshams/ skad ni skad sna mthun pas na/ ma mo
191b6: chen mo tha mo ta/ bde skyid ldan pa'i sa la gnas/ po mtshan steng gi byang phyogs na/ u rgyan yul na g+ha s+pha ri/ sbyor bas longs spyod 'jug pas na/ dngos grub can yang de na mang / de nas stan dkyil 'khor 'dir/ bris te
191b7: bsams nas dgongs pa ni/ dur khrod bdag pos 'dus pa dang / dbang du sdud pa'i las brtsam gyis/ sangs rgyas kun gyi byin brlabs zhes brjod do// de nas 'ged la rdo rje khu tshur dgu g.yas su gzhag cing / mig gis
191b8: phyogs bcur bltas te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi 'jig rten 'di/ skye shi gnas ni dur khrod kyi/ rang bzhin yin ne rnams gzigs nas/ sa bzhi dur khrod gan su bstan/ bdag gis yid ches par bya zhing / stana'i dkyil

192a1: gnas nyid du/ khams gsum 'khor ba kun bsdu'o// chos nyid skye 'gag med pa las/ dbyings su thim pas gnyis su med/ kun gyi ngo bo mnyam nyid de/ thams cad snying po byang chub las/ ma skyes pas na 'gag pa
192a2: 'jig/ bdag nyid med pas mnyam pa'i sku/ thugs rje chen po cir mi mdzad/ sems can ma rig mongs pa'i blos/ bdag dang bdag gis so sor phye/ log tog phyin ci log bzhis bcings// 'khor brgyud lnga yi kha
192a3: brims/ mya ngan mi 'da' yun rings te/ thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ sku yi sprul pa phyogs bcur bkye// gsung gis mtha' yas sems can sgrol/ thugs ni tshad med bzhi dang ldan/ sku gsum 'gro ba'i tshul
192a4: ston pas/ dus la bab pa'i sems can dag/ las la bab pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du/ thugs rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni/ yang dag nyid la yang dag grol/ yang dag bsgral nas bde chen
192a5: thob/ mi ldog sa la nges par phyin/ phyin pa tsam gyis dbang thob nas/ rgyal bri zhing khams dbyings nyid mthong / rgyud drug gnas su mi skye phyir/ dpa' bo 'bru lngas lam lnga dgag/ phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// /
192a6: 'khrug pa'i bag chags bag la nyal/ bde 'gro la ma la sgrib pa'i rnams/ ye shes 'bar ba'i mes bsregs te/ mtshan nyid med par stong par 'gyur/ sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis phaT/ gsang ba'i dbyings su hUM gis
192a7: bsdu/ / skur bskyed ye shes skur bsdus pas/ 'og min gnas mchog dam pa ru/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor zhing gshegs/ stong gsum ma lus gdon pa ni/ 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do// skyes bu chen po'i rnal
192a8: 'byor gyis/ bskal pa 'bar zhing snying rje'i mchog/ nyan thos dgra bcom rang rgyal dang / sa bcu byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pas mchod/ de nas 'gying zhing dkyil 'khor phyogs su

192b1: mcho dra la/ / ma tang ga gnas dang lung gi tshul du smos pa bzhin gsal bar bsgoms te/ de'i 'khor 'byung po mang po yang mngon du bkug par bsams te/ rkang pa gnyis bsnol ba'i drung du phyin nas byang shar mtshams su
192b2: bltas te/ bdag nyid brkyang bskum gyi tshul du 'greng la/ 'dzub mo gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings la/ gnas kyi sgo 'di su yis bcad/ sems kyi bdag pos bcad dam ci/ gzung 'dzin rgalag bsnol ba'i
192b3: sgo/ / yul las 'das pa'i zhabs kyis phye/ de nas hUM phaT pra pa sha hUM phaT/ rkang pas shag gis phye bar bsam/ de nas lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje gsum pa'i phyag rgya bya// g.yon pa'i 'dzub mo snying khar bsgreng ste/ oM/
192b4: shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sarba ru ShA na sa ma ya mu dra pra ban tsa hU~M phaT swA hA/ zung thar byed kyis bzung // las thar byed gang gi sa mnan na sa kha lho phyogs su bltas te/ brkyang bskum du bsgred la a a zhes brjod la/ lcags
192b5: klus snying kar sgo phye bar bsam/ g.yas nas rgyab tu bskor te/ lus kyi nang du zhugs ma thag tu rkang pa bshibs te/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas te/ hUM zhes sgo bya bar bsam/ g.yas rgyab kyis bskor bas 'bod
192b6: bar bya/ e he hi ma hA/ ru sha/ dra karma badz+ra hU~M phaT/ ma hA de ba ma ta rung dza/ zhes rdo rje gar gyi gom pa 'dor zhing lte ba'i phyogs su song la/ shin du dmar po bzhi lta ba'i phyogs bzhir dgod do// yi ge hUM mchog tu
192b7: brjod cing / g.yas g.yon du lan cig tu gang gyis bskor bar bya'o// de nas snying po 'dri brjod par bya'o// tse bya d+he tsa bya/ ma nud+ha ra/ a mang+ga re/ shrI ma hA kA rA la/ d+hotsaphye/ pad ma rag tad+ha re/ badz+ra d+hA ra~M badz+ram
192b8: dA ma ba d+ha re/ zhes brjod do// de nas gar gyi tshul du snying kha phyogs su song la/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya gcings nas ci ltar bde ba gtor ma sbyin par mkhyen pa ni shes rab mkha' dbyings dang / ma tang gi lus su

193a1: dbyer med par gzhal yas khang 'bar ba'i nang khro bi he ru ka phyi'i 'phra men la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bkod de/ spyan drang ba'i phyir thabs dang shes rab kyi dbyings nas yi ge dza las lcags kyus
193a2: gsal bar phyogs bcur 'phros te/ phyi'i rnal 'byor dgug cing spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya gsal ba las 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drang ngo // mi gsang ba'i bsad pa chen po chos nyid kyis bsgral ba dang / sku gsung
193a3: thugs che ba'i yon tan gyis bsgral ba dang / bdag nyid chen po lhun gyis grub pas bsgral lo// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa gsang ba zab mo'i don bdud 'dul ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas bcom
193a4: ldan 'das kyis he ru ka'i las kyi bzlas pa 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / / 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las/ 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon 'byung ste/
193a5: de tshe sems can thams cad kun/ shin du khro zhing gdug par gyur/ shin du khro drag gtum pa yang / zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo yis// khro bas de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad/
193a6: sangs rgyas thugs rjes khros pa yis/ thams cad 'jigs pa'i mchog yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir/ dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar gsal/ hU~M bzhis
193a7: he ra ka bsgom/ ha sa he ru ka la sogs pa bsgom/ he sa sing ha la sogs pa bsgom/ phaT kyis sgo ba la sogs pa bsgom/ hUM ha he phaT kyis ting nge 'dzin bzlas/ sngags 'dis spyan drang ngo / sarba duSh+TaM naM sa ma
193a8: ya mud tra pra ban dza kra hUM phaT/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga ban/ dzaHhUM baM hoHru lu ru lu dzaHhUM baM ho// e h+ye hi tri sha ho sa ma ya ho// e h+ye hi a ra li d+ha ri d+hing / dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis/ tshur gshegs tshur gshegs he ru ka/ chos sku

193b1: zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang / gzugs su 'jigs tshul bstan du gsol/ thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas/ gdug pa 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol/ tshogs rje tshogs bdag dpal dang ldan/ tshogs kyi slos
193b2: dpon gshegs su gsol/ ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par las/ sprul pa mang po'i tshogs dang gshegs/ oM shI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra/ sarba duSh+Ti sa ma ya mu dra pra be sha ya shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ oM dza hUM ba ho// shrI he ruH
193b3: mA hA badz+ra sarba duSh+TaM sa ma ya mu tra pra ban tsa ka hU~M phaT/ bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir/ 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir/ don gyi dbang du dgongs nas kyang / 'khor bcas rab 'bar gshegs su gsol
193b4: oM shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sa ma ya hi/ sarba duSh+TiM kA ya bA ka tsirta badz+ra hUM phaT/ sems can don phyir nan tan mchog bskyed cing / ye shes thugs rjes bdag la dgongs nas kyang / mi gnyis don phyir dngos grub
193b5: mchog gi rnams/ bdag cag srul cing brtan be ra bzhugs su gsol/ oM shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+TAM sa ma ya mu tra a ma bstam b+ha ka phaT/ oM gu h+ya tri sha sa ma ya/ gu h+ya tri sha sa ma ya ho/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya tri sha sa ma sa
193b6: hUM/ dam tshigs la bzhengs pa yi/ dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// dam tshig tshul bzhin ma gshegs sam/ grub pa mchog dag ma stsal na// sku gsung thugs dang 'gal ba'o// dzaHhUM baM hoH
193b7: shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+Ti sa ma ya mu dra bra ban tsakra b+ha k+Sha ya bak+Sha ya bi rtogs pa ba rtogs ya/ he b+hag pan bud d+ha k+She traM pra tistam b+ha ka hUM phaT/ sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor bas/ pho brang dkyil 'khor rang las
193b8: thul/ de ni bdud kyi bdud bdag ste/ mkha' 'gro tshogs bcas bsdus pa'o// oM shrI badz+ra ka ra mra ka shar yA yai na maHoM badz+ra rag sa ma yA ya na ma/ oM shrI badz+ra kha T+wAM ga pra ma yA ya na ma/ oM shrI gnaH

194a1: dza yA ya na ma/ a ti bu ho/ pra ti bu ho/ ta thA ban d+ha naM ka ro ya mi ma hA yo ga ni/ a ti bA ho/ pra ti bu he/ bdag med phyogs bral don dam thugs chud cing // byams dang snying rje skra zun mi mnga' yang / gdug pa
194a2: 'dul phyir dus las mi 'da' ba'i/ 'jigs byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i lus can gar yang thogs med cing / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul mo che/ ma srid byams pa'i tshul gyis 'grogs
194a3: mdzad ma/ phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// dzaHhUM baM hoHshI he ru ka ya hA i dan bu ya ti ba lin ta pra ti dza ho/ shrI ba na kha kha khA hi khA hi/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra a be sha ya/ pra pre sha ya/
194a4: hUM khA hi/ he ru ka yis gnas bcu dang / dur khrod chen po gnas brgyad nas// dpal chen 'khor bcas spyan drangs te/ dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru/ zhing chen gsar rnying sti lar bcas/ dmar gyi arga N+ya
194a5: mtsher bskyil/ mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas kyis/ ma lus gshegs shing bsnams su gsol// dzaHhUM baM ho/ shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+Ti sa ma ya mudra pra ban tsakra/ kha kha khA hi khA dId
194a6: yan bi ba hUM phaT/ nga ni za byed chen mo ste khams gsum ma lus bsgral bar bya/ gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir/ she rus las sogs bza' bar bya/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra
194a7: sarba duSh+Ta nas ma ya/ ma dA maM sa ma hA raka ta// ma hA tsata/ ma hA ba su ta/ ma hA ba na tsa a mri ta kha kha le le tsuM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo hUM/ rang 'byung gdod nas dag pa'o// rtsa brgyad stong la sbyar ba'i sman/ rigs
194a8: lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngosaHye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas/ rgyud lnga'i sems can kun sgrol ba'i/ dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi ste/ phyogs bcu sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems

194b1: dpa'i tshogs chen gyis/ thugs dam dbyings nyid bskul ba'i mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi ngang nyid 'di/ bdag cag dad pas 'bul lags na/ bzhes te kun du dgyes mdzad la/ 'phrul gyi dngos grub bdag la stsol/
194b2: oM sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA a na ma pra ti dza ho/ dpal ldan shi he ru dang / yum chen kro d+hi shwa ri la/ dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul/ bzhes te kun du dgyes mdzad la/ 'phrul gyis dngos grub bdag la stsol// oM sarba taSh+Tha
194b3: ga tA ma hA ar+tha pra ti dza ho/ / dpal ldan badz+ra he ru u0f7f dang / badz+ra kro d+hi shwa ri la/ dam tshig gi ni mchod pa 'bul/ dpal chen rad na he ru dang / rang na kro d+hi shwa ri la/ dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul/ dpal chen pad ma he rA
194b4: dang / pad makro d+hi shwa ri la/ dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul/ dpal chen karma he ru dang / karma kro ti shwa ri la/ dam tshig mchog gi mchod ba 'bul/ oM sarba ta thA gad+hA ma hA arga ma pra ti dza ho// dpal chen mi pa mardorje
194b5: dang / / ma tshogs dbang phyug 'khor gyi rkyen/ go'u ri las sogs brgyad rnams dang / sing ha las sogs brgyad rnams la/ dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul/ ma mo chen mo bdun rnams dang / sring mo chen mo bzhi
194b6: rnams dang / mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas thams cad la/ dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'phrul/ bzhes te kun du dgyes mdzod la/ 'phrul gyi dngos grub bdag la stsol/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA ma dA a na ma pra tidza to//
194b7: ban khe hi/ dpal chen sems dpa' 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dang / dpal chen po shrI he ru ka/ badz+ra DA ki nI 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo mched lum bral
194b8: 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa thams cad dgongs su gsol lo/ dgazhi gnas mchog dam pa 'dir 'phags pa thams cad mchod pa dang / rdo rje mched lam dral phyogs bcun bzhugs pa dang / da ltar bzhum

195a1: ba'i thugs dam bskang ba dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i gnas su bsngal ba'i phyir rgya mchog rkang bzhi pa zhig yon du 'bul zhing mchis na thugs rjes bzung zhing bsngal du gsol lo//
195a2: rgyu mchog 'di thugs rjes bzung nas ma sbal na/ 'di la spyod pa zhig mchis te/ rnal 'byor theg pa'i gzhung las kyang tshul bzhin tu ma bgyis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshad ma khyad du bsad pa dang / rdo rje
195a3: slob dpon dang / mched dang ldam dral la mngon sems dang byed sems bskyed pa dang / mched la 'khus pa dang / dam las 'das pa dang / sba lo dang stu gsog/ brdzun dang khags ga/ byi tshul dang rgya ba nyan bgyis
195a4: nas rdo rje slob dpon snying nas sprod cing bla ma la dbang zos pa dang mnyam pa'i spyod yul sun phyung ste/ sbyor sgrol sgo bkag pa dang / dad pa can gyi tshogs bcag ste/ gdung sems kyi rgyun bcad pas phrag dog dbang
195a5: gis su gsung thugs kyi gdud 'tsho ba pa'i bar chad kyis da ltar ngan song gi gnas nas 'khyam zhing rtog pa'i dra bas ni bcings/ 'khor ba'i snyis ni zin nas dmyal khams kyi gting brgyud par nges te/ zhing
195a6: bcu dang ldan pa 'di dam tshig tshul shin du zlal pa/ 'di'i rnam par shes pa bla na med pa'i gnas su bsngal ba yang gnas stobs par byin gyis brlab du gsol// lnga phung gi yan lag ni kun tu bzang po mchod pa'i
195a7: sprin phung du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dgyes pa'i nga du thim par thon to// smon lam brjod de bsngal bar bya'o// spyi gtsug tu oM lag pa g.yas par sA/ g.yon pa la hA/ snying kar hUM
195a8: lus la oM/ oM ma hA su ra ta s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM ba ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha shI he ru ka a a hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ga dza hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha yak+Sha han ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+han la tan trad had ha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+rarba

195b1: san/ sa tsas/ a brdzaHam+b+has la ma rlu na/ ma badrag rnams zab nas m+b+ha d+hapaT/ sa badz+rarbarnam par tsatas k+Sha/ d+hus/ ma nga ga d+ha lam tas/ la na na dru
195b2: badz+ra kro d+ha trai lokyo ba dza ya b+hin da b+hin da/ hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la sgrol s+pho ta hUM phaT/ ma ma mam/ be bo bi bo// dza dzadzadza/ mi 'gyur nam mkha'i rang bzhin las// gzugs snang rtog pa rnam par bsgribs// bag chags
195b3: ma lus spyod pa'i phyir/ / khams gsum ma lus bsgral bar bya// nga ni za byed chen po ste// sems can thams cad gsad par bya// ma skyes phyir yang gsad par bya// rnam shes hUM gis bsdus nas kyang // sha rus la sogs
195b4: bza' bar bya/ / nga ni khrag 'thung chen po ste// 'khor ba'i dra bas chags pa yi// dmar chen dag gi rgya mtsho la// 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro tshogs dang rol// ma rungs gdug pas ma chags shing // dam tshig la sdang dgra
195b5: chen rnams/ / thugs rje byams sems ldan pa yis// ngo mthon stobs kyis bsgral bar bya// pra be sha ya phaT/ tsi ta b+h+rUM// suM b+ha ni suM b+ha ni hUM/ grih+Na grih+Na hUM/ gri h+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM/ a na ya ho b+ha ga ban bi d+ya rA dza ya hUM/ an ya
195b6: ho/ badz+ra DA ki ni/ a yang / s+phar na phaT/ badz+ra yu ti dza/ drag po las kyis bsgral ba'i rnams// 'khor ba'i lam lnga sgo yang gcad// rnam shes hUM gis bsdus brngubs nas// 'og min gnas mchog tha med 'di pa
195b7: gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga/ / sems pa dang ni sems ma dang // khro bo dang ni khro mo yi// sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT gyis 'phang // zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams na 'byam kun// skad cig yud
195b8: la brlag mdzad de/ / brlag par ma gyur gang yang med// 'dod chags rdo rje 'khor bcas rnams// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun// yud tsam gyis ni dbang mdzad de// dbang du ma gyur gar yang med// rgyal

196a1: rdo rje 'khor bcas rnams/ 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun/ dpal ldan gzi brjid chen po rnams// yud tsam gyis ni rgyas par mdzod// gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas rnams// 'jig rten khams ni rab
196a2: 'byam kun/ / yud tsam gyis ni zhi mdzad de/ zhi bar gyur pas dbyings la rol// bdag cag mched lham dral rnams kyis rdo rje slob dpon dbang zos pa dang / phrag dog gi dbang gis mched lham dral mngon samra
196a3: dang dbye sems bgyis pa dang / gnyid dbang gi sa la lor gyur pa dang / sems g.yengs pas sngags dang phyag rgya zur chag pa dang / dam tshig dang du len rngo ma thog pas smad pa'i dam tshig nyams so 'tshal thams
196a4: cad mthol zhing bshags so/ / rgyu mchog rkang bzhi pa 'di phrin las rnam bzhis bsgral ba yang gnas stobs par smon to// bdag cag mched lham dral 'di tshogs pa rnams kyis yid la rtag pa'i
196a5: dngos grub thob par gyur cig/ shrI he ru ka bya sha na badz+ra be ra ba na sha na/ ka ra dza li ta/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ u ra ta ke sha pra la pan/ sha ta sha pra dra/ sha ma ba ra na shra ma la ha ha ha hUM// raM gaM badz+ra ka ra gaM
196a6: ka ran ta/ tI shu la a gu dza/ pa ra sha ra na su sho ma ma/ pra yo ma hA tsan Ta/ su re pa ru na/ ku be ra na/ nir pa dra tsi ti ma hA ku ru nan/ shrI he ru ka ta na ti/ la la gan du sa ta ma had/ ya ku ra ka te/ ku sha la dzi mo ha/ par mo
196a7: gan ta ga ne ti/ ka ra ta ka/ ga bo dza la ni/ ba pur ti pa ta/ ko sha bi sha la/ i san pad ma tsan dri na ka/ mang gu na da ro/ tsi ri ka ta/ tsi ta sti/ dza bi s+tha/ ban d+ha he ru ka/ badz+ra ma rang sa na sa rang / ba mun ka na/ tig
196a8: shwa/ traM sta ga ya/ dza yab ke dong / bi ka ra be ra/ ma ra ma hA/ ri tsa yang sang sa ra/ ma hA ru na/ dz+wa la ba ni/ ho ho ha/ ro na ro hUM hUM/ re na rod na/ he he ran ro// bzhi la bstod tha med tang ba ting kha ba ti ka bar

196b1: yan dzu/ srin rdal ba rota/ he he ron ro// oM bung bu sra sti sra ho// oM phur bu sha shaM ka/ pur bu btab tito// phur bu ba sA sar hUM/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ oM e sha hUM be she hUM sa ma ya pak+Sha trAM/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo h+ne/
196b2: raM pra tidza he// mchod pa 'bul/ bshags pa bya/ smon lam gdab/ phyogs bcu mtha' zas mu med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dang / dpal chen po
196b3: shrI he ru ka badz+ra DA ki nI tshogs kyis dam tshig gis sa la gzhes pa'i nang gi rnal 'byor dang / phyi'i grub pa la sogs te/ phra men gyi 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa rdo rje theg pa bsrung bar zhal
196b4: 'chas pa'i 'phags pa thams cad dang / rigs 'dzin rtsal 'chad du gyur pa'i mi la sogs te/ sprul pa sna tshogs su slu bzhengs nas slob dpon gyis la bzhengs shing sems can gyi don mdzad pa la bdag
196b5: cag mched lcam dral 'dir tshogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa'i zhal zas 'di dag tshul bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas 'bul bas mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad ye shes bla ma'i sa non/ dam tshig nyam
196b6: pa thams cad spongs par gyur nas so so'i thugs dam skongs par smon to/ / rnal 'byor snga rabs sku tshe 'das pa rnams kyang sgrib pa rnams gnyis ni byang tshogs gnyis ni rdzogs/ bdag cag gi stong grogs
196b7: su gyur cig/ bdag gis snga skad dam rdzas bsgral ba dang / sems can gyi srog bkum mo 'tshal thams cad kyang ye shes ngang gis sgrol zhing rnal 'byor gyi skal pa can du gyur cig/ bdag cag rnams kyi
196b8: tshe snga ma nas da ltar gyi slob dpon du gyur pa dang / rgyud gcig cing yi dam gcig pa'i thugs dmal mnyes par bo ga pa dang / bdag gi snying rje chungs pa'i rkyen gyis 'phags pa thugs dam bskul ba'i rtsal

197a1: 'bang dmas pa dang / gnod pa'i dbang las pham par gyur pa dang / gti mug mtshor ba'i rkyen gyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rkyen mi bzod de/ lus ngag yid gsum gyis sems dkrugs nas ma yin
197a2: pa'i chos smra ba dang / spyod lam mi mkhas pa'i rkyen gyis dam tshig gi lha dang / slob dpon dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / rdo rje mched lham dral thugs dam gyi lha yal bar bzhag nas dngos grub thams cad 'phang bar
197a3: gyur pa dang / mkhyen gsol gong ma rnams dang bral ba'i rkyen gyis mchod pa'i yo byad rgyun mi gcig pa dang / mchod pa ma yin pa'i grogs po la brten nas rgyun mi gcig pa dang / bsod nams 'dres pas rtsal tshad ma
197a4: gyur te/ le lo dang btang snyoms kyi dbang du gyur nas thugs rje'i gnas su ma gyur te/ ye shes lha dang srungs ma rnams 'phang bar gyur pa dang / rgyang pan gyi chos kyis gdungs nas bde ba'i yo byad dang bral te/
197a5: nyes pa bsags pa'i cha shas dang / mchod sbyin mi chung ba'i sgrib pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las the tshom gcod pa'i bsam pa ma yin pa byung ba dang / shin du sdug bsngal bar gyur
197a6: pa rnams rjes su dran zhing gnod pa'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshags so/ / bshags bya 'di ni brjod pa tsam gyis tshor ba dang ma tsher ba dang bag chags byang bar smon to// gnas thob pa dang rgyud byang bas
197a7: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur cig/ lha dang slob dpon gyi dbang dang sngon ci ltar dkyil 'khor gnang ba dang / mi skyol zhing dngos grub rnam pa bzhi yang thob par gyur cig/ skyon brjod pa thams cad bral/
197a8: shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa rnams/ yon tan tshad ma bzhin thob par gyur cig/ de nas tshogs kyi gtor ma btang / oM shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra DA ki nI nAM/ badz+ra go'u ri ha/ badz+ra tse'u riH/

197b1: badz+ra pra mo ha/ badz+ra pe ta li/ badz+ra pu ka si/ badz+ra ga wa ri/ badz+ra tsaN li/ badz+ra sma sha ni/ badz+ra he ru ka sa ma ya yo gi shwa ri/ sarba DA ki nan/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hU~M/ dbyug pa'i brda yis mtshon nas kyang / ma tshogs dbang phyug
197b2: spyan 'dren gyis/ / dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol// thal mo brda yis mtshon nas kyang // mtshogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis// dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol// glu yi brda yis
197b3: mtshon nas kyang / / mtshogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis// dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol// bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba yi// 'od zer 'du 'phro klong dkyil na// sku ni dud kha chen po la// zhal gsum
197b4: po la phyag drug ste/ gnag dang mthing ka dmar ba'i dbu// g.yas kyi gsum na thogs pa ni/ rdo rjes bkug cing zhal du gsol// khyung gi khra chen 'bar ba'o// g.yon pa gsum na thogs pa ni// sti ra'i rgyu
197b5: ma'i zhags pa dang / / thod rlon dmar gyis bkang pa dang // sti ra bra mo gsus pa nas/ glo snying nang grol 'byin cing za/ glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon// zhi lpags g.yad gzhi sha ma thabs can// thod rlon
197b6: phreng bas rgyan du byas/ / ma lus pa dag gsan du gsol// rgyu las byung bas de bzhin gshegs// ston ni ma nor don mdzad pa// mngag pa'i gnas su yud tsam gyis// thams cad kho nar
197b7: dbang mdzad mdzad/ / srungs shi ga myur du rnam rgyal dpal// thal ba bzhin du rab tu lhogs// rol cig dgongs cig de bzhin gshegs// mA ra na ta tha/ 'byung po'i sha ni zan pas zhim// 'byung po'i khrag
197b8: ni chang bas zhim/ / 'byung po'i rus bzhim pa ste// thams cad gsol te dgyes par mdzod// dpal chen he ru ka/ mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs chen po// shin du mi bzad 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ nam mkha'i

198a1: khams kun khyab par sprul/ lhing nag gcer bu ral pa can/ mi lpags rlon pa gos su gyon/ thal pa'i mtshan mas phyugs pa ste// khrag dang zhag gi thig les brgyan/ phreng ba mang pos rgyan du byas/
198a2: lag na tri shul thod pa thogs/ dus gsum bshig par dam bcas pa'i// rdo rje ma phung 'khrug pa'i tshul/ ra ba thams cad stongs mdzad pa'i/ khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab/ theg pa chen rnal 'byor spyod pa
198a3: la/ gnod pa'i dgra bgegs gtan nas phyung / thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas kyang / rdul phran bzhin du brlag pa dang / sems nyid theg pa chen po yi/ rnam thar la ni dgod par mdzod/ rnal 'byor bde mchog
198a4: sgyu mas sprul/ dam tshig dag la 'jug tu gsol/ nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzod/ ma lus pa dag bsnams su gsol// rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod chags rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med pa/
198a5: 'dul mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ de na te the hU~M/ rnam pa sna tshogs dag pa'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa
198a6: med par 'dul mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ hU~M hUM hU~M/ rnam pa sna tshogs khro bo rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus/
198a7: pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgrims thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ ru lu ru la~M hU~M b+h+rU~M hU~M/ rnam pa sna tshogs thabs kyi rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus
198a8: bamed par 'dul mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyums thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ hUM oM ga hU~M bi shan+d+re/ ni mo rad na tra yA ya/ na mo sh+tsa/ Da d+ha ba pra/ 5/

198b1: yak+Shas na ba tas/ tathA/ a d+hatas ma la/ an la ba shan te/ badz+rab d+hani/ brda na bi bdagan/ bang mu sna / ba a ta/ badz+rag te/ badz+rag na/ badz+ra ma zang / bang // ba dang / badz+ragan tu
198b2: badz+ra yi kar tsam/ badz+ra ma ne ta ra ma/ badz+ra dun ting / badz+ran lam/ badz+ran lam/ badz+ra kr-i ta/ badz+ra mu gr-ing / badz+ra ka lam/ badz+ra us swA/ badz+ra ba ka rad lA/ badz+ra bi d+ha tsa can ka khan Sha/ tu t+ta She/ sarba a/
198b3: sarba ma a ka ra Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ ban d+ha ya ban d+ha ya/ sarba DA ki ni nan/ e a ra li ma nu sma ra ya phaT/ mi yi srin mo tshangs mo dang / khro bo dang ni 'jug sred mo// gzhon nu ma dang dbang po dang / rdo rje dmar
198b4: mo bdud rtsi mo/ zhi ba ma dang be con mo/ zin mo dang ni za ba mo/ rdo rje dga' ba mo dang ni/ shin du khrag 'thung che ba mo/ gcig pu spyod dang yid 'phrog mo// grub mo dang ni rlung mo dang / rdo rje yang ni gsod chen mo dang / jo
198b5: rje yang ni gsod chen mo/ me mo phag mo rgan byed mo/ sna chen mo dang chu lha mo/ rdo rje nag mo chen mo dang / rdo rje ra ste dmar ser mo// rdo rje sngo nag bum rna mo/ rdo rje dam ra si ra dril 'khrol ma/ ma mo chen mo
198b6: khyed rnams kyis/ ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i/ 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ ye shes thob par bya ba dang / bsgrub pa rnams kyi las bya zhes/ rdo rje byin nas ming btags te/ dam bcas
198b7: bzhin du he ru ka/ da ltar khyed kyis gzugs mchog rnams/ mngon par ston la grub pa 'phrul/ ci snyed grub mchog ma phul zhing / khyed rnams mngon du ma gyur na/ rab tu sta na'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/
198b8: 'dug pa las rnams kun gyis shi ga/ oM pad ma pad mu mu ka/ a ka ra Sha ya/ a ka ra Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ bra be sha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ to sha ya to sha ya/ badz+ra DA ki nI hri da ya na/ oM au hU~M/

199a1: gtor ma dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bsgyur la kha band dang / ras chen gyis bcad la rgyamagrin dbang gi phyag tu bcas la mchod do// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las khro ba bsnyed rdzogs la
199a2: kyis bzlas pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di byung ngo // zhi ba'i mchog gtan phred ba'i phrin las rab bsdus pa/ tshad
199a3: med snying rje sbed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag la ni// sngon du 'gro ba'i las mchog ste// sgrub pa pos ni nan tanaH// khrag 'thung thugs su gnas pa ni// ye shes gtso mo mchog nyid de// gsum pa las
199a4: ni 'das pa'i phyir/ / rtse mo med pa'i las su bstan// de na gzugs dang byin rlabs dang / bzlas brjod dang ni phrin las dang // dus dang gnas dang bdag nyid dag/ phun sum tshogs pa bdun po ste// btab na
199a5: ci 'dod sbyin no zhes/ / dam tshig bdag pos rab tu gsungs// 'das na lha yang brlag pa'i phyir// rang gi bka' las 'di mi 'da'// gzugs ni thugs kyi phyag rgya dbyings la ste// lcags dang lcags lnga se
199a6: ldeng la sogs pa tsher ma can gyi shing las sor brgyad dam bcu gnyis par byas pa mgo mjug ma nor bar shing cab phyogs su mgo byas la/ sor brgyad la sor gcig la rgya mdung rked par sor
199a7: gcig la rgya mdung stod zur brgyad/ / srad zur gsum du byas la ri rab ltar brjid pa 'dug pa ni gzugs so// byin rlabs ni thog ma nyid sku gsum du byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ de'i 'og tu rgya mdur
199a8: gzhal med yang du dmigs te/ phyogs pazhi dbus dang ldang/ hUM spelam lnga bzhag ste/ dbus su he ruka/ shar du 'ams gsum rnam par rgyal ba/ ster gshin rjegashed/ nub turta ma zin byang du skabs pom/

199b1: 'di rnams so so'i snying po dran pa tsam gyis bskul te/ phyi nang gi mchod pa ci 'byor pa phul te/ dam tshig rjes su bkug nas gnyis su med pa'i rgyan rdzogs par mdzad pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur byin gyis
199b2: po/ / de nas sras phur bu'i khro bo bskyed pa ni/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha kI li kI la ya ma na phaT/ ces brjod pas lte ba yan chad mthing nag la dbu kham pa zur gsum pa'i thabs su bsgreng laM/ zang gis 'gro chen po dang /
199b3: thod rnon gyis bcings shing bshams la/ stan gsum sdang mig tu bzad de/ phyag g.yon pa'i phur bul gzugs/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ rab tu rngam pa/ dur khrod kyi se phung gi nang du lte ba man chad sngags
199b4: kyi phur bu zur gsum pa/ e'i nang du sum cha tsam nub pa la phyag bzhi la g.yas kyi gong ma sta re/ kha yar bstan te brdeg par bya ste/ g.yon pa ri rab kyis gnon pa'i stabs su 'dzin pa/ g.yon dang
199b5: bos rdo rje kha T+wAM ga 'khrol zhing bdud kyi khams 'jigs pa/ 'og ma phur bu zur gsum 'debs pa'i stabs su gzas shing / ngan song gsum du 'jigs pa/ stobs dang mthu la sogs pa khro ba thams cad
199b6: 'dus pas kyang che ba gcig phyung ste/ rtag pa chen po zhugs par bstan pa ni sprul pa'i mur byin gyis brlab po// de la rigs lngar byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ 'bru lngas gnas lnga byin gyis brlab bo// sku gsung
199b7: thugs su byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ spyi gtsug tu so/ rked par hUM/ rtse mo ra~M phaT bsam mo// de'i 'og tu thugs kyi ye shes rtse gcig par byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ zur gsum du pa Ta gsum/ des
199b8: gsum du hUM gzhag go/ / de nas sku bltas pa dang / rigs so so'i khro bo thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar bya ste// khro bo dkyil 'khor de dag nyid phyogs bcur 'phros pa slar 'dus nas/ hUM hUM phaT phaT

200a1: kyis sku 'byin cing de'i skul bstims te/ dbang dang byin rlabs thams cad bsnan par bya'o// de nas 'gro ba'i don la gshegs nas phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad dang / sngon thugs
200a2: dam du zhal gyis bzhes pa lags pas des gros mdad cing bskul ba la bzhugs pa dang / bdag nyid kyang bdag nyid chen po yin pas phur pa yang bdag nyid chen po nyid du dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brna
200a3: par bya ba'i phyir/ lag par ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i steng du hU~M/ g.yon pa'i steng du a las tha ba'i dkyil 'khor dbyu ba'i dung ba ma // mthe bo la hUM/ 'dub mol / srin lag la
200a4: mthe'u chung la ha/ 'di rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i steng du bzhag ste/ su ra ta s+t+waM zhes brjod pas thal mo mnyam par sbyar la/ oM badz+ra a dza la hUM/ zhes brjod pas sor mo cung zad bsnol lo//
200a5: oM badz+ra ban d+ha hU~M zhes brjod pas sor ma rgyab tu bsnol la bsdam mo/ sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod pas zur ba blangs te chang ba'i nang du bcug la/ lag pa chang ba phye la mthe bo dang phrin la gdang mthe'u chung dang gnyis kyi lang du yang gzhug/
200a6: mthe bos chung zad bskul zhing drung ngo // oM badz+ra a be sha ya/ a a zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa yab yum sras dang bcas pa thams cad zhe sdang rjes su dran pa'i sku yungs 'acu
200a7: tsam par mtshams med par phur bal bsdu zhing bstim mo/ / sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po chen po nyid du rdzogs pa'i byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur bar bya ste/ ser ma chub tu bsnol la grang mo bshabs
200a8: te/ bsgreng ba'i bar du phur ba btsug la/ oM badz+ra sa tra ra dza hUTazhes brjod pas bzlas so// de nas sor mo bug zug byas te/ lag pas zur ba bzung la/ oM hUM hraM phur bu ba phaT zhes brjod pas de nas ra

200b1: mo rgyab tu bsnol la the bong gnyis bshigs pa'i chad babacug nas/ oM ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ han ha na/ ti ba ta tsakra hUM phaT/ ces brjed nas dril te/ bdag nyid chen po thams cad gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba mdzad
200b2: pa'i gzi byin thams cad dpung pa'i skul bstims pas stong gsum gang bar mi stag 'phro zhing / dmigs pa thams cad sgrub pa'i byin dang / dbang dang ldan par gyur te/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la a'i gdan
200b3: la bzhugs par gsol nas yungs dkar gyi rgyal pos brab cing gu gul sbyar bas bcugs la/ phyi nang gi mchod pa thams cad mchod par bya'o// de nas yid la brnag pa'i phrin las yos te de'i byin par
200b4: so/ / bzlas brjod ni bdag nyid las kyi lha'i ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs la snyid khar nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor la hU~M mthing nag pa cig bsams la/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha kI li kI la ya mA ra ya phaT ces brjod pas phur bu'i
200b5: khro bo co 'dra bzhig de las byung ste phyogs bcu thams cad du sems can gyi don byas nas phur bul bstim mo/ / 'di 'bum 'am/ bdun 'bum 'am/ sa ya bye ba snyed bya ste bsnyen pa gtong bar 'dod
200b6: naphur bu nyid snying ka la bsdu ste/ 'di ni bzlas brjod do// 'phrin las ni thog ma nyid brtag pa'i sa rnyed nas bskrad pa dang mtshams gcad pa// la sogs pa byas nas skad cig ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
200b7: khro bo'i sdang mig dang / mtshon cha'i char dang / rdo rje gnad sbyin la sogs pas/ bskrad nas phung ba bcu khri bo bcur byin gyis brlabs te phyogs bcur btab nas ci tsam 'dod pa thams cad mtshams
200b8: gcad do/ / rigs lnga'i lha mnyes par bya te/ de nas las kyi lha mnyes par byas nas/ de nas ting nge 'dzin gong nas byung ba dang / bsnyen pa tshang nas gnas chen por dkyil 'khor gru gsum la

201a1: me lho phyogs su bsnun te/ zhing chen gyi thal ba dang / se tshe dang / lan tshwa dang zhing chen gyi rag ta dang / srub mi'i lo mo'i lo ma dang / khre dang ci tsa dang / sum ma dang / grog mkhar gyis dang / bor bu'i
201a2: bdud rtsi las sbrus te/ zhing chen gyi thal ba ma rnyed na til nag po las gzhi blangs te gzugs byas kyang rung / ri mo bris la mdog spug nag tu bgyis te shul ba la sogs pa la zhing chen gyi rag tas hUM che ge ma
201a3: mA ra ya phaT/ ces bris te/ snying kar glan te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gan rkyal du bzhag ste/ mgo bo lho phyogs su bstan te/ gdon de nyid dgug pa ni mngag gzhug gam/ khro bo sum b+ha ni sbyor ba yi rung ste/
201a4: gsang ba'i thugs kha 'am snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dmar po zhig bzhag la dzaHhU~M ba~M ho/ badz+ra aM ku sha che ge mo zhig hUM zhes brjod nas khro bo lcags kyu can grangs med pa brgyud ma sha stag byung bas bgegs/
201a5: kyi snying kha nas bzung ste// der 'ongs pa dang / dzaHhU~M ba~M ho/ che ge mo mar ya pra pe sha phaT ran tsam du brjod la// gzugs sam ri mo la phab la lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya
201a6: bcings pa dang / bsdams pa dang / de'i sems ma 'khrugs par dag par byas nas e'i nang du rtse mo 'og tu song bar bsam de nas phur ba blangs te/ las kyi lha'i snying po dang bcas pas drag tu chung zad
201a7: bskul lo/ / thal mo sbyar phur bu thabs kyis gsor la rdo rje sder mo'i sngags bzlas nas ting nge 'dzin gsal bar ma khugs kyi bar du dril na ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa dang / gdan gyi steng du rtse mo nas
201a8: gang tsam ma reg par gzas la khro bo'i skye 'am rked pa nas lag pa g.yon pas bzung ste/ / rdo rje tho ba'i sta re lag pa rdog cing rdo rje sder mo'i sngags lan gsum dang / nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab cing bzlas

201b1: te ser ldeng gi phur ba sor brgyad pa gcig snying khar btab dpral bar gcig gdab/ dpung mgo gnyis dang brla'i nang rol gnyis su yang gdab/ lte ba khung du yang gdab/ sder mo'i sngags/ na maHsa man ta
201b2: kA ya bAkatsi d+ha badz+ra nan/ oM ga ga ga ta ya/ sarba dush+man/ ma ra ya phaT/ kI li ki lA ya sarba ba bam phaT/ hUM hUM badz+ra ki li ki lA ya badz+ra d+ha rod/ a dz+nyA pa ya ti kA ya bA ga tsit+ta badz+ra ki la ya hU~M phaT drag tu brjod do// phur ba
201b3: bteb zin nas de'i steng du las kyi lha phyag rgya dang sngags kyis mnan te lag pa gnyis sor mo bsnol ba mthe bo dang mthe' chung rtse sbyar brkyang nas gzhan ni drag por rgyab tu bgyed de'i sngags/ oM badz+ra ga rba kro d+ha hU~M phaT/
201b4: lan nyi shurtsa gcig bzlas te g.yas phyogs su bskor te ki la ya'i mgol lan gsum bdug go// de nas phur bslar mi 'byung ba dang / sus kyang mi byin pa dang / lhag par yang zad cing thal phyin par bsam mo//
201b5: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstun te/ sor mo rnams rgyab tu bsnol la btsungs nas gung mo gnyis rgya ba sbyar rtse mo rnon por bslar la phur ba'i glang du gnan// phur ba'i lha dang bgegs che ge mo khyod dam tshig
201b6: 'di las pa 'da' zhig par bsgo zhing sngags 'dis lan bdun bzlas so/ / oM sarba ta thA ga tA sa ma ya hU~M phaT ces bya'o// 'di ni sems ma dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ bsgo ba thams cad nyan par bsam
201b7: ser mo gnyis nang du bsnol te/ mthe bo dang mthe'u chung ngo sbyar la sbed/ khu tshur mi bcang bar sor mo rnams phyir bskyed dpur ba'i steng du gnan cing sngags 'di brjod de// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha na ta na/ dang da
201b8: pAtsa dA tsa/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ts+tshin dats+tshind/ can can pha Ta/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// stobs po che'i sngags dang / phyag rgya ste// gong du bka' nyan pas bdag gis dbang du gyur nas ci bsgo ba thams cad

202a1: bran bzhin du las byed par 'gyu ro/ / yungs dkar gyi rgyal pos brdeg/ gur bum sbyar mas bdugs la gzhag go// de nas lag pa gnyis sbyar la/ mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig 'khyud 'dzub mo gnyis
202a2: sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig 'khyud/ 'dzub mo gnyis la gram la g.yas g.yon du sgred yid tsam dag par bya lhag ma rnams nang du bcangs la 'dzub mo gnyis mche bar bsams te/ rkang pa
202a3: g.yon pas bgegs kyi snying kar mnan te lan bdun bzlas/ oM badz+rakle d+ha la k+Sha ga kha/ khA h+Na ShAH/ b+h+rUM hUM phaT phaT/ ces brjod de/ de nas rdo rje btson gyi sngags dang byug rgya ste/ lag pa gnyis de rje sa grar+b+ba d+haH
202a4: spel la mthe bong g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag/ 'dzub mo gnyis do sbyar te bsgred nas sngar mig tu bgrod la rdeg cing sngags 'di lan bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gam brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM
202a5: dzakri drA ma hA ba la/ ha na ha na daha pa tsa bi d+h+waM sa ya dza ti lam bo d+ha ra mA~M sa makro d+hi hU~M phaT ces brjod do// de nas yungs dkar gyi rgyal po brdeg cing las 'di shin du brtan zhing grub par bcol lo// rdo rje
202a6: brjid gnon gyi bsam gtan gyis gnan par bya'o/ / khro bo rnams kyi spyi bo nas 'dus pa'i steng du hUM mthing nag la rdo rje lcags kyu'i rgya gram me lce'i phreng bas bskor ba'i rgya gram gyi dkyil 'khor yi ge ga suM/
202a7: gser btso ma'i mdog 'dra ba zhig tu gnas pa las/ oM badz+ra badz+ra merta hUM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod pa las gser gyi ri rab dpag tshad dbye ba gru bzhi pa gcig tu gyur la de'i steng na bcom ldan 'das don
202a8: yod grub pa sku mdog ljang ku dbu gsum phyag drug la/ phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje 'bar ba phyar te bsnams/ g.yon dang po rdo rje rgya gram thugs khar brtan/ 'khor dpag du med pa'i pho brang gtams pa khro ba

202b1: rnams kyis shin du gzir zhing mi g.ye ba dang / las ma grub na bskal pa mthar thug na yang gnas par bsam/ phrin las kyang de bzhin du bcol te gzhag go// yo byad thams cad kyang nag por bsam/ gtor ma
202b2: dag po che gcig bshams te dam tshig can gyi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la bsngo zhing dbul lo// drag po'i gtor ma cha gcig gnod byed de nyid bkug ste zar gzhug go/ phrin la sa 'di
202b3: 'dus su phra men ma dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / srin mo nams kyang spyan drang / gtor ma dbu la lo// dza b+h+r-i ba~M ho/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn bya da yak+Sha dza/ b+h+yo ru lu ru lu hU~M zhes lan gsum brjod de spyan drang / pra ti ts+tsha ho/
202b4: zhes brjod la gtong / oM sa ma ya arge pra tits+tsha hUM swA hA zhes lan gsum brjod la a mri ta phul la las bcol lo/ 'di'i phrin las so// dus ni chos bcu bdun nam mar gyi ro la nyin mtshan gyi gung du
202b5: gza' dang sbyar ba dang / bsnyen pa chad pa dang / rtags byung ba la sogs te 'di ni dus so// gnas ni shing rkang gcig pa dang gnod par nges pa te/ 'di ni gnas so// bdag nyid byang chub sems la gzhol zhing
202b6: mang du thos pa dang / la sa la mkhas pa dang / lha nye bar gyur pa dang / mi phyed pa'i dad pa thob pa dang / drag cing ltos pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / gzhan la re ba med pa dang / dam tshig
202b7: mnyams pa'o/ / 'di ni bdag nyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang / gnan bzlog drug tu bka' stsal to// zhe
202b8: ba'i zhi ba chen po ni dkyil 'khor 'dom gang thab khu da zlum po chag gang thab kyi dkyil du 'khor lo brtsibs bzhi mtho gang zlum po phar sor gcig/ 'jim pa'am bong bar 'bul du brkos te gzhag

203a1: rnab kyi la khyed do rdo rabs bstod / / rtso rol blam pal pad+mam 'dab brgyad / gas mo dang / mchod pa'i lha ma ga/ bsreg pa'i sa thazhug/ gags/ ma dgapa kha bak+Sha d+ha/
203a2: 'bras can// 'bras thug/ 'bras yos/ til zho// nas thug/ so ba/ gro so ba/ til so ba/ sran ma sha/ yungs kar/ 'bras kyi lag pa na/ gtor ma dkar po// 'bras la bgyi/ yo byad thams cad dkar po//
203a3: tshen dkar pos bri/ chas gos gsum dkar po/ lha'i sku mdog kyang dkar po/ grangs dang sbyar nas mchod par bya'o// rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi/ lha ni snga ma'i steng du gnod sbyin mo brgyad
203a4: kyis bstan/ pho nya yang 'byung ngo // yo byad thams cad kyang ser po/ dgang gzar ser po/ phrugs su bcas pa grangs bzhin du dbul lo dbang gi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng
203a5: du zla gas phyed par bcad pa'i tshul du bya/ las kyi lha pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug dgod/ bsreg rdzas dmar po/ gtor ma dmar po/ chas gos dmar po/ lha'i grangs bzhin du dbul drag po'i dkyil 'khor 'dom
203a6: gang gru bzhi dbus su gru gsum zabs su khru phyed/ / gru gsum du mda' gzhu/ mtha' thod pa gsam snying gis bskor/ dpal chen po dang khro bcu dkod// yo byad thams cad nag po/ bsreg rdzas nag po/
203a7: dkyil 'khor yang nag po/ gtor mu yang nag po/ las kyi khro bo bcu dang / phra men ma chas gos nag po/ sbyin bsreg lha'i grangs bzhin du dbul lo// oM shan ting gan ting ti kar pra sha ma ni rA tsa ta/ a ba
203a8: ba sra ba ba/ a mu ka si/ swa sti shi paM/ ku ru swA hA/ zhi ba'o// ba shing ku ru pra sha ma na ye ho/ pus tid ku ru swA hA/ sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka rol pa las khro

203b1: boganan bzlog gi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po thugs gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di phyung ngo // dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ thig bzhi brdabs pas re'u
203b2: cha bu/ dbus su zla ba pyod par bcas pa'i tshul du bya/ de'i phyi rim phra men ma bcu drug/ sgo ba bzhi/ kham por ri mor bris pa dgu/ snang ba'i 'od bcas pa dgram/ tshil chen dang ni tsi ta'i tog/ ras chen 'phan
203b3: gdugs la sogs pa/ dkyil 'khor rgyun du bri bar bya// ban da'i gnam yol/ shing gi rgyal mtshan/ thod pa'i phreng ba la sogs pa dgod/ rag ta dri chen gyi maN/ la b+hA/ yo byad thams cad tshad bar
203b4: bsogs la/ 'phags pa mchod cing bdag kyang bza'o// dam ma 'dres shing mi gcig pa// spyod lam yan chad ci'i sgo nas kyang sgrub pa'i zhal zas dang tshogs rnams phyi rol tu byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das
203b5: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa po nyid ting nge 'dzin gnyid dbang du mi gtad/ spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas sku gsung thugs dngos grub kyi dbyig bsgrub pa dang / srid pa gsum gyi sems can rgyu'i sdug bsngal gyis
203b6: gdungs pa rnams grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir tshul la mkhas pa dang / spyod pa gzob pas rnal 'byor bsgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o// de la dang por sgrub pa la bgegs mi 'jug par bya ba'i phyir mtshams
203b7: gcad do/ / ting nge 'dzin dang lta ba dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / rgyal mtshan dang / rdzas 'di dag gis rab tu gcad par bya'o// bsnyen pa nye bsnyen dbang yang rdzogs// rdzogs nas dngos grub blang bar/
203b8: bya/ lha yi grangs bzhin bsnyen pa dbul bar bya'o// snying po ni/ oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M zhes drang ngo // de nas bsnyen bsgrub legs pa dang / yo byad rnams phyi rol du mi 'byung / gnas su mi bgyid/

204a1: lha dang bdag mchod la sogs pa'i rjes la lhag ma dkyil 'khor ma'i 'og kya rin po ches kha bcad la sgru bar bya'o// don de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sras su d+he'i/
204a2: de ltar ma byas na dmyal bar lhung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phra men ma'i bsgrub pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi lo dbus
204a3: mu gau ru ro/ / de'i phyi ma pad ma medab ma brgyad la shar du stag gi mgo can lho drug yag gi mgo can/ nub tu med go'i mgo can/ byang dru gzig gi mgo canA/ shar lho ba bang gi mgo can/ lho nub tu drug
204a4: shud kyi mgo can dang / nub byang du srin bya'i mgo can/ byang shar du skye ga'i mgo can/ sgo ba bzhi'i dgod/ dkyil 'khor mdom gang grubazhi la/ dbus su tse'u ri/ de'i phyi rim pad ma 'dab ma bzhi la/ sha
204a5: du smigs bu'i mgo can/ lhor bya rgod kyi mgo can/ nub du sha ba'i mgo can/ byang du khu byug mgo can/ mtshams bzhir pha wang gi mgo can// pra mgo can dang / byan lag gi mgo can dang / pho rog gi
204a6: mgo can dang rnams so/ / sgo ba bzhi dgod do/ dkyil 'khor mdom ga gru bzhi la dbyas su za mo ha/ de'i phyi ri ma 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la shar du 'ug pa'i mgo can dang / lhor sbyang ku'i mgo can dang /
204a7: chub tu stsal gyi mgo can dang byang drugazig gi mgo can/ mtshams bzhir phra mo'i mgo can/ ma gon dang wa ba'i mgo can rnams so// sgob bzhi dgod do// dkyil 'khor mdom glu na
204a8: ladabus pu be ta laM/ pad ma 'dab ma bcu drug la ye shes kyi khro mo bcu drug dgod do// mtshams bzhir ye shes kyi khro mo bzhi dgod do// dkyil 'khor mdom gang kya bzhi la dbus su buka rba~M

204b1: phyi ma pa ma 'dabs ban la shar ca ka'i mags na/ lhur nas ma'a' tha~Mng kyi sag can/ rab cu lha'i mgacan/ byang dru ti'i mganan// mtshams bzhi yang skal ba dag du// 'tha ma ga/
204b2: bzhi dgod do// dkyil 'khor mdo ma grang gru bzhi la dbus sug+ha s+pha ri/ da'i phyi rim pad ma 'dab ma bzhi la shar dran rje dbyings phyung ngo // lhor rin chen dbyings blag ma/ nub tu pad ma dbyings thug ma/
204b3: byang du las kyi dbyings phyug ma/ nub du khyi'i mgo can/ mtshams bzhir phag gi mgo can ma/ byi la'i mgo can/ chu srin gyi mgo can/ ra'i mgo can rnams so// sgo bzhi dgod do// dkyil 'khor
204b4: mdom gang gru bzhi la/ / dbus su s+phu sha ni/ de'i phyi rim pad ma 'dab brgyad la shar du ste ra'i gnas nyul ma/ lhor rdo rje phud nyul ma/ nub du mchod pa'i tshogs nyul ma/ byang du de byi'i sbyor nyul ma/
204b5: shar lhor dam tshig rjes gcod ma/ lho nub du phyi nang gi mtshams nyul ma/ dur khrod gnas phyug ma'i lhag nyul ma/ de'i mtshams bzhir rdo rje sgrol nyul ma/ bsnyen pa'i mtshams nyul ma/ dgongs
204b6: pa'i don nyul ma/ dur khrod gnas nyul ma dgod do// dkyil 'khor mdom gang gru bzhi la dbus su tsaN Da li/ pad ma 'dab ma bzhi la/ shar du rdo rje snying mo/ lhor rdo rje gtum mo// nub tu dur khrod
204b7: bdag mo/ byang du rdo rje sgrol ma/ de'i mtshams bzhir rdo rje tib tib dang / rdo rje te gteg dang / rdo rje 'dzin ma/ rdo rje yid g.yo ma dang / sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor mdom gang gru bzhi la/
204b8: pu sing ta mu kha/ pad ma 'dabam brgyad la/ chu srin gyi lus la seng ge'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor mdom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su bya kri mul das ma /

205a1: la/ kang ka'i lus la stag gi mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor mdom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su sri la mu kha/ pad ma 'dab ma brgyad kyi seng ge'i lus la wa'i mgo can brgyad kyis
205a2: 'askor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor mdom gang gru ba ni la/ dbus su shwan mu la/ pad ma 'dab ma brgyad la po rog gi lus la khyi'i mgocan brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgong / dkyil 'khor mdom gang gru bzhi la
205a3: dbus su kri kya mu kha/ pad ma 'dab ma brgyad la kang kA'i lus la bya rgod kyi mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khon mdom gru bzhi la dbus su kang ka mu kha/ pad ma 'dab ma brgyad la/ spyad ku'i
205a4: lus la kang ka'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor mdom gang gru bzhi la dbus su kang ka mu kha/ pad ma 'dab ma brkyang la 'ug pa'i lus la po rog gi mgo btags pa brgyad kyis
205a5: bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor mdom gang gru bzhi la dbus su u lu mu kha/ pad ma 'dab ma brgyad la pho rog gi lus la 'ug pa'i mgo btags pa brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ de nas btso
205a6: ldan 'das phra men ma'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad do/ / bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las za men ma bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o//
205a7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs dngos grub kyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // sku dang gsung dang thugs la sprul pa'i he ru ka/ chos/
205a8: dbyings don dam rig pa'i dbyings na bzhugs/ phyag rgya yum gyi mkha' la bzhugs nas kyang / sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bdag la stsol/ ye shes khro rgyal sprul pa mang po 'phro/ phyag mtshan sna

205b1: tshogs 'gro don mang por mdzad/ las byed mkha' 'gro chos dbyings skul 'khril/ ye shes bro rgyal dngos grub bdag la stsol// phra men za byed mcheg shog 'bar ba'i tshogs/ dbang phyug 'jug byed yid
205b2: 'phrog nu ma can/ rdo rje mchu can sder chen gshog pa can/ phra men za byed chen mo dngos grub bdag la stsol/ rdo rje yang sprul chen po chos dbyings mkha' la shar/ mtshan thogs sprul pa sna tshogs 'tsha
205b3: don mdag rtag tu don mdzad thugs rje shugs las b+hang / pra ma nu yang sprul chen po dngas grub stsal// smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha
205b4: yas pa sems can rnams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol/ ye shes chos dbyings skar tshogs zla nya'i zhal/ las mdzad ye shes nan tan don la zhugs/ rgyu 'bras gnyis kyis 'gro ba'i
205b5: don dang mdzad pa/ sgo ba yab yum dngos grub stsal du gsol/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro dbyings kyi ye shes yum/ las byed ma mo kun la dbang mdzad ma/ phyag brnyan sprul pa sna tshogs 'gro don mdzad/ rdo rje
205b6: mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub bdag la stsol/ rdo rje gshog pa thogs pa yid 'phrog ma/ rdo rje sder mo phyogs bcur sprul pa 'gro// rdo rje las byed ma mo brgya yang 'gyed/ dbang phyug po nya'i dngos grub bdag
205b7: la stsol/ mi mnyam pa yi lha khyod rtag tu ni/ thugs rje spyan gyis gzigs shing 'gro ba'i dpal/ bla med byang chub bsgrub par dam bcas pa/ bdag cag las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ de nas
205b8: bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnams 'dus nas gsol pa/ sngon tshe ye shes bsnyes pa'i lha/ de yi 'khor du gtogs pa ma dang mkha' 'gro ma/ rtse gcig bsnyen kyang ye shes lha dang pra men khyod bsnyen

206a1: na/ / bstan pa'i ngas na rgyang ba dang / bslabs pa'i rnas nam mam chung // yang stan na pa nga gyu // dpal can la sa khru dum lags/ 2/ rtog nas sa/
206a2: blangs shing khubs gdung // yang bsgra la na pang ba sgrub na/ lang ka'i tshogs kyi srin mo yang // mapas byams shing med pas gzung / gdungs pa'i mchi ma'i tshul du darba// ye shes lngal thugs kyis bzad zag/
206a3: sapa// dngos grub skal dang ldan par mi dmigs kyang // sngon gyi thugs dam dbang gis dngos grub stsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs kyi sprul ba'i dngos grub 'khor nams
206a4: la phul to/ / 'khor rnams kyis kyang rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa po dngos grub stsal to// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub dbyig bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// de nas bcom ldan
206a5: 'das kyis da/ dam pa'i don gyi gsang bzab mo 'di nyid kyi sku nga gsung da thugs rdo rje las gyur nas sprul pa lcam dral 'di mgo mjug gi don rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis/ dbyings dang ye shes gnyis/ thabs dang shes rab
206a6: gnyis/ kun rdzob dang dan dam gnyis/ mdar bsdus na dan dam shAn kyi thub pa'i byang chub sems su bsdu'o// rlung 'di mgo mjug gdon dpa la kun du bzang par 'dras so// sanu du babang po su mi ba rgyas
206a7: 'khor po dang / gsung mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang / thugs me zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang / sugasung dazugs bde ba chen po ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyang byang chub kyi sems kyang 'dus so//
206a8: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i kun du bzang por 'dus pa'i don ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sdud pa po rdo rje chos la gtad do// sku gsung thugs kyi don gsang ba zab mo 'di rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa
