269b7: srid rtser 'baraHkhams gsum ma lus spyan gyis gzigasaHshangs kyis srid gsum ma lus rngub/ / snyan gyis stong gsum 'brug sgras 'gengasaHtshems kyis gnod gdug ma lus sgrol

270a1: ljags kyis glog dmar 'jig rten khyabaHkhro gnyer 'od kyis dbang du sUHphrin las rigs kyis dbul brgyanaHbcwo brgyad phyag gi dang po gnyis/ dbang bsdud rdo rje dril bu 'dzin thagayas
270a2: g .yon 'og ma'i phyag brgyad naHdregs pa'i lha brgyad ban d+ha g.yasaHtsi ta srog rtsa g.yon na bsnams 'bar ba'i chas kyis skul brgyan srung ba'i lha brgyad su la rdzogasaHg.yas g.yon zhabs
270a3: k yi dregs pa gziraHma rungs gdul ka rnams kyis gshedaHlog lta ru tra 'dul ba'i dpalaH'byung lnga'i bdag mo gnyis med yumaHdbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi sbyoraHgri gug tri
270a4: s hul bdud rtsi g.yasaHban d+ha zhing chen g.yang gzhi g.yonaHmthing nag 'od kyis kun du khya baHched 'ga' rigs kyi sprul ba 'diHdbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bskradaHsku mdog
270a5: s ngonaga'akhros shing rngamaHphyag drug g.yas g.yon dang pa yisaHrdo rje dung khrag dkrug cing gsolaHg.yas g.yon gnyis kyi phyag bzhi yisaHlha brgyad klubargyad ci te rol yus chen na
270a6: gcig phyag gnyis maHsku mdog mthing nag zhabs gnyis sbyoraHg.yas kyi nam mkha' stong khams 'degs/ / g.yon gyis 'jig rten sa gzhi gnonaHzhal nas 'byung ba lnga 'char mdza dpal
270a7: c hen yab yum byin rlabs lasan sprul pa'i dregs pa po mo gtseHbdud mo nag mo kha rlags canaHzhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing u0f7fkhram shing tri shul g.yas na bsnamasaHg.yon gyis kha T+wAM zhags pa 'be naHna

270b1: bza' zhing lpags rlon pa gsol/ / zhabs gnyis gdug pa'i snying khar gziraHbdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag maHkhram baM thod rlon phyag na bsnams/ sku la zhing lpags gsar ba bgosaHbdud rti nag po chibs su
270b2: bcibs/ / zhabs kyis dgra bgegs bzhugs kyis sgrolaH'chi bdag gshin rje nag po niHzhal cig phyag gnyis sku mdog gnagaHphyag g.yas thod khrag gri gug g.yonaHbtsun mo yum chen za byed
270b3: gri gug thod pa phyag na bsnams/ / yab yum zhing lpags rlon pa gsol tsam he 'khros dang chu glang bcibs u0f7fzhabs kyis dgra bgegs po mo mtharaHsrin po gsod byed sku mdog gnag phyag na ral gri thod khrag
270b4: bsnamasaHyum chen bsod par byed ma yang u0f7fgri gug mi thod phyag na bsnams/ can bza' shing lpags rlon pa bsolaHstag ser rol pa chibs su bcibasaHgnod sbyin gang ba bzang po ya raHzhal cig byag
270b5: gnyis sku mdog sngo/ / dar nag 'phyar zhing zhing lpags brde gaHyum chen sha za ral cig ma/ u0f7fyum gyi tshul 'dzin sprul pa moHzhing lpags gyon te gyi ling bcibasaHdrag sngags bdag po chen po ni dbang phyug
270b6: chen po lha yi gtse mdog dkar shes gri pa dan 'phyaraHna bza' dar dkar ber chen gsol/ / chibs su gnam ru dkar po bcibs// thar pa nag po ru tra'i gtseHmchod gtor dug thun phyag na bsnams/
270b7: zhing lpags dgos te dom nag bcibasaHrmu bdud rje dpon nag po ni/ Nadang nag 'byang zhing stir 'draHber nag bsol zhing rmu rta bcibasaHmu stegs ka la yag sha ni/ u0f7fmthing nag kha T+wAM tri

271a1: shwal 'dzin zhing lpags bgos te mge bci bas khyab 'jug rog ti nag po yang u0f7fwam zhing dgra sta phyag gis 'dzin pa smin nag bgos te 'brug sngon bcibs thakru rgyal ba dun li rnge ba ser nag sprul gyin bza' gsolas/ b
271a2: um pa ru sbal phyag gis 'dzin tha 'chibs su chu srin mgo dgu bcibs pa rgyal po har mdzes zhes bya ba u0f7f mdog dkar shel gyi dar dkar 'dzin u0f7fsras mchog 'bar ba dmar po steHmdung rings g.yas la shin gri g.yon rdo rje mdzes pa mdog dmar po r
271a3: u mtshon dgra sta phyag gis 'dzin/ / 'u le lag dgu 'bar ba yang u0f7fmdog gser sprul pa'i lag dgu 'gying // zhing lpags dgos shing stir gnon// drag sngags bdag po gtso 'khor 'dul// rang gi rigs kyi 'khor 'dul ba// so so'i sprul
271a4: pa bsam mi khyab/ / gcod par byed pa bdud kyi sde// 'chi bar byed pa gshin rje'i sde// bsod byed shan pa srin po'i sde// gdub tsub 'chang ba gnod sbyin sde// drag rtsal ldan pa lha yi sde// nad gdon 'bebs pa ma mo'i sde// nam mkha' dbang
271a5: skur gza' yi sde/ / glen lkugs gdug pa klu yi sde// sde brgyad smod pa'i drag sngags can// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// 'khor dang sde rigs brjod mi lang // 'phrin las longs spyod mi zad gter// yon tan nus pa dpag tu med// zhe
271a6: sdong can la 'khros par ston/ / nga rgyal can la lhag par ston// 'dod chags can la mi gdug ston// gti mug can la myos par ston// ser sna can gyis 'phrog par byed/ phrag dog can la 'jigs par ston// khyod kyis mi 'dul cig med kyis/
271a7: mchod cing skad pa'i 'thun rdzas bzhes// bcol cing gnyer ba'i las mdzod cig/ stong cing bsgrubs des las mdzod dgyes par mdzod// de nas rang gi snying po dang / 'jig rten dregs pa'i bdag po rnams// so so'i sngags kyis las la sbyar/
271a8: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis// byang chub sems kyi bsam pa yis// stobs dang re ba kun spangs te// sangs rgyas bstan pa rab dmigs nas// drag sngags bdag po nyer sbubs na// de dang sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa thob

271b1: bcing / / sems can rnams kyi ston par 'gyur// thun mong ba dang nye ba dang / mchog 'gyur rig pa'i dngos grub kun// dpa' bo de las mngon du 'byung // yon tan mchog gi stobs rnyed cing // 'jig rten chos las rab sngags pa'i// byang chub sems//
271b2: dpa'i spyod pa dang / sa chen po la rtogs pa yi// rlabs chen rnams kyang nus par spyod// mthu stobs nus pa mnyams pa yis// gzhan gyis brdzi bar mi nus shing / rang gi dbang du zhugs pa dang / bsgo brtsod pa med par 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal
271b3: to/ / drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i brgyad las// stod pa yon tan brjod pa'i le'u ste// bcu pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos/ nyid kyi sku 'jigs byed chen po'i lugs su sku sprul te/ thugs chos nyid zhi ba chen po'i
271b4: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku'i gnas thams cad las 'od kyi dra ba dpag tu med pa phyung nas// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dregs pa can gyi gnas thams cad khyab par mdzad nas// ma rungs shing
271b5: gdug pa dang gtum pa'i sems dang bsam pa thams cad yang ma lus par zhi ba byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par gyur te/ phan pa dang / bde ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / rtse ba dang / yid dga' ba dang bcas pas// phyogs der snang bar
271b6: gyur nas/ / thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang// khyod kyis bstan pa gsang chen 'di// ma 'ongs pa'i dus dag tu/ rab tu rgyas par 'gyur zhig na// bdag
271b7: cag 'jig rten dregs pa can/ / zhib sems su gnas byas pas// rjes su spyod pa gang yin pa// de la rgyas pa phan par bstan// 'phrin las dang ni lha spyod kyis// khyab pa de las yongs rdzogs zhing // grogs dang bran dang mangs bzhin du/
271b8: gang gis sgo ba de bzhin bgyi// dam tshig bsrungs pa'i yon tan dang // rol pa'i ting 'dzin ldan pa la// bka' las 'da' ba mi spyad cing // gsung bzhin bsgrub pa rab tu spro// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin khyod kyis// ji ltar mngags pa'i las rnams ni//

272a1: bdag cag nus pas myur tu bsgrub// byin gyis brlab pa gtsor mdzod cig/ ces gsol nas rang rang gi gnas su deng shing byin par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer gyi skor ba rnams// rang gi 'khor gyi snang ba thams cad
272a2: kyang / / nyid kyi sku'i dbyings su bsdus shing / sku nyid kyang chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin du gnas par mdzad do// drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las// phrin las kyi gnyer bul ba'i le'u ste// bcu gcig pa'o// // drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje
272a3: rtsa ba'i rgyud zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ / rgyag kyi mkhan pa chen po slob dpon pa dam 'byung gnas dang / bod kyi lo chub bdag TIr tsa nas bskur shing thum te gtan la bab pa'o// rgyal po khri srang lde bcan gyi blo'i byag dpel nas
272a4: bshus pa las rgyud pa'o/ / // rgya gar skad du/ lo ka to tra pu tsa tan tran ma no b+hi ka san ta ka/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa rtsa ba'i rgyud zhes bya ba// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
272a5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa rus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid gsang ba chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
272a6: dang thugs kyi/ phrin las ma lus pa yang dag par bsgrub par mdzad pa/ mthu dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / dbang phyug dang / gzugs kyis 'jigs par byed pa/ gtum po dang / drag shul can dang / dregs pa can dang stobs
272a7: can dang / bzod par dka' ba dag myur du 'dul bar byed pa/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi snying po de kho na nyid las byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtso bos chen po mthar byin pa la rab tu bzhugs pa/
272a8: 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa'i dbang phyug lha'i rigs rnams kyi bdag po chen po// lcang lo can gyi gnas dang ri rab kyi gnas kyi gnod sbyin rnams kyi dpon chen po de// 'og min gyi gnas lha'i rgyal po'i

272b1: khang bzangs na bzhugs te/ rus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od zer sna tshogs skye nas/ tshig 'di skad du bskul te/ kye kye gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin/ khyod ni sangs
272b2: rgyas thams cad kyis/ bstan pa dam pa bsrung ba yin// mthu stobs bdag por dbang bskur ste// dam tshig chen po de gzigs la// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba las// 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed pa yi// sku mchog drag po'i
272b3: gsung dang bcas/ / gtum po'i thugs kyis shugs 'byung la// gdul ka ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir/ sprul pa snga 'phrul phrin las kyis// sngon gyi thugs dam rol par mdzod// zhes skul ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de/ sangs rgyas
272b4: kyi phrin las mdzad pa'i dus la bab par mkhyen nas/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs zhi ba chos nyid de bzhin las ma g.yos kyang / gdul ba bya ba'i yul drag shul can rnams la gzigs nas// phyogs bcu na ma mkha'i mtha' dang
272b5: mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du/ sku'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa khro bo chen po'i gzugs 'di lta ste/ sku mdog 'thing na gzhal dgu pa la/ g.yas kyi zhal ni kham nag rtsigs pa/ g.yon
272b6: gyi zhal ni spug nag bsdus pa/ dbus kyi zhal ni 'thing nag 'khro zhing rngam pa// phyag g.yas kyi rdo rje 'bar bas g.yon gyi thod khrag dkrug cing gsol pa// g.yas 'og ma brgyad na lha chen po sprul ba'i mgo bcad de sngams la// g.yon
272b7: gyi 'og brgyad na klu chen po brgyad kyi mgo snams pa/ de dag kyang g.yang gzhi dang bcas pa// g.yas kyi spyan dgu gyen la bzlog pa/ g.yon gyi spyan dgu 'phreng la gzigs pa dbus kyi spyan dgu thur la sngar mig mdzad pa/ khro gnyer
272b8: drag po sprul par sdus pa/ shangs nas sred pa'i rlung drag po 'tshub pa/ zhal nas skal ba'i me 'bar ba/ mche ba dmar po bar snang khams su brtsigs pa// sma ra ag tshom sprin bzhin du btibs pa/ dbu skra ral pa kham nag srid

273a1: ba'i rtse mor 'bar zhing 'khyil ba/ / snyan nas bdug pa'i sgra chen po 'byin pa// sbrul gyi chun pos yan lag bkris pa// bdud dang ru tra bsgral ba dang glang po che'i lpags pa nam bzar gsol pa/ stag gi lpags pa
273a2: sku sman dkris pa/ khrag dang zhag gi thig le dang ri mos brgyan pa// thal chen gyis lus la blugs pa// thod pa skam po dang rlon pa dang // sha khra ga ra ri can gyis 'phreng bar byas nas brgyan pa// zhabs brgyad kyis tshangs pa
273a3: dang khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal byin chung ma dang bcas pa dag mnan pa/ yum chen mo rab tu gtum mo 'jigs byed ma rang gi sku dang mtshungs pa zhig dang mnyam par sbyor ba/ grangs med cing brjod kyis mi la dbabyi ba
273a4: til gyi gar bu bzhin du gyur pa thams cad kyang / oM badz+ra tsan d+ha sarba duSh+Tan ta ka ta na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ zhes bya ba'i gsung sgra drag po 'byin pa/ de dag re re las kyang sprul pa dang sprul pa'i yang sprul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu snang bar
273a5: mdzad pa/ / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dregs pa can lha'i tshogs dang / bdud dang / gshin rje dang / srin po dang / gnod sbyin dang / gza' bdud dang / klu dang / rgyal po dang / ging dang / ma mo chen mo rnams dang / mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang
273a6: rudza dang / mu stegs dang / srog gi bdag po dang / nor gyi bdag po dang / tshe'i bdag po dang / sngags kyi bdag po dang / srid pa'i bdag po dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / drar khrod chen po rnams dang /
273a7: yul chen po rnams dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi mtha' 'khob kyis dang / ri'i rgyal po dang / ri phra mo dang / rgya mtsho dang / chu bran dang / yongs su 'dra ba'i shing dang / nags tshal chen po dang / gnas phra mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag na gnas pa'i
273a8: 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can po dang mo'i rnam par 'dug pa dang / gtso bo dang 'khor dang khyad par rgyu ba dang / bran dang g.yog gi tshogs dang bcas pa dag gis// rang rang gi gnas nas myur ba dang zhing skrag la 'jigs pa dang / yang ba'i

273b1: sems dang / dul ba'i sems kyis 'thon ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar rlung drag po'i shugs kyis rab tu skyod pa'i shing bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du dang dbang med par lhags par gyur te// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
273b2: kyis khams ma lus pa dang / khyad par du mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na gling bzhi dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / rol ba'i chu klu'i gnas dang bcas pa dang / rire rab chen po dang / ri bdun gyi gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang / lha'i gnas
273b3: 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams gzugs med pa'i khams dang bcas pa dang / dmyal ba dang yi dgas dang / byol song gi skye gnas na gnas pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa'i chan gnas pa'i dregs pa
273b4: can rnams so so nas rang rang gi mdun na drag po chen po'i sku gzi byin dpag tu med pa/ gzhan dag gis nye ba'i thugs mi thub pa re re 'dug pa mthong ste// de dag thams cad tha dad du rang rang gi sde dpon chen po rnams la skyabs
273b5: su 'gro bar byed do/ / sde dpon chen po rnams ni 'jigs byed chen po'i sku gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la rang gi 'khor dang bcas te skyabs su 'gro bar byed de/ thams cad kyi rang rang gi gzugs dang / longs spyod dang / 'khor
273b6: dang / rgyan dang / gzhon pa dang / gnas dang nye bar bde bar spyod pa phrin las khyad par ma lus par spyan cing / ming gi snying po rnams mngon du byung ste smras so// mdA d+he ba yeng/ um d+hi ba yeng/ dra pram du bragang/ du rmi madrang
273b7: ces 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug chen po yab yum bdud po mo dang bcas pa rnams kyis rang rang gi ming phul ba'o/ / de nas gshin rje'i ded dpon rang gi tshogs dang bcas pas rang rang gi ming dang srog dang bcas pa phul ba/ hri to Ta s+dza
273b8: ya ma pred ta dza/ ma ma ya mun tri b+hi tri dza/ zhes phul lo// de nas srin po'i sde dpon rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa'i ming gi snying po// rak+Sha ra shar ma ti rak+Sha ma shu ti dza// zhes phul lo// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rang gi 'khor dang bcas

274a1: ba'i ming dang srog gi snying po/ / yak+Sha ku be rak+Sha te ma ya k+Shi ma sha dza/ zhes phul lo// de nas 'jig rten gyi gnod sbyin lha'i sde dpon kha ba can gyi dbang pos rang gi ming daphul ba/ gaM b+ha b+had tra d+he ba ta ru ti dza/ zhes phul lo//
274a2: de nas 'jig rten gyi rgyal phran gyi ded dpon lha'i the bcu gsum gyi bdag pos ming phul ba/ gau ta pa sha li ba ra tri sa ka ra sha dza/ zhes phul lo// de nas spyi bdud kyi sde dpon rang gi 'khor bcas pas ming gi snying po smras pa/ dusma
274a3: shaM dza a ka ru kaM tsadza/ zhes phul lo// de nas ye shes dang las la grub pa'i ngang dam tshig gi tshogs kyi bdag mo srid pa dbang sdud ma dang / ral pa cig ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kun gyis rang rang gi ming gi snying po phul ba/
274a4: ma ma trag mu tra ra tsa a ka tsa ti ru ru ro ti sta b+had to re tu ma ti kha mun tra ba tsa le me sha dza/ zhes phul lo// de nas 'jig rten gyi lha tsan po dang / ru tra'i rigs kyi ded dpon chen po rnams kyi rang rang gi ming gi snying po// d+he ba a b+hi sh+ya tri ru tra ni dzi ha
274a5: shaM tri dza/ zhes phul lo// de nas 'jig rten gyi bgegs kyi rgyal po dang / mu stegs byed pa dang / bdud chu ba'i tshegs kyis rang rang gi ming gi snying po/ b+hi Na ya ka ta ri thi ta ka du mun mun pa dza/ zhes phul lo// de nas 'jig rten
274a6: gyi srog gi bdag po dang / gnod sbyin klu'i bdag po rdo rje can dang // bla'i rgyal po chen po dang // lha'i dbang phyug nag po chen po'i tshogs kyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi rang rang gi ming gi snying po/ ging ka ra tri ba le ra tsa badz+ra pu ru lu dza brda la ru
274a7: tradzam hA ka la ya kI dza zhes bral lo/ / de nas 'jig rten gyi klu dang gza' skar gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyis rang rang gi ming gi srog gi snying po phyung ba/ nag tsi ta gu la na ga me k+She ta hrul gru he pa sha mi ke dzA dz+ra/ zhes phul lo// gzhan
274a8: yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dregs pa'i dbang phyug mdungs pa'i 'khor dang bcas padag gis rang rang gi lus dang srog dang bcas pa/ a a nri dze sa ma ya srog dang bred bred dza dza// zhes phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

274b1: zegs pa can 'khor dang bcas pa de dag dbugs phyung nas mi 'jigs pa byin te 'di skad du/ kye ma 'jig rten grags pa'i tshogs// khyed rnams ngal ma 'jigs shig/ nga ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sku gsang
274b2: thugs kyi 'phrin las bdag/ chos nyid zhi ba chen po yi// thugs rje dang ni ye shes kyis// dus gsum 'dus byas 'dus ma byas// skad cig nyid la mngon du gsal// ma 'ongs sems can don gyi phyir// sna tshogs lus kyi
274b3: bsad pa ston/ / dregs pa'i sde dpon khyed rnams kyang // thog ma med nas da lta'i bar// nyon mongs 'khrul pa'i dbang gyur te// gnas ngan len gyi bag chags kyis// lus ngan yid kyis mi dger spyod// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
274b4: rgyun mi 'chad/ / na rag chen po re lhung nas ni// thar pa'i dus meda' byung srid kyis// de bas da lta'i dus mchog 'dir// da dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // mdzad pa'i 'phrin las rab ston la//
274b5: sgo ba'i gsung bzhin nyan par gyis// las dang srid pa don yod la// mi dge'i bag chags dor bar gyis// srab pa'i bzhi bzung sems skyed la// mthu stobs nus pa jag shul dag/ sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rjes su spyod//
274b6: rigs 'dzin rnams kyi bka' bzhin skyongs// khyod cag rgyal po de dpon dang // bran g.yog tshul du lus brten pa// dngos grub gsol zhing phrin las skabs// gal te de ltar mi byed cing // gsad pa'i tshigs las 'gal
274b7: byed na/ / khyed kyi lus sems srog gi rgyud// da lta nyid du ma rungs 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal nas dam pa'i mtha' tshigs la bkod nas bzhag go/
274b8: 'jig rten pa'i sde dpon gyi tshogs rab tu 'dul ba/ gleng bzhi'i le'u ste/ dang po'o// // de nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i dbang phyug chen po yab yum la sogs pa'i dregs pa can gyi 'khor rab tu 'dus

275a1: ba de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gsang ba'i bdag po chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag/ 'jig rten gnas
275a2: ba'i drag shul can/ / 'dod chags zhe sdang sred len gyis// gang gis mchod cing brten byas nas// bdag cag rnams ni dga' mgur rangs// khyod kyis bka' lung rjes bzhin du// brtul zhugs 'dzin pa de dag la// phrin las spyod
275a3: pa'i grogs bya'i phyir/ / bdag cag so so'i gnas dang dus// rang gi sde dang 'khor g.yog dpung // mthun pa'i las dang longs spyod dang // cha lugs rigs dang bsam pa dang // khams dang byed pa'i tshul dag dang // dam tshig sbyor
275a4: ba'i khyad par dag/ bdag cag rnams dang ma 'ongs pa'i// rigs pa'i tshul 'dzin don phyir du// ma lus rgyas par bshad du gsol// zhes gsol bas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can dag gi gtso bo dbang phyug chen po
275a5: la sogs pa rnams so so'i las dang cig tu sbas pa dang / tha dad du sbyar ba dang / nges pa dang ma nges pa dang / rim pa dang 'tshol ba dang / phyi dang nad dang / gsang ba dang / sbas pa dang / 'tshogs pa dang / 'thor ba dang / 'thun pa'i rdzas dang / snying po
275a6: da pag pa dang / gnyer gtang ba dang / skul ba dang / rbad pa dang / bzlog pa dang / tshar bcad pa dang / gzing ba dang / spobs pa dang / las sna tshogs bdag gi sgo nas/ rol po chen po'i gsang bsku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dam tshig chen po
275a7: las byung ste/ bka' stsal to// nyon cig 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs// phyi ma'i tshan stebla ma'i dus// dge sbyong chen po'i bstan pa 'di// so so'i skye bo rnams la snang // nyan thos da rgyal rnams kyi tshul// rdo rje 'chang ba rnams kyi su// d+had

275b1: dgas las rdzogs la gsal/ / smos med chos su 'du 'bral med// ting nge 'dzin la sbyangs pas 'grub// bsam pa che snga spod pa yis// rigs drugs so'i bdag por sdang // las kyi dregs pas khyed rnams ni// 'jigs shing 'ardig
275b2: bar byed pa yis/ / gzu sa zhing dpa' la ches dpa' bas// gdul zhing drag par nus pa las// zhibs 'dul bar mi 'gyur te// rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes dran// stobs ldan dregs tshogs kun 'dul ba// khams gsum gyil dang shA
275b3: ngadang gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ / las kyi bya bar rab rdzogs pas// dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs pas// byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbenas ru// sgrib byang bsod nams bsag pa dang / bar chod bdud bzlog las la 'bad// mthun rdzas sa la pho brang bzhengs//
275b4: dam tshig drag po'i rdzas kyis zan// thod ma khar ba mdzod ldan pa'am// a khram grangs dang sbyar bar bya// dregs pa'i lus ngag yid gnas brten// ngas bshad tshul dang 'thun par dgod// phyi rol sgo sogs brgyan 'jigs ldan// dung brod chen po
275b5: nga/ ma dang / seM shes men dang / kyai ga dag po dang / kad kyin kyi bgagan// ra pa ma / nod/ yod pa tan/ da / kyi zad dpas/ yan/
275b6: snying dang bcas// so so'i thun pa'i gnas su bsham// 'bru bzang bshos dang dam tshig rdzas// bdud rtsi sha khrag snying sbyar ba// rin chen bcud kyis sbreng ba ni// grangs mnyam yang na phyogs bzhir bzhag/ gdugs dang ba dan bla res dang // lnga lnga dra bzar
275b7: tshags/ 'di la shis shing mthun pas te// stag gzigs dom dred 'phar spyad dang // kang ka du ra bya bya rgod khra// mi rtab glang ke le yi// sha r+m+mas lpags pa mgo yis bya// mda' gzhu mdung dang kha T+wAM ga/ ral gri chu gri spu gri dang // tri shul phur pa so mangs dang //

276a1: mtshanam drag pos skor ning rnams tha mdzes dang ma mdzes mnyan mi spyad// rlung ba dang gdang ba dang la ma dang na myur nuchub pad mgrang 'jas cub dra dang sa gzugs sna rnams kyis /
276a2: pa bzhin du gte/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa des/ phyin gas dpa' bsrung ba yis u0f7fgnod cing 'tshe ba tshar rabacad de/ bsod nams tshigs kyis rang rdung snang gzhan pa na byang chub sems kyis bsgrub chos rnams shin
276a3: lugs bzhin du sgom/ ma mthong ba la snying rje bskyedaHdengo bo skyed rgyu hUM du sgom// de las gnod kyi gzhi mo lAHye shes 'byung ba lnga ru bas maHsteng du rin chen ri rab kyi dbus su dung khrod gzhal med khang thod mkhar me tra
276a4: sum bcu paHgzugs brnyan bzhin du ting 'dzin skyed/ / dbus su nyi zla pad ma dang / ro bzhi stsol ba'i steng nyid duHrdo rje 'chang ba'i sku gsung thugs de nyid kun la sdang bzhin bsamaHyum chen khams gsum spyi 'dul ma//
276a5: gtso dang gnyis med sbyor ba las/ thabs dang shes rab 'od zer lasaHe dgu'i rnam par sa bon tshulaH'phro 'dus gri gug kha T+wAM gsalaHde nyid bsal ba'i rgyud sbyangs pasaH'dod khams dbang phyug gtso bo tshoHlha mo
276a6: yum dang bcas par gyur/ seng ge glang chen zhabs kyis gnonaHzhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag rnga maHna bza' ljang nag klubs ber gsolaHgci chen gri gug tsi ta bsnamasaHyum gyi kha T+wAM thod khrag bzung u0f7fya
276a7: yu ma gnyis med thugs kha na/ ya ma dun ta rak+Sha ya kA lasaHphyogs bzhir bdud dang gshin rje dang srin po gnod sbyin sde dpon dang u0f7fyab yum bcas pa gsal bar sproHgra te na ga steng 'og tu ni bdud krug nI/
276a8: sde dpon yang yub spro zhir skyed/ d+he ba tri dza du tri gang bzang lha dang rnam rgyal dang / spyi bdud sde dpon shar du skyedaHma ma dza ti d+haM ki lasaHma chen srid pa'i rgyal mo dang u0f7fral cig ma dang 'gyogs byed maHmo tshogs sde dpon n+ta

276b1: phyogs su 'o ru tras a b+hi ti shaM lasaHlha sbyin gcan dmar ril btsan gyisaHsde dpon nub kyi phyogs su bskyedaHbi tra ti thi chu rulas/ bgegs dang mu stegs chu bdud kyiHsde dpon byang gi phyogs su skyedatri yaM ra tris trinaH
276b2: lasaHsrid pa'i srog gi bdag po dang / gnod sbyin klu tsha bdud rgyal po// sku lha gsang ba rdo rje legs/ nag po chen po chos bsrung rje// shar lho nub byang sgo bzhir bskyed// phyi rol 'khyams su dregs pa can// so so'i g.yog 'khor
276b3: mang po dag bka' nyan gsung sdong tshul du bskyed/ / rang rang sngags kyis bstan par bya// dbang po'i tshul du gsal ba dang // 'jig rten rang rgyud so sol/ gnas nas 'od kyis bkye ba dang // gsang ba'i snying pos myur du bod// ting nge 'dzin gyi
276b4: tshul 'dra ba/ / rang gi gzugs brnyan lus la lcim// nga rgyud pa dang gzugs brnyan 'dres/ oM A hrIHoM badz+ra tsan d+ha sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaTaHsku gsung thugs ldan byin brlab cing // rdo rje 'chang bas dbang bskur bya// dur 'od
276b5: gnas kyi sgo bzhinas/ / bka' nyan las byed sde brgyad kyis// lus ngag gus pas phyag 'tshal zhing // phyi nang gsang ba'i 'dod yon tshegs// 'tshe zhing gdug pa'i bsam pa can// gzugs can gzugs med bcas pa yis/ dreg pa'i
276b6: tshogs la mnyes par 'bul/ sku'i cha lugs so so'o// don brtags 'thun pa'i tshig gis bstod// sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dang // phrin las smos te thugs dam skul// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku gsung thugs// bsal bstan tshad dang /
276b7: ldan pa yis// nam mkha'i khams kun mthas khyab kun// rang gi yul gsum gsal bar dmigs// dregs pa'i sde dpo ni re re'i drung // rdul snyed 'dul byed gnyen po gnas// bal bar re re'i gnas drung du// sde dpon chen po de bzhin
276b8: bsam/ / bka' nyan gsung sdong g.yo mi nub// cud tsam 'da' bar mi spyod cing // rang gi 'dod pa mi spobs la// skad cig tsam la don grub dmigs// de nyid kyis ni gtso chen gyi// bstan cing bsgrub pa tshad rtags ldan// yong

277a1: su rdzogs par gyur nas ni/ / dregs pa'i ded dpon tshags rnams kyis// so so'i gzugs brnyan gsol btab ste// rang gi ming gi snying po dang // bcod 'phrog yi ge smos te bzlas// dus chad grangs dang mtshanas
277a2: yis/ / tshad bzung ma nor grub pa yis// rtags la phab ste las la sbyar// de nyid rjes su bsgrub byed pas// dregs pa myur du dbang du sdung zhes bka' stsal to// / 'jig rten pa'i dad dpon gyis tshogs nye bar sgrub pa'i/ rtsa ba'i
277a3: las kyi gnyer gtang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// 'di dag kun las ngas bshad pa'i// sde dpon chen po rang gnas nas// bod dang bzhugs dang mnyes pa dang // bstod dang thugs dam bskul pa
277a4: ngag/ tshig brjod 'di yis brtan par bya// thugs rje rnam dag dbyings kyis dkyil 'khor nas// chos sku stong nyid dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// khro chen dpa' gtum
277a5: 'jigs byed skur bstan pa/ / thugs dam dgyes bskul gsang ba'i yum dang bcas// ma rtogs shugs kyis 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol// dregs pa'i dbang phyug 'jig rten lha'i gtso// 'dod pa'i lha mo bde chen 'byung gnas
277a6: 'khor tshegs drag shul mthu stobs dpung gi bdag/ khro gtum bdug pa'i rtsal 'chad dpal dang ldan// rdo rje 'chang gi bka' bzhin rjes su bsgrub// dam tshig rjes dgongs gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// badz+ra sarba dus Sh+TA na ma
277a7: ta na ya e dza b+h+yoHa gad tsa sa ma ya hring hring / / dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// lha chen nyi zla pad ma'i gdan stengs su// bcom ldan khro rgyal rngam brjid 'bar ba'i sku// yab yum dgyes par rol cing bzhugs su gsol/
277a8: skang srid dregs pa ma lus dad dpon gtso// 'dod khams bdag po dgyes mdzad yum dang bcas// lha srin tshogs kyi gtso chen 'khor dang bcas// 'phrin las mthun pa'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn a ta na ya a dzats+tsha

277b1: la ya steta badz+ra u0f7fdus gsum sangs rgyas thugs kyi snang po mjug/ chos kyi thu las gzugs su 'gradon sngal// ba can 'gran thus dpa khra bo'i dra// dbang bsdud lus dang bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod// phyogs bcu'i
277b2: rgyal ba ma lus sras dang bcas/ / dam bcas bstan pa'i tshul bsrung 'jig rten mgon// zhing bcu sgrol mdzad phrin las drag shul can// sde dpon sum bcu'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// badz+ra sarba duSh+Ta na a ta na ya e dza b+hoHnas mar li
277b3: hoHdpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul yab yum la/ / sku gsung thugs mnyes mchod pa 'bul ba ni// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan bla re dang // phreng ba phye ma lnga ldi zar tshags// gdug spos me tog mar me chab bsil dang // gzugs
277b4: mdzes sgra snyan dri zhim ro bro dang / / reg 'jam 'dod yon ma lus ji snyed pa'i// 'phags pa'i thun mong mchod tshogs bzhes su gsol// khyad par gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul ba ni// dus gsum nas su sbyangs pa'i sha rus khrag/ dug lnga sma/
277b5: du skabs pa'i dam tshig rdzas// stobs mchog nus pa b+ha lid mchod pang // thugs rjes mthun bI rang gis bzhes su gsol// dpal chen yab yum bka' bzhin rjes sgrub pa'i// dbang phyug chen po yab yum mnga' bdag rje// 'jig rten
277b6: 'das kyang 'khor ba'i cha lugs 'dzin/ / bka'i bstan bsrungs sde dpon sus cu la// 'dod pa'i yon tan mchod cing sbyin pa ni// dkar dmar ser ljang la sogs mdog/ zlum po kru ba zhi la sogs dbyibs// che chung sbom 'bra
277b7: ring thang tshad/ / mdzes dang mi mdzes sdug mi sdug/ 'byung ba rten 'brel rol mo'i sgra// gru tshigs bstod dbyangs bstan pa'i tshig/ spos sman bdud rtsi me tog dri// bsreg sungs pas sungs dreng dang // kha mngar tsa sbyar ska ba dang // lan
277b8: spo dang byi sgra dang / / 'jam nub sil yang cha dang bro// so so'i yon tan tshegs dang bcas// 'dod dgur 'bul gyis bzhes su gsol// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang // don snying lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// dbang po lnga dang yul lnga dang / phung po ldang nang

278a1: ros lnga/ / 'tshe zhing bsod dang bar du gcod// gdug par sems shing log par lta// mi mthun phyogs sngar bcas pa rnams// so sor 'bul gyis bzhes su gsol// badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn a ta na ya a tsadza b+h+yoHma hA b+hA ling ta a br-i ta su
278a2: ka ta/ ma sa rag ta/ bi ba ta/ u0f7fba su taHla ma ta i dam gyi tAn du sa ma duHkha khA/ kha hi kha hiHbcom ldan dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul dang // yum chen khams gsum spyi 'dul 'khor bcas kyis// sku mdog 'gyur med me long gzugs brnyan
278a3: bzhin/ / gsal zhing rtog med snang ba ma 'gags pa// sku lnga lhun grub rdzogs pa'i dngos grub gsol// gsung mchog 'gag med brag cha sgra snyan bzhin// snyan dang mi snyan grag stong tshangs pa'i gsung // gsung dbyangs nam mkha'i mthas 'khyab
278a4: dngos grub gsol/ / thugs mchog spros bral bsam 'das chos kyi dbyings// mi rtog bde chen thabs dang shes rab dang // rtsol med mi g.yo mchog gi dngos grub gsol// yon tan brjod kyis mi lang sna tshogs yod// 'das dang ma 'das
278a5: mchog dang thun mong gi/ grub pa brgyad dang mthar thug dngos grub gsol// 'jigs pa brgyad sogs zhi dang 'byor pa rgyas// log lha mos pa'i tshul gyis dbang du bsdud // mngon spyod dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i dngos grub gsol// badz+ra sarba/
278a6: dus stan a ta na ya e dza ka ya sid d+hi bA ga sid d+hi tsiti sid d+hi/ g+hu na sid d+ha/ ka ra ma sid ti hU~M hU~M hU~MHbcom ldan dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul ni// dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad de// sku mdog mthing nag 'khro zhing rngam// g.yas kyi zhal gsu
278a7: skug nag bgrang/ / g.yon gyi zhal gsum kham nag brtsigs// dbu sba ral pa me dpung 'bar// spyan dgu sdang mig bzlog cing bgrad// shangs nas srid pa'i rlung nag 'ther// snyan nas stong gsum 'brug sgra 'dir// sma ra ag chom me
278a8: ltar 'bar/ / 'chi brtsigs srid gsum rtsa ba gcod// phyag dgu g.yas g.yon dang po'o// rdo rje thod khrag dkrug cing gsol// g.yas kyi phyag brgyad 'og man// dregs pa'i lha brgyad sgral ba'i// g.yang gzhi mgo bor bcas te bsnam// g.yon gyi

278b1: phyag brgyad 'ogaman/ / klung chen brgyad kyi ban d+ha ra// dregs pa'i snying khrag skad nas gsol// dpa' bo'i chas brgyad yul rdzogs// zhabs brgyad brkyang bsum dong stabs kyis// khams gsum bdag po sde bzhi gnan// ma
278b2: chen khams gsum spyi 'dul ma/ / zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag su// rdo rje 'phyar zhing thod khrag stob// gnyis med thugs kyi phrin las kyis// 'jig rten dregs pa bran du 'khol// lha srin sde brgyad las la 'gyed// dgra pa gakra/
278b3: bdug partsad nas gcod// khro rgyal gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal gyi bka' bzhin las mdzad pa'i// lha chen dbang phyug chen po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing // phyag g.yas gri gug tsi ta g.yon// lha mo
278b4: mde ba ni/ / sku mdog mthing nag gtso la bdud// phyag g.yas rtse gsum thod khrag g.yon// seng ge glang chen gdan la bzhugs// sde dpon dregs pa kun gyi gtso// yab yum sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdud kyi rgyal po'i snga
278b5: dpon ni/ / khram shing g.yas la dgra sta g.yon// bdud rta nag po'i khri la bzhugs// sbyor yum bdud mo re ma ti// bram bam g.yas la nad stsal g.yon// bod bugya dmar gdan la bzhugs// gshin rje'i sde dpon chen po ni// be con
278b6: g.yas la thod dbyug g.yon/ / sbyor yum gshin rje za byed mo// phyag gnyis srid pa'i 'khor lo bskod// yab yum ma he chu glang gnon// srin po'i sde dpon glog 'phreng can// phyag gnyis thog ser 'dril zhing 'ben// srin mo sbal
278b7: mgo khrag migam/ / phyag g.yas phur pa khrag por g.yon// yab yum 'brug dang rnga mo gnon// gnod sbyin sde dpon ma sbal ni// phyag g.yas rin chen g.yon ral gri// sbyor yum gnod sbyin nag mo ni// phyag g.yas spu gri g.yod
278b8: sbyang ngo ro/ / skrag seng phag mo zhabs kyis gnan// bza' bdud ded dpon chen po ni// phyag g.yas mda' gzhu g.yon sbrul zhags// sku smad sbrul 'khyil 'brug chen gnon// sbyor yum thog gi bu yug can// g.yas g.yon phyag

279a1: gis thog ser 'bebs/ / klu tan ded dpon chen po ni// phyag g.yas sbrul zhags g.yen nad kyal// sbyor yum klu mo nag mon// sbrul mgo phyag mtshan yab kyi tshul// yab yum chu srin rus sbal gnon// phyogs kyi
279a2: steng 'og gnas bzhugs pa'i/ / dregs pa'i ded dpon 'di dag ni// kun kyang sku mdag mthing nag la// 'khros pa'i cha byad 'jigs tshul can// dur khrod g.yang gzhi'i chas kyis rgyan// rang gi tshogs 'dus phrin las
279a3: mdzad/ / yab yum bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod// gnod sbyin lha'i rgyal po no// shel gri bde ni dkar po 'dzin// rgod dkar ru bzangs zhabs kyis gnon// gnam rgyal chen po ded dpon ni// phyag g.yas ldan da/
279a4: g.yon shel gri// rta dkar rngog dmar zhabs kyis gnon// spyi bdud rgyal po gu rum rtse// phyag g.yas pa dan g.yon shel gri// zhabs gnyis rdo ma rdo bo gnon// dkar po'i ded dpon chen po gsum// shar phyogs ga naH
279a5: la phyag 'tshal bstod/ / srid pa'i ma mo ded dpon mo// 'khor lo g.yas la me long g.yon// zhabs gnyis 'brug mo mgo mgu gnon// sngags kyi bsrungs ma chen mo ni// tsi ta g.yas la spyad mo g.yon// dre rta nag mo
279a6: zhabs kyis gnon/ / mkha' 'gro nag mo mgyogs byed ma// rgyu zhags g.yas la mtshon grug g.yon// so bya nag po zhabs kyis gnon// nag mo'i ded dpon ma mo gsum// lho phyogs gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod/
279a7: rdo rje bdud 'dul nag po ni// g.yas g.yon phyag gis thun khrig 'phen// brag can srog zan dmar po ni// mda' gzhu 'phen zhing dar dmar 'phyar// che ba can 'god rgyal chen po ni// shing gi bar ni zhags pa 'dzin// dmapa
279a8: ded dpon rgyal po gsum/ / kun kyang rtadamar zhabs kyis gnon// nub phyogs skyong la phyag 'tshal bstod// byin ya ga bgegs kyi rgyal// phyag g.yas kha T+wAM g.yon thod khrag/ phyi rol skyongs pa'i mu stegs gso// tsu

279b1: g.yas la thor khrag g.yon/ / mu bdud chen po phrag med ni// mda' gzhu dang ni shang lang 'dzin// nag po'i tshogs kyis ded dpon gsum// bdud rta nag po zhabs kyis gnon// byang phyogs gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod// tshangs
279b2: pa'i rgyal po srog gi bdag/ spu gri g.yas la nyi zhags g.yon// seng ge dkar po zhabs kyis gnon// bdud kyi rgyal po ner gyis bdag/ bdud zhags g.yas la spu gri g.yon// ba glang sna rings zhabs kyis gnono// sku
279b3: lha'i rgyal po yul gyi bdag/ phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon pa dan// ra dkar gan ma ru zhabs kyis gnon// nag po chen po tshogs kyi bdag/ phyag g.yas be con g.yon tha~Md khrag/ rta nag mgyogs pa zhabs kyis gnon// phyogs
279b4: kyi sde dpon chen po bzhi/ / sku mdog dkar ser dmar nag mdzes// sgo bzhir gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod// sde dpon dregs pa 'di dag ni// 'khri zhing gtum pa'i tshul 'chang zhing // na bza' g.yang gzhi 'jigs pa'i chas//
279b5: sna tshogs mdzes pa'i brgyan dang ldan// rang gi 'khor g.yog tshegs kyis skor// sprul pa'i cho 'phrul bsam mi khyab// mchod stod chen pos khyed sgrubs na// so so'i tshogs 'dul phrin las mdzod// zhes brjod ting 'dzin ldan pa
279b6: yis/ / dregs pa'i ded dpon mchod cing bstod// 'di ltar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'jig rten gtso bdag gzhung bzhin smra ba// rdo rje 'dzin dang gnyis su med// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi ded dpon nye bar bsgrub
279b7: rdo rje'i dam tshig mchod bstod kyi le'u ste/ gsum pa'o// // de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// 'jig rten dregs pa dbang sdud cing // char gcad las la skol ba'i phyir// byin brlabs gnas pa'i dbang bskur bshad// gsang
279b8: shing dben pa'i gnas dag tu/ / sngar bshad las kyi pho rang bsham// yo byad rdzas kyi khyad par 'phags// ma lus par ni gzung bar bya// rdo rje 'chang ba rjes 'brang bcas// mtshan nyid ldan pa mngon sum sbyar// dus kyis grangs

280a1: dang mtshan mi'i rtags/ / bsnyen pa'i lung bzhin brtson par 'bad// gzugs brnyan bdag po slob ma rnams// khyad par gnas pa'i stag gon bya// bris dang skos pa la sogs pa'i// sde dpon rnams kyis gzugs brnyan
280a2: dang / brar pa grangs dang mnyam par dgram// gzhan yang bum pas mchod gtor dang // dug gter thun gtor thun rdzas dang // sha khrag bshos chang bza' btung sogs// rgyal mtshan bdan mda' dang gzu// dpa' bo'i chas dang
280a3: rol mo'i sgra/ / rab tu brdar zhing mdzes par bsham// rdo rje 'dzin pas ting 'dzin pasar// las kyi rgyal pos mchod bstod bya// rgyu dang mdangs kyis thugs dam bskad// bshags dral btsugs spyad dpa' ba bya// mos shing spros
280a4: dang ba yis/ / bdud 'dul gtso la skyabs su 'gro// bstan pa bsrung bar sems skyed de// bla ma sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin / te dug dang gnyis med la// gdug byed log blta 'dul nus pa'i// mthu dbang chen po'i zhing 'tshal gyis//
280a5: ba'i thugs kyis dgongs nas ni// dkyil 'khor dam par bzhug tu gsol// nyon cig skal ldan rigs kyi ba// dus gsum sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs// gnas pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// spro ba 'jug pa khyod lagra
280a6: kyis/ / mngon spyod brtul zhugs dam pa yis// dam tshig chen po'i sar 'dug shog/ mgon po he ru dka' dpal che// 'dul ba'i 'khor tshogs bcas pa'i// drag shul spyod pa'i pho brang du// mdzes pa'i me tog bdag 'bul
280a7: gyis/ / rdo rje dam tshig 'di bzhes la// dregs pa 'dul nus dngos grub gsol// pra ti b+hin bus pa hU~MHdpal ldan rdo rje 'chang ba'i// rjes 'jug rigs kyi bu khyod ni// thog ma med nas da lta'i bar// bstan pa bsrung ba'i skal
280a8: ldan ste/ / de dpon dbang chen dkyil 'khor 'dir// bstan la rab dga'i sems kyis ltos// badz+ra ya sa ma ya ma d+ha la tsag shu pra da sha ya phaT/ rdo rje bdud rtsi dam tshig chu// 'di las dus gsum 'da' mi bya// grub pa'i 'bras

280b1: bu gnyis yin te/ / tshul bzhin mi 'da' bros dor cig/ ma hA sa ma ya i dan te na rag kan ShA ba mi laM// rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' drin che// thugs rjes rtag tu byin brlab phyir// 'di nas rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bar// mthu stobs dngos
280b2: grub stsal du gsol/ / badz+ra sa ma ya tsi ta sid d+hi sid d+hi hU~M// thog ma'i sangs rgyas sras bcas kyi// rjes su sgrub pa bdag yin gyis// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// lha dang dregs pa mthu stobs can// gtso dang 'khor du
280b3: bcas rnams kyis/ / sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dgongs// rdo rje slob ma rigs 'dzin la// dbang skur dngos grub rtsol mdzad pa// nus chen rtags mtshan bstan du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal ldan gyis// khri stan chen po
280b4: steng 'dug la/ / snod ldan slob ma mdun bzhag ste// dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i bum pa yis// sku gsung thugs su dbang skur bya// gnyen po gtso dang gdul bya'i yul// drags chen yab yum 'khor bcas kyi// mdzes pa'i
280b5: sku gzugs sku'i dbang / / so so'i tshig bstod snying po dang // smon lam bcas pa gsung gi'o// rang rgyud gnas dag don rtags kyis// chos skur dbang skur thugs kyi'o// rig sbyangs stobs la ngang gis gsal// phur ba drag shul
280b6: rdzas kyi dbang / / me chod gtor bcos cha sku gsung thugs// ma lus mnyes par byed pas te// yo byad tshogs kyi longs spyod spel// rgyal mtshan pa dan sgra dang bcas// dus rnams kun du mda' thang rgyas// sha khrag drug gtor thun rdzas rnams
280b7: dregs pa'i ded dpon dbang sdud cing / / bo nya phrin las skul mdzad de// mngon spyod gdug pa tshar gcad dbang // 'di dag kyang ni gzugs brnyan sgra// don de shes pas dbang skur ste// chos kun spyi dang dregs pa'i// sde dpon so so'i dam tshig
280b8: rgyal/ / thugs rje dang ni rtogs pa yis// rang bzhin don gyis sgrol byed pa'i// dpag med don chen 'dir 'dus te// tha dad mi gnas cig yin no// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kyis// phyi nang 'khor bcas so sor snang // ma lus dbang bsku

281a1: zil nan phyir/ / so so'i snying po tshad kyis snyim// nga rgyal brtan po mdun du skyes// don snying sha khrag la sogs bza'// dug gsum tshar gcad dbyings nas dbyung // gzug brnyan snyims la rab tu gas la// dbang bsdu las bcom
281a2: gdul ba'i phyir/ / zhabs 'og mnan te bran bzhin no// dam tshig rdzas mchod sngar bzhin gso// dam tshig dbab cing bstod skul bcol// 'jig rten lha srin khyed rnams kyang // nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// zhal mthong lung bstan
281a3: mchog bsngal ba/ / srid pa'i sa bon phra mo yis// de rung 'jig rten las la spyod// rang rgyud rtsub mos pa na gnod sbyor// da ni bka'i dam tshig gzung ma 'ongs du na bya dang / bgrub par dbyed pa de dag dang // mnyam par kun la dbang sgyur te// chos nyid
281a4: rig pa'i rgyal po rdzogs/ / theg mchog ma 'dres cir yang ston// ma lus myur du rdzogs bya'i phyir// rgyal tshab spyi bor bzhag gnas pa// kun du bzang po nyid thob 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu bsgrub
281a5: pa'i rdo rje dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor du dbang skur pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o/ / / de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dregs pa'i 'khor tshogs mnyes bya'i phyir// mthun rdzas gzugs kyis skang ba ni// ri bo'i rtse 'am chu bo'i mdo// 'jig rten
281a6: dbang phyug 'dug gnas so/ / skal med yul la mchod sbyin gnas// thod mkhar re mig dgu sogs sam// yang na gling bzhi ri rab rtse// 'bru dang sha khrag sna tshogs pa// rin chen spros sman me tog rtsal// dregs pa bdag po so so yi// gzugs
281a7: rnyan rang gi 'khor dang bcas/ / sku mdog phyag mtshan yongs rdzogs shing // rang gi gdan khri zhon par bcibs// ri rab zod mkhar yang stengs su// lha chen yab yum 'khor bcas bzhugs// bad rim re mig dang po gsum// bdud
281a8: dang gshin rje srin mo dang / / gnod sbyin bza' dang klu rnams kyi// sde dpon yab yum 'khor bcas dgod// gnyis po la ni dkar po dang // nag mo dmar po nag pa'o// sde dpon bcu gnyis gnas su bya// gsum pa'i phyogs bzhir go/

281b1: bsrungs bzhi// 'khor bcas rang gi gnas su dgod// tha ma gsum 'am bzhi pa la// phyi nang gsang ba sbas pa la// gsang ba'i gter dang drag po sngags// las byed btags chags lha ma srin// sde brgyad gzugs brnyan gnas su
281b2: dgod/ / gtso chen sum bcu'i 'thun rdzas ni// rang gi gdan nam zhon pa yi// srog chags gzugs ni lnga 'am bcu// brgya'am stong ngam grub tshad bya// skyes pa bud med glang chen u0f7f// ba glang ra lug byar khyi// longs spyod skor rdzas sngar bzhi
281b3: no/ / sde brgyad dpal ba kun la ni// shes ldan mi dang byol song ste// 'dab chags gcan zan ri dgas dang // sa bcur gnas dang dud 'gro tshogs// mthong thos dran pa rnams kyi gzugs// ji ltar nus pa'i grangs kyi skor// 'di skad
281b4: pa'i yo byad na/ / 'gro ba'i drud du 'bral ba ni// rin chen dar mi brgyan ldan dang // nam mkha' sems kyi gzug brnyan dang // sku gsung thugs ldan rgyang bu dang // shing blud yul mkhar mtshon pa dang // skyes pa bud med phyag cha dang / rgyal
281b5: mtshan ba dan ru mtshon rnams/ / dregs pa so so'i sku mdog dang // mthun pa grangs mnyam gnas su dgod// mchod gtor bshos cha mar me dang // gling tshad chung ngu de bzhin no// bzlog pa sa drag po zor gyis rdzas// sbyin pa'i sa la
281b6: zor po dang / khru gsum mnyam byas dug khrag dang // thun rdzas sna tshogs rtsal ba dang // gdug pa'i shing girtsengs phur dang // b+ha drA drug thun gtor mar bcas// bzhi brgyad bcu drug sum bcu gnyis// ci rigs sbyar te mdzes par dgo/
281b7: steng du zhing lpags g.yang gzhi'am// dang nag mtshon srud gdugs kyis dbub// tha mar ras bzang yol bas bred// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// gtso chen skyed cing rdzogs pa dang // dregs pa mchod stod mnyes byas nas// gzugs
281b8: bdanamathun rdzas sngo ba ni/ / rnal 'byor ting 'dzin rgyalagasar// bdud rtsi mchod skyems rag ta spang // sha chen spos kyi dri bsrang 'bul// rnga chen gling bu rol mo sgra chen skrag/ mda' chen ba dan nag po g.yag// Sh+mi ni dpal chen ter

282a1: ha ka/ gang laka ma lus 'dul bar byed// 'jig rten dregs pa zas su za// khams gsum srid gsu mang yi dbang // sngang srid 'khor 'das nga'i bran// nga'i bka' bzhin 'dir 'dus shig/ nyon mongs dbang gis dregs pa'i/
282a2: bdud gshin rje srin po dang // gnod sbyin bza' klu rgyal po dang // ging dang ma mo lha gcan dang // rang gi sde dang g.yog du bcas// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyi thugs dam bskongs// re rab chen po'i
282a3: yang stengs nas/ / lha chen dbang phyug chen mo bzhengs// btsun mo yum dab bzhengs// na bza' dar nag ber chan gsal// tshabs su seng ge glang chen chebs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni// g.yas na po chud po nyar 'gyed g.yon
282a4: na mo rgyud las la khol/ / 'khor du 'jig rten dregs pas skor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam skar// rtsal gyi rgyal po seng ge dang // stobs kyi rgyal po glang chen dang // shes ldan
282a5: mi dang cang shes rta/ / theg chen glang dang 'dod 'ja' ba// rin chen lug dang gcand na dang // thos gsad kyi dang kha lding bya// khyed kyis bzhes pa'i skor du 'bul// rin chen rgyan ldan dar mi dang // sems kyi gzugs brnyan nam mkha'
282a6: dang / / sku gsung thugs ldan rgyang bu dang // shing ris yul mkhar mtshon pa dang // pho blud mda' dang mo blud 'phang// rgyal mtshon ba dan ru mtshon rnams// nyid kyi sku mdog dang mthun pa'i// rnal 'byor rnams kyi blung du 'bul// dam rdzas/
282a7: byar ba'i mchod gtor dang / mthun rdzas ldan pa'i bshes cha dang // sngang gas la 'ang ldan mar med dang // brgyan dang mdzes pa'i thang tshad dang // mdzes pa'i gzugs dang snyan pa'i sgra// zhim pa'i dri dang bsku ba'i ro// khyed kyi thugs dam
282a8: bskad phyir 'bul/ / lha chen yab yum 'khor dang bcas// sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs te// mdos blud mthun rdzas bzhed pa'i skor// sna tshogs sbyar ba 'di bzhes la// sangs rgyas bstan pa khyed kyis bsrungs// dkon mchog dbu

282b1: 'phang khyed kyis stong / / rnal 'byor sku sgra khyed kyis sgrol// sgrub pa po la bar gcod pa'i// stong phrag brgya bcu'i ge sa rigs rnams// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams dang // blo bur gnod pa brgyad cu gcig/ ye 'gro gsum brgya
282b2: drug cu'i tshogs/ / dus min 'chi ba rnam brgyad dang // gshis ngan 'grum pa bcwa lnga dang // gzugs can dag dang gzugs med bgegs// rmi lam mtshan ltas ngan pa rnams// zhe dang gsal zhing bzlog pa dang // gdul dang tshar bcad
282b3: las mdzod cig/ ri rab chen po'i shar phyogs nas// sred pa'i rgyal po skos rjes ni// bdud rnams kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' mthing naga'abar chen gsol// ral pa nag po mun ltar stobs// spyan mig nyi zla 'khyil/
282b4: ba 'dra/ rdo sbal 'chi ba zla chos brtsegs// smar kham nag srid rtser 'bar// tshabs su bdud rta nag po btsabs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni// khram thogs bdud sde g.yas na rol// shod thogs rtsis pa g.yon nas 'gyed// sdang srid
282b5: pho bdud khyod kyi 'khor/ / dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyi thugs dam skapa/ shugs ldan rtan ga la sogs pa// khyed kyi bzhed pa'i skor du 'bul// rin chen dar mi la sogs pa// rnal 'byor
282b6: rnams kyi byung du 'bul/ / dam rdzas mchong gtor la sogs pa// khyed kyi thugs dam skang phyir dbul// srid pa'i bdud rje 'khor bcas kyis// sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs la// ji ltar bcol ba'i las mdzod cig/ bdud
282b7: mtshan po re mo ta/ / ma bdud kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs// dpal ldan nag ma 'jigs gzugs can// nag mo sha zlog bdud phye ma// sA la mthing nag ber chen gsol// chibs su ba bu gra mar chibs// khyod kyi 'phrul
282b8: bstan pa ni/ / ma bdud 'bum phrag pho nyar 'gyed// nag po stong sde las la 'dzud// sdang srid bdud mo khyod kyi 'khor// dmatshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// cang shes bong bu la sogs pa// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dman

283a1: srid pa'i bdud mo 'khor bcas kyis/ / ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po'i lho phyogs nas gshin rje ya ma ra tsa ste// gshin rje'i tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog nag po ral pa can//
283a2: gadrug pa'i thod sbrul g.yang gzhis brgyan// gcan zan gdug pa'i lpags pas dkris// sha za'i mgo ga can thod du bcings// zhal bgrang mche ba rab tu bcigs// ma he nag po chibs su chibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan
283a3: pa na/ gshin rje pho mo pho nyar 'gyed// 'tsha bdag gshin rje btsun mo ste// gsod byed mon mo'i tshul 'dzin cing // gshin rje mo'i sde dpon bzhengs// za byed dur khrod chas kyis rgyan// g.yang gzhi nag mo sku la gsol// chu glang
283a4: nag po chibs su chibs/ / khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// yi dgas po mo las la 'dzud// snang srid gshin rje khyod kyi 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// ma he chu glang la sogs pa// mthun pa'i rdzas
283a5: kyis thugs dam skad/ / gshin rje pho mo 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po'i nub phyogs nas// srin po nag po klog phreng can// srin po'i tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog
283a6: mthing nag 'bar ba la/ / klog dang 'od kyis 'phreng bas brgyan// 'brug chen 'ur ba chibs su chibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// srin po 'bum phrag po nyar 'gyed// srin po gsod pa'i las la 'dzud// gcan zan
283a7: gadrug pa byi nas rol/ / 'khor du snang srid srin pos skor// srin ma skal mgo khrag mig ma// srin mo rnams kyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog dmar nag 'jigs su rung // lus la khrag gi lab nag gsol// rus sbal da/
283a8: bo'i thor tshugs can// chibs su rnga mo gdong drug chibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// srin mo kha 'bar po nyar 'gyed// gdong srin nag mo las la 'dzud// snang srid srin mo 'khor dang bcas// srog gcod srin po yas

283b1: yum 'khor/ / dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// 'brug sngon rnga mo la sogs pa// mthun pa'i rdzas lus thugs dam skang // srin po pho mo'i 'khor gyis 'khor// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab
283b2: chen po'i byang phyogs nas/ / gnod sbyin yak+Sha me dpal can// gnod sbyin kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog mthing sngon 'bar ba la// me dpung chub ma na bzar gsol// stag seng rngam pa'i chibs su chi bas/ khyod/
283b3: kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// g.yas na me pal 'bar ba la// g.yon na dung 'thul pU ru ru// gnod skyon sde tshogs pho nyar 'byed// zhub chas 'bum sde las la 'dzud// 'jig rten gnod sbyin 'khor gyis skor/ gnod sbyin
283b4: chen po blon mon ma/ / gnod sbyin bu mo gdug pa can// nag mo rdo rje lcags mchu ma// snyan cha rin chen ne'u les brgyan/ sku la ba ti nag po gsol// chibs su lcags kyi phag mo tshabs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// nor 'dzin
283b5: mo ni pho nyar 'gyed/ / klo mon nag mo las la 'dzud// gnod sbyin mo ni 'bum sdes skor// shan pa gnod sbyin yab yum 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// stag seng pho mo la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis
283b6: thugs dam skang / / gnod sbyin pho mo 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po'i steng phyogs su// bza' bdud chen po mi bzad pa// rog ti khyab 'jug ra hu la// bza' bdud sde dpon chen po bzhengs// mgo
283b7: dgu smad sbrul mgo mangs lus/ / chibs su 'brug chen glog gyu chibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// 'brug sgra stong gsum ldi ri ri// nam mkha' glog 'od lcags se khrugs// gza' bran rgyu skar pho nyer 'phyed// thog gser ki kang
283b8: drag tu 'bebs/ / bza' bdud stong ga 'khor gyi 'khor// nam sman thog gi bu g.yug ma// gdong mo rnams kyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog dmar skya mdzes pa la// na bza' gu su ma rdos pa gsol// 'brug sgra glog gi 'od la zhon//

284a1: khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// bza' chen nyi zla glang la skor// rgyu skar tshogs ni zhal la 'char// lha min 'bum ni po nyar 'gyed// gdong zor ma mo las la 'dzud// zor gdong srin mo'i 'khor gyis skor// gza' stong gan
284a2: sma na yab yum 'khor/ / dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// 'brug cher 'ur ba la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam skad// bza' bdud gdong mo sman dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod/
284a3: ri rab chen po'i 'og phyogs nas// klu bdud nag mo mgo dgu po// klu rnams kun gyi sde dpon yin// sku stod dud kha nag po la// tsha ba'i bu srid nyi li li// sku smad dug sbrul nag po la// grang ba'i sbal lhod pra la la// chibs su chu
284a4: srin mgo dgu chibs/ / khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// klu rgyal stod ni pho nyar 'gyed// klu bran 'bum ni las la 'dzud// klu bdud gdug pa'i'ikhor gyis skor// klu mo yak+Sha nag mo ni// klu bdud ma mo'i sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog
284a5: dung kha 'jigs bag can/ / sbrul nag bshibs pa'i ral pa las// mdze dang shu ba'i tsho tsha 'phro// sbrul gyi thul ban bzar gsol// sbal sprul nye'u tharar// ru sbal nag po chibs su chibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul sbyin pa
284a6: ni/ / klu rigs lnga'i sprul pa 'gyed// sa bdag gdug pa'i pho nya gtong // snang srid klu mo'i 'khor dang bcas// gdug pa klu bdud yab yum 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// chu srin rus sbal la sogs
284a7: ba'i/ / mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam skad // klu bdud po mo yab yum 'khor// ji ltar bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po mdzes pa'i// bang rim gnyis pa'i shar phyogs la// gnod sbyin rgyal po gang ba
284a8: bzang / srid pa lha'i sde pon bzhengs// mdog dkar ral ka' bar ba gsol// gnam du dkar po chi bas su chibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni// gnod sbyin stong na po nyar 'gyed// lha dmag 'bum sdoms pa 'dzud// bdan

284b1: can na g.yas nas rol/ / go mtshon can ni g.yon nas rol// gnad sbyin lha'i 'khor dang bcas// skyes bu gnas rgyal chen po ni// rgyul phran kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' dang zab ber chen gsol// ta dkar
284b2: rdog par chibs su che bas/ / khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// rgyal phran mang po po nyar 'gyed// gro rgyu pra mo los la 'dzud// bre rgyal phra mo'i 'khor dang bcas// spyi bdud rgyal po gu ru ma rtse// mi ma lha'i sde dpon bzhengs// sku stod rgya che'i
284b3: glag pa gsol/ / 'bum byed smad kyi sham thabs can// dbul shel smog dkar po gsol// chibs su rdo rta dro bo chebs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// sred pa'i khyud chen glang nas lding // stag seng tshad ma khyi nas rol//
284b4: sde dpon mched lnga pho nyar 'gyed// ma sangs spyan dgu las la 'dzud// lha ma srin gyi 'khor dang bcas// skyes bu dkar po sde gsum yang // dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// gnam ru rta dkar dro bo chibs// mthun
284b5: pa'i rdzas kyi thugs dam skrang / / dkar po sde gsum 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// bang rim gnyis pa'i lho phyogs nas// ma tshan srid pa'i rgyal mo ni// snang srid ma mo'i sde dpon bzhengs// na bza'
284b6: dar nag gu zu gsol/ / chibs su 'brug mo yid mgyogs chibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bston pa ni// tshogs kyi rje mo pho nyar 'gyed// sman mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad 'khor// snang srid ma mo'i tshigs kyis skor// e ka rtsa ti la gcig ma// bka'
284b7: bsrungs ma'i sde dpon ni/ / skul na bza' mthing nag gsol// chibs su dri rta nag mo chibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni// srin mo nag mo pho nyar 'gyed// bal mo nag mo las la 'khor// mon mo nag mo sna tshogs sbrul/
284b8: smug nag 'bum gyis 'khor dang bcas// dpal ldan nag mo mgyogs byed ma// mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' mthing nag gu zu gsol// chibs su so bya rog po zhon// khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni// rigs

285a1: kyi mkha' 'gro pho nyar 'gyed/ / sna tshogs mkha' 'gro las la 'dzud// snang srid mkha' 'gro'i 'khor gyis skor// dpal ldan nag mo sde gsum yang // dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// 'brug dang dri ste
285a2: so bya sogs/ / mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam skar // nag po sde gsum 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// bang rim gnyis pa'i nub phyogs nas// skyes bu rdo rje bdud 'dul ni// gnod sbyin rA tra'i sde dpon
285a3: bzhengs/ / nam bza' mthing na ga ber chen gsol// ral pa nag po mun ltar stobs// chibs surta 'dre nag po chibs// zhing lpags gyon pa pho nyar 'gyed// ral chas bgos pa las la 'dzud// snang srid ru tra'i 'khor gyis bskor// btsan
285a4: rgyal srog zan dmar po ni/ / srid pa'i bcan gyis sde dpon bzhengs// sku la dar dkar ral dmar gsol// chibs su rta dmar glog 'gru chi bas// khyod kyi cho 'phral ston pa ni// dbul bse smog dmar po gsol// btsan po kha bzhi
285a5: bo nyar 'gyed/ / mgyogs pa sde brgyad las la 'dzud// snang srid dregs pa'i btsan gyis bskor// skyes pra yam shud dmar po ni// bcan 'god rnams kyi sde dpon bzhengs// sbrul zab dmar ber chen gsol// chibs su rta dmar
285a6: yid 'gyogs chibs/ / khyod kyi tshe 'bral bstan pa ni// g.yas su bro brdung tshi la li// g.yon na phyugs glu ku ru ru// rta bzhon stong ni phyin 'breng // srid pa'i btsan gong 'khor dang bcas// skyes mchog dmar po sde gsum ni// dam
285a7: tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs/ / dri ni gca dmar la sogs pa'i/ mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam skad // dmar po sde gsum 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// bang rim bzhi pa'i byang phyogs nas// b+hin
285a8: yag bgegs kyi rgyal/ / log 'dren kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs// nam bza' mthing nag zer chen gsol// tshabs su rtanag 'gyogs pa chibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni// rgyal chen bzhi ni pho nyar 'gyed// phyogs skyong tshogs

285b1: kyi mkha' 'gro po nyar 'gyed/ / sna tshogs mkha' 'gro las la 'dzud// sdang srid mkha' 'gro'i 'khor gyis skor// dpal ldan nag mo sde gsum yang // dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// 'brag dang dri ste
285b2: so bya sogs/ mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam skang // nag po ste gsum 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// bang rim gnyis pa'i nub phyogs nas// skyes bu rdo rje bdud 'dul ni// gnod sbyin du tra'i sde dpon
285b3: bzhengs/ / nam bza' mthing na ga per chen gsol// ral pa nag po mun ltar stobs// chibs sun 'drenag po chibs// zhing lpags gyon pa po nyar 'gyed// ral chas bgos pa las la 'dzud// snang srid ru tra'i 'khor gyis bskor/ btsan
285b4: rgyal srog zan dmar po ni/ / srid pa'i bcan gyis sde dpon bzhengs// sku la dar dkar ral dmar gsol// chibs su rta dmar glog 'gru chibs// khyod kyi tshe 'phral ston pa ni// dbul bas srog dmar po gsol// btsan po kha bzhi
285b5: bonyar 'gyed/ / mgyogs pa sde brgyad las la 'dzud// snang srid dregs pa'i btsan gyis bskor// skyes pra yam shud dmar po ni// bcan 'god rnams kyi sde dpon pazhengs// sbrul zab dmar ber chen gsol// chibs su ta mar
285b6: yid 'gyogs chibs/ / khyod kyi tshe 'phral bstan pa ni// g.yas su bro brdung tshi la li// g.yon na phyugs glu kU ru ru// rta bzhon stong ni phyin 'breng // srid pa'i btsan gong 'khor dang bcas// skyes mchog dmar po sde gsum ni// dam
285b7: tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs/ / dri na ga ca mar la sogs pa'i/ mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam skad // dmar po sde gsum 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// bang rim bzhi pa'i byang phyogs nas// b+hin
285b8: ya ga bgegs kyi rgyal/ / log 'dren kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs// nam bza' mthing nag zer chen gsol// tshabs su rta nag 'gyogs pa chibs// khyod kyi cho 'phral ston pa ni// rgyal chen bzhi ni pho nyar 'gyed// phyogs skyong tshogs

286a1: dpon yin/ / mthar shes kyi nam bza' gsol// kun kyang shes kyi nam bza' gsol// radakar nam du chibs su tshabs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// 'dzin gang dgu bcu po nyar 'gyed// rang gi 'khor
286a2: sde las la 'dzud/ / tsar bya khyi la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyi thugs dam skang // ba ram gsum pa'i byang phyogs la// lha chen nag po chen pos ste// bstan pa'i bsrungs pa'i sde dpon bzhengs// nam bza' lding
286a3: nag per nag gsol/ / tshabs su bdud rta tha nag chibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// lha dmag phyogs kyi dbugs 'byin cing // lha mini g.yul ngo rab tu bzlog/ phyogs skyong dpal mgon las la 'dzud// me rta ra lug bya
286a4: dang khyi/ / nag po'i tshogs kyis thugs dam skang // dregs pa'i bka' nyan sgo bsrungs bzhi// rang gi bka' nyan 'khor dang bcas// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam skad // dbang chen
286a5: bde bzhi 'khor dang bcas/ / ji ltar bcol ba'i zin las mdzod// bang rim tha ma'i phyogs bzhin// bya'i lha srin sde brgyad dang // nang gi lha srin sde brgyad dang // sbas pa'i lha phrin sde brgyad dang // gsang ba'i lha srin sde brgyad dang /
286a6: yang gsang gter gyi lha srin dang // drag po'i sngags kyi lha srin dang // las byed myur mgyogs lha srin dang // brtags shing chags pa'i lha srin dang // sde brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa la// khyod kyi thugs dam skad pa ni// shem ldan
286a7: mi dang cang shes te/ / theg chen glang dang 'dod 'jo'i ba// rin chen lug dang gtsang ldan pa// thos gsang khyi dang mkha' lding bya// khyod kyi bzhed pa'i sgor du 'bul// rin chen rgyan ldan dar mi dang // sems kyi gzugs ldan dar mi dang /
286a8: su gsung thugs ldan rgyang bu dang // shing thud yul mkhar mtshon pa dang // pho zung mda' dang / mo thung 'bang// rgyal mtshan pa dan rol mo rnams// nyid kyi sku mdog dang mthun pa// rnal 'byor rnams kyi nyid du 'bral// dam rdzas sbyar

286b1: ba'i mchod gtor dang / / mthun rdzas ldan pa'i bshos cha dang // snang gsal 'od ldan par me dang // rgyan ldan mdzes pa'i gling tshad dang // mdze sa bI gzugs dang snyan pa'i sgra// zhim pi'i dri dang brda pa'i ro// khyod kyi thugs dam skad phyir 'bul
286b2: 'jig rten dregs pa 'khor dang bcas/ / sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs te// mdo blad mthun rdzas bzhed pa'i skor// sna tshogs sbyar ba 'di bzhes la// sangs rgyas bstan pa khyod kyis bsrungs// dkon mchog dbu 'phang khyed
286b3: kyis stod/ / rnal 'byor sku sgra khyed kyis sgrol// sgrub pa po la bar gcod pa'i// stong phrag brgya bcu'i bgegs rigs dang // bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams dang // blo bur gnod pa brgyad bcu cig/ ye 'grogs sum
286b4: brgya drug bcu'i tshogs/ / dus min 'chi ba rnam brgyad dang // bshis ngan 'gum pa brgya bcu cig/ gzugs can sgra dang gzugs med bgegs// rmi lam mtshan bltas ngan pa rnams// zhi dang gsal zhing bzlog pa dang //
286b5: gdul dang cher gcod las mdzod cig/ zhes brjod rang gi mthun rdzas stab// bskang bzlogs gsad dang gso la sogs// ji ltar 'dod pa'i phrini las bcol// gang la dmigs pa de bzhin 'grub// zhes bka' stsal to//
286b6: 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can gyi sde dpon 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// mchod bstod rgya chen po'i sgo nas nye bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dregs pa'i 'khor tshogs 'di rnams kun// ngo bo rang
286b7: rig byang chub sems/ / ma skyes dbyings las g.yos pa med// 'jig rten gnas dang mthun 'jug cing // mchod dang bstod pas mnyes 'gyur bas// 'jig rten mchod bstod zhes su brjod// phyi nang gsang ba'i bye brag ste// sngang
286b8: dang srid pa'i dkyil 'khor kun/ / gsang ba'i bdag po de nyid dang // gnas skabs mchod bstod bya yin no// dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin las byung // rang gi snang ba 'dus pa'i tshogs// dbang po'i yul gyi longs spyod dang // gtsang

287a1: sgra'i rtog pa snang ba'i rdzas/ / 'dod chags bzhi dang 'bru bcud rtsi// gnyis med pha rol snang byed pa// rang gi dang du mnyes byed cing // so so'i mtshan dang dpe byed dag/ nges par bstan pa nang gi'o// sems dang
287a2: sems la ster ba'i tshogs/ / thams cad ye nas dkyil 'khor che// ma bcos rang bzhin lhun gyis grub// 'ung nas ma lus 'dus pa las// chos gzhan med de yul nyid dang // yul du 'dzin pa snang ba'i bdag/ gnyis
287a3: med rtogs shing khong du chud/ / mchod bstod rab tu gsang ba'i// lus las sprul zhing bsgrubs pas sku// 'bru bcu sgra'i 'khor lo gsung // rang grol snying po ma bcos thugs// lha klu gnod sbyin bcan dang bdud// srin
287a4: po bza' dang mo rigs rnams/ / dregs shing gdug pa' khro zhing gtum// myur mi gyogs rmugs shing thibs pa dang // drag dang dbyings pa so so'i bde// ri rab bshos gas du brgyan dang bcas// 'bru lug snying brtse rtsa ru'i dbyig//
287a5: dkar dmar bcud ldan dmigs kyis mchod// pha dang rgyal po grogs dang l-I// ma dang rje khol bran lta bu// brten pa rang gi tshul yin no// che btsan dbang gi dngos grub dang // longs spyod 'phel zhing mngag par blang // rgyud 'dzab
287a6: skyabs che bka' nyan zhing / / drag rtsal ldan zhing slar mi ldog/ shin tu nye bar yon tan ste// rang la nub cing 'chi ba dang // longs spyod mi 'byor mi 'phrod dang // blo bur nad kyis gzir byed cing // slar ldog bkra shis nyams pa dang //
287a7: bsgo ba mi nyan don med cing // rang rgyud nub cing khengs pa dang // rigs rgyud ma smin kun gyis brnyas// bsams don mi grub mang 'thang nyams// rgyud don sbas pa ma shes ston// khrims kyi bdag po lta bu'i lha// gnad kyis bcing
287a8: zhing bsgrub par bya/ dbang chen pa dang mtshungs pa'i bdud// mtshungs mid thogs dang 'dra ba'i bcan// gnod sbyin khrims kyi gcol bu// srin po srog la rgol ba'i gshed// gab 'anod lag lan gzhon lta bu/ sdong bu du/

287b1: sbrul lta bu'i klu// mo rlung dbang chen rje dpon ma// mtshungs ldan de'i gnyen spos bsgrub// lugs sum bcug sgo mnyan// so long gnod med bdud du 'gyur// bcud phung mthebs slar la ldog/ rang gi rab rol ma
287b2: bzhir g.yel/ / lte ba ma dkrugs las mi myur// log non ma ldan bdag nyid stob// dbang dum 'dus sgo mi nyan// gnad kyis man ngag rgyad kyis ni// mchod bstod sbubs te 'phrin las bcol// zhes bka'
287b3: stsal to/ / 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi zab pa'i mchod bstod gnad kyi le'u s+ye/ drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya// 'jig rten dregs pa'i sdeng dpon rnams// drug po las
287b4: la sbyar ba ni/ / dur khrod bdug pa'i gnas dag tu// rtsa ba'i bsnyen pa sngon song nas// so so'i mthun pa'i rdzas bsar ste// drag po'i las kyis khang pa ni// e dbyibs sum bcur ldan par bsham// phyi nang gas
287b5: ba sku gsung thugs/ / gnas byin brlab dang skad dang mchod// spyi dang so sor sngags pa dag/ rab tu bde bar 'dod pas dmigs// gzugs sgra bsam pa'i nus pa yis// lus dang lus kyi 'khrul 'khor dang //
287b6: srog dang srog gi gnyen po yis// sems dang sems kyi ngo bo lngas// phyi nang kun du sngags pa ste// 'phro 'du 'od kyis drang zhing bgug/ rang gzhan dmigs pa de la snyim// sha lus khrag sogs ma lus bzos
287b7: dregs pa'i sde dpon sku gsung thugs/ / ma lus mnyes pa 'di yis bya// gang la dmigs pa chad kyis sgrol// ting nge 'dzin gyis brtul shugs kyis// bul dang myur ba blo'i stobs// 'di la the tshom mi bya ste/
287b8: rdo rje 'chang chen gas ba'i bka'// gal te 'bar bas mngon spyod cing // myur du 'pho bar bya ba ni// rdo rgal tsha rtsub dri nga ba'i// yam shing gdug pas dbyings lngan cig/ rdol pa rigs ngan shan pa dang // g.yung

288a1: me thogs bral khyim kyims/ / spar zhing drug khrag mngang ba las// gzugs brtad rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i// slar yang dmigs te lhag ma dbul// btso dang 'khor gyis rab bye ba'i// drag po
288a2: tshig gis rab tu bgrang / / dregs pa'i bdag po so so'o// che brjod gnad dang bcas pa yis// sgrub cing sbyin pa rim bzhin bya// drang srong phrin las rdzogs par skul// thal cher dang ni drag po'o rdzas// che khrag
288a3: gsum dang gsod byed gsum/ / mtshon bral rin chen gsum gyi dbyig/ rang byung bkra shis bzlog pa'i rdzis// nang du 'dra'i zor sbyar ba ni// sgra tshigating nge 'dzin ldan pas// stobs chen 'khor los dbab tsa
288a4: 'bad / / dregs pa 'khor bcas las su dmigs// gzhan yang mchod rdzas gzugs brnyan byas// rab tu bstan pa'i dmigs pos snyim// 'gyu gnas sa dang chu phug dang // srag sher 'thab dang bud shul dang /
288a5: rgya mtsho'i dbus dang lam po che// mtshon gyis brdegs dang rlung gi skyal// bag med lhung zhing me chus 'joms// lugs nas byung ba'i rten 'brel te// brnag pa'i yid kyis 'dzin bur gdab// gdug byed 'khor
288a6: dang zas su gtang / / ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs par// thar par mi 'gyur las kyi ging // byams dang snying rje'i sems ma rtogs// 'di ltar mngon par spyad pa yis// bstan la rab sdang phyir gyur pa'i// rjes
288a7: 'brang log par lta ba rnams/ / tshar gcod sgrol zhing 'dul ba yi// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi de dpon chen po'i phrin las drag po'i las la sbyar ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad
288a8: pa ni/ / 'jig rten dregs pa rang gi gdang // gsang ba'i snying po drag shul gzungs// kun sdus dril dang phye mas gnan// badz+ra sarba du stan// e ka ba ra oM sta na ya/ ma ta shar de ba de bi du phrag dun ting ma/ pre ta

288b1: bri kri sta na rag sha rag sha yag kA k+Shi ta/ byi tri pa tra a se la dza na ga gu ling sha dza/ tsa du tri tsa ra tsa la ma du tri// ma ma ru lu man tra ra tsa du ma ti/ ma ka la ru tra ti ga sA s+thi ra thi ke tha/ a b+hi shu tri ba sha li hi
288b2: tri pra ra tsa kid ka ra/ su t+ya trin tha ka la/ a gad cha/ hring hring/ dza/ bod pa'i sngags so// badz+ra sarba du stan e ka ba ra sarba ban tsa a mri ta a gad dza/ b+ha ling takri/ a mi ta gr-i danan du ma hA gan pra tsa kha kha kha hi la
288b3: si'ang dag sbyar bas mchod par 'gyur/ / sarba a yu mi tra sid d+he pu tra ba ra ti ni/ sid d+hi pu ta b+ha hu b+had ta b+ha su d+ha ra rad na rad na pas ting sid d+hi/ ma hA dz+nyA na sarba d+harma gar b+ha ka ya bag k+Sha tsit+ta sid d+hi sid d+he/ pa la sid d+hi ma hA sid
288b4: d+hi a be sha ya a/ ha ha hi ho/ rab tu sbyar bas dngos grub blang / sarba sha truM ya k+Sha rbad rbad b+h+yo b+ho// 'di yis rab tu rbad par bya/ nI hud bruMs dza dza/ sha tru rtse ta ma ra ya rbad/ ru ba ya ka na nga drung chud paT paT ma ra mar nus
288b5: thus/ han tan/ da had ta/ ba tsa ba tsa/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ thun cad thun rbad/ 'di yis dmigs pa rab tu gsad/ ma ma ra ya pri pre ta ka hri trang / tri sha pha li ru ba ya/ bi d+ha bi d+ha/ hu lu hra lA/ rbang mnan la nan/ oM na ra/ hUM dan/ staM ba
288b6: yasrA pa ya rAn/ / zhes pa yis ni ga da par bya/ sarba mar ta ka ra / dz+wa la raM dz+wal pa/ swo s+pho ta ya/ ho ha ya ho ha ya/ ra tsa ya ra ku ya/ zhes pa ma lus bsreg par bya mar sha truM thun b+h+yo thu ma ril b+h+yon kun/ a b+hi sha yats+tsha/
288b7: dmigs pa 'di mas 'bang bar bya'o// badz+ra u tsa ta ma paT a bris brdzog/ sa ma sa rbad/ sa rgyags bzlog/ pa rol nus pa 'di yis bzlog/ ma hA b+ha ri ga ya/ a b+he sha ya pra tsa ya/ b+he tsa la~M Sh+T+r-i tsa la/ zhes

289a1: u na du na sla nan ga sngags tu ga sa
289a2: tha sa k+Sha A.A/ / blan pas tham pa dang bsgrub pal// ldan pa'i sa ga na / da
289a3: yul zhing / / kun tu khyab pa'i mtshad sbyin bya// zha dang rgyas dang dbang bya// drag gis sprul zhing char gcod pa'i// las kun rang bzhin don du spyad/ 'jig rten gnas shi'i sreg dang sted// le gegs sa pa nga gyu
289a4: gnas/ / mngon du rmya ba thugs la ste// rid krung phra mo khrag dang dus// chags sdang snying srog snying rje gcor// rdo rje pad ma rlung dang gnas// thabs dang shes rab chos can dang // chos nyid las dang 'bras bu yis// mi 'a
289a5: gnad 'chang bor dang drang / / grogs dang ldan pas las la sbyar// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi las sna tshogs kyi rtsa ba'i snying po gnad kyi le'u ste/ brgyad pa'o// de nas yang ni bshang
289a6: bya ba/ / 'jig rten dregs pa'i gtso chen rnams// tshul bzhin rab tu bsgrubs pa yis// grub cing nye ba'i rtags rnams ni// nyams dang zad rtags rmi lam rtags// 'di la so so'i 'byung 'gyur te// dga' zhing
289a7: mdangs ldan stobs rnyed dang / / bde dang rtogs pa spro bskyed cing // mngon rgyu yid kyis gdeng thob kyis// nyams pa bag tsha dogs med cing // nus ldan phrin las mthar phyin rtogs// 'di dag la sogs rim par 'byung //
289a8: lus 'jam dbugs kyi mi gnod cing // yang zhing brtan la khyad par dga'o// nad dang gdon gyis brdzi mi nus// 'byung ba'i nus pas mi skrod cing // kha dog dang ldan sdug cing mdzes// 'di la sogs pa lus 'byung gda'

289b1: ji ltar sgo ba gzhan gyis 'dzin/ / rang dang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsungs// mthun pa'i tshul gyis mi dor la// snyan dang mi snyan ci brjod rnams// tshangs pa yi dbyangs bzhin du 'od// grag thos tsam gyis
289b2: dbang byed/ / tshul mdzes 'jug pa ngag gi brda'// gang la brtsams pa de 'grub cing // ma zhum mi spor mi 'dor bas// dbang dang ldan zhing mi g.yo la// gsang ba'i mthu stobs rab tu thob// yid kyi yul du brda 'byung
289b3: ba'i/ / snga phyi de ma thag pa'o// bag chags ma yin rmi lam ni// rgyal po mkhan pa slob dpon dang // che ba can rigs ldan brgyan bcas ldan// gcan zan 'dab chags dud 'gro dang // skyes pa bud med byis pa sogs//
289b4: rang gi gnas su lhags pa ni// nye bar 'grub pa'i rtags yin no// bran 'bangs ma dag pa'i tshul 'chang zhing // bka' bsgo las byed nyan pa rtags// ring ba'i gnas nas klu len cing // rgyang mig blta ba gas/
289b5: ba'i rtags// rang la chad pa'i las rtsom zhing // nyes lan 'dod pa bzlog pa'i rtags// zas skom 'dod cing 'khrig lan bsnyag/ rang nyid gnod 'gyod ma skongs rtags// 'dzem zhing dud mos 'debs byed pa// ma
289b6: ngag lus snang nyams pa'i rtags/ / rang gi sgo ba mi nyan zhing // slar zhing tshur la 'khol 'dod pa// gnyen pos dbang du ma gyur rtags// mtshon cha brdungs zhing tshad ma ldan// nus med bya ba mi 'grub pas// sngags
289b7: kyis nus pa ma grub rtags/ / gzhan 'dod rang la med pa dang // ngang gi yod pa 'dod med rnams// mchod kad mthun rdzas mtshang rtags// sha rus khrag sogs longs spyod cing // ngo mthon rab tu che ba na// las byas

290a1: 'grub pa'i rtags yin no/ / pha rol dmag tshogs ma byung zhing // sgo med khang par bdag zhugs la// ngan sngags gzhan gyis bzlog pa'i rtags// bye brag sde brgyad ma son// mi dang dud 'gro 'dab chags
290a2: sogs/ / po tshogs nag po bdud kyi rtags// mo tshogs brgyan bzang ma mo ste// che btsan 'bag seng gtsug lag khang // smras pa spu sme rgyal po'i rtags// mi rta khra spyang ri dgas ni// brag tsan ri tsan brtags yin no//
290a3: chu gnas dud 'gro klu'i rtags// ma her lug dmig mangs dang // mun pa bu yug gza'i rtags// skyes pa chas bzang 'byor pa dang // ri mtsho la gnas gnod sbyin rtags// nyab shan pa bya ba dang // dmag gi go
290a4: srin po'i rtags/ / 'di dag sngar bshad bzang ngan sbyar// bye brag bsgrub pa'i rtags su gyur zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten sde dpon chen po bsgrub pa'i rtags kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad
290a5: ba/ / dregs pa can gyi khyad par rdzas// mdzes pa'i gzugs brnyan sku'i rten// ming nas 'bod pa gsung gi rten// phyag mtshan dam pa thugs kyi rten// lug g.yag dkar po sbal sbrul nya// glang rta sngon po rin po che/
290a6: g.yul ba shams myur bsgral bya gcan dang / del bu shel nag byin ga dang // ta lug khyi dang rgod nag dang / rabag bya khyi dkar pod dang/ maklor rog dom khyeganag/ sbrul bya rgod dang smai dang // rtar bya khyo dmang po yi/ TI
290a7: thags ga dang rgyal yin na/ / zug ny-i can pa dang / mamangon rgyam bgag/ da nams kyi/ sa tshan ma ma na pa / mardzogs da med do// ga

290b1: thong pa mtshon cha phur pa bdag/ drag khrag rin chen drag po'i 'bru// kun rdzogs rab tu gsang ba'i rdzas// klu bzung sdod ne sha khrag bcas// ru bzangs rigs med slar song chu// myu gu sna tshogs dri ldan rdzas// chu drag rba rabs
290b2: dud pi rjes yin no/ / mchod rten ri rab brgyar bcas// rma rdzas rigs ngan mgo bo gsum// dmigs pa'i 'bab rdzas pad ma ni// slar la bzlog pa'i rdzas yin no// nad sdug po rim mgo rkang rnams// rab tu mnan pa'i rdzas
290b3: yin no/ / drag khrag tshogs dang mtshan ma ngan// dmigs pa'i rten la 'phang ba'i rdzas// ngan pa'i sa'i rten khang dang // gdug cing rab tu tsha ba'i shing // 'brun ga dug khrag sreg bI rdzas// gzhan yang dbang can dregs pa'i 'khor// so so'i rigs
290b4: dang sder bcas pa'i/ / mthun dang mi mthun gtsang dang rme// sngags pa'i kun rdzas shes par 'gyur// ma 'ongs dus na rdo rje 'chang // rang gi rigs 'dzin byang chub sems// rdul zhugs can gyi 'grub pa yis// dbus na mtha' 'khob
290b5: yul rnams dang / / sangs rgyas zhing gi 'jig rten khams// kun nas sde dpon g.yog bcas pa'i// yid dang dngos po'i lus can rnams// khams dang rigs pa bsam pa dang // skyed pa rten gnas yo byad dang // ma lus rdzob
290b6: par rab tu rtogs/ / shes ldan mig can rnams la ston// de tshe dregs pa'i gtso tshon rnams// de ltar nga yis gdams pa yin// yang dag don lam 'ad cig/ khyed rnams kyang ni dus nam zhig/ las kyi gnas ngan len spangs
290b7: te/ / de bas bka'i dam mnos la// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin bsgrubs shig/ gsang chen de'i bstan pa'i tshul// phyi rol phyogs la sogs pa yis// nyams zhing smad par mi 'gyur bas// rgyas shing bstan par khyod kyis byos// /
290b8: zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po'i rten rdzas dang // las kyi gnyer sgo ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid gsang ba chen

291a1: po'i sku'i rnam par rol pa chen po de dag nyid kyi sku la rab tu bsdus mdzad de/ dgyes pa'i gsung gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// bdud dang gshin
291a2: la sogs pa'o/ / 'jig rten pa dge gtso chen rnams// mthar thug mya ngan 'das nas kyang // dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bstan pa'i mtha' tshigs 'grub pa dang // rnal 'byor lam gyi grogs mdzad byir// khrag zed
291a3: sku gsung thugs nyid dang / / yon tan phrin las sna tshogs ston// phyi ma'i dus na rig pa 'dzin// skyes bu brtson ldan rnams kyi ni// gnyis su 'dzin pa yod mi bya// yul snang phyi nang ma lus kun// rang rig sems kyi rtsa
291a4: por sgrub/ de ni ma bcos yal mi bral// ma chad ma lhung bdag po med// gnyis med mnyam nyid lhun gyis grub// des 'gyur sprad blang rtsol sems bral// ma lus rtsa ba snying gi srog/ de nyid shes bya rab tu blad// dbang gi rgyal/
291a5: bo 'char bar 'gyur// gal te de dang dregs pa can// so so rang rgyud ldan pa yi// gnyis 'dzin yid kyis rtog spyod cing // mtshan ma rab tu sgom byed pa// rkang med khams gsum spyod 'dod cing // mig med stong gsum
291a6: lha dang mtshungs/ / bdud bzhi dga' ba skyed par byed// de bas rigs mchog ma rnams kyis// gsang bdag nga nyid shes par gyis// zhes bka' stsal nas// nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po chos nyid
291a7: de bzhin nyid thos dang bral ba'i dbyings su zim mdzad do/ / 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po 'khor dang bcas pa chos sku mthar thug tu sgrub par gdams pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// dregs pa can gyi sde dpon
291a8: 'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa rtsa ba'i rgyud zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho/ / // ye d+harmA he tu pra b+hA ba he tun te ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba dang / teShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA tI ma hA sha ma NaH/
